Un o Jesuseskre mala wan ap i wawar panjeskri rig, un haiwan, te bistran le o maro lentsa te lell.
Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "Denn jak! O shutlo jarro hi gar mishto, hoi well i Farisarjendar un i Saddukarjendar!"
Har jon kowa shunan, rakran le pral leskre laba un penan: "Mer lam kek maro mentsa. Doleske penas lo kowa menge."
O Jesus haiwas, hoi jon penan, un job penas ap lende: "Hoske rakrenn tumer pral o maro, hoi tumer bistran? Hawo tikno patsepen hi tumen!
Tumer haiwan man gar. Bistran tumer kol pantch mare, hoi dom kol pantch serja menshende te chal? Un pal ko chapen hadan tumer deesh-te-dui marengre gone pherdo maro pre, hoi pral atchas.
Un bistran tumer ninna kol efta mare, hoi dom kol star serja menshende te chal? Un pal ko chapen hadan tumer efta marengre gone pherdo maro pre, hoi pral atchas.
Haiwenn tumer kanna, kai me rakrom gar pral o maro, har penom: Denn jak! O shutlo jarro hi gar mishto, hoi well i Farisarjendar un i Saddukarjendar!"
Un koi haiwan le, te rakras lo gar pral o shutlo jarro, hoi lenn le, te pekenn le maro. Job rakras pral kol laba, hoi i Farisarja un i Saddukarja i menshenge penenna.
O Jesus djas pash o foro Cesarea Filipi. Un kote putchas lo peskre malendar: "Hoi penenn i menshe pral o Menshengro Tchaweste?"

Un leskre mala penan ap leste: "Jon penenna, tu hal o Johanni, kowa, kai thowas i menshen an o pani. Wawar penenna, kai tu hal o Elija. Un wawar penenna, kai tu hal o Jeremia. Un pale wawar penenna, kai tu hal i Debleskro rakepaskro, kai i mulendar pre stas."
Penas lo: "Un hoi penenn tumer, koon me hom?"
Penas o Simon Petro: "Tu hal o baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas te well job. Tu hal o tchawo o djido Deblestar."
Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Bachtelo hal tu, Simon Bar-Jona. Kol laba, hoi tu pral mande penal, kolla wan gar tutar, witar gar wawar menshendar. Miro dad an o bolepen sikras tut kowa.

Doleske penau tuke: Tiro lab hi kanna Petro. Kowa, hoi tu kate penal, hi har i sorelo bar, ap koleste tchiwau miro kheer. Un miro kheer hi kolla, kai patsenn ap mande. Un kek nashte lell len dran mire wasta win, ninna kek merepen.

Me dau tut i klidepaskro, hoi krell o wudar pre, te wenn i menshe ap miro drom. Ap koleste, kai tu peneh: O Dewel las tiri doosh tutar, kolestar hi li krik lino. Ap koleste, kai tu peneh: Tiri doosh atchell ap tute, ap koleste atchell leskri doosh tchiddo."
Pal kowa penas lo peskre malenge, te penenn le kekeske, te hi lo ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job.

Un ap ko tsiro penas o Jesus peskre malenge, te hunte djal lo an o foro Jerusalem. Un job penas lenge: "Me hunte lap bud duka ap mande. I bare rashaja, un i biboldengre phureder un tchatchepangre, kolla marenn man. Un pal triin diwessa krell man o Dewel djido."
Koi las o Petro les ap i rig, un tchingras ap leste un penas: "Mo rai, ko nashte well gar. Ma muk kowa pral tute te well!"
O Jesus risras pes trujal, un penas ap o Petreste: "Dja tuke, tu beng! Tu kameh man o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell. Tu kameh gar, hoi o Dewel kamella. Na-a, tu kameh, hoi i menshe kamenna."
Palle penas o Jesus ap peskre malende: Koon ap miro drom mantsa djala, kowa hunte bistrell, hoi leske kokres mishto hi, un hunte lell peskro trushel ap peste, un djal mantsa.
Koon peskro djipen soreles kamella, kowa nashrell les. Koon peskro djipen mange nashrella, lell les mandar pale.
I mensheske wals kowa gar mishto, te lals lo o tselo brawlepen ap kai phub, un nashrals o djipen. I mensho nai dell tchi o Debleste, te lell lo ko djipen pale.

Me hom o Menshengro Tchawo. Un me wau pale ap i phub an o railepen, hoi das man miro dad an o bolepen. Un mantsa wenna mire bolepangre. Un palle dikau ap hakeneste, hoi job kras. Un me dau latcho koowa kolen, kai latcho koowa kran. Un me dau i phagi kolen, kai tchilatcho koowa kran.
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Mashkral tumende hi sawe menshe, kai merenn gar, bis te dikenn le o Menshengro Tchawes, har job o baro rai hi.
Un pal shob diwessa djas o Jesus ap i bari berga. Leha khetne djas o Petro un kol dui phrala, o Jakobo un o Johanni. Kek wawar djas lentsa.
Un glan lengre jaka las lo i bolepaskro railepen. Leskro mui was har o kham. Un leskro ripen was bijalo har i bari momeli.
Un ap jek kopo dikan le o Moses un o Elijas koi tardo, kai leha rakrenn.
Koi penas o Petro ap o Jesuseste: "Rai, hi mishto, te ham mer kate. Tu te kameh, krau me triin tikne khera kate, jek tuke, jek o Moseske, un jek o Elijeske."
Un har job jaake rakras, was i parni wolka pral lende tele. Un dran koi wolka was o rakepen, hoi penas: "Kawa hi miro tchawo! Koles kamau o djijestar. Job krell man bachtelo. Shunenn ap leste!"
Un har jon kowa shunan, witsran le pen i bari darjatar ap i phub.
Un o Jesus djas pash lende, tchiwas peskre wasta ap lende, un penas: "Stenn pre! Ma darenn!"
Un jon dikan pre, un dikan kekes buder, har o Jesuses kokres.
Un o Jesus djas lentsa koi berga tele, un penas soreles ap lende: "Penenn kekeske, hoi tumer dikan, jaake raha har o Menshengro Tchawo gar i mulendar pre stas!"
Un leskre mala putchan lestar: "Hoske penenn mare tchatchepangre, kai o Elija hunte well glan ko tsiro, kai kowa lauter wella?"
Penas lo: "Kowa hi tchatcho: O Elija wella, un anell o Debleskre menshen lauter pale khetne.
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: O Elija was pale. Jon prindjran les gar, un kran leha, hoi jon kaman. Un jaake hunte lell ninna o Menshengro Tchawo bud duka ap peste."
Kote haiwan leskre mala, te rakras lo o Johannestar, kowa, kai thowas i menshen an o pani.
Un har jon pash kol tsele menshende wan, kai kote tardo hi, was i mursh pash o Jesuseste. Kowa witsras pes glan leste ap i phub,
un penas: "Rai, kre tiro dji miro tchaweske pre! Job hi jaake nasselo, har te wals lo dinelo, un job perell ap i phub. Bud kope peras lo an i jag, un bud kope peras lo an i pani.
Me anom les pash tire malende, te krenn le les sasto. Un jon nashte kran kowa gar."
Koi penas o Jesus: "Tumer tchilatche menshe, tumen hi kek patsepen! Har raha hunte atchap pash tumende? Har raha marap man tumentsa tele? Anenn les pash mande!"
Un o Jesus das o benges trad, un penas leske, te djal job dran koleste win. Un o beng djas dran leste win. Un ko tchawo was sasto.
Koi wan o Jesuseskre mala pash o Jesuseste, har job kokres his, un putchan lestar: "Hoske tradam mer les nashte gar win?"

Penas lo ap lende: "Tumaro patsepen hi tikno. Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Te wals tumaro patsepen ninna tikno har i senftikro djob, nai penans tumer ap kai berga: Tchip tut ap koi wawar rig! Un koi berga tchiwals pes ap i wawar rig. Un tchi nashte wals, hoi tumer nashte gar krans."
Un o Jesus djas peskre malentsa an o them Galilea trujal. Ap o drom penas lo ap lende: "O Menshengro Tchawo well an i menshengre wasta dino.
Un jon marenn les. Pal triin diwessa well lo o Deblestar djides kerdo." Un ko lab dukas len an o dji.

Un jon djan an o foro Kapernaum. Kote his kolla, kai lenn o Debleskro khereskre lowe khetne. Kolla wan pash o Petreste, un putchan lestar: "Dell tumaro sikepaskro kol Debleskro khereskre lowe?" "Awa," penas lo, "kowa plaissrell job."

Un o Petro djas an o kheer dre, te penell lo kowa o Jesuseske. Har o Jesus dikas, te well o Petro pash leste, putchas lo lestar: "Petro, koon hunte dell kol lowe i bare rajende ap kai phub? Hunte denn lengre menshe lende kol lowe? Hunte denn i wi-themarja lende kol lowe?"
Penas o Petro: "I wi-themarja hunte denn kol lowe ap i bare rajende." "Mishto," penas o Jesus, "jaake hunte plaissrenna lengre menshe tchi ap lende.

Ninna te hi kowa jaake, kamah gar, te wenn le chojedo ap mende. Doleske dja pash o baro pani, un witse i raan an o pani! Ko matcho, hoi tu tapreh, koleske kre o mui pre! Un tu hatseh an leskro mui i rupeni bema. Le koi rupeni bema, un de koi bema kolende, kai len kol lowe dre! Kowa hi doha mange un tuke."
Ap ko tsiro wan leskre mala pash leste un putchan lestar: "Koon hi o bareder mashkral kolende, kai djan ap o Debleskro drom?"
Koi das o Jesus i tikno tchawes pash peste gole, un tchiwas les glan lende,
un penas: Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Tumer te mukenn gar tumaro drom, un wenn gar har i tchawe, palle nashte wenn gar ap o Debleskro drom.
Koon krell pes gar bares un well har kau tchawo, kowa hi o bareder mank kolende, kai djan ap o Debleskro drom.
Un kowa, kai lell sawo tchawo pash peste pre, kowa lell man pash peste pre.
Kowa, kai anell jekes kal tikneder, kai patsenn ap mande, miro dromestar tele, koleske wals feteder, te well leske i pharo bar trul i meen pandlo, un te well lo tassedo an o baro pani.
I bibacht hi kowa, kai della ap kai phub bud koowa, hoi anell i menshen ap o tchilatcho drom. Hawo bibacht well ap koleste, kai anell i wawaren ap o tchilatcho drom!

Te kamell tiro wast, te kress i tchilatcho koowa, de les tele un witse les tutar! Te kamell tut tiro piro ap o tchilatcho drom te anel, de les tele, un witse les tutar! Hi tuke latcheder, te nashress tu jek wast un jek piro, un leh ko djipen, hoi o Dewel tut della, har te djas tu dui wastentsa un dui pirentsa an i jag, hoi hako tsireske chatchella.

Un te kamel tiro jak tchomone te dikell, hoi anell tut ap o tchilatcho drom, palle tchin les win, un witse les tutar! Hi tuke feteder, te nashress jek jak, un leh o djipen, hoi o Dewel tut della, har te djas dui jakentsa an o bengeskri jag.
Ma tchiwenn kol tiknen ap i rig, har te wans le tchi moldo. Me penau tumenge: I bolepangre, kai ap lende jak denna, kolla nai djana hako tsiro glan miro dadeste an o bolepen, te mangenn le les lenge.
O Menshengro Tchawo was ap i phub, te anell lo kolen ap o Debleskro drom pale, kai nashedo hi.
Kowa hi jaake, har te hi i murshes sheel bakre, un jek lendar djal nashedo. Palle mukell lo kol enja-deesh-te-enja (99) bakre ap i pralstuno them tardo, un rodell ko jek bakres, hoi nashedo hi.
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Un te hatsell lo les, palle hi lo bachtleder pral ko jekeste, har pral kol tsele wawar, hoi khetne atchan.
Un jaake kamell miro dad an o bolepen gar, te djal jek kol tikneder nashedo.

Te krell tiro phraal tchilatcho koowa ap tute, palle dja pash leste kokres, un pen leske, kai kowa gar mishto hi, hoi job kras. Un te dikell lo, kai kowa tchatcho hi, hoi tu leske penal, palle anal tu tiro phrales pale ap miro drom.
Job te shunell gar ap tute, palle le dui wawar phralen tuha, un dja pash leste, te shunenn le, hoi tu leske peneh. Jaake djinenn dui, triin, hoi job kras.

Te shunell lo kau kopo witar gar ap tumende, palle pen les i patslenge an i kangri. Un te shunell lo gar ap kolende, palle well lo tumenge har i mursh, kai prindjrell o Debles gar un har i pale-tchiddo.

Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Ap koleste, kai tumer penenna: O Dewel las tiri doosh tutar, kolestar hi li krik lino. Ap koleste, kai tumer penenna: Tiri doosh atchell ap tute, ap koleste atchell leskri doosh tchiddo.
Me penau tumenge ninna: Te mangenn dui tumendar khetne tchomone o Deblestar, palle dell len miro dad an o bolepen kowa, hoi jon lestar mangan.
Un kote, kai dui, triin menshe khetne wenna an miro lab, kote hom me mashkral lende.
Koi djas o Petro pash leste, un putchas lestar: "Rai, te hi miro phraal bud kope tchilatcho ap mande, kitse kope hunte bistrap ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi job ap mande kras? Hi efta kope doha?"
Penas o Jesus ap leste: Na-a, me penau tuke, efta kope hi gar doha. Tu hunte bistress kowa efta-deesh kope un pale efta-deesh kope, jaake raha har job ap tute tchilatcho koowa krella.

Me kamau te sikrap tumende har pash kolende hi, kai djan ap o Debleskro drom. O Dewel an o bolepen hi har i baro rai. Kowa mukell peskre budepangren glan peste te anell, te lell lo lendar kol lowe, hoi jon leske khetne anan dran pengri budi.
Koi was i mursh glan leste anlo. Koles his deesh serja rupene beme sijaan pash leste.
Kowa nashte plaissras kowa gar pale. Koi penas o rai: Bikrenn les peskri romjaha, un peskre tchawentsa, un lauterentsa, hoi les hi! Un denn mande kol lowe, hoi tumer lenge dre lenna!
Koi witsras pes ko mursh glan leste ap i phub, un penas: Rai, me mangau tut: Ab latches ap mande! De man i tsiro, te nai plaissrap miri sijaan pash tute!
Un o rajes khaitas kowa, un job mukas leske leskri tseli sijaan te perell, un mukas les te djal.

Un o mursh djas dran o kheer win, un tapras i wawar budepaskres ap o drom. Kales his sheel beme sijaan pash leste. Koi tchiwas lo peskre wasta trul koleskri meen, te tassrell lo les, un penas ap leste: De man kanna mire lowe pale!
Koi witsras pes kau mursh glan ko wawareste ap i phub un penas: Me mangau tut: Ab latches ap mande, un de man i tsiro, te nai plaissrap me tuke len pale!
Ko wawar mursh kamas tchi te shunell, un witsras les an o stilepen, te atchell job kote jaake raha, har job gar koi sijaan pale plaissras.
Un har shunan kowa kol tsele wawar budepangre, kai o rajeske budrenna, dukas kowa len an o dji. Un jon djan pash o rajeste, un penan leske lauter, hoi jon shunan.
Koi das o rai ap ko mursheste gole, un penas ap leste: Tu hal i tchilatcho budepaskro. Me mukom tiri sijaan tuke te perell, har tu mandar mangal.
Jaake har dikom latches ap tute, jaake hunte dikals tu ninna latches ap koleste, kai les hi i sijaan pash tute.
Un pherdo choli das les o rai an i wasta kolendar, kai denn les dawa an o stilepen. Kote hunte atchell job jaake raha, har job gar koi sijaan pale plaissras.
Un o Jesus penas dureder: Te bistrenn tumer gar o tselo djijestar o tchilatcho koowa, hoi i wawar phraal ap tumende kras, jaake krell miro dad an o bolepen emligo tumentsa.
Un har o Jesus kowa lauter peskre malenge penas, djas lo lentsa dran o them Galilea win, un was an o them Judea wergal o pani Jordan.
Un bud menshe djan leske palla. Un job kras i nasselen kote sasto.
Un i Farisarja wan pash leste, un kaman les leskre labentsa te taprell. Un jon putchan lestar: "Nai tradell i mursh peskri romjat pestar, ninna te kras li kek tchilatchepen?"
Penas lo: "Tumer djinenn, hoi hi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo: O Dewel kras o murshes un i djuwjat.
Un job penas: Doleske mukell i mursh peskro dades un peskri da, te djiwell lo peskri romjaha khetne. Un kol dui wenna har jek.
Jaake hi le har jek un buder gar dui. Un kowa, hoi o Dewel khetne anas, kowa hunte krell i mensho gar paash!"
Penan le ap leste: "Te hi kowa jaake, hoske tchinas o Mose an peskro liil: Te kamell i mursh peskri romjat te mukell, pali hunte dell lo lat i liil, kai tchindlo hi, kai job mukas lat?"

Penas lo ap lende: "Tumaro dji hi dran bar, kai o Debleskro lab gar dre djal. Doleske tchinas o Mose, kai nai mukenn tumer tumari romjat. Ap ko tsiro, kai o Dewel i murshes un i djuwjat kras, his kowa gar jaake.
Me penau tumenge: Te hi jekes i romni, kai chochas les gar i wawar mursheha, un job mukell lat, un romedinerell i wawar djuwjat, kowa chochell peskri romjat."
Penan leskre mala ap leste: "Te hi kowa jaake, palle hi i mursheske feteder, te romedinerell lo gar."
Penas lo: "Kau lab, hoi me penom, haiwell gar hakeno. Kolen, kai o Dewel kau lab an o dji tchiwas, kolla haiwenn les.

Della menshe, kai wan jaake boldo, kai hi lenge kowa gar mishto, te romedinerenn le. Un wawar wan jaake ap o mass tchindlo, te romedinerenn le nai gar. Wawar kamenn o tselo djijestar o Debleske te budrell. Doleske romedinerenn le gar. Koneske kau lab mishto hi, kowa te krell jaake."
Koi anan le tchawen pash o Jesuseste, te tchiwell lo peskre wasta ap lende, te mangell lo o Debles, te dikell job latches ap lende. Har peskre mala kowa dikan, tchingran le ap kol menshende.
Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Mukenn kol tchawen pash mande te well! Ma rikrenn len pale! Sawe har jon, kolen das o Dewel gole, te djiwenn le khetne leha an o bolepen."
Un job tchiwas peskre wasta ap lende, un djas peske.
Un i mursh was pash leste un penas: "Sikepaskro, hawo latcho koowa hunte krap, te well man o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella?"
Penas o Jesus: "Hoske putcheh tu mandar, hoi latcho hi? O Dewel kokres hi latcho. Tu te kameh o Debleskro djipen, palle kre kowa, hoi job penas!"
Koi putchas lo lestar: "Hoi hunte krap?" Penas o Jesus: "Ma mare kekes! Ma choche tiri romjat i wawar djuwjaha! Ma tchore! Ma pen chochepen pral jekeste!
Dik ap tiro dadeste un ap tiri date, te djal lenge mishto! Un ap koleste, kai pash tute hi hunte wess jaake latches, har hal latches ap tute kokres."
Koi penas ko tarno mursh ap leste: "Kowa lauter krom. Hoi hunte krap budeder?"
Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Te kameh tu o tselo Debleskro kamlepen te krell, palle bike lauter, hoi tut hi! Un de kol lowe i tchorwelende! Palle hi tut i brawlepen an o bolepen. Un am un dja mantsa!"
Ko tarno murshes his bud brawlepen. Har job kal laba shunas, dukas kowa les. Un job djas peske.
Un o Jesus penas ap peskre malende: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Pharo hi i braweleske, te well lo ap o Debleskro drom.
Me penau tumenge ninna: Hi gar jaake pharo, te djal i baro ficho an i subjakro kand dre har te well i brawelo ap o Debleskro drom."
Har leskre mala kowa shunan, tapras len i daar. Un jon putchan lestar: "Te hi kowa jaake, koon lell nai o Debleskro djipen?"
Un o Jesus dikas ap lende, un penas: "I menshe krenn nai kowa gar. O Dewel krell nai halauter."
Koi penas o Petro ap leste: "Djineh, mer mukam lauter un djam tuha. Hoi lah mer?"

Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Ko tsiro wella, kai o Dewel lauter newes krella. Ap ko tsiro hi o Menshengro Tchawo o rai pral lauterende, un job hi beshdo ap peskro rajeskro beshepaskro. Un tumer, kai mantsa djana, tumer wenn ninna raja, un han beshdo ap deesh-te-dui rajeskre beshepangre, un rakrenn o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende, kai wenna i deesh-te-dui Israeleskre tchawendar.

Un hakeno, kai mukas peskro kheer, peskre phralen, peskre phenjen, peskro dades, peskri dat, peskre tchawen un peskro kotar them, te djal lo mantsa, kowa lell sheel kope pale, hoi job mukas. Un o Dewel dell les o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
Un bud, kai kanna glan tardo hi, kolla hi ap ko diwes palla tardo. Un bud, kai kanna palla tardo hi, kolla hi ap ko diwes glan tardo."

Un o Jesus penas lenge, har kote hi, kai dell o Dewel menshen pash peste gole, te djan le ap leskro drom. O Dewel hi har i rai, koles his i kotar them, kai drakengre ruka tardo hi. Sik taissarlake djas lo an o foro dre, un rodas peske i budepangren, te budrenn le ap leskro kotar them.
Kolentsa kras job win, te dell lo len jek rupeni bema kau diweske. Palle bitchras lo len ap peskro kotar them, te budrenn le leske.
Har enjenge his, djas job pale an o foro, un dikas wawaren, kai his len kek budi.
Ap kolende penas lo: Djan ap miro kotar them, un budrenn mange! Me dau tumen jaake bud lowe, har tumari budi moldo hi. Un jon djan kote.
Har o paash diwes trujal his, djas lo pale an o foro dre, hatsas wawaren, kai hi len kek budi, un bitchras len ninna ap peskro kotar them. Ninna har trinenge his, kras job kowa jaake.
Har pantchenge his, djas lo pale an ko foro, dikas pale wawaren koi trujal tardo, un penas ap lende: Hoske han tumer koi tardo, un budrenn gar?
Penan le: Kek das men i budi. Koi penas job: Djan ap miro kotar them, un budrenn mange kote!

Har i rati was, penas ko rai ap peskro pralstuno budepaskro: De i budepangren khetne gole, un de len lengre lowe! De kolen pengre lowe, kai an i rat wan, un palle kolen, kai o paash diwes wan, un palle kolen kai taissarlake wan!
Koi wan kolla glan leste, kai an i rat wan, un lan jek rupeni bema lestar. Un lauter, kai pal lende wan, lan ninna jek rupeni bema lestar.
Har kolla pash leste wan, kai budran o tselo diwes, patsan le, te lenn le budeder lowe. Ninna jon lan jek rupeni bema.
Koi tchingran le ap ko rajeste, un penan:
Kolla, kai an i rat wan, budran i tikno tsiro. Tu dal len jaake bud lowe har men. Tu djineh, te budram mer o tselo diwes. Un o kham chatchas soreles ap mende.
Koi penas ko rai ap jekeste lendar: Miro maal, me chochom tut gar. Tu kral mantsa win, te budress mange, un te leh jek rupeni bema mandar.
Kanna le tire lowe, un dja khere! Me kamau, te dap koleste, kai an i rat was, jaake bud lowe har tut.
Me krau nai mire lowentsa, hoi me kamau. Hoske hal tu tchilatcho ap mande, te hom me latcho?
Un o Jesus penas dureder: "Dikenn, jaake wenn bud palla tardo, kai kanna glan tardo hi. Ninna wenn bud glan tardo, kai kanna palla tardo hi."
Un job djas dureder, te well lo an o foro Jerusalem. Ap o drom las lo peskre deesh-te-dui malen ap i rig, un penas lenge:
"Shunenn, mer djah kanna an o foro Jerusalem. Kote denn le o Menshengro Tchawes an i wasta kol bare rashajendar un kol tchatchepangre murshendar. Un kolla krenn win, te well lo maredo.
Jon denn les an i wasta kolendar, kai kek bibolde hi. Un kolla praassenn les, denn les dawa i tchupnijaha, un denn les ap o trushel, te merell lo. Pal triin diwessa krell o Dewel les pale djido."
Pal kowa was o Zebedeskri romni lakre tchawentsa, o Jakobeha un o Johanneha, pash o Jesuseste. Un joi witsras pes glan leste ap i phub, te mangas li lestar tchomone.

"Hoi kameh tu?" putchas lo latar. Penas li: "Ap ko diwes, kai tu hal o baro rai pral i tsele menshende, muk mire dui tchawen ap tiri rig te beshell: Jek ap tiri tchatchi rig un ko wawar ap tiri serwi rig."
Penas o Jesus: "Tumer djinenn gar, hoi mangenna mandar. Nai lenn tumer kol duka ap tumende, hoi me hunte lap ap mande?" Penan le: "Awa, ko nai krah mer."

"Hi tchatcho," penas lo, "tumer hunte lenna bud duka ap tumende, jaake har me hunte lap len ap mande. Ninna te hi jaake, nai penau tumenge gar, koon beshell ap miri tchatchi rig un ap miri serwi rig. Kowa hi gar an miro wast. Miro dad an o bolepen rodas kolen win, kai ap miri rig beshenna."
Un har kol wawar deesh kowa shunan, wan le chojemen ap kol dui phralende.

Doleske das len o Jesus pash peste gole, un penas ap lende: "Tumer djinenna, i bare raja un i pralstune ap kai phub, len hi penepaske pral i menshende an pengre themma. Un jon rikrenn i menshen sorjaha tele. Un jon hunte shunenn ap lende un hunte budrenn lenge.
Mank tumende hunte well kowa gar jaake! Koon tumendar kamell, te well lo baro, kowa hunte well tumenge koi.
Un koon tumendar kamell o pralstuno te well, kowa hunte well tumaro budepaskro.

Ninna o Menshengro Tchawo was gar ap i phub, te budrenn i menshen leske. Na-a. Job was ap i phub, te well lo lenge koi, un te merell lo budenge. Un jaake lell lo len dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win."
Un o Jesus djas peskre malentsa dran o foro Jericho win. Un bud menshe djan leske palla.
Pash o drom his dui korele mursha beshdo. Kolla shunan, te well o Jesus ap o drom. Un jon dan gole: "Maro rai, tu Davideskro tchawo, kre tiro dji menge pre!"
Kol menshe, kai djan o Jesuseha, tchingran ap kol dujende, un penan ap lende: "Mukenn tele! Atchenn!" Koi dan jon budeder gole: "Maro rai, tu Davideskro tchawo, kre tiro dji menge pre!"
Un o Jesus atchas tardo, kharas len pash peste, un penas: "Hoi kamenn tumer, te krap tumenge?"
"Rai!" penan le, "mer mangah tut: Kre mare jaka sasto, te dikas nai pale!"
Un o Jesuseske djas kowa phares an o dji. Un job tchiwas peskre wasta ap lengre jaka. Un ap jek kopo dikan le pale. Un jon djan leha.
Ap o drom an o foro Jerusalem wan le an o gab Betfage, kai pash o djeteskri berga tchiddo hi. Un kote penas o Jesus ap dujende peskre malendar:
"Djan an o gab koi wergal! Kote hatsenn tumer i esla pandlo un lakro tarnepen pash late. Pandenn len tele, un anenn len pash mande!
Jon te putchenn tumendar, hoi tumer lentsa kamenn te krell, palle penenn lenge: Hi maro rajeske, te beshell job koi pre. Un jon denn len tumende."
Un kowa djas jaake, har o Dewel kowa glan i raha tsiro ap o Debleskro rakepaskro penas:
"Penenn i menshenge an o foro Jerusalem: Dik, tiro baro rai well pash tute. Job hi latcho un krell pes gar bares. Job hi beshdo ap i esla, ap i tarni esla.
Un o Jesuseskre mala djan an o gab, un kran jaake, har o Jesus ap lende penas.
Un jon anan koi esla un lakro tarnepen pash leste, un tchiwan pengre ripja koi pre. Un o Jesus beshas pes pral pre.
Un bud bud menshe, kai leha djan, tchiwan pengre ripja ap o drom. Un wawar dan i bare patria i rukendar tele, un tchiwan len ap o drom.
Un kol bud menshe, kai djan glan leste un pal leste, dan bari gole: "Sharas o Davideskro tchawes! Sharedo well kowa, koles o Dewel bitchras. Sharas o Debles an o bolepen!"
Un har o Jesus an o foro Jerusalem was, wan kote i tsele menshe diwjo, un jon putchan: "Koon hi kowa?"
Un kol bud menshe, kai leha djan, penan lenge: "Kawa hi o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesus, kai was dran o foro Nazaret, hoi an o them Galilea tchiddo hi."

Un o Jesus djas an o Debleskro baro kheer, un tradas lauteren win, kai kote bikran un ginan. Un job witsras i lowengre stamja kolendar trujal, kai kol menshenge lowe paran. Ninna i stamja kolendar, kai tchirkle bikran, witsras lo trujal.
Un job penas ap kol tsele menshende: "O Dewel penas: Miro kheer te well i kheer, kai sharenn man i menshe un mangenn man an. Tumer kran lestar i kheer, kai i menshe chochenna un randenna."
Koi wan korele un bange an o Debleskro baro kheer pash o Jesuseste, un job kras len sasto.

Un i bare rashaja un i biboldengre tchatchepangre dikan ko baro koowa, hoi o Jesus kote kras an o Debleskri soor. Un jon shunan, har i tchawe an o Debleskro baro kheer bari gole dan un penan: "Sharas o Davideskro tchawes!" Un jon wan chojedo ap o Jesuseste,

un penan ap leste: "Shuneh tu, hoi kol tchawe kote penenna?" "Awa," penas o Jesus ap lende, "me shunau len. Djinenn tumer gar, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: Tu, o Dewel, kral, te sharenn tut i tchawe un i tarne."
Un job mukas len, djas dran o foro win, un was an o gab Betani. Un kote atchas lo pral i rat.
Un o wawar diwes taissarlake, djas job an o foro pale. Ap o drom las lo bok.
Un har job i faigetikro ruk dikas, djas lo kote un hatsas tchi har i patria kokres ap leste. Koi penas lo ap ko ruk: "Kek tsireske wenna pale faige ap tute!" Un ap jek kopo meras kau ruk tele.
Un har leskre mala kowa dikan, kran le bare jaka, un putchan lestar: "Har nai meras kau ruk jaake sik tele?"

Penas o Jesus: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Tumer te patsenn ap o Debleste, te krell lo nai hako koowa, palle nai krenn tumer ninna budeder, har me krom kau rukeha. Tumer penenn nai ap koi berga: Hade tut un witse tut an o baro pani! Un kai berga krell kowa.
Te patsenn tumer, te lenn kowa, hoi mangenna o Deblestar, palle lenn tumer kowa lauter ninna."

Un har o Jesus an o Debleskro baro kheer was, ap i menshende rakras, un len o Debleskro drom sikras, koi wan i bare rashaja un i biboldengre phureder pash leste, un putchan lestar: "Koon penas tuke, te kress tu kowa lauter? Koon bitchras tut?"
Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Ninna me kamau tumendar tchomone te putchell. Tumer te penenn les mange, palle penau me tumenge ninna, koon man bitchras, te krap me kowa lauter.

Kanna putchau me tumendar: Bitchras o Dewel o Johannes, te thowell lo i menshen an o pani? Bitchran i menshe o Johannes?" Un jon rakran mashkral pende, un penan: "Te penah mer leske: O Dewel bitchras o Johannes, palle penell lo menge: Hoske patsan tumer les gar?
Te penah mer leske: I menshe bitchran o Johannes, palle hunte trashas i menshendar. Jon patsenna, te hi o Johanni i Debleskro rakepaskro."
Un jaake penan le ap o Jesuseste: "Mer djinah les gar." Koi penas lo ap lende: "Jaake penau tumenge witar gar, koon man bitchras, te krap me kowa."

"Kanna kamau tumenge tchomone te penell: His i dad. Koles his dui tchawe. Un job djas pash ko phureder tchaweste, un penas ap leste: Mo tchawo, dja ap ko kotar them, kai hi i drakengre ruka tardo, un bude kote!
Penas kowa: Na-a, me kamau gar. Pal i tikno tsiro, khaitas les kowa, hoi job penas. Un job djas, te budrell lo kote.
Un o dad djas ninna pash o tarneder, un penas leske i emlige laba. Un ko tarneder penas: Awa, mo rai, me djau kote. Un job djas gar.

Koon kol dujendar kras kowa, hoi o dad kamas?" Penan le ap leste: "O phureder." Penas o Jesus: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Kol bibolde, kai i lowe i Remarjenge dre lenna un hi tumenge pale-tchiddo, un i lubja wenna sikeder ap o Debleskro drom har tumer.

Har o Johanni pash tumende was, te sikrell lo tumende o tchatcho drom, patsan tumer leske gar. I pale-tchidde un i lubja patsan ap leskre laba. Ninna har tumer dikan, te patsan kolla ap leskre laba, mukan tumer gar tumaro tchilatcho drom un patsan leske witar gar."

Un o Jesus penas lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi: "Shunenn, hoi me tumenge kanna penau. His i rai. Koles his i kotar them. Kote tchiwas lo drakengre ruka an i phub. Trul ko kotar them tchiwas lo barra. Un kote kras lo ninna i platsa an i phub, kai nai stakrenn le ap i drake, te well i mool win. Mashkral kol ruka kras lo i kheer, kai kowa beshdo hi, kai dell garda ap i drake. Palle patsas o rai ko kotar them ap i hachende, te budrenn le kote leske. Un job djas peske an i wawar them.
Har ko tsiro was, te anenn le i drake dre, bitchras lo peskre budepangren pash i hachende, te lenn le lendar kol drake, hoi leske hi.
I hache tapran kol budepangren. Ko jekes dan le dawa, un ko wawares maran le. Un pale i wawares witsran le i barentsa mulo.
Job bitchras wawar budepangren pash lende, budeder har job o glanstuno kopo bitchras. Un i hache kran lentsa jaake, har kol wawarentsa.
Koi penas o rai peske: Miro tchawestar darenn le. Un jaake bitchras lo peskro tchawes pash lende.
Har i hache leskro tchawes dikan, rakran le mashkral pende: Kowa hi leskro tchawo, kai lauter lella pal peskro dadeskro merepen. Awenn, maras les, te well kau kotar them menge, hoi leske hunte wals.
Un jon tapran les, tradan les dran ko drakengro them win, un maran les."
Kanna putchas o Jesus kolendar, kai kote tardo hi: "Hoi krell o rai pral ko drakengro them kol hachentsa, te well lo pale?"
Penan le ap o Jesuseste: "Job marell kol tchilatche murshen. Les khaitenn jon gar. Un job dell ko kotar them kol wawarende, kai leske i drake an o tchatcho tsiro dre anenna."

Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Djinenn tumer gar, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi? Kote hi tchindlo: His i bar, kai i budepangre lestar penan: Kowa hi tchi moldo. Ko bar las o Dewel un tchiwas les jaake an o kheer, te rikrell lo ko tselo kheer khetne. O Dewel kras kowa, un kowa hi i baro koowa menge."
Awa, me penau tumenge: An ko tsiro, hoi wella, han tumer buder gar o Debleskre menshe. O Dewel dell wawar menshen khetne gole, te djiwenn le leha khetne. Un jon krenna, hoi o Dewel kamella.
Koon ap kau bar perella, kowa merella. Ap koneste kau bar perella, koles dell ko bar khetne."
I bare rashaja un i Farisarja shunan kol laba un haiwan, te rakras lo lendar.
Un jon kaman les te taprell, un kran kowa gar. Jon daran i menshendar. Kolla patsan, kai hi o Jesus o Debleskro rakepaskro.
Un o Jesus rakras pale sawe laba ap lende, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi. Un job penas:
"Te dell o Dewel i menshen gole, te wenn le pash leste, hi kowa jaake har pash i baro rajeste, kai kras peskro tchaweske i bari bijab.
Ap ko tsiro, kai i bijab his, bitchras lo peskre budepangren pash i menshende, te denn le len pash i bijab gole. Un jon kaman gar te well.
Un pale bitchras lo wawar budepangren pash kolende, te penenn le ap lende: Shunenn, me krom i chapen tumenge, un marom thule grumja. Un wawar latcho chapen un pipen hi lauter koi. Awenn ap i bijab!
Un kolla shunan gar ap lende un djan penge. Ko jek djas ap peskro kotar phub, ko wawar ap o mangepen.
Un pale wawar tapran kol budepangren, praassan len, un maran len.
O baro rajes tapras i bari choli, un job bitchras peskre lurden, te marenn le kol marepangren, un te chatchrenn le lengro foro.
Palle penas lo ap peskre budepangren: Kanna hi i bijab. Un kol menshe, kai me ap o chapen gole dom, hi gar moldo, te wenn le ap i bijab.
Djan kanna ap i dromma, kai bud menshe hi! Un penenn lauterenge, kai tumer kote hatsenna, te wenn le ap i bijab!
Un kol budepangre djan ap kol tsele dromma, un anan lauteren khetne, i tchilatchen un i latchen. Un jaake bud menshe wan ap i bijab, te was o kheer pherdo.
Un o baro rai was an o kheer, te dikell lo kolen, kai kote hi. Koi dikas lo kote i murshes, kai kek bijabeskro ripen ap leste hi.
Un job penas ap leste: Miro maal, tut hi kek bijabeskro ripen ap tute, te nai djah tu ap i bijab. Hoi kreh tu kate? Un kowa nashte penas leske tchi.
Penas o baro rai ap peskre budepangre: Pandenn les ap i pire un ap i wasta, un witsrenn les win an i kali rat! Un kote rowenn le un dandrenn i danda i dukatar khetne."
Palle penas o Jesus ap kolende, kai trul leste tardo hi: "Bud menshen dell o Dewel gole. Kolla kokres, kai pash leste wenna, mukell lo dre te djal."
Un pal kowa wan i Farisarja khetne, un rakran mank pende, har jon nai taprenn o Jesuses an leskre laba.

Un jon bitchran pengre murshen pash leste. Lentsa djan ninna wawar mursha. Kolla his o Herodeskre mala. Un jon penan ap leste: "Sikepaskro, mer djinah, tu peneh o tchatchepen, un sikreh mishto i menshende o Debleskro drom. Tu rakreh kekeske pal o mui, ninna te hi len bud penepaske.
Pen menge kanna: Hi mishto pal maro tchatchepen, te das mer o themeskre lowe o baro rajeste an o foro Rom?"
O Jesus haiwas lengro tchilatchepen un penas ap lende: "Tumer rakrenn dui tchipjentsa. Hoske kamenn tumer man an mire laba te taprell?
Denn man i rupeni bema!" Un jon dan les jek bema.
Koi putchas lo lendar: "Koneskro shero un lab hi ap kai bema?"
Penan le: "O shero un o lab o baro rajestar an o foro Rom!" Penas lo ap lende: "Jaake denn leste, hoi leskro hi! Un denn o Debleste, hoi leskro hi!"
Un har jon kol laba lestar shunan, kran le bare jaka. Un jon mukan les, un djan penge.
Ap ko diwes wan i Saddukarja pash leste. Jon hi kolla, kai penenna: O Dewel krell i mulen gar djido.
Jon penan ap leste: "Sikepaskro, o Mose penas: Te merell i romedino mursh, un les his kek tchawe, palle hunte romedinerell peskro phraal koi romjat, te well peskro phraleske i tarnepen boldo.
Koi his pash mende efta phrala. Un o phurestar, kai romedino his, meras. Les his kek tchawe. Doleske las peskro phraal koi romjat.

Un ko duito meras, un les his kek tchawe. Un ko triinto romedineras lat un meras. Un les his kek tchawe. Un jaake djas kowa bis ap o eftato. Jek pal o wawar romedineran lat un meran. Un lauteren his kek tchawe.
Un har i tsele phrala mulo his, meras koi romni ninna.
Kanna putchah tutar: Ap ko tsiro, kai krell o Dewel i mulen djido, koneskri romni hi li? Hake efta his laha romedino."
Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Tumer prindjrenn gar o Debleskro lab un o Debleskri soor witar gar. Doleske haiwan tumer tchi.
Kol mulen, kai o Dewel djido krella, kolla romedinerenn buder gar, un wenna gar romedino. Jon hi har i bolepangre an o bolepen.
An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo, te wenn i mule djido. Kote penell o Dewel:
Me hom o Abrahameskro Dewel un o Isaakeskro Dewel un o Jakobeskro Dewel. Un me penau tumenge: Job hi gar o Dewel kolenge, kai mulo hi. Na-a, job hi o Dewel i djidenge."
Kolla bud menshe, kai trul o Jesuseste tardo his, kolenge atchas o rakepen krik, har jon kowa lestar shunan.
O Jesus rakras jaake, te nashte penan leske i Saddukarja tchi buder. Har i Farisarja kowa shunan, wan le khetne.
Un jek lendar, i biboldengro tchatchepaskro, kamas te taprell lo les an leskre laba un putchas lestar:
"Sikepaskro, kol tsele labendar, kai penenna, hoi o Dewel mendar kamella, hawo lab hi o bareder lendar?"
Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Tu kamess tiro Debles o tselo djijestar an tiro tselo djipen, an lauter, hoi tu djineh.
Kowa hi o bareder lauterestar, hoi o Dewel tutar kamella.
Ninna kamell lo tutar, te wess jaake latches ap koleste, kai pash tute hi, har hal latches ap tute kokres.
Kowa, hoi o Mose un i tsele Debleskre rakepangre menge penan, hoi o Dewel mendar kamella, kowa hi an kolla dui bare Debleskre laba penlo."
I Farisarja his gomme khetne pash o Jesuseste. Un job putchas lendar:
"Hoi penenn tumer pral ko baro rajeste, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job? Koneskro tchawo hi lo?" Penan le: "O Davideskro tchawo."
Penas o Jesus: "Te hi kowa tchatcho, har nai penas o David ap leste: Mo rai? Kau lab tchiwas o Debleskro Ducho an o Davideste,
har job penas: O Dewel penas ap miro rajeste: Besh tut ap miri tchatchi rig, te tchiwap kolen tel tire pire, kai hi chojedo ap tute.
Kate penas o David ap leste: Mo rai. Har well lo nai leskro tchawo?"
Un kek lendar nashte penas o Jesuseske jek lab koi pre. Un pal ko diwes trashan le, te putchenn le lestar budeder.
Palle rakras o Jesus ap i tsele menshende, kai trul leste tardo his, un ap peskre malende,
un penas: I biboldengre tchatchepangre un i Farisarja, kolen hi o Moseskro wast, te penenn le i menshenge o Debleskro lab.
Kowa, hoi jon tumenge penenna, kowa krenn lauter un rikrenn tumen ap kowa! Kowa, hoi jon krenna, ma krenn! Jon kokres krenn kowa gar, hoi jon i menshenge penenna.
Un jon krenn i menshenge o djipen pharo. Ko tselo koowa, hoi kolla hunte rikrenn, hi har i pharo gono ap lengri phik. I tchatchepangre un i Farisarja kokres rikrenn pen gar ap kowa.

Lauter, hoi kolla krenna, krenn le, te dikenn kowa i wawar. Te pandenn le i diklo trul o shero un trul i mussi, kai o Debleskre laba dre tchindlo hi, jaake hi lengro diklo buchleder har ko diklo i wawar murshendar. Un len hi lengste koola ap pende, te sikrenn le i menshende, te hi le o Debleskre mursha.
Pash i baro chapen kamenn le ap i feteder beshepangre te beshell. Un an i biboldengre kangria kamenn le ap i pralstune beshepangre te beshell.
Te djan le an o foro, kamenn le, te penenn i menshe ap lende: Latcho diwes, mo rai.
Tumenge penau me: Ma mukenn tumen te kharell: Mo rai! Tumer han halauter phrala. Jek kokres hi tumaro rai.
Ma kharenn jekes ap kai phub: Dad! Jek dad hi tumen. Kowa hi o Dewel an o bolepen.
Ma mukenn tumen te kharell: Baro sikepaskro! Jek baro sikepaskro hi tumen. Kowa hi o Kristo.
O bareder tumendar te well tumaro budepaskro.
Kowa, kai krell pes baro, koles krell o Dewel tikneder har i wawar. Kowa, kai krell pes tikno, koles krell o Dewel baro.

Tumer tchatchepangre un Farisarja! Kowa, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto. Tumaro patsepen ap o Debleste hi chochepen! Tumer krenn o wudar pandlo, te well kek ap o Debleskro drom. Tumer djan gar koi dre. Witar gar mukenn i wawaren dre te djal.

Tumer tchatchepangre un Farisarja! Kowa, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto. Tumaro patsepen ap o Debleste hi chochepen. Tumer lenn i khera i djuwjendar krik, kolengre romma mulo hi. Tumer te rakrenn o Debleha, rakrenn tumer i raha tsiro, te dikenn i menshe har patslo tumer han. O Dewel rakrell o tchatchepen pral tumende win, un tumer lenn i sorleder phagi har i wawar.

Tumer tchatchepangre un Farisarja! Kowa, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto. Tumaro patsepen ap o Debleste hi chochepen. Tumer djan pral i tseli phub, te anenn i menshenge o biboldengro patsepen. Un te djiwell jek pal tumaro patsepen, palle krenn lestar i bengeskro tchawo. Un job well dui kope tchilatcheder har tumer han.

Kowa, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto. Tumer kamenn i wawaren o tchatcho drom te sikrell, un han kokres har i korele, kai tchi dikenna. Tumer penenn i menshenge: "Te dell jek pes ap o Debleskro baro kheer sowel, jaake hi kau sowel tchi moldo. Te dell jek pes ap o sonakai sowel, hoi an o Debleskro baro kheer hi, palle hunte krell lo kowa, hoi job penas."
Tumer han dinelo un korelo! Hi o Debleskro baro kheer gar budeder moldo har o sonakai, hoi an koleste hi un doleske i Debleskro koowa hi?

Tumer penenn i menshenge ninna: Te dell jek pes ap o Debleskri chapaskri sowel, palle hi kau sowel tchi moldo. Te dell jek pes ap ko chapen sowel, hoi ap late tchiddo hi, palle hunte krell lo kowa, hoi job penas.
Tumer han korelo! Hi o Debleskro chapaskri gar budeder moldo har o chapen, hoi ap late tchiddo hi un doleske i Debleskro koowa hi?
Kowa, kai dell pes ap o Debleskri chapaskri sowel, kowa dell pes ninna ap lauter sowel, hoi kote pre tchiddo hi.
Kowa, kai dell pes ap o Debleskro baro kheer sowel, kowa dell pes ninna ap o Debleste sowel, kai kote djiwella.
Kowa, kai dell pes ap o bolepen sowel, kowa dell pes ninna ap o Debleskro beshepaskro sowel un ap o Debleste, kai kote beshdo hi.

Tumer tchatchepangre un Farisarja! Kowa, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto! Tumaro patsepen hi chochepen. Tumer denna o Debleste o deshto kotar dran hako senlepen an tumari baar. Un tumer bistrenn ko bareder koowa, hoi o Dewel tumendar kamella: O tchatchepen, un o kamlepen, un o patsepen. Kawa hunte krenn, un ko wawar gar mukenn!

Tumer kamenn i wawaren o tchatcho drom te sikrell, un han kokres har i korele, kai tchi dikenna. Tumer trashenn hako tikno koowa, hoi tumen pale-tchiddo krella, un denn gar garda ap kowa, hoi tumen glan o Debleste pale-tchiddo krella.

Tumer tchatchepangre un Farisarja! Kowa, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto! Tumaro patsepen hi chochepen! Tumer thowenn i khore un tchare kokres wrijal. Tumer han har i tcharo, hoi win djudjo hi un dren djungelo. An tumare djia han boklo un tchilatcho.
Tu Farisari, tu hal korelo. Kre tiro dji djudjo! Palle well tuke o tselo wawar koowa ninna djudjo.

Tumer tchatchepangre un Farisarja! Kowa, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto! Tumaro patsepen hi chochepen! Tumer han har i mulengre khera, hoi parno kerdo wan. Kolla hi win shukar. Dren hi le pherdo tchik un kokale.
Jaake han tumer. Te dikenn tumen i menshe, patsenn le, te han latche un tchatche menshe. An tumende hi lauter chochepen un tchilatchepen.

Tumer tchatchepangre un Farisarja! Kowa, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto! Tumaro patsepen hi chochepen! Tumer krenn shukar mulengre khera kolenge, kai his o Debleskre rakepangre. Un i mulengre khera, kai latche menshe paskedo hi, krenn tumer shukar un railo.
Un tumer penenna: Te djiwams mer an ko tsiro, kai mare phure djiwan, palle marams mer kol Debleskre rakepangren gar.
Me penau tumenge: Te penenn tumer kowa jaake, palle sikrenn tumer, kai han i tchawe kolendar, kai o Debleskre rakepangren maran.
Awa, krenn kowa dureder jaake, har tumare phure kran!
Tumer han sapa. Awa, tchilatche sapa han tumer. O Dewel witsrell tumen an o bengeskri jag. Un tumer nashte nashenn gar glan koleste krik.

Shunenn, bitchrau pash tumende mire rakepangren, mire gosewe murshen, un mire tchatchepangren. Kolen denn tumer ap o trushel, marenn len, un denn len dawa an tumare kangria. Un tumer lenn len palla an hako foro.

Tumer han tchilatcho har tumare phure. Jon maran i latche menshen jaake raha har i phub tardo hi: O latcho mursh Abel was maredo glan i tsele wawar menshende. Pal leste maran le wawar latche menshen bis ap ko tsiro, kai o Zachari maredo was, koleskro dad his o Barachi. O Zachares maran tumer mashkral o Debleskro kheer un i sasterni chapaskri, kai i fiche o Debleske maredo wenna. Doleske well i phagi ap tumende, kai kanna djiwenna.
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Kalla menshe, kai kanna djiwenna, kolla lenna i tseli phagi.

Tumer menshe an o foro Jerusalem! Tumer maran o Debleskre rakepangren, un dan kolen i barentsa mulo, kai o Dewel pash tumende bitchras. Bud kope kamom tumen pash mande te lell, te dap garda ap tumende, har i kachni ap peskre tarnende garda della, un lell len tel peskre phora. Un tumer kaman gar.
Doleske mukell o Dewel peskro kheer pash tumende un djiwell buder gar koi.
Un me penau tumenge: Tumer dikenn man jaake raha buder gar bis te was ko tsiro, kai tumer penenna: Sharedo well kowa, kai hi o Deblestar bitchedo!
Un o Jesus mukas o Debleskro baro kheer. Har job peske djas, wan peskre mala pash leste, te sikrenn le leste o tselo Debleskro baro kheer.
Koi penas lo ap lende: "Kowa, hoi tumer kote lauter dikenna, kowa lauter djal paash. Kate atchell kek bar ap i wawareste."

Pale djas lo ap i djeteskri berga un beshas pes. Leskre mala kokres his pash leste un putchan lestar: "Ap hawo tsiro well o Debleskro baro kheer tele phagedo? Har nai dikas mer, te was ko tsiro, kai tu pale weh, un o Dewel o rai hi pral halauter?"
Penas o Jesus: Denn jak, ma mukenn tumen kekestar o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell!
Bud mursha wenna un penenna: Me hom o Kristo, ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job! Un bud menshe patsenn ap lengro chochepen.

Baro kurepen wella an kol themma, kai hi dur tumendar un ninna an kol themma, kai hi gar dur tumendar. Te shunenn tumer kowa, ma trashenn! Ko hunte well jaake. Ko tsiro, kai o Dewel o rai hi pral lauterende, well gar jaake sik.

I pralstune pral bare themma kurenn pen i wawar pralstunentsa. Un i menshe dran jek them marenn kolen an i wawar them. An bud themma hi i menshen gar doha te chal. Un kate un kote well i phub trisslemen.
Kowa lauter wella jaake pral i phub, har i duka wenna pral i djuwjate, kai lell i tarnepen.
Palle taprenn le tumen, denn tumen dawa, un marenn tumen. Un i menshe an i tsele themma wenna chojedo ap tumende doleske, kai patsenn tumer ap mande.
Un bud denn pengro patsepen ap mande pre, un phukrenn ninna ap i wawarende, kai ap mande patsenna, un jek krell o wawareske tchilatchepen.
Ninna wenna bud chochene rakepangre un penenna, te hi le bitchedo o Deblestar. Kolla anenn bud menshen o tchatcho dromestar tele.
O tchilatchepen well jaake baro ap i phub, te denn bud patsle pengro kamlepen i wawarenge pre.
Kowa, kai atchell soreles tardo an o patsepen, jaake raha, har job djiwella, kowa lell o Debleskro djipen.

Ap i tseli phub well i menshenge ko latcho lab penlo, kai o Dewel kamell len dran o tchilatchepen te lell un kamell lengro rai te well. I menshe an hake themma hunte shunenn ko lab. Un palle well ko tsiro, kai hi o Dewel o rai pral lauterende.

Glan i raha tsiro rakras o Debleskro rakepaskro Daniel pral ko djungelo pale-tchiddo koowa. Koon kawa drawerella, kamaus, te haiwell lo les ninna. Ap ko diwes, kai dikenn tumer ko djungelo pale-tchiddo koowa an o Debleskro baro kheer tardo,
hunte nashenn kolla, kai an o them Judea djiwenna, sik ap i berga.
Kowa, kai pral ap o kheer hi, hunte djal buder gar an peskro kheer dre, te lell lo peskro koowa win.
Un kowa, kai ap i kotar phub budrella, kowa hunte djal buder gar khere, te lell lo peskri baja.
Koi bibacht hi bari kol djuwjenge, kai hi an wawar koowa, ninna kol djuwjenge, kai hi len i tarnepen.
Mangenn o Deblestar, te hunte nashenn gar krik an o wend, witar gar ap o Debleskro diwes!
Ko tsiro wella djungleder har lauter, hoi ap i menshende was, jaake raha, har i phub tardo hi. Un ko tsiro, hoi well pal kowa, well witar gar jaake tchilatcho.
Te krals o Dewel o tchilatcho tsiro gar tikneder, palle wals kek mensho dran o tchilatcho tsiro win. Kolen, kai o Dewel peske win rodas, kolenge krell lo o tchilatcho tsiro tikneder.
Te penell jek ap tumende: Dikenn, kate hi ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job! palle patsenn les gar! Un te penell i wawar ap tumende: Ake, kote hi lo! palle patsenn les witar gar!

Bud chochene mursha penenna ap tumende: Me hom ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job. Un chochene rakepangre penenna: Me hom o Deblestar bitchedo. Un jon krenna baro un sorelo koowa, hoi i mensho nashte krell gar dran peskri soor. Kowa krenn le, te anenn le i menshen o tchatcho dromestar tele. Te djals kowa, anans le ninna kolen o Debleskro dromestar tele, kolen o Dewel peske win rodas.
Ma bistrenn, hoi me tumenge penom!
Jon te penenn tumenge: O baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job, kowa hi an o mulo them! ma djan kote win! Un jon te penenn: Job hi an ko kheer! ma patsenn len!
Ap ko diwes, kai o Menshengro Tchawo pale wella, dikenn les i tsele menshe, jaake har i Debleskri jag ap o bolepen diklo well, hoi djal jek rigatar ap i wawar rig an o bolepen.
Kote, kai i mulo mass tchiddo hi, kote wenn i bare diwje tchirkle khetne te chan le.
Un sik pal kol tchilatche diwessa, well o kham kalo har i rat, un o mondo dikell kek buder gar. Un i bare momlia ap o bolepen perenn tele. Un i bolepaskri soor perell khetne.
Palle dikenn le o Menshengro Tchawes, har job dran o bolepen wella. An hake themma dikenn le les, har job well ap i wolke bari sorjaha un railepen. Un jon rowenna un penenna: Patsams mer ap leste!
Un job bitchrell peskre bolepangren pral i tseli phub. Un kolla phurdenn an i bashepangre, te anenn le dran hako them kolen khetne, kai o Dewel peske win rodas.
Me kamau te sikrap tumende tchomone. Dikenn ap o faigetikro ruk! Te wenn leskre kashta senelo, un i patria wenn dran lende win, palle djinenn tumer, te well sik o nijal.
Jaake hi kowa ninna koleha, pral kowa rakrom. Te dikenn tumer, har kowa lauter wella, palle djinenn tumer, kai o Debleskro tsiro was.
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Kol menshe, kai an ko tsiro djiwenna, dikenna kowa lauter pengre jakentsa.
O bolepen un i phub atchenna gar. Mire laba atchenna hako tsiro.
Kek djinella ko tsiro, kaana kowa lauter wella. I bolepangre an o bolepen djinenn les gar, witar gar o Debleskro tchawo. Miro dad an o bolepen kokres djinell les.
Jaake har i menshe djiwan an ko tsiro, kai o Noa djiwas, jaake djiwenn le an ko tsiro, kai o Menshengro Tchawo pale wella.
Glan ko tsiro, har o baro pani was, chan un pijan le, romedineran le, un wan romedino. Har o Noa ap o panjeskro ulepaskro djas,
haiwan le gar, hoi koi djas. O baro pani was pral lende, un jon lauter tassan. Jaake djal kowa ninna ap ko diwes, kai well o Menshengro Tchawo pale.
Dui budrenn ap i kotar phub. Ko jek well krik lino, ko wawar atchell koi.
Dui djuwja krenn jarro dran djob. Koi jek well krik lino, koi wawar atchell koi.
Rikrenn tumare jaka pre! Tumer djinenn gar ko diwes, kai tumaro rai pale wella.
Haiwenn: Te djinals o rai pral i kheer ko tsiro an i rati, kaana o tchorepaskro wella, palle sowals lo gar, un mukals kekes an peskro kheer dre te phagell.
Doleske penau tumenge: Denn garda! Me, o Menshengro Tchawo, wau pale an i tsiro, kai tumer gar djinenna.

I latcho budepaskro della mishto garda ap peskro rajeskro kheer, un sowella gar. Leskro rai das peskre tsele budepangren an leskre wasta. Un ko latcho budepaskro dell len hako diwes kowa, hoi len hunte well djipaske.
Bachtelo hi lo, te well leskro rai pale, un dikell, kai job peskri budi mishto kras.
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Leskro rai dell peskro tselo brawlepen an leskre wasta.
Job te hi i tchilatcho budepaskro un penell ap peste: Miro rai well gar jaake sik pale,
un job dell kol wawar budepangren dawa, un chal un pijell pes mato kol matentsa,
palle well leskro rai pale ap i diwes, kai ko budepaskro gar patsell, te well job. Ap jek kopo hi lo koi,
un dell ko budepaskres khetne, un anell les kote, kai i chochene hi. Kote rowenn le, un dandrenn i danda khetne i dukatar.

Un o Jesus penas: Ap ko tsiro, kai wella o Menshengro Tchawo pale, djal kowa jaake har kol deesh tarne tchentsa, kai djan ap i bijab. Jon lan pengre momlia an o wast; un djan ap o drom, kai o bijabeskro hunte wella.
Pantch lendar hi dinelo, un pantch lendar hi gosewo.
Kolla pantch dinele lan kek djet peha.
I gosewe tchen his djet an pengre khore.
Un ko bijabeskro was gar jaake sik. Doleske wan lauter khino un sowan dre.
His deesh-te-dujenge an i rat; koi das jek bari gole: O bijabeskro wella! Djan win pash leste!
Koi stan i tsele tarne tcha pre, un kran i jag an pengre momlia bareder.
Un kol dinele tcha penan ap kolla gosewe tchende: Denn men djet! Mare momlia djan win.
Penan i gosewe: Na-a! Maro djet hi gar doha menge un tumenge. Djan pash i bikepangre, un ginenn tumenge djet!
Har jon kote djan, te ginenn le penge djet, koi was o bijabeskro. Un kolen, kai len djet his, djan leha an o kheer, kai i bijab hi. Un o wudar was pal lende pandlo.
Un pal i tikno tsiro wan ninna kolla wawar tarne tcha glan o wudar, un penan: Rai, rai, kre menge o wudar pre!
Penas lo ap lende: Tchatchepaha, me prindjrau tumen gar.
Doleske penau me tumenge: Rikrenn tumare jaka pre! Tumer djinenn gar ko diwes, kai o rai pale wella!
Kowa hi jaake har pash ko mursheste, kai kamas an i wawar them te djal. Dran kowa das lo peskre budepangren gole, un das len peskro tselo brawlepen an i wast.

Hakeneste das lo jaake bud lowe, har kowa haiwas, te ginell un te bikrell kol lowentsa. Ko jekeste das lo pantch gone pherdo rup, un ko wawareste das lo dui gone, un pale i wawareste jek gono. Un palle djas lo an o wawar them.
Un ko mursh, kai kol pantch gone pherdo rup las, kowa djas sik pash i bikepangre, ginas un bikras bud koowa, un anas pantch wawar gone pherdo rup khetne pashal.
Un ninna kowa, kai kol dui gone peskro rajestar las, kowa las dui wawar gone pashal.
Ko mursh, kai jek gono peskro rajestar las, djas ap i kotar phub un khatras ko rup an i phub.
Un pal i raha tsiro was lengro rai pale un mukas peskre budepangren glan leste te anell, te lell lo lendar kol lowe, hoi jon leske khetne anan.
Un ko budepaskro, kai las lestar pantch gone pherdo rup, djas pash leste, un penas: Mo rai, pantch gone dal man. Un dik, me lom pantch wawar gone pashal.

Penas o rai ap leste: Kowa kral tu mishto. Tu hal i latcho budepaskro. Me dom tut i tikni budi, un tu kral kai budi mishto. Doleske dau me kanna bud koowa an tire wasta. Ab an miro kheer dre, te wess tu mantsa bachteles!
Un ko budepaskro, kai las lestar dui gone pherdo rup, kowa djas ninna pash leste, un penas: Mo rai, dui gone dal man. Un dik, me lom dui wawar gone pashal.

Penas o rai ap leste: Kowa kral tu mishto. Tu hal i latcho budepaskro. Me dom tut i tikni budi, un tu kral lat mishto. Doleske dau me kanna bud koowa an tire wasta. Ab an miro kheer dre, te wess tu mantsa bachteles!

Un ko budepaskro, kai jek gono pherdo rup las, kowa djas pash leste, un penas: Mo rai, me djinom, tut hi i dji dran bar. Tu leh tuke o djob, hoi i wawar an i phub tchiwas, te was kowa baro. Tu leh kote tuke khetne, kai budral gar.
Doleske darom tutar, djom win, un khatrom tiro gono pherdo rup an i phub. Un dik, kate hi lo.
Penas peskro rai ap leste: I tchilatcho budepaskro hal tu. Tu kral tiri budi gar mishto. Tu djinal, te lap mange o djob, hoi me gar an i phub tchiwom, un lap mange kote khetne, kai budrom gar.
Tu hunte dals mire lowe kolende, kai patsenn i lowe win. Un te woms pale, palle loms budeder lowe pale, har tu len dal.
Un palle penas o rai ap i wawarende, kai koi tardo hi: Lenn ko jek gono lestar, un denn les koleste, kai hi les kol wawar deesh gone!
Hakeno, kai hi les bud, kowa lell budeder. Jaake well les bud brawlepen. Un kowa, kai hi les gar bud, kolestar well ninna kowa krik lino, hoi les hi.
Ko budepaskro, kai tchi moldo hi, witsrenn les an i kali rat win! Kote rowenn le, un dandrenn i danda i dukatar khetne.

Un o Jesus penas: Ap ko diwes, kai well o Menshengro Tchawo an peskro tselo railepen, un leha wenna i tsele bolepangre, palle hi lo o rai pral halauter, un rakrell o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende ap i phub.
Un glan leste wenna i tsele menshe dran hake themma khetne. Un job tchiwell len ap dui riga, jaake har i bakrengro rai tchiwell i bakre ap jek rig un i busnia ap i wawar rig.
I latche menshe tchiwell lo ap peskri tchatchi rig, un i wawar ap peskri serwi rig.

Un palle penell o baro rai ap kolende, kai ap leskri tchatchi rig tardo hi: Ap tumende well i bacht miro dadestar an o bolepen. Awenn un djiwenn mantsa khetne an miri harmenationa. Kowa kamas o Dewel jaake raha har o bolepen un i phub koi hi.
Man his bok. Un tumer dan man te chal. Man his trush. Un tumer dan man te pijell. Me homs kek tumendar. Un tumer lan man an tumare khera.
Man his kek ripen ap mande. Un tumer dan man i ripen. Me homs nasselo. Un tumer wan pash mande. Me homs an o stilepen. Un tumer wan ninna pash mande.
Palle putchenn lestar i latche menshe, kai ap peskri tchatchi rig tardo hi: Rai, kaana his tut bok, un mer dam tut te chal? Un kaana his tut trush, un mer dam tut te pijell?
Un kaana hals tu kek mendar, un mer lam tut an mare khera? Un kaana his tut kek ripen, un mer dam tut jek?
Un kaana hals tu nasselo un stildo, un mer wam pash tute?
Un o baro rai penell lenge: Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Ko latchepen, hoi tumer jekeske mire tchorwele phralendar kran, ko latchepen kran tumer mange.

Un palle penell job kolenge, kai ap leskri serwi rig tardo hi: Tumer han tel o Debleskro praassepen tardo! Djan tumenge! Djan an koi jag, hoi chatchella hako tsiro, un hoi hi o bengeske un leskre kurepangre kerdo!
Man his bok. Tumer dan man tchi te chal. Man his trush. Tumer dan man tchi te pijell.
Me homs kek tumendar. Un tumer lan man gar an tumare khera dre. Man his kek ripen, un tumer dan man kek. Me homs nasselo un stildo, un tumer wan gar pash mande.
Un palle penenn jon ap leste: Rai, kaana his tut bok un trush? Kaana hals tu kek mendar? Kaana his tut kek ripen? Kaana hals tu nasselo un stildo, un mer hams gar tuke koi?
Palle penell lo ap lende: Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Ko latchepen, hoi tumer gar jekeske mire tchorwele phralendar kran, ko latchepen kran tumer mange ninna gar.
Un kol tchilatche len i phagi hako tsireske. I latche len o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
Un har o Jesus kowa lauter ap i tsele menshende penas, kai kote his, penas lo peskre malenge:
"Tumer djinenna, an dui diwessa wenn kol bare diwessa, kai Passa kharenna. Un o Menshengro Tchawes well an i wasta kolendar dino, kai les ap o trushel denna, te merell lo."
Ap ko tsiro wan i bare rashaja un i biboldengre phureder khetne an o kheer o baro rashajestar. Koleskro lab his Kajafas.
Un jon rodan i drom, har nai taprans le o Jesuses tchorchanes, te marenn le les.
"Mer taprah les gar ap o Passa," penan le, "te wenn i menshe gar diwjo un chojedo ap mende."
Un o Jesus his an o gab Betani, an o Simoneskro kheer. Kowa hi ko Simon, kai his les i djungelo nasslepen ap peskro mass.
Un har o Jesus kote chas, was i djuwel pash leste. Kolat his i tushni an o wast. Kote his kutch djet dre. Ko djet tchoras joi ap leskro shero win, te makell li les dre.
Un har leskre mala kowa dikan, choiran le pen un penan: "Hoske tchoras li ko djet tchitcheske win?
Te bikrams ko djet, lams bud lowe. Un kol lowe nai dams mer i tchorwelende."
Un har o Jesus haiwas, hoi rakran le, penas lo ap lende: "Mukenn koi djuwjat! Joi kras i latcho koowa.
I tchorwele hi hako tsiro pash tumende. Me hom gar hako tsiro pash tumende.
Kowa, hoi joi kras, kras li, te makell li man dre ko diweske, kai wau paskedo.
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Ap i tseli phub, kai mire laba i menshenge penlo wenna, koi well ninna penlo, hoi koja djuwel mange kras. Joi well gar bistedo."
Pal kowa djas jek kol deesh-te-dujendar, leskro lab hi Judas Iskariot, pash i bare rashajende,
un putchas lendar: "Kitse lowe denn man tumer, te dau les an tumare wasta?" Un jon dan les triin-deesh rupene beme.
Un palle rodas o Judas i latcho tsiro, kai nai dals lo les an lengre wasta.
O diwes glan ko kurko, kai i bibolde o maro chan, kai kek shutlo jarro dren hi, wan i Jesuseskre mala pash leste, un putchan lestar: "Kai kameh tu, te kras o chapen tuke?"

Koi penas job lenge, pash hawo mursheste an o foro Jerusalem jon hunte djan. "Koleske penenn", penas job, "maro sikepaskro penell tuke: Miro tsiro hi kanna kai. Pash tute kamau te chal o chapen mire malentsa."
Un o Jesuseskre mala djan kote, un kran les jaake, har job kowa penas. Un jon kran o chapen.
Ap i rati was o Jesus peskre deesh-te-dui malentsa an ko kheer. Un jon beshan pen, te chan le ko chapen.
Pash o chapen penas lo ap lende: "Tchatchepaha me penau tumenge: Jek tumendar phukrella ap mande."
Kowa dukas len an o dji. Un jon putchan lestar, jek pal o wawar: "Mo rai, hom me kawa?"
Penas lo ap lende: "Ko mursh, kai tchiwell o maro mantsa an jek tcharo, kawa phukrell ap mande.
O Menshengro Tchawo hunte merella, jaake har hi lestar tchindlo an o Debleskro lab. Hawi bibacht well ap koleste, kai ap leste phukrella! Koleske wals feteder, te wals lo gar boldo."
Un o Judas, kai ap leste phukrell kamell, putchas lestar: "Sikepaskro, hom me kowa?" Penas o Jesus: "Awa, tu hal kowa."
Har jon chan, las o Jesus o maro, parkras pes pash o Debleste, phagas ko maro, das les peskre malende, un penas: "Ake, lenn ko maro un chan les! Kau maro hi miro mass."
Palle las lo i khoro, parkras pes pash o Debleste, das lende ko khoro, un penas: "Pijenn halauter lestar!
Kai mool hi miro rat, hoi me ratau budenge, te lap lengri doosh lendar. Jaake krau i drom, kai o Dewel un i menshe mala wenna.
Un me penau tumenge: Me pijau buder gar i mool, bis te well ko diwes, kai me pijau newi mool tumentsa khetne pash miro dadeste an o bolepen."
Un palle giwan le o Debleske i gili, un djan win pash o djeteskri berga.
Kote penas o Jesus lenge: "Kai rati nashenn tumer halauter mandar. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: O Dewel penella: Me dau o bakrengro rajes. Un i bakre nashenn penge.
Pal kowa krell o Dewel man i mulendar djido. Un te djan tumer an o them Galilea, djau glan tumende."
Koi penas o Petro ap leste: "Ninna te nashenn halauter tutar krik, me mukau tut gar."
Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Tchatchepaha me penau tuke: Kai rati dell o bashno gar gole jaake raha har tu man gar triin kope buchoste dal."
Penas o Petro: "Ninna te hunte meroms tuha, doms tut gar buchoste." Ninna kol tsele wawar penan kowa.
Un palle djas o Jesus peskre malentsa an i baar, hoi kharella Getsemani. Un job penas ap lende: "Beshenn tumen kate! Me djau kote, te rakrap o Debleha."
Un job las o Petres un kol dui Zebedeskre tchawen peha, un djas kote. Un leskro dji rowas, un i daar tapras les.
Koi penas lo ap lende: "Miro dji rowella, un mange hi jaake har te merap. Atchenn kate un sowenn gar dre!"

Un job djas i kotar drom dureder, witsras pes ap i phub, un mangas o Debles: "Mo dad, te kameh tu, muk kek duka un merepen ap mande te well! Mangau tut: Ma kre, har me kamau! Kre jaake, har tu kameh!"
Un job djas pale pash lende un dikas, har sowan le, un penas ap o Petreste: "Kate dik, kek tikno tsiro nai atchan tumare jaka pre.
Ma sowenn dre! Mangenn o Deblestar, te perenn gar miro dromestar tele! Tumen kokres hi kek soor te atchenn pash mande, ninna te kamell kowa tumaro dji."
Un palle djas lo i duito kopo kote, te mangell lo o Debles. Un job penas pale: "Mo dad, tu te kameh gar kol duka un merepen mandar te lell, palle muk kowa te well, hoi tu kameh!"
Un job djas pale pash lende un dikas, te sowan le pale. Jon rikran nai pengre jaka gar pre.
Un job mukas len, un djas pale kote, te mangell lo o Debles, un penas pale kolla laba o Debleske.
Palle djas lo pash peskre malende pale, un penas: "Kamenn tumer dureder sowell un kate tchiddo atchell? O tsiro hi kai, kai denn le o Menshengro Tchawes an i wasta kol tchilatche menshendar.
Stenn pre! Djas menge kanna! Kanna well kowa, kai phukrell ap mande."
Un har job jaake rakras, was o Judas, ko jek kol deesh-te-dujendar. Pash leste his bud wawar mursha. Len his chare un kashta an i wasta. Kolen bitchran i bare rashaja un i biboldengre phureder.
O Judas kras lentsa win: "Koles, kai tchumrau, kowa hi lo. Koles taprenn!"
Un sik djas lo pash o Jesuseste un penas ap leste: "Latcho diwes, mo rai!" un tchumras les.
Penas o Jesus: "Mo maal, hoske wal tu?" Un palle wan kol wawar mursha, tapran o Jesuses, un pandan les.
Un jek kolendar, kai o Jesuseha djas, las peskro charo un das jek klisteske o kand tele. Un kowa his i klisto, kai budrell o baro rashajeske.
Koi penas o Jesus: "Tchip tiro charo tele! Hakeno, kai i charo lella un dell i wawares, ko well i chareha mulo dino.
Me nai mangoms miro dadestar an o bolepen, te bitchrell lo mange budeder har efta-deesh-te-dui serja (72.000) bolepangren, te wenn le ap miri rig.
Kowa te kroms, palle nai wals kowa gar tchatcho, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi."

Un koi pre penas lo ap kol tsele murshende, kai trul leste tardo hi: "Tumer wan i charentsa un i kashtentsa pash mande, har te woms i marepaskro. Hako diwes homs an o Debleskro baro kheer un sikrom i menshende o Debleskro drom. Un tumer tapran man gar.
Kawa lauter hunte djas, te well tchatcho, hoi o Debleskre rakepangre glan i raha tsiro an pengre lila tchinan." Har peskre mala kowa shunan, nashan le penge lauter lestar.
Kolla, kai o Jesuses pandan, anan les pash o baro rashajeste, o Kajafas. Un kote wan i biboldengre tchatchepangre un phureder khetne.
Dur pal leste djas o Petro leske palla, un was glan o shukar kheer o baro rashajestar. Un job djas an o baro wudar dre, un beshas pes pash i lurdende, te nai dikell lo, hoi krenn le o Jesuseha.
Un i bare rashaja un i tsele pralstune bibolde rodan murshen, kai anenn chocheno koowa ap o Jesuseste, te nai marenn le les.
Un jon hatsan tchi, ninna te wan bud mursha pash lende, kai anan chochene koowa ap leste. Palle wan dui mursha pash lende,
un penan: "Kau mursh penas, te nai phagell lo o Debleskro baro kheer tele, un te nai tchiwell lo les an triin diwessa pale pre."
Un o baro rashai stas pre un putchas o Jesusestar: "Peneh tu tchi ap kowa, hoi jon ap tute pre anan?"
O Jesus penas tchi. Pale penas o baro rashai ap leste: "Glan o djido Dewel, pen menge: Hal tu ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job? Hal tu o Debleskro tchawo?"

Penas o Jesus: "Awa, hi jaake, har tu penal. Un kanna penau tumenge: Ko tsiro well sik, kai dikenn tumer o Menshengro Tchawes, har hi lo beshdo ap i tchatchi rig o sorelo Deblestar, un har well lo ap i wolke dran o bolepen."
Koi kras o baro rashai peskro ripen paash, te sikrell lo peskri choli, un penas ap i wawar pralstunende: "Job krell pes har o Dewel. Tumer shunan les. Kek hunte penell menge budeder.
Hoi kamenn tumer leha te krell?" Penan le: "Job hunte well maredo."
Un palle tchungran le leske an o mui, un dan les ap o shero. Wawar dan les an o mui,
un penan ap leste: "Tu, baro rai, pen menge, koon das tut?"
O Petro his win glan o kheer beshdo. Un i budepaskretsa was pash leste, un penas ap leste: "Tu hal ninna jek kolendar, kai o Jesuseha dran o them Galilea was."
Un job chochas glan kol tsele menshende, kai koi beshdo hi, un penas: "Me haiwau gar, hoi tu peneh."

Un job djas win pash o baro wudar glan ko kheer. Kote dikas les i wawar budepaskretsa. Un koja penas ap kolende, kai kote tardo hi: "Kowa hi ninna jek kolendar, kai his o Jesuseha dran Nazaret khetne."
Un pale chochas lo, das pes sowel, un penas ap late: "Me prindjrau kau murshes gar."
Un pal i tikno tsiro wan kolla pash o Petreste, kai kote tardo hi, un penan ap leste: "Tchatchepaha, tu hal ninna jek kolendar. Tiro rakepen phukrell ap tute."
Koi tchingras lo, das pes sowel, un penas ap lende: "Me prindjrau kau murshes gar!" Un sik koi pre das o bashno gole.

Un o Petreske wan o Jesuseskre laba an o shero, hoi job leske penas: "O bashno dell gar gole jaake raha, har tu man gar triin kope buchoste dal." Un o Petro djas dran o baro wudar win, un rowas soreles.
Sik taissarlake wan i tsele bare rashaja un i biboldengre phureder khetne. Un khetne kran le win, te marenn le o Jesuses.
Un jon pandan les, un anan les pash o themeskro rajeste. Leskro lab his Pilato. Job his i Remari. An leskre wasta dan le o Jesuses.

O Judas, ko phukepaskro, har haiwas lo, te kran le win, te well o Jesus maredo, khaitas kowa les. Doleske anas job kol triin-deesh rupene beme pale pash i bare rashajende un pash i biboldengre phureder.
Un job penas ap lende: "Me anom doosh ap mande. Me phukrom ap koleste, kai kek doosh ap peste anas." Penan le: "Kowa hi gar maro koowa. Kowa hi tiro koowa."
Koi witsras lo kol triin-deesh rupene beme an o Debleskro baro kheer, nashas lendar, tchiwas i dori trul peskri meen, un tassras pes.
Kol bare rashaja lan kol rupene beme, un penan: "Ap kal lowe hi o rat pre. Mer nai tchiwah kal lowe gar pash o brawlepen an o Debleskro baro kheer. Kowa djal gar pal o biboldengro tchatchepen."

Un jon rakran khetne, hoi nai krans le kol lowentsa. Un jon penan: "Mer ginah i kotar them, te nai paskrah kote kolen, kai kek bibolde hi." Un jon ginan ko kotar them ko romestar, kai krell pirja dran lolo tchik.
Doleske dan le ko kotar them o lab: ratli phub. Ninna kau diwes kharell kowa jaake.

Un jaake was kowa tchatcho, hoi o Debleskro rakepaskro Jeremia glan i raha tsiro penas: Jon lan i triin-deesh rupene beme. Kowa his kol lowe, kai i Israeleskre menshe win kran, te plaissrenn le leske. Kol lowentsa ginan le i kotar them kolestar, kai krell pirja dran lolo tchik, jaake har o Dewel mange kowa penas.
Un o Jesus his glan o themeskro rajeste, o Pilato tardo. Un kowa putchas lestar: "Hal tu o baro rai pral i biboldende?" Koi penas o Jesus: "Awa, hi jaake, har tu penal."
Un i bare rashaja un i biboldengre phureder anan doosh ap leste pre. O Jesus penas tchi.
Koi penas o Pilato ap leste: "Shuneh tu gar, hoi jon lauter ap tute pre anenna?"
O Jesus penas tchi, kek lab. Un o Pilato kras tchatchepaha bare jaka.
Ap ko tsiro his jaake, te mukas o themeskro rai ap o Passa jekes dran o stilepen win. Koles nai rodan i bibolde penge win.
An ko bersh his i mursh kote stildo, leskro lab his Barabas. Hakeno djinas, te hi job i tchilatcho mursh.
Un har jon lauter khetne his, putchas o Pilato lendar: "Kones mukap dran o stilepen win: O Barabes? O Jesuses, kai ninna o Kristo kharella?"
O Pilato djinas mishto, te silwerenn le ap o Jesuseste. Un dran kowa dan le les an leskre wasta.

Har o Pilato ap o tchatchepaskro beshepaskro beshdo his, te rakrell lo o tchatchepen pral leste win, mukas leskri romni leske te penell: "Ko mursh anas kek doosh ap peste. Muk les te djal! Taissar rati his man i tchilatchi suni, un man his bare duka dran leste."
I bare rashaja un i biboldengre phureder rakran bud ap kol tsele menshende kote dre, te penenn jon, te well o Barabas dran o stilepen win, un te well o Jesus maredo.
Un o Pilato putchas lendar: "Kones kol dui murshendar mukap dran o stilepen win?" "O Barabes!" penan le.
Koi penas o Pilato ap lende: "Hoi krap o Jesuseha, kai kharella ninna o Kristo?" Penan le halauter: "De les ap o trushel!"
Putchas lo lendar: "Hawo tchilatcho koowa kras job?" Kote dan le bari gole: "De les ap o trushel!"

Har o Pilato dikas, te nai krell lo tchi, un te wenn le diwjeder, las lo pani, thowas peskre wasta glan i tsele menshende, un penas: "Me anau kek doosh ap mande, te well lo maredo. Koi doosh well ap tumende."
Un kol tsele menshe penan: "Koi doosh well ap mende un ap mare tchawende!"
Palle mukas lo o Barabes dran o stilepen win. Un o Jesuses mukas lo i tchupnijaha dawa te dell, un das les an i lurdengre wasta, te denn le les ap o trushel.
Palle anan o Pilateskre lurde o Jesuses an o baro kheer o themeskro rajestar. Un jon dan i tsele lurden gole, te wenn le kote khetne.
Un jon riwan leske leskre koola win, un tchiwan leske i loli rajeskri plashka trujal.

Un jon pandan subjengre kashta khetne, un tchiwan len leske ap o shero, jaake har i baro rai hidjell shereskro sonakai ap peskro shero. Ninna tchiwan le leske i kasht an leskro tchatcho wast. Un jon mukan pen glan leste ap i tchanga te perell, un kran jaake, har te mangans le i baro rajes an. Jon san pral leste, un penan: "Sharedo wess tu, tu baro rai pral i bibolde!"
Un jon tchungran ap leste, lan leske o kasht dran o wast, un dan les leske ap o shero.
Har jon san pral leste, riwan le leske koi loli plashka pale win, un riwan leske leskre koola pale an. Un jon anan les win, te denn le les ap o trushel.
Har jon dran o foro win djan, dikan le i murshes dran o foro Kirene. Leskro lab his Simon. Koles tapran le i sorjaha, un kran, te hidjell lo o Jesuseskro trushel.
Un har jon ap ko kotar them wan, hoi kharella Golgata, - kowa kharella Muleskro Shero, -
dan le les mool te pijell, kai tchomone dre hi, hoi Galle kharella. Har job kowa haiwas, kamas lo gar te pijell.
Un jon dan les ap o trushel. Un palle khelan le pral leskre koola, te dikenn le, hoi hakeno lella.
Un jon beshan pen kote tele, un dan ap leste jak.
Ap o trushel pral leskro shero tchiwan le i kotar kasht, kai tchindlo hi, hoske job hunte meras. Un koi pre his tchindlo: Kawa hi o Jesus, o baro rai pral i biboldende.
Leha dan le dui marepangren ap o trushel. Ko jekeskro trushel his tchatches lestar, ko wawareskro trushel his serwes lestar.
Un kolla, kai kote pashal wan, sikran i gushteha ap o Jesuseste, un praassan les.

Un jon penan ap o Jesuseste: "Tu kamal o Debleskro baro kheer tele te phagell, un an triin diwessa pale pre te tchiwell. Tu te hal o Debleskro tchawo, kre tuke, hoi kral i wawarenge un ab kau trushelestar tele!"
Un ninna i bare rashaja, i biboldengre tchatchepangre un phureder san pral leste, un penan:
"Wawaren las job dran o merepen win. Pes kokres nai lell lo gar dran o merepen win. Te hi lo o baro rai pral o Israel, palle well lo kanna o trushelestar tele. Palle patsah ap leste.
Job patsas o Debles, un penas: Me hom o Debleskro tchawo. Te kamell o Dewel les o djijestar, mu well lo, un lell les kanna kau trushelestar tele!"
Ninna kol dui marepangre praassan les, kolla kai langs leste ap pengro trushel dino wan.
His deesh-te-dujenge, koi was o diwes kalo har i rat an o tselo them. Un kowa atchas jaake bis trinenge.
Un har trinenge his, das o Jesus bari gole un penas: Eli, Eli, lema sabachtani? Kowa kharella: Miro Dewel, miro Dewel, hoske mukal man tu?
Un kolendar, kai kote tardo his, un kowa shunan, penan: "Kawa dell ap o Elija gole."
Un jek kol lurdendar anas sik tchomone har i kotar thann, kras les pherdo shutli mool, tchiwas les ap i kasht, un das les o Jesuses te pijell.
Wawar penan: "Muk les, dikas, te well o Elija, un lell les tele."
O Jesus das pale bari gole, un meras.
Un ko wudar an o Debleskro baro kheer, hoi his kerdo dran kutch pesso thann, kowa djas paash an dui kotja fun pral bis tele. Un i phub was trisslemen. Un i bare barra phagan an kotja.
I mulengre khera phagan pre. Un bud kolendar, kai ap o Debles patsan un meran, wan djido,
un djan dran pengre mulengre khera win. Palle, har ninna o Jesus i mulendar djido was, djan le an o Debleskro foro Jerusalem. Un bud menshe dikan len kote.

Ko pralstuno lurdo un kol wawar, kai khetne leha ap o Jesuseste jak dan, kolla dikan, te was i phub trisslemen, un hoi lauter koi djas. Koi tapras len i bari daar. Un jon penan: "Kau mursh his tchatchepaha o Debleskro tchawo."
Bud djuwja his i kotar krik tardo un dikan kowa lauter. Kolla wan o Jesuseha dran o them Galilea, te denn le les chapen un pipen.
Mashkral lende his i Maria Magdalena, un koi Maria, kai hi o Jakobeskri un o Josefeskri dai. Un o Zebedeskri romni, lakre tchawe his o Jakobo un o Johanni, joi his ninna kote pash lende.
Har i rat was, was i brawelo mursh dran o foro Arimatia. Leskro lab his Josef. Kowa patsas ninna ap o Jesuseste.
Job djas pash o Pilateste un mangas les, te dell lo les o mulo Jesuses. Un o Pilato penas i lurdenge, te denn le les leste.
Un o Josef las o mulo Jesuses, tchiwas les an i djudji plachta,
un tchiwas les an peskro newo mulengro kheer, hoi job das peske an i baro bar. Palle uleras job i baro bar glan o wudar an ko mulengro kheer, un djas peske.
Kote his ninna i Maria Magdalena un i wawar Maria. Kolla beshan wergal ko mulengro kheer.
O wawar diwes his o Debleskro diwes. Un i bare rashaja un i Farisarja wan pash o Pilateste khetne,
un penan ap leste: "Rai, menge djas an maro shero trujal, te penas ko chocheno, har job djiwas: Pal triin diwessa krell o Dewel man djido.

Dran kowa pen tire lurdenge, te denn le kol triin diwessa ap ko mulengro kheer jak! Jaake te nai tchorenn leskre mala les gar, un te penenn le i menshenge gar: Job stas i mulendar pre. Kowa wals i bareder chochepen har lauter kowa, hoi job penas."
Koi penas o Pilato ap lende: "Ake, lenn lurden tumentsa un denn jak ap ko mulengro kheer, jaake har tumer patsenn, te hunte well kowa!"
Un jon djan pash o mulengro kheer, un kran i sikepen ap ko bar, te dikenn le, te las jek o bar krik. Un kol lurde dan jak ap ko mulengro kheer.
O Debleskro diwes djas trujal. O wawar diwes, taissarlake, har o kham pre djala, djas i Maria Magdalena, un koi wawar Maria pash o mulengro kheer.
Ap jek kopo was i phub soreles trisslemen. Un o Debleskro bolepaskro was dran o bolepen, uleras ko baro bar glan o mulengro kheer ap i rig, un beshas pes koi pre.
Leskro mui chatchas har i soreli momeli. Un leskro ripen his parno har i gib.
Kol lurde, kai kote jak dan, tapran sawi daar, te peran le ap i phub, un atchan kote tchiddo, har te wans le mulo.
Un o bolepaskro penas ap kol djuwjende: "Ma darenn! Me djinau, te rodenn tumer o Jesuses, kai ap o trushel dino was.
Job hi gar kate. O Dewel kras les i mulendar djido, jaake har job penas. Awenn un dikenn, kai job tchiddo his!
Djan sik pash leskre malende un penenn lenge: O Dewel kras les djido! Shunenn, job djal glan tumende an o them Galilea. Un kote dikenn tumer les pale. Ma bistrenn, hoi me tumenge penom!"
Un jon djan sik krik. Lengro dji his pherdo daar un bacht. Un jon nashan, te penenn le o Jesuseskre malenge kowa lauter.
Ap o drom was o Jesus pash lende un penas: "Latcho diwes!" Un jon djan pash leste, peran glan leste tele, un tapran leskre pire.
Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Ma darenn! Djan pash mire phralende un penenn lenge, te djan le an o them Galilea! Un kote dikenn le man pale."
Har i djuwja ap o drom his, djan ninna kol lurdendar, kai ap o mulengro kheer jak dan, an o foro. Un kolla penan i bare rashajenge lauter, hoi koi djas.
Un i bare rashaja dan i biboldengre phureden khetne gole, un kran lentsa win, te denn le kol lurden bud lowe.
Un jon penan ap kol lurdende: "Penenn i menshenge: Leskre mala tchoran les an i rat, har mer sowam.
O themeskro rai, te shunell lo kowa, palle penah mer leske, te anan tumer an ko koowa kek doosh ap tumende. Jaake hunte trashenn tumer gar lestar."
Un kol lurde lan kol lowe, un kran kowa jaake, har i pralstune lenge penan. Un ko rakepen djal gomme kau diwes mashkral i biboldende trujal.
Kol deesh-te-jek Jesuseskre mala djan an o them Galilea, ap koi berga, kai o Jesus penas, te wenn le kote.
Un har jon les dikan kote tardo, peran le glan leste tele, ninna te patsan gar lauter, te hi job tchatchepaha o Jesus.
Un o Jesus djas pash lende un penas ap lende: "O baro Dewel das man i soor pral o bolepen un pral i phub.
Doleske djan pash i menshende an hake themma, un penenn lenge mire laba, te patsenn le ap mande! Thowenn len an o pani ap o lab o dadestar, o tchawestar un o Debleskro Ducho!
Penenn lenge, te rikrenn le ap lauter, hoi me tumenge penom! Tchatchepaha, me hom pash tumende hako diwes jaake raha, har i phub koi hi."
Kowa hi o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar. Job hi o Debleskro tchawo.

Kowa was jaake har o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja, glan i raha tsiro an peskro liil tchinas. O Dewel penas ap peskro tchaweste: Shun, me, o Dewel, bitchrau i murshes glan tute ap o drom, te krell lo tuke i drom, te nai wess pash i menshende.
Koi hi jek an o mulo them, kai dell gole: Krenn maro Debleske o drom, te nai well lo pash i menshende! Lenn halauter krik, hoi o Debleske an o drom tchiddo hi!

Kowa his o Johanni, kowa, kai thowas i menshen an o pani. Job his an o mulo them, un penas i menshenge: "Mukenn tumaro tchilatcho drom! Djan ap o Debleskro drom! Un mukenn tumen mandar an o pani te tchiwell, te sikrenn tumer hakeneste, kai mukan tumaro phuro djipen. Un o Dewel lell tumari doosh tumendar krik!"
Un bud menshe djan pash leste. Jon wan dran o tselo them Judea un dran o foro Jerusalem. Un jon penan o tchilatcho koowa, hoi jon kran. Un o Johanni thowas len an o pani Jordan.
O Johanneskri plashka his dran fichengre balla. Un i ledertikri dori his trul leste. Un leskro chapen his gwin un stepangre.
Un job penas i menshenge: "Koi wella i mursh pal mande, kowa hi sorleder har me. Me hom gar moldo, te tchiwap man glan leste tele, te krap leskre tircha pre.
Me tchiwom tumen an o pani, te well diklo, kai mukan tumaro phuro djipen. Kowa, kai well pal mande, tchiwell o Debleskro Ducho ap tumende."
His an kol diwessa, kai was o Jesus dran o foro Nazaret, hoi an o them Galilea tchiddo hi, un mukas pes o Johannestar an o pani Jordan te thowell.
Un har o Jesus pes dran o pani hadas, dikas lo, kai djas o bolepen pre, un o Debleskro Ducho was har i parno tchirklo ap leste tele.
Un i rakepen dran o bolepen penas: "Tu hal miro tchawo, kai me kamau. Pral tute hom bachtelo."
Un sik pal kowa anas les o Debleskro Ducho an o mulo them.
Un kote atchas lo star-deesh diwessa. Un o beng kamas les o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell. Kote his ninna diwje fiche. Un i bolepangre wan un his leske koi.
Har o Johanni stildo was, djas o Jesus an o them Galilea, un sikras i menshende o Debleskro drom.
Un job penas: "O tsiro was, kai lell o Dewel i menshen dran o tchilatchepen win. Mukenn tumaro phuro djipen! Un djan ap o Debleskro drom! Un patsenn ap kau latcho lab!"
