Har o Jesus pash o baro pani an o them Galilea djas, dikas lo o Simones un leskro phrales, o Andreas. Kolla his matchepangre, un witsran pengre matchengre gone an o pani, te taprenn le matchen.
Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "Awenn mantsa! Me krau tumendar menshen, kai anenn wawaren pash mande."
Koi pre mukan le pengre matchengre gone un djan leha.
Un o Jesus djas dureder, un dikas o Jakobes un leskro phrales, o Johanni. Lengro dad hi o Zebedeo. Jon his an o panjeskro ulepaskro beshdo un kran i matchengre gone tseles.
Har job len dikas, das lo len gole. Un jon mukan pengro dades, o Zebedeo, an o panjeskro ulepaskro, khetne kolentsa, kai budran leske, un djan o Jesuseha.
Un jon djan an o foro Kapernaum. Ap o Debleskro diwes djas o Jesus an i biboldengri kangri un sikras i menshende o Debleskro drom.
Un jon kran bare jaka pral kowa, hoi job lenge penas. Job rakras bari sorjaha un gar jaake har i biboldengre tchatchepangre rakrenna.
An koi kangri his ninna i mursh, kai his an leste i beng. Un kowa das gole:
"Hoi kameh tu mendar, Jesus dran Nazaret? Wal tu, te maress men? Me djinau, koon tu hal: Tu weh o Deblestar."
Un o Jesus das les trad un penas ap leste: "Ma rake un dja dran leste win!"
Un ko beng, kai an ko mursheste his, tsardas kau murshes kate un kote, das soreles gole, un djas dran leste win.

Un lenge atchas o rakepen krik. Un jon putchan mank pende: "Hoi hi kowa? I newo drom sikrell lo men i bari sorjaha. Les hi ninna penepaske pral i benga. Un jon shunenn ap leste, un wenn dran i menshende win."
Un an i tikno tsiro shunas hakeno lestar an kau tselo them Galilea.
Har jon dran i biboldengri kangri win wan, djan le an ko kheer, kai o Simon un o Andreas djiwenn. Ninna o Jakobo un o Johanni djan lentsa.
Un i dai o Simoneskri romjatar his tchiddo ap o tchiben, un lakro shero his tato. Un jon penan o Jesuseske latar.
Un job was pash late, tapras lat pash o wast un kras, te stell li pale pre. Un o nasslepen djas latar. Un joi anas lenge i chapen.
Ap i rati, har o kham tele djas, anan jon pash leste i tsele nasselen un kolen, kai his benga an lende.
Un i tsele menshe dran o foro wan khetne glan o wudar.
Un job kras bud nasselen sasto, un las bud nasslepen lendar. Ninna bud bengen tradas lo win un mukas len gar rakrell. Jon djinan, koon job hi. Doleske mukas o Jesus len gar te rakrell.
Un taissarlake, glan o diwes, stas lo pre, un djas kote, kai lo kokres hi. Un kote rakras lo o Debleha.
Un o Simon un kolla, kai pash leste his, nashan leske sik palla.
Un har hatsan le les, penan le leske: "Hakeno rodell tut."
Penas lo ap lende: "Mer djas ninna an i wawar forja, te penap kote i menshenge o Debleskro lab. Doleske wom kai, te penap kowa lenge."
Un job djas an o tselo them Galilea trujal, un rakras an i biboldengre kangria, un tradas i bengen dran i menshende win.
I mursh was pash o Jesuseste. Koles his i djungelo nasslepen, kai leskro mass tele merella. Job peras glan leste tele, un mangas lestar: "Te kameh tu, nai kreh man sasto."
Un o Jesuses khaitas kowa, un job tchiwas peskro wast ap leste, un penas ap leste: "Me kamau, te wess sasto."
Un har job kowa penas, djas ko nasslepen lestar, un job was sasto.
Un o Jesus bitchras les pestar un penas soreles ap leste:

"Shun, pen kekeske, hoi me krom tuke! Dja pash o rashajeste un sike leste, kai tu sasto wal! Un aan kowa glan o Debleste, hoi o Mose penas, te wess erligo kerdo. Kre kowa, te djinenn i menshe, kai tu sasto wal."

Un ko mursh djas peske, un rakras bud pral kowa, hoi o Jesus leske kras. Un bud shunan kowa, jaake, te nai djas o Jesus buder gar an i forja dre, har job kamas. Un job his win, kote, kai kek menshe djiwan. Un kote wan le pash leste dran i tsele gaba un forja.
Pal i tikno tsiro djas o Jesus pale an o foro Kapernaum. Un bud shunan, kai job an o kheer his.
Koi wan jaake bud menshe an o kheer un glan o wudar khetne, te nai djas buder kek an o kheer dre. Un o Jesus penas lenge o Debleskro lab.
Koi anan le jekes ap o tchiben, kai nai nashell gar. Star mursha hidjan les.
Kolla anan les nashte gar pash o Jesuseste, jaake bud menshe his trul leste. Koi djan jon ap o kheer pral pre, lan barra win, un mukan ko tchiben o nassleha glan o Jesuseste tele.
Har o Jesus lengro patsepen dikas, penas lo ap koleste, kai nai nashell gar: "Miro tchawo, me lau tiri doosh tutar."
Koi his ninna biboldengre tchatchepangre beshdo. Kolla penan an pengre djia:
"Har nai penell job kowa? Job krell pes har o Dewel! O Dewel kokres nai lell i doosh i menshendar!"
O Jesus haiwas, hoi an lengro shero trujal djas un penas ap lende: "Hoske djal kowa an tumaro shero trujal?
Hi kowa phareder, te penap ap leste: Me lau tiri doosh tutar, har te penap: Ste pre, le tiro tchiben un dja khere?
Me kamau, te djinenn tumer: O Menshengro Tchawes hi i soor ap kai phub, te nai lell lo i doosh i menshendar krik." Palle penas lo ap koleste, kai nasselo hi:
"Ste pre, le tiro tchiben un dja khere!"
Un job stas pre, las peskro tchiben un djas win. Un lauter dikan les, un kran bare jaka. Jon sharan o Debles, un penan: "An maro tselo djipen dikam sawo koowa gar."
O Jesus djas pale win pash o baro pani. Un bud menshe wan pash leste. Un job sikras len o Debleskro drom.

Un har job jaake kote djas, dikas lo i murshes, kowa kharas Levi. Leskro dad hi o Alfeo. O Levi his pash ko kheer beshdo, kai las job lowe i Remarjenge dre. Penell o Jesus ap leste: "Am, dja mantsa!" Un job stas pre, un djas leha.

Un o Jesus djas an leskro kheer un beshas pes tele. Un bud menshe djan leha. Bud his kolendar, kai lenn i biboldendar lowe i Remarjenge dre, un kolendar, kai tchilatcho koowa kran un doleske pale-tchiddo his. Un jon beshan pen tele o Jesuseha un leskre malentsa, te chan le.

Mank i Farisarja his sawe, kai tchatchepangre hi. Har jon dikan, kai job kolentsa chal, penan le ap leskre malende: "Hoske chal job kolentsa, kai lenn i biboldendar lowe i Remarjenge dre, un kol wawarentsa, kai hi ninna pale-tchiddo?"

Har o Jesus kowa shunas, penas job ap lende: "Kolla, kai sasto hi, djan gar pash o dramaskro. Kolla, kai nasselo hi, djan pash leste. Me wom gar, te dap kolen pash mande gole, kai ap o tchatcho drom hi. Na-a! Me wom, te dap kolen pash mande gole, kai djan ap o tchilatcho drom."

His i diwes, kai chan o Johanneskre mala un i Farisarja tchi, te mangenn le o Debles an. Koi wan mursha pash o Jesuseste, un penan ap leste: "Kolla, kai shunenn ap o Johanneste, ninna kolla, kai shunenn ap i Farisarja, chan i tsiro tchi, te mangenn le o Debles an. Hoske krenn tire mala kowa gar?"
Penell o Jesus ap lende: "Jaake raha, har o bijabeskro ap i bijab hi, chan un pijenn leskre mala, kai leha ap i bijab hi.
Ko tsiro wella, kai o bijabeskro lendar krik lino wella. Ap ko tsiro chan le un pijenn le tchi, te mangenn le o Debles an.
Kek siwell i newo kotar thann ap i phuro ripen. Pash o thopen well o newo kotar tikneder un tsardell pes pale tele, un o phuro ripen djal budeder paash.

Un kek tchorell newi mool an i phure moljakre gone. I newi mool krell i phure moljakre gone paash. Un koi mool nashell win, un kol moljakre gone djan paash. I newi mool well tchoredo an newe moljakre gone!"
Ap jek Debleskro diwes djas o Jesus ap i kotar them, kai djob baro was. Un leskre mala lan o djob an i wasta, te chan le.
Un kol Farisarja penan ap leste: "Hoske krenn tire mala ap o Debleskro diwes sawo koowa, hoi hi gar pal maro tchatchepen?"
Penas lo ap lende: "Hoi kras o baro rai David peskre malentsa, har jon bokan? Djinenn tumer gar, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi?

An ko tsiro, kai o Abjathar o baro rashai his, djas o David an o Debleskro kheer un chas o Debleskre mare, hoi kote tchiddo his. Pal i biboldengro tchatchepen his kol mare i rashajenge kokres koi. O David chas len, un das ninna kolen, kai pash leste his."
Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "O Debleskro diwes hi i menshenge koi. O mensho was gar kerdo, te hi lo o Debleskro diweske koi.
Jaake hom me, o Menshengro Tchawo, ninna o rai pral o Debleskro diwes."
Un o Jesus djas pale an i biboldengri kangri. Koi his i mursh, koles his i bango wast.
Un jon dikan ap leste, un putchan pendar: "Krell lo kanna kau murshes ap o Debleskro diwes sasto?" Jon rodan tchomone, te nai anenn le les glan i tchatchepangre.
Un job penas ap kol mursheste, koles i bango wast hi: "Ste pre un am kai!"

Palle penas lo ap lende: "Hoi kras mer pal maro tchatchepen ap o Debleskro diwes? Hi gar feteder te kras mer latcho koowa har tchilatcho koowa? Hi gar feteder te kras mer i nasselen sasto, har te mukas mer len te merell?" Jon penan tchi.
Kowa dukas les, kai lengro dji har i bar his. Un job dikas chojemen ap lende un penas ap ko mursheste: "Sike tiro wast!" Un job sikras peskro wast. Un ko wast was sasto.
Un kol Farisarja djan win, un djan pash kolende, kai shunenn ap o Herodeste, un rakran lentsa, har jon nai marenn les.

O Jesus un leskre mala djan penge pash o baro pani. Un bud menshe dran o them Galilea djan leske palla. Ninna bud wawar djan pash leste, kai shunan, hoi job lauter kras. Kolla wan dran o them Judea, un dran o foro Jerusalem, un dran o them Idumea un dran o them ap i wawar rig o panjestar Jordan, un dran ko them, kai i forja Tirus un Sidon tchiddo hi.

Un o Jesus kras bud menshen sasto. Doleske wan lauter, kai nasselo hi, pash leste. Un hakeno kamas les an-taprell, te well lo sasto. Koi penas o Jesus ap peskre malende, te anenn le leske i tikno panjeskro ulepaskro, kai job nai pre djala, te well lo gar paash stakedo.
Un har kol menshe, kai benga an lende his, les dikan, peran jon glan leste tele, un dan gole: "Tu hal o Debleskro tchawo!"
Un job penas soreles ap lende, te penenn le kowa kekeske.
O Jesus djas ap i berga, un das kolen pash peste gole, kai job win rodas. Un kolla wan pash leste.
Job rodas deesh-te-dujen lendar win, te wenn le leskre bitchepangre. "Me rodom tumen win, te atchenn pash mande," penas lo. "Me bitchrau tumen pash i menshende, te penenn lenge o Debleskro lab.
Un tumen well i soor, te tradenn i bengen wi."
Un kol deesh-te-dui his: o Simon, koles das job ko lab Petro,
un o Jakobo un leskro phraal o Johanni. Lengro dad hi o Zebedeo. Kolen das lo ko lab Boanerges, kowa kharella Mursha pherdo choli.

Mank kol deesh-te-dujende his ninna o Andreas, un o Filipo, un o Bartolomeo, un o Mateo, un o Thomas, un o Jakobo, koleskro dad hi o Alfeo, un o Tadeo, un o Simon, kai his kol menshendar, kai kharenna Zelotarja,
un o Judas Iskariot, ko phukepaskro.
O Jesus djas an i kheer. Koi wan pale bud menshe khetne, jaake, kai his len kek tsiro, te chan le.
Un har leskre menshe kowa shunan, penan le: "Job hi dinelo!" Un jon kaman les te taprell.
Un i biboldengre tchatchepangre, kai wan dran o foro Jerusalem tele, penan: "O pralstuno beng hi an leste!" Un jon penan ninna: "O pralstuno beng das les i soor, te nai tradell job i bengen wi."
Un o Jesus kharas len khetne, un rakras ap lende laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dre hi. Un job penas: Har nai tradell o beng o benges wi?
Te kurenn pen i bare raja an jek them, palle djal ko them paash.
Un an jek kheer nai well gar dujen penepaske. Kowa djal gar.
Te tchingrell jek beng i wawar bengeha, palle nashrell job peskri soor un job djal paash.
Kek nai djal an i kheer, kai i sorelo mursh djiwella, un tchorell leskro koowa. Job hunte pandell ko sorelo murshes. Palle nai randell lo leskro tselo brawlepen.
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Hako tchilatcho koowa, hoi i menshe kran, nai bistrell o Dewel. Ninna te penenn le djungele laba pral leste, nai bistrell lo kowa.
Koon pral o Debleskro Ducho djungele laba rakrella, kolestar well koi doosh gar krik lino. Leskri doosh atchella hako tsiro.
Kowa penas lo lenge, har jon penan: "An leste hi i beng!"
Koi was o Jesuseskri dai un leskre phrala. Jon his win tardo un bitchran jekes pash leste, te kharell lo les.
Bud menshe his trul leste beshdo. Un leske was penlo: "Dik, tiri dai, tire phrala un tire phenja hi win tardo, un kamenn tuha te rakrell."
Koi penas job: "Me kamau tumen te sikrell, koon miri dai hi un mire phrala."
Un job dikas trujal ap kolende, kai his trul leste beshdo, un penas: "Dikenn, koja hi miri dai, un kolla hi mire phrala.
Kowa, kai krell, hoi o Dewel kamella, kowa hi miro phraal, miri pheen, un miri dai."

Un pale djas o Jesus pash o baro pani, un penas i menshenge o Debleskro lab. Un pash leste wan jaake bud menshe khetne, te hunte djas job ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, kai an o pani tchiddo his. Un job beshas pes kote, un kol tsele menshe his pash o pani tardo.
Un job rakras ap lende bud sawe laba, kai hi i khatedo tchatchepen dre. Un job penas ap lende:
Shunenn, i hacho djas win, te witsrell lo o tikno djob ap peskro kotar phub, te well ko djob baro.
Un har job o tikno djob ap i phub witsras, peran tikne kotja ap o drom. Koi wan i tchirkle un chan len pre.
Wawar djob peras ap i barra. Koi his gar bud phub. Dran kowa was ko djob sik dran i phub win.
Har kanna o kham pre djas, was ko djob, kai gar dur an i phub his, chatchedo un meras tele.
Wawar tikno djob peras tel i subjengre burra, un kol burra wan baro un tassran les, jaake, kai was ko djob gar baro.
Wawar tikno djob peras ap i latchi phub, djas pre un was baro. Kowa was triin-deesh kope jaake bud. Wawar tikno djob was shob-deesh kope jaake bud. Un wawar tikno djob was sheel kope jaake bud.
Un job penas: Mukenn kowa an tumaro shero trujal te djal!
Har his o Jesus kokres peskre deesh-te-dujentsa un wawarentsa peskre malendar, putchan le lestar, hoi job kol labentsa kamell te sikrell.

Koi penas lo ap lende: O Dewel mukell tumen te haiwell, har kote djal, kai dell lo menshen pash peste gole, te djan le ap leskro drom. Kol wawar, kai win hi, ap kolende rakrau sawe labentsa, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi,
te nai dikenn le kowa pengre jakentsa, un haiwenn les gar, un te nai shunenn le les, un haiwenn les gar, te wenn le gar pash o Debleste, te lell lo lengri doosh lendar.
Palle penas lo ap lende: Te haiwenn tumer kal laba gar, har kamenn tumer kol tsele wawar laba te haiwell?
Ko hacho hi har i mensho, kai penell i menshenge o Debleskro lab.
Ko drom hi har o dji kol menshendar, kai shunenn ko lab. Palle well sik o beng, un lell ko lab lendar krik, kai lenge penlo was.
Ko kotar phub, kai pherde barra hi, hi har o dji kol menshendar, kai shunenn ko lab, un lenn les i bachtjatar sik pre,
un bistrenn les ninna pale sik. Jon mukenn les gar an pengro dji soreles te well. Te well i pharo tsiro ap lende, un te wenn le mange palla lino, palle witsrenn le pengro patsepen ap i rig.
Wawar menshe hi har ko kotar phub, kai o djob tel i subjengre burra peras. Kal menshe shunan ko lab.

Palle dikenn le ap i phubjakro koowa. Jon kamenn brawelo te well, un o brawlepen krell len gar bachtelo. Un len hi bok pal bud wawar koowa. Un kowa lauter tassrell ko lab, hoi shunan le. Un ko lab nai rakrell buder gar an lengro dji.

Koi latchi phub hi har o dji kol menshendar, kai shunenn ko lab un krenn kowa, hoi ko lab lenge penella. Pash kolende hi ko lab har o djob, hoi baro was. Un pash jekeste was lo triin-deesh kope jaake bud, un pash i wawareste was lo shob-deesh kope jaake bud, un pale pash i wawareste was lo sheel kope jaake bud.
O Jesus penas ap peskre malende: Kek chatchell i momeli an, te tchiwell lo lat tel i piri, witar gar tel o tchiben. Na-a, job tchiwell lat ap i momelengri, kai i momeli diklo wella.
Well i tsiro, kai djinenn i menshe kowa, hoi djinenn le kanna gomme gar. Well i tsiro, kai haiwenn le kowa, hoi haiwenn le kanna gomme gar.
Mukenn kowa an tumaro shero trujal te djal!

Un job penas ap lende: Denn garda ap kowa, hoi tumer shunenna! Te shunenn gar mishto, hoi penau, haiwenn kowa gar. Te shunenn mishto, haiwenn kowa ninna mishto. Un o Dewel krell tumaro dji pre, te haiwenn gomme feteder.
Koon kowa, hoi job haiwas, an peskro dji rikrella, kowa haiwell bud un budeder. Koon kowa gar an peskro dji rikrella, kolestar well ninna kowa lino, hoi les hi.
Un o Jesus penas: Te kharell o Dewel menshen pash peste, te djan le ap leskro drom, hi kowa jaake, har te tchiwell i hacho tikno djob ap i phub.
Haki rati tchiwell lo pes tele, un taissarlake stell lo pale pre. Un ko tikno djob djal pre un well baro, un ko mursh djinell gar, har kowa lauter djala.
I phub krell pestar, te well lauter baro. O senlepen well win, palle baro un bareder, un well pherdo tikno djob.
Ap ko tsiro kai hi ko djob pesso, bitchrell o hacho peskre budepangren, te tchinenn le o djob tele. O tsiro was, te anenn le o djob dre.
Palle penas o Jesus ap lende: Me penau tumenge kanna, har kowa hi, te dell o Dewel i menshen pash peste gole, te djan le ap leskro drom.
Kowa hi jaake har i djob dran i senftikro ruk. Te well lo an i phub witsedo, hi lo tikneder har ko tselo wawar djob ap i phub.
Hi lo an i phub, djal lo pre un well bareder har o tselo wawar senlepen. Dran ko tikno djob well i ruk jaake baro, te nai djiwenn i tchirkle ap leste, kote, kai o kham gar jaake tato hi.
Un o Jesus penas lenge bud sawe laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi. Job penas lenge o Debleskro lab jaake, har jon nai haiwan kowa.
Hako kopo, kai job lenge o Debleskro lab penas, rakras lo sawe labentsa, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi. Job te his pengre malentsa kokres, palle penas lo lenge, hoi kol laba kamenn te sikrell.
Un ap ko diwes ap i rati penas o Jesus ap peskre malende: "Uleras wergal!"
Un jon mukan kol menshen te djal, un djan an ko panjeskro ulepaskro, kai o Jesus hi, un lan les lentsa. Wawar panjeskre ulepangre his ninna koi un uleran lentsa.
Koi phurdas i baro diwjo ducho pral o baro pani. Un o pani was diwjo un djas pre te tele. Un bud pani was an o panjeskro ulepaskro dre, jaake bud, te was o panjeskro ulepaskro pherdo pani.
Un o Jesus his pal ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, un sowas ap i pernitsa. Un jon djangran les pre, un penan ap leste: "Sikepaskro, putcheh tu gar koi pal, kai mer tassah?"
Un job stas pre, un das ko sorelo ducho trad, un penas ap ko baro pani: "Atch! Muk tele!" Un ko sorelo ducho phurdas buder gar, un o baro pani das buder kek gole.
Un job penas ap lende: "Hoske trashenn tumer jaake? Hi tumen kek patsepen?"
Un kolen was i bari traash, un jon penan mank pende: "Koon hi ko mursh? Ninna o sorelo ducho un o baro pani shunenn ap leste."
Un jon wan ap o wawar panjeskri rig an o them Gerasa.
Un har o Jesus dran o panjeskro ulepaskro djas, nashas i mursh pash leste. Kowa was dran i mulengre khera. Les his i beng an peste,
un djiwas an kol mulengre khera. Un kek nashte pandas les, witar gar i sasterne shellentsa.
Bud kope pandan le leskre wasta un pire i sasterne shellentsa, un job kras len paash un phagas len pestar tele. Un kek nashte was rai pral leste.
Hako tsiro ap o diwes un an i rati, his job an i mulengre khera un ap i berge, un das bari gole, un das pes i barentsa.
Har job o Jesuses dur glan peste dikas, nashas lo pash leste un witsras pes glan leste ap i phub.
Un o Jesus penas ap o bengeste: "Tu beng, dja wi dran kau mursheste!" Koi das job bari gole: "Jesus, tu tchawo o baro Deblestar, hoi kameh tu mandar? Me mangau tut pash o Debleste: Ma duke man gar!"
Un o Jesus putchas lestar: "Har khareh tu?" Koi penas lo: "Mer ham bud. Doleske kharau Legioni."
Un job mangas o Jesusestar, te tradell lo len gar dran ko them win.
Koi his pash i berga bud bale, hoi kote chan.
Un kol benga mangan lestar: "Muk men an kol balende dre te djal!"

Un job mukas len an lende dre te djal. Koi wan kol benga dran o mursheste win, un djan an kol balende. Un kol tsele bale wan diwjo un nashan i berga tele, un stan an o baro pani, un tassan. Kolla his nai dui serja bale.
Un kolla, kai dan garda ap i balende, nashan penge, un penan kowa i menshenge an i forja un an i gaba. Un kol menshe kaman te dikell, hoi kote djas, un wan pash o Jesuseste,
un dikan koles kote beshdo, kolestar kol bud benga win wan. Job his an-rido un buder gar diwjo. Har jon kowa dikan, was i traash ap lende.
Un kolla, kai lauter dikan, penan lenge, hoi koleha djas, un hoi kol balentsa djas.
Un jon mangan o Jesusestar, te djal lo dran lengro them win.
Un har job ap o panjeskro ulepaskro djas, mangas lestar ko mursh, kai his i benga an leste, te atchell lo nai pash leste.
O Jesus kamas gar, te djas job leha, un penas ap leste: "Dja khere pash tire menshende! Pen lenge lauter, hoi o Dewel tuke kras un har latcho job ap tute his!"
Un kau mursh djas peske, un djas an ko them trujal, kai i deesh forja tchiddo hi, un penas i menshenge, hawo baro koowa o Jesus ap leste kras. Un hakeno kras bare jaka.
Har o Jesus ap o panjeskro ulepaskro pale wergal uleras, wan kote bud menshe pash leste khetne. Un job his gomme pash o baro pani,
koi was i pralstuno pral i biboldengri kangri. Leskro lab his Jairo. Har dikas lo o Jesuses, peras lo glan leste tele,
un mangas les o tselo djijeha un penas: "Miri tchai hi ap o merepen tchiddo. Am un tchip tire wasta ap late, te well li sasto, un te djiwell li!"
Un job djas leha. Un bud menshe djan leske palla un his trul leste.
Mank lende his i djuwel. Kolat his i ratlo nasslepen. Deesh-te-dui bersha his li nasseli,
un das lauter, hoi lat his, i dramangrende. Un kek nashte kras lat sasto. Joi was gomme nassleder.
Har joi o Jesusestar shunas, was li mashkral i menshende pal leste, un tapras ap leskro ripen.
Joi penas peske: "Te taprau kokres ap leskro ripen, wau sasto."
Un ap jek kopo djas kau nasslepen latar. Un joi haiwas, kai hi li sasto.
Un o Jesus haiwas pestar, kai djas i soor lestar win, un risras pes trujal, un penas ap i menshende: "Koon tapras ap miro ripen?"
Un leskre mala penan ap leste: "Tu dikeh, har bud menshe trul tute hi, un koi putcheh tu: Koon tapras ap miro ripen?"
Job dikas pes trujal pal kolate, kai kras kowa.
Koi djuwel kai djinas, hoi lake djas, trashas un trissas. Un joi was pash leste, un peras glan leste tele ap i phub, un penas leske o tselo tchatchepen.
Job penas ap late: "Romnija, tiro patsepen kras tut sasto. Dja mo Debleha! Tiro nasslepen well buder gar pale."
Har job jaake rakras, wan mursha dran o kheer kolestar, kai o pralstuno pral i biboldengri kangri hi, un penan leske: "Tiri tchai meras. Tu hunte mangess o rajes buder gar."
O Jesus shunas kal laba, un penas ap kol pralstuneste: "Ma traash, pats!"
Un o Jesus mukas kokres o Petres, un o Jakobes, un koleskro phrales, o Johanni, leha te djal.
Un jon wan an o kheer kol pralstunestar. Un job dikas kote bud menshen, kai nashan kate un kote un rowan un dan bari gole.
Un job djas dre, un penas ap lende: "Hoske denn tumer gole un rowenna? Koi tchai meras gar, joi sowella."
Un jon san pral leste. O Jesus tradas len lauteren win, un las kol tchakro dades un lakri dai peha, ninna kolen, kai pash leste his, un djas dre, kai koi tchai tchiddo his.
Un job tapras kol tchat pash o wast, un penas ap late an peskro rakepen: "Talita kumi!" Kowa kharella: Tchai, me penau tuke, ste pre!
Un sik stas koi tchai pre, un djas trujal. Joi his deesh-te-dui bersha phuro. Un kolenge atchas o rakepen pral kowa krik.
Un job penas lenge soreles: "Ma penenn kowa kekeske!" Un palle penas lo: "Denn lat te chal!"
O Jesus djas dran ko foro win un was an peskro dadeskro foro. Un leskre mala djan leha.

Ap o Debleskro diwes djas lo an i biboldengri kangri un sikras i menshende o Debleskro drom. Un bud menshe, kai shunan les, kran bare jaka pral kowa, hoi job penas. Jon penan: "Koon penas leske kowa lauter? Koon das les sawo goswepen? Kai well leskri bari soor, te nai krell lo sawo baro koowa?"

"Hi kowa gar ko mursh, kai budrell i kashtentsa? Hi leskri dai gar i Maria? Hi leskre phrala gar o Jakobo, o Josef, o Simon, un o Judas? Un ninna leskre phenja djiwenn pash mende." Un jon choiran pen pral leste.
O Jesus penas ap lende: "Kek Debleskro rakepaskro well kote sharedo, kai job khere hi, witar gar pash peskre menshende un an peskro kheer. An i wawar forja un gaba well lo sharedo."
Un kote nashte kras job kek baro koowa an o Debleskri soor, kokres i nasslenge tchiwas job i wasta pre un kras len sasto, un kolla his gar bud nassele.
Un job nai haiwas gar, hoske i menshen kote kek patsepen his. Palle djas lo an kol gaba trujal, un sikras i menshende o Debleskro drom.
O Jesus das kol deesh-te-dujen pash peste gole, te bitchrell lo len win, dui te dui. Job das len i soor pral i benga, te nai tradenn le len i menshendar win.
Un job penas lenge soreles: "Lenn tchi tumentsa ap o drom, kokres i kasht un tircha. Lenn kek maro, kek possita, kek lowe, witar gar i duito gad!"
Un job penas ap lende: "Kote, kai tumer an i kheer dre djana, kote atchenn jaake raha har atchenn an ko foro.
Kote, kai lenn le tumen gar an pengro kheer dre, un kamenn gar ap tumende te shunell, kote djan dureder, un denn koi tchik tumare pirendar tele! Kowa sikrell kol menshende, kai jon tchilatcho hi."
Un kol deesh-te-dui djan trujal, un penan i menshenge: "Mukenn tumaro tchilatcho drom, un djan ap o Debleskro drom!"
Un jon tradan bud bengen i menshendar win, un makan bud nasselen o djeteha dre, un kran len sasto.

Ninna o baro rai, o Herodes, shunas o Jesusestar. An o tselo them rakran le lestar. I menshe penan: "O Johanni, kowa, kai i menshen an o pani thowas, stas i mulendar pre. Doleske hi les i soor, te krell lo sawo baro koowa."
Wawar penan: "Kowa hi o Elija." Un pale wawar penan: "Kowa hi i Debleskro rakepaskro har kol wawar Debleskre rakepangre."
Har kowa o Herodes shunas, penas lo: "Kowa hi o Johanni, kai mukom leske o shero tele te dell. Kowa stas i mulendar pre."

Kowa was jaake: Glan ko tsiro las o Herodes koi romjat peskro phralestar Filip. Lakro lab his Herodia. Un o Johanni penas leske: "Kowa hi gar mishto, kai tu lal tiro phraleskri romjat." Har o Herodes kowa shunas, penas lo ap peskre lurdende, te taprenn le o Johanni, un te witsrenn le les an o stilepen.
Un i Herodia his chojedo ap o Johanneste un kamas les te marell, un joi kras les nashte gar.

O Herodes trashas o Johannestar. Job djinas, kai o Johanni i Debleskro mursh hi, kai djas o tchatcho drom. Doleske das lo garda ap leste un rikras les an o stilepen. Job kamas o Johanneskro rakepen. Hako kopo, kai job les shunas, djinas lo buder gar, hoi te krell lo un te penell lo.

Koi was i diwes, kai hi mishto i Herodiake. O Herodes was i bersh phureder un mukas i baro chapen te krell. Pash ko chapen wan i pralstune pral peskro them, ninna i pralstune lurde. Un i brawele dran o them Galilea his ninna koi.

Koi was i Herodiakri tchai pash lende un khelas glan lende. Lakro khelepen his shukar an i jaka o rajestar Herodes un an i jaka kolendar, kai pash leste beshdo hi un chan. Koi penas o Herodes ap koi tchate: "Tu nai mangeh mandar, hoi tu kameh. Me dau kowa tute!"
Un job das pes sowel: "Hoi tu mandar ninna mangeh, kowa dau tut, ninna te mangeh mandar o paash miro themestar un brawlepen."
Un koi tchai djas win, un putchas peskri datar: "Hoi mangap lestar?" Koja penas: "O shero o Johannestar, kowa kai thowas i menshen an o pani."
Koi djas li sik dre pash o Herodeste, un mangas lestar: "Me kamau, te dess man kanna ap i tcharo o shero o Johannestar, kowa, kai thowas i menshen an o pani."

Har o Herodes kowa shunas, dukas leskro dji. Ninna te khaitas les kowa, kamas lo peskro lab te rikrell, hoi job glan kolende das, kai pash leste trul i chapaskri beshdo his un shunan, har job pes sowel das.
Doleske bitchras lo i lurdes pash o Johanneste, te dell lo leskro shero tele. Kowa djas an o stilepen, un das leske o shero tele,
hidjas ko shero ap i tcharo, un das les kol tchate. Un koi tchai das les peskri date.
Un har shunan o Johanneskre mala kowa, wan le, lan o mules lentsa, un paskran les.
Un kol deesh-te-dui, kai o Jesus pash i menshende bitchras, kolla wan pale, un penan o Jesuseske lauter, hoi jon kran un penan.
Kote his jaake bud menshe, kai wan un djan, te his len kek tsiro, te chan le. Un job penas ap lende: "Awenn, djas kote, kai kokres ham, te lenn tumer newi soor!"
Un jon uleran ap o panjeskro ulepaskro kote, kai jon kokres hi.
Har kol menshe dikan, kai jon uleran penge, nashan le dran i tsele forja kote khetne, kai o Jesus peskre malentsa djas. Un jon his glan lende koi.
Un o Jesus djas dran o panjeskro ulepaskro win, un dikas kol bud menshen. Kolla khaitan les. Jon his har bakre, kai hi len kek bakrengro, kai dell garda ap lende. Un job rakras lentsa i raha tsiro.
Ap i rati wan leskre mala pash leste, un penan: "Kate, kai mer ham, della tchi te chal, un i rati wella.
Bitche kal menshen tutar, te djan le pash i hachende un an i gaba, te ginenn le penge maro!"
Koi penas lo ap lende: "Denn tumer len te chal!" Penan le: "Kameh, te las dui-sheel rupene beme, te ginas maro un das len te chal?"
Penas lo: "Kitse mare hi tumen? Djan koi un dikenn!" Un har jon kowa djinan, penan le leske: "Pantch mare un dui matche."
Un o Jesus penas lenge, te beshenn le pen lauter kate te kote an o senlepen khetne.
Un jon beshan pen kate te kote khetne, jaake te his kate sheel beshdo, un kote his paash-sheel beshdo.

Un job las kol pantch mare un kol dui matche an i wasta, dikas pre ap o bolepen, parkras pes pash o Debleste, un phagas kol mare an kotja. Palle das lo len peskre malende, te denn le kowa i menshende. Un kol dui matche das lo ninna i tsele menshende.
Un jon chan lauter un wan tchalo.
Palle hadan le kol kotja pre, hoi atchan pral. Koi wan deesh-te-dui marengre gone pherdo lendar. Un jon hadan ninna kol matchendar pre, hoi pral atchan.
Un kolla, kai chan kol mare, kolla his pantch serja mursha.

Un sik pral kowa tradas o Jesus peskre malen, te djan le ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, te ulerenn le glan leste wergal ap i wawar rig pash o foro Betsaida. Job atchas pash i menshende, te bitchrell lo len khere.
Har job bitchras len pestar, djas lo ap i berga, te rakrell lo o Debleha.
Ap i rati his ko panjeskro ulepaskro mashkral ap o baro pani. Un job his ap o them kokres.

Un i sorelo ducho phurdas pral o baro pani, un das ap lende. Un job dikas, har jon pen tele maran ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, te wenn le pash o them. Sik taissarlake, his jaake starenge, was lo pash lende, un djas ap o baro pani, un kamas langs lende te djal.
Jon lauter dikan les, un i daar tapras len. Jon patsan, kai hi job i mulo, un dan gole i darjatar. Sik penas lo ap lende: "Ma darenn! Me hom. Lauter hi mishto!"
Un job was pash lende ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, un o sorelo ducho mukas tele. Un lenge atchas o rakepen krik.
Ninna te dikan le, hoi job kol pantch marentsa kras, haiwan le gar, hawi soor les hi. Lengro dji his har bar.
Un jon uleran wergal pral o pani un djan ap o them pash o foro Genezaret.
Un har jon dran o panjeskro ulepaskro stan, prindjran les i menshe sik,
un nashan an o tselo them trujal, un hidjan kol nasselen ap i tchibja kote, kai jon shunan, te hi lo.

Un kote, kai job djas, an i gaba, an i forja, un ap o them, tchiwan le i nasselen kote, kai i menshe khetne wenna, un mangan lestar, te mukell lo len i kotar leskro ripen an-taprell. Un hakeno, kai ap leskro ripen tapras, was sasto.
Jek diwes wan i Farisarja un biboldengre tchatchepangre dran o foro Jerusalem khetne pash o Jesuseste.
Un jon dikan, har mank leskre malende sawe hi, kai thowan gar pengre wasta glan o chapen.
Kol Farisarja, ninna i tsele wawar bibolde, thowenn pengre wasta glan o chapen. Un jaake rikrenn le kowa, hoi lengre phure lenge penan.

Te wenn jon dran o foro an lengro kheer pale, thowenn le pen, un palle nai chan le. Un jon rikrenn pen ap bud wawar koowa, un thowenn i khore, i pirja un i sasterne tchare jaake, har lengre phure lenge penan.
Koi putchan lestar kol Farisarja un kol biboldengre tchatchepangre: "Hoske djiwenn tire mala gar pal kowa, hoi mare phure menge penan? Hoske chan le o maro i tchikle wastentsa?"

Penas lo ap lende: "Tumer rakrenn dui tchipjentsa. O Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja, penas o tchatchepen pral tumende, har job tchinas: Jaake penell o Dewel: Kal menshe sharenn man pengre muja. Lengre djia hi dur krik mandar.
Jon te mangenn man an, hi kowa mange tchi moldo. Jon penenn i menshenge menshengre laba un gar miro lab.
Tumer krenn, hoi i menshe tumenge penan un gar, hoi o Dewel tumenge penas."
Un pale penas lo ap lende: "Tumer haiwenn mishto o Debleskre laba ap i rig te tchiwell, te nai krenn kowa, hoi tumare phure tumenge penan.
O Mose penas: Dik ap tiro dadeste un ap tiri date, te djal lenge mishto! Un ninna penas o Mose: Koon ap peskro dadeste un ap peskri date i bibacht anella, kowa hunte merella!
Tumer penenna: Te penell jek ap peskro dadeste un ap peskri date: Korban, kowa kharella: Me dau kowa o Debleste, hoi hunte doms tute,
palle hunte krell job buder tchi peskro dadeske un peskri dake.
Un jaake tchiwenn tumer o Debleskro lab ap i rig, un krenn kowa, hoi tumare phure tumenge penan. Un bud sau koowa krenn tumer."
Un o Jesus das pale i menshen pash peste gole, un penas ap lende: "Shunenn un haiwenn mishto, hoi me tumenge penau!
Tchi, hoi an o mensheskro mui dre wella, krell les pale-tchiddo. Kowa, hoi dran leskro dji win wella, kowa krell les pale-tchiddo.
Shunenn mishto, hoi me tumenge penau!"
Pale mukas lo kol menshen, un djas an o kheer. Kote putchan leskre mala lestar, hoi job kol labentsa kamas te penell.
Un job penas ap lende: "Haiwan tumer witar gar? Haiwan tumer gar, kai lauter, hoi an o mensheskro mui dre wella, kowa nashte krell les gar pale-tchiddo.
Ko chapen djal gar an leskro dji. Ko djal an leskro per, un well pale win." Un kol labentsa penas o Jesus lenge, kai kek chapen pale-tchiddo hi.
Un job penas: "O tchilatchepen, hoi dran o mensheste win wella, kowa krell les pale-tchiddo.
Dran o menshengro dji well o tchilatcho koowa, hoi an leskro shero trujal djal. Dran o dji well, te krell lo djungelo bi-pandlo koowa, te tchorell lo, te dell lo i wawares mulo.

Te chochell i mursh peskri romjat i wawar djuwjaha, un te chochell i djuwel peskro romes i wawar mursheha, well kowa dran lengre djia. Dran o dji well ninna i bok pal i lowe, o chochepen, wi-ladjedo koowa un dinlepen. Dran o dji well ninna, te dikell jek tchilatche jakentsa ap kowa, hoi o wawares hi, te hi lo midjak ap o wawareste, te rakrell lo djungeles pral o wawareste, te hadell lo pes pral o wawareste.
Ko tselo tchilatchepen well dran o mensheskro dji, un krell o menshes pale-tchiddo."
Un o Jesus stas pre un djas dureder, un was an ko them pash o foro Tirus. Kote djas lo an i kheer. Un job kamas, te djinell kek, kai job hi. Un ninna kote nai atchas lo gar khatedo.

I djuwel shunas lestar. Kaja his kek biboldetsa. Joi his dran o them Siro-Fenicia. Kolakri tchat his i beng an late. Un koi djuwel was pash leste, un witsras pes glan leste ap i phub, un mangas lestar, te tradell lo ko beng dran lakri tchate win.
O Jesus penas ap late: "Muk o maro i tchawenge! Jon te hi tchalo, nai chan i wawar. Kowa hi gar mishto, te lell jek o maro i tchawendar krik un witsrell les glan i djuklende."
Penas li ap leste: "Tiro hi tchatcho, miro rai. Ninna i djukle tel i chapaskri chan i tikne kotja, hoi mukenn i tchawe ap i phub te perell."
Penas lo ap late: "Hawo baro lab! Doleske penau tuke: Dja khere! Ko beng djas dran tiri tchate win."
Un joi djas an peskro kheer un hatsas lakri tchat ap o tchiben tchiddo, un ko beng his dran late win.
Un o Jesus djas win dran o them pash o foro Tirus, un djas an o them pash o foro Sidon, un dureder pash o baro pani an o them Galilea. Un job was mashkral an ko them, kai hi kol deesh forja tchiddo.
Un jon anan jekes pash leste, kowa nai shunas gar un rakras gar. Un jon mangan o Jesusestar, te tchiwell lo peskro wast ap leste.
Un job las kol murshes ap i rig, krik kol bud menshendar, un tchiwas peskre gushte an leskre kanna, un tchiwas tchunger ap leskro tchip.
Palle dikas lo pre ap o bolepen, las i baro ducho, un penas ap leste: Effata! Kowa kharella: Kre tut pre!
Un ap jek kopo kran pen leskre kanda pre. Un leskro tchip his buder gar pandlo, un job rakras nai mishto.
Un o Jesus penas kolenge, kai kote his, te penenn le kekeske, hoi job kras. Budeder te penas job, te penenn le tchi i menshenge, budeder rakran jon koi pral.

Un kolenge, kai kowa shunan, atchas o rakepen krik, un jon penan: "O Jesus kras lauter mishto. Kolen, kai nashte shunenn gar, krell lo, te shunenn le. Un kolen, kai rakrenn nashte gar, krell lo, te rakrenn le."
An kol diwessa his ninna pale bud menshe pash o Jesuseste. Har kolen buder tchi te chal his, das o Jesus peskre malen pash peste gole, un penas ap lende:
"Man khaitenn kal menshe. Triin diwessa hi le kate pash mande, un len hi tchi te chal.
Me te bitchrau len bokles khere, palle perenn le ap o drom khetne. Mank lende hi sawe, kolen hi i dur drom."
Leskre mala penan ap leste: "Kai hatsas mer maro kate an kau mulo them, te kras len tchalo?"
"Kitse mare hi tumen?" putchas lo. "Efta," penan le.

Job penas i menshenge, te beshenn pen le ap i phub. Un job las kol efta mare, parkras pes pash o Debleste, un phagas len an kotja. Un job das len peskre malende, te denn le len i menshende. Un jon kran kowa.
Un len his ninna tikne matche. Un o Jesus parkras pes pash o Debleste un das len peskre malende, te denn le kolen ninna i menshende te chal.
Un jon chan un wan tchalo. Koi his nai star serja menshe. Un pal o chapen hadan le kol kotja maro pre, hoi pral atchan. Kolla his efta marengre gone pherdo. Palle mukas lo len khere te djal,
djas peskre malentsa ap o panjeskro ulepaskro un was an ko them, kai Dalmanuta tchiddo hi.
Un i Farisarja wan win pash leste, te rakrenn le leha. Jon kaman te taprenn le les leskre labentsa un penan ap leste: "Kre menge i baro koowa, hoi sikrell men, te well tiri soor o Deblestar!"
Job las i baro ducho un penas: "Hoske kamenn kol menshe, kai djiwenna kau diwes, i baro Debleskro koowa te dikell? Me penau tumenge o tchatchepen: Jon dikenna kek sawo koowa."
Un job mukas len, djas pale ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, un uleras wergal.
Un o Jesuseskre mala bistran, te lenn le maro lentsa. Len his jek maro kokres ap o panjeskro ulepaskro.
Un o Jesus penas soreles ap lende: "Denn jak! O shutlo jarro hi gar mishto, hoi well i Farisarjendar un o Herodestar!"
Har jon kowa shunan, penan le penge: "Mer lam kek maro. Doleske penas lo kowa menge."
Un o Jesus haiwas kowa, un penas ap lende: "Hoske rakrenn tumer pral kowa, kai hi tumen kek maro? Dikenn un haiwenn tumer gomme gar? Hi tumen i dji har i bar an tumende?
Tumen hi jaka, un dikenn tchi. Un tumen hi kanna, un shunenn tchi. Djinenn tumer buder gar,
har me kol pantch mare phagom, un kol pantch serja menshende dom? Kitse marengre gone pherdo kotja, hoi pral atchan, hadan tumer pre?" Penan le: "Deesh-te-dui."
Penas lo: "Un har me phagom kol efta mare kol star serja menshenge? Kitse marengre gone pherdo kotja, hoi pral atchan, hadan tumer kote pre?" Penan le: "Efta."
Un job penas ap lende: "Haiwenn tumer gomme gar?"
O Jesus un peskre mala wan an o gab Betsaida. Koi anan le i murshes pash leste, kai dikas nai gar. Un jon mangan o Jesusestar, te tchiwell lo peskro wast ap leste.
Un job las koles, kai dikas nai gar, pash o wast, un anas les win glan o gab. Palle tchiwas lo tchunger ap leskre jaka, tchiwas peskre wasta ap leste, un putchas lestar: "Dikeh tu tchomone?"
Un job dikas pre un penas: "Me dikau i menshen, har te wenn le ruka, kai nashenn trujal."
Pale tchiwas o Jesus peskre wasta ap leskre jaka. Un kau kopo dikas ko mursh pre un his sasto. Job dikas lauter mishto.
Un o Jesus bitchras les khere un penas: "Ma dja dre an o gab!"
Un o Jesus djas peskre malentsa dureder un was an kol gaba pash o foro Cesarea Filipi. Ap o drom putchas lo peskre malendar: "Hoi penenn i menshe, koon me hom?"

Un jon penan ap leste: "Hi menshe koi, kai penenn, tu hal o Johanni, kowa, kai thowas i menshen an o pani. Wawar penenna, tu hal o Elija. Un pale wawar penenna, tu hal i Debleskro rakepaskro, kai glan i raha tsiro djiwas."
Koi putchas lo lendar: "Un tumer, hoi penenn tumer, koon me hom?" Koi penas o Petro ap leste: "Tu hal o Kristo, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job."
Un job das len trad, te penenn le kowa kekeske.

Un o Jesus penas peskre malenge: "O Menshengro Tchawo hunte lell bud duka ap peste. Un i biboldengre phureder un tchatchepangre un i bare rashaja tchiwenn les ap i rig. Un job hunte well maredo. Un pal triin diwessa stell lo pale i mulendar pre."
Un kowa lauter penas lo lenge, un rikras tchi pale. Koi las les o Petro ap i rig, un tchingras ap leste.
Un o Jesus risras pes trujal, dikas ap peskre malende, un das o Petres trad un penas: "Dja tuke, tu beng! Tu kameh gar, hoi o Dewel kamella, na-a, tu kameh, hoi i menshe kamenna."

Palle das o Jesus kol bud menshen pash peste gole, ninna peskre malen, un penas ap lende: Koon ap miro drom mantsa djala, kowa hunte bistrell, hoi leske kokres mishto hi, un lell peskro trushel ap peste, un djal mantsa.
Koon kamell peskro djipen te rikrell, kowa nashrell les. Koon ap miro drom mantsa djala un i menshenge miro lab penella, un well doleske mulo dino, kowa lell o djipen pale.
I mensheske wals kowa gar mishto, te lals lo o tselo brawlepen ap kai phub, un nashrals peskro djipen.
I mensho nai dell tchi o Debleste, te lell lo ko djipen pale.

I menshe an kau tsiro hi tchilatcho un mukan o Debles. Kowa, kai ladjell pes mange un mire labenge glan kolende, koleske ladjau me ninna, te wau me, o Menshengro Tchawo, pale ap i phub. Ap ko diwes hi man o railepen, hoi das man miro dad an o bolepen. Un mantsa wenna o Debleskre bolepangre.

Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Mashkral tumende hi sawe menshe, kai merenna gar, bis te dikan le, kai was kowa bari sorjaha, kones o Dewel win rodas, te well lo baro rai."
Un pal shob diwessa las o Jesus o Petres peha, ninna o Jakobes un o Johannes, un anas len ap i bari berga. Kek wawar djas lentsa. Un glan lengre jaka las lo i bolepaskro railepen.
Un leskre koola wan railes bijalo, jaake bijalo, har kek ap i phub nai thowell len bijalo.
Un ap jek kopo dikan le o Elijas un o Moses, kai rakran o Jesuseha.
Un o Petro penas ap o Jesuseste: "Rai, hi mishto, te ham kate. Muk men triin tikne khera te krell, jek tuke, jek o Moseske, un jek o Elijeske."
Job djinas gar, hoi rakrell lo koi. I bari traash tapran len.
Koi was i wolka pral lende tele. Un jon shunan i rakepen dran i wolka: "Kawa hi miro tchawo, koles kamaua o djijestar. Shunenn ap leste!"
Un ap jek kopo, har jon trul pende dikan, dikan le buder kekes har o Jesuses kokres.
Har jon pale i berga tele djan, penas o Jesus lenge soreles, te penenn le kekeske, hoi jon dikan, jaake raha har o Menshengro Tchawo gar i mulendar pre stas.
Un jon rikran ko lab pash pende un putchan mank pende jek o wawarestar: "Hoi hi kowa, te penell job, kai stell lo i mulendar pre?"
Un jon putchan lestar: "Hoske penenn mare tchatchepangre, kai glan ko tsiro hunte well o Elija?"

Koi penas lo ap lende: "Tchatchepaha, o Elija well un anell o Debleskre menshen pale khetne. Hoske hi tchindlo pral o Menshengro Tchaweste, kai hunte wenn bud duka ap leste un kai i menshe rikrenn tchi lestar?
Me penau tumenge: O Elija was, un jon kran leha, hoi jon kaman, jaake har lestar tchindlo hi."
Un jon wan pash pengre wawar malende, un dikan bud menshen trul lende, ninna biboldengre tchatchepangre, kai rakran lentsa.
Un har kol bud menshe o Jesuses dikan, kran le bare jaka. Jon nashan pash leste un penan: "Latcho diwes!"
Un o Jesus putchas lendar: "Hoi rakrenn tumer lentsa?"
Koi penas jek kolendar, kai kote tardo hi, ap leste: "Rai, me anom miro tchawes kate pash tute. Koles hi i beng an leste. Kowa krella, kai rakrell lo nashte gar.

Un te taprell lo les, witsrell lo les ap i phub. Un les hi tchunger glan o mui, un dandrell i danda khetne, un well har mulo. Un me rakrom tire malentsa, te tradenn le o benges lestar win, un jon haiwan les gar."
Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Hawe menshe han tumer, kai hi tumen kek patsepen! Har raha hunte atchap pash tumende? Har raha rikrap me pash tumende win? Anenn les kate pash mande!"
Un jon anan o tchawes pash leste. Har dikas o beng o Jesuses, tsardas lo o tchawes kai te koi. Un o tchawo peras ap i phub, risras pes trujal ap haki rig. Un i tchunger his glan leskro mui.
Koi putchas o Jesus o tchaweskro dadestar: "Har raha hi les kowa?" Kowa penas: "Jaake raha, har job djiwella.
Bud kope witsras lo les an i jag un an o pani, te marell lo les. Tu te haiweh tchomone, palle ab menge latches un kre les sasto!"
O Jesus penas ap leste: "Tu peneh: Te haiweh tu! Me penau tuke: Lauter djal koleske, kai patsella."
Koi das o tchaweskro dad gole: "Me patsau. Miro patsepen hi gar baro. Kre, te patsap budeder!"

Un o Jesus dikas, kai nashan bud menshe pash leste khetne. Koi das lo ko benges trad, un penas ap leste: "Tu beng, kai rakreh un shuneh nashte gar, me penau tuke: Dja wi lestar, un dja buder gar an leste dre!"
Koi das job gole, un tsardas les soreles kai te koi, un djas lestar win. Un ko tchawo his kote tchiddo, har te well lo mulo. Koi penan kol menshe, kai kote tardo hi: "Job meras."
O Jesus tapras les pash o wast, un mukas les pre te stell. Un job stas pre.
Har o Jesus khere was; un jon kokres his, putchan leskre mala lestar: "Hoske tradam mer ko benges nashte gar win?"
Un job penas: "Tumer hunte mangenn kowa o Deblestar. Te mangenn lestar gar, nai tradenn tumer sawe bengen gar wi dran i menshende."
Un jon djan dureder, un djan an o them Galilea. Un o Jesus kamas gar, te djinell jek, kai jon hi.
Un job penas peskre malenge: "O Menshengro Tchawo well an i menshengre wasta dino, un jon marenn les. Un ap o triinto diwes pal leskro merepen, stell job pale i mulendar pre."
Un jon haiwan kol laba gar un trashan, te putchenn le lestar.
Un jon wan an o foro Kapernaum. Har o Jesus khere his, putchas lo lendar: "Hoi tchingran tumer ap o drom?"
Un jon penan tchi. His jaake, ap o drom rakran le mank pende, koon lendar o pralstuno hi.
Koi beshas lo pes, un das kol deesh-te-dujen gole, un penas ap lende: "Jek te kamell o pralstuno te well, hunte well kowa o tikneder lauterender. Un job hunte budrell i wawarenge."
Un job las i tikno tchawes pash o wast, anas les glan lende, las les an i mussi, un penas ap lende:
"Kowa, kai lell sawo tchawes pash peste pre an miro lab, kowa lell man pash peste pre. Un koon man pre lella, kowa lell o koles pre, kai bitchras man."
Koi penas o Johanni ap leste: "Rai, mer dikam i murshes. Kowa tradas bengen wi an tiro lab. Job his kek mendar. Doleske penam leske: Ma kre kowa buder gar!"
Penas o Jesus ap lende: Mukenn les! Kowa, kai sawo baro koowa krella an miro lab, kowa nai rakrell gar sik koi pal djungeles pral mande.
Koon krell menge gar tchilatcho koowa, kowa hi ap mari rig.
Kowa hi o tchatchepen, hoi me tumenge penau: Koon dell tumen i tcharo pani te pijell, un krell kowa doleske, kai han mire mala, koles dell o Dewel ko latchepen pale, hoi job kras.
Kowa, kai anell jekes kal tiknendar, kai patsenn ap mande, miro dromestar tele, koleske wals feteder, te well leske i baro bar trul i meen pandlo, un te well lo witsedo an o baro pani.

Te kamell tiro wast, te kress o tchilatcho koowa, de les tele! Hi tuke feteder, te nashress tu jek wast, un djiweh hako tsiro pash o Debleste, har te djas tu dui wastentsa an o bengeskri jag, hoi hako tsireske chatchella.

Te kamell tut tiro piro ap i tchilatcho drom te anell, de les tele! Hi tuke feteder, te nashress tu jek piro, un djiweh hako tsiro pash o Debleste, har te wess dui pirentsa an o bengeskri jag witsedo.

Un te kamell tiro jak tchomone te dikell, hoi anell tut ap i tchilatcho drom, palle tchin les win! Hi tuke feteder, te nashress jek jak un djah pash o Debleste an o bolepen, har te wess dui jakentsa an o bengeskri jag witsedo,
kai i kerme gar merenna, un i jag gar wi djala.

Hakeno, kai djal mantsa, hunte djiwell peskro tselo djipen o Debleske. Kowa hi jaake har pash i bakro, hoi o Debleske maredo un chatchedo wella. Kowa well tseles chatchedo. Un ap ko chapen, hoi anenn le o Debleske, hunte tchiwan le loon pre. Kowa sikrell: Ko chapen hi o Debleske.
O loon hi mishto. Te nashras o loon peskri soor, hi lo buder gar mishto. Un tu nai kreh buder tchi, te well lo pale londo. Djiwenn tumaro tselo djipen o Debleske, un tchingrenn tumen gar!

Un o Jesus djas dureder un was an ko them Judea un an o them ap i wawar rig o panjestar Jordan. Un pale nashan bud menshe pash leste khetne. Un jaake har job bud kope kras, kras lo kote ninna, un penas lenge o Debleskro lab.
Un i Farisarja wan pash leste, un kaman les leskre labentsa te taprell. Un jon putchan lestar: "Nai mukell i mursh peskri romjat pal maro tchatchepen?"
Penas lo lenge: "Hoi penas o Mose tumenge?"
Penan le: "O Mose penas, te tchinell o rom i liil, kai tchindlo hi, kai job mukas lat. Un palle nai mukell lo lat."
O Jesus penas ap lende: "Tumaro dji hi har bar. Doleske tchinas o Mose, kai nai mukenn tumer tumari romjat.
Kowa his gar jaake, har o Dewel lauter kras. Ap ko tsiro kras lo o murshes un i djuwjat.
Doleske mukell o mursh peskro dades un peskri dat, te djiwell lo peskri romjaha khetne. Un kol dui wenna har jek.
Jaake hi le har jek un buder gar dui.
Un kowa, hoi o Dewel khetne anas, kowa hunte krell i mensho gar paash!"
Un khere putchan leskre mala lestar pale pral kowa.
Un job penas ap lende: "Koon peskri romjat mukella un romedinerell i wawar djuwjat, kowa chochell peskri romjat.
Un te mukell i djuwel peskro romes, un romedinerell i wawares, chochell li peskro romes."
Un jon anan tchawen pash leste, te tchiwell lo peskre wasta ap lende. Leskre mala tchingran ap kolende, kai anan len pash leste.
Har o Jesus dikas kowa, was lo chojedo, un penas ap lende: "Mukenn kol tchawen pash mande te well! Ma rikrenn len pale! Sawe har jon, kolen das o Dewel gole, te djiwenn le khetne leha an o bolepen.
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Koon gar ap mande patsella har kal tchawe, kowa nai well gar ap o Debleskro drom."
Un job las len an i mussi, tchiwas i wasta ap lende, un rakras o Debleskri bacht pral lende win.
Har djas o Jesus dureder ap o drom, nashas jek pash leste, peras glan leste tele ap i phub, un putchas lestar: "Latcho sikepaskro, hoi hunte krap, te dell man o Dewel o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella?"
Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Hoske peneh tu Latcho sikepaskro ap mande? Kek mensho hi latcho. O Dewel kokres hi latcho.

Tu djineh, kai o Dewel penas: De kekes mulo! Romeha, ma choche tiri romjat i wawar djuwjaha! Romnija, ma choche tiro romes i wawar mursheha! Ma tchore! Ma pen chochepen pral i wawarende! Ma rande tchi i wawarestar! Dik ap tiro dadeste un ap tiri date, te djal lenge mishto!"
Penas ko mursh ap o Jesuseste: "Me krom kowa lauter fun tiknes pre."
Un o Jesus dikas kamles ap leste un penas: "Jek hunte kress tu budeder. Bike lauter, hoi tut hi, un de kol lowe i tchorwelende! Palle hi tut i brawlepen an o bolepen. Un dja mantsa!"
Kol murshes his bud brawlepen. Har job kowa shunas, dukras les kowa. Un job djas dukedes peske.
Un o Jesus dikas trul peste un penas ap peskre malende: "Har pharo hi i brawelenge, te wenn le ap o Debleskro drom!"
Pral kal laba atchas o Jesuseskre malenge o rakepen krik. Koi penas o Jesus pale ap lende: "Mire tchawe, har pharo hi i menshenge, te wenn le ap o Debleskro drom!
Hi gar jaake pharo, te djal i baro ficho an i subjakro kand dre, har te well i brawelo ap o Debleskro drom."
Jon kran gomme bareder jaka un penan mank pende: "Te hi kowa jaake, koon nai lell o Debleskro djipen?"
Koi dikas o Jesus ap lende un penas: "Kowa, hoi nashte krenn i menshe gar, kowa nai krell o Dewel. O Dewel nai krell halauter."
Koi penas o Petro ap o Jesuseste: "Djineh, mer mukam lauter, un djam tuha."
Un o Jesus penas: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Hakeno, kai mukell mange un mire labenge peskro kheer, peskre phralen, peskre phenjen, peskri dat, peskro dades, peskre tchawen, peskro kotar phub,

kowa lell sheel kope jaake bud pale. Kanna, an kau tsiro lell lo khera un phralen un phenjen un daja un tchawen, un i kotar phub. Ninna well lo palla lino. An ko tsiro, hoi wella, lell lo o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
Un bud, kai kanna glan tardo hi, kolla hi ap ko diwes palla tardo. Un bud, kai kanna palla tardo hi, kolla hi ap ko diwes glan tardo."

Jon his ap o drom an o foro Jerusalem. Un o Jesus djas glan peskre malende. Kolla his dareno. Un kol wawar, kai djan lenge palla, trashan. Un job las pale kol deesh-te-dujen pash peste, un penas lenge, hoi leha djala:

"Shunenn, mer djah kanna an o foro Jerusalem. Kote denn le o Menshengro Tchawes an i wasta kol bare rashajendar un tchatchepangre murshendar. Kolla krenn wi, te well lo maredo. Un jon denn les an i wasta kolendar, kai kek bibolde hi.
Kolla praassenn les, tchungrenn ap leste, denn les i tchupnijaha, un marenn les. Pal triin diwessa stell lo pale i mulendar pre."
Koi djan o Jakobo un o Johanni, - lengro dad hi o Zebedeo, - pash o Jesuseste un penan ap leste: "Rai, mer kamah, te kress menge kowa, hoi mer tutar mangah."
Penas lo ap lende: "Hoi kamenn tumer, te krap tumenge?"
Koi penan le ap leste: "Ap ko diwes, kai tu hal o rai pral i tsele menshende, muk men te beshas ap tiri rig; jek ap tiri tchatchi rig un ko wawar ap tiri serwi rig."
Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Tumer djinenn gar, hoi tumer mangenna mandar. Nai lenn tumer kol duka ap tumende, hoi me hunte lap ap mande? Nai djan tumer jaake an o merepen, har me djau?"
Penan le: "Awa, kowa nai krah mer." Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Tumer hunte lenna bud duka ap tumende, jaake har me hunte lap len ap mande. Un tumer hunte djan an o merepen, jaake har me hunte djap.
Ninna te hi jaake, nai penap tumenge gar, koon beshell ap miri tchatchi rig un ap miri serwi rig. Kowa hi gar an miro wast. O Dewel rodas kolen wi, kai ap miri rig beshenna."
Un har kol deesh kowa shunan, wan le chojemen ap kol dujende, ap o Jakobeste un o Johanneste.
Koi das len o Jesus pash peste gole, un penas ap lende: "Tumer djinenna, i bare rajen hi penepaske pral i menshende an lengre themma. Un i pralstune rikrenn pengre menshen sorjaha tele.
Mank tumende hunte well kowa gar jaake! Koon tumendar kamell, te well lo baro, kowa hunte well tumaro budepaskro.
Un koon tumendar kamell o pralstuno te well, kowa hunte well hakeneskro budepaskro.

Ninna o Menshengro Tchawo was gar ap i phub, te budrenn i menshe leske. Na-a, job was ap i phub, te well lo lenge koi, un te merell lo lenge. Un jaake plaissrell lo peskro djipaha, te lell lo bud menshen dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win."

Un jon wan an o foro Jericho. Un har job peskre malentsa un bud wawar menshentsa dran o foro Jericho win djas, his i mangepaskro pash o drom beshdo. Kowa his korelo. Leskro lab his Bartimeo. Leskro dad his o Timeo.
Un har job shunas, kai kowa o Jesus dran o foro Nazaret hi, kai well kate, das lo gole: "Jesus, tu Davideskro tchawo, kre tiro dji mange pre!"
Un bud tchingran ap leste, un penan: "Atch! Muk!" Koi das job budeder gole: "Tu Davideskro tchawo, kre tiro dji mange pre!"
Un o Jesus atchas tardo un penas: "Denn les gole, te well lo kai!" Un jon dan les gole un penan ap leste: "Ma traash! Ste pre! Job dell tut gole!"
Un job witsras peskri plashka pestar, stas sik pre, un was pash o Jesuseste.
Un o Jesus penas ap leste: "Hoi kameh, te krap tuke?" Ko korelo penas ap leste: "Mo rai, te dikap nai pale."
Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Dja koi! Tiro patsepen kras tut sasto." Un ap jek kopo dikas job nai pale, un djas leha ap o drom.
Un jon wan pash i gaba Betfage un Betani, kai hi gar dur glan o foro. Kol gaba hi tchiddo pash koi djeteskri berga. Un kote penas o Jesus ap dujende peskre malendar:
"Djan an o gab koi wergal! Un har tumer dre wenna, hatsenn i tarni esla pandlo, ap kolate his gomme kek beshdo. Pandenn lat tele, un anenn lat pash mande!
Un te penell jek ap tumende: Hoske krenn tumer kowa? palle penenn ap leste: Hi maro rajeske, te beshell job ap late. Un job bitchrell lat sik pale pale."
Un jon djan kote un hatsan koi tarni esla win ap o drom pandlo ap i wudar. Un jon pandan lat tele.
His menshe kote tardo, kolla penan ap lende: "Hoi krenn tumer koi? Hoske pandenn tumer koi esla tele?"
Un jon penan kol laba ap lende, hoi o Jesus lenge penas. Un kol wawar mukan len koi esla te lell.
Koi anan le koi esla pash o Jesuseste, un tchiwan pengre koola ap late. Un o Jesus beshas pes pral pre.
Un bud menshe tchiwan pengre koola ap o drom. Wawar tchinan senele kashta i rukendar tele, un tchiwan len ap o drom.
Un kolla, kai djan glan leste un kolla, kai djan pal leste, dan gole: "Sharas o Debles! Sharedo well kowa, koles o Dewel bitchras.
Sharas o baro rajes, ko tchawes maro dadestar David, kai wella an peskri soor! Sharas o Debles an o bolepen!"
Un o Jesus djas dre an o foro Jerusalem, an o Debleskro baro kheer. Un kote dikas lo pes trujal. An i rati djas lo win an o gab Betani peskre deesh-te-dui malentsa.
Un o wawar diwes, har o Jesus dran o gab Betani djas, las lo bok.

Un job dikas dur glan peste i faigetikro ruk. Ap leste his patria. Un job djas kote, te hatsell lo faige ap ko ruk. Un har job kote was, hatsas lo tchi har i patria kokres. His gar ko tsiro, kai i faige baro wenna.
Un job penas ap ko ruk: " Kek chal tutar buder - an kek tsiro!" Un leskre mala shunan kowa.

Un jon wan an o foro Jerusalem. Un o Jesus djas an o Debleskro baro kheer. Un job tradas kolen win, kai kote bikran un ginan, un witsras i lowengre stamja kolendar trujal, kai i menshenge lowe paran. Ninna i stamja kolendar, kai parne tchirkle bikran, witsras lo trujal.
Un job mukas gar, te hidjell jek tchomone an o Debleskro baro kheer trujal.

Un job penas lenge, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi, un penas: O Dewel penella: Miro kheer te well i kheer, kai i tsele menshe ap i phub nai wenna, te sharenn le man, un te mangenn le man an. Tumer kran lestar i kheer, kai i menshe chochenna un randenna.
Un kowa shunan i bare rashaja un i biboldengre tchatchepangre. Un jon dikan, har kran i tsele menshe bare jaka pral leskro rakepen. Doleske daran le lestar un rodan, har te nai marenn le les.
Un ap i rati djas lo peskre malentsa win glan o foro.
Un har jon taissarlake pash ko faigetikro ruk wan, dikan le, kai ko tselo ruk tele meras.
Un o Petreske wan o Jesuseskre laba pale an shero, un job penas ap leste: "Sikepaskro, dik, ko ruk, hoi tu praassal, ko meras."
Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "Patsenn ap o Debleste!
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Te penell jek ap kai berga "hade tut, un witse tut an o baro pani", un patsell soreles an peskro dji, te djal kowa, hoi job penell, palle well kowa ninna.
Doleske penau tumenge: Lauter, hoi tumer o Deblestar mangenna, patsenn, te lan les, palle lenn tumer kowa ninna.
Un te han tumer tardo un mangenn tchomone o Deblestar, bistrenn ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi i wawar ap tumende kras, te bistrell tumaro dad an o bolepen ninna ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi tumer kran.
Tumer te bistrenn gar ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi i wawar ap tumende kras, palle bistrell tumaro dad an o bolepen witar gar ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi tumer kran."
Un jon wan pale an o foro Jerusalem. Un har job an o Debleskro baro kheer trujal djas, wan i bare rashaja, i biboldengre tchatchepangre un phureder pash leste,
un putchan lestar: "Koon penas tuke, te kress kowa lauter? Koon bitchras tut?"
Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Me kamau tumendar ninna tchomone te putchell. Tumer te penenn les mange, palle penau me tumenge ninna, koon man bitchras, te krap me kowa lauter.
Koon bitchras o Johanni, te thowas job i menshen an o pani? Bitchras o Dewel les? Bitchran i menshe les? Penenn les mange!"
Un jon rakran mank pende, un penan: "Mer te penah leske: O Dewel bitchras les, palle penell lo menge: Hoske patsan tumer les gar?
Witar gar nai penah mer: I menshe bitchran les." Jon trashan kol bud menshendar. Kolla patsan, te hi o Johanni tchatchepaha i Debleskro rakepaskro.
Un jon penan ap o Jesuseste: "Mer djinah les gar." Koi penas job ap lende: "Jaake penau tumenge witar gar, koon man bitchras, te krap me kowa."

Un o Jesus penas lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi. Un job penas: His i mursh, koles his i kotar them. Kote tchiwas lo drakengre ruka an i phub. Trul ko kotar them tchiwas lo barra. Un kote kras lo ninna i platsa an i phub, kai nai stakrenn le ap i drake, te well i mool win. Mashkral kol ruka kras lo i kheer, kai kowa beshdo hi, kai dell garda ap i drake. Palle patsas lo ko kotar phub ap i hachende, te budrenn le kote leske. Un job djas peske an i wawar them.
Har ko tsiro was, te anenn le i drake dre, bitchras lo peskro budepaskres pash i hachende, te lell lo lendar kol drake, hoi leske hi.
Un i hache dan les kek drake. Jon tapran les, dan les dawa un bitchran les krik.
Un ko mursh bitchras pale i wawar budepaskres pash lende. Un koles dan jon ap o shero, un praassan les.
Un job bitchras i wawares, koles maran jon. Un bud wawaren bitchras lo pash lende. Bud lendar dan jon, kol wawaren maran le.
Les his jek wawar, leskro tchawo, koles kamell job o djijestar. Koi penas ko mursh peske: Miro tchawestar darenn le. Un jaake bitchras lo pal kol tsele wawarende peskro tchawes pash lende.
Kol hache rakran mashkral pende: Kowa hi leskro tchawo, kai lauter lella pal peskro dadeskro merepen. Awenn, maras les, te well kau kotar them menge, hoi leske hunte wals!
Un jon tapran les, maran les, un witsran les win glan ko drakengro them.
Hoi krell kanna ko rai pral ko drakengro them? Job wella, un marell kol hachen, un dell ko drakengro them i wawaren.

Djinenn tumer gar, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi? Kote hi tardo: His i bar, kai i budepangre lestar penan: Kowa hi tchi moldo. Ko bar las o Dewel un tchiwas les jaake an o kheer, te rikrell lo ko tselo kheer khetne.
O Dewel kras kowa, un kowa hi i baro koowa menge.
Un jon haiwan, te rakras o Jesus lendar, un kaman les te taprell. Un har trashan le i menshendar, tapran le les gar, un djan krik.
I Farisarja kran pen khetne kolentsa, kai shunenn ap o Herodes, un bitchran murshen pash o Jesuseste, te taprenn le les an peskro rakepen.

Un jon wan pash leste, un penan: "Sikepaskro, mer djinah, tu peneh o tchatchepen, un rakreh kekeske pal o mui, ninna te hi les bud penepaske. Awa, tu sikreh mishto i menshende o Debleskro drom. Pen menge, hi mishto pal maro tchatchepen, te das mer o themeskre lowe o baro rajeste an o foro Rom? Plaissras len? Plaissras len gar?"
Job haiwas, te rakran le dui tchipjentsa, un penas ap lende: "Hoske kamenn tumer man mire labentsa te taprell? Anenn mange i rupeni bema, te dikap lat!"
Un jon anan jek. Koi penas job: "Koneskro shero un lab hi ap kai bema?" Penan le: "O shero un o lab o baro rajestar an o foro Rom."
Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "Jaake denn leste, hoi leskro hi, un denn o Debleste, hoi leskro hi!" Un jon kran bare jaka pral leste.
Palle wan i Saddukarja pash leste. Jon hi kolla, kai penenna: I mule wenna buder gar djido. Kolla putchan lestar:
"Sikepaskro, o Mose tchinas an peskre lila: Te merell i rom, kai romedino hi, un les hi kek tchawe, palle hunte romedinerell lat leskro phraal, te well leskro phraleske tchawen boldo.
Koi his efta phrala. Un o phureder las i romjat, un meras. Les his kek tchawe.
Un ko duito las lat un meras ninna. Un les his witar kek tchawe. Un ko triinteske djas kowa ninna jaake.
Un hake efta murshen his kek tchawe. Palle meras ninna koi romni.
Kanna putchah tutar: Ap ko tsiro, kai krell o Dewel i mulen djido, koneskri romni hi li? Hake efta his laha romedino."
Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Tumer prindjrenn gar o Debleskro lab, un o Debleskri soor witar gar. Doleske haiwan tumer tchi.
Kol mulen, kai o Dewel djido krella, romedinerenn buder gar un wenna gar romedino. Jon hi har i bolepangre an o bolepen.

Djinenn tumer gar, har an o Moseskro liil tardo hi, te wenn i mule pale djido. O Dewel penas ap o Moseste, har his job tardo pash o bur, hoi chatchas: Me hom o Abrahameskro Dewel un o Isaakeskro Dewel un o Jakobeskro Dewel.
Un me penau tumenge: Job hi gar o Dewel kolenge, kai mulo hi. Na-a, job hi o Dewel kol djidenge. Tumer haiwan tchi!"

Jek biboldengro tchatchepaskro his koi pashal un shunas, har kol Saddukarja leha rakran. Har job dikas, kai das o Jesus lenge i mishto lab pale, was lo pash leste un putchas lestar: "Kol tsele laba, kai penenna, hoi o Dewel mendar kamella, hawo lab hi o bareder lendar?"
Penas o Jesus leske: "O bareder lab hi kowa: Shun tu, Israel! Maro Dewel hi o rai, hi kek wawar.
Tu kamess tiro Debles o tselo djijestar an tiro tselo djipen, an lauter, hoi tu kreh un djineh.
O duito Debleskro lab hi kowa: Te wess jaake latches ap koleste, kai pash tute hi, har hal latches ap tute kokres. Kek wawar lab, hoi penell, hoi o Dewel mendar kamella, hi bareder har kolla dui."
Un ko biboldengro tchatchepaskro penas ap leste: "Sikepaskro, tu rakral tchatchepaha mishto. Hi jek Dewel kokres un kek wawar.

Te kamah mer les o tselo djijeha, an lauter hoi krah un djinah, un te ham jaake latcho ap koleste, kai pash mende hi, har ham latcho ap mende kokres, palle hi kowa feteder, har i tsele bakre un grumja, hoi mer marah un chatchrah o Debleske."
Har o Jesus dikas, kai job mishto rakras, penas lo ap leste: "Tu hal gar dur o Debleskro dromestar." Un jon trashan, te putchenn le lestar budeder.

Un har o Jesus an o Debleskro baro kheer i menshenge o Debleskro lab penas, putchas lo i menshendar: Hoske penenn kol biboldengre tchatchepangre, kai ko baro rai, koles o Dewel bitchrell, o Davideskro tchawo hi?
O David penas lestar, har o Debleskro Ducho ap leste was: O Dewel penas ap miro rajeste: Besh tut ap miri tchatchi rig, bis te tchiwau kolen tel tire pire, kai hi chojedo ap tute.
Koi penell o David mo rai ap leste. Har well lo nai leskro tchawo? Un i tsele menshe kaman, te shunenn le o Jesuseskro rakepen.

Un job rakras ap lende un penas: Denn jak ap tumende! Kowa, hoi kol biboldengre tchatchepangre krenna, hi gar mishto. Len hi lengste koola ap lende, te sikrenn le, te hi le o Debleskre menshe. Te djan le an o foro, kamenn le, te penenn i menshe "Latcho diwes, mo rai" ap lende.
An i biboldengre kangria kamenn le ap i pralstune beshepangre te beshenn. Un pash i baro chapen kamenn le ap i feteder beshepangre te beshenn.

Jon lenn i khera kol djuwjendar krik, kolengre romma meran. Jon rakrenn o Debleha i raha tsiro, te dikenn i menshe, har patslo jon hi. Ap ko diwes, kai rakrell o Dewel o tchatchepen pral lende win, lenn le i sorleder phagi har kol wawar.
An o Debleskro baro kheer his i lowengri piri tardo, kai i menshe lowe o Debleske dre tchiwan. Un o Jesus beshas pes pashal un dikas, har kol menshe lowe dre tchiwan. Un bud brawele tchiwan bud dre.
Koi was i tchorweli djuwel, kolakro rom meras. Joi tchiwas dui tikne kotja dre. Kowa his jaake bud har jek bema.
Koi das job peskre malen pash peste gole, un penas ap lende: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Koi romni das budeder o Debleske, har kol tsele wawar, kai tchiwan lowe dren.
Kol tsele wawar dan lowe dran pengro brawlepen. Kai tchorweli romni das halauter, hoi lat his, halauter, hoi lat his djipaske."
Har o Jesus dran o Debleskro baro kheer win djas, penas jek peskre malendar ap leste: "Sikepaskro, dik, sawe bare barra un sawe shukar khera!"
Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Kal bare khera, hoi tu dikeh, djan paash. Kek bar atchell ap o wawareste!"
Un job djas ap o djeteskri berga, hoi hi wergal o Debleskro baro kherestar, un beshas pes kote. Un har jon kokres his, putchan lestar o Petro, un o Jakobo, un o Johanni, un o Andreas:
"Pen menge, kaana well kowa? Har nai dikas mer, kai kowa lauter glan o wudar tardo hi, hoi wella?"
Un o Jesus penas ap lende: Denn jak! Ma mukenn tumen kekestar o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell!
Koi wenna bud mursha, kai penenna: Me hom o Kristo, ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job. Un bud menshe patsenn ap lengro chochepen.

An ko tsiro hi kurepen an kol themma, kai hi dur tumendar un ninna an kol themma, kai hi gar dur tumendar. Tumer te shunenn kowa, ma trashenn! Kowa hunte well jaake. Ko tsiro, kai i phub paash djala, well gar jaake sik.

I pralstune pral bare themma kurenn pen i wawar pralstunentsa. Un i menshe dran jek them marenn i menshen an i wawar them. Un kate un kote well i phub trisslemen. Bud menshen hi gar doha te chal. Kowa lauter wella jaake pral i phub, har i duka wenna pral i djuwjate, kai lell i tarnepen.

Denn jak ap tumende! Tumer wenn glan i tchatchepangre anlo, un chan dawa an i biboldengre kangria. Tumer patsenn ap mande. Doleske anenn le tumen glan i pralstunende un glan i bare rajende, te rakrenn jon i phagi wi pral tumende. Te han glan lende tardo, palle nai rakrenn tumer mandar, te shunenn jon pral mande o tchatchepen.
Glan ko tsiro, kai i phub paash djala, hunte well o latcho lab mandar penlo an i tsele themma.

Te taprenn le tumen, te anenn le tumen glan i tchatchepangre, ma darenn, hoi hunte penenna! Ap ko diwes, kai han glan lende tardo, sikrell o Dewel tumen, hoi te penenn lenge. Kowa rakrenna! Ma bistrenn, tumer han gar kolla, kai rakrenna. Kowa hi o Debleskro Ducho, kai dran tumende rakrella.

An kol diwessa phukrell o phraal ap peskro phraleste, te well job maredo. Un ninna o dad krell kowa peskro tchaweha. Un i tchawe hadenn pen pral pengre dadende un pral pengre dajende, un denn len an i wasta kolendar, kai marenn len.
Tumer patsenn ap mande. Doleske wenn i tsele menshe chojedo ap tumende. Kowa, kai atchell soreles tardo an o patsepen, jaake raha, har job djiwella, kowa lell o Debleskro djipen.

An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo pral ko djungelo pale-tchiddo koowa. Koon kawa drawerella, kamaus, te haiwell lo les ninna. Ap ko diwes, kai dikenn tumer ko djungelo pale-tchiddo koowa kote tardo, kai hunte well lo gar tardo, palle hunte nashenn kolla, kai hi an o them Judea, sik ap i berge!
Kowa, kai hi pral ap o kheer, hunte djal buder gar an peskro kheer dre, te lell lo peske tchomone.
Un kowa, kai budrella ap i kotar phub, kowa hunte djal buder gar khere, te lell lo peskri baja.
Koi bibacht hi bari kol djuwjenge, kai hi an wawar koowa, ninna kol djuwjenge, kai hi len i tarnepen.
Mangenn o Deblestar, te well kowa lauter gar an o wend.

Kowa, hoi an kol diwessa pral i menshende wella, hi djungleder har ko tselo tchilatcho koowa, hoi ap i menshende was jaake raha, har o Dewel i phub kras. Un ko tsiro, hoi well pal kowa, well witar gar jaake tchilatcho.
Te krals o Dewel ko tchilatcho tsiro gar tikneder, wals kek mensho dran o tchilatcho tsiro win. Kolen, kai o Dewel peske win rodas, kolenge kras lo o tchilatcho tsiro tikneder.
Te penell jek ap tumende: Dikenn, kate hi o Kristo! - palle patsenn les gar! Un te penell i wawar: Ake, kote hi lo! - palle patsenn les witar gar!

Chochene mursha wenna un penenna ap tumende: Me hom o Kristo. Un i chochene rakepangre penenna: Me wom o Deblestar bitchedo. Un jon krenna baro un sorelo koowa, hoi i mensho nashte krell gar dran peskri soor. Te djals kowa, anans le kolen o Debleskro dromestar tele, kolen o Dewel peske win rodas.
Denn jak ap tumende! Me penom tumenge kowa lauter, te djinenn les ap ko tsiro, kai kowa wella.
An kol diwessa pal ko tchilatcho tsiro, wella o kham kalo har i rat, un o mondo dikell kek buder.
Un i bare momlia ap o bolepen perenn tele. Un o bolepaskri soor perell khetne.
Palle dikenn le o Menshengro Tchawes, har well lo an i wolke bari sorjaha un railepen.
Palle bitchrell lo i bolepangren pral i tseli phub, te anenn le dran hako them kolen khetne, kai len o Dewel peske win rodas.
Me kamau te sikrap tumende tchomone. Dikenn ap o faigetikro ruk! Te wenn leskre kashta senelo, un i patria wenn dran lende win, palle djinenn tumer, te well sik o nijal.
Jaake hi kowa ninna koleha, pral kowa rakrom. Te dikenn tumer, har kowa lauter wella, palle djinenn tumer, kai job glan o wudar tardo hi.
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Kol menshe, kai an ko tsiro djiwenna, dikenna kowa lauter pengre jakentsa.
O bolepen un i phub atchenna gar. Mire laba atchenna hako tsiro.
Kek djinell ko diwes un ko tsiro, kai kowa lauter wella. I bolepangre an o bolepen djinenn les gar, witar gar o Debleskro tchawo. Miro dad an o bolepen kokres djinell les.
Denn jak! Rikrenn tumare jaka pre! Tumer djinenn gar, kaana hi ko tsiro kai.

Kowa hi jaake har pash i mursheste, kai djas ap o them. Job mukas peskro kheer un das peskre budepangren lauter an o wast, hakeneste das lo leskri budi. Un penas ap koleste, kai pash o wudar beshdo hi: De garda ap miro kheer! Ma sob!

Jaake penau tumenge: Rikrenn tumare jaka pre! Tumer djinenn gar ko tsiro, kai o rai pral o kheer pale wella. Job nai well ap i rati, nai well mashkral an i rati, nai well ap ko tsiro, kai dell o bashno gole, nai well taissarlake.
Jaake denn garda, te hatsell lo tumen gar ap o sopen, te well lo ap jek kopo.
Kowa, hoi me tumenge penaua, ko penau lauterenge: Denn jak un sowenn gar!

His dui diwessa glan kol bare diwessa, kai kharenna Passa un glan kol diwessa, kai chan i bibolde kek shutlo maro. Un kol bare rashaja un kol biboldengre tchatchepangre rodan i latcho tsiro, te taprenn le o Jesuses tchorchanes, te marenn le les.
Jon penan mashkral pende: "Mer taprah les gar ap o Passa, te wenn i menshe gar diwjo un chojedo ap mende."

Un o Jesus his an o gab Betani, an o Simoneskro kheer. Kowa hi ko Simon, kai his les i djungelo nasslepen ap peskro mass. Har o Jesus kote chas, was i djuwel pash leste. Kolat his i tushni an o wast. Koi his djudjo un kutch djet dre, kerdo dran ko kasht, hoi kharella Narde. Un joi phagas koi tushni pre, un tchoras ko djet ap leskro shero, te makell li les dre.
Mank kolende, kai koi pashal his, his sawe, kai choiran pen un penan mashkral pende: "Hoske tchoras li ko djet tchitcheske win?
Te bikrams ko djet, lams budeder har triin-sheel rupene beme. Un kol lowe nai dams mer i tchorwelende." Un jon tchingran ap late.
Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Mukenn lat! Hoske tchingrenn tumer ap late? Hoi joi mange kras, his mishto.
I tchorwele hi hako tsiro pash tumende. Un te kamenn tumer, nai krenn tumer lenge latcho koowa. Me hom gar hako tsiro pash tumende.
Koja kras, hoi nai kras li, un makas man kanna dre ko diweske, kai wau paskedo.
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Ap i tseli phub, kai penenn le o latcho lab mandar i menshenge, koi well ninna penlo, hoi koi djuwel mange kras. Joi wella gar bistedo."
O Judas Iskariot, jek kol deesh-te-dujendar, djas pash kol bare rashajende, te phukrell lo ap o Jesuseste.
Har jon kowa shunan, his le bachtelo, un penan: "Mer dah tut lowe!" Un job rodas i latcho tsiro, te dell lo les an lengre wasta.

His jek diwes glan kol diwessa, kai chan i bibolde o maro, kai kek shutlo jarro dren hi. Ap ko diwes marenn le i bakren, te chan le len ap ko baro diwes Passa. Koi penan o Jesuseskre mala ap leste: "Kai djas mer, te kras o chapen tuke?"
Un job bitchras dui peskre malendar un penas ap lende: "Djan an o foro. Koi dikenn tumer i murshes, ko hidjell i khoro pani. Djan leske palla!
An ko kheer, kai job dre djal, penenn o rajeske an ko kheer: Maro sikepaskro putchell tutar: Kai hi koi isema, kai nai chau me o bakro mire malentsa?
Un job sikrell tumende i bari isema pral an ko kheer. Kote hi beshepangre un lauter hoi men hunte well. Kote krenn menge o chapen!"
Un kol mala djan koi, un wan an ko foro un hatsan kowa jaake, har job lenge penas. Un jon kran o chapen.
Un ap i rati was job kol deesh-te-dujentsa.
Un har jon pash i chapaskri beshdo his un chan, penas o Jesus: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Jek tumendar, kai chal mantsa, kowa phukrella ap mande."
Ko dukas len. Un jon putchan lestar, jek pal o wawar: "Hom me kowa?"
Koi penas job ap lende: "Kowa hi jek kol deesh-te-dujendar, kai tchiwell peskro kotar maro mantsa an jek tcharo.
O Menshengro Tchawo hunte merella jaake, har hi lestar tchindlo an o Debleskro lab. Hawi bibacht well ap koleste, kai ap leste phukrella! Koleske wals feteder, te wals lo gar boldo."
Har jon chan, las o Jesus o maro, parkras pes pash o Debleste, phagas ko maro, das les peskre malende, un penas: "Lenn ko maro un chan les! Kau maro hi miro mass!"
Palle las lo o khoro, parkras pes pash o Debleste, das len o khoro, un jon pijan halauter lestar.
Un job penas ap lende: "Kai mool hi miro rat, hoi me ratau budenge. Jaake krau i drom, kai o Dewel un i menshe mala wenna.
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Me pijau buder gar i mool, bis te well ko diwes, kai hi o Dewel o rai pral halauter. Palle pijau newi mool pash leste an o bolepen."
Palle giwan le o Debleske i gili, un djan wi pash o djeteskri berga.
Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "Tumer halauter mukenn man. Hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: O Dewel penas: Me dau o bakrengro rajes. Un i bakre nashenn penge.
Pal kowa krell o Dewel man i mulendar djido. Un te djan tumer an o them Galilea, palle djau glan tumende."
O Petro penas ap leste: "Ninna te nashenn halauter tutar krik, me mukau tut gar."
Penell o Jesus ap leste: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tuke: Kai rati dell o bashno gar o duito kopo gole jaake raha, har tu gar triin kope penal, te prindjreh man gar."
Penell o Petro soreles: "Ninna te hunte meroms tuha, doms tut gar buchoste." Ninna kol tsele wawar penan kowa.
Un jon wan an i baar, koi kharas Getsemani. Un o Jesus penas ap peskre malende: "Beshenn tumen kate jaake raha, har rakrau o Debleha."
Un job las o Petres peha, ninna o Jakobes un o Johannes. Un i bari daar was ap leste, un job trissas.
Un job penas ap lende: "Miro dji rowella un dukell, har te merap. Atchenn kate un sowenn gar!"
Un job djas i kotar drom dureder, witsras pes ap i phub un mangas o Debles, te well ko pharo tsiro gar ap leste.
Un o Jesus mangas o Debles: "Tata, halauter nai kreh tu. Muk, te wenn kol duka gar ap mande! Ninna te mangau tut kowa, ma kre, hoi me kamaua! Kre jaake, har tu kameh!"
Un job djas pale pash peskre malende un dikas, har sowan le, un penas ap o Petreste: "Simon, soweh tu? Nai rikreh tu gar tire jaka i tikno tsiro pre?
Ma sowenn dre! Mangenn o Deblestar, te perenn gar miro dromestar tele! Tumen kokres hi kek soor, te atchenn pash mande, ninna te kamell kowa tumaro dji."
Un job djas pale koi, mangas o Debles un penas kol emlige laba.
Palle djas lo pale pash lende un dikas, te sowenn le. Jon rikran nai lengre jaka gar pre. Un jon djinan gar, hoi te penenn le ap leste.
Un job was o triinto kopo un penas ap lende: "Kamenn tumer dureder sowell un kate tchiddo atchell? Kanna hi doha! O tsiro hi kai, kai denn le o Menshengro Tchawes an i wasta i tchilatche menshendar.
Stenn pre! Djas menge! Dikenn, ko phukepaskro wella."

Un har job jaake rakras, was o Judas, ko jek kol deesh-te-dujendar. Pash leste his bud wawar mursha. Len his chare un kashta an i wasta. Kolen bitchran i bare rashaja, un i biboldengre tchatchepangre un phureder.
O Judas, ko phukepaskro, kras lentsa win: "Koles, kai tchumrau, kowa hi lo. Koles taprenn, anenn les krik un denn garda ap leste!"
Un o Judas was pash leste, un penas: "Mo rai!" un tchumras les.
Un kolla tapran les, un rikran les.
Un jek kolendar, kai koi pashal tardo hi, las peskro charo, un das jek klisteske o kand tele. Kowa his i klisto, kai budrell o baro rashajeske.
Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "Tumer wan i charentsa un i kashtentsa pash mande, har te woms i marepaskro.

Hako diwes homs pash tumende an o Debleskro baro kheer un sikrom i menshende o Debleskro drom. Un tumer tapran man gar. Kau koowa well jaake, te well tchatcho, hoi o Debleskre rakepangre glan i raha tsiro an pengre lila tchinan."
Har peskre mala kowa shunan, mukan le les lauter un nashan penge.
I tarno mursh djas o Jesuseske palla. Koles his kokres i laintikro kotar trul peste. Un jon tapran pal leste.
Koi mukas lo ko laintikro kotar an lengre wasta, un nashas nanges lendar.
Un jon anan o Jesuses pash o baro rashajeste. Un i tsele bare rashaja un i biboldengre phureder un tchatchepangre wan khetne.
Dur pal leste djas o Petro leske palla, un was glan o shukar kheer o baro rashajestar. Un job djas an o baro wudar dre un beshas pes pash i lurdende pash i jag un tatsras pes.
Un i bare rashaja un i tsele pralstune bibolde rodan tchomone, hoi anenn le nai ap o Jesuseste, te nai marenn le les. Un jon hatsan tchi.
Bud anan ap leste chochepen pre. Un har jek rakras jaake un o wawar jaake, rakran le gar dran jek mui.
Palle stan mursha pre un anan chochepen ap leste pre un penan:
"Mer shunam, har job penas: Me phagau kau Debleskro baro kheer tele, hoi i menshe pengre wastentsa kran. Un an triin diwessa krau i wawar Debleskro baro kheer, hoi kek menshe pengre wastentsa kran."
Ninna kowa, hoi kolla penan, rakran le gar dran jek mui.
Un o baro rashai stas pre, djas mashkral lende, un putchas o Jesusestar: "Peneh tu tchi ap kowa, hoi jon ap tute pre anan?"
