Un o Jesus penas tchi. Pale putchas o baro rashai lestar: "Hal tu ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job? Hal tu o tchawo o baro Deblestar?"
"Me hom kowa," penas o Jesus, "un ko diwes wella, kai dikenn tumer o Menshengro Tchawes, har hi lo beshdo ap i tchatchi rig o sorelo Deblestar, un har well lo an i wolke dran o bolepen."
Koi kras o baro rashai peskre koola paash, te sikrell lo peskri choli, un penas ap i wawar pralstunende: "Kek hunte penell menge budeder.
Tumer shunan: Job krell pes har o Dewel. Hoi kamenn tumer leha te krell?" Un jon penan halauter: "Job hunte well maredo!"
Koi wan mursha un tchungran leske an o mui, pandan leske tchomone trul leskre jaka, dan les un penan ap leste: "Pen menge, koon das tut?" Un i lurde dan les an o mui.
O Petro his glan o kheer beshdo. Koi was i budepaskretsa o baro rashajestar.
Un har dikas li o Petres, har tatsras pes lo pash i jag, dikas li ap leste, un penas: "Tu hals ninna o Jesuseha dran Nazaret khetne!"
Un o Petro penas: "Na-a, kowa hi gar tchatcho! Me djinau gar un haiwau gar, hoi tu peneh!" Un job djas win pash o baro wudar glan ko kheer. Un o bashno das gole.
Un koi budepaskretsa dikas les, un penas pale ap kolende, kai koi pashal tardo his: "Kawa hi jek kolendar!"
Un job penas pale: "Na-a, me hom kek lendar!" Pal i tikno tsiro penan kolla, kai kote tardo hi, pale ap o Petreste: "Tchatchepaha, tu hal ninna jek kolendar. Tu hal dran o them Galilea."
Koi tchingras lo, das pes sowel, un penas ap lende: "Me prindjrau ko murshes gar, kolestar rakrenna!"

Un sik koi pre das o bashno o duito kopo gole. Un o Petreske wan o Jesuseskre laba an o shero, hoi job leske penas: "O bashno dell gar o duito kopo gole jaake raha, har tu gar triin kope penal, te prindjreh man gar." Kowa djas an leskro dji, un job rowas.

Sik taissarlake wan i bare rashaja un i biboldengre phureder un tchatchepangre khetne i tsele pralstune biboldentsa. Un jon rakran khetne, hoi te krenn le o Jesuseha. Un jon pandan les, anan les pash o Pilateste un dan les an leskre wasta.
Un o Pilato putchas lestar: "Hal tu o baro rai pral i biboldende?" Penas job ap leste: "Awa, hi jaake, har tu penal."
Un kol bare rashaja anan bud doosh ap leste pre.
Un o Pilato putchas lestar pale: "Hoske peneh tu tchi? Shun, har bud doosh anenn le ap tute pre!"
O Jesus penas buder tchi, jaake te kras o Pilato bare jaka.
Ap ko tsiro his jaake, te mukas o Pilato hako bersh ap kol diwessa, kai kherenna Passa, jekes dran o stilepen win. Koles nai rodan i bibolde win.
Koi his jek, ko kharas Barabas. Kowa his stildo kolentsa, kai kran i baro tchingepen, kai wan i menshe diwjo. Koi pashal maran le jekes.
Un i bibolde djan pash o Pilateste, un mangan lestar, te krell lo jaake, har job ap hako Passa krella.
Un o Pilato putchas lendar: "Kamenn tumer, te mukap o rajes pral i biboldende wi?"
O Pilato djinas, te silwerenn i bare rashaja ap o Jesuseste. Un doleske dan le les an leskre wasta.
Koi kran kol bare rashaja i menshen diwjo, te penenn le o Pilateske: "Mer kamah feteder, te mukess o Barabes wi!"
O Pilato putchas pale lendar: "Hoi kamenn tumer, te krap me koleha, koles tumer kharenna Baro rai pral i biboldende?"
Un jon dan pale gole: "De les ap o trushel!"
Koi putchas o Pilato lendar: "Hawo tchilatcho koowa kras job?" Koi dan le sorleder gole: "De les ap o trushel!"

O Pilato kamas kowa te krell, hoi kol bud menshe lestar kaman un mukas o Barabes dran o stilepen wi. Un o Jesuses mukas lo i tchupnijaha dawa te dell, un das les an i lurdengre wasta, te denn le les ap o trushel.
Kol lurde anan les an o baro kheer o themeskro rajestar, un dan i tsele lurden khetne gole.
Un jon tchiwan leske i loli rajeskri plashka trujal, pandan subjengre kashta khetne, un tchiwan len ap leskro shero, jaake har i baro rai hidjell shereskro sonakai ap leskro shero.
Un jon penan ap leste: "Mer sharah tut, tu baro rai pral i biboldende!"
Un jon dan les i kashteha ap o shero, tchungran ap leste, un mukan pen glan leste ap i phub te perell, un kran jaake, har te mangans le i baro rajes an.
Un har jon san pral leste, riwan le leske koi loli plashka pale wi, un riwan leske leskre koola pale an. Un jon anan les wi, te denn le les ap o trushel.

Ap o drom tapran le i murshes i sorjaha, te hidjell lo o Jesuseskro trushel. Leskro lab hi Simon, un job his dran ko foro Kirene. Leskre tchawe hi o Alexandro un o Rufo. O Simon budras win ap i kotar phub un his ap o drom pale.
Un jon anan o Jesuses ap ko kotar them, hoi kharell an o biboldengro rakepen Golgata, ko kharella Muleskro Shero.
Un jon dan les mool te pijell. An koi mool his i drab dre, ko kharell Myrrhe. Un job pijas gar.
Un jon dan les ap o trushel. Un palle khelan le pral leskre koola, te dikenn le, hoi hakeno lella.
His taissarlake enjenge, kai dan le les ap o trushel.
Un pral leste ap i kasht his tchindlo, hoske job hunte meras. Koi pre his tchindlo: O baro rai pral i biboldende.
Khetne leha dan le dui marepangren ap o trushel. Ko jekeskro trushel his tchatches lestar, ko wawareskro trushel his serwes lestar.
Un kolla, kai kote pashal wan, sikran i gushteha ap leste, un praassan les, un penan: "Tu kamal o Debleskro baro kheer tele te phagell, un an triin diwessa pale pre te tchiwell.
Kanna, kre tuke, hoi i wawarenge kral, un ab o trushelestar tele!"
Ninna kol bare rashaja un kol biboldengre tchatchepangre san pral leste, un jon penan jek ap o wawareste: "Wawaren las job dran o merepen win. Pes kokres nai lell lo gar dran o merepen win.

Te hi lo ko baro rai, koles o Dewel bitchras, ko baro rai pral o Israel, palle nai djals job o trushelestar tele, te dikas mer kowa un te nai patsas ap leste." Un kolla dui, kai wan langs leste ap pengro trushel dino, praassan les ninna.
His deesh-te-dujenge, koi was o diwes kalo har i rati an o tselo them. Un kowa atchas jaake bis pash trinenge.
Un har trinenge his, das o Jesus bari gole un penas: Eloi, Eloi, lema sabachtani? Kowa kharella: Miro Dewel, miro Dewel, hoske mukal man tu?
Un kolendar, kai kote tardo his un kowa shunan, penan: "Shunenn, kawa dell ap o Elija gole."
Un jek nashas, las tchomone har i kotar thann, kras les pherdo shutli mool, tchiwas les ap i kasht, un das les o Jesuseste te pijell, un penas: "Muk les, dikas, te well o Elija, un lell les tele!"
Un o Jesus das bari gole, un meras.
Un ko wudar an o Debleskro baro kheer, hoi his kerdo dran kutch pesso thann, kowa djas paash an dui kotja fun pral bis tele.
Ko pralstuno lurdo, kai glan o Jesuseste tardo his, dikas, har o Jesus meras. Un job penas: "Tchatchepaha, kau mursh his o Debleskro tchawo!"
His ninna djuwja i kotar krik tardo, kai dikan kowa lauter. Mashkral lende his i Maria dran o gab Magdala, i Salome un i Maria, kolakre tchawe o tikno Jakobo un o Joses hi.
Kolla his leha, har job an o them Galilea his, un dan leske chapen un pipen. Un bud wawar djuwja his koi, kolla, kai leha khetne an o foro Jerusalem djan.
Har i rati was glan o Debleskro diwes,

was o Josef. Kowa his dran o foro Arimatia, un his jek kol pralstune biboldendar, kolen penepaske his. Un job dikas ninna ap o Debleste, te well ko tsiro, kai hakeno dikell, kai o Dewel o baro rai hi. O Josef las pes khetne, djas pash o Pilateste, un mangas lestar, te dell lo les o mulo Jesuses.
O Pilato kras bare jaka, har job shunas, kai o Jesus jaake sik meras. Job das ko pralstuno lurdes gole un putchas lestar, har raha job mulo hi.
Un har job kowa o pralstuno lurdestar shunas, penas lo o Josefeske, te nai lell lo o mulo Jesuses.
O Josef ginas i plachta, las o Jesuses o trushelestar tele, tchiwas les an koi plachta, un paskras les an i mulengro kheer, hoi his dre dino an i baro bar. Kote glan tchiwas lo i baro bar.
I Maria dran o gab Magdala un i Maria, koi dai o Josestar, dikan, kai o Jesus tchiddo was.
Har o Debleskro diwes trujal his, djan i Maria dran Magdala un i Maria, koi dai o Jakobestar, un i Salome un ginan djet, hoi sungella mishto, te makenn le les dre.
Sik taissarlake pal o Debleskro diwes djan jon pash o mulengro kheer, har o kham pre djas.
Un jon rakran mashkral pende: "Koon lell menge ko bar krik, hoi glan o mulengro kheer tardo hi?"
Kowa his i baro bar. Un har jon pash ko mulengro kheer wan, dikan le, kai ko bar krik lino was.
Un jon djan an o mulengro kheer dre. Kote dikan le i tarno murshes ap i tchatchi rig beshdo, koles his trul peste i lengsto bijalo ripen. Un jon trashan.
Job penas ap lende: "Ma trashenn! Tumer rodenn o Jesuses dran Nazaret, kai was ap o trushel dino. Job stas i mulendar pre. Job hi gar kate. Dikenn kote, kai job tchiddo his.
Kanna djan pash leskre malende! Penenn lenge un o Petreske, kai djal job glan tumende an o them Galilea! Kote dikenn tumer les, har job les tumenge penas."
Un jon djan dran ko mulengro kheer wi, un nashan penge. Jon trissan i trashatar un penan kekeske tchomone, jaake baro his lengri daar.

Har o Jesus i mulendar pre stas, sik taissarlake pal o Debleskro diwes, his i Maria dran Magdala koi ersti, kolatar mukas lo pes te dikell. Joi hi koja, kolatar job glan i tsiro efta bengen wi tradas.
Un joi djas pash kolende, kai djan o Jesuseha, un kolengro dji kanna dukas, un kai rowan pral leste. Un joi penas lenge, te dikas li les.
Un har jon shunan, kai job djiwella, un kai dikas li les, patsan le kowa gar.
Pal kowa mukas job pes dui wawar peskre malendar te dikell, kai his ap o drom glan o foro. Pash lende dikas lo wawartchandes win har jon les prindjran.
Un kolla dui djan pale, un penan les kol wawar malenge. Kolen patsan le witar gar.

Koi pre, har kol deesh-te-jek pash o chapen beshdo his, mukas lo pes lendar te dikell un tchingras ap lende, kai hi lengre djia har barra, un te patsan le gar kolenge, kai les dikan, har job i mulendar pre stas.
Un job penas ap lende: "Djan pash i tsele menshende ap i phub un sikrenn hakeneste miro drom!"
"Koon patsell ap mande un well an o pani thodo, te sikrell lo, kai job miro hi, ko djal gar nashedo. Koon gar ap mande patsella, ko djal nashedo!
Kolla, kai patsenn ap mande, krenn baro koowa an o Debleskri soor. An miro lab tradenn le bengen i menshendar wi, un rakrenn an wawar rakepen.
Jon te lenn sapa an pengre wasta, un te pijenn le i pipen, kai nai merenn le, palle wenn le gar nasselo. Ap i nasslende tchiwenn le i wasta pre. Un kolla wenn sasto."
Har o rai Jesus jaake lentsa rakras, was lo pral an o bolepen hadedo, un beshas pes ap o Debleskri tchatchi rig.

Un jon djan, te penenn le i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar an hake gaba un forja. Un o rai Jesus his pash lende peskri sorjaha, un kras baro koowa, kai nai krell kek mensho. Un jaake dikan i menshe, kai leskro lab tchatcho hi.
Latcho Theofilo, bud menshe tchinan an i liil, hoi o Dewel mashkral mende kras.
Jon tchinan pre, hoi kolla penan, kai kote pashal his un kowa lauter dikan.
Un me ninna putchom i menshendar har kowa lauter his, te djinap kowa lauter mishto. Doleske kamau tuke kowa jaake pre te tchinell, har kowa tchatchepaha his.
Jaake haiweh tu, kai lauter tchatcho hi, hoi penan le tuke.

Ap kau tsiro, kai o Herodes o baro rai pral o them Judea his, djiwas i rashai. Kowa his jek kol rashajendar, kai kharan pen pal o rashai Abia. Leskro lab his Zachari. Un leskri romni kharas Elisabet. Joi hi o Aroneskre menshendar
O Zachari un i Elisabet his latcho an o Debleskre jaka. Un jon shunan ap o Debleste, un kran lauter, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo his.
Len his kek tchawe. Joi nai las kek. Un jon dui his phuro.

His i tsiro, kai budran kol rashaja an o Debleskro baro kheer, kolendar o Zachari jek his. Un har pash lende jaake hi, rodan le les win, te djal lo an o Debleskro baro kheer, te chatchrell lo kasht o Debleske, hoi shukar sungella.
Un ap ko tsiro, har chatchras job ko kasht, hoi shukar sungella, his bud menshe win tardo, un mangan o Debles an.
Ap jek kopo his o Debleskro bolepaskro tardo ap i tchatchi rig pash o Debleskro sonakaskro bob, kai o Zachari o kasht chatchas.
Har o Zachari les dikas, las lo traash lestar.
Koi penas o bolepaskro ap leste: "Ma traash, Zachari! O Dewel shunas tut, har tu mangas lestar, te well tumen i tarnepen. Tiri romni Elisabet lella i mursh tchawes. Un koles dess tu ko lab Johanni.
Un tiro dji stella i bachtjatar. Un bud menshe wenna bachteles pral ko tarnepen.
Un job well bares glan o Debleskre jaka. Mool un wawar sorelo pipen pijell job gar. Un har job gomme gar boldo hi, hi lo pherdo Debleskro Ducho.
Un job anell bud menshen an Israel pash o Debleste.

Un job hi pherdo Debleskri soor jaake har o Elija, un job krell i drom pre o Debleske. Un job krella, te lenn i dada pale i dji pengre tchawenge. Un kolla, kai shunan gar ap o Debleste, kolen anell job pale ap o tchatcho drom. Un jaake krell lo, te hi i menshen djia, kai pre hi lengro Debleske."
O Zachari penas ap o bolepaskro: "Har nai djinau me, kai tiro tchatcho hi? Me hom i phuro mursh. Un miri romni hi ninna phuro."
O bolepaskro penas ap leste: "Me hom o Gabriel, un me hom glan o Debleste tardo. O Dewel bitchras man pash tute, te penap tuke kowa.
"Ap o tchatcho tsiro well kowa jaake, har tuke penom. Tu patsal mire laba gar, un doleske lell o Dewel tiro rakepen jaake raha krik, bis te well ko diwes, kai kowa lauter wella."
Un i menshe dikan ap o wudar an o Debleskro baro kheer, un djinan gar, hoske o Zachari jaake raha an o Debleskro baro kheer atchella.
Un har job kote win was, nai rakras lo buder gar. Job hadas peskro wast, te sikrell lo lende, te nai rakrell job buder gar. Koi pre dikan i menshe, kai o Dewel rakras leha an o Debleskro baro kheer.
Un har kol diwessa trujal djan, kai job an o Debleskro kheer budras, djas lo khere.
Un palle was leskri romni Elisabet an wawar koowa, un khatras pes pantch tchon glan i menshengre jaka. Un joi penas:
"O Dewel dikas latches ap mande un kras, te well man i tarnepen ap ko tsiro, har job kamas, un las miri ladj mandar krik."

Ap ko tsiro har i Elisabet o shobto tchon an wawar koowa his, bitchras o Dewel o bolepaskres, o Gabrieles, pash i tarni tchate. Lakro lab his Maria. Joi djiwas an o foro Nazaret. Kowa hi i foro an o them Galilea. Un kolakro pirno kharas Josef. O Josef his o Davideskre menshendar.
Un o Gabriel was pash late an o kheer un penas: "Latcho diwes, Maria! O Dewel hi tuha! Job dikas latches ap tute."
Joi tapras i daar, har job jaake rakras, un penas peske: "Hoi penell job koi?"
Un o bolepaskro penas ap late: "Ma traash, Maria! O Dewel hi tuke latcho.
Shun, tu weh an wawar koowa, un leh i tchawes. Koles dess tu o lab Jesus.
Kowa well i baro rai. Job well kharedo Debleskro tchawo. Un o Dewel krell lestar i baro rai pral Israel, jaake har jek leskre phurendar, o David, o baro rai his.
Un job atchell baro rai pral o Jakobeskre menshende hako tsiro. Un les hi penepaske pral lauter un hakeneste. Kowa atchell jaake hako tsireske."
Koi penas i Maria ap o bolepaskro: "Har djal kowa? Man hi kek mursh."
O bolepaskro penas ap late: "O Debleskro Ducho un leskri soor well pral tute. Doleske well o tarnepen o Deblestar un well Debleskro tchawo kharedo.
Shun, i Elisabet, kai tire menshendar hi, hi an wawar koowa an o shobto tchon. Joi hi phuri un latar well penlo, kai lell li nai kek tchawe.
O Dewel nai krell halauter."
Koi penas i Maria: "Me kamau o Debleske koi te well. Lauter te well jaake, har tu penal." Koi djas job peske.
Pal i tikno tsiro djas i Maria jaake sik har djala an i foro an o pralstuno them Judea.
Un joi djas an o Zachareskro kheer, un penas: "Latcho diwes, Elisabet!"
Har i Elisabet kowa shunas, stas o tarnepen an late. Un i Elisabet was pherdo Debleskro Ducho,
un das bares gole: "Sharedi weh tu mashkral i tsele djuwjende, un sharedo well o tarnepen an tute!
Har djal kowa, te well koi dai miro rajestar pash mande?
Har me tut shunom, stas o tarnepen i bachtjatar an mande.
Bachteli hal tu! Tu patsal, te well kowa jaake, hoi o Dewel tuke penas."
Un i Maria penas: "Me sharau mo Debles.
Un miro dji dell gole i bachtjatar pral mo Debleste. Job hi ap miri rig.
Me hom gar moldo, te dikas o Dewel jaake latches ap mande. Un kanna sharenn man i tsele menshe. Un lengre tchawe penenna mandar, kai o Dewel man bachteles kras.
Baro koowa kras job ap mande. Les hi i tseli soor, un leskro lab hi bareder har hako wawar lab.
Job kras peskro dji pre kol phurenge un kolengre tchawenge, lauterenge, kai shunenn ap leste, un darenn lestar.
Un job hadas peskri soreli mussi, un tradas kolen krik, kai kran pen kokres bares.
Job las i soor i bare rajendar krik, te well len buder tchi penepaske, un hadas i tiknen, te wenn le baro.
Kolen, kai bok his, das job te chal. Un kol brawelen bitchras lo krik. Un jon nai lan tchi peha.
Un job bistras gar peskro budepaskres, o Israel, un kras peskro dji leske pre,
jaake har penas lo mare phurenge, o Abrahameske un leskre tchawenge, te well lo lenge latcho hako tsireske."
I Maria atchas triin tchon pash i Elisabet. Un palle djas li khere.
Un ko tsiro was, kai las i Elisabet i tarnepen. Un kowa his i tchawo.
Lakre menshe un kolla, kai djiwan trul late, shunan kowa, un wan bachteles laha pral ko baro latchepen, hoi o Dewel kras ap late.
Pal ochta diwessa wan le, te tchinenn le o tarnepas ap o mass. Un jon kaman les ko lab Zachari te dell, jaake har leskro dad kharella.
Leskri dai penas: "Na-a! Job hunte lell ko lab Johanni."
Penan le ap late: "Kek tire menshendar kharell jaake."
Un jon sikran i wastentsa ap leskro dad, te penell kowa, har ko tarnepen hunte kharella.
Un job kamas, te anenn le leske tchomone, kai nai tchinas job pre. Un job tchinas: "Job kharell Johanni." Koi kran lauter bare jaka.
Ap jek kopo nai rakras o Zachari pale, un sharas o Debles.
Un i traash was ap lauterende, kai trul lende djiwan. Un i tsele menshe, hoi an o pralstuno them Judea djiwan, rakran pral kowa.
Un lauterenge djas kowa an o dji, kai kowa shunan. Un jon penan: "Hoi well dran kau tarnepen?" Un lauter patsan, kai o Debleskri soor ap o tchaweste tchiddo hi.
Un leskro dad Zachari was pherdo Debleskro Ducho, un penas kol laba, hoi o Dewel an leste tchiwas:
"Sharas o baro Debles! Job hi o Israeleskro Dewel! Job was pash mende, un las men dran mari bibacht win.
Job bitchras menge jek soreles, te lell job men dran o tchilatchepen win. Un kawa wella o Davideskre menshendar.
Glan i raha tsiro penan i Debleskre rakepangre,
te lell men o Dewel dran i wasta kolendar win, kai kamenn men te marell, awa, te lell lo men dran i wasta kolendar win, kai men gar kamenna.
Les his i baro dji mare phurenge un bistras gar kowa, hoi job lentsa an o phuro tsiro win kras un peskro wast pre das.
Glan maro dadeste, o Abrahameste, das job pes sowel,
te lell lo men dran i tchilatche wasta win, te budrah nai leske, un trashah buder gar,
jaake te djiwas mer leske i djudjo un latcho djijeha jaake raha, har djiwah.
Un tu miro tchawo, tu weh ninna i Debleskro rakepaskro. Un tu djah glan o Debleste, un kreh leske i drom pre, te well lo nai pash i menshende.
Leskre menshende sikreh tu, har nai well lengri doosh krik lino, jaake te djan le gar nashedo.
Maro Debles hi i baro dji menge. Leskro kamlepen well pash mende. Kowa hi har o kham, hoi djal pre ap o bolepen,
un well diklo kolendar, kai hi len traash o merepastar. Kai bari momeli anell men ap o drom, kai wella o Debleskri bacht ap mende."
O Johanni was baro, un haiwas hako diwes feteder, hoi o Dewel kamella. Un job djiwas an o mulo them jaake raha, bis te was ko diwes, kai job glan i menshende an Israel rakras.
Ap ko tsiro mukas o baro rai Augusto an o foro Rom te penell: "Tchinenn i laba i tsele menshendar an mire themma pre!"
Kowa his o ersto kopo, kai tchinan le i laba i tsele menshendar an i liil dre. Un kowa his ap ko tsiro, kai o Kwirinio o pralstuno his pral o them Siria.
Un halauter djan an pengre forja un gaba, kai lengre phure boldo wan, te mukenn le pengre laba pre te tchinell.

Un o Josef djas peskri pirnjaha, i Maria, dran o foro Nazaret, hoi an o them Galilea tchiddo hi. Un jon djan an o foro Betlehem an o them Judea, te mukenn le kote pengre laba pre te tchinell. An ko foro his o baro rai David glan i raha tsiro boldo. Un o Josef his o Davideskre menshendar. I Maria his ap ko tsiro an wawar koowa.
Har jon an kau foro wan, was i Mariake ko tsiro, te lell li o tchawes.
Un lat was i tchawo. Un joi tchiwas pherne trul leste, un tchiwas les kote dre, kai o chapen i fichenge dre tchiddo wella. An i kertchima his lenge kek tchiben.
Glan o foro Betlehem dan i bakrengre jak ap pengre bakre an koi rat.
Ap jek kopo his glan lende o Debleskro bolepaskro tardo. Un o Debleskro railepen his trul lende. Un i bari daar was ap lende.
Un o bolepaskro penas ap lende: "Ma darenn! I bari bacht well ap tumende, un ap i tsele menshende.
Kau diwes was tumenge an o foro Betlehem kowa boldo, kai lell tumen dran o tchilatchepen win. Job hi ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job.
Un ap kowa dikenn tumer, koon o tarnepen hi: Job hi pandlo an i pherne, un kote dre tchiddo, kai o chapen i fichenge dre tchiddo wella."
Ap jek kopo his pash ko bolepaskro bud wawar bolepangre. Un jon sharan o Debles, un penan:
"Baro hi o Debleskro railepen an o bolepen! O Debleskri bacht well ap i phub. Job dikell latches ap i menshende."
Un palle djan i tsele Debleskre bolepangre pale an o bolepen. Un i bakrengre penan jek ap o wawareste: "Awenn, djas an o foro Betlehem, te dikas, hoi o Dewel menge penas!"
Un i bakrengre nashan sik an o foro, un hatsan i Mariat un o Josefes. Un o tarnepen his koi dre tchiddo, kai o chapen i fichenge dre tchiddo wella.
Har jon kowa dikan, penan le lauterenge ko lab, hoi lenge o bolepaskro pral kau tarnepen penas.
Un lauter kran bare jaka, har jon shunan, hoi i bakrengre lenge penan.
I Maria rikras kol tsele laba an peskro dji un mukas len an lakro shero trujal te djal.
Un i bakrengre djan pale pash pengre bakre. Un jon sharan o Debles o tselo djijestar pral kowa, hoi jon shunan un dikan. Lauter kowa his jaake, har o bolepaskro lenge penas.
Har ochta diwessa trujal his, un o tarnepen ap o mass tchindlo was, dan le les o lab Jesus. Kau lab penas o bolepaskro i Mariake, har joi gomme gar an wawar koowa his.

Star-deesh diwessa his i Maria pale-tchiddo, jaake har o Mose kowa an peskro liil tchinas. Pal kowa anan o Josef un i Maria kol tarnepas an o Debleskro baro kheer an o foro Jerusalem, te denn le les an o Debleskro wast.
An o Moseskre lila hi ninna tchindlo: O phureder tchawo, kai boldo wella, hi o Debleske.
Un o Josef un i Maria anan dui parne tchirkle glan o Debleste, jaake har kowa an i Moseskre lila tchindlo hi, te well i djuwel pale erligo.

Ap ko tsiro djiwas an o foro Jerusalem i mursh. Leskro lab his Simeon. Kowa patsas ap o Debleste, un djiwas jaake, har o Dewel kowa kamas. Un job dikas ap ko tsiro, kai lell o Dewel i bibacht i Israeleskre menshendar krik. O Simeon his pherdo Debleskro Ducho.
Un o Debleskro Ducho penas leske, te merell job gar, bis te dikas lo ko baro rajes, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job.

Un ap ko diwes, kai anan o Josef un i Maria pengro tchawes, o Jesuses, an o Debleskro baro kheer, te denn le les an o Debleskro wast, har kowa pal o biboldengro tchatchepen jaake his, koi anas o Debleskro Ducho o Simeones ninna an o Debleskro baro kheer.
Un o Simeon las o tchawes ap i mussi, sharas o Debles, un penas:
"Miro Dewel, miro rai, kanna nai merau me an o latchepen, jaake har tu penal.
Me dikom koles, kai tu bitchral, te lell lo i menshen dran o tchilatchepen win.
Un tu bitchral les i tsele menshenge ap i phub.
Job hi har i momeli, te sikrell lo kolen tiro drom, kai prindjrenn tut gar. Koleske sharenn jon i menshen an Israel."
Un o Jesuseskro dad un leskri dai kran bare jaka pral kowa, hoi o Simeon pral pengro tchaweste Jesus penas.

Un o Simeon rakras o Debleskri bacht pral lende win un penas ap i Mariate: "Pral kau tchaweste choirenn pen bud menshe an o them Israel. Ap leste sikrell pes, koon djal ap o Debleskro drom, un koon perell o Debleskro dromestar tele.
Jaake well diklo, hoi bud menshenge an o shero trujal djala. Un tire duka, Maria, pral tiro tchaweste wenn jaake, har te dell jek i charo an tiro dji."
An o foro Jerusalem djiwas i phuri Debleskri rakepaskretsa. Joi kharas Hanna. Lakro dad his o Penuel. Job hi kol menshendar, kai wenna pal o Asser. Efta bersha his i Hanna romedino.

Palle meras lakro rom. Un kanna his li ochta-deesh-te-star bersha phuro. Un joi his o tselo diwes un i tseli rati an o Debleskro baro kheer, te mangell li o Debles an. Un bud kope chas un pijas li tchi o Debleske.

Ap ko tsiro har i Maria un o Josef pengro tchaweha an o Debleskro baro kheer his, was li ninna kote pash lende. Un joi sharas o Debles o tselo djijeha pral ko tchaweste, un rakras kolestar ap lauterende, kai dikan ap ko tsiro, kai lell o Dewel i menshen an o foro Jerusalem dran o tchilatchepen win.
Un har i Maria un o Josef lauter jaake kran, har an o Debleskro lab tchindlo his, djan le pale an pengro foro Nazaret, hoi an o them Galilea hi.
Ko tarnepen was baro un sorelo, un pherdo goswepen. Un hakeno dikas, kai o Dewel pash leste hi.
Hako bersh, har wan kol bare diwessa, kai kharenna Passa, djan i Maria un o Josef an o foro Jerusalem. Un har o Jesus deesh-te-dui bersha phuro his, lan jon les peha.
Har kol bare diwessa trujal his, un jon pale khere djan, atchas ko tchawo Jesus an o foro Jerusalem. Un leskro dad un lakri dai djinan kowa gar.
Jon patsan, kai job mashkral kol wawar menshende hi. Doleske rodan jon les jek diwes mashkral pengre menshende, un mashkral kol wawarende, kai his lentsa khetne ap o drom.
Un jon hatsan les gar. Koi djan jon pale an o foro Jerusalem, un rodan les kote.
Pal triin diwessa hatsan le les an o Debleskro baro kheer. Un job his beshdo mashkral i sikepangre. Un job shunas, hoi jon rakran, un job putchas bud lendar.
Lauter, hoi shunan, hoi job lenge penas, kran bare jaka, jaake gosewo his kau tchawo.

Un har leskro dad un leskri dai les kote dikan, atchas lenge o rakepen krik. Un leskri dai penas ap leste: "Tchawa, hoske kreh tu mentsa sawo koowa? Me un tiro dad, har rodam tut, hams i darjatar mulo."
Koi penas lo ap lende: "Hoske rodan tumer man? Djinenn tumer gar, te krap me kowa, hoi miro dad mandar kamella?"
Jon haiwan gar, hoi job lenge kamas te penell.
Palle djas lo lentsa pale an o foro Nazaret, un kras lauter, hoi jon penan leske. Leskri dai rikras kol tsele laba, hoi o Jesus penas, an peskro dji.
Job was gosweder un phureder. Un o Dewel un i menshe dikan latches ap leste.

His ap ko tsiro, kai o Tiberio an o foro Rom deesh-te-pantch bersha baro rai his. Un o Pontio Pilato his o rai pral o them Judea. Un o Herodes his o rai pral o them Galilea. Un peskro phraal Filipo his o rai pral i themma Iturea un Trakonitia. Un o Lisanio his o rai pral o them Abilene.
Un o Hannas un o Kajafas his bare rashaja. Ap ko tsiro rakras o Dewel an o mulo them ap o Johanneste. Koleskro dad his o Zachari.

Un o Johanni djas an o them pash o pani Jordan trujal, un penas i menshenge: "Mukenn tumaro tchilatcho drom! Un djan ap o Debleskro drom! Mukenn tumen mandar an o pani te thowell, te sikrenn tumer, kai mukan tumaro phuro djipen! Un o Dewel lell tumari doosh tumendar krik."
Jaake tchinas o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja: Jek dell gole an o mulo them: Krenn maro Debleske o drom, te nai well lo pash i menshende! Lenn halauter krik, hoi o Debleske an o drom tchiddo hi!
Krenn, te well haki berga tikneder! Un hadenn ko them, hoi mank i berge tchiddo hi! O bango drom te well buder gar bango! Un o djungelo drom te well mishto kerdo.
Palle dikell hakeno, har o Dewel i menshen dran o tchilatchepen win lella.
Bud menshe djan pash o Johanneste, te mukan le pen lestar an o pani te thowell. Job penas lenge: "Tumer han sapa! Tumer nai nashenn gar glan o Debleskri choli krik, hoi wella pral i menshende.

Sikrenn i menshende, te djan tumer ap o Debleskro drom, un buder gar ap o tchilatcho drom! Ma penenn, kai o Abraham tumaro dad hi! Kowa anell tumen gar dureder. Me penau tumenge: O Dewel nai krell dran kal barra o Abrahameskre tchawen.
Tumer han har ruka, kai o tower pashal tchiddo hi, te wenn le tele dino. Hako ruk, kai well kek latcho koowa baro pre, well tele dino, un an i jag witsedo."
Un i menshe putchan o Johannestar: "Hoi te kras mer?"
"Te hi jekes dui gada," penas lo, "mu dell lo jek gad koleste, kones kek hi. Un kones chapen hi, kowa dell koleste i paash, kones tchi hi."
Koi wan ninna bibolde pash leste, te mukenn pen le lestar an o pani te thowell. Kolla his mursha, kai lenn kol themeskre lowe i Remarjenge dre. Jon putchan lestar: "Sikepaskro, hoi te kras mer?"
Penas o Johanni ap lende: "Ma lenn gar budeder lowe dre, har win kerdo hi!"

Ninna i lurde putchan lestar: "Har hi mentsa? Hoi te kras mer?" Lenge penas lo: "Ma krenn kekeske tchilatcho koowa, un lenn kekestar lowe i sorjaha! Kol lowe, hoi plaissrenn i pralstune tumenge, kol lowe mukenn tumenge doha te well!"
I menshe dikan, kai o Dewel o Johannes bitchras, un jon putchan pendar: "Hi job ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel glan i raha tsiro penas, te well job?"

Koi penas o Johanni ap lauterende: "Me thowau tumen an o pani. Jek wella, kowa hi sorleder har me. Me hom gar moldo, te krap leskre tircha pre. Job tchiwell o Debleskro Ducho ap tumende, un krell tumen djudjo, har i jag o saster djudjo krella.

Job hi har i hacho, kai rikrell i witsepaskri an peskro wast, te witsrell lo o djob pral, jaake te perell o phuss tele ap i phub. Peskro djob anell lo an peskro djobeskro kheer dre. Un i phuss chatchrell lo an i jag, hoi chatchella hako tsiro."
Kol labentsa, ninna bud wawar labentsa rakras o Johanni i menshenge an o dji, un sikras lende o Debleskro drom.
Un o Herodes, ko baro rai pral o them Galilea, las peskro phraleskri romjat, i Herodia, un kras wawar tchilatcho koowa. Un o Johanni penas leske: "Kowa hi tchilatcho, hoi tu kral."
Har o Herodes kowa shunas, tchiwas lo o Johannes an o stilepen, un anas jaake wawar doosh ap peste.
Ap ko tsiro, kai thowas o Johanni i menshen an o pani, was ninna o Jesus pash leste, un mukas pes lestar an o pani te thowell. Un har o Jesus o Debles an-mangas, djas o bolepen pre.
Un o Debleskro Ducho was har i parno tchirklo ap leste tele. Un i rakepen dran o bolepen penas: "Tu hal miro tchawo, kai me kamaua. Pral tute hom bachtelo."
O Jesus nai his jaake triin-deesh bersha phuro, har job i menshenge o Debleskro lab penas. I menshe patsan, kai o Josef leskro dad hi. O Josefeskro dad his o Eli.
Koleskre phure his jek pal o wawar: o Matat, o Levi, o Melki, o Jannai, o Josef,
o Matatias, o Amos, o Nahum, o Hesli, o Naggai,
o Mahat, o Matatias, o Simi, o Josech, o Joda,
o Johanan, o Resa, o Serubabel, o Shealtiel, o Neri,
o Melki, o Addi, o Kosam, o Elmadam, o Er,
o Josua, o Elieser, o Jorim, o Matat, o Levi,
o Simeon, o Juda, o Josef, o Jonam, o Eljakim,
o Melea, o Menna, o Mattata, o Natan, o David,
o Isai, o Obed, o Boas, o Salmon, o Nason,
o Aminadab, o Admin, o Arni, o Esrom, o Perez, o Juda,
o Jakob, o Isaak, o Abraham, o Terach, o Nahor,
o Serug, o Regu, o Peleg, o Eber, o Shelach,
o Kainan, o Arpachsad, o Sem, o Noa, o Lamech,
o Metuselah, o Henoch, o Jered, o Mahalalel, o Kenan,
o Enosh, o Set, o Adam. Kowa was o Deblestar.
Un o Jesus his pherdo Debleskro Ducho. Un job mukas o them pash o pani Jordan. Un o Debleskro Ducho anas les an o mulo them.
Kote atchas lo star-deesh diwessa. Un o beng was pash leste, te anell lo les o Debleskro dromestar tele. An kol diwessa chas o Jesus tchi. Un har kol diwessa trujal his, his les bok.
Un o beng penas ap leste: "Te hal tu o Debleskro tchawo, pen ap ko bar, te well lestar i kotar maro!"
Koi penas o Jesus: "An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: O maro kokres rikrell i menshes gar djido."
Palle anas les o beng ap i berga, un sikras leste ap jek kopo i tsele themma ap i phub.
Un o beng penas leske: "Kol tsele themma un lengro brawlepen kamau me tute te dell. Kawa lauter hi miro, un me dau kowa koneste me kamau.
Tu te mangeh man an, palle dau me lauter tute."
Koi penas o Jesus: "An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Tu mangess o Debles an, - job hi tiro rai, - un wess leske kokres koi!"
Pal kowa anas les o beng an o foro Jerusalem, un tchiwas les ap o Debleskro baro kheer pral pre, un penas ap leste: "Te hal tu o Debleskro tchawo, muk tut tele te perell!
An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: O Dewel penas ap pengre bolepangre, te denn le jak ap tute.
Un jon hidjenn tut pengre wastentsa, te dukress tire pire gar ap i barra!"
Koi penas o Jesus ap o bengeste: "O Debleskro lab penella: Rike o Debles gar dineleske, te sikrell lo tut, har sorelo job hi!"
Har o beng dikas, kai o Jesus gar kras, hoi job kamas, mukas job lestar i tsiro tele.
Un o Jesus djas pale an o them Galilea. Un o Debleskri soor his an leste. Un an i tsele gaba un forja, kai kote his, shunan le lestar.
Un job djas an i biboldengre kangria un sikras i menshende o Debleskro drom. Un hakeno sharas les.
Un job was an o foro Nazaret, kai job baro was. Ap o Debleskro diwes djas lo an i biboldengri kangri, har job kowa hako Debleskro diwes kras. Un job stas pre, te drawerell lo an o Debleskro lab.
Koi dan le les ko liil, hoi o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja, tchinas. Un job kras kau liil pre, un kote hatsas lo kol laba:

O Debleskro Ducho hi ap mande. Job rodas man win, te penap i tchorwelenge o Debleskro latcho lab. Un job bitchras man, te penap kolenge, hoi stilde hi, te wenn le dran lengro stilepen win, un kolenge, kai korelo hi, te dikenn le pale, un kolenge, kai pale-tchiddo hi, te wenn le pale erligo,
un te penap i menshenge: Kawa hi ko bersh, kai o Dewel i menshen bachteles krella.
Un o Jesus kras kau liil pandlo, un das les pale, un beshas pes. Un i tsele menshe an i biboldengri kangri dikan ap leste.
Un job penas ap lende: "Kau diwes nai dikenn tumer, te hi kau lab o tchatchepen."
Lauter rakran lestar mishto, un leskro rakepen his lenge pherdo latchepen. Un jon kran bare jaka. Un jon penan: "Hi kawa gar o Josefeskro tchawo?"
O Jesus penas: "Tchatchepaha, tumer penenna: Dramaskro, kre tut kokres sasto! Tu kral sau baro koowa an o foro Kapernaum. Kre kowa kate ninna!
Kawa penau me tumenge: Kek Debleskro rakepaskro well kote sharedo, kai job khere hi.

Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Ap ko tsiro, kai o Debleskro rakepaskro Elija djiwas, djiwan bud djuwja, kolengre mursha mulo hi, an o them Israel. Ap ko tsiro das triin-te-paash bersha kek brishin. Un i bari bok was an o tselo them.
Pash kol djuwjende was o Elija gar bitchedo. Job was bitchedo pash jek djuwjate an o foro Sarepta, an o them Sidon, kolakro rom mulo hi.

Dikenn ninna ap ko tsiro, kai o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Elisa, djiwas. An ko tsiro his bud menshen an o them Israel i djungelo nasslepen ap pengro mass. Kekes lendar kras o Elisa sasto. Kokres o Naaman dran o them Siria kras job sasto."
Un lauter kolla, kai an i biboldengri kangri his, wan chojedo ap o Jesuseste, har jon kowa lestar shunan.
Jon stan pre, un tradan les dran o foro win, anan les pral ap i berga, kai lengro foro pre tardo hi, te witsrenn le les tele.
Job risras pes trujal un djas mashkral lende pale, un djas peske.
Un job djas an o foro Kapernaum an o them Galilea. Un hako Debleskro diwes penas lo kote i menshenge o Debleskro lab.
Un job rakras jaake bari sorjaha, te kran le bare jaka pral kowa, hoi job lenge penas.
Koi his i mursh an i biboldengri kangri, kai his i beng an leste. Un kowa das bari gole:
"Ah! Hoi kameh tu mendar, Jesus dran Nazaret? Wal tu, te maress men? Me djinau, koon tu hal: Tu hal o Debleskro mursh, koles o Dewel bitchras."

Un o Jesus das les trad, un penas soreles ap leste: "Ma rake un dja dran leste win!" Un ko beng, kai an ko mursheste hi, witsras ko murshes mashkral i menshende ap i phub, djas dran leste win, un dukras les gar.
Un halauter kran bare jaka. Un jon rakran jek o wawareha, un penan: "Hawe sorele laba! Job rakrell sorele labentsa ap i bengende, un jon djan dran i menshende win."
Un an hake gaba un forja, kai kote his, shunan le lestar.
Un har job dran i biboldengri kangri was, djas lo an o Simoneskro kheer. Un i dai o Simoneskri romjatar his ap o tchiben tchiddi, un lakro shero his tato. Un jon mangan lestar, te krell lo la sasto.
Un job djas pash late, un penas ap ko nasslepen: "Dja tuke!" Un ko nasslepen djas latar. Un joi stas sik pre, un anas lenge i chapen.
Un o kham djas tele. Un bud menshe anan i nasselen pash leste. Kolen his bud nasslepen. Un o Jesus tchiwas peskre wasta ap hakeneste lendar, un kras len sasto.

Un dran bud menshende, kai his benga an lende, djan i benga wi. Un har jon wi wan, dan le gole: "Tu hal o Debleskro tchawo." Un o Jesus das len trad, un mukas len gar te rakrell. I benga djinan, kai job ko baro rai hi, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job.
Un o wawar diwes taissarlake, djas o Jesus dran o kheer win, un djas kote, kai job kokres hi. Un bud menshe rodan les, un djan pash leste. Un jon kaman les te rikrell, te djal lo gar peske lendar.

Un har jon hatsan les, penas lo ap lende: "Me hunte djap ninna an i wawar forja, te penap i menshenge o Debleskro lab, te hi o tsiro kanna kai, kai o Dewel kamell len dran o tchilatchepen te lell, un kamell lengro rai te well. Un me wom bitchedo, te penap kowa."
Un o Jesus djas an o them Judea un rakras kote an i biboldengre kangria.
His i diwes, kai o Jesus pash o baro pani Genezaret tardo his. Un bud menshe kaman te shunell o Debleskro lab.
Un job dikas dui tikne panjeskre ulepangre pash o pani tchiddo. I matchepangre djan dran lende win, te thowenn le pengre matchengre gone.
Koi djas lo ap ko panjeskro ulepaskro, hoi o Simoneske hi, un mangas les, te ulerell lo i tikno kotar ap o pani win. Un job beshas pes an ko panjeskro ulepaskro, un penas i menshenge o Debleskro lab.
Un pal kowa penas lo ap o Simoneste: "Aan ko panjeskro ulepaskro dureder ap o pani, un witsrenn tumare matchengre gone win, te taprenn tumer i matche!"
Penas o Simon: "Sikepaskro, mer budram i tseli rat, un tapram tchi. Tu te peneh les mange, palle witsrau i matchengre gone pale win."
Un har jon kowa kran, tapran jon jaake bud matche, te kaman i matchengre gone paash te djal.

Un jon dan i wawar matchepangren gole, te tsardenn jon lentsa khetne i matchengre gone dran o pani win. Un jon wan, un khetne kran le kol dui panjeskre ulepangre jaake pherdo matche, te djan i panjeskre ulepangre paash tele.
Har o Simon Petro kowa dikas, peras lo glan o Jesuseste tele ap i phub, un penas: "Dja tuke mandar, miro rai! Me hom i mursh, kai doosh ap mande hi."
Har job dikas, te tapran le jaake bud matche, was i bari traash pral leste, un ap kolende, kai pash leste his,
ninna ap o Jakobo un ap o Johanni, kolengro dad hi o Zebedeo. Kol dui budran o Simoneha khetne. Un o Jesus penas ap o Simoneste: "Ma traash! Me krau tutar jekes, kai anell menshen pash mande."
Un jon anan kol panjeskre ulepangre ap o them, un mukan lauter tchiddo, un djan leha.

An jek foro his i mursh, koles his i djungelo nasslepen, kai leskro mass ap leste tele merella. Job dikas o Jesuses, un witsras pes glan leste tele ap i phub, un mangas lestar: "Rai, te kameh tu, nai kreh tu man sasto."
Un o Jesus tchiwas peskro wast ap leste, un penas: "Me kamau, te wess sasto." Un ap jek kopo djas o nasslepen lestar.

Un o Jesus penas leske: "De jak, te peness kekeske, hoi me tuke krom! Dja pash o rashajeste un sike leste, kai tiro nasslepen tutar djas. Un aan kowa glan o Debleste, hoi o Mose penas, te djinenn i menshe, kai tu sasto wal!"
Un bud un budeder menshe shunan o Jesusestar. Un bud wan khetne, te shunenn le les, un te wenn le lestar sasto kerdo.
O Jesus tsardas pes lendar pale, un djas an o mulo them, un rakras kote o Debleha.

His i diwes, kai job i menshenge o Debleskro lab penas. Un bud Farisarja un biboldengre tchatchepangre his mashkral lende beshdo. Jon wan dran i themma Galilea un Judea, un dran o foro Jerusalem. Un o Jesus kras i menshen sasto an o Debleskri soor.
Koi wan mursha un anan i murshes ap o tchiben. Kowa nashte nashas gar. Jon kaman les an o kheer te anell, kai o Jesus hi, un glan leste te tchiwell.
An kau kheer his jaake bud menshe, te nashte anan le kol nasseles gar dre. Koi djan jon ap o kheer pral pre, lan barra win, un mukan ko tchiben mashkral i menshende glan o Jesuseste tele.
Un o Jesus dikas lengro patsepen, un penas ap ko mursheste, kai nasselo hi: "Tchawa, me lau tiri doosh tutar."
Un i biboldengre tchatchepangre un i Farisarja penan jek ap o wawareste: "Koon hi kau mursh, kai krell pes har o Dewel? O Dewel kokres nai lell i doosh i menshendar."
Un o Jesus haiwas, hoi jon mashkral pende jaake penan. Un job penas ap lende: "Hoske djal kowa an tumaro shero trujal?
Hi kowa phareder, te penap: Me lau tiri doosh tutar krik, har te penap ap leste: Ste pre, le tiro tchiben un dja trujal?

Kanna sikrau tumen, te hi o Menshengro Tchawes koi soor ap i phub, te nai lell lo i doosh i menshendar krik." Palle penas o Jesus ap ko mursheste, kai nai nashell gar: "Ste pre, le tiro tchiben un dja khere!"
Un kowa stas sik glan lauterende pre, las peskro tchiben, un djas khere un sharas o Debles.
Un kolla, kai dikan kowa, kran bare jaka, un sharan o Debles. Un i bari traash was ap lende, un jon penan: "Mer dikam kau diwes i baro koowa."

Koi pal djas o Jesus dran ko foro win. Un job dikas i murshes pash ko kheer beshdo, kai job i biboldendar lowe i Remarjengre rajenge dre las. Leskro lab hi Levi. Un o Jesus djas pash leste un penas: "Am, dja mantsa!"
Un job stas pre, un mukas lauter tchiddo, un djas leha.
Un o Levi kras o Jesuseske an peskro kheer i baro chapen. Un bud kolendar, kai lan i biboldendar lowe i Remarjengre rajenge dre, chan lentsa khetne. Un ninna wawar menshe his koi.

Un i Farisarja un i biboldengre tchatchepangre his chojemen ap o Jesuseste. Un jon penan ap leskre malende: "Hoske chan tumer kolentsa, kai lenna lowe i Remarjenge dre, un kol wawarentsa, kai ninna tchilatcho koowa kran un doleske pale-tchiddo hi?"
Koi penas o Jesus: "Kolla, kai sasto hi, djan gar pash o dramaskro. Kolla, kai nasselo hi, djan pash leste.
Me wom gar, te dap ap kolende gole, kai ap o tchatcho drom hi. Na-a! Me wom, te dap kolen gole, kai djan ap o tchilatcho drom, te mukenn le pengro tchilatcho drom, un djan ap o Debleskro drom."
Jon penan ap o Jesuseste: "O Johanneskre mala chan un pijenn bud kope tchi, te mangenn le o Debles. Un ninna kolla, kai shunenn ap i Farisarja, krenn kowa jaake. Hoske chan un pijenn tire mala?"
Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Jaake raha har o bijabeskro ap i bijab hi, denn tumer chapen kolende, kai ap i bijab hi. Tumer mukenn len gar te bokell.
I tsiro wella, kai o bijabeskro lendar krik lino wella. Ap ko tsiro chan un pijenn le tchi."
Un job penas lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi, un penas: "Kek tchinell i kotar dran i newo ripen win, un siwell les ap i phuro ripen. Kowa krell o newo un o phuro ripen paash.
Un kek tchorell i newi mool an phure moljakre gone. I newi mool krell i phure moljakre gone paash. Un i mool nashella win. Un i gone hi ninna paash.
I newi mool well tchoredo an i newe moljakre gone.
Un kek, kai phuri mool pijas, kamell i newi mool te pijell. Job penella: Koi phuri mool hi latcheder."
Ap o Debleskro diwes djas o Jesus ap i kotar them, kai o djob bares was. Un peskre mala lan ko djob an i wasta, un kran ko djob pre, te chan le.
Kote his ninna Farisarja, kai penan ap lende: "Hoske krenn tumer ap o Debleskro diwes kowa, hoi hi gar pal o biboldengro tchatchepen?"
Penas o Jesus: "Draweran tumer gar an o Debleskro lab, hoi kras o David un leskre mala, har jon bokan?
Job djas an o Debleskro kheer un las kol mare, kai kote tchiddo hi, un chas len peskre malentsa? Pal i biboldengro tchatchepen his i mare i rashajenge kokres koi."
Un o Jesus penas: "Me, o Menshengro Tchawo, hom ninna o rai pral o Debleskro diwes."
Un ap i wawar Debleskro diwes djas o Jesus an i biboldengri kangri, te penell lo kote i menshenge o Debleskro lab. Un job dikas kote i murshes, koleskro tchatcho wast his bango.

I biboldengre tchatchepangre un i Farisarja dikan ap o Jesuseste, un putchan pendar: "Krell lo kau murshes ap o Debleskro diwes sasto?" Jon kaman tchomone ap leste pre te anell, te anenn le les nai glan i tchatchepangre.
O Jesus haiwas, hoi an lengro shero trujal djas. Un job penas ap ko mursheste, koles i bango wast hi: "Ste pre un am kai!" Un job stas pre, un djas pash leste.
Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Me putchau tumendar: Nai krah mer latcho koowa ap o Debleskro diwes pal maro tchatchepen? Nai krah mer i menshen sasto ap o Debleskro diwes? Nai mukah mer len te merell?"
Un job dikas ap kolende, kai trul leste tardo his, un penas ap kau mursheste: "Sike tiro wast!" Un job sikras peskro wast, un ko wast was sasto.
Koi wan jon chojedo ap o Jesuseste, un rakran khetne, hoi jon o Jesuseha nai krans.
His i diwes, kai djas o Jesus ap i berga, te rakrell lo o Debleha. Un job atchas i tseli rat un rakras leha.
Har diwes was, das lo peskre malende gole, un rodas deesh-te-dujen lendar win, te wenn le leskre bitchepangre.
Un kolla his: O Simon, - koleste das job ninna o lab Petro, un leskro phraal Andreas, o Jakobo, un o Johanni, o Filipo, o Bartolomeo,
o Mateo, o Thomas, o Jakobo, koleskro dad hi o Alfeo, un o Simon, kai hi kol menshendar, kai kharenna Zelotarja
un o Judas Iskariot, ko phukepaskro.

Pal kowa djas o Jesus lentsa i berga tele. Un jon wan ap i buchlo kotar them. Koi his bud kolendar khetne, kai leske palla djan, un ap leste shunan. Ninna bud wawar menshe his kote. Un kolla wan dran o tselo them Judea un dran o foro Jerusalem, ninna dran o them, kai i forja Tirus un Sidon tchiddo hi.
Kolla wan lauter, te shunenn le o Jesuses te rakrell, un kaman sasto te well. Ninna lauter kolla wan sasto, kai his i beng an lende.
I tsele menshe kaman les an-te-taprell. I bari soor was dran leste, un kras lauteren sasto.
Un o Jesus dikas ap peskre malende un penas: Bachtele han tumer tchorwele! Tumer djiwenna o Debleha khetne an o bolepen un lenn leskro brawlepen.
Bachtele han tumer, kai kanna bokenna. Tumer wenna tchalo. Bachtele han tumer, kai kanna rowenna. Tumer sana.

Bachtele han tumer, te wenn i menshe chojedo ap tumende, un tchiwenn tumen pale, un praassenn tumen, un rakrenn tchilatches pral tumende, un kowa lauter krenn le doleske, te patsenn tumer ap o Menshengro Tchaweste!

Awenn bachteles ap ko diwes, un khelenn i bachtjatar! O Dewel dell tumen i baro brawlepen an o bolepen. Kowa, hoi i menshe kanna tumentsa krenna, kowa kran ninna lengre phure ap o Debleskre rakepangre an o phuro tsiro.
Bibacht well ap tumende, kai kanna brawelo han. Tumer lenna tchi buder.
Bibacht well ap tumende, kai kanna tchalo han. Tumer bokenna. Bibacht well ap tumende, kai kanna sana. Tumer rowenna, un denn gole.
Bibacht well ap tumende, te rakrenn i tsele menshe tumendar latches. Kolengre phure rakran ninna latches pral i chochene rakepangre, kai penan, te wan le o Deblestar, un wan gar lestar.
Tumer, kai man shunenna, tumenge penaua: Awenn latches kolenge, kai hi tchilatcho ap tumende! Krenn kolenge latchepen, kai hi chojedo ap tumende!
Penenn kolenge latche laba, kai tumen khoshenna! Mangenn o Debles kolenge, kai dukrenn tumen!
Kowa, kai das tut ap jek tcham, koleske rike i wawar tcham ninna koi, te dell lo tut! Te lell jek tutar tiri plashka, de les ninna tiro gad!
De hakenes, kai tutar mangella! Un te lell jek tutar tchomone, hoi tiro hi, ma mang les pale!
Lauter, hoi tumer kamenna, te krenn i menshe tumenge, kowa krenn tumer lenge ninna!
Te wenn tumer latches kolenge, kai hi latches ap tumende, patsenna tumer, kai sharell tumen o Dewel? Na-a! Ninna i tchilatche hi latches ap pengre mala.
Te krenna tumer kolenge latchepen, kai tumenge latchepen kran, patsenna tumer, kai sharell tumen o Dewel? Na-a! Ninna i tchilatche krenn kolenge latchepen, kai lenge latchepen kran.

Tumer te patsenn tumare lowe win ap kolende, kai denn tumen kol lowe pale, patsenn tumer, kai sharell tumen o Dewel? Na-a, ninna i tchilatche patsenn pengre lowe kolenge win, kai denn len kol lowe pale.

Me penau tumenge: Awenn latches kolenge, kai hi tchilatcho ap tumende! Krenn kolenge latchepen! Patsenn tumare lowe win ap kolende, kai tumer gar djinenna, te lenn tumer lendar tchomone pale! Te krenna tumer kowa lauter, palle dell o Dewel tumen peskro brawlepen an o bolepen, un tumer wenna o baro Debleskre tchawe. O Dewel hi ninna latches ap kol menshende, kai tchilatche hi, un kai parkrenn pen gar pash leste.
Tumen hunte well hakeneske i baro dji, jaake har o Debles hakeneske i baro dji hi.

Ma sikrenn ap o wawareskri doosh! Un o Dewel dikell gar ap tumari doosh. Ma penenn: Kowa hunte lell i phagi! Un o Dewel dell tumen kek phagi. Bistrenn ko tchilatchepen, hoi i wawar menshe ap tumende kran. Un o Dewel bistrell ko tchilatchepen, hoi tumer kran.

Denn i menshen latcho koowa! Un o Dewel dell tumen latcho koowa! Awa, job dell tumen jaake bud, te hi tumen budeder har doha. Job dell tumen jaake bud, te nai lenn kowa gar lauter. Doleske penau tumenge: Tumer te denn bud, palle dell o Dewel tumen bud. Tumer te denn gar bud, palle dell o Dewel tumen gar bud.
Un o Jesus ginas lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi, un penas: Te lell jek korelo i wawar koreles ap o wast, palle perenn jon hake dui.
Jek, kai djal an o sikepaskro kheer, djinell gar budeder har o sikepaskro. Job te djinell bud, palle hi lo jaake gosewo har peskro sikepaskro.
Hoske kameh tu i tikno kasht dran tiro phraleskro jak win tsardell, un tu dikeh gar o baro kasht an tiro jak?

Tu peneh ap leste: Miro phraal, am kai! Me kamau ko tikno kasht dran tiro jak win tsardell. Un tu dikeh gar o baro kasht an tiro jak. Tu chocheno! Tu kreh, har te wals tu latcheder har job. Le ko baro kasht dran tiro jak win, palle nai leh tu o tikno kasht dran tiro phraleskro jak win!
Kek latcho pawjakro ruk hidjella djungele pawja. Un kek nasselo ruk hidjella latcho koowa.
Tu prindjreh nai o ruk ap kowa, hoi ap leste baro wella. Ap i subjengro ruk wenna kek faige baro. Witar gar wenna drake baro ap subjengre burra.
Dran i latcho mensheskro dji wella latcho koowa. Dran i tchilatcho dji wella tchilatcho koowa. I mensho penell kowa, hoi an leskro dji dre hi.
Hoske penenn tumer: Rai, rai! ap mande un krenn gar, hoi me tumenge penaua?
Koon well pash mande, un shunell mire laba, un krell, hoi me penau,

kowa hi har i mensho, kai kras peske i kheer. Job hadas i phub wi, bis te was lo ap i sorelo baro bar. Kote tchiwas job peskro kheer pre. Un o baro pani was, un kamas ko kheer paash te krell. Un kowa djas gar. Ko kheer his ap o sorelo bar tardo.

Koon shunell mire laba, un krell kowa gar, hoi me penaua, hi har i mensho, kai kras peskro kheer ap i tchik, un gar ap i sorelo baro bar. Un o baro pani was, un o tselo kheer peras khetne. Un i bibacht his baro.
Un pal ko rakepen djas lo an o foro Kapernaum.
An ko foro djiwas i pralstuno lurdo. Les his i budepaskro, kai ap o merepen tchiddo hi. Kowa his leske bud moldo.
Un ko lurdo shunas, kai o Jesus an o foro hi. Un job bitchras i biboldengre phureden pash o Jesuseste, te mangenn le les, te well lo pash leste, un te krell lo o budepaskres sasto.
Un jon wan pash o Jesuseste, un mangan les, un penan ap leste: "Kau pralstuno lurdo hi moldo, te kress leskro budepaskres sasto.
Job hi menge latches un kras menge i kheer, kai mangah o Debles an."
Koi djas o Jesus lentsa. Har job ap o drom his, bitchras ko pralstuno lurdo peskre malen pash leste, te penenn le leske: "Ma kre tuke o drom, te wess pash mande!
Witar gar hom moldo, te wap me pash tute. Te peneh tu jek lab, jaake well miro budepaskro sasto.

Jaake har me ninna hunte shunap ap mire pralstunende, jaake hi man ninna lurde, kai hunte krenn, hoi me penau. Me te penau ap jekeste: Dja koi! palle djal lo. Me te penau ap i wawareste: Am kai! palle well lo. Me te penau ap miro budepaskro: Kre kowa! palle krell job kowa."
Har o Jesus kowa shunas, kras job bare jaka. Un job risras pes trujal, un penas ap kolende, kai leha djan: "Me penau tumenge: Sawo patsepen hatsom me gar an o tselo them Israel."
Har kol bitchepangre o pralstuno lurdestar khere wan, his ko budepaskro sasto.
Ap o wawar diwes djas o Jesus an o foro Nain. Peskre mala un bud wawar djan leha.
Un jon wan pash o baro wudar kau forestar. Un i menshe hidjan i mules dran o foro win. Kowa his o tchawo i djuwjatar, kolakro rom meras. Un lat his ninna kek wawar tchawe. Un bud menshe djan laha.
Un o Jesus dikas lat, un leskro dji dukas. Un job penas ap late: "Ma rob!"
Un job djas pash o mochton, un tchiwas peskro wast ap leste. Un kolla, kai o mochton hidjan, atchan tardo. Un job penas: "Tarno mursh, me penau tuke: Ste pre!"
Un o djipen was pale an leste. Un job hadas pes pre, un rakras. Un o Jesus das les leskri date pale.
Koi was i traash pral lauterende. Un jon sharan o Debles un penan: "I baro Debleskro rakepaskro hi mashkral mende. O Dewel was pash peskre menshende."
Un an o tselo them Judea shunan le, hoi o Jesus kras. Un an i wawar themma, kote shunan le kowa ninna.
Un har o Johanni lauter kowa peskre malendar shunas, das lo dujen lendar pash peste gole,
un bitchras len pash o Jesuseste, te putchenn le les: "Hal tu kowa, kai hunte well? Hunte dikas mer ap i wawareste, te well lo?"
Un jon wan pash o Jesuseste, un penan: "O Johanni, kowa, kai i menshen o Debleske an o pani thowas, kamell tutar te djinell: Hal tu kowa, kai hunte wella? Hunte dikas mer ap i wawareste, te well lo?"
Ap kau tsiro kras o Jesus bud menshen sasto, kai nasselo un korelo hi, ninna kolen, kai benga an lende hi.

Un job penas o Johanneskre malenge: "Penenn o Johanneske, hoi tumer dikan un shunan: I korele nai dikenn pale. Un i bange nai djan pale. I nassele, kai lengro mass ap lende tele merell, wenna sasto. Kolla, kai nai shunan gar, nai shunenna pale. I mule wenna djido. Un i tchorwele shunenn o Debleskro latcho lab.
Bachtelo hi kowa, kai choirell pes gar pral mande."

Har kol mursha, kolen o Johanni bitchras, penge djan, rakras o Jesus pral o Johanneste ap i menshende, un penas: "Hoske djan tumer an o mulo them? Kaman tumer i murshes te dikell, kai hi har i patrin, hoi i sorelo ducho pral i phub phurdella? Na-a, sawo mursh hi lo gar.

Koon kaman tumer te dikell? Kaman tumer i murshes te dikell, kai an kutch koola rido hi? Na-a, sawo mursh hi lo witar gar. Me penau tumenge: Kolla, kai riwenn raile koola, un djiwenn i shukar djipen, kolla djiwenna an i rajengre bare khera.
Koon kaman tumer te dikell? Kaman tumer i Debleskro rakepaskro te dikell? Awa, kowa hi o Johanni. Un me penau tumenge: Job hi bareder har i Debleskro rakepaskro.
Kolestar hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: O Dewel penas ap peskro tchaweste: Me bitchrau i murshes glan tute ap o drom, te krell lo tuke i drom, te nai wess pash i menshende.

Me penau tumenge: Kek was boldo ap kai phub, kai hi bareder har o Johanni. Me penau tumenge ninna: O tikneder kolendar, kai patsenn ap mande un mukenn man pengro rai te well, kowa hi bareder har o Johanni.
Kolla, kai shunan les, un ninna kol bibolde, kai lenn lowe i Remarjenge dre, dan o Debles tchatches, un mukan pen o Johannestar an o pani te thowell.
Kol Farisarja un kol biboldengre tchatchepangre, kran o Debleskro lab penge tchitcheske. Jon mukan pen gar o Johannestar an o pani te thowell."
Un o Jesus penas: "Me penau tumenge, har i menshe ap kau tsiro hi.
Jon hi har kol tchawe, kai khelenn an o foro, un denn gole jek ap o wawareste: Mer bashram tumenge. Tumer khelan gar. Mer giwam mulengre gilja. Tumer rowan gar.
O Johanni, kowa, kai i menshen o Debleske an o pani thowas, chas kek maro, un pijas kek mool. Lestar penan tumer: An koleste hi i beng.

Un me, o Menshengro Tchawo, me wom, chom un pijom, un mandar penenn tumer: Kawa hi i chapaskro un i pipaskro. Kawa hi i maal kolendar, kai lenn i biboldendar lowe i Remarjenge dre, un i maal kol wawarendar, kai tchilatcho koowa kran un doleske ninna pale-tchiddo hi.
Me penau tumenge: O Debleskro goswepen dikenn tumer ap kolende, kai djiwenn koi pal."
Un i Farisari, - leskro lab hi Simon, - mangas o Jesuses: "Ab pash mande te chal!" Un o Jesus djas an leskro kheer, un beshas pes tele, te chal lo leha khetne.
Kote his i djuwel an kau foro, koja kras djungelo koowa un hi pale-tchiddo. Un joi shunas, te hi o Jesus an ko kheer. Un joi las i tushni, kai kutch djet dren hi, un was an kau kheer.
Un joi his tardo pal o Jesuseste un rowas. Un lakre swar kran leskre pire sapenes. Un joi khossas len peskre balentsa. Un joi tchumras leskre pire, un makas len o kutch djeteha dre.

Har o Farisari kowa lauter dikas, penas lo ap peste kokres: "Te wals kau rom tchatchepaha i Debleskro rakepaskro, hunte djinals lo, hawi djuwel les an-tapras. Job hunte djinals, te hi li pale-tchiddi."
Koi penas o Jesus ap leste: "Simon, me hunte penap tuke tchomone." "Sikepaskro, pen les mange!" penas lo.
Koi penas o Jesus: "Dui kran sijaan pash i rajeste kai lowe win patsella. Ko jekes his pantch-sheel (500) rupene beme sijaan, ko wawares pantch-deesh (50).
Har jon pengro sijaan gar nai plaissran, kamas ko rai kol lowe lendar buder gar pale te lell. Koon kol dujendar kamas o rajes budeder?"
Penas o Simon leske: "Me patsau, kowa, kai les budeder sijaan his." Penas o Jesus: "Tiro hi tchatcho."

Un o Jesus risras pes trujal, dikas ap koi djuwjate, un penas ap o Simoneste: "Dik ap koi djuwjate, un ap kowa, hoi joi mange kras! Me wom an tiro kheer. Un tu dal man kek pani, te nai thowom mire pire. Lakre swar kran mire pire sapenes, un joi khossas len peskre balentsa.
Tu dal man kek tchum. Joi tchumras mire pire jaake raha har joi koi hi.
Tu makal gar miro shero kutch djeteha dre. Joi makas mire pire kutch djeteha dre.
Un me penau tuke kanna: Lakri bari doosh hi latar krik lino. Doleske kamell li man o tselo djijeha. Koneske gar bud doosh krik lino wella, kowa kamell gar i tselo djijeha."
Un o Jesus penas ap late: "Tiri doosh hi tutar krik lino."
Kolla, kai koi pashal beshdo hi, penan ap pende: "Koon hi kau mursh, kai nai lell i doosh i menshendar krik?"
O Jesus penas ap late: "Tu patseh ap mande. Doleske hi tiri doosh tutar krik lino. Dja mo Debleha!"
Un o Jesus djas an i forja un gaba trujal, te penell lo i menshenge o latcho lab, kai o Dewel kamell len dran o tchilatchepen te lell, un kamell lengro rai te well. Kol deesh-te-dui mala djan leha.
Un bud djuwja, kolen job sasto kras, djan ninna leha. Mashkral kol djuwjende his ninna kolla, kai bengen an pende his. Efta benga tradas lo dran i Mariate win, kai kharas ninna Magdalena.

Ninna i Susanna djas leha, un i Joanna. Lakro rom his o Kuza. Kowa his o pralstuno budepaskro an o Herodeskro kheer. Un bud wawar djuwja djan leha, te denn le len chapen un pipen dran kowa, hoi len hi.
Dran bud forja wan bud menshe pash leste khetne. Un job rakras ap lende sawe laba, kai hi i khatedo tchatchepen dre."
Un job penas: "I hacho djas win, te witsrell lo o djob ap peskro kotar them, te well ko djob bares. Un tikne kotja peran ap o drom, un i menshe stakran len khetne. Un i tchirkle chan len pre.
Un wawar djob peras ap i barra. Kote his gar doha pani. Un har ko djob dran i phub win was, chatchras o kham les.
Un wawar djob peras mashkral i subjengre burra, un kol burra wan jaake baro, te las o djob kek ducho buder, un job meras.
Wawar djob peras ap i latchi phub, un was baro, un hidjas sheel kope jaake bud." Pal kowa das o Jesus gole, un penas ap i menshende: "Mukenn kowa an tumaro shero trujal te djal!"
Un o Jesuseskre mala putchan lestar: "Hoi kameh tu menge kal labentsa te penell?"

Penas lo ap lende: "O Dewel mukell tumen te haiwell, har kote djal, kai dell lo menshen pash peste gole, te djan le ap leskro drom. Kowa djinenn i wawar menshe gar. Lenge penau laba, kai o tchatchepen dre khatedo hi. Me rakrau jaake, te dikenn le kowa nai, un haiwenn les gar, un jaake, te shunenn le les nai, un haiwenn les gar.
Kanna penau tumenge kowa jaake, te haiwenn tumer kowa: O djob hi o Debleskro lab.
Ko drom hi har o dji kol menshendar, kai shunenn o Debleskro lab. Un o beng wella, un lell kowa lenge pale dran o dji win, te patsenn le gar ap o Debleste un wenn gar ap leskro drom.

Ko kotar phub, hoi hi pherde barra, hi har o dji kol menshendar, kai shunenn o Debleskro lab, un lenn les bachteles pre. O lab well gar sorelo an lengre djia. I tikno tsiro patsenn le. Un te well pharo tsiro ap lende, witsrenn le pengro patsepen ap i rig.

Ko kotar phub, kai o djob mashkral i subjengre burra peras, hi har o dji kol menshendar, kai shunenn o Debleskro lab un rikrenn les i tsiro an pengre djia. Te well i daar an lengro djipen, un te well o brawlepen glan lengre jaka, un ko shukar djipen, palle well ko lab lendar tassedo un rakrell buder gar an lengre djia.
Koi latchi phub hi har o dji kol menshendar, kai o Debleskro lab shunenna, un djiwenn koi pal. An lengre djia well ko lab sorelo. Un jon atchenn soreles an o patsepen tardo."

"Kek chatchell i momeli an, un tchiwell i piri pral. Un kek chatchell i momeli an, un tchiwell lat tel o tchiben. Na-a, job tchiwell lat ap i momelengri, te well koi momeli diklo hakenestar, kai wella an o kheer.
Jaake hi kowa ninna o Debleskro labeha. Jek diwes dikenn le kowa, hoi jon kanna gar dikenna. Jek diwes shunenn le un haiwenn le, hoi jon kanna gar djinenna.

Denn jak, te shunenn tumer ap o Debleskro lab! Koon o Debleskro lab an o dji rikrella, kowa haiwell les bud un budeder. Koon o Debleskro lab gar an o dji rikrella, koleske well ninna kowa krik lino, hoi job patsell, te hi les."
O Jesus his an o kheer un bud menshe his trul leste. Un leskri dai un leskre phrala kaman pash leste te djal, un nai wan gar pash leste.
Koi penas jek ap leste: "Tiri dai un tire phrala hi win tardo, un kamenn tut te dikell."
Penas lo: "Miri dai un mire phrala hi kolla, kai o Debleskro lab shunenna, un kowa ninna krenna."
Was i diwes, kai o Jesus peskre malentsa an i panjeskro ulepaskro djas. Un job penas ap lende: "Djas ap i wawar panjeskri rig!" Un jon uleran ap o baro pani.

Har jon ap o baro pani his, sowas lo dre. Un i baro diwjo ducho phurdas pral o baro pani. Un o pani was diwjo, un djas pre te tele. Un bud pani was an o panjeskro ulepaskro dre, jaake bud, te kamas ko panjeskro ulepaskro tele te djal.

Un jon djan pash leste, djangran les pre, un penan: "Sikepaskro, sikepaskro, ste pre, mer tassah!" Un job stas pre, un penas ap ko sorelo ducho, hoi phurdas pral o pani: "Atch kanna!" Un ap o diwjo pani penas lo: "Muk tele!" Un o sorelo ducho phurdas buder gar. Un o pani his buder gar diwjo, un das buder kek gole.

Un job penas ap lende: "Kai hi tumaro patsepen?" Un jon trashan, un penan jek ap o wawareste: "Koon hi kau mursh? Job penell ap o sorelo ducho, te phurdell lo buder gar, un ap o pani, te tchiwell lo pes. Un jon shunenn ap leste."
Un jon uleran dureder, un wan ap i wawar panjeskri rig an ko them Gerasa. Kawa his wergal o them Galilea tchiddo.
Un o Jesus djas dran o panjeskro ulepaskro. Kote was i mursh dran o foro. An koleste his benga. I raha tsiro his job nango, un djiwas gar an i kheer. Job djiwas an i mulengre khera.

Bud kope tapras les o beng. Un i menshe pandan les sasterne shellentsa ap i wasta un ap i pire. Job phagas kol sasterne shelle pestar tele. Un o beng tradas les an o mulo them. Har ko mursh kanna o Jesuses dikas, witsras pes lo glan leste ap i phub. Un o Jesus penas soreles ap o bengeste: "Dja lestar win!" Koi das ko mursh bari gole: "Jesus, tchawo o baro Deblestar, hoi kameh tu mandar? Me mangau tut: Ma duke man!"
Un o Jesus putchas lestar: "Har khareh tu?" Penas lo: "Legioni." Ko lab sikrella, te his bud benga an leste.
Un jon mangan les, te bitchrell lo len gar an i telstuni phub.
Un kote his bud bale ap koi berga, hoi kote chan. Un kol benga mangan lestar: "Muk men an kol balende te djal!" Un job mukas len an lende dre te djal.
Koi wan kol benga dran o mursheste win, un djan an kol balende. Un kol tsele bale wan diwjo, un nashan i berga tele, un stan an o baro pani, un tassan.
Kol mursha, kai dan ap i balende jak, dikan kowa, un nashan an o foro un an i gaba, un penan kowa i menshenge.

Un kol menshe kaman te dikell, hoi kote djas, un wan pash o Jesuseste. Un jon dikan ko murshes, dran koleste i benga win wan. Job his pash o Jesuseste beshdo, his an-rido, un buder gar diwjo. Koi wan jon dareno.
Un kolla, kai dikan, har kau mursh sasto was, penan kowa kolenge, kai dran i forja un dran i gaba wan.
Un i bari daar was ap lende. Un kol bud menshe dran o them Gerasa penan ap o Jesuseste: "Mer mangah tut: Dja tuke mendar!" Un job djas an o panjeskro ulepaskro, un uleras pale.
Ko mursh, kai sasto was, mangas lestar, te atchell lo nai pash leste. O Jesus penas ap leste:
"Dja khere un pen i menshenge, hoi o Dewel tuke kras!" Un kau mursh djas peske, un penas i tsele menshenge an peskro foro, hawo baro koowa o Jesus ap leste kras.
Un o Jesus was pale ap i wawar panjeskri rig. Un bud menshe his kote tardo, un lan les kamles pre.
Koi was i mursh pash o Jesuseste. Leskro lab his Jairo. Job his i pralstuno an i biboldengri kangri. Kowa witsras pes glan o Jesuseste tele, un mangas les, te well lo an leskro kheer.
Leskri tchai, kai his deesh-te-dui bersha phuro, his ap o merepen tchiddo. Un les his kek wawar tchawe har koja. Un o Jesus kamas leha te djal. Un bud menshe his trul leste un djan lentsa.
Koi pashal his i djuwel. Kolat hi deesh-te-dui bersha i ratlo nasslepen. Koja das lauter, hoi lat his djipaske, i dramangren, un kek nai kras lat sasto.
Un joi djas pal o Jesuseste, un tapras ap leskro ripen. Ap jek kopo was li sasto.
"Koon tapras ap miro ripen?" putchas o Jesus. Un hakeno das buchoste. Penas o Petro leske: "Rai, bud menshe hi trul tute, un taprenn tut an."
Koi penas o Jesus: "Jek tapras man an. Me haiwom, har soor mandar krik djas."

Har koi djuwel dikas, kai o Jesus lauter djinas, was li glan. Un joi trissas un witsras pes glan leste tele, un penas glan i tsele menshende, hoske joi ap leskro ripen tapras, un kai joi ap jek kopo sasto was.
Un o Jesus penas ap late: "Romnija, tiro patsepen kras tut sasto. Dja mo Debleha!"
Un har o Jesus jaake rakras, was jek dran o kheer ko pralstunestar pral i biboldengri kangri, un penas ap leste: "Tiri tchai meras. Tu hunte mangess o rajes buder gar."
Har o Jesus kowa shunas, penas lo ap ko pralstuneste: "Ma traash! Tiri tchai djiwella. Pats man!"
Un o Jesus djas an ko kheer. Un o Johanni un o Petro un o Jakobo djan leha. Un o tchakro dad un lakri dai djan ninna lentsa. Un o Jesus mukas kek wawares an kau kheer dre te djal.
Un halauter rowan, un dan pengre wasta pral o shero khetne. Un job penas ap lende: "Ma rowenn! Joi hi gar muli. Joi sowella."
Jon djinan, te meras li, un san pral leste.
Un o Jesus tapras lakro wast, un penas ap late: "Tchai, ste pre!"
Koi was pale djipen an late, un joi stas pre. Un job penas, te anenn le lake tchomone te chal.
Lakro dad un lakri dai kran bare jaka pral kowa, hoi koi djas. Un o Jesus penas lenge, te penenn le kekeske, hoi job kras.
Pal kowa das lo peskre deesh-te-dui malen pash peste gole, un das len i soor pral i tsele benga, te nai tradenn le len dran i menshende win, un te nai krenn le i nasselen sasto.

Un job bitchras len pash i menshende, te penenn le lenge, te hi o tsiro kanna kai, kai o Dewel i menshen pash peste gole della, te djan le ap leskro drom. Un job bitchras len ninna, te krenn le i nasselen sasto.
Un job penas lenge: "Te djan tumer ap o drom, ma lenn tchi peha: kek kasht, kek possita, kek maro, kek lowe, witar gar i duito gad!
Te lell jek tumen an peskro kheer dre, atchenn pash leste jaake raha, bis te djan dureder!
Un te lenn le tumen gar an pengro kheer dre, djan tumenge dran kau foro, un denn koi tchik tumare pirendar tele! Un kowa sikrell i menshende, kai jon tchilatcho hi."
Un o Jesuseskre deesh-te-dui mala kran pen ap o drom, un djan an jek gab pal o wawar, penan i menshenge o Debleskro lab, un kran i nasselen sasto kote, kai jon ninna djan.
O Herodes, ko baro rai pral o them Galilea, shunas lauter, hoi o Jesus krella. Un job djinas gar, hoi te patsell lo. His menshe koi, kai penan: "O Johanni stas i mulendar pre."
Wawar penan: "O Elija was pale." Un ninna wawar penan: "Jek kol phure Debleskre rakepangrendar stas i mulendar pre."
O Herodes penas: "Me mukom o Johanneskro shero tele te dell. Koon hi kowa, kai shunau sawo koowa pral leste?" Un job kamas les te dikell.
Un kol deesh-te-dui bitchepangre wan pale, un penan o Jesuseske, hoi jon lauter kran. Un o Jesus las len peha, te well lo lentsa kokres, un djas lentsa pash ko foro Betsaida.

Har i menshe dikan, te djas o Jesus pash o foro Betsaida, djan bud leske palla. Un job mukas len pash peste te well, un penas lenge, te dell o Dewel len pash peste gole, te djiwell lo lentsa khetne. Un kolen, kai nasselo hi, kras lo sasto.

Un o kham djas tele, un o Jesuseskre deesh-te-dui mala wan pash leste, un penan leske: "Bitche kal menshen tutar, te djan le an i gaba, un pash i hachende, te lenn le penge tchomone te chal, un te dikenn le kote, kai jon pral i rati nai atchenna! Kate, kai mer ham, della tchi te chal."
O Jesus penas ap lende: "Denn tumer len tchomone te chal!" Penan le leske: "Men hi gar budeder har pantch mare un dui matche. Kameh tu, te ginas kolenge lauterenge te chal?"

Kote his nai jaake pantch serja mursha, ninna bud djuwja un tchawe. O Jesus penas ap peskre malende: "Krenn, te beshenn pen le jaake khetne, te hi kate pantch-deesh beshdo un kote pantch-deesh beshdo!"
Un leskre mala kran jaake. Un lauter beshan pen.

Un job las kol pantch mare un kol dui matche, un dikas pre ap o bolepen, un parkras pes pash o Debleste. Un palle phagas job kol mare un matche an kotja, un das len peskre malende, te denn le len i menshende.
Un jon chan, un wan lauter tchalo. Un jon hadan kol kotja pre, hoi pral atchan. Koi wan deesh-te-dui marengre gone pherdo.
His i diwes, kote his o Jesus kokres peskre malentsa, un mangas o Debles an. Un pal kowa putchas lo lendar: "Hoi penenn kol menshe, koon me hom?"

Penan le leske: "Jon penenna, kai tu hal o Johanni, kowa, kai thowas i menshen o Debleske an o pani. Wawar penenn: Kowa hi o Elija. Un pale wawar penenn: Jek kol phure Debleskre rakepangrendar stas i mulendar pre."
Putchas lo lendar: "Tumer, hoi penenn tumer, koon me hom?" Penas o Petro: "Tu hal o Kristo, ko baro rai, kai menge o Deblestar bitchedo was."
Koi penas lo lenge, te penenn le kowa kekeske.

Un job penas: "Me, o Menshengro Tchawo, hunte lap bud duka ap mande. I bare rashaja un i biboldengre phureder un tchatchepangre tchiwenn man ap i rig. Un me hunte wap mulo dino, un pal triin diwessa krell man o Dewel djido."
Un o Jesus penas ap lauterende: "Koon ap miro drom mantsa djala, kowa hunte bistrell, hoi leske kokres mishto hi, un lell peskro trushel hako diwes ap peste un djal mantsa.
Koon kamell peskro djipen te rikrell, kowa nashrell les. Koon peskro djipen mange nashrella, lell les mandar pale.
I mensheske wals kowa gar mishto, te lals lo o tselo brawlepen ap kai phub, un te wals lo o Debleske nashedo.
Kowa, kai ladjell pes mange un mire labenge, koleske ladjau me ninna, te wau me, o Menshengro Tchawo, pale. Ap ko diwes hi man ko railepen, kai hi ninna miro dades un o Debleskre bolepangren.
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Kate hi menshe tardo, kolla merenna gar, bis te dikenn le o Debleskro railepen un soor, hoi an mande diklo wella."
Pal ochta diwessa las o Jesus o Petres, o Johannes, un o Jakobes, un djas lentsa ap i berga, te rakrell lo o Debleha.
Un har job rakras o Debleha, dikas peskro mui wawartchandes win, un leskre koola wan railes bijalo.
Ap jek kopo rakran dui mursha leha. Kolla his o Mose un o Elija.
Kol dujen his i bolepaskro railepen, un rakran leha pral leskro merepen an o foro Jerusalem.

O Petro un kol dui wawar his jaake khino, te sowan le. Har jon pre djangewan, dikan le o Jesuses, har job an peskro bolepaskro railepen koi tardo his, un kol dui murshen, o Moses un o Elijas, pash leste.

Un har kol dui mursha kaman penge te djal, penas o Petro ap o Jesuseste: "Rai, hi mishto, te ham kai. Muk men triin tikne khera te krell, jek tuke, jek o Moseske, un jek o Elijeske." Un job djinas gar, hoi rakrell lo kote.
Un har job jaake rakras, was i wolka pral lende tele. Un len his traash, har jon an koi wolka dre wan.
Koi shunan le i rakepen dran i wolka, hoi penas: "Kawa hi mo tchawo, job hi o wi-rodedo! Shunenn ap leste!"
Un har ko rakepen pre-heras, dikan le, kai o Jesus kokres koi tardo hi. Kol triin rikran kowa lauter penge, un penan an ko tsiro kekeske, hoi jon dikan.
Un o wawar diwes djan le koi berga tele, un bud menshe wan pash leste.
Mashkral lende his i mursh, kai das bari gole, un penas: "Sikepaskro, me mangau tut: Dik ap miro tchaweste! Man hi kokres kau tchawo, kek wawar.
I beng taprell les jaake, kai dell lo ap jek kopo bari gole, un perell ap i phub. Un palle well tchunger dran leskro mui. Ko beng kamell les buder gar te djal mukell, un kamell les te marell.
Me mangom tire malendar, te tradenn le o benges lestar win. Un jon haiwan kowa gar te krell."
Koi penas o Jesus: "Tumer tchilatche menshe. Tumen hi kek patsepen. Har raha tsiro hunte atchap pash tumende, te marap man tele tumentsa? Aan tiro tchawes pash mande!"
Har o tchawo was, witsras ko beng o tchawes ap i phub, un tsardas les jek rigatar ap i wawar. Koi das o Jesus ko benges trad, un kras o tchawes sasto, un das les peskro dadeste pale.
Un lauterenge, kai kote tardo his, atchas o rakepen krik pral koi bari Debleskri soor. Har jon jaake bare jaka kran pral kowa, hoi o Jesus kras, penas lo ap peskre malende:
"Ma bistrenn, hoi me tumenge penaua: Me, o Menshengro Tchawo, wau an i menshengre wasta dino!"
Kal laba haiwan le gar. Kowa, hoi job lenge kate penas, djas gar an lengro shero dre. Jaake djinan le gar, pral hoi job rakras un trashan, te putchenn le lestar pral kol laba.
Jek diwes tchingran pen leskre mala koi pral, koon lendar o pralstuno hi.
Har o Jesus haiwas, hoi an lengro shero trujal djala, las job i tchawes pash peste,

un penas ap lende: "Kowa, kai lell kau tchawes pash peste pre an miro lab, kowa lell man pash peste pre. Koon man pre lella, kowa lell koles pre, kai bitchras man. Koon mashkral tumende o tikneder hi, kowa hi baro."
Koi penas o Johanni ap o Jesuseste: "Rai, mer dikam i murshes. Kowa tradas i bengen wi an tiro lab. Un kowa his kek mendar. Doleske penam leske: Ma kre kowa buder!"
O Jesus penas ap lende: "Mukenn les! Koon hi gar tchilatcho ap tumende, kowa hi ap tumari rig tardo."
Har ko tsiro kai his, te well o Jesus maredo, kras pes lo ap o drom, te djal lo an o foro Jerusalem. Un kek nai rikras les pale.
Un job bitchras murshen glan peste ap kau drom. Kolla djan, un wan an i gab an o them Samaria. Kote rodan jon leske i kheer, kai nai atchell lo pral i rati.
I menshe an ko gab shunan, kai kamell lo an o foro Jerusalem te djal. Doleske lan jon les gar pash pende pre.
Har leskre mala, o Jakobo un o Johanni, kowa dikan, penan jon ap leste: "Rai, te kameh tu, mukah mer jag dran o bolepen tele te perell, hoi chatchrell len."
O Jesus risras pes trujal, un tchingras ap lende.
Un jon djan an i wawar gab.
Un har jon ap o drom his, penas i mursh ap o Jesuseste: "Me kamau tuha te djal, kai tu ninna djah."
Penas o Jesus ap leste: "I diwje djuklen hi i tchiben an i phub, kai sowenn le. Un i tchirklen hi i tikne khera ap i ruka. Me, o Menshengro Tchawo, man hi tchi, kai nai tchiwap man tele, te sowap."
Ap i wawar mursheste penas job: "Am mantsa!" Kowa penas: "Muk man khere te djal, te paskrap miro dades! Pal kowa djau tuha."
Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Muk kol mule pengre mulen te paskrell! Dja un pen i menshenge, kai o tsiro kanna kai hi, kai o Dewel kamell len dran o tchilatchepen te lell, un kamell lengro rai te well!"
Un i wawar mursh penas ap o Jesuseste: "Me kamaus te djap khere, te penap mire menshenge: Atchenn mo Debleha! Un palle kamoms tuha te djal."

Ap leste penas o Jesus: "Koon kamell o Debleske te budrell, un dikell ap wawar koowa, kowa budrella gar mishto o Debleske. Job hi har i hacho, kai budrell peskri kotar phub, un dikell pal peste. Leskri budi hi tchi moldo."
Pal kowa rodas o Jesus wawar efta-deesh murshen win. Un job bitchras len ap o drom glan peste, te djan le an i forja un gaba, kai job ninna wella. Hako kopo djan dui mursha khetne.

Un job penas ap lende: "Bud djob hi win tardo, te well lo an o kheer dre anlo. Jaake hi bud menshe koi, kai kamenn pash o Debleste te well. Un hi gar doha budepangre koi, te anenn le len pash leste. Doleske mangenn o Deblestar, te bitchrell lo budepangren, kai leske budrenna!
Djan kanna! Me bitchrau tumen har bakre mashkral kol diwje djuklende.
Lenn kek lowe peha, kek possita, un kek wawar tircha, har kolla, hoi ap tumare pire hi! Un atchenn gar ap o drom tardo, te rakrenn tumer jekeha!
Te wenn tumer an i kheer, rakrenn o Debleskri bacht pral kol menshende win!

Te hi i mensho kote, kai kamell koi bacht, hoi o Dewel an leskro dji della, ap koleste well o Debleskri bacht. Te kamell jek gar koi bacht, hoi o Dewel an leskro dji della, kowa lell o Debleskri bacht gar.
Atchenn an ko kheer, kai jon tumen pre lan! Chan un pijenn kowa, hoi jon tumen denna! Hako budepaskro lell peskro chapen kolendar, kolenge job budrella. Tumer hunte djan gar an jek kheer pal o wawar.
Te wenn tumer an i foro, un jon lenn tumen pre, chan, hoi jon tumen denna!
Krenn sasto kol nasselen, kai kote hi! Un penenn i menshenge: O tsiro well sik, kai lell o Dewel i menshen dran o tchilatchepen win."
Un job penas dureder: "Te wenn tumer an i foro, un jon lenn tumen gar an i kheer dre, palle djan win ap i dromma un penenn:
Ninna koi tchik dran tumaro foro, hoi ap mare pire hi, tchiwah mer tele. Kowa sikrell tumen, kai tumer kaman gar, te well o Dewel tumaro rai.
Me penau tumenge: Ap ko diwes, kai o Dewel o tchatchepen pral i tsele menshende ap i phub wi-rakrella, lenna kol menshe, kai lan tumen gar pre, i bareder phagi har kol menshe an o foro Sodom."

"Bibachtelo wenna tumer menshe an o foro Betsaida! Bibachtelo wenna tumer menshe an o foro Korazin! Te krals jek an i forja Tirus un Sidon sawo baro koowa an o Debleskri soor, har me pash tumende krom, riwans i menshe kote i gono trul pende, un beshans pen an i jagakri tchik, te sikrenn le, kai lengro tchilatchepen khaitell len. Un jon mukans pengro tchilatcho drom, un djans ap o Debleskro drom.
Ap ko diwes, kai rakrell o Dewel o tchatchepen pral i menshende win, djal kol menshenge an i forja Tirus un Sidon feteder har tumenge kate.
Un tumer menshe an o foro Kapernaum, patsenn tumer, kai wenn tumer an o bolepen hadedo? Na-a! Tumer wenna tele an o mulengro them witsedo."

Pale penas o Jesus ap peskre malende: "Koon ap tumende shunella, kowa shunella ap mande. Un koon tumen gar shunell kamella, kowa kamell man gar te shunell. Kowa, kai shunell gar ap mande, kowa shunell gar ap koleste, kai bitchras man."
Un kol efta-deesh wan pale pash o Jesuseste. Un jon his bachtelo, un penan leske: "Ninna i benga shunenn ap mende, te penah mer lenge an tiro lab: Djan dran i menshende win!"
Koi penas o Jesus ap peskre malende: "Me dikom o benges, har peras lo dran o bolepen har i jag.
Shunenn: Me dom tumen i soor pral o tselo bengeskri soor. Tumer stakrenna ap i sapa un ap i skorpione. Un kek nai dukrell tumen.
Awenn gar bachtelo, te shunenn i benga ap tumende! Awenn bachtelo, kai tumaro lab an o bolepen dre tchindlo hi!"

An ko tsiro das o Debleskro Ducho o Jesuses i bari bacht an o dji. Un job penas: "Tata, tu hal o rai pral o bolepen un i phub, un me sharau tut. Kowa, hoi tu kreh, sikral tu kolende, kai gar bud djinenna. Un kolla, kai gosewo hi un bud djinenna, kolla haiwenn kowa gar. Awa, jaake kamal tu kowa.
Lauter das miro dad an mire wasta. Un kek djinella, koon o tchawo hi, har kokres o dad. Un kokres o tchawo djinella, koon o dad hi. Un o tchawo sikrell o dades kolende, kai job win rodas."
Pal kowa penas o Jesus ap penkre malende kokres: "Bachtelo nai han tumer, kai tumer kowa lauter dikenna, hoi o Dewel krella.
Me penau tumenge: Bud Debleskre rakepangre un bare raja kaman te dikell, hoi tumer dikenna, un dikan les gar. Un jon kaman te shunell, hoi tumer shunenna, un shunan les gar."

His i diwes, koi was i biboldengro tchatchepaskro pash o Jesuseste. Un kowa putchas lestar tchomone, te djinell lo, har gosewo o Jesus hi. Un job putchas lestar: "Sikepaskro, hoi hunte krap me, te lap o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella?"
Penas o Jesus leske: "Hoi penell tuke o Debleskro lab? Hoi hi kote tchindlo?"
