Penas ko mursh: "Tu hunte kamess tiro Debles o tselo djijestar, an tiro tselo djipen, tiri tseli sorjaha, un an lauter, hoi tu djineh. Un ap koleste, kai pash tute hi, hunte wess jaake latches, har hal latches ap tute kokres."
Penas o Jesus leske: "Tiro hi tchatcho. Kre lauter jaake, un tu djiweh!"
Un ko mursheske his kowa, hoi o Jesus leske penas, gar doha, un job putchas pale: "Koon hi kolla lauter, kai pash mande hi, te wap latches ap lende?"

Un o Jesus penas ap leste: "I mursh was dran o foro Jerusalem, un kamas te djal an o foro Jericho. Un i tchorepangre peran pral leste, un dan les, un lan leske lauter krik, un mukan les paash-mulo tchiddo.
Ap ko tsiro djas i rashai ap ko drom. Har job kau murshes dikas, djas lo dureder.
Ninna i mursh, kai budrell an o Debleskro baro kheer, djas ap ko drom, un dikas kau murshes, un djas dureder.
Palle djas i mursh, kai was dran o them Samaria ap ko drom, kai ko mursh tchiddo hi. Un har dikas lo les, djas kowa leske phares an o dji.

Job djas pash leste, tchoras djet un mool kote, kai job dino un tchindlo was, un pandas laintikre kotja trujal. Palle hadas les lo ap peskro grai, un anas les an i kertchima, un dikas, kai well les sopaske un chapaske.
O wawar diwes taissarlake das lo dui rupene beme o rajeste an koi kertchima, un penas: De les chapen un pipen! Te hi kol lowe gar doha leske, dau tute budeder, te wau pale."
Un o Jesus putchas: "Hoi patseh, koon kol trinendar kras kowa ap koleste, kai dino un tchoredo was, hoi te kras mer ap kolende, kai pash mende hi?"
Penas o biboldengro tchatchepaskro ap leste: "Kowa, kai kras peskro dji leske pre." Pale penas o Jesus leske: "Dja, un kre kowa ninna jaake!"
Un o Jesus djas peskre malentsa dureder ap o drom. Un jon wan an i gab. Kote his i djuwel. Kolakro lab his Marta. Koja las les pash peste an o kheer dre.
Un kolat his i pheen. Koja kharas Maria. Joi beshas pes glan leskre pire, un shunas, hoi job penas.

I Marta kras peske bud budi, te dell li len te chal un te pijell. Joi djas pash o Jesuseste, un penas: "Rai, hi tuke kowa jek, kai miri pheen mukell man lauter kokres te krell? Pen lake, te budrell li mantsa!"
Koi penas o rai: "Marta, Marta, tu mareh tut tele, un kreh tuke bud budi.
Dell jek koowa, hoi bud moldo hi, un i Maria hatsas les. Kowa well latar gar krik lino."
Jek diwes, har o Jesus o Debleha rakras, penas jek peskre malendar ap leste: "Sike men, har te rakras o Debleha! Ninna o Johanni sikras peskre malende, har jon hunte rakrenn o Debleha."
Penas o Jesus ap peskre malende: "Te rakrenn o Debleha, penenn: Maro dad, tiro lab well sharedo. Te well ko tsiro sik, kai tu o rai hal pral i tseli phub!
De men maro hako diwes!
Un biste maro tchilatchepen, hoi mer kram! Un ninna mer bistrah o tchilatchepen, hoi i wawar ap mende kran. Ma muk men tiro dromestar tele te djal!"
Un job penas ap lende: "Te hi jekes tumendar i maal, un kowa djal mashkral an i rati pash leste un penell: Kamlo maal, pats man triin mare!
I maal mandar was pash mande. Un man hi tchi an o kheer, hoi nai dau les te chal.
Penals lo ap leste: Tchawa, ma de kek sau gole! O wudar hi klidedo. Un mire tchawe un me hom an o tchiben. Me nai stau gar pre, te dap tut tchomone te chal.

Me penau tumenge: Job stell pre un dell les jaake bud, har ko wawares hunte well. Kowa krell lo gar doleske, kai hi o wawar leskro maal. Kowa krell lo doleske, kai mangas les o wawar jaake bud un mukas gar tele.
Doleske penau tumenge: Mangenn o Debles! Un o Dewel dell tumen! Rodenn les! Un tumer hatsenn les. Denn ap o wudar! Un o wudar well tumenge pre kerdo.
Koon mangella, kowa lella. Koon rodella, kowa hatsella. Un koon ap o wudar della, koleske well pre kerdo.
"Mashkral tumende hi kek mursh, kai dell peskro tchawes i sap, te mangas job lestar i matcho.
Witar gar dell kek dad peskro tchawes i skorpiono, te mangas job lestar i jaro.
Ninna te han tumer tchilatche menshe, denn tumer tumare tchawen latcho koowa. Har bud budeder dell tumaro dad an o bolepen peskro Ducho kolende, kai les mangenna."

His i diwes, koi tradas o Jesus i benges wi dran i mursheste, kai nai rakras gar. Har ko beng dran leste win djas, nai rakras ko mursh pale. Un kol bud menshe, kai trul lende tardo his, kran bare jaka.
Mashkral lende his sawe, kai penan: "O pralstuno beng das les koi soor. Doleske nai tradell job kol bengen wi."
Wawar kaman lestar i baro Debleskro koowa te dikell, te sikrell lo, kai o Dewel les bitchras.
O Jesus djinas, hoi an lengro shero trujal djala, un penas ap lende: "Te kurenn pen i bare raja an jek them, palle djal ko them paash, un i tsele khera perenn khetne.
Te tradell o beng i wawar benges wi, djal leskri soor paash. Tumer penan mange, kai me tradau i bengen dran o bengeskri soor win.
Putchau tumendar: Me te tradau i bengen dran o bengeskri soor win, har nai tradenn tumare menshe len win? Well i diwes, kai jon penenn tumenge, kai kowa gar tchatcho hi, hoi tumer pral mande rakran.
Na-a, me tradau i bengen dran o Debleskri soor win. Ap kowa dikenn tumer, kai ko tsiro was, kai o Dewel i menshen dran o tchilatchepen win lella, un leskri soor mank tumende hi.
Te dell i sorelo mursh garda ap peskro baro kheer, un les hi i charo an o wast, nai tchorell leske i wawar tchi.
Jek te well, kai hi sorleder har job, un dell les khetne, palle lell lo leskro charo krik, hoi leskri soor his un lell kowa, hoi ko wawar tchoras un dell les ninna i wawarende.
Koon hi gar ap miri rig, kowa hi ap ko wawareskri rig. Un koon anell gar mantsa i menshen pash o Debleste, kowa tradell len o Deblestar."

"Te djas i beng dran i mensheste win, nashell job an i them trujal, kai kek djipen hi, un rodell peske, kai atchell job nai. Job te hatsell tchi, penell lo ap peste: Me kamau pale an miro kheer te djal, dran hoi me win djom.
Un te well lo pale, hi ko kheer djudjo un shukar.
Koi rodell lo peske wawar efta bengen, kai hi tchilatcheder har job. Un kol benga djan an ko mensheste dre, un djiwenn an leste. Jaake hi ko mensheha djungleder har glan ko tsiro."
Bud menshe his trul o Jesuseste tardo. Un har job kowa penas, das i djuwel gole: "Bachteli hi koi dai, kolatar tu boldo wal!"
Koi penas lo: "Bachtele hi kolla, kai ap o Debleskro lab shunenna, un kowa ninna krenna, hoi o Dewel penella."

Un budeder menshe wan pash leste, un his trul leste tardo. Un job penas: "Har tchilatcho hi kol menshe, kai djiwenn an kau tsiro! Jon kamenn i baro Debleskro koowa te dikell. Un o Dewel sikrell len tchi wawar har kowa, hoi i menshe ninna ap o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jona, dikan.
Jaake har i menshe an o foro Ninive dikan, te was o Jona bitchedo o Deblestar, jaake dikenna i menshe an kau tsiro, te was o Menshengro Tchawo o Deblestar bitchedo.

Ap ko diwes, kai rakrell o Dewel o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende, stella ninna i bari rani dran o foro Saba pre. Un joi penella, te hi kol menshe tchilatcho, kai kanna djiwenna. Glan i raha tsiro, was joi dran i dur them, un was pash o baro rai Salomo, te shunell li leskre gosewe laba. Kawa, kai glan tumende tardo hi, kawa hi bareder har o baro rai Salomo.

Ap ko tsiro, kai rakrell o Dewel o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende ap i phub, stenna ninna i menshe dran o foro Ninive pre. Un jon penenna, te hi kal menshe, kai kanna djiwenna, tchilatcho. Glan raha tsiro penas o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jona, i menshenge an o foro Ninive o Debleskro lab. Un jon mukan pengro tchilatcho drom, un djan ap o Debleskro drom. Kawa, kai glan tumende tardo hi, kawa hi bareder har o Jona."
"Kek krell i momeli an, un khatrell lat, witar gar tchiwell lo lat tel i piri. Job tchiwell lat pral, te dikell nai hakeno, kai dre wella.

O mensheskro jak hi har i momeli an i kheer. Te dikeh kokres ap o Debleste, hi kowa jaake, har te chatchell koi momeli mishto. Te dikeh ap wawar koowa un gar ap o Debleste, hi kowa jaake, har te chatchell kek momeli an kau kheer.
Doleske penau tuke: De garda, te chatchell tiri momeli un well gar win kerdo!
Te chatchell i momeli an o tselo kheer, un tchi atchella an o tamlepen, palle hi kowa jaake, har te dikenn le i momeli dran hake walja."
Har o Jesus jaake rakras, was i Farisari pash leste un mangas lestar, te well job pash leste, te chal lo leha khetne. Un o Jesus djas leha an leskro kheer, un beshas pes tele, te chal lo.
Har ko Farisari dikas, te thowas o Jesus gar peskre wasta glan o chapen, har biboldengro koowa hi, kras job bare jaka.
Koi penas o Jesus ap leste: "Tumer Farisarja, tumer thowenn tumare khore un tchare wrijal. Un tumaro dji hi pherdo tchorepen un tchilatchepen.
Tumer haiwan tchi! O Dewel, kai kras o tselo menshes, kras ninna leskro dji.
Denn i tchorwelende kowa, hoi tumen an tumare khore un tchare dren hi! Un tchi hi tumenge pale-tchiddo.

Tumer Farisarja, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto. Tumer denna o Debleske o deshto kotar tumaro tselo senlepastar, hoi an tumari baar hi, un tumer bistrenn o tchatchepen un o Debleskro kamlepen. Kawa hunte krenn, un ko wawar gar mukenn!

Tumer Farisarja, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto. Tumer kamenn ap i pralstune beshepangre an i biboldengri kangri te beshell. Un tumer kamenn, te penenn i menshe ap o drom: Latcho diwes, mo rai, ap tumende.
Tumer Farisarja, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto. Tumer han har i handako, hoi tele an i phub hi. Un i menshe djan pral wergal, un djinenn gar, kai i mule koi paskedo hi."
Koi penas i biboldengro tchatchepaskro: "Sikepaskro, te peneh tu kal laba, praasseh tu men ninna."

Koi penas o Jesus: "Tumer tchatchepangre, tumer krenna, hoi gar mishto hi. Tumer krenn i menshenge o djipen pharo. Ko tselo koowa, hoi jon hunte rikrenn, hi har i pharo gono ap lengri phik. Un tumer rikrenn tumen gar ap kowa.
Tumer Farisarja, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto. Tumer krenn shukar mulengre khera kolenge, kai his o Debleskre rakepangre. Kolen maran tumare phure.
Jaake penenn tumer: Awa, mer djinah, hoi mare phure kran. Kowa his mishto. Me penau tumenge: Jon maran o Debleskre rakepangren. Un tumer krenn kolenge i mulengre khera.

O Dewel djinas kowa. Doleske penas lo glan i raha tsiro: Me bitchrau mire rakepangren un mire bitchepangren pash lende. Un mashkral lende hi sawe mursha, kai wenn lendar maredo, un wawar wenn palla lino.
Doleske well i tseli bibacht ap kal menshende, kai kanna djiwenna. Jon un lengre phure maran i Debleskre rakepangren, jaake raha har i phub tardo hi.

O Abel was maredo glan i tsele wawar menshende. Pal leste maran le wawar menshen pale te pale. Pal lauterende wawarende was o Zachari maredo. Kowa was maredo pash i sasterni chapaskri an o Debleskro baro kheer. Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: I tseli bibacht well ap kal menshende, kai kanna djiwenna.

Tumer tchatchepangre, hoi tumer krenna, ko hi gar mishto. Tumer lan o klidepaskro krik, hoi krell o wudar ap o Debleskro drom pre. Tumer djan gar ap ko drom. Un kolla, kai kamenn ap o Debleskro drom te djal, mukenn tumer gar koi pre."
Un har o Jesus djas peske, lan les i tchatchepangre un i Farisarja chojedo palla, un putchan soreles lestar bud koowa.
Un jon dan jak ap hako lab lestar, te nai taprenn le les leskre labentsa.

Ap ko tsiro wan bud serja menshe khetne, jaake te stakras jek o wawareske ap i pire. Koi penas o Jesus ap peskre malende, gar ap kol wawarende: Denn garda, te rakrenn gar dui tchipjentsa har i Farisarja! Kowa hi har shutlo jarro, hoi krell o tselo jarro shutlo.
Well o diwes, kai well kowa diklo, hoi kanna khatedo hi. Well o diwes, kai djinell hakeno kowa, hoi kanna kek djinella.
Djinenn! Well o diwes, kai shunell hakeno, hoi tumer tchorchanes rakran. Un kowa, hoi tumer pal o pandlo wudar i wawareske an o kand penan, kowa penenn le bari goljaha ap o drom.
Tumer han mire mala, un me penau tumenge: Ma trashenn i menshendar. Jon nai marenn tumen. Budeder har kowa nai krenn le gar.

Me kamau tumen te sikrell, konestar hunte tchatchepaha trashenn: Trashenn kolestar, kai les i soor hi, te witsrell lo jekes pal o merepen an o bengeskri jag! Awa, kowa penau tumenge: Kolestar trashenn!
Pantch tikne tchirkle hi glan i menshende gar budeder moldo har dui beme. Glan o Debleste hi kek lendar bistedo.
Ninna djinell o Dewel kitse balla ap tumaro shero hi. Doleske ma darenn! Tumer molenna budeder har bud tchirkle.
Me penau tumenge: Koon glan i menshende penella: O Jesus hi miro rai! kolestar penau me glan o Debleskre bolepangre: Job hi miro.
Koon man buchoste della glan i menshende, koles dau me ninna buchoste glan o Debleskre bolepangre.

Koon djungele laba pral o Menshengro Tchaweste penella, koleske nai bistrell o Dewel kol laba, hoi job penas. Koon praassell o Debleskro Duches, koleske nai bistrell o Dewel kol laba gar, hoi job penas.
Te anenn i menshe tumen glan i tchatchepangre un glan i rajende un pralstunende, ma darenn, hoi tumer hunte rakrenna.
O Debleskro Ducho sikrell tumen ap ko tsiro, hoi tumer hunte penenna.
Jek kol bud menshendar, kai kote khetne hi, penas ap o Jesuseste: "Sikepaskro, pen miro phraleske, te dell job mande miro kotar dran ko brawlepen, hoi maro dad menge mukas, har job meras!"
Penas o Jesus ap koleste: "Romeha, kowa hi gar miri budi."
Palle penas o Jesus ap kolende, kai trul leste tardo hi: "Denn garda! Ma nashenn bud brawlepen palla! O tselo brawlepen, hoi i mensho khetne anas, krell o mensheskro djipen gar braweles."
Un o Jesus penas lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi. Un job penas: "His i brawelo hacho. Ap leskro kotar phub was bud djob baro.
Un ko brawelo penas ap peste: Hoi krap kanna? Djinau gar, kai anau nai o tselo djob dre.
Un job penas: Kanna djinau, hoi krap. Me phagau mire khera tele, kai miro djob dren hi, un krau len bareder. Kote dre tchiwau miro tselo djob un o wawar latcho koowa, hoi anom khetne.
Un me nai penau ap mande: Kowa krom mishto. Kanna hi man bud bersha latcho koowa o djipaske un budrap buder gar. Me chau un pijau un krau miro djipen mange mishto.
O Dewel penell ap leste: Tu dinelo! Kai rat hunte meress tu. Koon lell tiro tselo brawlepen, hoi tu tuke khetne anal?"
O Jesus penas dureder: "Jaake djal koleske, kai anas peske bud brawlepen khetne, un hi tchorwelo glan o Debleste."
Un o Jesus penas peskre malenge: "Doleske penau tumenge: Ma darenn tumaro djipaske! Ma darenn, te well tumen tchi te chal, witar gar, te well tumen tchi an-ripaske!
O djipen hi budeder moldo har o chapen. Un o mensho hi budeder moldo har o ripen.

Dikenn ap i korakende! Jon tchiwenna kek djob an i phub, te well lo baro. Witar gar anenn le o baro djob dre. Len hi kek khera, kai nai anenn le o djob khetne. O Dewel dell len te chal. Un tumer han budeder moldo har i tchirkle!
Kek tumendar nai tchiwell jek diwes budeder pash peskro djipen pashal!
Na-a, sawo tikno koowa nai krenn tumer gar. Hoske trashenn tumer, te well tumen gar doha djipaske?
Dikenn, har ap o senlepen shukar blume baro wenna! Jon budrenna gar, un krenn penge kek ripja. O baro rai Salomo an peskro tselo railepen his gar jaake shukar an-rido, har jek lendar.
O Dewel kras o senlepen jaake shukar, hoi kau diwes win tardo hi, un o wawar diwes an o bob witsedo wella. Kitse kope budeder dell job tumen an-ripaske. Har tikno hi tumaro patsepen!
Ma darenn, hoi tumer taissar chana un pijenna!
Kowa krenn kol menshe, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar. Tumaro dad an o bolepen djinella, hoi tumen hunte well djipaske.
Dikenn koi pre, te krenn o Debleskri budi! Un job dell tumen lauter, hoi tumen hunte well djipaske.
Ma darenn! Kate han tumer gar bud un gar an-diklo. O Dewel, kai hi tumaro dad an o bolepen, kowa kamella, te lenn tumer leskro brawlepen un railepen.

Bikrenn, hoi tumen hi! Denn kol lowe i tchorwelende! Palle hi kowa jaake, har te krenn tumen i lowengro gono, hoi gar paash djala! Jaake krenn tumenge i baro brawlepen, hoi nashrenn nai gar. Kowa hi an o bolepen, kai kek tchorepaskro tumaro koowa hatsella, un kek kerme les nai pre chan!
Kote, kai tumaro brawlepen hi, kote hi ninna tumaro dji."
"Awenn hako tsiro mange koi! Un mukenn gar tumari momeli win te djal!
Awenn har menshe, kai gar sowenna, te well lengro rai i bijabestar pale! Te dell job ap o wudar, nai krenn le leske sik pre.
Bachtele hi kol budepangre, kai sowenn gar, te well lengro rai pale. Me penau tumenge: O rai penell lenge, te beshenn le pen tele, te chan le. Un job pandell peske i damedira trujal, un hi lenge koi.
Te well job mashkral an i rat, un jon sowenn gar, hi lengri bacht baro.
Kowa hunte haiwenn tumer: Te djinals kowa, kai ap o kheer jak della, ko tsiro, kai ko dre-phagepaskro wella, nai phagals kowa gar pash leste dre.
Doleske penau tumenge: Ma sowenn! Denn jak! Me, o Menshengro Tchawo, wau pale an i tsiro, kai tumer gar djinenna."
O Petro penas: "Rai, hi kowa, hoi tu kate peneh, menge kokres? Peneh tu kowa i tsele menshenge?"

Penas o Jesus: "I latcho budepaskro della mishto garda ap peskro rajeskro kheer, un sowella gar. Leskro rai das peskre tsele budepangren an leskre wasta. Un ko latcho budepaskro dell lende hako diwes kowa, hoi len hunte wella djipaske.
Bachtelo hi job, te well peskro rai pale un dikell, kai job peskri budi mishto kras.
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Leskro rai dell peskro tselo brawlepen an leskre wasta."
"Ko budepaskro, te penell lo ap peste: Miro rai well gar jaake sik pale, un job dell kol wawar budepangren dawa, un chal un pijell pes mato,
palle well leskro rai pale ap i tsiro, kai ko budepaskro gar patsell, te well job. Ap jek kopo hi job koi, un dell ko budepaskres khetne, un anell les kote, kai kolla hi, kai gar ap leste patsenna.
Ko budepaskro, kai djinella, hoi peskro rai lestar kamella, un krell kowa gar, kowa lell bud dawa.

Koon kowa krella, hoi gar mishto hi, un djinell kowa gar, lell gar bud dawa. Koon bud o Deblestar las, kolestar kamell job, te krell lo peskri budi mishto. Un kones bud soor un goswepen dino was, kolestar kamell o Dewel, te budrell lo gomme feteder."
"Me wom, te witsrap i jag ap i phub. Kamoms te chatchals koi jag.
Glan mande hi i pharo tsiro. Ap mande wenna bare duka. Kamoms, te well ko tsiro pal mande."
"Me wom gar ap kai phub, te lap o tchingepen krik. Na-a! Me penau tumenge: Mantsa well o tchingepen.
Kanna well o tchingepen an i kheer, kai djiwenn pantch menshe khetne. Triin hi chojedo ap dujende. Un dui hi chojedo ap trinende.

O dad well chojedo ap peskro tchaweste. Un o tchawo well chojedo ap peskro dadeste. I dai well chojedo ap peskri tchate. Un i tchai well chojedo ap peskri date. O romeskri dai well chojedo ap o tchaweskri romjate. Un o tchaweskri romni well chojedo ap o romeskri date."
Pale penas o Jesus ap kol bud menshende, kai pash leste his: "Te well o bolepen tamlo ap koi rig, kai o baro pani hi, penenn tumer: Kanna dell brishin. Un kowa well jaake.
Un te phurdell i sorelo ducho dran ko tato mulo them, palle penenn tumer: Kanna well tato. Un tumaro hi tchatcho.
Tumen hi dui djia! Tumer dikenn ap i phub un ap o bolepen un djinenn, hoi wella. Hoske nai haiwenn gar, hoi an kau tsiro glan tumare jaka lauter djala.
Hoske nai dikenn tumer gar, hoi o tchatchepen hi?

Te hal tu an o tchingepen jekeha, un hal leha ap o drom pash o tchatchepaskro, palle dik, te wenn tumer pale mishto khetne jaake raha, har hal tu leha ap o drom, te nai dell job tut gar an o tchatchepaskro wast! Un kowa dell tut an o klisteskro wast. Un kowa witsrell tut an o stilepen.
Me penau tuke: Tu weh gar dran o stilepen win jaake raha, har tu plaissral gar tiri tseli sijaan."

An ko tsiro wan menshe pash o Jesuseste, un penan leske kol murshendar dran o them Galilea, kai an o Debleskro baro kheer fichen o Debleske maran. Un o Pilato maras kol menshen. Un o menshengro rat un o fichengro rat was lauter khetne.
Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Un kanna putchenn tumer mandar: His kol menshe tchilatcheder har kol wawar an o them Galilea, kai wan jon jaake maredo?
Na-a, penau me tumenge. Tumer te mukenn gar tumaro tchilatcho drom, un djan ap o Debleskro drom, palle wenna tumer lauter ninna jaake maredo.
Hoi hi kol menshentsa, kai ko baro kheer an o gab Siloah ap lende peras un jon meran? Hi kol menshe tchilatcheder har kol wawar an o foro Jerusalem, kai koi djiwan?
Na-a, penau me tumenge. Te mukenn tumer gar tumaro tchilatcho drom, un djan ap o Debleskro drom, palle wenna tumer lauter ninna jaake maredo."
Un o Jesus penas lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi. Un penas: "I murshes his i faigetikro ruk an peskro baar tardo. Un job was bud kope, un rodas faige ap ko ruk un hatsas kek.
Koi penas job ap koleste, kai dell garda ap ko baar: Triin bersha wom me kanna kai, un rodom faige ap kau ruk, un hatsom kek. De les tele! Ko ruk hi tchitcheske kate tardo.
Penas o wawar: Rai, muk les kau bersh tardo! Me hadau i phub trul koleste pre, un tchiwau grajengro ful trul leste, te well lo feteder.
Un te hidjell ko ruk an o wawar bersh faige, kowa hi mishto. Te hidjell lo tchi, de les tele!"
His i Debleskro diwes, koi his o Jesus an i biboldengri kangri un penas i menshenge o Debleskro lab.
Mank kol menshende his i djuwel, koja his deesh-te-ochta bersha nasselo. I beng, kai an late was, kras lat bango. Un joi nai hadas pes gar pre.
Har o Jesus lat dikas, das job lat pash peste gole, un penas ap late: "Romnija, tu hal kanna sasto."
Un job tchiwas peskre wasta ap late. Koi hadas pes li pre, un sharas o Debles.

Koi choiras pes ko pralstuno an i biboldengri kangri, kai o Jesus koi djuwjat ap o Debleskro diwes sasto kras. Un kowa penas ap i menshende: "Mer hunte budras shob diwessa. Awenn an kolla diwessa, te mukenn tumen sasto te krell, un gar ap o Debleskro diwes!"

Penas o Jesus ap koleste: "Tumen hi dui djia! Tumer krenn har te krans kek budi ap o Debleskro diwes. Hakeno tumendar pandell peskri grumni un peskri esla tele, un anell len pash o pani ap o Debleskro diwes.
Kate hi kai djuwel, kai patsell ap o Debleste jaake, har o Abraham kowa kras: Un joi his deesh-te-ochta bersha o bengestar pandlo. Hoske te well li gar ap o Debleskro diwes sasto kerdo?"
Har job kowa penas, ladjan lauter, kai chojedo ap leste his. Un kol bud wawar, kai kote tardo hi, his bachtelo pral ko tselo railo koowa, hoi o Jesus kras.
Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Me penau tumenge kanna, har kowa hi, te dell o Dewel i menshen pash peste gole, te djan le ap leskro drom.
Kowa hi jaake: I mursh tchiwas i tikno senftikro djob an i phub. Un dran ko tikno djob was i baro ruk. Un i tchirkle djiwan ap leste."
Un o Jesus penas pale: "Me penau tumenge kanna, har kowa hi, te dell o Dewel i menshen pash peste gole, te djan le ap leskro drom.
Kowa hi jaake: I djuwel las i tikno kotar shutlo jarro, un tchiwas les mashkral an i baro tcharo parno jarro. Un ko tikno kotar shutlo jarro kras ko tselo jarro shutlo."
Un o Jesus djas dureder ap ko drom, hoi djas an o foro Jerusalem. Un job was an i gaba un i forja, un sikras i menshende o Debleskro drom.
Un i mursh putchas lestar: "Rai, pen menge: Lell o Dewel bud menshen an o bolepen, te djiwenn le pash leste?"
Un o Jesus penas pale: "Krenn lauter, te djan an ko tikno wudar dre! Me penau tumenge: Bud kamenn an ko wudar dre te djal. Un haiwenn kowa gar.
Te stell o rai pral o kheer pre un krell o wudar pandlo, palle han tumer win tardo, un tumer denn gole: Rai, kre menge o wudar pre! Un ko rai penella: Me prindjrau tumen gar.
Koi penenn tumer: Mer cham un pijam tuha. Un tu penal menge o Debleskro lab ap i dromma an mare forja.
Koi penell job ap tumende: Me prindjrau tumen gar. Djan mandar, tumer tchilatche!
Te han tumer win tardo un dikenn, kai o Abraham, un o Isaak, un o Jakob, un kol tsele Debleskre rakepangre pash o Debleste an o bolepen hi, rowenn tumer. Un tumer dandrenn i danda i dukatar khetne.
Dran hako them wenna i menshe pash o Debleste an o bolepen khetne, un beshenn pen tele, te chan le.
Un bud, kai kanna palla tardo hi, kolla hi ap ko diwes glan tardo. Un bud, kai kanna glan tardo hi, kolla hi ap ko diwes palla tardo."
Ap kau tsiro har o Jesus kowa penas, wan Farisarja pash leste un penan: "Dja tuke! Khate tut! O Herodes kamell tut te marell."
Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Djan un penenn ko tchilatcho mursheske: Kau diwes un taissar tradau i bengen wi, un krau i menshen sasto. Un pal triin diwessa hi miro tselo koowa kerdo.
Kau diwes, taissar, un o diwes koi pre hunte djap miro drom, te wap an o foro Jerusalem. Kowa djal gar, te well i Debleskro rakepaskro win glan o foro Jerusalem maredo."

"Tumer menshe an o foro Jerusalem! Tumer maran o Debleskre rakepangren, un dan kolen i barentsa mulo, kai o Dewel pash tumende bitchras. Bud kope kamom tumen pash mande te lell, te dap garda ap tumende, har i kachni ap peskre tarnende garda della, un lell len tel peskre phora. Un tumer kaman gar.

Doleske mukell o Dewel peskro kheer pash tumende un djiwell buder gar koi. Un me penau tumenge: Tumer dikenn man jaake raha buder gar, bis te was ko tsiro, kai tumer penenna: Sharedo well kowa, kai hi o Deblestar bitchedo!"
His i Debleskro diwes, koi djas o Jesus pash i pralstuno Farisari an o kheer te chal. Un kol menshe kote lan les an o jak.
Kote his i mursh, kai his shuwlo ap i herja un ap i mussja.
Un o Jesus penas ap i tchatchepangre un ap i Farisarja: "Nai krau menshen sasto ap o Debleskro diwes pal o biboldengro tchatchepen?"
Jon penan tchi koi pre. Koi tchiwas o Jesus peskro wast ap ko mursheste, kras les sasto, un mukas les te djal.

Palle penas lo ap kolende, kai kote beshdo hi: "Te hi jekes tumendar i tchawo un kowa perell an o pani dre, tsardenn les tumer gar win, ninna ap o Debleskro diwes? Te hi jekes tumendar i grumni un koja perell an o pani dre, tsardenn lat tumer gar win, ninna ap o Debleskro diwes?"
Un jon nai penan tchi koi pre.
Un o Jesus dikas, har kolla, kai an o kheer dre wan, penge i feteder beshepangre win rodan. Doleske penas lo lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi, un penas:
"Te penell jek ap tute: Am ap i bijab! palle besh tut gar ap o feteder beshepaskro kote! Nai well jek mursh, kai hi bareder har tu.
Un palle well kowa pash tute, kai penas, te wess ap i bijab, un penell ap tute: Muk koles kate te beshell, un besh tut kote tele! Un tu hunte leh ko telstuno beshepaskro, un tut hi i bari ladj.

Tu te djah ap i bijab, palle besh tut ap o telstuno beshepaskro! Un kowa, kai kamas, te djah tu ap peskri bijab, wella pash tute un penella: Miro maal, besh tut ap i feteder beshepaskro! Un lauter, kai kote ap i bijab hi, dikenn, kai tu i an-diklo mursh hal.
Koon pes baro krella, koles sharell o Dewel gar. Koon pes gar baro krella, un penella: Me molau tchi, koles krell o Dewel baro."

Un o Jesus penas ap koleste, kai kamas, te chal lo leha: "Te kreh tu i baro chapen, palle ma khare tire malen un phralen pash tute, witar gar brawele menshe, kai an tiro drom djiwenna! Kolla len tut ninna pash pende pre, un jaake denn le tut pale, hoi tu lenge kral.
Te kameh tu i baro chapen te krell, palle le kol tchorwelen pash tute pre, ninna kolen, kai bango hi, kolen, kai nashenn nai gar, un kolen, kai korelo hi, un de len te chal!
Te kreh tu kowa, hal tu bachtelo! Kol menshe nai denn tut tchi pale. Te krell o Dewel kol mulen djido, kai kran, hoi job kamas, palle dell lo tut kowa lauter pale, hoi tu lenge kral."
Pash i chapaskri his i mursh beshdo. Har kowa shunas, hoi o Jesus rakras, penas lo ap o Jesuseste: "Bachtelo hi kowa, kai chal o maro pash o Debleste an o bolepen."
Koi penas o Jesus leske: "I mursh kras i baro chapen, un mukas bud menshen te penell, te wenn le pash o chapen.
Un ap ko tsiro, kai job kamas pes tele te beshell, bitchras lo i budepaskres pash lende, te penell lo: Awenn! Chapen un pipen hi lauter koi.
Jek pal o wawar penan, te nai wan le gar. Ko jek penas: Me ginom i kotar phub, un me djap koi un dikap, har kowa wi-dikella. Me nai wau gar.
Ko duito penas: Me ginom deesh grumja, un djau kanna kote, te dikap, har jon wi-dikenna. Me nai wau gar.
Ko triinto penas: Me romedinerom. Doleske nai wau gar.

Ko budepaskro was pale, un penas lauter peskro rajeske. Koi was ko rai an i bari choli, un penas ap koleste: Dja ap i tsele dromma an o foro! Aan kol tchorwelen, kol bangen, kol korelen un kolen, kai nai nashenn gar, pash mande!
Un pal i tsiro was o budepaskro pale un penas: Me krom, hoi tu penal. O kheer hi gar pherdo.
Un ko rai penas ap koleste: Dja win ap i dromma glan o foro un pash i burra ap o them, kai menshe beshdo hi, un pen lenge, te wenn le pash mande. Rake lenge an o dji, te well miro kheer pherdo!
Me penau tumenge: Kolenge, kai mukom glan i tsiro te penell, te wenn le pash miro chapen, un kai kaman gar pash mande te well, kolendar mukau kekes an miro kheer dre te well, te chal lo mantsa."
Har o Jesus ap o drom djas, his bud menshe trul leste. Un job dikas ap lende un penas:
"Koon pash mande wella, un kamell peskro dades, peskri dat, peskri romjat, peskre tchawen, peskre phralen, peskre phenjen, un peskro djipen budeder har man, kowa nai well gar miro maal.
Koon lell gar peskro trushel ap peste un djal mantsa, nai well gar miro maal.
Te kamell jek tumendar i baro kheer te krell, hunte dikell lo, te hi les doha lowe.
Te tchiwell lo nai kokres i telstune barra, palle san i tsele menshe pral leste.
Un jon penenn: Ko mursh kamas i kheer te krell. Un kanna nai krell lo les gar dureder.

Te kamell i baro rai an o kurepen te djal i wawar baro rajeha, hunte putchell lo pestar: Hom me sorelo doha mire deesh serja lurdentsa, te kurap man ko wawar baro rajeha, kai biish serja lurde pash leste hi?
Te hi lo gar sorelo doha, bitchrell lo murshen pash o wawar baro rajeste jaake raha, har kowa gomme dur lestar hi, un mangell les, te djal kek kurepen.
Doleske penau tumenge: Kek tumendar nai well miro maal, te dell job gar lauter pre, hoi les hi."
"O loon hi mishto. Te nashras o loon peskri soor, hi lo buder gar mishto. Un tu nai kreh buder tchi, te well lo pale londo.
Ko loon molell tchi buder. Tu nai witsreh les krik. Lenn kowa ap tumaro dji, hoi me tumenge penaua!"
His i diwes, kai wan bud bibolde pash o Jesuseste, te shunenn le les. Kolla his sawe, kai lenn i biboldendar lowe i Remarjenge dre, un bud wawar, kai tchilatcho koowa kran un doleske pale-tchidde hi.
Kol Farisarja un i biboldengre tchatchepangre his chojemen pral o Jesuseste un penan: "Kau mursh lell i pale-tchidde pash peste pre, un chal lentsa."
Koi penas o Jesus lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi, un penas:
"Te hi jekes tumendar sheel bakre, un jek lendar djal nashedo, palle mukell lo kol wawaren tardo, un rodell ko jekes jaake raha, te hatsell lo les.
Un te hatsell lo koles, lell lo les ap i phik, un hi bachtelo.
Un te well lo khere, penell lo peskre malenge un kol wawarenge, kai trul leste djiwenna: Awenn bachteles mantsa! Me hatsom ko bakres pale, hoi his nashedo."

Palle penas o Jesus lenge: "Me penau tumenge: Pral ko jek tchilatcho, kai mukas peskro tchilatcho drom un djal ap o Debleskro drom, pral koleste hi bareder bacht an o bolepen, har pral kol wawarende, kai patsenna, te nai atchenn le ap pengro drom."
Te hi i djuwjat deesh rupene beme, un nashrell jek, krell li i momeli an, un rodell koi bema an o tselo kheer jaake raha, bis te hatsell li lat.
Un te hatsell li koi rupeni bema, dell li peskre malen gole un kol wawaren, kai pash late djiwenna, un penella: Awenn bachtelo mantsa! Me hatsom miri rupeni bema, kai nashrom.
Me penau tumenge ninna: O Debleskre bolepangre hi bachtelo pral jekeste, kai mukell peskro tchilatcho drom un djal ap o Debleskro drom.
Un o Jesus penas: I murshes his dui tchawe.
Ko tarneder penas ap peskro dadeste: De man kanna kowa, hoi me lau pal tiro merepen! Un o dad das hakenes peskro kotar.
Pal i tikno tsiro las ko tarneder tchawo peskro tselo brawlepen, un djas an i wawar them, djiwas i shukar djipen, un das peskro tselo brawlepen win.
Har les his buder tchi, was i bari bok pral ko them un les his buder tchi te chal.
Koi djas lo pash i hacho un rodas i budi. Kowa bitchras les pash i balende, te dell job garda ap lende.
Les his bari bok un kamas ninna kowa te chal, hoi i bale chana. Kowa kamas kek les te dell.
Un job penas ap peste: Miro dades hi bud budepangre. Kolen hi bud te chal, un me merau kate i bokatar.
Me kamau pash miro dadeste te djal, te penap: Tata, me krom i tchilatcho koowa, kai me djom tutar un o Deblestar krik.
Me hom gar moldo, te atchap tiro tchawo. Le man pash tute pre, te wap tiro budepaskro!
Un job stas pre, un djas pash peskro dadeste pale. Har leskro dad les dural dikas, khaitas o tchawo les. Un o dad nashas pash leste, tapras les trujal, un tchumras les.
Koi penas o tchawo ap leste: Tata, me krom i tchilatcho koowa, kai me djom tutar un o Deblestar krik. Un me hom gar moldo, te atchap tiro tchawo.
Koi penas o dad ap peskre budepangre: Anenn sik o feteder ripen, un riwenn kowa leske an! Denn les i gustrin un denn les kircha!
Anenn i tarni thuli grumni! Marenn lat, te chas un was bachtelo!
Tchatchepaha, miro tchawo his mulo, un was djido. Job his nashedo un was pale. Un jon wan lauter bachtelo.
Ko phureder tchawo budras win ap i kotar phub. Har job khere djas un pash o kheer was, shunas lo bashepen un khelepen.
Un job das i budepaskres gole, un putchas lestar, hoi kote djas.
Kowa penas: Tiro phraal was sasto pale. Doleske maras tiro dad i tarni thuli grumjat leske.
Koi was job chojedo, un kamas gar an o kheer te djal. Un leskro dad djas win, un mangas les, te well lo an o kheer dre.
Un ko tchawo penas ap peskro dadeste: Tu djineh, kai me bud bersha tuke budrom, un krom lauter, hoi tu mange penal. Mange maral tu kek bakro, te chap les mire malentsa, un te wap bachtelo.
Tiro tchawo, kai was kanna pale khere, kowa, kai das tire lowe win i lubjentsa, koleske maral tu i tarni thuli grumni.
Koi penas o dad ap leste: Miro tchawo, tu hal hako tsiro pash mande, un hoi miro hi, kowa hi ninna tiro.
Mer hunte was bachtelo. Tiro phraal his mulo un was djido. Job his nashedo un hatsas pale khere.
O Jesus penas ninna ap peskre malende: "His i brawelo mursh. Koles his i budepaskro, kai chochas les un das leskro brawlepen win. Har ko brawelo kowa shunas,
mukas lo les gole te dell, un penas ap leste: Hoi shunom me pral tute? Sike mande kol lila, hoi dre tchindlo hi, har bud lowe tu dre lal! Tu nai deh buder gar ap miro brawlepen garda!
Un ko budepaskro penas ap peste: Te nai budrau buder gar miro rajeske, hoi te krap me kanna? Me nai budrau gar win ap i kotar phub. Un te hunte mangap, ladjau man.
Me djinau kanna, hoi te krap, te lenn jon man pash pende pre ap ko diwes, kai hi man buder kek budi.
Un job das kolen pash peste gole, kai hi sijaan pash peskro rajeste. Un jek pal o wawareste was pash leste. Un job putchas hakenestar: Har bud sijaan hi tut pash miro rajeste?
Un te penas jek: Sheel khoro djet, palle penas lo ap leste: Le ko liil, kai tiro sijaan dre tardo hi. Tchin kanna: paash-sheel!
Un te putchas lo i wawarestar: Har bud sijaan hi tut? un kowa penas: Sheel gone djob, palle penas lo ap koleste: Le ko liil, kai tiro sijaan dre tardo hi, un tchin kanna: ochta-deesh!

Un ko rai sharas ko chocheno budepaskres doleske, kai his lo gosewo." "Un kowa hi tchatcho", penas o Jesus, "kol menshe, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar, djan gosweder trujal i wawar menshentsa har kolla, kai djan ap o Debleskro drom.

Me penau tumenge: Tumare lowe atchenna gar. Denn len i tchorwelende, te wenn le tumare mala! Te hi kol lowe buder tchi moldo, palle lenn le tumen kote an i khera dre, kai tumer hako tsiro nai atchenna."
"Koon an i tikno koowa lauter mishto krella, kowa krell ninna an i baro koowa lauter mishto. Koon i tikno koowa gar mishto krella, kowa krell ninna i baro koowa gar mishto.
Te djan tumer gar mishto trujal kol lowentsa, hoi gar atchenna, koon dell tumen nai ko brawlepen an o wast, hoi atchella?
Te djan tumer wawar menshengro brawlepen gar mishto trujal, har nai dell tumen o Dewel kowa an tumare wasta, hoi kamell lo tumen te dell?

Kek budepaskro budrell nai dui rajenge. Te wals kowa jaake, budrals lo ko jekeske mishto, un ko wawareske gar mishto. Ko jekes kamals job gar, ko wawares kamals job o djijestar. Tu nai budreh gar o Debleske un leh tiro brawlepen khetne!"
Kol Farisarja shunan kowa lauter. Jon his pal i lowe, un jon san pral o Jesuseste.
Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Glan i menshengre jaka kamenn tumer latcho te well. O Dewel prindjrell tumaro dji. Hoi pash i menshende bud molella, hi tchi moldo an o Debleskre jaka.

An o phuro tsiro rikran pen i menshe ap kowa, hoi o Mose un i Debleskre rakepangre penan. Har was o Johanni, was o Debleskro newo tsiro. Kanna well i menshenge o latcho lab penlo, te dell o Dewel i menshen pash peste gole, te djiwenn le leha khetne an jek harmenationa. Un hakeno kamell sorjaha jaake dre te well, har job kamella.
O bolepen un i phub atchenna gar. Kowa, hoi o Mose un kol Debleskre rakepangre penan, atchella. Ninna o tikneder lab well gar krik lino.
Koon peskri romjat mukella, un romedinerell i wawar djuwjat, kowa chochell peskri romjat. Un kowa, kai romedinerell i mukli djuwjat, kowa anell doosh ap peste, te las lo i wawareskri romjat."
Un o Jesus penas pale: Koi his i brawelo mursh. Kowa his hako tsiro shukar un railes rido, un djiwas i shukar djipen.
Glan leskro wudar his i tchorwelo tchiddo, kai his nasselo ap peskro mass. Leskro lab hi Lazaro.
Kowa mangas ko brawelestar ko chapen, hoi peras tele ap i phub, te chal lo kowa. Un i djukle wan pash leste, un tcharan leskro nasselo mass tele.
Ko diwes was, kai ko tchorwelo meras. Un i bolepangre anan les an o bolepen, te beshas lo pes pash o Abraham. I tsiro koi pre meras ninna ko brawelo, un las i shukar paskepen.
Har job kanna an o mulengro them his, wan bare duka ap leste. Un job dikas pre, un dikas o Abrahames dural, un o Lazaro his pash leste beshdo.
Koi das ko brawelo gole: Tata Abraham, kre tiro dji mange pre, un bitche o Lazares pash mande! Job hunte tchiwell peskro gushto an o pani, un tchiwell kowa ap miri tchip, te dukrell man kai jag gar!
Koi penas o Abraham: Tchawa, tuke djas hako tsiro an tiro djipen mishto. O Lazares his kek shukar djipen. Kanna hi job bachtelo un leske djal mishto. Un tut hi kanna bare duka.
Ninna hi mashkral mende i baro telstunepen, te nai well kek mendar pash tumende, un kek tumendar nai well pash mende.
Koi penas o brawelo: Me mangau tut, tata Abraham, bitche les an miro dadeskro kheer!
Man hi pantch phrala. Kolenge hunte penell job, har mange djala, te wenn jon gar koi, kai me hom, un bare duka lom."
Koi penas o Abraham: Len hi o Moseskre laba un kol lila, hoi o Debleskre rakepangre tchinan. Ap kolende hunte shunenn jon!
Penas o brawelo: Na-a! Te wals jek i mulendar pash lende, palle mukans le pengro tchilatcho drom.
Penas o Abraham: Te shunenn le gar ap o Mose un ap kol Debleskre rakepangre, shunenn le witar gar ap jekeste, kai stas i mulendar pre."
Un o Jesus penas ap peskre malende: "Tchatchepaha, menshe wenna, kai kamenn tumen o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell. Bibacht ap koleste, kai kowa krella!
Koleske wals feteder, te well leske i pharo bar trul i meen pandlo, un te well lo an o baro pani witsedo, te nai anell lo buder gar jekes kal tiknendar ap o tchilatcho drom.

Denn jak ap tumende! Te krell tiro phraal tchilatcho koowa ap tute, pen leske, kai kowa gar mishto hi, hoi job kras! Te khaitell les ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi job ap tute kras, jaake ab buder gar chojedo ap leste!
Te krell lo efta kope ap o diwes tchilatcho koowa ap tute, un te well lo efta kope pash tute un penella, kai les kowa khaitella, jaake ab buder gar chojedo ap leste!"
Un kol deesh-te-dui bitchepangre penan ap o Jesuseste: "Kre maro patsepen soreles!"
Koi penas o rai Jesus ap lende: "Te wals tumaro patsepen ninna tikno har i senftikro djob, nai penans tumer ap ko baro ruk: Witse tut an o pani! Un ko ruk shunals ap tumende."
"Shunenn, hoi me tumenge penaua: Kek tumendar penella ap peskro budepaskro, kai pal peskri budi ap o kotar them khere wella: Am, besh tut kate tele, cha un pi!
Ko krenn tumer gar. Tumer penenn leske: Rib tut trujal un kre mange chapaske! Aan ko chapen pash mande! Palle nai chah un pijeh tu ninna.
Parkrenn tumen pash leste koleske, hoi job kras? Na-a, ko krenn tumer gar.
Jaake hi kowa ninna tumentsa. Te kran tumer lauter, hoi o Dewel tumenge penas, palle penenn: Mer ham tire budepangre. Mer kram, hoi hunte kram."
Har o Jesus ap o drom an o foro Jerusalem his, djas lo mank i themma Samaria un Galilea.
Un job djas an i gab. Un kote wan deesh nassele mursha pash leste. Kolen his i djungelo nasslepen, kai lengro mass tele merella. Jon his lestar doha dur krik tardo,
un dan gole: "Jesus, latcho rai, kre tiro dji menge pre!"
Un o Jesus dikas len, un penas ap lende: "Djan pash o rashajeste, un sikrenn tumen glan leste!" Un har jon djan, wan jon ap o drom sasto.
Jek lendar, har job dikas, te hi lo sasto, djas lo pash o Jesuseste pale pale, un sharas o Debles o tselo djijeha.
Job witsras pes glan o Jesuseskre pire tele, un parkras pes. Kowa his i Samaritari.
Koi penas o Jesus: "Deesh wan sasto. Kai hi kol wawar enja?
Hi kek wawar koi, kai was pale pale, te sharell lo o Debles har kau Samaritari?"
Un job penas ap ko mursheste: "Ste pre, un dja khere! Tiro patsepen kras tut sasto."
Un i Farisarja putchan o Jesusestar: "Kaana well ko tsiro, kai dikah, kai o Dewel o rai hi pral i tseli phub?" Koi penas lo: "Ko tsiro well gar jaake, te nai dikenn kowa.
Ninna nai penell jek gar: Kanna hi ko tsiro kai." Un o Jesus penas dureder: "Kote, kai i mensho kamella, te well o Dewel leskro rai, kote was ko tsiro."
Un job penas ap peskre malende: "I tsiro wella, kai tumaro dji kamell o Menshengro Tchawes jek diwes te dikell. Un tumer dikenn les gar.
Un jon penenn ap tumende: Dikenn, kote hi lo! Dikenn, kate hi lo! Me penau tumenge: Djan gar kote! Patsenn gar, hoi kol menshe penenna!
Jaake har i Debleskri jag ap o bolepen diklo hi, hoi djal jek rigatar ap i wawar rig an o bolepen, jaake well o Menshengro Tchawo ap peskro diwes diklo.
Glan ko tsiro hunte lell lo bud duka ap peste. Un i menshe, kai kau diwes djiwenna, tchiwenn les ap i rig.
Ap ko tsiro, kai o Menshengro Tchawo pale wella, djiwenn i menshe jaake har an ko tsiro, kai o Noa djiwas.
Kol menshe chan, pijan, un romedineran, bis ap ko diwes, kai o Noa an o panjeskro kheer djas, un o baro pani was, un lauter tassan le.
Ko tsiro, kai o Menshengro Tchawo pale wella, hi ninna har ko tsiro, kai o Lot djiwas. Jon chan, pijan, jon ginan, bikran, jon budran ap pengro kotar phub, un kran penge khera.
Ap ko diwes, kai o Lot dran o foro Sodom djas, was jag dran o bolepen, un lauter wan chatchedo.
Jaake djal kowa ninna ap ko diwes, kai o Menshengro Tchawo diklo wella.
Koon ap ko diwes ap o kheer hi, un kones peskro koowa an o kheer hi, kowa hunte djal gar tele, te lell lo peskro koowa. Un koon ap peskro kotar phub budrella, hunte djal gar buder khere.
Ma bistrenn o Loteskri romjat!
Koon kamell peskro djipen te rikrell, kowa nashrell les. Koon peskro djipen nashrella, kowa lell les pale.
Me penau tumenge: Te hi an koi rati dui menshe an o tchiben tchiddo, well ko jek krik lino, ko wawar atchell koi.
Dui djuwja krenn dran djob jarro. Koi jek well krik lino, koi wawar atchell koi.
Dui budrenn ap i kotar phub. Ko jek well krik lino, ko wawar atchell koi."
Leskre mala putchan lestar: "Rai, kai well kowa?" Penas lo: "Kote, kai i mulo mass tchiddo hi, kote wenn i bare diwje tchirkle khetne te chan le."
Un o Jesus penas lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi, te sikrell lo len, te hunte mangenn le o Debles hako tsiro, un te hunte mukenn le gar tele, te denn le les gole. Un job penas:
"An i foro djiwas i tchatchepaskro rai. Kowa putchas gar pal o Debleste, un daras kek menshestar.
An ko foro djiwas ninna i djuwel, kolakro rom meras. Koja was bud kope pash leste, un penas: Ab ap miri rig, te lap miro tchatchepen!
I raha tsiro kras ko tchatchepaskro rai lake tchi. Pal i tsiro penas lo ap peste: Tchatchepaha, pal o Debleste putchau gar, un witar gar darau i menshendar.
Koi djuwel mukell gar tele. Doleske kamau te krell, te lell li lakro tchatchepen, te nai tchingrell li gar ap mande."
Koi penas o Jesus: "Shunenn tumer, hoi ko tchilatcho tchatchepaskro penas?

Har bud feteder hi o Dewel! Patsenn tumer gar, te well lo ap i rig peskre wi-rodede menshendar, kai diwes un rati ap leste gole denna? Awa, job well ap lengri rig un dell len lengro tchatchepen. Lell lo pes bud tsiro, te well lo ap lengri rig?
Na-a, penau me tumenge: Jon lenn sik pengro tchatchepen. Hoi penenn tumer mange, te putchau tumendar: Te well o Menshengro Tchawo pale, hatsell job menshen ap i phub, kai patsenn ap leste?"
His menshe trul o Jesuseste tardo, kai patsan pendar, te hi le latcho un feteder har kol wawar. Un o Jesus penas lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi, un penas:
"Dui mursha djan an o Debleskro baro kheer, te mangenn le o Debles an. Ko jek hi i Farisari, ko wawar hi jek kolendar, kai lenn lowe i biboldendar i Remarjenge dre.

Ko Farisari tchiwas pes tardo un penas: Mo Dewel, me parkrau man pash tute, te hom gar jaake har kal wawar menshe: tchorepangre, chochene, un har kolla, kai chochenn pengri romjat i wawar djuwjaha, un gar jaake har kowa, kai koi wergal tardo hi: Ko pale-tchiddo.
Dui diwessa an o kurko chau me tchi, te mangap tut an. Un me dau tut o deshto kotar halauterestar, hoi dre lau.

Ko pale-tchiddo atchas palla tardo, un hadas gar peskro shero pre. Un job das ap peskro betch, te sikrell lo, kai leskro tchilatcho koowa khaitas les, un penas: Miro Dewel, me hom i tchilatcho mursh. Dik ap mande un ab mange latcho!"

Un o Jesus penas: "Me penau tumenge: O Dewel dikas ap kaleste, un his leske latcho un gar ko wawareske. Kowa, kai pes bares krella, koles sharell o Dewel gar. Un kowa, kai pes gar bares krella, koles krell o Dewel bares."
Un i menshe anan tchawen pash leste, te tchiwell lo peskre wasta ap lende. Har peskre mala dikan kowa, tchingran le ap kol menshende.
Koi das o Jesus peskre malen gole, un penas ap lende: "Mukenn kol tchawen pash mande te well! Ma rikrenn len pale! Sawe har jon, kolen das o Dewel gole, te djiwenn le khetne leha an o bolepen.
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Koon gar ap mande patsella har kol tchawe, kowa nai well gar ap o Debleskro drom."
Koi putchas lestar i pralstuno: "Latcho sikepaskro, hoi hunte krap, te dell man o Dewel o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella?"
Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Hoske peneh tu: Latcho sikepaskro! ap mande? Kek mensho hi latcho. O Dewel kokres hi latcho.

Tu prindjreh kol deesh Debleskre laba: Romeha, ma choche tiri romjat i wawar djuwjaha! Romnija, ma choche tiro romes i wawar mursheha! Ma mare kekes! Ma tchore! Ma pen chochepen pral jekeste! Dik ap tiro dadeste un ap tiri date, te djal lenge mishto!"
Koi penas job: "Me krom kowa lauter jaake raha, har me djiwau."
Har o Jesus kowa shunas, penas lo ap leste: "Jek hunte kress tu budeder. Bike lauter, hoi tut hi, un de kol lowe i tchorwelende! Palle hi tut i brawlepen an o bolepen. Un am un dja mantsa!"
Har o pralstuno kowa shunas, dukas les kowa an o dji. Les hi bud brawlepen.
Un o Jesus dikas, kai kol laba les dukan. Un job penas: "Har pharo hi i brawelenge, te wenn le ap o Debleskro drom.
Hi gar jaake pharo, te djal i baro ficho an i subjakro kand dre, har te well i brawelo ap o Debleskro drom."
Penan kolla, kai pash leste tardo hi, ap leste: "Te hi kowa jaake, koon nai lell o Debleskro djipen?"
Penas lo: "Kowa hoi i menshe nai krenn gar, kowa nai krell o Dewel."
Koi penas o Petro: "Mer mukam lauter tchiddo un djam tuha."
Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Hakeno, kai mukell peskro kheer, peskri romjat, phralen, tchawen, dades un dat, te nai budrell lo feteder o Debleske,
kowa lell an kau tsiro lauter bud kope pale. Un an ko tsiro, kai wella, dell o Dewel les o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella."
Un o Jesus las i deesh-te-dui ap i rig un penas lenge: "Shunenn! Mer djah kanna an o foro Jerusalem. Kote well lauter tchatcho, hoi o Debleskre rakepangre pral o Menshengro Tchaweste tchinan:
Jon denn les an i wasta kolendar, kai kek bibolde hi. Un kolla praassenn les, denn les dawa un tchungrenn ap leste.
Jon denn les i tchupnijaha, un marenn les. Un pal triin diwessa krell o Dewel les djido."
Leskre mala haiwan kek lab. Kowa, hoi job lenge kal labentsa kamas te penell, djas gar an lengro shero dre. Un jon djinan gar, pral hoi job rakras.
Un o Jesus djas pash o foro Jericho. Un i korelo, his pash o drom beshdo, un mangas lowe i menshendar.
Un job shunas bud menshen, kai djan ap ko drom. Koi putchas lo lendar: "Hoi djal kote?"
Koi penan le: "O Jesus dran Nazaret djal kote."
Koi das lo gole: "Jesus, tu Davideskro tchawo, kre tiro dji mange pre!"
Un kolla, kai djan glan o Jesuseste ap o drom, tchingran ap ko mursheste un penan: "Muk tele un atch!" Job das budeder gole: "Jesus, Davideskro tchawo, kre tiro dji mange pre!"
Un o Jesus atchas tardo, un penas: "Anenn les pash mande!" Un har ko mursh pash leste was, putchas o Jesus lestar:
"Hoi kameh tu, te krap tuke?" Penas kowa: "Rai, me kamoms te dikell."
Penas o Jesus: "Palle dik! Tiro patsepen kras tut sasto."
Un job dikas nai pale, djas o Jesuseha, un sharas o Debles. Un halauter, kai kowa dikan, sharan o Debles ninna.
Un o Jesus djas an o foro Jericho.
Kote his i biboldo, ko his i pralstuno pral kolende, kai lenna i biboldendar lowe i Remarjenge dre. Leskro lab his Zacheo.
Job kamas o Jesuses te dikell, un nai dikas les gar. Job his tikno, un bud menshe his trul o Jesuseste.
Doleske nashas lo glan i menshende, un djas ap i ruk, te dikell lo feteder.
Un o Jesus was koi un dikas pre, un penas ap leste: "Zacheo, am sik koi tele! Kau diwes hunte wap me an tiro kheer."
Un o Zacheo was sik o rukestar tele, un las o Jesuses an peskro kheer dre, un his bachtelo.
Har jon kowa dikan, his jon chojemen un penan: "Pash i pale-tchiddo djal job an o kheer."
O Zacheo his koi tardo un penas ap o Jesuseste: "Mo rai, me dau i tchorwelende i paash lauterestar, hoi man hi. Un te chochom jekes, dau les kanna star kope jaake bud pale."
Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Kau diwes las o Dewel i menshen an kau kheer dran o tchilatchepen win. Ninna kawa rom hi o Abrahameskro tchawo.
O Menshengro Tchawo was, te rodell lo kolen, kai nashedo hi, un te anell lo kolen ap o Debleskro drom, kai ap o tchilatcho drom hi."

O Jesus his gar dur o forestar Jerusalem, un i menshe patsan, kai ko tsiro kanna kai hi, kai o Dewel sikrella, te hi lo o rai pral i tseli phub. Koi penas o Jesus lenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi,

un penas: "I pralstuno kamas te well lo baro rai pral peskro them. Doleske djas lo pash koleste, kai hi o wast pral bud themma, te krell kowa les baro rai. Un pal kowa kamas lo an peskro them pale te djal.
Un job das deesh peskre budepangren gole, das hakeneste i sheel rupene beme, un penas: Budrenn kol lowentsa jaake raha har me gar kai hom. Un job djas peske.
I menshe an peskro them his chojedo ap leste un bitchran murshen leske palla, te penenn le leske: Mer kamah gar, te wess tu baro rai pral mende!
Ko mursh was baro rai, un was an peskro them pale. Koi das lo kol budepangren gole, kolen job kol lowe das. Un job kamas dikell, hoi jon kol lowentsa kran.
I budepaskro was pash leste un penas: Mo rai, me budrom kol lowentsa, hoi tu man dal. Un kanna hi man deesh kope jaake bud.
Penas lo ap koleste: Kowa kral tu mishto. Tu hal o latcho budepaskro. Me tchiwom i tikno koowa an tire wasta, un tu kral i bari budi koleha. Doleske kamau, te wess tu o pralstuno pral deesh forja.
Ko duito was pash ko rajeste, un penas: Mo rai, me budrom kol lowentsa, hoi tu man dal. Un kanna hi man pantch kope jaake bud.
Ap koleste penas lo ninna: Tu weh o pralstuno pral pantch forja.
Ko triinto was un penas: Mo rai, ake, tire sheel rupene beme. Me khatrom len an i diklo.
Me darom tutar. Tut hi i dji dran bar. Tu leh, kai dal tchi. Un hoi i wawar ap i kotar phub tchiwas, leh tu lestar krik, te was kowa bares.
Ap koleste penas o rai: Tu moleh tchi. Tu hal i tchilatcho budepaskro. Tu djinal, kai hi man i dji dran bar, un kai lau, kai dom tchi, un hoi me gar an i phub tchiwom, te well kowa baro.
Hoske anal tu mire lowe gar pash kolende, kai i lowe win patsenna? Un te woms me pale, loms budeder lowe pale, har tu len dal.
Un job penas ap kolende, kai koi pashal tardo hi: Lenn kol sheel rupene beme lestar krik, un denn kol lowe koleste, kai hi les deesh kope budeder!
Un jon penan ap o rajeste: Rai, koles hi deesh kope jaake bud!
Koi penas o rai: Kones bud hi, kowa lell budeder. Un kowa, kai hi les gar bud, kolestar well kowa ninna krik lino.
Un job penas dureder: Anenn kolen glan mande, kai hi chojedo ap mande, un kai kaman gar, te wap baro rai pral lende, un denn len glan mire jaka temerl!"
Har o Jesus kowa penas, djas lo glan lende ap o drom, kai djal an o foro Jerusalem.
Un job was pash kol gaba Betfage un Betani. Kal gaba his ap koi berga tchiddo, hoi kharella djeteskri berga. Un job bitchras dui peskre malendar glan-wi un penas lenge:
"Djan an o gab koi wergal. Kote hatsenn tumer i tarni esla pandlo, ap koleste his gomme kek beshdo. Pandenn lat tele, un anenn lat pash mande!
Un te putchell jek tumendar: Hoske pandenn lat tele? penenn leske: Hi maro rajeske, te beshell job ap late."
Un kol dui djan an ko gab, un lauter his jaake, har o Jesus lenge penas.
Har jon koja tarni esla tele pandan, putchas lendar ko mursh, koleske koi esla his: "Hoske pandenn tumer koi tarni esla tele?"
Un jon penan leske: "Hi maro rajeske, te beshell job ap late."
Koi anan jon koi esla pash o Jesuseste, un tchiwan pengre koola ap late. Un o Jesus beshas pes pral pre.
Ap o drom, har job an o foro Jerusalem klissas, tchiwan i menshe pengre koola ap o drom, te nashte klissas job pral wergal.
Har jon kote wan, kai djal o drom o djeteskri berga tele, dan leskre mala bari gole i bachtjatar, un sharan o Debles pral ko baro koowa, hoi job mashkral lende kras.
Un jon penan: "Sharas ko baro rajes, koles o Dewel bitchras. O Debleskri bacht well pash mende! Baro hi o Debleskro railepen an o bolepen!"
Koi his ninna Farisarja mashkral i menshende ap o drom. Kolla penan: "Rai, pen ap tire malende, te mukenn le tele!"
Penas o Jesus ap lende: "Me penau tumenge: Jon te rikrenn pengre muja, palle denn i barra gole."
Un har o Jesus pash o foro Jerusalem was, rowas lo pral i menshende an kau foro,
un penas: "Bachtelo wans tumer, te djinans tumer kau diwes, koon anell tumenge o Debleskri bacht! Tumer han korelo. Tumer dikenn les gar.
Ko bibachtelo diwes wella, kai lurde wenna dran i wawar themma. Jon tchiwenn bare barra trul tumaro foro, te wenn tumer buder gar win.

Un jon marenn tumare menshen, un denn tumare tchawen an ko foro mulo. Mo Dewel kamas tumen peskro latchepen te sikrell. Un tumer kaman gar te krenn tumaro dji leske pre. Doleske atchell kek bar ap ko wawar an kau foro."
Un o Jesus djas an o Debleskro baro kheer un tradas kol bikepangren win,

un penas lenge: "An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: O Dewel penella: Miro kheer te well i kheer, kai sharenn man i menshe un mangenn man an. Tumer kran lestar i kheer, kai i menshe chochenna un randenna."
Hako diwes djas o Jesus an o Debleskro baro kheer un sikras i menshende o Debleskro drom. I bare rashaja, i biboldengre tchatchepangre un i wawar pralstune rodan i drom, te marenn le les.
Jon djinan gar, har nai tapran le les. Bud menshe his trul leste, un kaman hako lab te shunell, hoi job penas.
His i diwes, kai penas o Jesus i menshenge o Debleskro lab an o Debleskro baro kheer. Un i bare rashaja un i biboldengre tchatchepangre un phureder wan pash leste,
un penan ap leste: "Pen menge, koon penas tuke, te kress tu kowa lauter? Koon bitchras tut?"
Penas lo: "Kanna kamau tumendar ninna tchomone te putchell pral o Johanni, kowa, kai i menshen o Debleske an o pani thowas:
Bitchras o Dewel o Johannes, te thowell lo i menshen an o pani? Bitchran i menshe les? Penenn les mange!"
Un jon tchingran mashkral pende un penan: "Te penah mer leske: O Dewel bitchras o Johannes, palle penell lo menge: Hoske patsan tumer les gar?
Te penah mer leske: I menshe bitchran les, witsrenn le barentsa ap mende, te marenn le men. Jon patsenn soreles, te hi lo i Debleskro rakepaskro."
Un jon penan o Jesuseske: "Mer djinah les gar."
Penas o Jesus lenge: "Jaake penau tumenge witar gar, koon man bitchras, te krap me kowa."

Un o Jesus penas i menshenge laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi, un penas: "His i mursh. Koles his i kotar them. Kote tchiwas lo drakengre ruka an i phub, un patsas kau them ap i hachende, te budrenn le kote leske. Un job djas peske an i wawar them i raha tsireske.
Har ko tsiro was, te anenn le i drake dre, bitchras job i budepaskres pash i hachende, te lell lo lendar kol drake, hoi leske hi. I hache dan les kek drake. Jon dan les dawa un bitchran les krik.
Koi bitchras ko mursh i wawar budepaskres pash lende. I hache dan les kek drake. Jon dan les ninna dawa, praassan les, un bitchran les krik.
O mursh bitchras i triinto budepaskres. I hache dan les ninna ratlo, un witsran les win.
Kanna penas o rai pral o drakengro them ap peste: Hoi krap? Me bitchrau miro tchawes, koles, kai me kamau o tselo djijeha. Koles witsrenn jon gar win.
Har i hache les dikan, penan le mashkral pende: Kowa hi leskro tchawo, kai lauter lella pal peskro dadeskro merepen. Maras les, palle hi ko them maro!
Un jon witsran les dran ko drakengro them win, un maran les. Hoi krell kanna ko rai pral ko drakengro them i hachentsa?
Job wella, un marell kol hachen, un dell ko drakengro them i wawaren." Har kolla kowa shunan, kai trul o Jesuseste tardo his, penan le: "Kowa wella gar jaake!"

Un o Jesus dikas ap lende, un penas: "Hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: His i bar, kai i budepangre lestar penan: Kowa hi tchi moldo. Ko bar las o Dewel un tchiwas les jaake an o kheer, te rikrell lo ko tselo kheer khetne.
Koon ap kau bar perella, kowa merella. Ap koneste kau bar perella, koles dell ko bar khetne."

Un i biboldengre tchatchepangre un i bare rashaja haiwan, kai rakras o Jesus lendar. Un jon kaman te taprenn le les sik pal leskro rakepen, te tchiwenn le les an o stilepen. Jon trashan i menshendar. Doleske tapran le les gar.

Jon lan o Jesuses an o jak. Un jon bitchran murshen, kai kran, har te wans le latcho. Un kolla putchan bud koowa lestar, te dikenn le, hoi job penals, jaake te nai taprenn le les an leskro rakepen, un te nai denn le les an i Remarjengre wasta.
Un jaake penan le ap leste: "Sikepaskro, mer djinah, te dareh tu kekestar. Un tu peneh o tchatchepen i menshenge an o mui. Un tu sikreh lende o Debleskro drom.
Pen menge: Hi mishto pal maro tchatchepen, te das mer o themeskre lowe o baro rajeste an o foro Rom?"
O Jesus djinas, kai jon gosewo hi, un job penas ap lende:
"Denn man i rupeni bema. Koneskro shero un lab hi ap kai bema?" Penan le: "O shero o baro rajestar an o foro Rom!"
Penas lo lenge: "Jaake denn leste, hoi leskro hi, un denn o Debleste, hoi leskro hi!"
Un kote glan i menshende nai tapran le les gar an leskro rakepen, un kran bare jaka pral kowa, hoi job penas, un djinan buder gar, hoi te penenn le.
Koi wan kol rashaja pash leste, kai ninna kharenna Saddukarja. Kolla patsenn gar, kai o Dewel i mulen djido krella. Kolla putchan lestar:
"Sikepaskro, o Mose tchinas: Te merell tiro phraal, kai romedino hi, un les hi kek tchawe, palle romedineress tu leskri romjat, te well tiro phraleske i tarnepen boldo.
Koi his kanna efta phrala. Ko phureder romedineras i djuwjat. Un job meras, un les his kek tchawe.
Un ko duito romedineras lat un job meras. Un les his kek tchawe.
Un ko triinto romedineras lat un meras. Un les his kek tchawe. Un kol wawar lauter, jek pal o wawar, romedineran lat ninna. Un jon meran lauter. Un lauteren his kek tchawe.
Pal lende meras ninna koi romni.
Kanna putchah mer tutar: Ap ko tsiro, kai krell o Dewel i mulen djido, koneskri romni hi li? Hake efta his laha romedino."
Penas o Jesus lenge: "I menshe ap kai phub romedinerenna un mukenn pen te romedinerell.
Kol mulen, kai o Dewel djido krella, te djiwenn le pash leste, kolla romedinerenn buder gar un wenna gar romedino.
Jon merenn buder gar, un hi har i bolepangre. Jon stan i mulendar pre. Doleske hi le o Debleskre tchawe.

Ninna o Mose tchinas, kai o Dewel i mulen djido krella. Har o Mose glan o bur tardo his, hoi chatchas, penas lo ap o Debleste: Tu hal o Abrahameskro Dewel, un o Isaakeskro Dewel, un o Jakobeskro Dewel.
Un me penau tumenge: Job hi gar o Dewel kolenge, kai mulo hi. Job hi o Dewel kol djidenge. Kalla lauter djiwenn leske."
Koi penan i biboldengre tchatchepangre: "Rai, kowa hi tchatcho, hoi tu penal."
Un jon trashan, te putchenn le lestar budeder.
Koi penas o Jesus ap lende: "Har nai penenn jon, kai o baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well lo, o Davideskro tchawo hi?
O David tchinas an peskre gilja: O Dewel penas ap miro rajeste: Besh tut ap miri tchatchi rig,
te tchiwap kolen tel tire pire, kai hi chojedo ap tute!
Kate penell o David Rai ap leste. Har well lo nai leskro tchawo?"
Har i tsele menshe shunan, hoi o Jesus rakras, penas job ap peskre malende:

"Denn jak! Kowa, hoi kol biboldengre tchatchepangre krenna, hi gar mishto. Len hi lengste koola ap lende, te sikrenn le, te hi le o Debleskre menshe. Te djan le an o foro, kamenn le, te penenn i menshe Latcho diwes, mo rai! ap lende. Ninna kamenn le ap i pralstune beshepangre te beshell an i biboldengri kangri un ap i feteder beshepangre pash i baro chapen.

Jon lenn i khera kol djuwjendar krik, kolengre romma mulo hi. Te mangenn le o Debles, palle rakrenn le leha i raha tsiro, te dikenn i menshe, har patslo jon hi. O Dewel rakrell i phagi pral lende win, un jon lenna i bareder phagi har i wawar."
Un o Jesus dikas pre un dikas, har i brawele pengre lowe an i lowengri piri an o Debleskro baro kheer dre tchiwan.
Un job dikas kote ninna i tchorweli romni, kai hi lat buder kek romes. Joi das dui tikne kotja lowe o Debleske.
Koi penas o Jesus: "Me penau tumenge: Koi romni das budeder har kol tsele wawar, kai brawelo hi.
Kol wawar dan lowe dran pengro brawlepen. Kai tchorweli romni das halauter, hoi lat hi djipaske."
Un i menshe, kai trul leste tardo his, penan: "Dik, o Debleskro baro kheer! Hawe shukar barra un kutch koowa jon o Debleske anan." Koi penas o Jesus:
"Ko tsiro wella, kai lauter, hoi tumer kate dikenna, paash djala. Kek bar atchell ap i wawareste."
Koi putchan jon lestar: "Sikepaskro, kaana wella kowa? Har nai dikas mer, kai hi ko tsiro kai?"

Penas lo: "Denn jak! Mukenn tumen kekestar o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell! Koi wenna bud mursha, kai penenna: Me hom o Kristo, ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job! Un jon penenn ninna: O tsiro hi kai! Me penau tumenge: Ma nashenn lenge palla!
An ko tsiro della bud baro kurepen, un i menshe hadenn pen pral pengre themeskre rajende. Ma trashenn! Ko hunte well jaake. Ko tsiro, kai i phub paash djala, well gar jaake sik."
Palle penas lo ap lende: "Ko tsiro wella, kai kurenn pen i pralstune pral bare themma wawar pralstunentsa. Un i menshe dran jek them marenn kolen an i wawar them.
Un kai te koi well i phub soreles trisslemen. An bud themma hi i menshen gar doha te chal, un baro nasslepen well ap lende. Un jon dikenn i baro koowa ap o bolepen, hoi krell lenge bari daar.

Glan ko tsiro, kai kowa lauter wella, lenn jon tumen palla, un taprenn tumen. Jon anenn tumen glan i tchatchepangre an i biboldengre kangria un witsrenn tumen an o stilepen. Tumer patsenn ap mande. Doleske anenn le tumen glan i bare rajende un glan i pralstunende, te rakrenn jon i phagi win pral tumende.
Jon te krenn kowa lauter tumentsa, palle rakrenn nai mandar.
Ma mukenn kowa an tumaro shero trujal te djal, hoi tumer hunte penenn kol rajenge!
Me dau tumen ko goswepen, un penau tumenge, hoi tumer hunte penenn. Un palle djinenn le buder gar, hoi te penenn le.
Un tumaro dad un tumari dai, tumare phrala un phenja, un tumare wawar menshe phukrenn ap tumende, ninna tumare mala. Un mank tumende hi sawe, kai wenn maredo.
Hakeno hi chojedo ap tumende doleske, kai patsenn tumer ap mande.
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Kek bal ap tumaro shero djal nashedo.
Atchenn soreles an o patsepen, un tumer lenn ko tchatcho djipen!"
"Te dikenn tumer, kai bud lurde trul o foro Jerusalem tardo hi, palle djinenn tumer, kai jon ko foro paash krenna.
Palle hunte nashenn i tsele menshe dran o them Judea pral an i berge. Un koon an o foro hi, hunte djal jaake sik har djala dran win. Un koon win ap o them hi, hunte djal gar an o foro dre.
An kol diwessa well o Debleskri choli ap i menshende tele. Palle well lauter tchatcho, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi.
Koi bibacht hi bari kol djuwjenge, kai hi an wawar koowa, ninna kolenge, kai hi len i tarnepen. O Debleskri choli well pral i tsele menshende an kau them. Un len hi i pharo tsiro.

Bud wenna maredo o chareha. Wawar wenna pandlo un wenna an i wawar themma anlo. Un o foro Jerusalem well kol menshendar khetne stakedo, kai wenna dran wawar themma. Kowa djal jaake raha, har o Dewel mukell len kowa te krell."

"Ap o kham un ap o mondo un ap i bolepangre momlia dikenn tumer baro koowa. Pral i menshende an bud themma well i bari traash, te dikenn le, har well o baro pani diwjo un hadell pes pral un dell bari gole.
I tsele menshe ap i phub hi paash-mulo i trashatar pral kowa, hoi lauter ap lende wella. I bolepaskri soor perell khetne.
Un palle dikenn i tsele menshe o Menshengro Tchawes, har well lo ap i wolka bari sorjaha un railepen.
Te dikenn tumer, har kowa lauter wella, awenn soreles un trashenn gar! I tsiro hi palle koi, kai o Dewel lell tumen dran o tchilatchepen un dran o merepen win."
Un o Jesus penas lenge sawe laba, kai i khatedo tchatchepen dren hi, un penas: "Dikenn ap o faigetikro ruk un ap i wawar ruka!
Te wenn i ruka senelo, palle djinenn tumer, te well sik o nijal.

Jaake hi kowa ninna koleha, pral kowa rakrom. Te dikenn tumer, har kowa lauter wella, palle djinenn, te well ko tsiro sik, kai o Dewel peskre menshen dran o tchilatchepen win lella, un job o rai pral i tseli phub hi.
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Kol menshe, kai an ko tsiro djiwenna, dikenna kowa lauter pengre jakentsa.
O bolepen un i phub atchenna gar. Mire laba atchenna hako tsiro."

"Denn garda, te well tumaro dji gar pherdo phubjakro koowa, jaake te bistrenn o Debles! Pijenn tumen gar mato! Ma darenn tumaro djipaske! Denn jak, te well ko diwes gar ap jek kopo ap tumende jaake, te han tumer tapedo!
Djinenn! Ko diwes well pral lauterende, kai djiwenna ap i phub.

Denn jak hako tsiro! Mangenn o Deblestar, te wenn tumer sorelo an o patsepen tardo, un wenn mishto win dran ko tchilatcho tsiro, hoi wella! Jaake hunte trashenn tumer gar o Menshengro Tchawestar, te well lo pale."
Hako diwes rakras o Jesus an o Debleskro baro kheer. I rati djas job pash koi berga, hoi kharella djeteskri berga, un atchas koi.
Taissarlake wan bud menshe an o Debleskro baro kheer, te shunenn jon, hoi o Jesus penella.
His glan kol diwessa, kai i bibolde kek maro chan, kai shutlo jarro dren hi. Kol diwessa kharenna Passa.
Un i bare rashaja un i biboldengre tchatchepangre rodan i drom, har jon nai marenn o Jesuses. Jon kaman les gar glan kol bud menshende te taprell. Kolendar daran le.
Koi djas o beng an o Judas Iskariot dre. Kowa his jek kol deesh-te-dujendar.
O Judas djas pash kol bare rashajende un pash i pralstune lurdende, un rakras kolentsa, har job nai phukrell ap leste.
Un jon his bachtelo pral kowa, un kaman les lowe te dell, te nai taprenn le o Jesuses.
"Mishto" penas o Judas, un rodas i latcho tsiro, te dell lo les an lengre wasta, jaake te djinenn i menshe kowa gar.
His an kol diwessa, kai i bibolde ko maro chana, kai kek shutlo jarro dren hi. Un ko diwes was, kai hunte marenn le i bakro hako khereske.
Koi bitchras o Jesus o Petres un o Johannes an o foro Jerusalem, un penas: "Djan an ko foro un krenn o chapen menge!"
Un jon putchan lestar: "Kai kameh tu, te kras o chapen?"
Penas lo ap lende: "Shunenn, te wenn tumer an o foro, palle dikenn tumer i murshes. Kowa hidjell i khoro pani. Djan koleste palla an ko kheer, kai job dre djala!
Kote penenn o rajeske an ko kheer: Maro sikepaskro putchell tutar: Kai hi koi isema, kai nai chau me ko bakro mire malentsa?
Un job sikrell tumende i bari isema, pral an ko kheer. Kote hi beshepangre tardo. Kote krenn o chapen!"
Un jon djan kote, un hatsan lauter jaake, har o Jesus lenge penas. Un jon kran o chapen.
Har ko tchatcho tsiro was, beshas job pes tele. Un kol deesh-te-dui bitchepangre beshan pen leha.
Un job penas ap lende: "Kawa chapen kamom me o tselo djijestar te chap tumentsa glan ko tsiro, kai me hunte lap bud duka ap mande.
Me penau tumenge: Me chau kau chapen buder gar jaake raha, bis te well ko tsiro, kai kowa tchatcho was, hoi kau chapen sikrella. Palle chau les tumentsa pash o Debleste an o bolepen."
Un o Jesus las o khoro, parkras pes pash o Debleste, un penas ap lende: "Ake, lenn un pijenn halauter kai mool!
Me penau tumenge: Me pijau buder gar i mool jaake raha, bis te well ko diwes, kai hi o Dewel o rai pral halauter."

Un job las i kotar maro, parkras pes pash o Debleste, phagas ko maro, das kowa lende, un penas ap lende: "Ake, chan! Kau maro hi miro mass. Me dau man tumenge. Te hom buder gar koi, krenn kowa pale un pale, te well tumenge an tumaro shero, hoi me krom tumenge!"
Pal o chapen las lo o khoro un penas: "Kai mool an kau khoro hi miro rat, hoi tumenge ratau. Jaake krau i newo drom, kai o Dewel un i menshe mala wenna."
Palle penas o Jesus: "O phukepaskro hi mantsa ap kaja chapaskri beshdo.
Me, o Menshengro Tchawo, hunte merap. Ninna te hi mange glan diklo, te djap kau drom, hawi bibacht well ap koleste, kai ap mande phukrella!"
Un jek putchas i wawarestar: "Koon hi kowa mendar, kai krell kowa?"
Un o Jesuseskre mala tchingran pen, koon lendar o bareder hi.

Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "I bare rajen ap kai phub hi penepaske pral i menshende an pengre themma. Kolla hunte shunenn ap lende un hunte budrenn lenge. Un kol pralstune kamenn, te penenn i menshe lenge, har latche mursha jon hi.

Me penau tumenge: Ma krenn kowa jaake har kolla! O bareder mashkral tumende hunte well jaake har o tikneder tumendar. Un kowa, kai kamell o pralstuno te well, hunte well o telstuno, kai budrell i wawarenge.

Koon kol dujendar hi bareder: Kowa, kai pash i chapaskri beshdo hi? Kowa, kai tchiwell o chapen ap i chapaskri? Tchatchepaha, kowa, kai pash i chapaskri beshdo hi! Un me hom mashkral tumende har jek, kai tumenge budrella.
Tumer rikran pash mande win an kol diwessa, har i menshe miro djipen phares kran.
Un me kamau, te wenn tumer mantsa khetne raja, jaake har miro dad an o bolepen kamella, te wap o baro rai pral i menshende.

Un tumer chana un pijenna mantsa kote, kai me o baro rai hom, un han beshdo ap rajeskre beshepangre, un penenn o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende, kai wenna o deesh-te-dui Israeleskre tchawendar."
"Simon, Simon, shun, hoi me tuke penau: O beng las tumen an o jak un kamas te dikell, har sorelo tumaro patsepen hi.
Me mangom tuke pash mo Debleste, te djas tu gar o Debleskro dromestar tele. Un te djah tu pale ap o tchatcho drom, kre tire phralen soreles an o patsepen!"
Penas o Petro: "Rai, me djoms tuha an o stilepen un an o merepen."
Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Petro, me penau tuke, kai rati dell o bashno gar gole jaake raha, har tu gar triin kope penal, te prindjreh man gar."
Un job penas ap peskre malende: "Har me tumen ap o drom bitchrom, his tumen kek lowe, witar kek gono un kek kircha pash tumende. His tumen bok? His tumen trush?" Penan le: "Na-a, gar jek kopo!"
Penas lo: "Kanna lenn lowe tumentsa! Lenn ninna i gono peha, kai tchiwenn tumer tumare koola dre! Un bikrenn tumari plashka, te ginenn tumenge i charo!
Me penau tumenge: Hi tchindlo pral mande an o Debleskro lab: Jon penenn lestar, te hi lo jek lendar, kai tchilatcho hi. Tchatchepaha, lauter, hoi pral mande tchindlo was, wella tchatcho."
Penan leskre mala ap leste: "Rai, kate hi dui chare." Penas lo: "Kanna hi doha!"
Un o Jesus djas pash i djeteskri berga, jaake har job kowa bud kope kras. Un peskre mala djan leha.
Un har jon pash i djeteskri berga wan, penas lo ap lende: "Mangenn o Deblestar, te nai anell tumen tchi o Debleskro dromestar tele!"
Un o Jesus kokres djas i tikno kotar dureder, un witsras pes ap i tchanga,
un mangas o Debles: "Tata, te kameh tu, muk kek duka ap mande te well! Kre gar, har me kamau. Kre jaake, har tu kameh!"
Un i Debleskro bolepaskro was pash leste dran o bolepen un das les soor.
Un o Jesus mangas o Debles sorleder, un rat nashas leskro sherestar tele ap i phub, jaake soreles was i daar ap leste.
Un palle stas lo pre un djas pash peskre malende. Jon wan khino un sowan, jaake bibachtelo hi le. Har job dikas, te sowan le,
penas lo ap lende: "Hoske sowenn tumer? Stenn pre un mangenn o Deblestar, te nai anell tumen tchi o Debleskro dromestar tele!"
Har o Jesus jaake rakras, koi wan bud menshe. Glan kol menshende djas o Judas. Kowa his jek o Jesuseskre deesh-te-dui malendar. Job djas pash o Jesuseste, un kamas les i tchum te dell.
O Jesus penas ap leste: "Judas, kameh tu ap o Menshengro Tchaweste phukrell un deh les i tchum?"
Har o Jesuseskre mala, kai trul leste tardo hi, dikan, hoi koi djas, putchan jon lestar: "Rai, das mer i chareha ap lende pre?"
Un jek lendar las o charo, un das i klisteske o tchatcho kand tele. Kowa his i klisto, kai budrell o baro rashajeske.
Koi penas o Jesus: "Muk tele! Kanna hi doha!" Un job tchiwas peskro wast ap o kand ko murshestar, un kras les sasto.

Un o Jesus penas ap i bare rashajende un ap i pralstunende pral o Debleskro baro kheer un ap i biboldengre phureder, kai pash leste wan: "Tumer wan charentsa un kashtentsa pash mande, har te woms i marepaskro.
Hako diwes homs pash tumende an o Debleskro baro kheer, un tumer tapran man gar. Kanna hi tumaro tsiro. Kanna hi o benges penepaske."
Un jon pandan les un anan les an o baro rajeskro kheer. O Petro djas lenge palla, un atchas i kotar pal lende.
Pash ko kheer kran i lurde i jag, un beshan pen lauter khetne. Un o Petro beshas pes pash lende.
Un i budepaskretsa his pash i jag beshdo, dikas les un penas: "Kowa his ninna pash o Jesuseste."
O Petro das buchoste un penas: "Romnija, me prindjrau les gar."
I tikno tsiro koi pre dikas i wawar ap leste, un penas: "Tu hal ninna jek kolendar." Un o Petro penas: "Romeha, me hom gar jek lendar."
Un i tsiro koi pre penas pale i wawar: "Tchatchepaha, ko mursh his ninna pash leste. Job hi dran o them Galilea."
Koi penas o Petro: "Romeha, me djinau gar, hoi tu peneh." Un har job kowa penas, das o bashno gole.

Un o Jesus risras pes trujal, un dikas o Petres an i jaka. Un o Petreske wan kolla laba an o shero, hoi o Jesus ap leste penas: "O bashno dell gar gole jaake raha, har tu gar triin kope penal, te prindjreh man gar."
Un o Petro djas win, un rowas soreles.
Kol mursha, kai dan garda ap o Jesuseste, san pral leste, un dan les dawa.
Un jon pandan leskre jaka, un penan: "Pen menge, koon das tut!"
Un jon praassan les.
Un har o diwes was, mukan i biboldengre phureder, i bare rashaja un i tchatchepangre o Jesuses pash pende te anell.
Un penan ap leste: "Hal tu o Kristo, ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job? Pen menge!" Penas lo: "Me te penau les tumenge, patsenn tumer man gar.
Un te putchau tumendar tchomone, penenn tumer tchi.
Ko tsiro well sik, kai me, o Menshengro Tchawo, hom beshdo ap i tchatchi rig o sorelo Deblestar."
Penan jon: "Hal tu o Debleskro tchawo?" Penas job: "Awa, hi jaake har tumer penan. Me hom kowa."
Penan le mashkral pende: "Menge hi kanna doha. Mer shunam dran leskro mui, hoi job penas. Kek hunte penell menge budeder."
Un lauter stan pre, un anan o Jesuses pash o Pilateste.

Un jon anan bud koowa ap leste pre, un penan: "Kau mursh kras mare menshen diwjo. Job penas, te das mer o baro rajeste an o foro Rom buder kek lowe. Un job penas ninna, kai hi lo o Kristo, ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job."
Koi putchas o Pilato lestar: "Hal tu o baro rai pral i biboldende?" Penas lo: "Awa, hi jaake har tu penal."
Koi penas o Pilato ap kol bare rashajende un ap kol wawar menshende, kai kote tardo hi: "Me hatsom kek doosh ap leste."
Jon mukan gar tele, te anenn le tchilatcho koowa ap o Jesuseste, un penan: "Job kras i menshen diwjo an o them Galilea, un an o tselo them Judea, un an o foro Jerusalem ninna."
Har o Pilato kowa shunas, putchas job: "Hi kau mursh dran o them Galilea?"
Un har job shunas, kai o Jesus dran o them Galilea hi, kai o Herodes o baro rai hi, mukas lo o Jesuses pash koleste te anell. O Herodes his an ko tsiro ninna an o foro Jerusalem.
Un o Herodes his bachtelo, har job o Jesuses dikas. Job shunas lestar un kamas les i raha tsiro te dikell. Job kamas, te krell o Jesus leske i baro koowa, hoi kek wawar nai krella.
Kanna, har o Jesus glan leste tardo hi, putchas job o Jesusestar bud koowa. O Jesus penas tchi pale.
I bare rashaja un i biboldengre tchatchepangre his koi pashal tardo, un anan bud tchilatcho koowa ap o Jesuseste.
Un o Herodes un leskre lurde san pral leste, riwan leske i rajeskri plashka an, un mukan les pale pash o Pilateste te anell.
Un ap ko diwes wan o Herodes un o Pilato mala. Glan ko diwes his jon chojedo jek ap i wawareste.
O Pilato das i bare rashajen, i pralstune bibolden, un i tsele menshen khetne gole,

un penas ap lende: "Tumer anan kau murshes pash mande, un penan mange, te krell lo i menshen diwjo. Me kamom lestar te shunell, hoi job koi pre penella, un hatsom kek doosh ap leste, hoi tumer ap leste pre anan.
Un o Herodes hatsas witar kek doosh ap leste. Doleske bitchras job les pale pash mende. Un kanna shunenn, hoi me tumenge penau: Kawa mursh kras tchi, te hunte well lo maredo.
Me mukau les dawa te dell, un mukau les te djal."
Koi dan i tsele menshe gole: "Mare les, un de men o Barabes!"
O Barabas his i stildo. Job kras an o foro Jerusalem i baro tchingepen, un das i murshes temerl.
O Pilato kamas o Jesuses te djal mukell. Un job das gole, te kamell lo o Jesuses te djal mukell.
I menshe dan pale gole: "De les ap o trushel! Ap o trushel leha!"
Un o Pilato putchas lendar o triinto kopo: "Hawo tchilatcho koowa kras job? Jaake har me kowa dikau, kras job tchi, te hunte well job maredo. Me dau les dawa, un mukau les te djal."
Jon dan sorleder gole, te well lo ap o trushel dino. Un har jon gar tele mukan, shunas o Pilato ap lende un penas:
"Me krau, hoi tumer kamenna." Un job penas i lurdenge, te denn le les ap o trushel, te merell lo kote.
Un o Pilato mukas koles dran o stilepen win te djal, kai kras i baro tchingepen an o foro un maras jekes. O Jesuses das job an lengre wasta.

Un har jon o Jesuses krik anan, te well job ap o trushel dino, tapran le i murshes ap o drom. Kowa budras win ap i kotar phub un his kanna ap o drom khere. Leskro lab hi Simon, un job his dran ko foro Kirene. Ap koleste tchiwan jon o trushel, te hidjell lo kowa o Jesuseske palla.
Un bud mursha un djuwja djan o Jesuseske palla ap o drom. Kolla dan bari gole un rowan.
Un o Jesus risras pes trujal un penas ap lende: "Djuwjale dran o foro Jerusalem, rowenn gar pral mande! Rowenn pral tumende un pral tumare tchawende!
Ko tsiro wella, kai i menshe penenna: Bachtele hi kol djuwja, kai lan kek tarnepen.
Ap ko tsiro penenn le ap i berge: Perenn pral mende!
Te krenn jon kawa i senelo kashteha, hoi krenn jon palle i phuro kashteha?"
Ninna dui tchilatche mursha wan o Jesuseha glan o foro anlo, te wenn le kote ap o trushel dino.

Har jon lauter ap ko kotar them wan, hoi kharella Muleskro Shero, dan jon o Jesuses ap o trushel, un kol dui tchilatche murshen ninna. Ko jekeskro trushel his tchatches lestar, ko wawareskro trushel his serwes lestar.
Koi penas o Jesus: "Miro dad, le i doosh kolendar krik, kai man ap o trushel dan! Jon djinenn gar, hoi jon kran." Un i lurde khelan pral leskre koola, te dikenn le, hoi hakeno lella.

Un i menshe, kai koi pashal tardo his, dikan kowa lauter, hoi o Jesuseha djas. Kol pralstune bibolde, kai kote tardo hi, san pral leste, un penan: "Wawaren las job dran o merepen win. Te hi lo tchatchepaha o Kristo, ko baro rai, kones o Dewel win rodas, te well lo pash mende, palle nai djals job o trushelestar tele."
Un ninna kol lurde san pral leste, un dan les shutli mool te pijell.
Un jon penan ap leste: "Tu te hal o baro rai pral i biboldende, ab o trushelestar tele!"
Un pral leste ap i kasht his tchindlo: Kowa hi i o baro rai pral i biboldende.
Jek kol tchilatche murshendar, kai ap o trushel dino his, praassas o Jesuses, un penas: "Te hal tu ko Kristo, ab o trushelestar tele, un le men ninna tele!"
