Har job pash o Simon Petreste was, penas kowa ap leste: "Rai, thoweh tu mire pire?"
Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Hoi me kraua, haiweh tu kanna gar. Pal i tsiro haiweh tu kowa."
Penas o Petro ap leste: "An kek tsiro kamau me, te thowess mire pire!" "Te thowau tut gar," penas o Jesus, "hal tu gar miro."
"Rai," penas o Simon Petro, "thob mange gar i pire kokres! Thob mange ninna i wasta un o shero!"
Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Koon tseles thodo hi, hunte well buder gar thodo. Job hi djudjo. Leskre pire kokres hunte thowell lo. Tumer han djudjo, jek kokres hi gar djudjo."
O Jesus djinas, koon ap leste phukrella. Doleske penas job: "Jek kokres hi gar djudjo."
Har lengre pire thodo his, las o Jesus peskre pralstune ripja, beshas pes pale tele un penas ap lende: "Djinenn tumer, hoi me tumenge krom?
Tumer penenn ap mande: Sikepaskro un Rai. Un kowa hi tchatcho. Me hom kowa.
Te thowom me, tumaro rai un sikepaskro, tumare pire, jaake hunte thowenn tumer ninna tumenge i pire, jek o wawareske.
Me krom tumenge kowa glan, te krenn tumer kowa ninna, jek o wawareske.
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: I budepaskro hi gar bareder har leskro rai. Un jek, kai was bitchedo hi gar bareder har kowa, kai les bitchras.
Tumer djinenn kowa kanna halauter. Te krenn tumer kowa, han bachtelo.
Kowa penau me gar tumendar halauterendar. Me djinau, kones me win rodom. Kowa hunte well jaake, har an o Debleskro lab tardo hi: Kowa, kai chal kanna o maro mantsa, stakrell pal mande.
Me penau tumenge kowa kanna, te patsenn tumer, te wella kowa. Ap ko tsiro djinenn tumer, kai me hom kowa, koon me hom.

Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Koon jekes an peskro kheer lella, koles me bitchrom, kowa lell man an peskro kheer. Un koon man an peskro kheer lella, kowa lell koles an peskro kheer, kai bitchras man."
Har o Jesus kowa penas, dukas les kowa an o dji, un job penas: "Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Jek tumendar phukrella ap mande."
Koi dikan leskre mala darenes jek ap o wawareste. Jon djinan gar, konestar job rakrella.
Jek lendar, koles, kai kamas o Jesus o djijestar, his pash leste beshdo.
Lestar mangas o Simon Petro te putchell lo o Jesusestar, koon kowa hi, kai phukrella ap leste.
Koi tchiwas pes kowa pale ap o Jesuseskro betch un putchas lestar: "Rai, koon mendar hi kowa?"

Penas o Jesus: "Me tchiwau i kotar maro an ko tcharo, un koneste me ko maro dau, kawa hi kowa, kai phukrella ap mande." Har job ko maro dran ko tcharo win las, das job kowa o Judases, koleskro dad hi o Simon Iskariot.
Har o Judas ko kotar maro las, was o beng an leste. "Hoi kameh te kress, kowa kre sik!" penas o Jesus ap leste.
Kek, kai koi pashal beshdo his, djinas, hoske job kowa leske penas.

Mashkral lende his kolla, kai haiwan, har te penals o Jesus ap leste, te ginell job tchomone dre, hoi len hunte well ap o festo. Kol wawar haiwan, har te penals o Jesus, te dell job tchomone i tchorwelende. O Judas his kowa, kai hidjas koi possita lengre lowentsa pash peste.
Har o Judas ko maro chas, djas lo sik win. His rati.
Har o Judas win djas, penas o Jesus: "Kanna well o Menshengro Tchaweskro railepen un leskri soor diklo. Un o Debleskro railepen un leskri soor well diklo ap leste.
Te was o Debleskro railepen un leskri soor ap leste diklo, dell o Dewel leste peskro railepen. Un ko tsiro hi kanna kai.
Tchowale, me hom gar buder raha pash tumende. Tumer rodenn man, un kowa, hoi me kol biboldenge penom, penau me kanna ninna tumenge: Kai me djau, nai djan tumer gar.
Kowa hi newo, hoi me tumenge kanna penau: Te kamell jek o wawares o djijestar, jaake har me kamau tumen o djijestar!
Ap kowa dikell hakeno, kai tumer mire mala han, te kamell jek o wawares o djijestar."
"Rai, kai djah tu?" putchas o Simon Petro lestar. Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Kote, kai me kanna djaua, nai djah tu gar peha. Pal i tsiro weh tu ninna koi."
"Rai, hoske nai wau me kanna gar tuha?" putchas o Petro lestar. "Me meroms tuke ninna."
"Tu kameh mange te merell?" putchas o Jesus lestar. "Tchatchepaha, me penau tuke: O bashno dell gar gole jaake raha, har tu man gar triin kope buchoste dal."
"Tumaro dji hunte trashell gar. Patsenn ap o Debleste un patsenn ap mande!
An miro dadeskro kheer hi bud iseme. Te wals kowa gar jaake, penoms me kowa gar. Me djau koi un dikau, te wenn kol iseme tumenge kerdo.
Un te krom halauter jaake, te nai tsardenn dre, wau me pale, un lau tumen pash mande, te wenn tumer kote, kai me hom.
Tumer djinenn ko drom, kai me djaua."
"Rai," penas o Thomas ap leste, "mer djinah gar, kai tu djah. Har nai djinah ko drom?"
"Me hom o drom, un o tchatchepen un o djipen," penas o Jesus. "Dell kek wawar drom pash o dadeste, har man.
Te prindjrans man, prindjrans ninna miro dades. Un kanna prindjrenn les tumer un dikan les."
"Rai," penas o Filipo ap leste, "sike mende o dades! Kowa hi menge doha."
"Jaake raha hom pash tumende un tu prindjreh man gar, Filipo?" penas o Jesus. "Koon man dikella, kowa dikell o dades. Har nai peneh tu: Sike mende o dades?
Patseh tu gar, kai me an o dadeste hom un o dad an mande hi? Hoi me tumenge penau, kowa well gar mandar. Na-a! O dad, kai an mande hi, krell kowa halauter.
Patsenn man, kai me an o dadeste hom, un kai o dad an mande hi. Te patsenn tumer kowa gar, palle patsenn ap kowa, hoi me krau!
Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Koon ap mande patsella, krell ninna kowa, hoi me krau. Un job krell bareder koowa har me, kanna, kai djau me pash o dadeste.
Un hoi tumer an miro lab mangenna, kowa kamau me te krell tumenge. Kowa, hoi o tchawo krella, sikrell i menshende o Debleskro railepen un leskri soor.
Kowa, hoi tumer mangenn an miro lab, kamau me tumenge te krell."
"Te kamenn tumer man o djijestar, krenn tumer, hoi me tumenge penom.
Un me mangau o dadestar, te bitchrell job tumenge i rakepaskres, kai well ap tumari rig. Job djal buder gar krik tumendar.

Kowa hi o Debleskro Ducho, kai penell i menshenge o tchatchepen pral o Debleste. Kolla, kai patsenn gar ap o Debleste, nai lenn les gar. Jon dikenn les gar un prindjrenn les gar. Tumer prindjrenn les. Job atchell pash tumende, un hi an tumende.
Me mukau tumen gar kokres, har te well tumen kek dad. Me wau pash tumende.
An i tikno tsiro dikenn man i menshe ap kai phub buder gar. Tumer dikenn man. Me djiwau. Doleske djiwenn tumer ninna.
Ko diwes wella, kai tumer djinenna, kai me an miro dadeste hom, un tumer an mande han, un me an tumende hom.

Koon mire laba shunella un krell, hoi me penau, kowa kamell man tchatchepaha o djijestar. Un koon man kamella, koles kamell miro dad. Un me kamau les ninna o djijestar un me sikrau leste, koon me hom."
"Rai, hoske kameh tu mende te sikrell, koon tu hal, un gar i wawar menshende?" putchas lestar o Judas, kowa, kai his gar o Judas Iskariot.
Koi penas o Jesus ap leste: "Te kamell man jek o djijestar, kowa krell, hoi me penau. Koles kamell miro dad. Un mer wah pash leste un atchah pash leste.
Koon man gar kamella, kowa krell witar gar, hoi me penau. Un hoi me penau, well gar mandar. Kowa well miro dadestar, kai bitchras man.
Kau koowa penom me tumenge, jaake raha har me pash tumende homs.

Me te hom buder gar pash tumende, bitchrell o dad tumenge o rakepaskres, kai well ap tumari rig. Kowa hi o Debleskro Ducho. Un job penell tumenge halauter jaake, te nai haiwenn kowa mishto. Un job mukell tumenge halauter an o shero te well, hoi me tumenge penom.
Ninna te hom me gar pash tumende, atchell koi bacht, hoi me dom tumen, an tumare djia. Me dau tumen miri bacht. Koi bacht nai denn tumen gar i menshe ap kai phub. Ma trashenn! Ma awenn dareno!
Tumer shunan, hoi me penom: Me djau mange un wau pale pash tumende. Te kamans man o djijestar, wans tumer bachtelo, kai me pash o dadeste djau. Miro dad hi bareder har me.
Me penau tumenge kawa kanna, te patsenn tumer ap ko tsiro, kai kowa wella, kai kowa tchatcho hi, hoi me tumenge penom.
Man hi buder gar bud tsiro, te rakrap tumentsa. O beng, kai hi o rai pral kai phub, wella. Les hi kek soor pral mande.
Me krau, hoi miro dad mange penas, te dikenn i menshe ap kai phub, kai kamau les o djijestar. Stenn pre, te djas menge!"
"Me hom ko tchatcho drakengro ruk. Un miro dad hi ko hacho, kai budrella an koi baar, kai i drakengre ruka tardo hi.
Hako senelo kasht ap mande, hoi anell kek drake, tchinell job tele. Un ko kasht, hoi anell drake, krell job djudjo, te anell lo budeder drake.
Tumer han djudjo. Mire laba, hoi penom tumenge, kran tumen djudjo.
Atchenn an mande un me atchau an tumende! Te atchenn tumer gar an mande, well kek latcho koowa dran tumende, jaake har ko kasht nai anell dran peste kek drake. Job hunte atchell ap o ruk.
Me hom ko drakengro ruk. Un tumer han kol kashta. Koon atchell an mande un me an leste, dran koleste well bud latchepen. Tumer te han gar mantsa khetne, nai krenn tumer tchi.
Koon atchell gar an mande, kowa well win witsedo, har kol kashta, kai tele tchindlo hi. Jon wenn khetne rodedo un an i jag tchiddo, te chatchrenn le.
Te atchenn tumer an mande un krenn kowa, hoi me penom, palle nai mangenna mandar, hoi kamenna. Un kowa lenn tumer.
Te well bud latchepen dran tumende, well miro dad sharedo. Un tumer wenn mire mala.
Har miro dad man o djijestar kamella, jaake kamau me tumen ninna o djijestar. Atchenn an miro kamlepen!
Te krenn tumer kowa, hoi me tumenge penom, atchenn tumer an miro kamlepen jaake, har me kowa krau, hoi miro dad mange penas. Un me atchau an leskro kamlepen.
Kowa penom me tumenge, te well miri bacht an tumende jaake baro, har djal gar bareder.
Kowa kamau tumendar, te kamell jek o wawares o djijestar jaake har me tumen kamau o djijestar.
Kekes hi bareder kamlepen har kowa, kai merell peskre malenge.
Te krenn tumer, hoi me tumenge penom, han mire mala.
Tumer han mange buder gar budepangre. I budepaskro djinell gar, hoi leskro rai krella. Tumenge penom halauter, hoi shunom miro dadestar. Doleske han tumer kanna mire mala.
Tumer rodan man gar wi. Me rodom tumen wi, te djiwenn jaake, te well dran tumaro djipen latcho koowa, hoi atchella. Un o dad dell tumen halauter, hoi mangenn lestar an miro lab."
"Krenn, hoi me tumenge penau: Kamau, te kamell jek o wawares o djijestar!
Te kamenn tumen i menshe ap kai phub gar, ma bistrenn, kai jon kaman man witar gar.
Te hans tumer menshe kai phubjatar, palle kamans le tumen. Jon kamenn kolen, kai hi jaake har jon. Tumer han gar kolendar. Me rodom tumen dran lende wi. Doleske kamenn le tumen gar.

Rikrenn an tumaro shero, hoi me tumenge penom: I budepaskro hi gar bareder har leskro rai. Lan man jon palla, lenn jon tumen ninna palla. Te shunan jon ap kowa, hoi me lenge penom, shunenn jon ninna, hoi tumer lenge penenna.
Tumer han miro. Doleske hi jon tchilatcho ap tumende. Jon prindjrenn koles gar, kai bitchras man.
Te woms me gar pash lende, un penoms lenge gar halauter, lans le kek doosh ap pende. Kanna nai penenn jon gar: Mer djinam gar, kai kowa, hoi kram, tchilatcho hi.
Koon man gar kamella, kowa kamell witar gar miro dades.
Te kroms me gar glan lengre jaka ko baro koowa, hoi nai kek wawar kras, wals len kek doosh. Kanna dikan jon kowa. Un ninna te dikan le les, hi le tchilatcho ap mande un ap miro dadeste.
Jaake was kowa tchatcho, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: Jon hi tchilatcho ap mande, ninna te krom kek tchilatchepen ap lende.
"Te hom pash o dadeste, palle bitchrau tumenge o rakepaskres, kai wella ap tumari rig. Kowa hi o Debleskro Ducho. An leste hi o tchatchepen. Job wella o dadestar, un penell o tchatchepen pral mande.
Ninna tumer, kai hans o tselo tsiro pash mande, penenn i menshenge mandar, hoi tumer dikan un shunan."
"Kowa halauter penom me ap tumende, te denn tumer gar tumaro patsepen ap mande pre.
Jon krenn tumen pale-tchiddo. Un ko tsiro wella, kai denn jon tumen mulo un penenn: O Dewel kamas kowa jaake.
Jon prindjrenn o dades gar un man witar gar. Doleske krenn jon kowa.
Te well ko tsiro, hunte djinenn tumer, kai kowa jaake wella, har me les tumenge penom. Me penom tumenge kowa gar, har homs pash tumende. Kanna penau tumenge kowa.
Kanna djau me pash koleste, kai bitchras man. Un kek tumendar putchell mandar: Kai djah tu?
Kowa, hoi tumenge penom, dukell tumen an o dji.
Patsenn man: Hi mishto tumenge, te djap mange. Te djau me gar, nai well ko rakepaskro gar pash tumende, kai wella ap tumari rig. Me te djau mange, bitchrau les pash tumende.
Job te wella, palle krell job i menshenge i jaka pre pral lengri doosh, pral o Debleskro tchatchepen un pral o Debleskri choli, hoi wella pral kai phub.
Lengri doosh hi, kai patsenn le gar ap mande.
O Debleskro tchatchepen dikenn le ap kowa, kai me djau pash o dadeste, un tumer dikenn man buder gar.
Kai o Debleskri choli pral kai phub wella, dikenn le ap kowa, kai i phagi pral o rajeste pral kai phub wi-rakedo hi.
Me kamoms tumenge jaake bud te penell. Tumer haiwenn nai kowa kanna gar.

Te well o Debleskro Ducho, kai o tchatchepen an leste hi, sikrell lo tumende o tselo tchatchepen. Job rakrell gar dran peste. Hoi job shunella, kowa rakrell job. Un hoi wella, penell job tumenge glan-wi.
Job sharell man. Halauter, hoi job penell tumenge, well mandar.
Halauter, hoi o dades hi, hi ninna miro. Doleske nai penau me: Lauter, hoi job penell tumenge, well mandar.
Pal i tikno tsiro dikenn man buder gar. Un pale pal i tikno tsiro dikenn man tumer pale."
"Hoi penell lo," putchan leskre mala jek o wawarestar, "te penell lo ap mende: Pal i tikno tsiro dikenn man buder gar; un pale pal i tikno tsiro dikenn man tumer pale; un me djau pash o dadeste?
Hoi hi kowa, te penell lo: I tikno tsiro? Mer djinah gar, hoi job rakrella."

O Jesus haiwas lendar, kai kaman le lestar kowa te putchell, un job penas ap lende: "Kamenn tumer te djinell, hoi kowa hi, kai penom: Pal i tikno tsiro dikenn man buder gar; un pale pal i tikno tsiro dikenn man tumer?

Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Well i tsiro, kai tumer rowenna, un denn i wasta pral o shero khetne. Un i menshe, kai gar ap mande patsenna, hi bachtelo. Ninna te rowell tumaro dji ap ko diwes, djinenn: Tumaro ropen well tumendar krik lino, un tumer wenna bachtelo.
I djuwel, kai lell i tarnepen, kolat hi duka. Te hi ko tarnepen koi, bistrell li kol duka. Jaake bari hi lakri bacht, kai joi las i tarnepen.
Kanna rowell tumaro dji. Un me penau tumenge kanna: Me wau pale pash tumende. Un tumer wenn bachtelo. Un koi bacht nai lell tumendar kek krik.
Ap ko diwes, putchenn tumer mandar tchi. Tchatchepaha, me penau tumenge: Te mangenn tumer miro dadestar tchomone an miro lab, kowa dell job tumen.
Bis kanna mangan tumer tchi an miro lab. Mangenn un job dell tumen, te well tumari bacht jaake bari, bareder djal gar!
Kowa penom me tumenge gar an o mui. O diwes wella, kai me rikrau buder tchi pale. Palle rakrau tumentsa miro dadestar jaake, kai haiwenna halauter.
Ap ko diwes mangenn tumer o dades an miro lab. Me penau gar, kai me mangau miro dades tumenge.
Miro dad kamell tumen ninna jaake har me kamau tumen. Tumer kamenn man o djijestar un patsenna, kai me o Deblestar wom. Doleske kamell tumen miro dad ninna o djijestar.
Me wom o dadestar, un wom ap kai phub. Un me mukau pale kai phub, un djau pash miro dadeste."
Koi penan leskre mala ap leste: "Kanna rakreh tu jaake, kai haiwah kowa. Tu rikreh buder tchi pale.
Kanna djinah mer, kai tu halauter djineh. Tu djineh glan-wi, hoi i menshe kamenn tutar te putchell. Doleske patsah mer, kai tu o Deblestar weh."
"Kanna patsenn tumer?" penas o Jesus.
"Dikenn, ko tsiro wella un hi koi, kai nashenn tumer halauter mandar. Hakeno djal pale khere. Un man mukenn tumer kokres. Ninna te mukenn man, hom me gar kokres. O dad hi pash mande.
Kowa lauter penom tumenge, te well tumen i bari bacht an o dji pral kowa, kai han mire. Kate ap kai phub hi tumen daar. Ma darenn! Me hom sorleder har halauter ap kai phub."
Pal kol laba dikas o Jesus pre an o bolepen un penas: "Tata, o tsiro hi kai. Sike, hawo railepen un hawi soor tu tiro tchaweste dal, te sikrell job ninna tiro railepen un tiri soor!
Tu dal les i soor pral i tsele menshende, te dell job lauteren, kai tu les dal, o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
Kowa hi ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella: Te prindjrenn jon tut, kai tu hal o tchatcho Dewel, un te prindjrenn jon o Jesus Kristes, koles tu bitchral ap kai phub.
Me sikrom kol menshen tiro railepen un tiri soor ap i phub. Un me krom halauter, hoi tu mange penal.
Un kanna, tata, de man ko railepen un koi soor, hoi his man pash tute, har o bolepen un i phub gar koi his!
Tu dal menshen dran kai phub gole un dal len mande. Kolende sikrom, koon tu hal. Jon his tiro un tu dal len mande. Un jon rikran pen ap tiro lab.
Jon djinenna kanna, kai halauter, hoi tu man dal, tchatchepaha tutar well.
Hoi tu mange penal, penom me lenge dureder. Un jon lan mire laba pre un haiwan, kai me tchatchepaha tutar wom. Un jon patsan, kai tu man bitchral.
Kolenge mangau me. Me mangau gar kol wawar menshenge ap kai phub. Me mangau kolenge, kai tu man dal. Jon hi tire.
Halauter, hoi miro hi, hi ninna tiro. Un hoi tiro hi, hi ninna miro. Ap lende well miro railepen un miri soor diklo.
An i tikno tsiro hom buder gar ap kai phub. Me wau pash tute. Jon hi ap kai phub. Miro dad, tu hal o baro Dewel, rike len an tire wasta, te atchenn jon pash tute, te wenn jon jek, jaake har mer ham!

Jaake raha har me pash lende homs, dom garda ap lende an tiri soor, kai tu man dal. Me rikrom len, te djan jon gar krik tutar. Kek lendar djas nashedo. Jek kokres djas nashedo, jaake te was tchatcho, hoi lestar tchindlo was.
Kanna wau me pash tute. Kowa rakrau lauter jaake raha, har hom me ap kai phub, te well koi bacht an lengre djia jaake bari, bareder djal gar.
Me penom lenge tire laba. Jon hi gar kai phubjatar, jaake har me hom witar gar kai phubjatar. Doleske hi i menshe ap kai phub chojemen ap lende.
Me mangau tutar gar, te less len tu dran kai phub win. Me mangau tut, te rikress tu o benges lendar pale.
Jon hi gar kai phubjatar, jaake har me hom witar gar kai phubjatar.
Muk len tiro tchatchepen te dikell, te djiwenn le pengro tselo djipen tuke kokres! Tiro lab hi o tchatchepen.
Me bitchrau len pash i menshende, jaake har tu man pash i menshende bitchral.
Me dau tut miro tselo djipen. Kowa krau lenge, te wenn jon ninna tire an o tchatchepen.
Me mangau gar lenge kokres. Me mangau ninna kol menshenge, kai shunenna, hoi jon mandar penenna, un dran kowa ap mande patsenna.
Me mangau tutar, te wenn le halauter jek, jaake har tu, tata, an mande hal, un me an tute hom. Jaake te wenn jon jek an mende, te patsenn i menshe, kai tu man bitchral.
Me dom len ko railepen un koi soor, hoi tu man dal, te wenn jon jek, jaake har mer jek ham.
Me djiwau an lende. Un tu djiweh an mande. Jaake te wenn jon jek. Un i menshe dikenna, kai tu man bitchral, un kai tu len jaake kameh, har tu man kameh.
Tata, me kamau, te wenn kolla, kai tu man dal, pash mande, kote, kai me hom, te dikenn le miro railepen un miri soor, hoi tu man dal. Tu kamal man o djijestar, har o bolepen un i phub gar koi his.
Tata, tu hal an o tchatchepen tardo! I menshe ap kai phub prindjrenn tut gar. Me prindjrau tut. Un kalla haiwan, kai tu man bitchral.
Me sikrom lende, koon tu hal. Kowa krau me dureder, te well tiro kamlepen, hoi hi tut mange, ninna an lende. Jaake djiwau me an lende."
Har o Jesus kowa penas, djas job peskre malentsa wi. Un jon djan wergal ko pani, hoi kharella Kidron. Koi his i baar. Koi dre djas o Jesus peskre malentsa.
Kote his lo bud kope peskre malentsa. Doleske prindjras ninna o Judas, ko phukepaskro, koi baar.
Un o Judas djas kote. Leha wan kol lurde un kliste, kolen i bare rashaja un i Farisarja bitchran. Len his chare un kashta un hidjan momlia un jag.
O Jesus djinas halauter, hoi ap leste wella un djas wi pash lende un putchas lendar: "Kones rodenn tumer?"
"O Jesuses dran Nazaret," penan jon ap leste. "Me hom kowa!" penas o Jesus. O Judas, ko phukepaskro, his pash lende tardo.
Har o Jesus ap lende penas "Me hom kowa," djan jon i kotar pale un peran ap i phub.
Pale putchas o Jesus lendar: "Kones rodenn tumer?" "O Jesuses dran Nazaret," penan jon.
"Me penom tumenge, kai me kowa hom," penas o Jesus. "Te hom me kowa, koles tumer rodenna, palle mukenn kol wawaren te djal."
Kowa penas o Jesus, te well tchatcho, hoi job glan-wi penas: "Tata, me nashrom kekes kolendar, kai tu man dal."
O Simon Petro, koles his i charo pash peste. Job las peskro charo, un das jek klisteske o tchatcho kand tele. Kowa kharas Malcho un his i klisto, kai budras o baro rashajeske.
Koi penas o Jesus ap o Petreste: "Tchip tiro charo pale! Djap me gar ko drom, kai miro dad kamell, te djap les, ninna te wenn kote bare duka ap mande?"
Un i lurde pengro pralstuneha un i biboldengre kliste tapran o Jesuses un pandan les.
Un anan les pash o Hannas. Kowa his o dad o Kajafeskri romjatar. O Kajafas his an kau bersh baro rashai.
Job his kowa, kai penas i biboldenge: "Wals feteder menge, te merals jek i tsele menshenge."
O Petro un i wawar o Jesuseskre malendar djan o Jesuseske palla, har job an o kheer o baro rashajestar anlo was. O baro rashai prindjras ko wawar males. Doleske djas nai job o Jesuseha an ko kheer.
O Petro atchas win glan o wudar tardo. Koi was ko wawar pale, kowa, kai his o baro rashajestar prindjedo, un rakras koi djuwjaha, kai das garda glan o wudar, un las o Petres dre.
Koi djuwel, kai das glan o wudar garda, putchas o Petrestar: "Hal tu gar jek kol malendar ko murshestar koi?" "Na-a, me gar!" penas job.
Koi his budepangre un kliste tardo, kai kran i jag. Lenge his shila un jon tatsran pen. O Petro his ninna pash lende tardo, te tatsrell lo pes.
Kanna putchas o baro rashai o Jesuses win pral leskre malende un pral kowa, hoi job i menshenge penas.

O Jesus penas ap leste: "Me rakrom glan i tsele menshende jaake, kai hakeno kowa nai shunas. Hako tsiro rakrom an i biboldengri kangri un an o Debleskro baro kheer, kai i tsele bibolde khetne wan. Me penom tchi tchorchanes.
Hoske putcheh tu mandar? Putch kolendar, kai shunan man. Jon djinenna, hoi me penom!"
Har job kowa penas, das jek kol biboldengro klistendar, kai koi pashal tardo his, o Jesuses an o mui un penas: "Har nai rakreh tu jaake o baro rashajeha?"
Koi penas o Jesus ap leste: "Nai peneh tu, kai me tchilatcho koowa rakrom? Te penom me lauter, hoi tchatcho hi, hoske dal tu man?"
O Hannas anas les pandlo pash ko baro rashajeste Kajafas.
O Petro his koi tardo un tatsras pes. Koi penan le ap leste: "Hal tu gar jek leskre malendar?" Job das buchoste un penas: "Me hom kowa gar."
"Dikom me tut gar an i baar pash leste?" penas jek klisto, kai budrell ko baro rashajeske. Kau klisto his jek koleskre menshendar, koleske o Petro o kand tele das.
Pale das o Petro buchoste, un penas: "Me homs gar pash leste." Kanna das o bashno gole.

Kanna anan le o Jesuses dran o Kajafeskro kheer wi, un anan les an o baro kheer o themeskro rajestar, kai i Remari his. His taissarlake. I bibolde djan gar leha an ko baro kheer dre, te wenn le gar pale-tchiddo. Jon kaman te nai chan le ko chapen ap ko baro diwes, kai kharella Passa.
O themeskro rai, - leskro lab his Pilato - djas pash lende wi un putchas lendar: "Hawo tchilatcho koowa kras job?"
Jon penan ap leste: "Te wals kau mursh gar tchilatcho, anams les gar pash tute."
"Ake, lenn les un denn les tumer i phagi pal o biboldengro tchatchepen!" penas o Pilato ap lende. "Mer nai marah kekes pal o Remarjengro tchatchepen," penan kol bibolde.
Jaake was kowa tchatcho, hoi o Jesus pral peskro merepen glan-wi penas.
O Pilato djas pale an peskro kheer, un mukas o Jesuses dre te anell, un putchas lestar: "Hal tu o baro rai pral i biboldende?"
"Peneh tu kowa dran tute wi? Penan kowa tuke wawar mandar?" putchas o Jesus.
"Hom me i biboldo?" penas o Pilato. "Tire menshe un i bare rashaja dan tut an mire wasta. Hoi kral tu?"

Koi penas o Jesus: "Miro them un i menshe, kolengro rai me hom hi gar kai phubjatar. Te wals miro them kai phubjatar, un ninna i menshe, kolengro rai me hom, palle kurans pen mire budepangre i biboldentsa, te perap me gar an kolengre wasta. Me penau tuke: Miro them un mire menshe, kolengro rai me hom, hi gar kai phubjatar."

Putchas o Pilato lestar: "Hal tu tchatchepaha i baro rai?" Penas o Jesus: "Awa, hi jaake har tu penal. Me hom i baro rai. Me wom boldo ap kai phub, te penap o tchatchepen. Koon an o tchatchepen tardo hi, kowa shunell ap mande."
"Hoi hi o tchatchepen?" putchas o Pilato lestar. Un har job kowa penas, djas lo pale wi pash i biboldende un penas ap lende: "Me hatsau kek doosh ap leste.
Shunenn, pash tumende well hako bersh ap kol bare diwessa, kai kharenna Passa, i stildo dran o stilepen muklo. Kamenn tumer, te mukap o baro rajes pral i biboldende te djal?"
Jon dan pale gole: "Gar koles! Mer kamah, te mukess o Barabes dran o stilepen win!" Kowa his i marepaskro.
Koi las o Pilato o Jesuses, un mukas les i tchupnijaha te dell.
I lurde pandan subjengre kashta khetne un tchiwan len leske ap o shero jaake, har i baro rai hidjell shereskro sonakai ap peskro shero. Un jon tchiwan leske i loli rajeskri plashka trujal.
Un wan glan leste un penan: "Sharedo wess tu, baro rai pral i biboldende!" Un jon dan les an o mui.
Un pale djas o Pilato pash i biboldende win, un penas ap lende: "Me anau les pash tumende win, te dikenn tumer, kai hatsau kek doosh ap leste."
Un o Jesus was wi. Un ap leskro shero his i pandle subjengre kashta, un koi loli kutch plashka his ap leste. Un o Pilato penas ap lende: "Dikenn, hawo mensho hi lo!"

Har kol bare rashaja un kol kliste o Jesuses dikan, dan jon gole: "De les ap o trushel! De les ap o trushel!" "Lenn tumer les," penas o Pilato, "un denn les ap o trushel! Me hatsau kek doosh ap leste."
"Pal maro biboldengro tchatchepen hunte well lo mulo dino," penan i bibolde ap o Pilato. "Job penas, kai hi lo o Debleskro tchawo."
Har o Pilato kowa shunas, was i bari daar ap leste.
Job djas pale an peskro kheer un putchas o Jesusestar: "Kai weh tu?" O Jesus penas tchi koi pre.
Koi putchas o Pilato lestar: "Rakreh tu mantsa gar? Djineh tu gar, kai kowa an mire wasta hi, te mukap tut te djal. Un te dap tut ap o trushel, hi ninna an mire wasta?"
Penas o Jesus: "Tut wals kek soor pral mande, te dals tut o Dewel koja gar. Doleske hi koles, kai das man an tire wasta, bareder doosh har tut."

Koi kamas o Pilato o Jesuses mukell te djal. Kol bibolde dan gole: "Te mukeh tu koles te djal, hal tu kek maal o baro rajestar an o foro Rom! Hakeno, koon krell pes har te well job i baro rai, kowa hadell pes pral leste."
Har o Pilato kol laba shunas, anas job o Jesuses wi un beshas pes ap ko tchatchepaskro beshepaskro, hoi kharella Barengri Phub. Ap o biboldengro rakepen kharella kowa Gabbata.
His jaake deesh-te-dujenge, jek diwes glan kol bare diwessa, kai kharenna Passa. Un o Pilato penas ap kol biboldende: "Dikenn, kowa hi tumaro baro rai!"

Jon dan gole: "Mare les! Mare les, un de les ap o trushel!" Koi putchas o Pilato lendar: "Kamenn tumer te dap tumaro baro rajes ap o trushel?" "Men hi kek wawar rai har o baro rai an o foro Rom kokres," penan kol bare rashaja.
Kanna das job o Jesuses an lengre wasta, te denn le les ap o trushel. Un o Jesus was krik anlo.
Un job hidjas peskro trushel, un djas dran ko foro win ap ko kotar them, hoi kharella muleskro shero. Kowa kharella ap o biboldengro rakepen Golgata.
Kote dan le les ap o trushel, un dui wawar mursha ninna. Ko jekeskro trushel his tchatches lestar, ko wawareskro trushel his serwes lestar. Un o Jesus his mank lende.
O Pilato tchinas ap i kotar kasht: O Jesus dran Nazaret, o baro rai pral i biboldende. Ko kotar kasht was pral ap o trushel dino.

Kowa, hoi koi pre tchindlo hi, draweran bud bibolde. Ko kotar them, kai dan le o Jesuses ap o trushel, his gar dur o forestar tchiddo. Un kol laba his tchindlo ap hebretikes, lataintikes, un grichtikes.
Koi penan kol bare rashaja ap o Pilateste: "Ma tchin: O baro rai pral i biboldende! Tchin, kai job penas: Me hom o baro rai pral i biboldende!"
"Kowa atchell jaake, har me kowa tchinom!" penas o Pilato.
Kol lurde, kai o Jesuses ap o trushel dan, lan leskre ripja, un kran dran lende star kotja. Un hakeno las i kotar. Ko telstuno ripen his gar khetne sido. Kowa his an jek kotar.

Koi penan jon jek ap o wawareste: "Mer mukah ko ripen jaake, har kowa hi. Mer khelah, koon les lella." Jaake was kowa tchatcho, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: Hakeno las i kotar mire ripjendar. Un koon miro telstuno ripen lella, khelan jon win. Jaake kran i lurde.
Tel ko trushel, kai o Jesus pre dino his, his leskri dai un kolakri pheen tardo. Ninna i Maria, kolakro rom o Kleopas hi, un i Maria Magdalena his koi tardo.
Har o Jesus peskri dat dikas un pash late peskro males, koles, kai job o djijestar kamas, penas lo ap peskri date: "Romnija, dik, kowa hi kanna tiro tchawo!"
Ap peskro maleste penas lo: "Dik, koja hi kanna tiri dai!" Koi las ko maal lat pash peste an peskro kheer.
Pal kowa, har o Jesus djinas, kai job halauter kras, penas lo: "Man hi trush!" Kowa penas job, te well kowa tchatcho, hoi an o Debleskro lab glan-wi penlo was.

Koi his i khoro tardo. Kowa his pherdo shutli mool. Un jon lan tchomone har i kotar thann, kran les pherdo shutli mool, tchiwan kowa ap i baro kasht, hoi kharella Ysop, un rikran leske kowa glan o mui.
Har pijas o Jesus koi shutli mool, penas lo: "Me krom lauter, hoi hunte krom." Un job tchiwas peskro shero glan tele, un meras.

His o diwes glan o Debleskro diwes. Ko Debleskro diwes his i baro diwes. Doleske kaman i pralstune bibolde gar, te atchenn i mule ap ko Debleskro diwes ap o trushel. Un jon mangan o Pilatestar, te wenn i herja kolendar phagedo, kai ap o trushel dino wan, te merenn le sikeder. I bibolde kaman, te lenn le len sik tele.
Koi wan i lurde un phagan i herja kol dui wawarendar, kai kote ap i trushel dino wan.
Har jon pash o Jesuseste wan un dikan, kai job mulo hi, phagan jon leskre herja gar.
Jek kol lurdendar das les peskro chareha an i rig tchurje. Koi was pani un rat win.
Un kowa, kai dikas kowa halauter, penas i wawarenge, hoi job dikas. Un kowa, hoi job penas, hi tchatcho. Un job djinella, kai job o tchatchepen penella, te patsenn tumer ninna.
Kowa was halauter jaake, har an o Debleskro lab glan-wi penlo was: Kek kokalo was leske phagedo,
un ninna: Jon dikenn koles, kai dan le an i rig tchurje.

Pal kowa djas o Josef, kowa, kai dran o foro Arimatia his, pash o Pilateste, un mangas lestar, te dell job les o mulo Jesuses. O Josef patsas ap o Jesuseste tchorchanes i darjatar i pralstune biboldendar. Un o Pilato penas, kai job o Jesuses o trushelestar nai tele lella. Un jaake djas job pash o trushel, un las les tele.
Ninna o Nikodemus, kowa, kai was jek kopo an i rat pash o Jesuseste, was kote un anas jaake triin-deesh kilo kutch djet, kerdo dran Myrrhe un dran Aloe.
Un jon lan o mulo Jesuses un pandan les an laintikre kotja, kai tchiwan le ko kutch djet dre, hoi sungella mishto, jaake har i bibolde kowa krenna.
Kote, kai o Jesus ap o trushel dino was, his i baar. An koi baar his i newo mulengro kheer. Koi his kek mensho dre tchiddo.
Un har dikan le, kai ko mulengro kheer gar dur hi, tchiwan le kote o Jesuses dre. Len his kek tsiro. O Debleskro diwes wals sik.
Sik taissarlake, pal o Debleskro diwes, har gomme rati his, was i Maria Magdalena pash ko mulengro kheer, un dikas, kai ko bar buder gar glan o wudar hi.

Koi nashas joi pash o Simon Petreste un pash ko wawareste kol deesh-te-dujendar, koles, kai kamas o Jesus o djijestar, un penas ap lende: "Jon lan o rajes dran ko mulengro kheer win. Un mer djinah gar, kai jon les tchiwan."
Koi djas o Petro un ko wawar pash ko mulengro kheer.
Kol dui nashan khetne. Ko wawar nashas sikeder har o Petro. Jaake was job glan leste pash o mulengro kheer,
dikas koi dre, un dikas kol laintikre kotja kote tchiddo. Job djas gar dre.
Pal leste was o Simon Petro un djas an ko mulengro kheer dre, un dikas kol laintikre kotja kote tchiddo.
Ko diklo, kai trul o Jesuseskro shero pandlo his, his gar pash kol wawar laintikre kotja tchiddo. Kowa his khetne pandlo, un his kokres tchiddo.
Kanna djas ninna ko wawar o Jesuseskre malendar dre, kai glan leste pash ko mulengro kheer was. Un job dikas un patsas.
Jon haiwan gar, hoi an o Debleskro lab tardo hi, kai job hunte stella i mulendar pre.
Pal kowa djan kol dui pale khere.
I Maria his win glan o mulengro kheer tardo un rowas. Har joi jaake rowas, dikas li an o mulengro kheer dre.
Kote, kai o Jesus tchiddo his, dikas joi dui bolepangren an parne ripja beshdo. Ko jek his kote, kai leskro shero tchiddo his, un ko wawar, kai leskre herja his.
"Hoske roweh tu, romnija?" putchan kol bolepangre i Mariatar. "Jon lan miro rajes krik," penas li, "un me djinau gar, kai jon les tchiwan."
Un har joi kowa penas, risras pes li trujal, un dikas o Jesuses. Job his glan late tardo, un joi prindjras les gar.

Koi penas o Jesus ap late: "Romnija, hoske roweh tu? Kones rodeh tu?" I Maria patsas: Job hi kowa, kai budrell an i baar. Doleske penas li: "Romeha, te anal tu les krik, pen mange, kai tu les tchiwal, te djap koi, un lap les pale!"
"Maria!" penas o Jesus. Koi risras pes li trujal, un penas ap hebretikes: "Rabuni!" Kowa kharella Sikepaskro.

Penas o Jesus ap late: "Ma tape ap mande! Me djom gomme gar pash o dadeste pale. Dja pash mire phralende un pen lenge: Me djau pash miro dadeste un pash tumaro dadeste un pash miro Debleste un pash tumaro Debleste."
Koi djas i Maria Magdalena pash o Jesuseskre malende, un penas lenge: "Me dikom maro rajes!" Un joi penas lenge, hoi job lake penas.

Har rati his ap kau diwes, - kowa his i kurko, - his o Jesuseskre mala khetne. I darjatar kol biboldendar his lengro wudar klidedo. Ap jek kopo was o Jesus dre, un djas mashkral lende, un penas ap lende: "O Debleskri bacht tumentsa!"
Har job kowa penas, sikras job lende peskre wasta, un peskri rig. Koi wan o Jesuseskre mala bachtelo, kai dikan le pengro rajes.
Pale penas o Jesus ap lende: "O Debleskri bacht tumentsa! Har miro dad man bitchras, jaake bitchrau me tumen."
Un har job kowa penas, phurdas job ap lende, un penas: "Lenn o Debleskro Ducho!
Ap koneste tumer penenna: Tiri doosh hi krik lino, koleske well li krik lino. Un ap koneste tumer penenna: Tiri doosh atchell ap tute, ap koleste atchell li."
O Thomas, jek kol deesh-te-dujendar, koles dan le ninna Didimo gole, his gar koi pashal, har o Jesus pash lende was.

Ap leste penan i wawar kol deesh-te-dujendar: "Mer dikam maro rajes!" Job penas ap lende: "Te dikau me gar leskre wasta, kai saster dre dino was, un te tchiwau me gar miro gushto koi dre un miro wast an leskri rig, patsau me kowa gar."

Un pal ochta diwessa his o Jesuseskre mala pale khetne an ko kheer. Un o wudar his klidedo. Kau kopo his o Thomas pash lende. Ap jek kopo his o Jesus mashkral lende tardo, un penas: "O Debleskri bacht tumentsa!"
Pal kowa penas job ap o Thomas: "Tchip tiro gushto ap mire wasta, un tchip tiro wast an miri rig. Atch gar har jek, kai patsell gar. Pats kanna!"
Koi penas o Thomas ap leste: "Miro rai un miro Dewel!"
"Kanna, kai dikal man, patseh tu," penas o Jesus. "Bachtele hi kolla, kai patsenna, ninna te dikenn le man gar."
Bud wawar baro koowa kras o Jesus an o Debleskri soor glan peskre malende, kai gar an kau liil tchindlo hi.
Kawa was tchindlo, te patsenn tumer, kai o Jesus ko baro rai hi, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job. Job hi o Debleskro tchawo. Un te patsenn ap leste, lenn tumer o tchatcho djipen lestar.
Pal kowa mukas pes o Jesus glan peskre malende pale te dikell, har jon pash o baro pani Tiberias his. Un kowa was jaake:
O Simon Petro un o Thomas, kowa, kai dan le les Didimo gole, un o Natanael dran o gab Kana an o them Galilea, un kol Zebedeskre tchawe un wawar dui o Jesuseskre malendar his koi khetne.
Un o Simon Petro penas ap lende: "Me djau te matchrell." "Mer kamah tuha te djal," penan kol wawar. Jon djan wi un djan an o panjeskro ulepaskro dre. Un koi rati tapran le tchi.
Sik taissarlake his o Jesus pash o pani tardo, un leskre mala prindjran les gar.
Un o Jesus putchas lendar: "Tapran tumer tchi?" "Na-a," penan le.

Penas o Jesus: "Witsrenn tumare matchengre gone tchatches win pash o panjeskro ulepaskro! Un tumer taprenna i matche." Koi witsran jon i matchengre gone win, un tapran jaake bud matche, kai tsardan le nai i matchengre gone buder gar dran o pani win.

Koi penas ko jek kol deesh-te-dujendar, koles o Jesus o djijestar kamas, ap o Petreste: "Kowa hi maro rai." Har o Simon Petro kowa shunas, riwas lo peskro pralstuno ripen an, hoi riwas lo win, un witsras pes an o pani, te well lo sikeder ap o them.
Kol wawar mala wan an ko panjeskro ulepaskro, un tsardan ko matchengro gono pal pende. Jon his gar dur o themestar, nai well sheel metarja.
Har jon dran o panjeskro ulepaskro djan, dikan le i jag. Koi his pekle matche pre. Maro his ninna koi.
Un o Jesus penas ap lende: "Anenn kol matchendar, kai tumer kanna tapran!"

Koi djas o Simon Petro pale an o pani dre, un tsardas ko matchengro gono ap o them. Koi his sheel-te-pantch-deesh-te-triin (153) bare matche dre. Ninna te his jaake bud matche koi dre, djas o matchengro gono gar paash.
"Awenn un chan!" penas o Jesus ap lende. Kek lendar putchas lestar: Koon hal tu? Halauter djinan, kai job lengro rai hi.
O Jesus was pash lende, las ko maro, un das les lende. Jaake kras job ninna kol matchentsa.
Kowa his o triinto kopo, kai mukas pes o Jesus glan peskre malende te dikell pal kowa, har job i mulendar djido was.

Pal o chapen penas o Jesus ap o Simon Petreste: "Simon, tu o Johanneskro tchawo, kameh tu man budeder har kal tsele wawar man kamenna?" "Awa, rai!" penas job ap leste. "Tu djineh, kai me kamau tut o djijestar." "De mire tikne bakren te chal!" penas o Jesus.

I duito kopo putchas o Jesus lestar: "Simon, tu, o Johanneskro tchawo, kameh tu man o djijestar?" "Awa, rai!" penas job. "Tu djineh, kai me kamau tut o djijestar." "De garda ap mire bakre!" penas o Jesus ap leste.

O Jesus putchas lestar o triinto kopo: "Simon, tu, o Johanneskro tchawo, kameh tu man o djijestar?" Koi was o Petreske ropaske pral kowa, kai job triin kope putchas: Kameh tu man o djijestar? Un job penas: "Rai, tu djineh halauter. Tu djineh, kai me tut kamau o djijestar." Penas o Jesus: "De mire bakren te chal!

Tchatchepaha, me penau tuke: Har tu tarno hals, pandal tu tiri dori kokres trul tiro ripen, un djal kote, kai tu kamal. Te wal tu phuro, rikreh tu tire wasta glan tute, un i wawar pandell tire wasta khetne, un anell tut kote, kai tu gar kameh te djal."
Jaake kamas o Jesus o Petreste te sikrell, har job merella un an peskro merepen o Debles bares un railes krella. Pal kowa penas o Jesus ap leste: "Am mantsa!"

O Petro risras pes trujal, un dikas koles kol deesh-te-dujendar, kai o Jesus les o djijestar kamas. Job his kowa, kai tchiwas pes ap o Jesuseskro betch an koi rati, har jon khetne chan, un putchas lestar: "Rai, koon mendar phukrella ap tute?"
Har o Petro koles dikas, putchas job o Jesusestar: "Rai, hoi well dran koleste?"
Penas o Jesus ap leste: "Te kamau me, te atchell job djido, bis te wau pale, palle hi kowa gar tiro koowa. Am tu mantsa!"
Jaake was mashkral kol patslende penlo: Kowa merella gar. O Jesus penas gar, kai kowa gar merella. Job penas: "Te kamau me, te atchell job djido, bis te wau pale, palle hi kowa gar tiro koowa!"
Kau maal o Jesusestar hi kowa, kai nai penell, kai kowa lauter tchatcho hi. Job dikas kowa un tchinas les an kau liil. Un mer djinah, kai kowa, hoi job penas, tchatcho hi.
Hi ninna bud wawar koowa, hoi o Jesus kras. Te wals kowa lauter an i lila tchindlo, jek pal o wawar, wals i phub gar baro doha kol tsele pesse lilenge, patsau me.
Latcho Theofilo, an miro ersto liil tchinom tuke lauter, hoi o Jesus kras, un i menshende sikras,

jaake raha har job gomme gar an o bolepen djas. Glan kowa, kai djas lo an o bolepen, rakras lo kolentsa, kolen job win rodas, te wenn le peskre bitchepangre, un penas lenge an i soor, hoi das les o Debleskro Ducho, hoi jon hunte krenna.

Pal peskro merepen, djiwas lo star-deesh (40) diwessa kate ap kai phub, un mukas pes lendar te dikell bud kope. Un tchatchepaha jon dikan, kai hi job djido. Un job rakras lentsa pral o tsiro, kai hi o Dewel o rai pral i tsele menshende.

Har job lentsa khetne his, penas job lenge soreles: "Atchenn an o foro Jerusalem, un djan gar krik, jaake raha har bitchras miro dad an o bolepen gomme gar peskro Ducho ap tumende, jaake har penom les tumenge.
O Johanni tchiwas tumen an o pani, te well diklo, kai mukan tumaro phuro djipen. O Dewel tchiwell o Debleskro Ducho ap tumende. Un o tsiro well sik, kai kowa wella."
Kolla, kai khetne wan, putchan lestar: "Rai, kreh tu an kau tsiro o them Israel pale baro un sorelo?"
Koi penas o Jesus: "Ko tsiro, kai o dad kowa krella, hi leskro koowa. Tumer hunte djinenn kowa gar.
Ap tumende well o Debleskro Ducho un dell tumen i bari soor. Palle rakrenn tumer mandar an o foro Jerusalem, un an o tselo them Judea, un an o them Samaria, un ap i tseli phub."
Har job kowa penas, was job glan lengre jaka an o bolepen hadedo, un i wolka las les pre.
Har jon leske palla dikan, har job an o bolepen djas, his dui mursha an bijale ripja pash lende tardo.

Kolla penan: "Murshale dran o them Galilea, hoske han tumer koi tardo, un dikenn an o bolepen? Kau Jesus, kai djas tumendar krik an o bolepen, kowa well jaake dran o bolepen pale har dikan tumer les an o bolepen te djal."
Palle djan jon o djeteskri berga tele un pale an o foro Jerusalem. Koi berga his gar dur kau forestar krik.

An o foro Jerusalem djan le an ko kheer, an koi pralstuni isema, kai jon khetne atchan: O Petro, o Johanni, o Jakobo, o Andreas, o Filipo, un o Thomas, o Bartolomeo, un o Mateo, un o Jakobo, koleskro dad o Alfeo hi, un o Simon, kai hi kol menshendar, kai kharenna Zelotarja, un o Judas, o Jakobeskro tchawo.
Kalen lauteren his jek dji un jek djipen un mangan o Debles an. Pash lende his ninna djuwja, un i Maria, o Jesuseskri dai, un o Jesuseskre phrala.
An kolla diwessa wan bud patsle khetne, sheel-te-biish menshe. Mashkral lende stas o Petro pre un penas:

Mire phrala, kowa, hoi an o Debleskro lab pral o Judas tchindlo hi, hunte was jaake. Glan raha tsiro penas o Debleskro Ducho o Davideske kowa, hoi wella pral o Judaseste. O Judas sikras o drom kolende, kai tapran o Jesuses.
Job his jek mendar. O Jesus rodas men khetne win, te was mer leskre bitchepangre.

O Judas ginas peske i kotar phub kol lowentsa, hoi job las, har job ap o Jesuseste phukras. Job peras o shereha glan tele ap koi phub, hoi job peske ginas, un leskre tsele buke wan dran leskro per wi. Un job meras.
I tsele menshe an o foro Jerusalem shunan kowa. Doleske penenn jon ap ko kotar phub, kai o Judas meras: Hakeldamach. Kowa kharella ap lengro rakepen ratli phub.
An o Debleskre gilja hi tchindlo: Leskro kheer hunte djal paash, un kek mensho djiwella koi dre. Un leskri budi hunte krell i wawar.
Doleske hunte rodas i wawar murshes win. Kowa hunte well i mursh, kai o tselo tsiro mentsa khetne his, har o rai Jesus mank mende his,
ko tsirestar, kai thowas les o Johanni an o pani bis ap ko diwes, kai was lo mendar an o bolepen lino. Kau mursh hunte penell mentsa khetne i menshenge, kai o Jesus i mulendar pre stas.
Un jon rodan dui murshen win: o Matias un o Josef, koles dan le ninna Barsabas un Justo gole.
Palle mangan jon o Debles un penan: "Rai, tu prindjreh i tsele menshengre djia. Sike mende, kones tu kol dujendar win rodal,
te penell job i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar un krell koi budi, hoi o Judas mukas. Kowa mukas men un djas peske."
Un jon witsran i kashta, un jek kasht sikras ap o Matias. Un job was o Jesuseskro bitchepaskro jaake har i wawar deesh-te-jek Jesuseskre bitchepangre.
Ap i biboldengro baro diwes, hoi kharella Pfingsta his jon lauter an jek kheer khetne.
Ap jek kopo phurdas i sorelo un diwjo ducho dran o bolepen an ko tselo kheer, kai jon khetne his.
Koi dikan le tchomone, hoi hi har jagakre tchipja. Un ap hakeneste tchiwas pes jek tchip.
Un jon wan lauter pherdo Debleskro Ducho, un rakran an wawar rakepen. Un jon rakran ko rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho len das.
Ap ko tsiro his an o foro Jerusalem bibolde dran bud themma, kai mangan o Debles an.
Har jon ko baro un sorelo ducho shunan, wan jon lauter koi khetne, un kran bare jaka, har hakeno shunas len an leskro rakepen te rakrell.
"Kowa dell gar!" dan i bibolde gole. "Kolla, kai rakrenn kote, hi dran o them Galilea.
Har well kowa, kai jon an maro rakepen rakrenna, har te wans le an maro them boldo?
Mer wah dran i themma Partia, Media, Elam, Mesopotamia, Judea, Kappadocia, Pontus, Asia, Frigia, Pamfilia, Egiptia, dran o foro Kirene, kai hi an o them Libia, un ninna dran o foro Rom.
Wawar mendar wan dran i themma Arabia un Kreta. Mer shunah len an maro rakepen te rakrell, hawo baro koowa o Dewel kras!"
Un i bibolde dan i wasta pral o shero khetne, un djinan gar buder, hoi kowa hi. Un jek putchas i wawarestar: "Hoi well kowa?"
Wawar san len win, un penan: "Kol mursha hi mato!"

Koi stas o Petro un kol wawar deesh-te-jek Jesuseskre bitchepangre pre, un o Petro das gole, un penas ap i biboldende: "Murshale dran o them Judea, un tumer tsele wawar, kai djiwenn kanna an o foro Jerusalem, me kamau tumenge te penell, hoi kate lauter djala kolentsa, kai rakrenna an wawar rakepen. Shunenn, hoi tumenge penau!
Kol mursha hi gar mato, har tumer penenna. Hi enjenge taissarlake.
Kowa, hoi tumer kate dikenna, penas o Debleskro rakepaskro Joel glan i raha tsiro:

Ko tsiro wella, penell o Dewel, kai me tchiwau miro Debleskro Ducho ap i tsele menshende. Un tumare tchawe un tcha dikenn nai glan-wi, hoi wella. Un i tarne mursha dikenn kowa, hoi o Dewel len sikrell, un i phure mursha denn suni.
Ninna ap mire budepangre, mursha har djuwja, tchiwau me miro Debleskro Ducho. Un jon penenn i menshenge mire laba.
Un me kamau baro un sorelo koowa te krap, an o bolepen un ap i phub. Tumer dikenn rat, un jag, un tampa.
O kham well kalo, un o tchon well lolo har o rat. Koi djinenn tumer, te well ko baro diwes sik, kai well o rai Jesus pale.
Un koon ap o Jesuseste gole della, koles lell lo dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win.

Murshale dran Israel, shunenn kal laba, hoi penau tumenge! O Dewel bitchras ko murshes, o Jesuses dran Nazaret, pash tumende. Kowa kras baro un sorelo koowa mank tumende, hoi kek wawar nai krella. Jaake sikras o Dewel, kai o Jesus lestar was. Tumer djinenn kowa, un dikan kowa lauter.
Tumer dan o Jesuses an i wasta kolendar, kai gar ap o Debleste patsenna. Un kolla dan les ap o trushel, un kote meras job. Un hoi tumer leha kran, kowa his jaake glan-diklo o Deblestar.
Ko Jesuses kras o Dewel djido. Job las les i mulendar win, un kek soor nai rikras les pash i mulende pale.
Ninna o David rakras o Jesusestar, har job penas: Me dikau hako tsiro ap o Debleste, miro rajeste. Job dell man soor, te rikrap man ap leste.
Doleske hom me bachtelo an o dji un me giwau. Ninna te merau, djinau:
Tu mukeh man gar pash i mulende, un kameh gar, te ferdjal miro mass.
Tu sikral mange ko drom, hoi dell man o djipen. Un pash tute hom me bachtelo."

Un o Petro penas dureder ap lende: "Murshale, mire phrala, mukenn man tumenge te penell, hoi man ap o dji hi. Maro baro rai David meras, un was paskedo. Leskro muleskro kheer nai dikenn tumer kau diwes.

O David his i Debleskro rakepaskro, kai nai dikas glan-wi, hoi wella. O David djinas, hoi o Dewel leske penas, te well jek pal leste, hoi well o baro rai. Un kowa wella leskre menshendar. O Dewel das pes sowel, te well kowa jaake.
Un o Dewel mukas o David glan-wi te dikell, kai o Jesus Kristo i mulendar pre stella. Lestar penas o David, te atchell job gar pash i mulende, un te ferdjal gar leskro mass.
Kau Jesuses mukas o Dewel i mulendar pre te stell. Kowa djinah mer. Mer halauter dikam les djido.
Un o Dewel kras les rai pral halauter, un tchiwas o Debleskro Ducho ap leste, jaake har job penas. Un ko Debleskro Duches tchiwas o Jesus ninna ap mende. Kawa shunenn un dikenn tumer kate.
O David djas gar pre an o bolepen. Jaake rakras job gar pral peste, har job penas: O Dewel penas ap miro rajeste: Besh tut ap miri tchatchi rig,
bis te tchiwau kolen tel tire pire, kai kamenn tut gar.
I tsele menshe an Israel hunte djinenna, o Dewel kras, te hi kau Jesus, koles tumer ap o trushel dan, o rai pral halauter. Job hi ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job."
Har kol menshe kowa shunan, djas lenge kowa an lengro dji. Un jon putchan o Petrestar un kol wawar Jesuseskre bitchepangrendar: "Murshale, mire phrala, hoi kras mer?"

Koi penas o Petro ap lende: "Tumer anan doosh ap tumende. Mangenn tumen tele glan o Debleste! Un mukenn tumen an o Jesus Kristeskro lab an o pani te thowell, te lell o Dewel tumari doosh tumendar tele, un te lenn tumer o Debleskro Ducho!
O Dewel penas, te dell lo peskro Ducho tumende, un tumare tchawende, ninna kolende lauterende, kai kanna dur lestar hi, un kai job pash peste gole della."

Un bud wawar labentsa rakras o Petro lentsa, un mangas len, un penas ap lende: "Mukenn tumen win te lell dran o tchilatchepen, te lenn gar koi phagi, hoi well pral kal tchilatche menshende, kai djiwenn an kau tsiro."
Kolla, kai lan leskre laba an pengro dji pre, mukan pen lestar an o pani te thowell. Un ap ko diwes wan triin serja menshe ap o Jesuseste patslo.
Un hako tsiro wan le khetne un shunan, hoi o Jesuseskre bitchepangre lenge penan. Un jon chan o maro khetne, un mangan o Debles an.
Un o Jesuseskre bitchepangre kran bud baro un sorelo koowa, hoi kek wawar nai krella. Un i traash was pral i menshende.
Kolla, kai patslo wan, atchan lauter khetne. Un jon tchiwan pengro tselo brawlepen khetne, un kowa his lauterenge koi.
Jon bikran kowa, hoi len his, i kotar phub un wawar kutch koowa, un dan les kol patslende, kai len tchi his.
Hako diwes wan le khetne an o Debleskro baro kheer. Jon chan o maro khetne an i khera. Un jon his bachtelo, te dan jon nai i phralen ninna te chal. Kowa kran le o djijestar.
Jon sharan o Debles, un i tsele menshe dikan latches ap lende. Un hako diwes wan wawar menshe koi pashal, hoi patslo wan.
His jek diwes, his trinenge, koi djan o Petro un o Johanni an o Debleskro baro kheer, te mangenn le o Debles an.

Kote his i mursh, kowa his bango jaake raha har djiwell lo. Leskre menshe beshan les hako diwes glan o shukar wudar glan o Debleskro baro kheer, te nai mangell lo lowe kolendar, kai djan an o Debleskro baro kheer dre.
Har job o Johannes un o Petres dikas, har jon an o Debleskro baro kheer kaman te djal, mangas job lendar lowe.
Jon dikan soreles ap leste, un o Petro penas ap leste: "Dik ap mende!"
Un job dikas ap lende. Job patsas, te denn le les tchomone.
O Petro penas: "Rup un sonakai hi man gar. Hoi man hi, dau me tut. An o lab o Jesus Kristestar dran Nazaret penau me tuke: Ste pre un dja trujal!"
Un o Petro tapras les pash o tchatcho wast, un har job les pre tsardas, wan leskre pire sorelo un sasto.
Job stas sik pre, nai djas, un djas lentsa an o Debleskro baro kheer, nashas un stas trujal un sharas o Debles.
Un i tsele menshe dikan, kai stas job trujal, un sharas o Debles.

Un jon prindjran les pale, kai job ko mangepaskro his, kai glan o Debleskro baro kheer beshdo his, glan ko wudar, kai kharell shukar wudar. Un jon kran bare jaka pral kowa, hoi jon dikan, hoi leha djas.
Un kau mursh djas buder gar lendar krik. Un i tsele menshe nashan pash lende khetne an koi isema, hoi kharell Salomoneskri bari isema, un jon kran bare jaka.
Har o Petro kolen dikas, penas lo ap lende: "Murshale dran Israel, hoske krenn tumer sawe bare jaka, un dikenn ap mende? Kowa kras gar mari soor, witar gar maro patsepen, te nai nashell kawa mursh.

Na-a! O Dewel o Abrahamestar, un o Isaakestar un o Jakobestar, ko Dewel mare dadendar sikras tumende kate, hawi bari soor un railepen job peskro budepaskres, o Jesuses, das. Koles dan tumer an o Pilateskre wasta, un dan les buchoste, har o Pilato kamas les te djal mukell.
Tumer dan koles buchoste, kai was o Deblestar, un kai his kek tchilatchepen an leste. Un tumer mangan o Pilatestar, te mukell lo koles dran o stilepen te djal, kai maras jekes.
Ko rajes, kai o djipen della, maran tumer. Koles mukas o Dewel i mulendar pre te stell. Kowa djinah mer, mer dikam les.
Mer patsah ap leste. Doleske was kau mursh sasto. Tumer prindjrenn les lauter un djinenn, kai job nashas nai gar. Job patsas ap o Jesus Kristeste, un kowa kras les sasto.
Me djinau, mire phrala, kai tumer djinan gar, hoi tumer koi kran o Jesuseha. Un tumare pralstune djinan kowa witar gar.
Lauter was jaake, har o Dewel kowa penas. Leskre rakepangre penan glan i raha tsiro, kai hunte merell ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job un lell i menshen dran o tchilatchepen win.
Mukenn tumaro phuro djipen un awenn pash o Debleste, te lell job tumari doosh tumendar!
Palle well ko latcho tsiro, kai dell tumen o Dewel newi soor. Job bitchrell tumenge koles, kai was tumenge glan i raha tsiro win rodedo. Kowa hi o Jesus Kristo.
Job atchell an o bolepen jaake raha, bis te well ko tsiro, kai wella lauter newes kerdo. Kowa penan menge o Debleskre rakepangre glan i raha tsiro. O Dewel penas les lenge.
O Mose penas: I Debleskro rakepaskro har me hom, sawes bitchrell o Dewel pash tumende. Kowa hi jek tumare menshendar. Shunenn ap hako lab, hoi job tumenge penella!
Koon gar ap koleste shunella, koles hunte tchiwenn tumer pale, te nai well lo buder gar pash tumende.
Ninna o Samuel un kol wawar rakepangre, kai pal leste wan, rakran pral kal diwessa, kai mer kanna djiwah.

Kowa, hoi kol Debleskre rakepangre i menshenge penan, hi tumenge. Tumer han i tchawe kolendar. Un ko lab, hoi o Dewel tumare phurenge penas, un peskro wast pre das, hi ninna tumenge. Job penas ap o Abrahameste: Koi bacht, hoi dau tire menshende, djal dureder ap i tsele menshende, kai ap i phub hi.
Doleske bitchras o Dewel peskro budepaskres, o Jesuses, glanstunes pash tumende, te anell job tumenge o Debleskri bacht, te djal hakeno tumendar peskro tchilatcho dromestar tele."
Har o Petro un o Johanni kowa i menshenge penan, wan i rashaja pash lende, ninna ko pralstuno kol klistendar an o Debleskro baro kheer, un i Saddukarja.
Jon his chojemen pral o Petreste un o Johanneste, te sikran kalla i menshende o Debleskro drom un penan, kai o Jesus i mulendar pre stas.
Doleske tapran le len un tchiwran len i rati an o stilepen.
Bud kolendar, kai shunan kol laba, hoi o Petro penas, wan patslo. Nai his pantch serja menshe.
O wawar diwes, taissarlake, wan i biboldengre pralstune un phureder un tchatchepangre an o foro Jerusalem khetne.
Ninna o Hannas, ko baro rashai, un o Kajafas, un o Johanno, un o Alexandro, un kol tsele wawar, kai his kol bare rashajengre menshendar, his koi pashal.
Un jon mukan o Jesuseskre bitchepangren glan pende te anell, un jon putchan lendar: "An koneskri soor un an koneskro lab kran tumer kowa?"
Un o Petro, pherdo Debleskro Ducho, penas ap lende: "Tumer pralstune un tumer phureder, shunenn!
Mer kram i latcho koowa ap i nasselo mensheste. Un doleske ham kanna glan tumende tardo. Tumer putchenn mendar, har job sasto was.
Jaake hunte djinenn tumer un i tsele menshe an o them Israel: O Jesus Kristo dran Nazaret, koles tumer ap o trushel dan, kras kau murshes sasto. Kau Jesuses mukas o Dewel i mulendar pre te stell.
Kowa hi ko bar, kai tumer ap i rig witsran. Kowa was i bar, kai hidjell o tselo kheer.
Kek wawar har o Jesus kokres nai anell men pash o Debleste. Ap i tseli phub das o Dewel kek wawares, kai nai lell men dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win."

Har jon dikan, har o Petro un o Johanni rakran, kai kek traash an lende his, kran le bare jaka. Un jon haiwan, kai kolla kek bare rakepangre un gosewe mursha hi, un djinan ninna, kai jon o Jesuseha khetne his.
Ninna dikan le ko murshes, kai sasto was, pash lende tardo, un nai penan buder tchi.
Koi bitchran le len win, un rakran mank pende un penan:
"Hoi kras mer kal menshentsa? Hakeno an o foro Jerusalem djinell kanna, kai kran kolla i baro koowa, hoi kek wawar nai krella. Mer nai dah kowa gar buchoste.
Das len soreles trad, te penenn jon kekeske buder tchi o Jesusestar, te djal ko rakepen gar dureder pash i tsele menshende!"
Un jon dan len gole, dan len trad, un penan ap lende: "Ma rakrenn buder tchi o Jesusestar! Ma penenn i menshenge tchi, hoi job tumenge penas!"
O Petro un o Johanni penan ap lende: "Penenn menge, hi kowa mishto glan o Debleste, te shunas mer budeder ap tumende har ap o Debleste?
Mer nai rikrah gar maro mui pral kowa, hoi dikam un shunam."
Koi dan le len soreles trad, un mukan len te djal. Jon hatsan tchi ap lende, kai nai dans jon lenge i phagi. I menshe sharan o Debles pral kowa, hoi koi djas.
Ko mursh, kai sasto was, his star-deesh bersha phuro.
Un har kolla mukan len te djal, wan jon pash i patslende, un penan lenge, hoi kol bare rashaja, un kol biboldengre phureder ap lende penan.
Har i patsle kowa shunan, mangan jon khetne o Debles an, un penan: "Rai, tu kral o bolepen un i phub, un o baro pani, un lauter, hoi djiwella.
O Debleskro Ducho rakras dran o Davideskro mui: Hoske hi i menshe ap kai phub tchilatcho? Hoske krenn jon kowa, hoi tchitcheske hi?
I bare raja ap kai phub un i bare pralstune wan lauter khetne. Jon hi chojemen ap o Debleste un ap ko baro rajeste, kones o Dewel bitchras.

Tchatchepaha, jon wan lauter an kau foro khetne: O Pilato, o Herodes, i Remarja, un i tsele bibolde dran bud themma. Jon hi chojemen ap tiro budepaskro Jesus, kai tutar was. Koles rodal tu win, maro Dewel, te well lo baro rai.
Jaake kran jon kowa, hoi tu glan i raha tsiro penal, te well kowa lauter jaake.
Rai, shuneh tu, kai jon men kanna trad denna? Mer ham tire budepangre. De men koi soor, te nai rakras tutar!
Sike lende tiri soor! Kre i nasselen sasto, un kre bud baro un sorelo koowa an ko lab o Jesusestar, kai tutar was un tiro budepaskro hi!"
Ap jek kopo, har jon o Debles an-mangan, trissas i phub kote, kai jon his. Un o Debleskro Ducho was ap lauterende. Un jon penan o Debleskro lab, un kek traash his an lende.
Kol tsele patslen his jek dji un jek djipen. Kek lendar penas: Ko brawlepen, hoi man hi, hi mange kokres. Na-a, kowa his lauterenge koi!
Bari sorjaha penan o Jesuseskre bitchepangre i menshenge, kai o Jesus i mulendar pre stas, un i menshe haiwan o Debleskro latchepen.
Hakenes his doha djipaske. Kolen, kai hi len i kotar phub, i kheer, un wawar koowa, bikran kowa,
un anan kol lowe pash i Jesuseskre bitchepangre. Un jon dan hakenes jaake bud, te his hakenes doha djipaske.

Jaake kras kowa ninna o Josef. Kowa his i Levitari un was dran o them Ciprus. O Jesuseskre bitchepangre dan les ninna Barnabas gole. Ko kharella ap lengro rakepen: O mursh, kai rakrell i menshentsa latcho, te hi lengro dji pharo.
Un koles his i kotar phub. Ko kotar phub bikras job, un anas kol lowe pash o Jesuseskre bitchepangre, te denn le kol lowe i patslende.
I mursh, kai kharas Ananias, leskri romni kharas Safira, jon khetne bikran i kotar phub.
Un job rikras lowe peske pale. Leskri romni djinas kowa. Un jon anan gar i tsele lowe glan o Jesuseskre bitchepangre.
O Petro penas ap o Ananias: "Hoske kral tu o bengeske tiro dji pre? Hoske chochal tu o Debleskro Duches, un rikral lowe tuke?
Tu nai rikrals tiro kotar phub. Un har bikral les, nai rikrals kol lowe ninna. Har nai kral tu sawo koowa? Tu chochal gar i menshen. Tu chochal o Debles."
Har o Ananias kol laba shunas, peras job khetne un meras. Un i bari traash was ap kolende, kai shunan kowa.
Koi stan i tarne mursha pre, un tchiwan pral leste i kotar plachta, hidjan les win un paskran les.
Pal i tsiro was leskri romni dre un djinas gar, hoi koi djas.
O Petro putchas latar: "Lan tumer jaake bud lowe, har tumer koi kotar phub bikran?" "Awa, jaake bud lowe lam," penas li.
O Petro penas ap late: "Hoske kran tumer kowa win, un chochan o Debles? Kol mursha, kai paskran tiro romes, hi glan o wudar tardo, un hidjenn ninna tut win."
Koi peras li khetne un meras. Un har i tarne mursha dre wan, hatsan le lat mules, hidjan lat wi, un paskran lat pash lakro romeste.
Koi was i bari traash pral i tsele patslende un pral kolende, kai shunan kowa.
Un o Jesuseskre bitchepangre kran bud baro un sorelo koowa an o Debleskri soor ap i menshende. Un i tsele patsle his an o Salomoneskri bari isema an o Debleskro baro kheer khetne.
Kol wawar, kai gar patsle his, trashan, te beshenn le pen pash lende. Ninna te trashan le lendar, rakran le lendar mishto.
Bud mursha un djuwja patsan ap o Jesuseste un wan i patslentsa khetne.
Un i menshe hidjan pengre nasselen ap i dromma, un tchiwan len kote ap o tchiben. Jon penan penge, te well o Petro koi pashal un leskro shatto perell ap lende, wenn le sasto.
Ninna dran wawar forja, hoi trul o foro Jerusalem tchiddo his, anan jon i nasselen un kolen, kai an lende benga his. Un lauter wan sasto.
Ko baro rashai un kol Saddukarja, kai pash leste his, kolla silweran ap o Jesuseskre bitchepangre,
un tapran len, un witsran len an o stilepen.
An i rati was i bolepaskro o Deblestar un kras kol wudja an o stilepen pre, un anas len win, un penas ap lende:
"Djan an o Debleskro baro kheer, un penenn i menshenge halauter pral o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella."

Har jon kowa shunan, djan jon taissarlake an o Debleskro baro kheer un sikran i menshende o Debleskro drom. Ko baro rashai un kolla, kai pash leste his, dan i pralstune bibolden khetne gole, ninna i tsele phureden an o them Israel. Un jon bitchran i klisten an o stilepen, te anenn le len glan lende.
Un har jon an o stilepen djan, his jon buder gar kote. Un kol kliste wan pale un penan:
"Ko stilepen his pandlo, un kol lurde his glan o wudar tardo. Un har i lurde menge pre pandan, his kek dre."
Har ko pralstuno klisto pral o Debleskro baro kheer un kol bare rashaja kowa shunan, djinan jon gar, hoi te patsenn le, un putchan pendar har kowa dureder djala.
Koi was jek un penas lenge: "Kol mursha, kai tumer stildo tchiwan, hi an o Debleskro baro kheer tardo, un penenn i menshenge o Debleskro lab."
Koi djas ko pralstuno klisto kol wawar klistentsa an o Debleskro baro kheer, un lan i Jesuseskre bitchepangre win. Kowa kran le kek sorjaha. I kliste daran i menshendar, te marenn le len i barentsa.
Un jon anan len glan kol tsele pralstunende, kai khetne wan. Un o baro rashai penas ap lende:

"Mer dam tumen soreles trad, te rakrenn tumer tchi buder o Jesusestar. Un kanna well lestar rakedo an o tselo foro Jerusalem. Un tumer penenn, kai mer maram les. Kamenn tumer, te well leskro rat pral mende?"
O Petro un i wawar Jesuseskre bitchepangre penan: "Mer hunte shunas ap o Debleste budeder har ap i menshende.
Ko Dewel mare phurendar mukas o Jesuses i mulendar pre te stell, koles, kai tumer ap o trushel dan un maran.

Koles hadas o Dewel un beshas les ap peskri tchatchi rig, te well lo rai un lell i menshen dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win. Kowa kras o Dewel, te mukenn i menshe an o them Israel pengro phuro djipen, jaake te nai lell lo lengri doosh lendar krik.
Kowa dikam mer un penah nai tumenge, un o Debleskro Ducho ninna. Koles dell o Dewel kolende, kai shunenn ap leste."
Har jon kowa shunan, wan jon chojemen ap lende, un kaman len te marell.
Mank kol pralstunende his i Farisari, leskro lab his Gamaliel. Job his i biboldengro tchatchepaskro un an-diklo pash i tsele biboldende. Un kowa stas pre un penas: "Bitchrenn len i tikno tsiro win!"
Un pale penas lo: "Murshale an Israel, denn garda un dikenn, hoi tumer kal menshentsa kamenn te krell!

Glan i tsiro his i mursh, kowa kharas Thoidas. Job patsas pestar, te his lo i baro. Star-sheel mursha his pash leste, kai shunan ap leste. Palle was lo mulo dino. Un har job mulo his, atchan jon gar khetne. Un kek rakrell buder lendar.

Koi pal was i mursh dran o them Galilea, kowa kharas Judas. Kowa his an ko tsiro har i laba i biboldendar pre tchindlo wan. Kowa anas bud menshen ap peskri rig, te krenn le i kurepen i Remarjentsa. Ko Judas was ninna mulo dino, un kolla, kai pash leste his, hi gar buder koi. Un kek rakrell buder lendar.
Un kanna penau me tumenge: Mukenn tumare wasta kal menshendar! Mukenn len te djal! Te hi ko koowa i menshendar, palle atchella ko koowa gar.
Te hi ko koowa o Deblestar, palle nai phagenn les gar. Denn jak, te tchingrenn tumer gar ap o Debleste." Un jon shunan ap o Gamaliel.
Palle dan jon o Jesuseskre bitchepangren gole, dan len dawa i tchupnijaha, un dan len trad, te rakrenn le buder gar o Jesusestar. Un palle mukan le len te djal.
Koi djan jon penge i pralstunendar. Un jon his bachtelo, te hi le o Debleske jaake bud moldo, te rodas lo len win, te chan le dawa o Jesuseske.
Jon mukan gar tele, te penenn le o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar. Hako diwes djan le an o Debleskro baro kheer un pash i menshende an i khera, un sikran len o Jesuseskro drom.

An kol diwessa, kai i patsle budeder wan, djas i tchingepen mashkral i patslende, kai rakran hebretikes, un kol patslende, kai rakran grichtikes. Mashkral kolla, kai rakran grichtikes, his djuwja, kolengre romma mulo his. Un kolla lan gar jaake bud chapaske har kolla, kai rakran hebretikes. Doleske his kolla, kai rakran grichtikes, chojedo ap kolende, kai rakran hebretikes.
Koi dan kol deesh-te-dui Jesuseskre bitchepangre kol tsele patslen khetne gole, un penan: "Hi gar mishto, te das mer o chapen win, un men wals buder kek tsiro, te penas i menshenge o Debleskro lab.
"Doleske, mire phrala, rodenn mashkral tumende efta murshen win! Kolla hunte wenn mursha, kai hi pherdo Debleskro Ducho un goswepen. Kolla hunte lenn koi budi ap pende.
Mer kamah o Debles an-mangell, un i menshenge o Debleskro lab te penell."

Ko rakepen his i tsele patslenge mishto. Jon rodan o Stefanes win, koles his i sorelo patsepen un his i mursh pherdo Debleskro Ducho. Jon rodan ninna win o Filipo, o Prokoro, o Nikanor, o Timon, o Parmenas un o Nikolaus. Kowa his i gricho dran o foro Antiochia, kai las i biboldengro patsepen an un patsas kanna ap o Jesuseste.
Kol murshen anan le pash o Jesuseskre bitchepangre. Kolla tchiwan i wasta ap lende, un mangan o Debles, te dell lo len soor un goswepen an lengri budi.
O Debleskro lab was bud un budeder menshenge penlo, un bud wan patslo. An o foro Jerusalem wan ninna bud rashaja patslo.
O Stefano his i mursh pherdo Debleskro latchepen un Debleskri soor. Job kras bud baro un sorelo koowa an o Debleskri soor mank i biboldende.

Kote wan bibolde pash leste. Kolla wan dran bud biboldengre kangria. Jon his Libertarja, mursha dran i forja Kirene un Alexandria, un dran i themma Cilicia un Asia. Un jon rakran o Stefaneha un tchingran pen leha.
O Debleskro Ducho das les goswepen, te nai rakras kek lendar leske pale.
Palle anan le murshen ap lengri rig. Un kolla anan chochepen ap o Stefaneste pre. Jon penan: "Mer shunam, kai penas job djungele laba pral o Moseste un pral o Debleste."
Jon kran kol tsele menshen diwjo, ninna kol biboldengre phureden un tchatchepangren. Un jon wan ap leste pre, tapran les, un anan les glan i pralstune biboldende.
Kolla, kai chochepen ap leste pre anan, kolla penan: "Kau mursh mukell gar tele te rakrell lo djungele laba pral o Debleskro baro kheer un pral o Moseskre laba.
Mer shunam, har job penas: O Jesus dran Nazaret phagell o Debleskro baro kheer tele un krella, te hunte rikras mer buder gar ap kowa, hoi o Mose menge penas."
Un kol tsele pralstune dikan ap o Stefaneste, har leskro mui was jaake har i Debleskro bolepaskro.
Koi putchas ko baro rashai lestar: "Hi kowa tchatcho, hoi kolla penan?"
Koi penas o Stefano: "Tumer phrala un dada, shunenn! Maro baro un railo Dewel mukas pes maro dadestar Abraham te dikell an o them Mesopotamia. Ap ko tsiro djiwas o Abraham gomme gar an o foro Haran.
Un o Dewel penas ap leste: Dja dran tiro them! Muk tire menshen, un dja an ko them, hoi me tuke sikrau!
Koi djas o Abraham dran ko them Kaldea, un djiwas an o foro Haran. Un har leskro dad meras, anas o Dewel les an ko them, kai tumer kanna djiwenna.
O Dewel das les kek kotar phub an kau them, witar gar i tikno kotar. Un o Dewel das les peskro lab, te dell lo leskre tchawende i them. An ko tsiro his o Abrahames kek tchawo.
O Dewel penas ap leste: Tire tchawe, kai pal tute wenna, hi wi-themarja an i them, kai gar lengro hi. Star-sheel bersha hunte budrenn le i wawarenge tel duka un bare dawa.
Un kolla, kai len dan un dukran, kolen dau me i phagi. Un pal kowa djan le dran ko them win, un mangenn man kate an kau them an.

Un o Dewel das o Abrahameste peskro lab, te hi lo leskro Dewel un o Dewel lauterenge, kai pal leste wenna. Un job penas o Abrahameske, te mukell job pes ap peskro mass te tchinell. Ninna i tsele mursh tchawe, kai pal leste wenna, hunte wan tchindlo ap pengro mass. Un o Abraham las i tchawes, o Isaak. Un o Abraham tchinas les ap o mass, har job efta diwessa phuro his. Un o Isaak tchinas o Jakobes, un o Jakob peskre deesh-te-dui tchawen. Kolla hi mare phure dada, kolendar mer wam.
Mare phure dada silweran ap o Josefeste, un bikran les an o them Egiptia. Un o Dewel his pash leste,

un las les win dran halauter, hoi o Josefeske pharo his. Un o Dewel das les bud goswepen un kras, te dikas o baro rai pral o them Egiptia latcho ap o Josefeste. Ko baro rai kras, te was o Josef o rai pral o tselo them Egiptia un pral o tselo rajeskro kheer.
Un palle was i tsiro, kai bokan le an o tselo them Egiptia un an o them Kanaan. Un mare phure hatsan tchi te chal an o them Kanaan.
Har o Jakob shunas, kai an o them Egiptia djob della, bitchras job peskre tchawen an ko them, te ginenn le penge djob, un pal i tsiro bitchras lo len i duito kopo.
Har jon o duito kopo an o them Egiptia wan, prindjran le o Josefes. Koi djinas o baro rai pral o them, hawe menshendar o Josef his.
O Josef mukas peskro dades, un peskre tsele menshen an o them Egiptia te well. Kolla his efta-deesh-te-pantch menshe.
Jaake was o Jakob an o them Egiptia, un kote djiwas lo peskre tchawentsa. Kolla hi mare phure. Un kote meran le ninna.
Un lengre tchawe anan len an o them Kanaan un paskran len an o foro Sichem ap ko kotar phub, hoi ginas o Abraham kol menshendar, kolengro phuro dad o Hamor his.
Palle was ko tsiro, kai kowa was, hoi o Dewel o Abrahameske penas. I Israelitarja wan hako diwes budeder an o them Egiptia.
Koi was i wawar mursh baro rai pral o them Egiptia. Kowa djinas tchi o Josefestar,
un rodas i drom, har te rikrell lo mare menshen tele. Un jon hunte budran tel dawa, un hunte mukan pengre tikne tchawen, te merenn jon.
An ko tsiro was o Mose boldo. Un job his shukar an o Debleskre jaka. Triin tchon his job an peskro dadeskro kheer, un jon dan garda ap leste.

Un palle nai khatran le o Moses buder gar an o kheer. Un kote, kai tchiwan le les, hatsas les i tchai o baro rajestar pral o them Egiptia. Un joi las les pash peste un tsardas les pre, har te wals lo lakro tchawo.
Un gosewe Egiptarja sikran leste lauter, hoi jon djinan, jaake te was lo gosewo an lauter, hoi job rakras un kras.
Har o Mose star-deesh bersha phuro his, kamas lo pal peskre menshende, i Israelitarja, te dikell. Un job djas kote, kai budran le.
Un kote dikas job, kai jek leskre menshendar dawa chas. Un job djas koi, te well lo ap leskri rig, un das koi Egiptares pale un das les mulo.
O Mose patsas, kai peskre menshe haiwenna, kai o Dewel les bitchras, te lell lo len dran lengri bibacht win. Jon haiwan kowa gar.
O wawar diwes was job pash peskre menshende, har dui lendar tchingran. Un job das len trad, te tchingrenn le pen gar, un penas: Murshale, tumer han phrala, hoske tchingrenn?
Kowa, kai kras ko tchingepen das les i spildini un penas: Hal tu i tchatchepaskro un i rai pral mende, te hunte shunas ap tute?
Kameh tu man ninna mulo te dell, har tu taissar ko Egiptares mulo dal?
Har o Mose kowa shunas, nashas job peske, un djas an ko them Midian. Koi wan leske dui tchawe boldo.
Star-deesh bersha pal kowa his o Mose an o mulo them pash koi berga Sinai. Koi mukas pes i Debleskro bolepaskro glan leste te dikell an i subjengro bur, hoi chatchas.
Hoi job kote dikas, nai patsas lo gar. Jaake djas lo pash ko bur, te nai dikell lo feteder, hoi kowa hi. Kote rakras o Dewel ap leste:
Me hom o Dewel tire phurendar, o Dewel o Abrahamestar, o Isaakestar, un o Jakobestar. Un i bari traash was ap o Moseste, har job kowa shunas, un darjatar nai dikas lo gar kote pre.
Un o Dewel penas ap leste: Rib tire tircha win! Kote, kai tardo hal, hi o Debleskro them.
Me dikom, har mire menshe chan dawa an o them Egiptia. Un me shunom lengri gole un lengro ropen, un wom dran o bolepen tele, te lap len dran kau them win. Un me kamau, te djas tu an o them Egiptia.

O Dewel bitchras kau Moses, kai pash peskre menshende tchi moldo his. Kowa dikah mer koi pre, har jon penan: Koon kras tut pral mende tchatchepaskro un rai, te hunte shunas mer ap tute? O Dewel bitchras les, te well lo rai pral lende, un te anell lo len dran ko them win, kai jon pandle budepangre his. Kowa penas leske ko bolepaskro, kai dran i subjengro bur ap leste rakras.
Kau Mose anas i Israelitarjen wi un kras baro un sorelo koowa an o Debleskri soor an o them Egiptia, un pash o lolo pani, un star-deesh bersha an o mulo them.
Kowa his o Mose, kai ap lende penas: O Dewel bitchrell tumenge i Debleskro rakepaskres har me hom. Kowa hi jek tumare menshendar.

Un har kol Israelitarja an ko mulo them pash koi berga Sinai glan o Debleste khetne wan, his o Mose ap i berga Sinai tardo mashkral o bolepaskro un mare phurende. Un o bolepaskro das les kol Debleskre laba, hoi denn o djipen, te anell o Mose len pash mende.
Mare phure kaman gar ap leste te shunell un kran, hoi jon kaman. Jon kaman te djiwell, har jon an o them Egiptia djiwan.
Ap o Aron penan le: Kre menge i dewel, kai dell garda ap mende un sikrell mende o drom! Mer djinah gar, hoi djas o Moseske, kai anas men dran o them Egiptia win.
An ko tsiro kran le i grumni dran sonakai, te well kaja lengro dewel. Un jon anan fichen, maran len un chatchran len lake, un wan bachtelo pral kowa, hoi jon kran.

O Dewel djas peske lendar un mukas len. Koi mangan jon i momlia an o bolepen an. Jaake was kowa, hoi tchindlo hi an o liil, kai o Debleskre rakepangre tchinan. Kote penell o Dewel: Murshale an Israel, mange chatchran tumer kek fichen, un anan kek chapen glan mande an kol star-deesh bersha, har hans an o mulo them.

Tumer hidjan ko kheer trujal, kai o Moloch dren hi. Ninna hidjan koi bolepaskri momeli tumentsa, kai Refan kharedo wella. Kol dujen kran tumer tumare wastentsa, te nai mangenn len an. Doleske tradau me tumen dran tumaro them win, un anau tumen pandlo an o them Babilonia, un dureder.

O Stefano penas dureder: Mare phuren his o Debleskro tikno kheer, hoi his kerdo dran fichengre balla, un hidjan les lentsa, har djan le an o mulo them trujal. Kau kheer kran le jaake, har o Dewel kowa o Moseste ap i berga sikras.

Mare phure hidjan kau kheer lentsa, bis te anas len o Josua an o them Kanaan. Kote djiwan wawar menshe, kai o Debles gar prindjrenna. Kolen tradas o Dewel win, un das ko them mare phurende. O Debleskro tikno kheer dran fichengre balla atchas an o them Kanaan un his gomme koi, har o David o baro rai was.
Ap koleste dikas o Dewel latches. Un o David mangas lestar, te nai krell lo leske i kheer dran barra, kai i tsele Israelitarja nai mangenn les an.
His gar o David, na-a, kowa his leskro tchawo, o Salomo, kai kras o Debleske i baro kheer dran barra.
O baro Dewel djiwell gar an khera, kai i menshe kran pengre wastentsa. Kowa penas glan raha tsiro o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja:
O Dewel penas: O bolepen hi miro beshepaskro, un i phub hi tel mire pire tchiddo. Hawo kheer kamenn tumer mange te krell tumare wastentsa, kai djiwap dre?
Me krom o bolepen un i phub mire wastentsa."

Un o Stefano penas dureder ap lende: "Tumer kamenn tchi te haiwell. Tumaro dji hi har bar. Tumare kandentsa shunenn tchi, un kamenn gar ap o Debleskro Ducho te shunell. Jaake kran tumare phure. Jaake krenn ninna tumer.

Penenn mange: Dell jek Debleskro rakepaskro, kai lan tumare phure gar palla? Jon maran kolen, kai glan-wi penan, te well ko jek, kai hako tsiro o tchatchepen krella. Job was, un tumer phukran ap leste un maran les.
I bolepangre anan tumenge kol laba, kai penenna, hoi o Dewel tumendar kamella. Un tumer rikran tumen gar ap lende."
Har jon kowa shunan, hoi o Stefano lenge penas, djas lenge kowa an o dji, un i bari choli tapras len.
O Stefano, pherdo Debleskro Ducho, dikas an o bolepen pre, un dikas o Debleskro railepen un o Jesuses ap o Debleskri tchatchi rig tardo.
Un o Stefano penas: "Me dikau o bolepen pre, un o Menshengro Tchawes ap i tchatchi rig o Deblestar tardo."
Koi dan jon soreles gole, tchiwan pengre wasta ap i kanda, te shunenn le gar, un djan ap leste,
tradan les dran o foro win, un witsran barentsa ap leste. Un kolla, kai witsran i barra, riwan pengre koola win, un i tarno mursh, kai kharas Saulo, das ap lende jak.
Har jon ap leste i barentsa witsran, das o Stefano gole: "Rai Jesus, le man pash tute!"
Un job peras ap i phub tele, un das pale gole: "Rai, le koi doosh lendar!" Har job kowa penas, meras lo.

His mishto an o Sauleskre jaka, te maran le les. Pal ko diwes lan le i patslen soreles palla an o foro Jerusalem. Un i patsle nashan an o them Judea un an o them Samaria. I Jesuseskre bitchepangre atchan an o foro Jerusalem.
Un mursha, hoi ap o Debleskro drom djan, paskran o Stefanes un rowan bud pral leskro merepen.
O Saulo kras lauter, te nai marell lo i tsele patslen. Job djas an i khera, las len koi win, murshen har djuwjen, un witsras len an o stilepen.
Kol patsle, kai ap o nashepen his, djan trujal un penan o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar.
O Filipo djas an ko foro Samaria un rakras kote o Jesus Kristestar.
Kol menshe dan jak ap kowa, hoi o Filipo penas un kras an o Debleskri soor.
Bud menshendar tradas lo bengen wi. Kolla dan soreles gole, har jon lendar win djan. Un bud menshe, kai his bango un nai djan gar, wan sasto.
Un hakeno an kau foro his bachtelo pral kowa, hoi koi djas.
An ko foro Samaria his ninna i mursh, kowa his i durkepaskro. Leskro lab his Simon. Job penas pestar, te hi lo i baro mursh. Un i menshe an ko foro kran bare jaka pral kowa, hoi job kras.
Un halauter shunan ap leste, un penan: "Ap ko mursheste hi o Debleskri bari soor."
Peskro durkepaha tsardas lo len lauter ap peste. Doleske rikran jon bud lestar.

Har kanna o Filipo lenge o Jesus Kristestar penas, koles o Dewel bitchras, te anell lo len pash o Debleste, patsan djuwja un mursha ap kowa, hoi o Filipo lenge penas. Un jon mukan pen lestar an o pani te thowell, te sikrenn le, te patsenn le ap o Jesuseste.

Koi was ninna o Simon patslo, un mukas pes lestar an o pani te thowell. Palle atchas lo pash leste. Un har o Simon ko baro un sorelo koowa dikas, hoi o Filipo an o Debleskri soor kras, atchas leske o rakepen krik.
Un kol Jesuseskre bitchepangre an o foro Jerusalem shunan, kai kol menshe an o them Samaria patslo wan. Un jon bitchran o Petres un o Johannes pash lende.
Kolla wan an o them Samaria, un mangan o Deblestar, te dell lo i patslende o Debleskro Ducho.
Kol patsle his kokres ap ko lab Jesus an o pani thodo. O Debleskro Ducho peras gomme gar ap lende.
Koi tchiwan o Petro un o Johanni i wasta ap lende, un o Debleskro Ducho peras ap lende.
Har o Simon dikas, kai o Debleskro Ducho ap lende was, har o Jesuseskre bitchepangre i wasta ap lende tchiwan, kamas job len lowe te dell,
un penas ap lende: "Denn man ninna koi soor, te lell hakeno, koneske me o wast pre tchiwau, o Debleskro Ducho!"
O Petro penas ap leste: "Dja pash o bengeste, tu un tire lowe! Tu patseh tchatchepaha, te nai gineh tu i lowentsa o Debleskri soor!
Kau koowa, hoi mer krah, hi o Debleskro koowa un gar tiro koowa. Tiro dji hi gar tchatcho glan o Debleste.
Kanna, muk tiro tchilatcho drom, un pen o Debleske, te khaitell tut ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi tu kral. Un mange lestar, te lell lo koi doosh tutar!
Me dikau, kai hal pherdo tchilatcho koowa, un ko tchilatchepen hi o rai pral tute."
Koi penas o Simon ap lende: "Mangenn o Deblestar, te well kowa gar pral mande, hoi tumer penan!"

Har o Petro un o Johanni i menshenge penan, hoi o Jesus penas un kras, djan jon pale an o foro Jerusalem. Ap lengro drom pale wan le an bud gaba an ko them Samaria un sikran kote i menshende o Jesuseskro drom.
O Debleskro bolepaskro penas ap o Filipo: "Ste pre un dja ap ko drom, kai djal dran Jerusalem tele an ko foro Gaza. Ap ko drom hi gar bud menshe."
