Koi stas lo pre un djas kote. Ap ko drom his ninna i mursh dran o them Etiopia. Ap kau tsiro his i bari rani i rajetsa pral o them Etiopia. Un ko mursh his i pralstuno an lakro them un das garda ap lakro tselo brawlepen. Kowa was an o foro Jerusalem, te mangell job o Debles an.
Har job pale ap o drom his, te djal lo khere, his job an peskro wurdin beshdo, un draweras ko liil, kai o Debleskro rakepaskro Jesaja tchinas.
Koi penas o Debleskro Ducho ap o Filipeste: "Dja pash ko wurdin un atch koi pashal!"
Un o Filipo nashas koi, un shunas, har kowa ko liil draweras, hoi o Debleskro rakepaskro Jesaja tchinas. Un o Filipo putchas lestar: "Haiweh tu, hoi tu drawereh?"
"Na-a," penas lo, "har nai haiwap, te penell mange kek, hoi koi tchindlo hi?" Un job mangas o Filipes, te well job pash leste an o wurdin, te beshell lo pes pash leste.
Kol laba, hoi job draweras, his kolla: Job his har i bakro, kai djal kote, kai well lo maredo. Job kras peskro mui gar pre har i tarno bakro, koleske tchinenn le i balla tele.
Jon kran leha, har te wals lo tchi moldo un rakran gar o tchatchepen, har anan le les glan i tchatchepangre. Kek nai rakrell leskre tchawendar. Leskro djipen was kai phubjatar krik lino.
Har ko pralstuno kowa draweras, putchas lo o Filipestar: "Konestar rakrell o Debleskro rakepaskro? Rakrell job pestar? Rakrell job i wawarestar?"
Koi penas o Filipo leske, hoi kol laba kamenn te penell, un penas leske o latcho lab o Jesusestar.
Koi wan le pash o pani, un ko pralstuno penas: "Koi hi pani. Hi mange tchomone an o drom tchiddo, te mukap man tutar an o pani te thowell?"
"Te patseh tu o tselo djijestar ap o Jesus Kristeste, nai krau me kowa," penas o Filipo. Penas ko pralstuno: "Me patsau, kai hi o Jesus Kristo o Debleskro tchawo."
Un job penas, te atchell ko wurdin tardo. Un kol dui, o Filipo un o pralstuno, djan khetne an o pani, un o Filipo thowas les an o pani.
Har jon dran o pani win djan, las o Debleskro Ducho o Filipes ap jek kopo kote krik. Un ko pralstuno dikas les buder gar. Un job djas bachteles peskro drom dureder.
O Filipes hatsan le an o foro Ashdod. Un job djas trujal, un penas o latcho lab o Jesusestar an kol tsele forja. Un jaake was lo an o foro Cesarea.
An ko tsiro his o Saules i bari choli ap kolende, kai djan o Jesuseskro drom, kamas len te marell, un djas pash ko baro rashajeste,

un mangas kolestar lila, te nai djal lo an i biboldengre kangria an o foro Damaskus, te nai taprell job kote kolen, murshen har djuwjen, kai ap o Jesuseskro drom djana, te anell lo len an o foro Jerusalem.
Har o Saulo ap ko drom his, kai djas an o foro Damaskus, was ap jek kopo i soreli momeli dran o bolepen trul leste.
Un job peras ap i phub un shunas i rakepen. Kowa penas ap leste: "Saulo, Saulo, hoske leh tu man palla?"
Penas lo: "Rai, koon hal tu?" Kowa penas: "Me hom o Jesus, koles, kai tu palla leh.
Ste pre un dja an ko foro! Koi penenn le tuke, hoi te kress."
Kol mursha, kai pash leste his, kolenge atchas o rakepen krik. Jon shunan i rakepen un dikan kekes.
Har o Saulo pre stas un i jaka pre kras, his lo korelo. Jon lan les pash o wast un anan les an o foro Damaskus.
Triin diwessa nai dikas lo gar, un chas un pijas tchi.
An o foro Damaskus his i patslo mursh. Kowa kharas Anania. Kolestar mukas pes o rai Jesus an i suni te dikell. Un job penas: "Anania!" Un o Anania penas: "Ake, hom, mo rai."
Un o rai Jesus penas ap leste: "Ste pre un dja ap ko drom, kai kharell o tchatcho drom. Putch an ko kheer o Judasestar pal i mursheste, kai kharell Saulo dran Tarsus. Job mangell o Debles an,
un dikas tut, Anania, an i suni, har wal tu pash leste un tchiwal leske i wasta pre, te nai dikell lo pale."
O Anania penas: "Rai, me shunom bud pral ko mursheste, hawo tchilatcho koowa job kol patslenge an o foro Jerusalem kras.
Mer shunam ninna, kai las job lila kol bare rashajendar, te nai taprell job men un tchiwell men stildo, lauter kolen, kai tut an-mangenna."

Penas o rai Jesus leske: "Dja pash leste! Me rodom koles win, te well job mange koi, te djal lo pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, pash lengre bare rajende, un pash kol tsele biboldende, te penell lo lenge mandar.
Me kamau leste te sikrell, kai hunte lell job bud duka mange ap peste."

O Anania djas koi, was an ko kheer, tchiwas i wasta ap o Sauleste un penas: "Miro phraal Saulo, maro rai Jesus bitchras man, kowa, kai mukas pes ap ko drom tutar te dikell. Job kamell, te dikess tu nai pale, un te wess pherdo Debleskro Ducho."
Ap jek kopo, har te perals ko tamlepen leskre jakendar tele, dikas lo nai pale, stas pre un mukas pes an o pani te thowell, te sikrell lo, kai patsell lo ap o Jesuseste.
Palle chas un pijas o Saulo un was pale sorelo. Un o Saulo atchas i tsiro pash kol patslende an o foro Damaskus,
un rakras an i biboldengre kangria, un sikras len, kai o Jesus o Debleskro tchawo hi.

Lauter kolla, kai shunan kowa, atchas o rakepen krik, un jon penan: "Hi kowa gar ko mursh, kai las an o foro Jerusalem i tsele patslen palla, un kamas len te marell, kolen, kai denn o Jesuseskro lab an-gole? Was job gar kate, te anell job i patslen pandlo glan kol bare rashajende an o foro Jerusalem?"
O Saulo rakras bari sorjaha un sikras len, kai hi o Jesus o Kristo, kai was o Deblestar bitchedo, jaake te nai penan i bibolde, kai an o foro Damaskus djiwan, tchi buder.
Pal budeder diwessa wan kol bibolde khetne, rakran pral ko koowa, un penan: "Mer marah les."
Kowa was o Sauleske penlo. I rati un ap o diwes dan i bibolde jak glan kol foreskre wudja, te taprenn le les, un te marenn le les.
Doleske anan leskre mala les an i rati pash koi barengri baar, kai trul o foro hi, un mukan les an i korba pral i barra tele, te was lo dran o foro win.
Un job djas an o foro Jerusalem, un kote kamas lo pash kol patslende te djal. Kolla trashan lestar lauter un patsan gar, kai job ap o Jesuseskro drom djala.

O Barnabas las les pash peste un anas les pash kol Jesuseskre bitchepangre, un penas lenge, har o Saulo ap ko drom, kai djal an o foro Damaskus, o rai Jesuses dikas, un kowa leha rakras, un har job an o foro Damaskus i menshenge o Jesusestar penas, un les kek daar his, te rakrell lo lestar.
Un o Saulo atchas an o foro Jerusalem, un djas pash i patslende dre un win, un sikras i menshende o Jesuseskro drom un trashas gar, te rakrell lo o Jesusestar.
Job rakras ninna kol biboldentsa, kai rakrenn grichtikes, un tchingras lentsa pral kowa, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi. Kal bibolde kaman les te taprell un te marell.
Har kol patsle kowa shunan, anan le les an o foro Cesarea, un bitchran les dureder an o foro Tarsus.

I patsle an i themma Judea, Galilea un Samaria, kolen his kanna i latcho tsiro, kek las len buder palla. Un o Debleskro Ducho kras len soreles an o patsepen. Un jon shunan ap o Debleste un bud un budeder menshe wan patslo.
Har o Petro an o tselo them trujal djas, was job ninna pash kol patslende an o foro Lidda.
Koi hatsas lo i murshes, leskro lab hi Aneas. Kowa his ochta bersha ap o tchiben tchiddo, un nai nashas gar.
O Petro penas ap leste: "Aneas, o Jesus Kristo krell tut sasto. Ste pre un kre kokres tiro tchiben!" Koi stas job sik pre.
Koi dikan le les lauter, kai an i forja Lidda un Saron djiwenna. Un jon dan pengro djipen o Jesuseste, maro rajeste.
An o foro Joppe djiwas i patsli. Lakro lab his Tabita ap hebretikes un Dorkas ap grichtikes. Koja kras bud latcho koowa, un das bud lowe kol tchorwelende.
An ko tsiro was joi nasseli un meras. Koi thowan jon lat un tchiwan lat an koi pralstuni isema.
O foro Joppe his pash o foro Lidda tchiddo. Un har i patsle shunan, kai o Petro an ko foro his, bitchran jon dui murshen pash leste, un mangan les, te well job jaake sik har djala pash lende.

O Petro stas pre un djas lentsa. Har job kote was, anan jon les an koi pralstuni isema, kai koi muli djuwel tchiddo hi. Bud djuwja, kolengre romma mulo hi, his kote un rowan. Kolla wan pash leste un sikran leste kol ripja, kai i Tabita kras, har joi djiwas.

Un o Petro tradas len win, djas ap i tchanga glan o Debleste, mangas o Debles, un djas pash koi muli djuwjate un penas: "Tabita, ste pre!" Koi kras joi peskre jaka pre. Har joi o Petres dikas, beshas pes li pre.
Un job das lat o wast un hadas lat pre. Palle das job kol patslen gole, ninna kol djuwjen, kolengre romma mulo his. Un joi his djido glan lende tardo.
Kowa shunan i tsele menshe an o foro Joppe, un bud wan patslo ap o rai Jesuseste.
Un o Petro atchas bud diwessa an o foro Joppe pash ko mursheste, kai kharell Simon. Kowa his jek, kai budrell fichengre mortsi.
An o foro Cesarea djiwas i mursh, ko kharas Kornelio. Kowa his i Remarjengro pralstuno pral sheel lurdende. Kolen kharan le i lurde dran Italia.
Kowa his i latcho mursh un patsas ap o Debleste peskre tsele menshentsa. Job das bud i tchorwelende, un mangas o Debles hako diwes an.
His i diwes. His trinenge. Koi dikas ko mursh i Debleskro bolepaskres, har kowa pash leste dre was. Ko bolepaskro penas ap leste: "Kornelio!"

Koles his daar, har job dikas les, un penas ap leste: "Hoi kameh tu mandar, rai?" Un kowa penas ap leste: "O Dewel shunas, har tu les an-mangal. Un job dikas ko latchepen, hoi tu kral i tchorwelenge. Un job bistras kowa gar.
Bitche kanna murshen an o foro Joppe, te anenn le o Simones pash tute. Kowa kharella ninna Petro.
Job hi an o kheer, kai ko Simon djiwella, kai budrell i fichengri mortsi. Leskro kheer hi pash o baro pani tchiddo."
Har o bolepaskro peske djas, kharas o Kornelio dui budepangren un i patslo lurdes pash peste kolendar, kai his hako tsiro pash leste.
Kolenge penas job lauter, hoi o bolepaskro penas, un bitchras len an o foro Joppe.
O wawar diwes, har jon pash o foro Joppe wan, djas o Petro ap o kheer pral pre, te mangell lo o Debles an. His chapaskro tsiro.
Koi las job bok un kamas te chal. Har kran le leske i chapen, mukas o Dewel les tchomone te dikell.
Job dikas, har o bolepen pre djas un tchomone pral tele was ap i phub. Kowa his har i bari plachta. Koja was ap hake star riga rikedo.
Koi dren his bud fiche: fiche star herjentsa, sapa, un tchirkle.
Un o Petro shunas, har jek penas: "Petro, ste pre, kre len mulo un cha!"
O Petro penas: "Na-a, miro rai! An miro tselo djipen chom me tchi, hoi pale-tchiddo hi."
Un job shunas i duito kopo, har jek leha rakras un penas: "Ma kre pale-tchiddo, hoi o Dewel erligo kras!"
Kowa djas triin kope jaake. Palle djas koi plachta pale an o bolepen.
O Petro haiwas gar, hoske job kowa dikas, un putchas pestar, hoi kamas o Dewel leske te penell. Koi his i mursha, kai o Kornelio pal o Simoneskro kheer bitchras, glan o wudar tardo.
Jon dan gole un putchan: "Hi o Simon Petro pash tumende?"
Har djas o Petreske kowa an o shero trujal, hoi job dikas, koi penas o Debleskro Ducho ap leste: "Dik, triin mursha rodenn tut.
Ste pre, dja tele, un dja lentsa! Pats, hoi jon tuke penenn! Me bitchrom len."
Koi djas o Petro tele pash lende un penas: "Me hom kowa, kai tumer rodenna. Hoske han tumer kai?"

Penan le: "O Kornelio, ko pralstuno i lurdendar, bitchras men. Kowa hi i latcho mursh, un patsell ap o Debleste. I tsele bibolde rakrenn latches pral leste. I Debleskro bolepaskro penas ap leste, te lell job tut an peskro kheer, un te shunell job, hoi tu leske kameh te penell."
Un o Petro mukas len an o kheer te well, un das len i isema, te atchenn le kote. O wawar diwes djas job lentsa an o foro Cesarea. Un wawar patsle dran o foro Joppe djan ninna leha.
O diwes koi pre was job an o foro Cesarea. Kote his o Kornelio peskre menshentsa un malentsa khetne. Job das len gole, te shunenn le halauter, hoi o Petro lenge penella.
Un har o Petro dre was, djas o Kornelio pash leste, witsras pes glan leskre pire tele, un mangas les an.
O Petro hadas les pre un penas: "Ste pre! Me hom i mensho har tu."
Un har jon jaake rakran, djan jon an o kheer, un hatsan bud menshen kote, kai khetne wan.

Un o Petro penas ap lende: "Tumer djinenna, te hi kowa i biboldeske pale-tchiddo, te djal lo an o kheer dre, hoi gar i biboldeskro hi. Un kek wi-themari well pash i biboldeste an o kheer dre. Mande sikras o Dewel, te rikrap kekes pale-tchiddo.
Doleske rikrom man gar pale, te wap pash tumende, har tumer man kharan. Me putchau tumendar kanna, hoi kamenn mandar."
Koi penas o Kornelio: "Glan star diwessa, his trinenge, mangom o Debles an miro kheer an. Koi his ap jek kopo i mursh glan mande tardo. Koleskre koola his bijalo.
Un job penas ap mande: Kornelio, o Dewel shunas tut, un hoi tu dal kol tchorwelende, dikas o Dewel ninna.
Kanna bitche murshen an o foro Joppe, te anenn le o Petres pash tute. Kowa hi an o kheer, kai ko Simon djiwella, kai budrell i fichengri mortsi. Leskro kheer hi pash o baro pani tchiddo.
Un me bitchrom murshen pash tute. Un kowa his mishto, kai tu wal. Kanna ham mer lauter glan o Debleste khetne, te shunas lauter, hoi o Dewel, maro rai, tuke penas."

Un o Petro penas: "Kanna haiwau me tchatchepaha: O Dewel dikell gar koi pre, hawe menshendar jek wella: te well lo i biboldendar, - te well lo kolendar, kai kek bibolde hi. Job dikell latches ap hakeneste, kai trashell lestar, un kai krell o tchatchepen.
Job mukas i biboldenge o latcho lab te penell, te hi o Jesus Kristo kowa, kai anell len pash o Debleste. Job hi gar lengro rai kokres, na-a, job hi o rai pral halauter.
Tumer djinenna, hoi djas an o them Galilea, un palle an o tselo them Judea pal ko tsiro, har mukan pen i menshe o Johannestar an o pani te thowell, te sikrenn le, kai mukan le pengro phuro djipen.
Tumer djinenn, har das o Dewel o Jesuseste dran Nazaret peskro Ducho un peskri soor. Un job djas trujal un kras latcho koowa, un kras lauteren sasto, kai o beng pandas. O Dewel his pash leste.
Mer dikam lauter, hoi job an o biboldengro them un an o foro Jerusalem kras. Koles dan le ap o trushel, un maran les.
Pal triin diwessa kras o Dewel les i mulendar djides. Un o Jesus mukas pes i menshendar te dikell.
Job mukas pes gar i tsele menshendar te dikell. Na-a. Men rodas o Dewel win, te dikas les. Un har job i mulendar djido was, cham un pijam mer leha. Kowa penah i menshenge, un kowa hi tchatcho.

Job penas menge, te penas mer i tsele menshenge, kai o Dewel rodas les win, te hi lo o tchatchepaskro rai, kai rakrell o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende, pral kolende, kai djiwenna, un ninna pral i mulende.
Kolestar rakrenn i tsele Debleskre rakepangre an pengre lila. Jon penenn, kai lell o Dewel i doosh hakenestar krik, koon ap o Jesus Kristeste patsella."
Har o Petro jaake rakras, peras o Debleskro Ducho ap lauterende, kai les shunan.
Kol patsle biboldenge, kai o Petreha wan, atchas o rakepen krik, har jon dikan, kai peras o Debleskro Ducho ninna ap kolende, kai kek bibolde hi.
Jon shunan, har kol menshe an i wawar rakepen rakran, un o Debles sharan. Koi penas o Petro ap lende:
"Kolla lan o Debleskro Ducho jaake har mer. Nai rikrah mer len pale, te wenn le an o pani thodo, te sikrenn le, kai patsenn le ap o Jesuseste?"
Un job penas: "Mukenn tumen an o pani te thowell, te sikrenn tumer, kai patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste!" Pal kowa mangan le o Petres, te atchell lo triin, star diwessa pash lende.
Kol Jesuseskre bitchepangre un kol wawar patsle an o them Judea shunan, kai ninna kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, ap o Debleskro lab patsan.
Har o Petro an o foro Jerusalem was, tchingran kol patsle bibolde leha.
Un jon penan ap leste: "Tu djal pash kolende, kai hi gar bibolde, un chal lentsa."
Koi penas o Petro lenge, jek pal o wawar, hoi koi djas:

"Me homs an o foro Joppe," penas job, "un mangom o Debles an. Koi mukas o Dewel man tchomone te dikell. Me dikom tchomone har i bari plachta. Koja was ap star riga rikedo, un was tele dran o bolepen pash mande.
Har me dre dikom, dikom me bud fiche: star-herjengre fiche, sapa un tchirkle.
Un jek rakras ap mande: Petro, mare len un cha len!
Penom me: Na-a, rai! An miro tselo djipen chom me tchi, hoi hi pale-tchiddo.
Ko rakepen dran o bolepen penas pale: Ma kre pale-tchiddo, hoi o Dewel erligo kras!
Kowa djas triin kope. Un halauter djas pale an o bolepen.
Ap jek kopo his triin mursha tardo glan ko kheer, kai djiwom. Kolla wan dran o foro Cesarea pash mande.
Un o Debleskro Ducho penas ap mande: Pats, hoi jon tuke penenna! Dja lentsa! Un me djom shob phralentsa an o kheer ko murshestar, kai kol triin murshen pash mande bitchras.
Kowa penas menge, har dikas job i bolepaskres an peskro kheer, un kai kowa ap leste penas: Bitche murshen an o foro Joppe, te lenn le o Simones. Job kharella ninna Petro.
Kowa penell tuke, har leh tu un i menshe an tiro kheer o Debleskro djipen.
Har me, o Petro, lentsa rakrom, peras o Debleskro Ducho ap lende. Kowa his jaake har pash mende an o foro Jerusalem, har o Debleskro Ducho ap mende peras.
Koi djan kol laba an miro shero trujal, hoi menge maro rai Jesus penas: O Johanni tchiwas i menshen an o pani. Ap tumende tchiwell o Dewel peskro Debleskro Ducho.
Me dikom, o Dewel das lende ninna peskro Ducho, jaake har job mende das, har mer patsam ap o rajeste, o Jesus Kristeste. Koon hom me, te rikrap me o Debles pre?"

Har jon kowa shunan, tchingran le buder gar ap o Petreste. Jon sharan o Debles un penan: "O Dewel sikras ninna kolende peskro drom an o newo djipen, kai hi kek bibolde. Jon nai mukenn pengro tchilatcho drom un wenn ap o Debleskro drom."

An ko tsiro, kai o Stefano maredo was, wan i patsle palla lino. Kolla nashan dran o foro Jerusalem, un djan an i themma Fenicia un Ciprus, un an o foro Antiochia. Un jon penan kote kokres i biboldenge o Debleskro lab, un kek wawarenge.
Mashkral kol patslende his ninna mursha dran Ciprus un Kirene. Kolla wan an o foro Antiochia, un penan ninna kolenge, kai kek bibolde hi, o latcho lab o rai Jesusestar.
Un o rajeskri soor his lentsa. Un bud kolendar, kai kek bibolde hi, wan patslo, un wan ap o Jesuseskro drom.
Un i patsle an o foro Jerusalem shunan kowa, un bitchran o Barnabes an o foro Antiochia.
Har job koi his un dikas, hoi o Dewel an peskro baro latchepen kote lauter kras, was lo bachtelo un mangas len, te atchenn le pengro tselo djijeha pash o Jesuseste.
O Barnabas his i latcho mursh. Job his pherdo Debleskro Ducho. Un les his i baro patsepen. Un bud wan patslo ap o rai Jesuseste.
Un o Barnabas djas an o foro Tarsus, te rodell lo o Saules.
Har o Barnabas les hatsas, anas lo les an o foro Antiochia. Un kol dui atchan i tselo bersh kote pash i patslende, un penan bud menshenge o Debleskro lab. Kote dan jon i patslen ko lab Kristarja.
An kol diwessa wan Debleskre rakepangre dran o Jerusalem an o foro Antiochia.

Jek lendar his o Agabo. Job stas mashkral i patslende pre, un penas glan-wi, hoi o Debleskro Ducho leske penas, te well i bari bok pral i tseli phub. Un har o Klaudio o baro rai an o foro Rom his, was kowa jaake.
Koi penan kol patsle an o foro Antiochia: "Mer dah mare phralen an o them Judea jaake bud lowe, har hakeno nai della."
Un jon dan o Barnabes un o Saules kol lowe, te denn jon kol lowe kolende, kai hi i phureder mank i patslende an o them Judea.
An ko tsiro mukas o baro rai Herodes i patslen te stilell, un mukas len dawa te dell.
Job maras o Johanneskro phrales, o Jakobes, o chareha.
Har o Herodes haiwas, kai kowa mishto his an i biboldengre jaka, mukas job ninna o Petres te taprell. Kowa his an ko tsiro, kai chan i bibolde kek shutlo maro.

Har jon les tapran, witsran le les an o stilepen. Un o Herodes penas, te denn star kope star lurde jak ap leste. Star lurde dan i paash diwes jak ap leste. Un pal i paash diwes dan wawar star lurde jak ap leste. Un ninna jaake djas kowa ratsjakro. Pal kol diwessa, kai Passa kharenna, kamas o Herodes les glan i menshende te anell, te dell lo les glan lende i phagi.
Har o Petro an o stilepen his, mangan i tsele patsle pengro tselo djijeha o Debles leske ap i rati un ap o diwes.
An i rat glan ko diwes, kai kamas o Herodes les win anell, te dell lo les i phagi, sowas o Petro mashkral dui lurdende. Job his pandlo dui sasterne shellentsa, un dui lurde dan jak glan o wudar.

Ap jek kopo his an ko stilepen i soreli momeli, un o Debleskro bolepaskro his koi tardo, un das o Petres an i rig, djangras les pre, un penas: "Ste sik pre!" Un kol sasterne shelle peran leskre wastendar tele.
Un ko bolepaskro penas ap leste: "Tchip tiri dori trul tiro ripen, un rib tire kircha, un tchip tiri plashka trul tute, un am mantsa!" Un job kras kowa.
Un o Petro djas leha dran o stilepen win. Job djinas gar, kai kowa lauter tchatchepen hi. Job patsas, te dell lo suni.

Dui kope djan le pash kol lurdende pashal, kai jak dan. Un kolla dikan len gar. Un jaake wan jon pash i baro sasterno wudar. Kowa his ko wudar, hoi djas an o foro. Ko wudar djas kokres pre. Jon djan win, un wan ap o drom. Har djan le i kotar drom, his ap jek kopo ko bolepaskro gar buder koi.

Kanna djinas o Petro, kai kowa kek suni his, un job penas: "Kanna djinau tchatchepaha, kai bitchras o rai Jesus peskro bolepaskres mange. Un kowa las man dran o Herodeskre wasta win, ninna dran halauter, hoi kaman i bibolde mantsa te krell."
Har kowa an leskro shero was, djas job pash i Mariakro kheer. Lakro tchawo his o Johanni, kai ninna Marko kharedo wella. Kote his bud patsle khetne un mangan o Debles.
O Petro das o wasteha ap o wudar, un i budepaskretsa was. Lakro lab his Roda. Joi kamas te shunell, koon koi hi.
Un har joi shunas, kai kowa o Petro hi, kras li i bachtjatar o wudar gar pre, nashas pale un penas: "O Petro hi glan o wudar tardo."
Koi penan jon ap late: "Hal tu dinelo?" Joi atchas koi pashal, kai kowa jaake hi. Koi penan jon: "Kowa hi o bolepaskro, kai dell jak ap leste."
O Petro mukas gar tele, te dell lo ap o wudar. Har jon kanna pre kran, dikan jon les. Koi atchas lenge o mui pre.

I wastentsa sikras lo len, te denn le kek gole, un penas lenge, har o rai Jesus les dran o stilepen win las. Un ninna penas o Petro lenge: "Penenn kowa o Jakobeske, un kol wawar phralenge!" Palle djas job win, un djas peske an i wawar foro.
Taissarlake dikan i lurde, kai his o Petro buder gar an o stilepen un putchan pendar, hoi leha djas. Un i bari daar was ap lende.

Har o Herodes penas, te well o Petro win anlo, un job buder gar koi his, mukas lo les te rodell. Un jon hatsan les gar. Koi putchas lo i lurdendar, kai dan jak glan o wudar, har was nai o Petro win. Un palle mukas job kolen te marell. Palle djas o Herodes dran o them Judea, un was an o foro Cesarea, un atchas i tsiro kote.

O Herodes was chojemen ap i menshende an i forja Tirus un Sidon. Kolla lan pengro chapen dran o Herodeskro them. Doleske bitchran le khetne murshen pash leste, te well lo pale latcho lenge. Kolla rakran koleha, kai das jak ap o Herodeskro kheer, leskro lab his Blasto, un penan leske, te kamenn le buder kek tchingepen, un mangan lestar, te penell job kowa o Herodeske.
I diwes was win kerdo, kai kamas o Herodes lentsa te rakrell. Ap ko diwes riwas o Herodes peskre rajengre koola an, beshas pes ap peskro railo beshepaskro, un rakras i baro rakepen.
Kol menshe dan gole: "Jaake rakrell kek mensho. Jaake rakrell i dewel!"
Jaake mukas pes o Herodes i menshendar te sharell, har te wals job o Dewel. Un har job kowa kras, das les o Debleskro bolepaskro i nasslepen, te chan i kerme les pre, un job meras.
An bud gaba un forja was o Debleskro lab penlo. Un budeder un budeder menshe patsan ap o rai Jesuseste.
O Barnabas un o Saulo anan kol lowe i patslenge an o foro Jerusalem. Palle wan le pale an o foro Antiochia. Lentsa djas o Johanni Marko.

Mashkral i patslende an o foro Antiochia his Debleskre rakepangre un sikepangre. Kolla his o Barnabas un o Simon, ap koleste penan le Kalo, ninna o Lucio dran o foro Kirene, un o Manaen. Kowa his i maal o baro rajestar Herodes Antipas. Un o Saulo his ninna mank lende.

His i diwes, kai sharan le o Debles un chan tchi, te wenn le leske feteder koi. Koi penas lenge o Debleskro Ducho: " Bitchrenn o Barnabes un o Saules win, te krenn le koi budi, hoi me len dau. Me dom len gole, te krenn le kowa."
Un jon chan gomme i tikno tsiro tchi un mangan o Debles an. Palle, tchiwan le i wasta ap lende un penan: "Atchenn mo Debleha!" un mukan len te djal.
O Debleskro Ducho bitchras o Barnabes un o Saules an o foro Seleucia. Un palle uleran le ap o panjeskro ulepaskro an o them Ciprus.
Un har jon an ko foro Salamis wan, penan le o Debleskro lab kote an i biboldengre kangria. Un o Johanni Marko budras lentsa.

Jon djan an o tselo them Ciprus trujal, un wan ap i wawar rig ko themestar un djan an o foro Pafos. Kote tapran le i biboldes. Kowa kharas Bar-Jesus un his i durkepaskro. Job penas pestar, te hi lo i Debleskro rakepaskro. Kowa his i chochepen.
Job his pash ko pralstuneste pral o them Ciprus. Leskro lab his Sergio Paulo. Kowa his i gosewo mursh. Job mukas o Barnabes un o Saules gole te dell, te penenn jon leske o Debleskro lab.
Ko durkepaskro, o Elimas, - jaake his leskro lab ap grichtikes, - kamas kowa gar un kras lauter, te rikrell lo ko pralstunes pale, te well job gar patslo.
O Saulo, kai kharell ninna Paulo, pherdo Debleskro Ducho, dikas ap leste,
un penas: "Tu bengeskro tchawo! Tu hal pherdo tchilatchepen. Un chochepen hi an tute. Tu kameh gar o tchatchepen. Un mukeh gar tele o Debleskre tchatche dromma banges te krell.

Kanna dikeh tu, har o rai Jesus tuke i phagi della. Tu weh korelo, un dikeh i tsiro o kham buder gar." Ap jek kopo was lauter tamlo glan leskre jaka. Un job djas trujal, te nai rodell lo jekes, kai lell les pash o wast.
Har ko pralstuno kowa dikas, was job patslo, un kras bare jaka pral kowa, hoi job pral o rai Jesuseste shunas.

Pal kowa djas o Paulo un kolla, kai pash leste his, dran o foro Pafos. Ap o panjeskro ulepaskro uleran jon an o foro Perge. Kowa hi an ko them Pamfilia tchiddo. O Johanni Marko djas peske lendar, un djas pale an o foro Jerusalem.
Jon djan dran o foro Perge dureder, un wan an o foro Antiochia. Kowa hi an ko them Pisidia tchiddo. Ap ko Debleskro diwes djan jon an i biboldengri kangri, un beshan pen kote tele.

Koi pal, har i bibolde dran kol lila glan draweran, hoi o Mose un o Debleskre rakepangre tchinan, mukan lenge kol pralstune pral i biboldengri kangri te penell: "Mare phrala, te kamenn tumer menge i lab te penell, hoi krell men sorelo an o patsepen, penenn les menge!"
Koi stas o Paulo pre, hadas o wast, te atchenn jon pokone, un job penas: "Murshale dran Israel, un ninna tumer tsele wawar, kai mangenn o Debles an, shunenn, hoi me tumenge penau!
O Dewel, koles mer Israelitarja an-mangah, kowa rodas mare phuren win. Un jon wan bud, har jon an o them Egiptia wi-themarja his. Kote anas lo len bari sorjaha win.
Star-deesh bersha rikras len o Dewel an o mulo them ap o djipen.
Palle tradas job efta natione dran ko them Kanaan win, un das kau them mare menshende.

Kowa his star-sheel-te-paash (450) bersha pal ko tsiro, har mare phure an o them Egiptia wan. Har wan le an o them Kanaan, tchiwas o Dewel tchatchepangren pral lende. Kolla his lengre pralstune jaake raha, bis te was o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Samuel.

Ap ko tsiro mangan le les, te dell lo len i baro rajes. Un o Dewel das len o Saules. Leskro dad his o Kis. Kowa his i mursh kol menshendar, kai wenna pal o Benjamin. Star-deesh bersha his o Saul o baro rai pral mare menshende.

Palle tchiwas o Dewel o Saules ap i rig te atchell lo buder gar baro rai, un las peske o Davides, un kras les baro rai. Kolestar penas job: Me hatsom i murshes, pral leste hom bachtelo. Job hi o David, koleskro dad hi o Isai. Me rodom o Davides win, te krell lo lauter, hoi me leske penau.
Dran o Davideskre menshende mukas o Dewel o Jesuses te well, har job kowa glan i raha tsiro penas. O Jesus hi kowa, kai lell mare menshen dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win.

Glan ko tsiro, kai o Jesus ap i menshende rakras, penas o Johanni i tsele menshenge an o them Israel, te mukenn le pengro tchilatcho drom, un djan ap o Debleskro drom, un te mukenn pen le an o pani te thowell, te sikrenn le, kai mukan le pengro phuro djipen.

Har o Johanni lauter kras, hoi o Dewel leske penas, penas job: Patsenn tumer, kai me hom ko baro rai, koles o Dewel bitchras tumenge? Me penau tumenge: Me hom kowa gar. O baro rai, koles o Dewel bitchrell tumenge, well pal mande. Me hom gar mishto doha, te pandap leskre kircha pre.
Mire phrala, tumer, kai han o Abrahameskre menshe, un tumer wawar, kai mangenn o Debles an, tumenge penau: O Dewel bitchras tumenge peskro latcho lab, hoi dell tumen o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.

Kolla, kai djiwenn an o foro Jerusalem, un lengre pralstune haiwan gar, koon o Jesus hi. Jon haiwan witar gar kol laba, hoi o Debleskre rakepangre pral leste penan, ninna te wenn kal laba hako Debleskro diwes an i biboldengre kangria drawedo. Har jon o Jesuses ap o trushel dan, kran jon kowa, hoi o Debleskre rakepangre glan i raha tsiro penan.
Ninna te hatsan le kek doosh ap leste, te nai maran le les, penan le o Pilateske, te dell lo les ap o trushel.
Har kowa kerdo was, hoi an o Debleskro lab glan i raha tsiro tchindlo was, lan jon les o trushelestar tele, un tchiwan les an o mulengro kheer.
Job his mulo. Un o Dewel kras les i mulendar djido.

O Jesus mukas pes bud kope peskre malendar te dikell. Jon hi kolla, kai pash leste an o them Galilea his, un leha khetne an o foro Jerusalem wan. Kolla dikan, kai job pale djido was, un penenn kowa kanna i menshenge.

Un mer penah tumenge: Ko lab, hoi o Dewel mare phurenge penas, was kanna tchatcho, an kau tsiro, kai mer, lengre tchawe, djiwah. O Dewel kras o Jesuses i mulendar djido. An i duiti Debleskri gili hi tchindlo: Tu hal miro tchawo. Kau diwes wom tiro dad.
O Dewel kras o Jesuses i mulendar djido. Un job merell buder gar. Ap mare phurende penas o Dewel: Me kamau tumen miro latchepen un miro kamlepen te dell, har me o Davideske penom, te dap leste.
O David penell an i wawar Debleskri gili pral koleste, kai hi hako tsiro o Debleske koi: Tu, o Dewel, kameh gar, te ferdjal leskro mass tel i phub.
Un o David his an peskro djipen o Debleske koi. Un job meras un was paskedo pash peskre menshende. Un leskro mass ferdjas tel i phub.
O Jesus his mulo, un o Dewel kras les djido. Leskro mass ferdjas gar.
Mire phrala, tumenge well kai diwes penlo, kai o Jesus kowa hi, kai lell tumari doosh tumendar. Tumaro tchatchepaskro, o Mose, nai las gar tumari doosh tumendar.
Koon ap o Jesuseste patsella, koleskri doosh lell o Dewel lestar krik.
Krenn lauter, te well gar kowa pral tumende, hoi o Debleskre rakepangre an pengre lila penan:
Jaake penas o Dewel: Tumer, kai rikrenn o Debles dineleske, krenn bare jaka i darjatar un merenn! Shunenn, me krau i baro koowa an tumaro tsiro. Kowa patsenn tumer gar, te penell tumenge kowa jek."
Har o Paulo un o Barnabas dran i biboldengri kangri win djan, mangan i menshe lendar un penan: "Awenn pale ap o wawar Debleskro diwes, un penenn menge o Debleskro lab!"

Un har i menshe dran i biboldengri kangri win djan, nashan bud lendar o Pauleske un o Barnabeske palla. Kolla his bibolde un sawe, kai lan i biboldengro patsepen an. Un o Paulo un o Barnabas rakran budeder lentsa un penan lenge: "Rikrenn ap ko patsepen, kai o Dewel i doosh kolendar krik lella, kai patsenn ap leskro tchaweste."
O wawar Debleskro diwes wan bud bud menshe dran ko foro khetne, te shunenn le o Debleskro lab.
Har i bibolde kol bud menshen dikan, silweran le ap kol dujende. Jon tchingran ap o Pauleste, un rakran i djungele laba pral leste.

O Paules un o Barnabes his kek traash lendar, un penan lenge: "Tumenge hunte was o Debleskro lab glan kol tsele wawar menshende penlo. Har kamenn tumer kanna tchi kolestar te djinell, sikrenn tumer, te han gar moldo, te lenn ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Doleske djah mer kanna pash kolende, kai hi kek bibolde.
Kowa penas menge o Dewel: Me krom, te wenn tumer i momeli kol menshenge, kai hi gar bibolde. Penenn lenge, te lau me len dran o tchilatchepen un dran o merepen win!"
Har kolla, kai hi kek bibolde, kowa shunan, wan le bachtelo, un sharan o Debleskro lab. Un lauter kolla wan patslo, kai o Deblestar win rodedo wan, te lenn jon ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
Un an ko tselo them penan le o Debleskro lab.

Koi djan i pralstune bibolde pash kol brawele djuwjende, kai lan i biboldengro patsepen an, ninna pash kol pralstunende an ko foro, rakran lentsa un kran, te wan le chojedo ap o Pauleste un ap o Barnabeste. Un khetne lentsa lan le len palla un tradan len dran ko foro win.
Un o Paulo un o Barnabas dan koi tchik pengre pirendar tele, te djinan kolla an ko foro, hawo djungelo koowa jon kran. Un pal kowa djan o Paulo un o Barnabas an o foro Ikonion.
Un kolla, kai wan patslo, wan pherdo Debleskro Ducho, un lengro dji his bachtelo.
An o foro Ikonion djas o Paulo un o Barnabas pale an i biboldengri kangri, un penan i menshenge o Debleskro lab jaake, kai wan bud bibolde patslo, ninna bud wawar, kai kek bibolde hi.
Kol bibolde, kai wan gar patslo, penan, te wals kowa gar tchatcho, hoi o Paulo penas, un kran, te wan kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, chojedo ap i patslende.

Un o Paulo un o Barnabas atchan i raha tsiro an ko foro. Un len his kek traash, te sikren le i menshende o Jesuseskro drom. Un o rai Jesus das len i soor, te kran le baro un sorelo koowa, hoi kek wawar nai kras. Jaake sikras job, kai kowa, hoi jon pral leskro baro latchepen penan, tchatcho hi.
I menshe an ko foro djinan gar, koneske te patsenn le. His sawe, kai rikran kol biboldentsa khetne. Wawar rikran pen ap o Jesuseskre bitchepangre.
Kowa djas jaake dur, kai tchiwan pen i bibolde khetne kolentsa, kai kek bibolde hi. Un khetne lengre pralstunentsa kaman le ap kol dujende pre te djal, te denn le len i barentsa mulo.
Har o Paulo un o Barnabas kowa haiwan, nashan le penge an ko them Likaonia, an kol forja Listra un Derbe.
Un jon penan i menshenge an ko them o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar.
An o foro Listra his i mursh beshdo. Koles his nassele pire, un nai nashas gar jaake raha har job djiwas.
Kowa shunas, hoi o Paulo rakras. Un har o Paulo haiwas, kai job patsella, kai o Jesus nai krell les sasto, dikas lo ap leste,
un das gole ap leste: "Ste pre! Atch ap tire pire tardo!" Un job stas pre, un djas trujal.
Har kol menshe dikan, hoi o Paulo kras, dan jon ap pengro rakepen Likaontikes gole, un penan: "O dewel Zois un o dewel Hermes wan dran o bolepen tele pash mende!"
Jon penan ap o Barnabas: "O Zois", un ap o Paulo: "O Hermes". O Paulo his o rakepaskro. Doleske kharan le les jaake.

Glan ko foro his ko kheer tardo, kai mangan i menshe ko debles an, kai kharas "Zois". Koleskro rashai anas grumjen un shukar senlepen glan ko foreskro wudar. Job un kol menshe kote kaman kau koowa glan o Pauleste un glan o Barnabeste te anell, har te wans le i dewel.
Har o Barnabas un o Paulo kowa shunan, kran le pengre ripja paash un stan mashkral kol menshende, un dan gole:

"Murshale, hoi krenn tumer kote? Mer ham menshe har tumer, un penah tumenge o latcho lab o djido Deblestar. Job kamell, te wenn tumer ap leskro drom, un mangenn buder gar kol chochene deblen dran kasht un bar an. Job hi ko Dewel, kai kras o bolepen un i phub, un o baro pani, un lauter, hoi djiwella.
An o phuro tsiro mukas job i menshen, kai kek bibolde hi, jaake te djiwell, har jon kaman.

Ninna te djinans tumer tchi lestar, hunte dikans, kai o Dewel djiwella. Job kras bud latcho koowa tumenge. Job dell tumen o brishin dran o bolepen, te well lauter ap i phub baro. Job dell tumende te chal, un i bacht an tumaro dji."
Fote o Paulo un o Barnabas jaake rakran, kaman i menshe lenge fichen te marell. Un o Paulo un o Barnabas mangan len pengro tselo djijestar, te krenn le kowa gar.

Koi wan bibolde dran i forja Antiochia un Ikonion an kau foro. Kolla lan bud menshen ap pengri rig, lan barra, witsran i barentsa ap o Pauleste, tsardan les dran o foro win, un dikan ap leste, un penan: "Kowa hi mulo."
Har o Pauleskre mala trul leste tardo his, stas job pre un djas an ko foro. Ap o wawar diwes djas lo o Barnabeha an o foro Derbe.
An ko foro penan le o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, un bud menshe wan patslo. Palle djan jon pale an kol forja Listra, Ikonion un Antiochia,

djan pash i patslende un dan len soor an o dji, un rakran lenge an o dji, te atchenn jon an o patsepen. Un jon penan ap kol patslende: "Ap maro drom pash o Debleste an o bolepen krenn menge i menshe o djipen phares."

Un an hake gaba un forja, kai i patsle khetne wan, rodas o Paulo un o Barnabas phralen win, te wenn le phureder mank i patslende. Un o Paulo un o Barnabas lan penge i tsiro, kai chan le tchi o Debleske, un mangan o Debles lauterenge, kai ap leste patslo wan, te dell lo ap lende jak.
Palle djan le an i themma Pisidia un Pamfilia.
Jon penan i menshenge an o foro Perge o Debleskro lab, un djan dureder an o foro Attalia.

Kote djan le ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, un wan an o foro Antiochia. Kowa his kau foro, kai bitchran i patsle o Paules un o Barnabes an wawar forja, te penan jon kote o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, un jon mangan o Debles, te djal lo lentsa. Kai budi his kanna kerdo.

Un o Paulo un o Barnabas wan kanna pale pale an ko foro. Kote dan le i patslen khetne gole, un penan lenge, kai o Dewel lentsa his, un har bud koowa job kras, un har job ninna kolen, kai kek bibolde hi, pash peste gole das, un jon ap leskro drom wan.
Un o Paulo un o Barnabas atchan i raha tsiro pash kol patslende.

Koi wan mursha dran o them Judea an o foro Antiochia tele, un penan kol patslenge, kai kek bibolde hi: "Tumer hunte mukenn tumen ap o mass te tchinell, har o Mose kowa an peskre lila tchinas. Te mukenn tumen gar ap o mass te tchinell, palle nai wenn tumer gar o Debleskre tchawe."

Har o Paulo un o Barnabas kowa shunan, penan le kol murshenge: "Hi gar tchatcho, hoi tumer i patslenge penan!" Koi his len i baro tchingepen lentsa. Koi pre penan lenge i phrala, te djan jon dui i wawar phralentsa an o foro Jerusalem pash o Jesuseskre bitchepangre un pash i phureder mank i patslende, te putchenn le lendar, hoi jon pral kowa penenna.

Un i phrala penan ap o Pauleste un ap o Barnabeste: "Djan o Debleha!" Un kol dui kran pen ap o drom un wan an i themma Fenicia un Samaria. Un kote penan le i menshenge, har kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, patslo wan. Koi pral wan i tsele patsle bachtelo.

Palle was o Paulo un o Barnabas pash i patslende an o foro Jerusalem. Un i phureder un o Jesuseskre bitchepangre his ninna kote, un lan len o djijestar pash pende pre. Un o Paulo un o Barnabas penan lenge, kai o Dewel lentsa his, un har bud koowa job mashkral kolende kras, hoi kek bibolde hi.

His Farisarja koi, kai ap o Jesuseste patslo wan. Kolla penan ap i phralende: "Kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, hunte wenn ap o mass tchindlo, un lenge hunte well penlo, te rikrenn le pen ap o Moseskre laba."
Un i Jesuseskre bitchepangre un i phureder mank i patslende wan khetne, te rakrenn le pral ko koowa.

Har jon pen i raha tsiro tchingran, stas o Petro pre, un penas: "Mire phrala, tumer djinenna, kai o Dewel rodas man glan raha tsiro win, un kamas, te penap me o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar kolenge, kai kek bibolde hi. Un kolla shunan un patsan.
O Dewel, kai prindjrell i menshengre djia, sikras mende, kai das job ninna kolen o Debleskro Ducho, kai kek bibolde hi.
Leske hi jon gar wawartchandes har mer, i bibolde. Jon te patsenn ap leste, palle krell lo lengro dji djudjo.
Kamenn tumer, te well o Dewel chojedo ap tumende? Ma tchiwenn pharo koowa ap lende, kai nai hidjan mare phure gar, un mer witar gar!

Mer patsah, te dell men maro rai Jesus ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella tchitcheske, - kokres dran leskro latchepen. Ninna kolen, kai kek bibolde hi, dell lo kau djipen tchitcheske, - kokres dran leskro latchepen."
Koi tchingran kol tsele menshe buder gar lentsa, un shunan ap o Pauleste un o Barnabeste, har kolla lenge penan, hawo baro un sorelo koowa o Dewel mashkral kolende kras, kai kek bibolde hi.
Pal lengro rakepen stas o Jakobo pre, un penas: "Mire phrala, shunenn, hoi kamau te penap!
O Simon ginas menge dre, hoi o Dewel lauter kras, te wenn ninna kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, leskre menshe, un te wenn le leske koi.
Kowa hi ninna an o Debleskro lab tchindlo: O Dewel penas:
Pal kowa wau me pale pash tumende, te krap o Davideskro kheer pale newes, kowa, hoi khetne peras.
Kowa krau, te putchenn lauter, kai pral atchan, pal mande. Ninna kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, denn man an-gole. Un jon wenn miro, un wenn mange koi.
O Dewel krell kowa kanna, hoi job glan i raha tsiro penas."
"Doleske penau me" penas o Jakobo, "mer hunte tchiwas gar o biboldengro tchatchepen ap i patslende, kai kek bibolde hi, te krenn le lauter jaake, har i bibolde krenna.

Mer tchinah lenge i liil, un penah lenge, te chan le kek mass, hoi was glan i figura anlo, hoi i menshe an-mangenn, har te wals li o Dewel; te sowenn i mursha gar wawar djuwjentsa, witar gar i djuwja wawar murshentsa; te chan le kek mass i fichendar, kai o rat gar win nashas, te pijenn le lendar witar kek rat.
Kowa, hoi o Mose penas, kowa well i menshenge an hake forja penlo. Hako Debleskro diwes wenn o Moseskre laba an i biboldengre kangria glan-drawedo."

O Jesuseskre bitchepangre un i phureder mank i patslende, khetne i tsele patslentsa rodan murshen mashkral i patslende win, te djan jon o Pauleha un o Barnabeha an o foro Antiochia. Kol mursha his o Judas, koles his ninna ko lab Barsabas, un o Silas. Kolla his pralstune mursha mashkral kol patslende.

An ko liil, hoi jon peha lan, his tchindlo: "Kau liil tchinan o Jesuseskre bitchepangre un i phureder mank i patslende. Mer ham tumare phrala un tchinah kau liil ap i patslende, kai kek bibolde hi, un kai djiwenna an kol themma Antiochia, Siria un Cilicia.
Mer shunam, te wan menshe mendar pash tumende, un kran tumen dineles, jaake te lan tumer traash. Djinenn, kolen bitchram mer gar pash tumende.
Doleske wam mer khetne, un penam jek djijeha: Mer rodah murshen win, un bitchrah len pash tumende. Lentsa wenn ninna mare latche phrala, o Paulo un o Barnabas.
Kolla hi mursha, kai budrenna maro rajeske, o Jesus Kristeske, un lengri budi leske hi lenge budeder moldo har lengro djipen.
Kol dui murshen, kai bitchram kanna pash tumende, o Judas un o Silas, kolla penenn tumenge kol emlige laba, hoi mer tchinam:
O Debleskro Ducho un mer kamah gar tumaro djipen phares te krell. Mer penah tumenge tchi wawar har kawa:

Chan kek mass, hoi was glan i figura anlo, hoi i menshe an-mangenn, har te wals li o Dewel. Pijenn kek rat! Chan kek mass i fichestar, kai o rat gar win nashas! I murshenge penah, te sowenn le gar wawar djuwjentsa. Un i djuwjenge penah, te sowenn le gar wawar murshentsa. Te rikrenn tumen ap kowa, hi kowa mishto. Atchenn o Debleha!"
Koi djan le an o foro Antiochia, lan i patslen khetne, un dan len ko liil.
Har kolla ko liil draweran, wan jon lauter bachtelo pral kol laba.
O Judas un o Silas his o Debleskre rakepangre. Jon rakran kol patslentsa, un mangan len, te atchenn le an o patsepen. Un lengre labentsa dan jon len soor, te djan jon dureder ap o Jesuseskro drom.
Un har jon i tsiro an o foro Antiochia his, mukan kol patsle len te djal. Un jon djan pale an o foro Jerusalem pash kolende, kai bitchran len.
O Paulo un o Barnabas atchan an o foro Antiochia. Un jon khetne bud wawarentsa sikran i menshende o Jesuseskro drom, un penan lenge, hoi o rai Jesus lenge penas un kras.
Pal jek tsiro penas o Paulo ap o Barnabeste: "Djas pale pale an kol tsele forja, kai mer o Debleskro lab i menshenge penam! Dikas pal mare phralende an i wawar themma, har lenge djala!"
O Barnabas kamas ninna o Johanni Markes peha te lell.
O Paulo penas ap o Barnabeste: "Kowa hi gar mishto, te las o Markes peha. Job mukas men an o them Pamfilia kokres, djas peske, un budras gar mentsa."
Un kote tchingran pen o Paulo un o Barnabas pral o Markeste jaake, kai djas hakeno peskro drom. O Barnabas las o Markes peha, un jon uleran ap o panjeskro ulepaskro an o them Ciprus.
O Paulo rodas peske o Silases win, un djas peske leha. Un kol patsle penan lenge: "O Dewel djal tumentsa!"
Un o Paulo un o Silas djan an i themma Siria un Cilicia, un jon dan i tsele patslen soor an o patsepen.
Jon wan ninna an i forja Derbe un Listra. Koi his i tarno patslo mursh. Kowa kharas Timoteo. Leskri dai his i biboldetsa. Un joi his patslo. Leskro dad his kek biboldo.
O Timoteo his i mursh, pral koleste rakran i patsle mishto an i forja Listra un Ikonion.

Koles kamas o Paulo peha te lell ap o drom. Job las les un tchinas les ap o mass, har kowa pash i bibolde hi, te tchingrenn i bibolde gar koi pral. I bibolde djinan lauter, kai leskro dad kek biboldo hi.

An kol forja, kai jon wan, dan jon i phralen ko liil, kai dre tchindlo hi, hoi o Jesuseskre bitchepangre un i phureder mank i patslende an o foro Jerusalem win kran. Un jon penan lenge, te rikrenn le pen ap kol laba.
Un i tsele patsle wan sorleder an o patsepen, un hako diwes wan budeder patslo.
O Paulo un o Silas djan dureder. Un har o Debleskro Ducho gar kamas, te penan le o Debleskro lab an o them Asia, djan le an i themma Frigia un Galatia.
Har jon an o them Misia wan, kaman le dureder an o them Bitinia te djal. Un o Jesuseskro Ducho mukas len gar kote te djal.
Koi djan le mank o them Misia tele an o foro Troas.
Koi dikas o Paulo an i suni i murshes dran o them Macedonia. Kowa mangas les un penas: "Am wergal an o them Macedonia, un pen menge o Debleskro lab!"
Koi pre rodam mer sik i panjeskro ulepaskro, kai lell men peha an o them Macedonia. Mer djinam, kai das men o Dewel gole, te penas kote i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar.
Mer uleram dran o foro Troas krik, un wam an o foro Samotrake. Ap o wawar diwes djam an o foro Neapolis.
Palle uleram dureder an o foro Filipi. Kowa hi i foro an ko them Macedonia. Kote djiwan bud Remarja. Mer atcham i tsiro an ko foro.
Ap o Debleskro diwes djam mer win glan o foro pash o pani. Mer patsam, te wenn pash o pani menshe khetne, kai mangenn kote o Debles an. Koi besham men tele, un rakram kolla djuwjentsa, kai kote wan.

Koi his i djuwel, kai mangas kote o Debles an. Joi his i bikepaskretsa un bikras ripja dran lolo thann. Koja kharas Lidia. Joi his dran o foro Tiatira. Kolake kras o rai Jesus o dji pre. Un joi shunas, hoi o Paulo penas, un was patslo.

Un joi mukas pes peskre menshentsa an o pani te thowell, te sikrell li, te patsell li ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste. Un joi mangas men soreles un penas: "Te patsenn tumer, kai me ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste patsau, awenn an miro kheer un atchenn kote!" Un joi mangas men o tselo djijestar, te was mer an lakro kheer.
Jek diwes, har mer djam pale pash o pani, kai jon mangan o Debles an, tapram mer i rakli, an kolate his i beng, kowa das lat o durkepen. Lakro durkepaha anas li lakre rajenge bud lowe dre.
Koja las o Paules un men palla, un das gole: "Kalla mursha budrenn ko baro Debleske! Kalla sikrenn tumenge o drom pash leste."

Kowa das li gole hako diwes. O Paulo was chojedo, un risras pes trujal, un penas ap ko bengeste, kai hi an late: "Me penau tuke an o Jesus Kristeskro lab: Dja dran late win!" Koi djas o beng dran kai rakli win.
Har lakre raja dikan, kai nashte anas joi lenge buder kek lowe, wan le tchilatcho, un tapran o Paules un o Silases. Un jon anan len an o foro glan i pralstunende.
I pralstune anan i tchatchepangren an ko foro khetne, un penan: "Kalla anenn tchingepen an maro foro. Jon hi bibolde,
un penenn menge, te rikras ap sawe laba, hoi mer nai krah gar. Mer ham Remarja."
Bud menshe, kai his koi, wan tchilatcho ap o Pauleste un ap o Silaseste. Un kol tchatchepangre mukan lenge i koola tele te tsardell, un penan, te denn le len i kashtentsa.
Pal kowa har jon len soreles dawa dan, witsran le len an o stilepen, un penan ap o rajeste pral o stilepen: "De mishto jak ap lende!"
Har jon kowa ap leste penan, witsras job len an o palstuno stilepen, un tchiwas lengre pire an o kasht, un pandas len.
Deesh-te-dujenge an i rat sharan o Paulo un o Silas o Debles, un giwan leske i gili. Un kol wawar stilepangre shunan kowa, har jon giwan.
Ap jek kopo trissas i phub, un ko kheer, kai o stilepen his, peras khetne. I wudja stan pre, un ap i stilepangre peran i sasterne shelle tele.
Har o rai pral o stilepen pre djangewas un dikas, kai kol wudja an o stilepen pre his, patsas lo, kai kol stilde nashan penge. Koi las job peskro charo, un kamas pes te marell.
Koi das o Paulo soreles gole: "Ma mare tut! Mer ham lauter kate!"
Un o rai pral o stilepen mangas i momeli, un djas sik pash i stilepangre. Les his i bari daar, har mukas job pes glan o Pauleste un o Silaseste tele te perell.
Un job anas len win, un penas ap lende: "Rajale, hoi krap, te lap o Debleskro djipen?"
Penan le ap leste: "Pats ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste! Jaake leh tu un tire menshe o Debleskro djipen."
Un o Paulo un o Silas penan leske, un kol tsele wawarenge an leskro kheer, o Debleskro lab.
An koi rati thowas o rai pral o stilepen lengro rat tele, un mukas pes un peskre tsele menshen an o pani te thowell, te sikrell lo, te patsell lo ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste.
Job las len dre an peskro kheer, das len te chal un te pijell, un his bachtelo peskre tsele menshentsa, kai wan jon patslo ap o Debleste.
Har diwes was, bitchran kol tchatchepangre pengre klisten pash o rajeste pral o stilepen un penan leske, te mukell lo o Paules un o Silases te djal.
Kowa was pash o Pauleste un penas leske: "I tchatchepangre bitchran man, te penap tumenge, te han tumer gar buder stildo. Awenn win un djan tumaro drom. Kek krell tumenge tchilatchepen!"

O Paulo penas ap kol klistende: "Mer ham Remarja. Tumare pralstune mukan men dawa te dell glan i tsele menshende. Jon rakran kek tchatchepen pral mende win, un witsran men an o stilepen. Un kanna kamenn jon men tchorchanes dran o stilepen win te anell. Jaake djal kowa gar, har jon kamenna. Kolla tchatchepangre, kai kran kowa, kolla hunte wenna pash mende un hunte anenn men dran o stilepen win. Kowa penenn lenge!"
Kol kliste penan kowa i tchatchepangrenge. Har kolla shunan, kai o Paulo un o Silas Remarja hi, lan jon traash,
un djan pash lende, mangan pen tele glan lende, anan len dran o stilepen win, un mangan len, te djan le dran o foro win.
Un o Paulo un o Silas djan pale an o kheer, kai i Lidia djiwell. Un har jon kote pengre phralen dikan, penan jon lenge: "Ma trashenn! Atchenn o Debleha!" Palle djan jon dran ko foro win.
Un o Paulo un o Silas wan an i forja Amfipolis un Apolonia un djan dureder an o foro Tessalonika. Koi his i biboldengri kangri.
Har pash o Pauleste kowa jaake his, djas lo pash lende dre, un penas lenge ap triin Debleskre diwessa o Debleskro lab.

Job sikras lende, kai an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi, har ko baro rai, kai o Deblestar wella, hunte las bud duka ap peste, un stas i mulendar pre. "Un me penau tumenge," penas o Paulo, "kau Jesus, kolestar rakrau, kowa hi ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job."

Mank i biboldende his sawe, kai patsan kowa, hoi o Paulo lenge penas. Un jon rikran pen ap i rig o Paulestar un o Silasestar. Ninna bud, bud griche, kai lan o biboldengro patsepen an, patsan kowa, hoi o Paulo penas. Mank lende his ninna bud an-dikle djuwja.

I bibolde, kai gar ap o Jesuseste patsan, silweran ap o Pauleste un ap o Silaseste. Un jon djan ap o drom, rodan tchilatche murshen, un lentsa kran le i menshen an ko foro diwjo. Un jon djan pash ko kheer, kai djiwas o Jason. Jon patsan, te wans o Paulo un o Silas pash leste. Un i bibolde un i tchilatche kaman len dran o kheer win te anell glan i tsele menshende.

Har jon kol dujen gar hatsan, lan le o Jason un wawar patslen, un anan len glan kolende, kai his pralstune pral ko foro, un dan gole: "Kalla menshe krenn ap i tseli phub tchingepen. Kalla wan kanna ninna kate pash mende,
un djiwenn pash o Jason. Jon krenn gar, hoi o baro rai an o foro Rom lenge penella, un penenn: I wawar hi o baro rai. Leskro lab hi Jesus."
Har kol menshe un kol pralstune pral ko foro kowa shunan, wan le chojedo.
O Jason un i wawar patsle hunte dan len lowe, te mukan le len te djal.
An koi rat bitchran kol patsle o Paules un o Silases an o foro Berea. Har jon koi wan, djan jon an i biboldengri kangri.

I bibolde an o foro Berea shunan feteder ap o Debleskro lab, har kol bibolde an o foro Tessalonika. Jon shunan o Debleskro lab pengro tselo djijeha, un rodan hako diwes an o Debleskro lab, te djinenn le, te hi kowa tchatcho, hoi o Paulo penas.
Bud lendar wan patslo, ninna bud brawele griche, djuwja har mursha.
Har shunan kol bibolde an o foro Tessalonika, te penas o Paulo ninna i menshenge an o foro Berea o Debleskro lab, wan le kote un kran tchingepen. Jon kaman, te wenn i menshe chojedo ap lende.
Koi bitchran kol patsle o Paules sik dureder pash o baro pani. O Silas un o Timoteo atchan an o foro Berea.
Kolla, kai djan o Pauleha, anan les an o foro Athen. Glan kowa, har jon khere djan penas o Paulo lenge, te penenn le ap o Silaseste un ap o Timoteste, te wenn jon jaake sik har djala pash leste.

Jaake raha kamas o Paulo an o foro Athen te atchell. Kote dikas lo bud barengre murshen, djuwjen un fichen, hoi kran i menshe pengre wastentsa, un hoi jon an-mangenna. Un kowa dukas les an peskro dji.
Job rakras an i biboldengri kangri ap i biboldende, un ninna ap kol grichende, kai lan o biboldengro patsepen an. Un hako diwes rakras lo mashkral an o foro ap kol menshende, kai job kote dikas.

Mank lende his ninna sikle mursha, kai kharan Stoikarja un Epikurarja. Kolla tchingran leha. Har rakras o Paulo pral o Jesuseste, un penas, kai kras o Dewel o Jesuses i mulendar djido, penan le: "Hoi kamell ko dinelo rakepaskro te penell?" Wawar penan: "Job rakrell pral wawar deblende, kolen mer gar prindjrah."
Jon lan o Paules peha, un anan les ap i platsa, hoi kharella Areopag. Un jon penan: "Nai peneh tu menge, hawo newo patsepen hi kowa, hoi tu peneh kate i menshenge?
Kowa, hoi tu menge peneh, hi menge newo. Mer kamah te djinell, hoi hi kowa."
I tsele menshe an o foro Athen, ninna kol wi-themarja, kai djiwenn pash lende, kolen his tchi wawar an o shero, har te shunenn le i newo koowa, un te rakrenn le pral kowa.
Un o Paulo his mashkral lende ap o Areopag tardo, un penas: "Murshale an o foro Athen, me dikau, kai hi tumenge tumare debla bud moldo.

Me djom an tumaro foro trujal, un dikom ko koowa, hoi tumenge mulno hi, un hoi tumer an-mangenna. Un me hatsom i bar, kai anenn le chapen i debleske. Ap ko bar hi tchindlo: Ko debleske, kai prindjrah gar. Un me penau tumenge: Ko Dewel, kones tumer an-mangenna, ninna te prindjrenn les gar, pral koleste rakrau me kanna.
Ko Dewel kras o bolepen un i phub, un lauter, hoi koi pre hi. Job hi o rai pral o bolepen un i phub. Job djiwell gar an i Debleskre khera, kai i menshe pengre wastentsa kran.
Mer hunte anas les tchi te chal un te pijell. Job das lauteren o djipen, un job dell len lauter kowa, hoi len hunte well djipaske.
Ko Dewel kras ko jek menshes, o Adames. Kolestar wan i tsele menshe an hake themma ap i phub. Job das len i tsiro, har raha jon djiwenna, un ninna an hawo them jon djiwenna.
Kowa lauter kras o Dewel, te rodenn le les, un te haiwenn le, kai job kai hi, un te hatsenn le les. Un job hi gar dur hakenestar mendar.
An leste djiwah mer, un halauter, hoi mer krah, krah mer an leste. Un mer ham an leste. Ninna tumare gosewe mursha penan: Mer wah o Deblestar.
Mer te wah o Deblestar, palle hi kowa dinlepen, te patsenn tumer, kai hatsenn o Debles an kowa, hoi tumer tumare wastentsa kran dran sonakai, rup un barra.
An o phuro tsiro djinan i menshe gar, kai kowa, hoi jon kran, i doosh his. Un o Dewel das len kek phagi. Kanna penell o Dewel, te mukenn i menshe pengro tchilatcho drom, un djan ap leskro drom.

O Dewel djinell ko diwes, kai rakrell lo o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende, un job djal pal o tchatchepen. O Dewel rodas i murshes win, te well job tchatchepaskro rai. Koles kras job i mulendar djido. Jaake sikras o Dewel hakeneste, kai job kau murshes win rodas."
Har shunan le, kai rakrell o Paulo pral i mursheste, kai mulo his un pale djido was, his lenge sapaske. Wawar penan: "Tu te peness menge pral ko koowa i wawar kopo budeder."
Palle djas peske o Paulo lendar.
His mursha koi, kai djan leha un wan patslo. Mashkral lende his ninna o Dionisio, i pralstuno ap o Areopag, un i djuwel, kai kharas Damaris, un ninna wawar.
Pal kowa djas o Paulo dran o foro Athen, un djas an o foro Korint.

Koi tapras job i biboldes dran o foro Pontus. Leskro lab his Akwila. Kowa was glan i tikno tsiro peskri romjaha, i Priska, dran o them Italia. O baro rai an o foro Rom, o Klaudio, penas, te djan i tsele bibolde dran o foro Rom win. Pash lende djas o Paulo kanna.
Un har job koi emligi budi kras har jon, atchas lo pash lende un budras lentsa.

Hako Debleskro diwes djas job an i biboldengri kangri un sikras i menshende o Debleskro drom. Un hoi job penas, sikras i biboldende un kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, kai o Jesus hi o Kristo, ko baro rai, koles o Dewel bitchras.

Har o Silas un o Timoteo dran o them Macedonia wan, tchiwas o Paulo peskri budi ap i rig, te nai penell lo i menshenge o Debleskro lab. An o Debleskro lab sikras lo i biboldende, kai o Jesus ko baro rai hi, koles o Dewel bitchras.

Jon shunan gar ap leste un praassan les. Palle das job koi tchik dran peskre koola tele, un penas ap lende: "Tumaro rat well ap tumaro shero. Man hi kek doosh. Kanna djau me pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi."
Job djas peske, un was an o kheer jekestar, kai las i biboldengro patsepen an. Leskro lab his Titio Justo. Koleskro kheer his pash i biboldengri kangri.

O Krispo, ko pralstuno pral i biboldengri kangri, was peskre tsele menshentsa patslo ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste. Ninna bud menshe an o foro Korint wan patslo. Un jon mukan pen an o pani te thowell, te sikrenn le, kai patsenn le ap o Jesus Kristeste.
I rati penas o rai Jesus an i suni ap o Pauleste: "Ma traash! Rake mandar un muk gar tele!
Me hom pash tute un kek nai dukrell tut. An kau foro hi bud menshe, kai kamenna ap mande te patsell."
Un o Paulo atchas jek bersh un shob tchon an kau foro, un penas lenge o Debleskro lab.
An ko tsiro, har his o Gallio o pralstuno un tchatchepaskro rai pral ko them Achaja, tchiwan pen kol bibolde khetne, un anan o Paules glan leste,
un penan koleske: "O Mose sikras men, har mer hunte mangas o Debles an. Un kanna well kau mursh un penell menge, te mangas mer o Debles wawartchandes an."
Har o Paulo kamas tchomone te penell, koi penas o Gallio ap i biboldende: "Te krals o Paulo i tchilatcho koowa, kai hunte lals lo i phagi, palle shunoms me tumen.
Tumer tchingrenn pral o biboldengro patsepen, un pral o Moseskre laba. Doleske anenn les glan tumare tchatchepangre! Me dau les gar i phagi."
Un job tradas len pestar.
Koi tapran kol bibolde o Sostenes, kol pralstunes pral i biboldengri kangri, un dan les dawa glan o Gallio, un kowa dikas kowa, un kras tchi.

O Paulo atchas i tsiro an o foro Korint. Koi pal penas lo i patslenge: "Atchenn o Debleha!" Un job uleras ap o panjeskro ulepaskro pral o baro pani an o them Siria. I Priska un o Akwila his pash leste. Glan kowa, har jon an o foro Kenchrea ap o panjeskro ulepaskro djan, das pes o Paulo sowel un mukas peskre balla tele te tchinell.
Pal kowa wan le an o foro Efesus. Un o Paulo mukas o Akwiles un i Priskat koi. Job djas an i biboldengri kangri un rakras koi i biboldentsa.
Jon mangan les, te atchell job budeder tsiro pash lende. Job kamas gar te atchell.
Har djas lo peske, penas lo ap lende: "Te kamell o Dewel, wau pale pash tumende." Un job djas win dran o foro Efesus, un uleras ap o panjeskro ulepaskro pral o baro pani,
un was an o foro Cesarea. Kote was lo i patslentsa khetne. Palle djas lo tele an o foro Antiochia.
Un har job i tsiro koi his, djas lo dureder an i themma Galatia un Frigia, un das i tsele patslen soor an o patsepen.
Koi was i biboldo an o foro Efesus. Leskro lab his Apollo. Kowa was dran o foro Alexandria. O Apollo djinas o Debleskro lab mishto, un his i latcho rakepaskro.

Job djinas ninna tchomone pral o Jesuseskro drom. Un peskro tselo djijeha rakras lo lestar. Un lauter, hoi job pral leste penas, his tchatcho. Ninna te djinas lo kowa lauter, djinas job kokres, har o Johanni i menshen an o pani thowas.

O Apollo djas an i biboldengri kangri, un les his kek traash, te penell lo kote i biboldenge o Jesusestar. Har o Akwila un i Priska les shunan, lan le les pash pende khere, un sikran leste o Debleskro drom feteder un budeder.

Palle kamas o Apollo an o them Achaja te djal. Un i patsle an o foro Efesus dan les i liil peha. An ko liil mangan le i phralendar an o them Achaja, te lenn jon o phrales Apollo pash pende pre. Un har job kote was, djas lo pash kolende, kai patslo wan dran o Debleskro latchepen, un sikras len o Debleskro drom feteder un budeder.
Job penas i biboldenge o Debleskro lab kote, kai job djas. Un job sikras lende an o Debleskro lab, kai hi o Jesus ko baro rai, kolestar o Dewel glan i raha tsiro penas, te well job.
Har o Apollo an o foro Korint his, djas o Paulo an i themma Galatia un Frigia, un palle was lo an o foro Efesus. Koi hatsas job ninna patslen.
Ap kolende penas job: "Was o Debleskro Ducho ap tumende, har wan patslo?" Koi penan jon ap leste: "Mer shunam gar, kai hi o Debleskro Ducho kai."
Un job putchas lendar: "Ap hawo lab wan tumer an o pani thodo?" Penan jon: "Mer wam jaake an o pani thodo, har o Johanni kowa kras un penas."

Koi pre penas lenge o Paulo: "O Johanni thowas kolen an o pani, kai kaman te sikrell, kai mukan le pengro phuro djipen. Un job penas i menshenge, te hunte patsenn le ap koleste, kai pal leste wella. Un kowa hi o Jesus."
Har kol patsle kowa shunan, mukan pen le ap o lab o Jesusestar, maro rajestar, an o pani te thowell.
Un o Paulo tchiwas i wasta ap lende, un o Debleskro Ducho was ap lende. Un jon rakran an wawar rakepen, un penan kowa, hoi o Dewel lende sikras.
Koi his nai deesh-te-dui mursha khetne.

Triin tchon atchas o Paulo kote un rakras an i biboldengri kangri. Un les his kek traash un penas i menshenge i bari sorjaha, kai o Dewel o Jesus Kristes bitchras, te lell lo len dran o tchilatchepen win.

Koi his ninna menshe pashal, kai kaman o Jesusestar tchi te djinell un kaman gar ap leste te patsell. Un glan i menshende rakran le djungelo koowa pral o patsepen ap o Jesuseste. Koi mukas o Paulo kol wawar patslentsa i biboldengri kangri, un rakras hako diwes an ko sikepaskro kheer, kai o Tiranno o sikepaskro hi.
Kowa kras job dui bersha, te shunan i bibolde un kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, an o them Asia o Debleskro lab.
Un o Dewel his pash o Pauleste, un job nai kras bud baro un sorelo koowa an o Debleskri soor.

Hi jaake, kai lan i menshe ninna i koola un meenjakre dikle, hoi ap o Pauleste his, un tchiwan len ap kol nasslende, un o nasslepen djas lendar. Un i benga djan dran i menshende win, un jon wan sasto.

Kote his bibolde, kai nashan an o them trujal, un tradan i bengen dran i menshende win. Jon kaman ninna an o Jesuseskro lab kol bengen wi te tradell, un jon penan ap lende: "Mer penah tumenge an o lab ko Jesusestar, kolestar o Paulo rakrella: Awenn dran ko mensheste win!"
Kolla, kai kowa kran, his i efta tchawe i biboldestar. Kowa kharas Skewas un his i baro rashai.
Har kaman jon i benges wi tradenn, penas job ap lende: "O Jesuses prindjrau me, un o Paulestar shunom ninna. Koon han tumer?"
Un ko mursh, kai o beng an leste hi, stas ap lende pre, un das len jaake dawa, kai nashan jon ratles un nanges dran o kheer.
I menshe, kai an o foro Efesus djiwan, shunan kowa lauter. Un i bibolde, ninna kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, lan bari traash. Un ko lab o rai Jesusestar was soreles sharedo.
Wan ninna bud kolendar, kai patslo wan, un penan glan i menshende, hoi jon tchilatches kran.
Bud durkepangre lan pengre lila un chatchran len glan halauterende. Kol lila his nai pantch-deesh serja (50.000)rupene beme moldo.
Jaake shunan bud un budeder o Jesusestar, maro rajestar. Un job kras, te was peskro lab sorelo mank lende.
Pal kau koowa kamas o Paulo pral i themma Macedonia un Achaja an o foro Jerusalem te djal, un penas: "Un pal kowa hunte dikap me o foro Rom ninna."
Un job bitchras dujen, kai budran leske, o Timotes un o Erastes, an o them Macedonia. Job atchas i tsiro an o them Asia.
Ap ko tsiro was i baro tchingepen an o foro Efesus pral o newo patsepen ap o Jesuseste.

Koi his i mursh, kowa kharas Demetrio. Kowa kras tikne rupene khera, hoi wi-dikan har o kheer, kai mangan i menshe i debletsa an, kai Artemis kharella. O Demetrio anas peske un peskre budepangre bud lowe dre.
Un job das kol tsele murshen khetne gole, kai kran ninna koi budi, hoi job kras un penas ap lende: "Murshale, tumer djinenna, kai anell men koi budi bud lowe dre.
Tumer dikan un shunan, kai o Paulo i menshenge penella: I dewel, kai i wastentsa kerdo wella, hi kek dewel. I menshe an o foro Efesus un an o them Asia shunenn ap o Pauleskro rakepen.

Nai well, te rakrenn le djungelo koowa pral mari budi. Un mari debletsa Artemis, un lakro baro kheer hi lenge buder tchi moldo. I menshe bistrenn lakro railepen, kai well sharedo an o them Asia un ap i tseli phub."
Har jon kowa shunan, was i bari choli ap lende, un jon dan gole: "Bari hi i debletsa Artemis an o foro Efesus!"

Un i tsele menshe an kau foro wan diwjo. Un jon tapran kol dui murshen, o Gajes un o Aristarches, kai wan o Pauleha dran o them Macedonia. Un lauter khetne nashan le an o khelepaskro kheer un tsardan kol dui murshen sorjaha peha.
O Paulo kamas pash kol menshende an o khelepaskro kheer te djal. Leskre mala rikran les pale.
Ninna mank i pralstunende an ko them Asia his mursha, kai ap o Pauleste latcho his. Kolla mukan leske soreles te penell, te djal job gar an o khelepaskro kheer.
An kau kheer dan halauter gole. Ko jek das kowa gole un ko wawar das wawartchandes gole. Bud djinan gar, hoske wan le khetne.

Mashkral lende his menshe, kolla djan pash o Alexandro, un penan leske, hoske i menshe jaake diwjo hi. Un i bibolde mangan lestar, te rakrell job ap halauterende. Job hadas i wasta pre, te sikrell lo len, kai job kamas te rakrell lentsa.
Har jon haiwan, kai o Alexandro i biboldo his, dan jon i raha tsiro jaake gole, har te well kowa dran jek mui: "Bari hi i debletsa Artemis an o foro Efesus!"

Pal kowa har o moskero lenge penas, te mukenn le tele, penas job ap lende: "Murshale an o foro Efesus, hako mensho djinella, kai an maro foro i menshe garda denna ap i bari debletsa Artemis un ap lakro baro kheer. Un ninna djinell hakeno, kai peras koi bareskri debletsa, kai koi tardo hi, dran o bolepen tele.
Kek nai penella, kai kowa gar tchatcho hi. Kanna atchenn un mukenn! Ma krenn tchomone, hoi khaitell tumen!
Hoske anan tumer kal menshen kate an o khelepaskro kheer? Jon rakran kek djungele laba pral mari debletsa un tchoran tchi dran lakro kheer.
O Demetrio un kolla menshe, kai leha khetne budrenn, jon te trashenn, te lenn le buder kek lowe dre, palle nai djan le pash i tchatchepangre un moskere. Kolenge nai penenn le lengro koowa.
Tumer, te hatsenn wawar koowa ap kal murshende, palle hunte well kowa win kerdo ap i tsillo.
Kau diwes kran tumer i menshen diwjo tchitcheske. Kanna hunte trashas mer, te well kowa glan i tchatchepangre. Un mer nai penah lenge tchi, hoske kram kowa."
Un har job kowa penas, bitchras lo len khere.
Har i menshe buder gar diwjo his, das o Paulo i patslen pash peste gole, un das len soor an lengro patsepen. Palle penas lo lenge: "Atchenn o Debleha!" un djas peske, te djal lo an o them Macedonia.
Kote djas lo an i gaba un forja, kai i patsle khetne wenna, un das len soor an lengro patsepen. Koi pal was lo an o grichtikro them.
Har job triin tchon an kau them his, kamas lo ap o panjeskro ulepaskro an o them Siria te ulerell. Koi shunas lo, kai kamenn i bibolde les te marell. Doleske djas lo pale pale an o them Macedonia.

Khetne leha djas ninna o Sopater dran o foro Berea, leskro dad his o Pirro. Dran o foro Tessalonika djas o Aristarcho un o Sekundo lentsa. Dran o foro Derbe was o Gajo lentsa. Ninna o Timoteo djas lentsa. Un o Tichiko un o Trofimo wan dran ko them Asia lentsa.
Kolla uleran glan-wi, un atchan an o foro Troas, bis te wam ninna kote.
Har i diwessa trujal his, kai i bibolde kek shutlo maro chan, uleram mer ap o panjeskro ulepaskro dran o foro Filipi win, un wam pal pantch diwessa an o foro Troas. Kote atcham efta diwessa.

Ap o kurko wam mer khetne, te phagas o maro. Un o Paulo penas o Debleskro lab i menshenge. Un o wawar diwes kamas job ap o panjeskro ulepaskro dureder te ulerell. Doleske rakras job jaake raha bis deesh-te-dujenge an i rati.
An koi pralstuni isema, kai mer khetne hams, his bud momlia.
Pash i wochni his i tarno mursh beshdo. Kowa kharas Euticho. Har o Paulo jaake raha rakras, sowas o Euticho dre, un peras dran i pralstuni wochni ap i phub. Un har jon les pre hadan, his job mulo.
O Paulo djas tele, tchiwas pes ap leste, tapras les trujal, un penas: "Ma trashenn! Job djiwella."
Koi djas o Paulo pale pre, phagas o maro, chas les lentsa, un rakras i tseli rat lentsa, un palle djas lo peske.
Un kol wawar anan kol tarno murshes djides pale an o kheer, un lauter his bachtelo.

O Paulo kamas kokres o tselo drom an o foro Assos te nashell. Mer wawar djam lauter ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, un uleram glan-wi an o foro Assos. Kote kamam mer o Paules ap o panjeskro ulepaskro te lell. Jaake kamas o Paulo kowa mendar.
Har job men an o foro Assos tapras, lam les mer pash mende, un palle djam mer khetne an o foro Mitilene.
O wawar diwes wam pash o foro Kios. Palle wam an o foro Samos. Un i diwes koi pal wam an o foro Milet.

O Paulo kamas gar an o foro Efesus te djal, te nashrell lo an ko them Asia kek tsiro. Job kamas jaake sik har djala an o foro Jerusalem te djal, te well lo kote ap o baro diwes, kai kharella Pfingsta.
Har hams an o foro Milet, bitchras o Paulo jek phrales an o foro Efesus, un mukas kol phureden mank i patslende gole te dell, te wenn le pash leste.
Har jon pash o Pauleste wan, penas lo ap lende: "Tumer djinenna, har djiwom un hoi krom o tselo tsiro, har homs pash tumende an o them Asia.
Me krom man gar bareder har me hom. Me hom o rai Jesuseske koi. His mange jek, te djal mange djungeles. I bibolde lan man palla, un bud kope his mange ropaske.
Man his kek daar, te penap tumenge o tselo tchatchepen, har me tumende o Debleskro drom sikrom. Un me penom o Debleskro lab an tumare khera.
Me penom i biboldenge un kolenge, kai kek bibolde hi, te mukenn le pengro tchilatcho drom, un te djan le ap o Debleskro drom, un te patsenn le ap maro rajeste, o Jesuseste.
Un kanna penell mange o Debleskro Ducho, te djap an o foro Jerusalem. Un me hunte shunap ap leste. Hoi i bibolde an o foro Jerusalem mantsa krenna, kowa djinau gar.
O Debleskro Ducho penas mange an hako foro, kai djom, kai wau stildo un kai duka ap mande wenna.

Me dau tchi buder ap miro djipen. Jek koowa kamau me an miro djipen te krell: Me kamau koi budi te krell, hoi das man maro rai Jesus: Job penas mange, te penap i menshenge, har latcho o Dewel lenge hi, un har kras job i drom, te nai wenn le pash leste.
Me djom pash bud menshende un penom lenge, te dell o Dewel len pash peste gole, te lell lo len dran o tchilatchepen win. Kanna shunenn: Me djinau, kai dikenn tumer halauter man buder gar pale.
Jek penau me tumenge kau diwes: Man hi kek doosh, te djal jek tumendar nashedo.
Me mukom gar tele, te penap tumenge halauter, hoi o Dewel tumenge kras.
Denn garda ap tumende un ap kol tsele patslende! Kolen ginas o Dewel peskro tchaweskro rateha. O Debleskro Ducho das len an tumare wasta, te denn garda ap lende. Tumer han lengre bakrengre.
Jek djinau, te hom me gar buder koi, wenn diwje djukle pash tumende un marenn bud tumendar.
Ninna dran tumende wenna mursha, kai penenn i patslenge chochene laba, hoi gar o Deblestar wella. Un jon tsardenn i patslen ap pengri rig.
Doleske denn jak! Un rikrenn tumare jaka pre! Triin bersha homs me pash tumende, un rowom hako diwes un haki rat ap tumende, te krenn tchi, hoi gar mishto hi an o Debleskre jaka. Ma bistrenn kowa!

Me tchiwau tumen kanna an o Debleskro wast, te dell job jak ap tumende. Atchenn pash o Debleste un pash leskro lab! Leskro lab sikrell tumende o Debleskro latchepen. Les hi i soor, te krell lo tumen soreles an o patsepen. Un o Dewel dell tumen jek brawlepen an o bolepen. Kowa hi o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Kowa dell job lauterende, kai leskre tchawe hi.
Tumer djinenna: Me mangom kekestar tumendar tchomone: kek sonakai, kek rup, kek an-ripaske. Mire wastentsa budrom, te well man un kolen, kai pash mande hi, te chal.
Jaake sikrom tumende, kai hunte budras, te nai dah ninna i tchorwelende tchomone. Ma bistrenn kol laba, hoi o rai Jesus penas: Kowa, kai della, hi bachtleder har kowa, kai lella."
Har o Paulo kowa penas, djas lo lauterentsa ap i tchanga un mangas o Debles lenge.
Koi rowan le lauter soreles, tapran les trujal un tchumran les.
Ko lab, hoi o Paulo penas, te dikenn le les buder gar pale, kras len bare duka an o dji. Palle djan le leha pash o panjeskro ulepaskro.

Mer penam ap lende "Atchenn o Debleha," un uleram ap o panjeskro ulepaskro an o them Kos. Un o wawar diwes wam ap ko kotar them an o pani, hoi Rhodos kharella. Un palle uleram dureder an o foro Patara.
Un kote hatsam mer i wawar panjeskro ulepaskro, djam dre, un uleram an o them Fenicia.

Har wam jaake dur, te dikam nai o them Ciprus, mukam kowa serwes tchiddo, un uleram ap o panjeskro ulepaskro an o them Siria, un wam an o foro Tirus. Koi anan jon o tselo koowa, hoi o panjeskro ulepaskro hidjas, an o foro.

Kote rodam i patslen, un har hatsam len, atcham efta diwessa pash lende. O Debleskro Ducho penas kote i patslenge, te wenn bare duka ap o Pauleste an o foro Jerusalem. Koi penan jon ap leste, te djal lo gar an o foro Jerusalem.
Pal efta diwessa djam mer dureder. Mentsa djan i phrala pengre romjentsa un i tchawentsa dran o foro win pash o pani. Un kote djam mer ap i tchanga un mangam o Debles an.
Palle penam lenge: "Atchenn o Debleha," un jon djan pale khere, un mer djam ap o panjeskro ulepaskro.
Mer wam an o foro Ptolemais. Kote uleras o panjeskro ulepaskro gar buder dureder. An kau foro atcham mer jek diwes pash i patslende.

O wawar diwes djam mer dureder, un wam an o foro Cesarea. Kote djam an o kheer, kai o Filipo djiwell, un atcham pash leste. Kowa his i mursh, kai penell i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar. Job his jek kol eftendar, kai his wi-rodedo an o foro Jerusalem, te denn le i tchorwele patslende chapaske.
Koles his star tcha, kai gar romedino his. Kolla tcha his pherdo Debleskro Ducho, un jon penan i patslenge, hoi o Dewel lende sikras.
Har mer budeder diwessa koi hams, was i Debleskro rakepaskro dran o them Judea. Leskro lab his Agabo.

Un job was pash mende, las koi dori, hoi o Paules trul peskro ripen his, un pandas peskre pire un wasta, un penas: "Kowa penas mange o Debleskro Ducho: Ko mursh, koneske kai dori hi, koles pandenn i bibolde an o foro Jerusalem, un denn les an i wasta kolendar, kai kek bibolde hi."
Har mer kowa shunam, mangam mer, un kol wawar patsle an ko foro, o Paulestar, te djal job gar an o foro Jerusalem.

O Paulo penas: "Hoske rowenn tumer, un krenn mange miro dji pharo? Me kamau koi budi te krap, hoi o rai Jesus man das, ninna te pandenn le man i shellentsa, ninna te marenn le man an o foro Jerusalem."
Hako lab, hoi mer ap o Pauleste rakram, his tchitcheske. Koi penam mer: "Mu te well kowa jaake, har o Dewel kamella."
I tsiro koi pre djam mer an o foro Jerusalem.
Mentsa djan ninna patsle dran o foro Cesarea. Jon anan men pash o Menason. Kowa his i patslo, kai was dran o them Ciprus, un was glan o raha tsiro patslo. Pash leste atcham nai i tsiro.
Har wam an o foro Jerusalem, lan men kol patsle kote bachteles pre.
O wawar diwes djas o Paulo mentsa pash o Jakobeste. Un i tsele phureder mank i patslende wan kote.
O Paulo penas lenge "Latcho Diwes!" Un palle penas lo lenge halauter, jek pal o wawar, hoi o Dewel leha mashkral kol menshende kras, kai kek bibolde hi.

Har jon kowa shunan, sharan le o Debles, un penan ap o Pauleste: "Miro phraal, tu dikeh har bud serja bibolde patslo wan, un lauter rikrenn pen pengri tseli sorjaha ap kowa, hoi o Mose an peskre lila penas.
Lenge was pral tute penlo, kai tu kol biboldenge an i wawar themma penals, te mukenn le pengre tchawe buder gar ap o mass te tchinell, un te djiwenn le buder gar pal o Moseskre laba.
Hoi krah kanna? Jon shunan, kai tu pash mende hal.
Doleske shuness tu, hoi mer tuke penah: Men hi star mursha. Kolla dan pen sowel, kai pijenn jon i tsiro kek mool un mukenn pengre balla gar tele te tchinell.

Ko tsiro hi sik trujal. Le len pash tute, un thob tut lentsa khetne pal o biboldengro tchatchepen, un de len lowe, te mukenn jon pengre balla tele te tchinell! Jaake dikenn i tsele bibolde, kai kowa gar tchatcho hi, hoi jon pral tute penan. Un jon dikenna, kai tu pal o biboldengro tchatchepen djiweh.

Kolenge, kai kek bibolde hi un patslo wan, tchinam mer i liil. An ko liil hi tardo, - te chan le kek mass, hoi was glan i figura anlo, hoi i menshe an-mangenn, har te wals li o Dewel; - te pijenn le kek rat; - te chan le kek mass i fichestar, hoi was tassedo; - te sowenn i mursha gar wawar djuwjentsa, witar gar i djuwja wawar murshentsa."

Koi las o Paulo kol murshen pash peste. Un o wawar diwes thowas lo pes lentsa khetne pal o biboldengro tchatchepen. Palle djas job an o Debleskro baro kheer. Un kote penas lo i rashajenge: "Mer thowam men pal o biboldengro tchatchepen. An efta diwessa anah mer fichen hakeneske mendar, te wenn le maredo o Debleske. Koi tsiro hi kanna trujal, ap hoi mer men sowel dam."
Har his kolla efta diwessa trujal, dikan i bibolde dran o them Asia o Paules an o Debleskro baro kheer. Un jon kran, te wan bud menshe chojedo ap leste. Un jon tapran les,

un dan gole: "Murshale dran o them Israel, awenn pash mende! Kawa hi ko mursh, kai i tsele menshen ap i phub dinelo krella. Job rakrell djungeles pral i biboldende, pral o Moseskre lila, un pral o Debleskro baro kheer. Kanna anas job ninna kolen, kai kek bibolde hi, an o Debleskro baro kheer, un kras maro Debleskro baro kheer pale-tchiddo."

Glan kowa, kai dikan le les an o Debleskro baro kheer, dikan le les an o foro khetne jekeha, kai was dran o foro Efesus. Kowa his o Trofimo. Dran kowa patsan le, kai las o Paulo les peha an o Debleskro baro kheer. Kowa his gar tchatcho.

I tsele menshe an o foro Jerusalem wan chojemen ap o Pauleste, nashan khetne, tapran o Paules, un tsardan les dran o Debleskro baro kheer win. Har jon win his, pandan le sik i wudja an o Debleskro baro kheer.
I menshe djan ap o Pauleste pre un kaman les te marell. Koi was o pralstuneske pral i lurdende penlo, kai halauter an o foro Jerusalem diwjo wan.
Un o pralstuno lurdo las sik wawar pralstunen un lurden peha, un nashas kote, kai i menshe khetne wan. Har kolla kol pralstunes un kol lurden dikan, dan le o Paules kek dawa buder.
Un ko pralstuno lurdo djas pash o Pauleste, tapras les, mukas les dui sasterne shellentsa te pandell, un putchas halauterendar: "Koon hi kowa? Un hoi kras kowa?"
Ko jek das kawa gole, ko wawar das kowa gole. Un o pralstuno lurdo haiwas kek lab, hoi jon leske penan. Pale mukas lo o Paules an o lurdengro kheer te anell.
Kol bud menshe lan les palla, un dan gole: "Denn les mulo!" Har o Paulo glan ko lurdengro kheer was, hunte hidjan i lurde les, jaake diwjo his i menshe, kai kaman les te marell.
Har jon o Paules an o lurdengro kheer kaman te anell, putchas lo ko pralstunestar: "Nai rakrau tuha?" Kowa penas: "Rakreh tu grichtikes?
Hal tu gar ko mursh dran o them Egiptia, kai glan i tsiro i tchingepen kras, un anas star-sheel marepangren an o mulo them win?"
"Na-a," penas o Paulo, "me hom i biboldo un wau dran o foro Tarsus, dran o them Cilicia. Me mangau tut: Muk man kal menshentsa te rakrell!"
Un o pralstuno lurdo penas ap o Pauleste: "Palle rake!" O Paulo his tardo pral glan o kheer un hadas peskro wast, te wenn le pokone. Har jon buder gar gole dan, rakras job lentsa ap hebretikes.
Tumer mursha, phrala un dada, shunenn, hoi kamau tumenge te penell!
Har jon shunan, kai rakrell job hebretikes, dan le buder gar gole. Un job penas:

Me hom i biboldo, un wom boldo an o foro Tarsus, an ko them Cilicia. Baro wom an o foro Jerusalem. Miro sikepaskro his o Gamaliel. Kowa sikras mande, te djiwap jaake, har mare phure djiwan. Jaake har tumer pal o Moseskre laba djiwenna, djiwom me ninna o tselo djijestar.
Me lom kolen palla, kai djan ap ko newo drom - me lom len jaake palla, te marom len. Murshen un djuwjen pandom, un witsrom len an o stilepen.
