Ko baro rashai un kol tsele biboldengre phureder nai penenn, kai kowa tchatcho hi, hoi penau kate. Har kamom an o foro Damaskus te djal, dan man i rashaja lila peha i biboldenge an ko foro, te nai pandap ninna kote kolen, kai djan ap ko newo drom, te anap len an o foro Jerusalem, te lenn le kote pengri phagi.
Jaake djom ap o drom an o foro Damaskus. Har me homs i paash diwes glan o foro Damaskus, was ap jek kopo i bari momeli dran o bolepen trul mande.
Me perom ap i phub, un shunom, har jek ap mande penas: Saulo, Saulo, hoske leh tu man palla?
Me penom: Koon hal tu, mo rai? Un job penas ap mande: Me hom o Jesus dran Nazaret, koles tu palla leh.
Kolla mursha, kai pash mande his, dikan nai koja momeli. Jon shunan gar kol laba, hoi job ap mande penas.
Me putchom: Rai, hoi krap? Un o rai penas ap mande: Ste pre un dja an o foro Damaskus! Kote well tuke penlo, hoi tu hunte kress.
Koi bari momeli his jaake soreli, kai kras li man korelo. Un kolla, kai pash mande his, lan man ap o wast, un anan man an o foro Damaskus.
Koi his i patslo mursh. Kowa kharas Anania. Job rikras pes ap kowa, hoi an o Moseskre lila tardo hi. Kowa his an-diklo pash i tsele biboldende, kai kote djiwan.
Kowa was pash mande un penas: "Miro phraal Saulo, tu dikess pale." Un ap jek kopo dikom me pale.
Palle penas lo ap mande: "Ko Dewel mare dadendar rodas tut win, te djiness tu, hoi job kamella, un te dikess tu koles, kai hi kek tchilatchepen an leste, un shuness, hoi job penella.
Tu hunte rakress lestar glan i tsele menshende un peness, hoi tu dikal un shunal.
Un kanna ste pre! De leskro lab an-gole! Un muk tut an o pani te thowell, un tiri doosh tele te thowell!"
"Har me pale an o foro Jerusalem wom, un an o Debleskro baro kheer o Debles an-mangom, was o Debleskro Ducho soreles ap mande.
Un me dikom o Jesuses, un job rakras ap mande: Dja jaake sik har djala dran o foro Jerusalem. Kal menshe kate patsenn gar, hoi tu pral mande peneh.
Me penom: Rai, jon djinenna, kai me kolen, kai ap tute patsan, an o stilepen witsrom, un me mukom len an i biboldengre kangria i tchupnijaha te dell.
Me homs bachtelo, har maran le o Stefanes, koles, kai tutar rakras. Me homs pashal tardo, har maran le les. Un kolla, kai maran les, ap kolengre koola dom jak.
O rai Jesus penas ap mande: Dja dran o foro Jerusalem win! Me bitchrau tut an i wawar themma pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi.
Har kol tsele menshe o Pauleskre laba shunan, dan le lauter gole: "Anenn les krik un denn les mulo!"
Jon dan bari gole, tsardan pengre koola i choljatar pendar tele un witsran tchik an o bolepen.
Koi penas ko baro lurdo, te anenn le o Paules an o lurdengro kheer, un te denn le les dawa i tchupnijaha, te penell job, hoske kol bibolde jaake chojemen ap leste hi.

Har jon les pandan, te denn le les i tchupnijaha, penas o Paulo ap ko baro lurdeste, kai kote pashal tardo hi: "Nai denn tumer jekes i tchupnijaha, kai hi i Remari, un was gomme gar glan i tchatchepangre anlo?"
Ko baro lurdo djas pash peskro pralstuneste, un penas ap leste: "Hoi kameh te krell? Kau mursh hi i Remari."
Koi djas ko pralstuno pash o Pauleste, un putchas lestar: "Pen mange: Hal tu i Remari?" Penas lo: "Awa!"
Koi penas ko pralstuno: "Me dom bud lowe, te wap i Remari." Penas o Paulo: "Me wom jaake boldo."
Un kolla, kai kaman les dawa te dell, djan penge sik. Un ko pralstuno daras, har shunas lo, kai hi o Paulo i Remari, un te mukas lo i Remares te pandell.

O wawar diwes kamas o pralstuno lurdo win te hatsell, hawi doosh kol bibolde ap o Pauleste pre anan. Un job las les dran o stilepen win, un penas, te wenn kol bare rashaja un kol tsele pralstune bibolde khetne. Un job anas o Paules glan lende.
O Paulo dikas ap kol pralstune biboldende, un penas: "Tumer mursha, mire phrala, o tselo djipen budrom o Debleske, un man hi i djudjo dji."
Ko baro rashai Anania penas ap kolende, kai trul leste tardo hi, te denn le o Paules ap o mui.

Koi penas o Paulo ap leste: "O Dewel mu te dell tut! Tu rakreh i menshenge pal o mui. Tu hal kate beshdo, te rakress o tchatchepen pral mande win pal o biboldengro tchatchepen. Un tu mukeh man dawa te dell. Kowa hi gar pal o biboldengro tchatchepen."
Kolla, kai koi pashal tardo his, penan ap o Pauleste: "Tu praasseh o Debleskro baro rashajes."
O Paulo penas: "Mire phrala, me djinom gar, kai job ko baro rashai hi. Me djinau, kai an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: Te praassess gar o pralstunes tumare menshendar!"

Har o Paulo haiwas, kai i paash kol murshendar Saddukarja his, un i wawar paash Farisarja, das job ap kolende gole: "Tumer mursha, mire phrala, miro dad his i Farisari un me hom i Farisari. Me patsau, kai o Dewel i mulen djides krella. Dran kowa hom kanna glan tumende tardo, te rakrenn tumer i phagi pral mande win."
Har job kowa penas, was i baro tchingepen mashkral kol Saddukarja un kol Farisarja. Un jon rakran buder gar jek tchipjaha.
Kol Saddukarja patsenn gar, kai o Dewel i mulen djides krella. Un jon patsenn witar gar, te dell bolepangre un wawar, kai nai wenn gar diklo. I Farisarja patsenn kowa lauter.

Halauter dan bari gole, un kol tchatchepangre, kai ninna Farisarja his, stan pre un tchingran, un penan: "Mer hatsah kek tchilatchepen ap leste. Te rakras i bolepaskro ap leste, hoi krah mer palle? Te rakras i mulo ap leste, hoi krah mer palle?"
Ko tchingepen was jaake baro, te trashas ko pralstuno lurdo, te tsardans jon nai o Paules an kotja. Dran kowa das job peskre lurden gole, te anenn le les pale an o lurdengro kheer.
An koi rati mukas pes o rai Jesus glan o Pauleste te dikell, un penas ap leste: "Ma traash, Paulo! Jaake har tu mandar an o foro Jerusalem rakral, jaake hunte rakress mandar ninna an o foro Rom."
Taissarlake wan budeder har star-deesh bibolde khetne, un dan pen sowel, te chan le un te pijenn le tchi jaake raha, bis te jon o Paules maran.
Kolla djan pash kol bare rashajende un pash kol biboldengre phureder, un penan lenge: "Mer dam men sowel, kai chah un pijah tchi, bis te maram o Paules.

Bitchrenn jekes pash ko pralstuno lurdeste, un penenn leske an o lab kol tsele pralstune biboldendar, te anell lo o Paules pale kate pash tumende. Penenn ap o pralstuno lurdeste, te kamenn tumer budeder pral o Pauleste win te hatsell. Un ap o drom kate marah les.
Har o Pauleskri phenjakro tchawo shunas, kai kamenn jon o Paules te marell, djas lo an o lurdengro kheer, un penas kowa o Pauleske.
O Paulo das i baro lurdes pash peste gole, un penas: "Aan ko tarno murshes pash ko pralstuneste! Job kamell leske tchomone te penell."

O baro lurdo las les, un anas les pash ko pralstuneste, un penas leske: "Ko Paulo, kai stildo hi, das man pash peste gole, un mangas mandar, te anap kal tarno murshes pash tute. Kowa kamell tuke tchomone te penell."
Koi las les ko pralstuno ap o wast, anas les ap i rig, un putchas lestar: "Hoi kameh tu mange te penell?"
Job penas: "Kol bibolde kran win, te mangenn le tutar, te aness o Paules pale glan kol pralstune biboldende, te nai hatsans le feteder win, hoi job kras.

Tu patsess len gar. Budeder har star-deesh mursha lurenn ap leste ap o drom. Kolla dan pen sowel, te chan le tchi, te pijenn le tchi, bis te maran le les. Jon hi koi khatedo te nai marenn le les jaake sik, har tu mukeh les win te anell."
Koi penas ko pralstuno ap leste: "Phuke kekeske, kai penal mange kawa!" Palle mukas lo o tarno murshes te djal.

O pralstuno lurdo das dui bare lurden pash peste gole, un penas lenge: "Lenn dui-sheel lurden tumentsa, te djan tumer enjenge an i rat an o foro Cesarea. Lenn ninna efta-deesh lurden tumentsa, kai ap i graja klissenna, un dui-sheel wawar lurden.
Anenn graja o Pauleske, beshenn les ap jek grai, un anenn les pash o themeskro rajeste Felix! Denn jak ap leste ap o drom!"
O pralstuno tchinas ninna i liil, koi his dre tardo:
"Me, o Klaudio Lisias, sharau tut, ko themeskro rajes Felix, un penau tuke: Latcho diwes!
Kau murshes tapran i bibolde, un kaman les te marell. Koi wom me mire lurdentsa, un lom les lendar krik. Me shunom, kai job i Remari hi.
Me kamom te djinell, hawi doosh jon ap leste pre anenn. Jaake anom les glan lengre pralstune tchatchepangre.
Me hatsom win, te haiwell lo i biboldengro tchatchepen wawartchandes har jon. Kowa hi leskri doosh. Me hatsom tchi, te nai marams les, witar kek doosh, te nai tchiwams les an o stilepen.
Har me shunom, kai kamenn le ko murshes tchorchanes te marell, bitchrom les sik pash tute. Me penom ninna kolenge, kai anan i doosh ap leste pre, te penenn jon tuke, hawi doosh jon ap leste hatsan."
I lurde lan o Paules, har lenge penlo was, un anan les rati an o foro Antipatris.
O wawar diwes djan kol lurde, kai nashenna, pale an o foro Jerusalem. Kol wawar klissan o Pauleha dureder.
Har wan jon an o foro Cesarea, dan le o Felixes ko liil. Un o Paules anan le ninna glan leste.
O Felix draweras ko liil, un putchas o Paulestar dran hawo them job hi. Un har job shunas, kai o Paulo dran o them Cilicia hi, penas job ap leste:
"Jon te hi kate, kai anan i doosh ap tute pre, palle kamau te shunell, hoi tu peneh." Un job tchiwas les stildo an o Herodeskro kheer.

Pal pantch diwessa was ko baro rashai Anania an o foro Cesarea. Khetne leha wan i biboldengre phureder un ko rakepaskro Tertulo. Jon djan pash o themeskro rajeste, o Felix, te penenn le leske, hoske jon kaman o Paules i phagi te dell.

Har jon o Paules pash pende gole dan, rakras o Tertulo, te sikrell lo hawi doosh o Paulo ap peste anas: "Mer sharah tut, maro latcho un baro rajes Felix! An tiro goswepen kral tu, kai nai djiwah mer bachteles tumentsa. Un tu kral menge ninna bud latcho koowa.
Doleske parkrah men mer pash tute hako tsiro, kai hal jaake latcho ap mende.
Me kamau tut gar jaake raha pre te rikrell. Mangau tutar, te less i tikno tsiro, te shuness an tiro baro latchepen ap mande, hoi me kanna kamau tuke te penell.

Mer djinah, kai kau mursh tchilatcho hi, un kai job tchingepen krella mashkral kol tsele biboldende, kai ap i tseli phub djiwenna. Job hi i pralstuno rakepaskro kolendar, kai patsenna ap o Jesus dran Nazaret.
Job kamas o Debleskro baro kheer praassedo te krell. Koi pashal tapram les.
Har kaman les i phagi te dell pal maro tchatchepen, was ko pralstuno lurdo, o Lisias, un tsardas les sorjaha dran mare wasta.
Tu te shuneh, hoi job penella, palle haiweh tu, kai kowa tchatcho hi, hoi mer pral leste penam."
Ninna i wawar bibolde rakran jaake, un penan, kai kowa lauter jaake hi, har o Tertulo penas.

Kanna sikras o Felix o wasteha ap o Pauleste, te rakrell job. Un o Paulo penas: "Me djinau, kai hal tu, o Felix, bud bersha o tchatchepaskro rai an kau them. Doleske hi man kek traash, te penap tuke, har lauter was.
Hi gar budeder har deesh-te-dui diwessa, kai wom an o foro Jerusalem, te mangap o Debles an. I wawar nai penenn tuke, kai kowa tchatcho hi.
Kek dikas, kai tchingroms man jekeha an o Debleskro baro kheer. Witar gar krom i tchingepen mashkral i menshende, gar an i biboldengre kangria, witar gar an kau foro.
Jon nai sikrenn tut witar gar, kai kowa tchatcho hi, hoi jon pral mande penan.

Kawa penau tuke: Hi tchatcho, kai me djau ap ko newo drom, hoi hi kolenge i chocheno drom. Ap kau newo drom mangau me ko Debles an, koles ninna mire phure an-mangan. Un me patsau halauter, hoi o Mose un o Debleskre rakepangre an pengre lila tchinan.
Me patsau ninna har jon, kai kolla, kai meran, pale djido wenna: kol latche un kol tchilatche.
Doleske krau lauter te djiwap jaake, te well man hako tsiro i djudjo dji glan o Debleste un glan i menshende.
Bud bersha homs an i wawar themma. Kanna wom pale an o foro Jerusalem, te anap mire menshenge lowe, hoi wawar dan. Ninna wom, te chatchrap fichen o Debleske an o Debleskro baro kheer.
Har homs an o Debleskro baro kheer un thowom man pal o biboldengro tchatchepen, his gar bud menshe pash mande, witar kek, kai his chojedo un diwjo.
Kote dikan man bibolde, kai wan dran o them Asia. Kolla hunte wans kanna kate glan tute, te penenn le tuke, hoi me krom, te nai anans le doosh ap mande.
Tu putcheh nai ninna kal murshendar kate, hawi doosh jon ap mande hatsan, har me glan kol pralstune biboldende tardo homs.

Jek koowa nai anans le ap mande pre. Kowa hi ko lab, hoi me glan lende gole dom: Me patsau, kai o Dewel i mulen djides krella. Doleske hom kate glan tumende tardo, te rakrenn tumer i phagi pral mande win."
O Felix, kai bud djinas ko newo dromestar, tchiwas o tselo koowa ap o wawar diwes, un penas: "Te well ko pralstuno lurdo Lisias pash mende, palle penau me, hoi me krau o Pauleha."

Un job mukas o Paules pale an o stilepen te anell, un penas ap ko baro lurdeste, te krell job o Pauleske o djipen gar phares, un te well nai hakeno leskre malendar pash leste, te anell lo leske chapaske.

Diwessa koi pre was o Felix peskri romjaha Drusilla. Koja his i biboldetsa. Un o Felix mukas o Paules glan leste te well. Un o Felix un leskri romni kaman lestar pral o patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste te shunell.

Un o Paulo penas lenge, te hunte rikrenn le pen ap o Debleskro tchatchepen, te krenn le kek wi-ladjedo koowa, un te well ko tsiro, kai hakeno glan o Debleste tardo hunte well. Un o Felix las traash, un penas ap o Pauleste: "Kau kopo nai djah tu. Un te hi man tsiro, mukau tut pale gole te dell."
Job patsas, te dell les o Paulo lowe, te mukell les lo dran o stilepen win. Doleske mukas job les bud kope glan peste te well, un rakras leha.

Har dui bersha trujal his, was o Festo Porcio an o foro Cesarea, un kras kanna koi budi, hoi o Felix glan leste kras. O Felix kamas tchomone te krell, hoi his mishto an i biboldengre jaka. Doleske mukas lo o Paules an o stilepen.
Pal triin diwessa djas o Festo dran o foro Cesarea an o foro Jerusalem.
Kote wan kol bare rashaja un kol pralstune bibolde pash leste, un anan doosh ap o Pauleste pre.

Un jon mangan o Festestar soreles, te krell lo lenge i latchepen, te mukell lo o Paules an o foro Jerusalem te anell. Mank pende kran i bibolde win, te marenn le o Paules ap o drom an o foro Jerusalem.
Koi penas o Festo ap lende: "O Paulo atchell an o foro Cesarea stildo! Me djau an i tikno tsiro kote pale.
Kolla, kai len pash tumende tchomone penepaske hi, kolla wenn mantsa, un nai penenn mange kote, hawi doosh job ap peste anas."

O Festo atchas ochta diwessa an o foro Jerusalem. Pal kowa djas lo pale an o foro Cesarea. O wawar diwes beshas pes lo ap ko beshepaskro, kai o tchatchepaskro rai beshdo hi, un mukas o Paules glan peste te well.

Har o Paulo glan leste was, his trul leste kol tsele bibolde tardo, kai dran o foro Jerusalem wan. Kolla anan bud tchilatcho koowa glan, hoi job krals. Un kek nai penas, kai o Paulo kowa tchatchepaha kras.

O Paulo mukas kowa gar ap peste, un penas: "Me krom tchi, hoi pal o biboldengro tchatchepen tchilatcho hi. Un me krom gar o Debleskro baro kheer praassedo. Un me penom kek tchilatcho koowa pral o baro rajeste an o foro Rom."
O Festo kamas tchomone te krell, hoi hi mishto an i biboldengre jaka. Doleske penas lo ap o Pauleste: "Kameh tu, te anap tut an o foro Jerusalem, te penap kote i phagi pral tute win?"

O Paulo penas ap leste: "Me hom kate glan o tchatchepaskro tardo, koles o baro rai an o foro Rom an peskri budi tchiwas. Kote hunte well o tchatchepen pral mande win kerdo. I biboldenge krom kek tchilatcho koowa. Un kowa djineh tu mishto!

Te kroms me i tchilatcho koowa, kai hunte marans le man, mangoms tutar gar, te atchap djido. Te krom me kowa gar, hoi jon pral mande penan, palle nai tchiwenn tumer man gar an lengre wasta. Me kamau, te well miro koowa glan o baro rajeste an o foro Rom."
Koi rakras o Festo kolentsa, kolen leha khetne penepaske hi. Palle penas lo ap o Pauleste: "Pash o baro rajeste an o foro Rom kameh tu te djal. Palle dja pash leste!"
Pal budeder diwessa, was o biboldengro baro rai Agrippa peskri phenjaha Bernike an o foro Cesarea, te djan le pash o Festeste.
Un jon atchan budeder diwessa koi. Un o Festo rakras leha pral o Pauleste un leskro koowa, un penas ap leste: "O Felix, kai kras koi budi glan mande, mukas mange i murshes kate an o stilepen.
Har me an o foro Jerusalem homs, wan kol bare rashaja un kol biboldengre phureder glan mande, un mangan mandar, te dap les i phagi.
Kolenge penom: Jaake krah mer Remarja kowa gar. Mer dah kekes i phagi, kai dikas kolenge gar an o mui, kai anan doosh ap leste pre. Job hunte penas nai, har job ko koowa dikella.
Un har jon kate khetne wan, nashrom kek tsiro. O wawar diwes mukom kau murshes glan mande te anell, te shunap les.
Har kol bibolde penan, hawi doosh jon ap leste hatsan, his kowa kek sawo tchilatcho koowa, har me patsom.
Jon tchingran pen pral o biboldengro patsepen un pral i mursheste, kai kharas Jesus, un kai meras. Un kolestar penas o Paulo, te hi lo djido.
Me prindjrau man an ko koowa gar wi. Doleske putchom me o Paulestar, te kamell lo an o foro Jerusalem te djal, te well kote o tchatchepen pral leste wi-rakedo.

Kowa kamas lo gar. Job kamas, te anap les glan o baro rajeste an o foro Rom, te lell lo kolestar peskro tchatchepen. Jaake raha kamas lo stildo te atchell. Koi penom me, te rikrenn le les kate stildo jaake raha, bis te bitchroms nai les pash o baro rajeste an o foro Rom."
O Agrippa penas ap o Festo: "Me kamau ko murshes ninna te shunell." Koi penas o Festo ap leste: "Taissar shuneh les."

O wawar diwes was o Agrippa un i Bernike railes an-rido an o shukar baro kheer, kai i pralstune khetne wenna. Un kol pralstune lurde, un wawar foreskre pralstune wan lentsa kote khetne. Un o Festo mukas o Paules gole te dell.
Un o Festo penas: "Baro rai Agrippa un tumer lauter, kai han mentsa kate: Dikenn kau murshes! I tsele bibolde an o foro Jerusalem un an kau foro wan pash mande un dan gole: Mare les!
Me hatsom tchi ap leste, te nai marap les. Job kokres kamell pash o baro rajeste an o foro Rom te djal. Un jaake penom, te well lo kote anlo.

Me hunte tchinap i liil o baro rajeske an o foro Rom, te penap leske, hawi doosh kau mursh ap peste anas. Un me djinau gar, hoi te tchinap. Doleske anom les kate glan tumende lauterende, un glan tute, baro rai Agrippa, te shunap, hoi job tuke penella. Jaake djinau me, hoi hunte tchinap.
Kowa wals dinlepen, te bitchroms i stildes pash o baro rajeste an o foro Rom, un nai penau leske gar, hawo tchilatcho koowa job kras."
O Agrippa penas ap o Pauleste: "Tu nai rakreh kanna tuke." Koi hadas o Paulo o wast, un penas:
Baro rai Agrippa, me hom bachtelo, te nai penap tuke kau diwes lauter, hoi i bibolde ap mande pre anan.

Me djinau, kai tu prindjreh o biboldengro patsepen. Tu djineh, har i bibolde djiwenna. Un tu djineh ninna pral hawo koowa jon pen tchingrenna. Doleske mangau tutar: De man ko tsiro, te penap tuke halauter!
I tsele bibolde prindjrenn miro djipen, un har me i tarno tchawo homs, un har me mashkral mire menshende an o foro Jerusalem djiwom.
Jaake raha prindjrenn le man. Un jon te kamenn, palle nai penenn le tuke, kai homs i Farisari, un rikrom man o tselo djijeha ap i phurengre laba un ap o Moseskre laba.
Un me patsau ap kowa, hoi o Dewel mare phurenge penas. Doleske hom me kate glan o tchatchepaskro tardo.

Mare menshe, kai wenna i deesh-te-dui Israeleskre tchawendar, kolla mangenn o Debles diwes un rati, te well kowa, hoi job mare phurenge penas. Baro Agrippa, me patsau, kai kowa was, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job. Doleske kamenn man i bibolde i phagi te dell.
Hoske patsenn tumer gar, te krell o Dewel i mulen djides?
His i tsiro, kai kamom me ninna miri tseli sorjaha kau newo patsepen ap o Jesuseste dran Nazaret paash te krell.
Kowa krom me an o foro Jerusalem, un anom bud patslen an o stilepen. Kol bare rashaja dan an miro wast, te krap kowa. Un har kaman le len te marell, penom me ninna: Awa, krenn kowa!

An i tsele biboldengre kangria mukom me kol patslen dawa te dell i tchupnijaha, un kamom, te denn le pengro patsepen pre. Me homs jaake chojedo ap lende, te lom len ninna an forja an wawar themma palla.
Jaake bitchran man i bare rashaja an o foro Damaskus, un dan man lila mantsa, te nai taprau i patslen kote.
Me homs ap o drom, baro Agrippa, har dikom mashkral o diwes i bari momeli dran o bolepen. Un koja was trul mande un trul kolende, kai pash mande his. Koi momeli his sorleder har o kham.
Un mer lauter peram ap i phub. Un me shunom jekes, kai penas ap hebretikes ap mande: Saulo, Saulo, hoske leh tu man palla? Tiro kurepen hi tchitcheske. Me hom sorleder har tu.
Me penom: Rai, koon hal tu? O rai penas: Me hom o Jesus, koles tu palla leh.
Ste pre un atch ap tire pire tardo! Me mukom man tutar te dikell, te wess miro budepaskro, un te peness i menshenge, hoi tu dikal. Un lauter, hoi me tut sikrau, hunte peness.
Me bitchrau tut pash i biboldende un pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, un me dau garda ap tute.

Tu kress lenge i jaka pre, te wenn jon dran o tamlepen pash i momeli, te less len dran o bengeskro wast win, un te aness len pash o Debleste. Te patsenn le ap mande, palle lell o Dewel lengri doosh lendar krik. Un jon wenn o Debleskre tchawe, un djiwenn leha an o bolepen khetne lauterentsa, kai Debleskre tchawe hi.
Doleske krom kowa, baro Agrippa, hoi ko rakepen dran o bolepen mange penas.

Me djom an o foro Damaskus, un palle an ko foro Jerusalem. Un i tsiro koi pre djom an ko them Judea. Un pal kowa djom pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, un penom lauterenge, te mukenn le pengro tchilatcho drom, un te djan le ap o Debleskro drom, un te djiwenn le jaake, kai i wawar dikenna, kai jon pengro phuro djipen mukan.
Doleske tapran man kol bibolde an o Debleskro baro kheer, un kaman man te marell.
O Dewel his hako diwes pash mande. Un kanna hom kate tardo, un penau barenge un tiknenge, hoi o Dewel kras. Me penau tchi wawares, har kol Debleskre rakepangre un o Mose glan i raha tsiro penan.

Kolla penan: Ko baro rai, koles o Dewel bitchrella, hunte lell bud duka ap peste, un hunte well maredo. Un job hi o ersto mensho, koles o Dewel i mulendar djido kras. Un job sikrell i biboldende un kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, i bari momeli, hoi anell len dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win."
Har o Paulo kowa rakras, te sikrell lo, kai hi kek doosh ap leste, das o Festo gole: "Paulo, tu hal dinelo! Tu hal jaake gosewo, te wal narwelo."
O Paulo penas: "Railo Festo, hom gar narwelo! Hoi me rakrau, hi tchatcho un kek dinlepen.
O baro rai Agrippa djinell kowa lauter. Man hi kek traash, te rakrap leha pral halauter. Me djinau, job shunas kowa lauter. Kowa, hoi koi djas, atchas gar khatedo.
Patseh tu, baro rai Agrippa, hoi kol Debleskre rakepangre penan? Me djinau, kai tu kolen patseh.
Koi penas o Agrippa ap o Pauleste: "Rakreh tu kate ap mande, te djap me ninna ap o Jesuseskro drom, un kawa an sawo tikno tsiro?"
O Paulo penas ap leste: "Tikno tsiro, raha tsiro, - me mangau o Debles, te wess tu un kol tsele wawar, kai man kate shunan, patslo har me patslo hom. Hoi gar kamau, hi, te wess pandlo, har me."
Un o baro rai Agrippa peskri phenjaha Bernike, un o themeskro rai Festo, un kolla, kai pash lende beshdo his, stan pre.
Har jon penge djan, rakran jon tel pende: "Kau mursh kras tchi, te hunte well lo maredo, witar tchi, te well lo stildo."

O Agrippa penas ap o Festo: "Kau murshes mukams mer nai dran o stilepen win te djal, te penals job gar, te kamell lo glan o baro rajeste an o foro Rom te djal, te rakrell kowa o tchatchepen pral leste win."

Har kran le win, te ulerah mer ap o panjeskro ulepaskro an o them Italia, dan le o Paules un wawar stilden an i wasta i baro lurdestar. Leskro lab his Julio. Kowa his i pralstuno pral kol lurdende, kai o baro rajeskre lurde kharedo wenna.

Mer djam ap o panjeskro ulepaskro. Kowa was dran o foro Adramition un uleras an kol forja, kai pash o pani an o them Asia tchiddo hi. Mentsa was ninna i mursh dran o foro Tessalonika. Leskro lab his Aristarcho.
O wawar diwes wam an o foro Sidon. O Julio his kamlo ap o Pauleste, un mukas les pash peskre malende te djal, te wenn kolla leske koi.
Har mer dureder uleram, phurdas i baro ducho pral o baro pani. Doleske uleram mer ap koi rig ko themestar Ciprus, kai ko baro ducho gar jaake soreles phurdas.
I themma Cilicia un Pamfilia mukam mer tchatches tchiddo, un wam an ko them Licia an o foro Mira.
Koi hatsas ko baro lurdo i panjeskro ulepaskro, hoi was dran o foro Alexandria, un kamas an o them Italia te ulerell. Un mer djam ap ko panjeskro ulepaskro.

Bud diwessa wam gar sik dureder, un maram men tele, te was pash ko foro Knidus. O baro ducho phurdas jaake soreles pral o pani, te nashte djam gar, kai kamam. Jaake uleram pash o them Kreta, un dureder trul ko kotar them, kai kharella Salmone.
Menge his phares, te was dureder. Palle wam ap i wawar rig, kai kharella Latchi platsa. Koi pashal hi o foro Lasea tchiddo.
Har kote wam, nashram bud tsiro. O wend his glan o wudar, un mer lam daar, te uleras dureder. Doleske penas o Paulo ap lende:

"Murshale, te ulerah mer ap o pani dureder, dikau me, te wella bud bibacht ap mende. Gar kokres o panjeskro ulepaskro nai djal paash un kowa, hoi koi pre hi, djal nashedo. Ninna bud mendar nai tassen."
Ko baro lurdo shunas budeder ap koleste, kai ulerell ko panjeskro ulepaskro un ap koleste, kai hi o rai pral ko panjeskro ulepaskro, har ap o Pauleste.

Kote, kai maro panjeskro ulepaskro tchiddo his, his gar mishto, te atchas mer pral o wend. Doleske kaman i budester mursha dureder te ulerell, te wenn jon glan o wend an o foro Fenix. Kawa his o feteder foro an o them Kreta, kai jon nai atchans pral o wend.
Har i latcho baro ducho phurdas, patsan le, kai ko tsiro was, te nai uleras dureder. Un jon uleran, jaake nesh har djala, langs ko them Kreta.
Pal i tikno tsiro phurdas o baro ducho soreles dran i wawar rig. Ko ducho kharella Eurakulon.
Kau sorelo ducho tapras o panjeskro ulepaskro, un mer nai rikram les buder gar, jaake sorelo his lo. Koi mukam mer o panjeskro ulepaskro jaake te djal, har ko baro ducho kowa kamas.
Mer uleram dureder ap o pani pash ko them Kauda, un maram men tele, te nashras gar o tikno bero.

Jon tsardan les pre, un palle pandan le shelle trul o tselo panjeskro ulepaskro, te djal lo gar paash. Halauter daran, te nai ulerals o panjeskro ulepaskro ap i barra, kai glan o them Libia tel o pani hi. Doleske witsran le ko sasterno shello an o pani tele, hoi rikrell o panjeskro ulepaskro pale, te djal lo gar jaake sik. Un jon mukan o panjeskro ulepaskro jaake te djal har o baro ducho les pral o pani phurdas.
Ko baro ducho phurdas jaake soreles, kai witsran le o wawar diwes bud koowa an o pani, hoi kaman le an wawar forja te anell.
O triinto diwes witsran jon kowa an o pani, hoi ap o panjeskro ulepaskro his, te nai ulerell lo.
Bud diwessa nai dikam o kham un i bolepangre momlia gar, jaake sorelo phurdas o baro ducho pral o baro pani, un das sorelo brishin. Koi patsam mer, kai nashrah mer maro djipen.
Har chan le i raha tsiro tchi, djas o Paulo mashkral lende, un penas: "Murshale, tumer hunte shunans ap mande, un atchans an o them Kreta. Jaake wals i tseli bibacht gar pral mende.
Kanna penau me tumenge: Denn gar pre! Kek tumendar merella. Kokres kau panjeskro ulepaskro djal paash.
Kai rat was i bolepaskro pash mande. Koles bitchras miro Dewel, koleske budrau.
Kowa penas ap mande: Ma traash, Paulo! Tu hunte wess glan o baro rajeste an o foro Rom anlo. O Dewel shunas tut: Kek ap kau panjeskro ulepaskro merella.
Doleske murshale, ma trashenn! Me patsau o Debles, lauter wella jaake, har job mange penas.
O baro ducho phurdell men ap i tikno kotar them an o baro pani."
Mer hams deesh-te-star diwessa ap o baro pani Adria. An koja rat patsan kol budepangre ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, te dikenn le i kotar them.

Koi witsran jon i saster an o pani, hoi ap i shello pandlo hi, te dikenn le, har dur kowa tele djala. Kowa djas star-deesh metarja dur tele. I kotar dureder kran jon kowa pale, un dikan, kowa djas triin-deesh metarja dur tele.

Koi trashan le, te ulerenn le ap i bare barra, hoi tel o pani his. Un jon witsran star sasterne shelle, pal o panjeskro ulepaskro an o pani, te well lo gar krik tsardedo. Un o panjeskro ulepaskro atchas kote tchiddo, bis te was o wawar diwes.

Kol budepangre ap o panjeskro ulepaskro kaman penge tchorchanes mendar te djal, un penan chochenes ap i wawarenge: "Mer mukas ko tikno bero an o pani, te nai witsras ninna glan o panjeskro ulepaskro sasterne shelle an o pani."
O Paulo penas ap ko baro lurdeste un ap kol lurdende: "Te atchenn kolla gar ap o panjeskro ulepaskro, ham mer lauter nashedo."
Koi dan i lurde kol shelle tele, un mukan ko tikno bero an o pani te perell.
Un har buder gar jaake tamlo his, penas o Paulo ap lauterende, te chan jon tchomone: "Tumer maran tumen deesh-te-star diwessa tele," penas job, "un an ko tselo tsiro chan tumer tchi.
Doleske mangau me tumen: Chan kanna tchomone! Kowa hunte krenn, te atchenn djido. Kek tumendar nashrell i bal ap o shero."
Un har job kowa penas, las job o maro, parkras pes pash o Debleste glan lauterende, phagas o maro, un chas.
Har jon kowa dikan, tapran le newi soor un chan ninna.
Mer hams lauter khetne ap o panjeskro ulepaskro dui-sheel-efta-deesh-te-shob (276) mursha.
Un har jon lauter tchalo his, witsran le o tselo djob an o pani, te well o panjeskro ulepaskro buder gar jaake pharo.

Har diwes was, dikan kol budepangre ap o panjeskro ulepaskro i kotar them an o pani. Kowa prindjran jon gar. Kote dikan le i kotar phub, kai o panjeskro ulepaskro tchiddo nai wals. Un jon penan penge: Te djal kowa, djah kote ap o them.

Un jon dan kol sasterne shelle tele, un witsran len an o pani, un pandan kol shelle pre, hoi rikran ko kasht, hoi o ulepaskro ap i tchatchi rig anell. Palle tsardan le ko baro thann pre, te phurdell o baro ducho koi dre un anell len ap o them.
Ap jek kopo uleran le ap i barra, hoi tel o pani hi. Un o panjeskro ulepaskro his glanstunes soreles ap i barra beshdo. Un o sorelo pani kras o palstuno kotar paash.
Koi kaman i lurde i stilden te marell, te nashell kek peske.
Ko baro lurdo kamas gar, te well o Paulo mulo dino. Job djas koi mashkral un penas, te stenn kanna kolla an o pani, kai nai rikrenn pen pral o pani, te wenn le wergal ap o them.
un te tchiwenn pen i tsele wawar ap i kashta an o pani, te nai wenn le halauter wergal ap o them. Jaake wam mer lauter djido ap o them.
Har mer halauter ap o them wam, shunam, kai ko kotar them an o pani Malta kharella.
Kolla, kai kote djiwan, lan men kamles pre. Brishin das, un his shila. Doleske kran le i jag, un lan men pash pende.
Har o Paulo kashta khetne las, un ap i jag witsras, was i sap dran i kashta win, un dandras leske an o wast.
Har kol menshe ko themestar ko sap ap leskro wast dikan, penan le: "Kawa hi jek, kai maras jekes. Dran o baro pani was job djido win, un kanna lell lo peskri phagi."
O Paulo witsras koi sap an i jag, un leske djas tchi.
Koi patsan le, te well leskri mussi pesso, un te perell lo mules trujal. Har jon i raha tsiro ap leste dikan, un haiwan, kai leske tchi djas, rakran le wawartchandes un penan: "Kawa hi i dewel."
Gar dur djiwas o themeskro pralstuno. Les his kote bud them. Job kharas Publio. Kowa las men pash peste triin diwessa kamles pre.

Leskro dades his i djungelo nasslepen an o per. Leskro tselo shero his tato, un job his an o tchiben tchiddo. O Paulo djas pash leste, mangas o Debles leske, tchiwas peskre wasta ap leste, un kras les sasto.
Koi wan ninna kol wawar nassele dran ko them pash o Pauleste, un mukan pen sasto te krell.

Un jon sharan men bud. Triin tchon atcham kote. Un har mer dureder uleram, dan le men chapen un pipen peha. Mer uleram dureder ap i panjeskro ulepaskro, hoi atchas pral o wend ap ko them, hoi kharella Malta. Kau panjeskro ulepaskro was dran o foro Alexandria un kharas Dioskuro.
Mer wam an o foro Sirakus, un atcham kote triin diwessa.
Palle uleram dureder an o foro Region. Un har o wawar diwes i latcho baro ducho phurdas, wam an dui diwessa an o foro Puteoli.
Kote hatsam patslen. Kolla mangan mendar, te atchas efta diwessa pash lende. Palle djam dureder an o foro Rom.

Un har kol patsle an o foro Rom shunan, te wah mer, djan le dran o foro win, te tapran le men mashkral i forja Forum Appii un Tres-Tabernae. Har o Paulo len dikas, parkras lo pes pash o Debleste, un las newi soor.
Har wam an o foro Rom dre, nai las peske o Paulo i isema an i kertchima. Un i lurdo das garda ap leste.

Pal triin diwessa das o Paulo kol pralstune bibolden pash peste gole. Har jon lauter khetne his, penas o Paulo ap lende: "Tumer mursha, mire phrala, mare menshenge krom tchi, hoi tchilatcho his. Witar gar rakrom djungeles pral kowa, hoi mare phure menge penan. Un ninna te krom lenge kek tchilatchepen, tchiwan le man stildo an o foro Jerusalem, un dan man an i Remarjengre wasta.
Kol Remarja shunan, hoi penom, un hatsan tchi ap mande, kai nai marans le man. Jon kaman man te djal mukell.
Kol bibolde kaman kowa gar. Koi hunte penom me, te kamap pash o baro rajeste an o foro Rom te djal, te rakrell job o tchatchepen pral mande win. Me wom gar kate, te anap doosh ap mire menshende pre.

Kawa kamom tumenge te penell. Doleske dom tumen gole, te wenn pash mande. Mer bibolde dikah ap ko diwes, kai o Dewel koles bitchrella, kai anell o Israel dran i bibacht win. Ap koleste patsau me. Doleske hom kanna pandlo kol shellentsa."
Penan i bibolde ap leste: "Kek dran o them Judea tchinas menge i liil pral tute. Kek lendar was pash mende, kai penas djungelo koowa pral tute.
Mer kamah tutar te shunell, hoi tu peneh menge. Mer djinah, te rakrenn le djungeles pral kau newo drom, hoi tu sikreh."

Un i bibolde un o Paulo kran penge i diwes win, kai wenn le pale khetne an koi kertchima. Har ko diwes was, wan bud pash leste. Un o Paulo penas lenge, te was ko tsiro, kai o Dewel i menshen pash peste gole della, te lell lo len dran o tchilatchepen win. Un job sikras lende, hoi o Mose un o Debleskre rakepangre pral o Jesuseste tchinan. Un pral kowa rakras o Paulo lentsa o tselo diwes.
Bud lendar patsan leske un penan: "Leskro hi tchatcho." Wawar lendar patsan leske gar.

Jon tchingran pral kowa, hoi o Paulo penas, un djan penge, har o Paulo kau lab penas: "Me dikau, kai kowa tchatcho hi, hoi o Debleskro Ducho ap o Jesaja penas, te penell job kowa mare phurenge. O Debleskro Ducho penas:
Dja pash kol menshende un pen lenge: I kandentsa shunenn tumer, un haiwenn tchi. I jakentsa dikenn tumer, un dikenn tchi.

Kol menshengre djia hi har bar, un lengre kandentsa shunenn jon tchi. Lengre jaka hi pandlo, te nai dikenn jon tchi. Jon kamenn pengre jakentsa tchi te dikell, un pengre kandentsa tchi te shunell. Un pengre djijeha kamenn le tchi te haiwell. Jon kamenn gar pengro phuro djipen te mukell, un ap miro drom te djal. Doleske nai lau len gar dran o tchilatchepen win."
Un o Paulo penas: "Djinenn! Kanna well o Debleskro latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, un jon shunenna."
Har job kowa penas, djan i bibolde penge, un tchingran pen pral kowa, hoi o Paulo lenge penas.
O Paulo atchas dui bersha an peskri isema, hoi job peskre lowentsa plaissras, un las lauteren pash peste pre, kai wan pash leste.

Job rakras lentsa pral o Debleste un pral o djipen, hoi o Debleskre menshe khetne o Debleha djiwenna. Un job penas lenge lauter, hoi maro rai, o Jesus Kristo lenge kras. Un les his kek traash, te penell lo kowa. Un kek was, kai penas, te nai krell lo kowa gar.
Me, o Paulo, o budepaskro o Jesus Kristestar, tchinau kau liil. Job das man gole, te wap leskro bitchepaskro, un rodas man win, te sikrap i menshende leskro drom.
Pral kau drom tchinan glan raha tsiro o Debleskre rakepangre an pengre lila, te well i tsiro, kai krell o Dewel i drom i menshenge, te nai wenn le pash leste.

Ko drom hi o Debleskro tchawo. Kowa was i mensho un was o Davideskre menshendar. Job was ninna o Deblestar. O Dewel sikras i bari sorjaha, te hi lo leskro tchawo, har kras lo les i mulendar djido. Kowa hi o Jesus Kristo, maro rai.
Job das man koi Debleskri budi te djap pash i menshende an i tsele themma. Job bitchras man, te penap lenge, te patsenn le ap leste un shunenn ap leste.
Mank kol menshende han tumer ninna an o foro Rom. O Jesus Kristo das tumen gole, te wenn pash leste.

Ap tumende halauterende tchinau kau liil. O Dewel kamell tumen o djijestar, un das tumen gole, te djiwenn leha khetne. Mu well tumen latchepen un bacht an o dji! Kowa dell tumen o Dewel, maro dad un maro rai, o Jesus Kristo!

Glan hake wawar laba, hoi kamau tumenge te tchinap, penau tumenge: Hako tsiro, kai rakrau o Jesus Kristeha, parkrau man pash miro Debleste tumenge lauterenge. Ap i tseli phub rakrenn le pral tumaro patsepen.
Miro Dewel, koleske budrau o tselo djijeha un penau i menshenge leskro tchawestar, job djinella, me penau o tchatchepen: Me mukau gar tele, te mangap les tumenge.
Un hako tsiro mangau lestar, te krell lo mange i drom, te nai wap pash tumende.
O tselo djijeha kamau tumen te dikell, te nai sikrap tumende, hoi o Debleskro Ducho mande sikras, te krap tumaro patsepen soreles.
Te dikah o patsepen, hoi an o wawareste hi, wah mer khetne soreles an maro patsepen.

Mire phrala, tumer hunte djinenn, bud kope kamom pash tumende te well, un nai wom gar. Me kamoms ninna an tumaro foro menshen ap o Jesuseskro drom te anell, jaake har me kowa ninna krom an i wawar themma.
Me hunte sikrap kau drom i tsele menshende: kolen an o grichtikro them, ninna kolen an i wawar themma, kolen, kai siklo hi un kolen, kai gar siklo hi.
Doleske kamoms ninna pash tumende an o foro Rom i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar te penell.

Me ladjau gar glan i menshende, te penap lenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar. An kau lab hi o Debleskri soor. Un o Debleskri soor lell kolen dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win, kai ap ko lab patsenna, - i bibolden un kolen, kai kek bibolde hi.

An kau lab sikrell o Dewel, koon glan leste tchatcho hi: Kolla, kai patsenna un denn gar pre. Lengro tchatchepen well dran o patsepen. Jaake hi kowa tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: Kowa, kai patsella, kowa well tchatcho glan o Debleste un djiwella.
O Debleskri choli well dran o bolepen tele ap kol tsele menshende, kai kamenn lestar tchi te djinell un krenn o tchilatchepen. Un lengro tchilatchepen rikrell o tchatchepen tele.
Kowa, hoi jon haiwans nai o Deblestar, kowa sikras len o Dewel.

Ninna te dikenn le o Debles gar, nai dikenn le leskri bari soor an halauter, hoi job kras. Kowa well diklo jaake raha har i phub tardo hi. Jon nai djinenn, te hi i Dewel koi, un nai penenn gar: "Mer djinam kowa gar."
Ninna te djinan le o Deblestar, sharan le les gar un parkran pen gar pash leste. Na-a, jon djan pal kowa, hoi an lengro shero hi un tchi moldo hi. Un lengre djia haiwan buder gar, hoi mishto hi.
Kal menshe penenn pendar, te hi le gosewo. Dran kowa peran le an o dinlepen.
O baro Debles, kai hako tsiro atchella, sharenn le gar. Na-a, jon mangenn kol murshen un djuwjen an, kai merenna. Ninna wawar koowa, har i tchirkle, i star-herjengre fiche un i sapa mangenn le an.
Doleske mukas o baro Dewel len an pengro djungelo koowa te perell, hoi an lengre djia hi, te krenn le wi-ladjedo koowa jek o wawareha.

Jon tchiwan o Debleskro tchatchepen ap i rig, un patsan ap kowa, hoi chochepen hi, un sharan i menshen un i fichen, un mangan len an, har te wans le o Dewel. Un o baro Dewel, kai lauter kras un djipen das, koles sharan le gar un mangan les gar an. Un job hi kowa, kai moldo hi, te well lo sharedo hako tsiro. Amen
Doleske mukas o Dewel len an wi-ladjedo koowa te perell. Lengre djuwja kamenn djuwjen un kek murshen.
Emligo hi i mursha tato un chatchenn ap i murshende. Jaake krenn le pengro djipen paash un lenn pengri phagi ap pende kokres.
Jon kaman tchi o Deblestar te djinell. Doleske mukas o Dewel len te perell, te djiwenn le pal pengro tchilatcho shero, un krenna, hoi gar mishto hi.
Jon hi pherdo tchilatchepen, djunglepen, ninna bok pal i lowe. Jon hi tchilatcho un silwerenn, tchingrenn, chochenn, marenn, un dukrenn i wawaren. Jon rakrenn djungeles pral i wawarende,
un rakrenn chochepen pral lende. Jon praassenn o Debles un i menshen. Jon hadenn pen pre un hi sharedo. Jon rodenn, har te krenn le o tchilatchepen. Jon shunenn gar ap pengro dadeste un pengri date.
Jon kamenn tchi te haiwell. Jon rikrenn gar pengro lab. Len hi kek kamlepen, witar kek dji i wawarenge.
Jon djinenna, o Dewel dell kolen i phagi, kai jaake djiwenna. Un koi phagi hi o merepen. Ninna te djinenn le kowa, krenn le ko tchilatcho koowa, un sharenn kolen, kai kowa ninna krenna.

Tu te peneh kolendar, har baro hi lengri doosh, nai peneh gar tutar: "Man hi kek doosh ap mande." Ko tchilatchepen, hoi tu ap o wawareste dikeh, hi ninna an tute. Tu te sikreh ap o wawareskri doosh, rakreh tu o tchatchepen pral tute win.
Mer djinah, o Dewel djal pal o tchatchepen, te dell lo kolen i phagi, kai sawo tchilatcho koowa krenna.
Tu te sikreh ap i wawarende, kai sawo koowa krenna, un tu kreh kowa ninna, patseh tu tchatchepaha, tu nai nasheh o Debleskri choljatar krik?
Hi tuke o Debleskro baro latchepen tchi moldo? Les hi i baro dji un dell i menshen gar sik pre. Djineh tu gar o Debleskro latchepen, hoi kamell tut ap leskro drom te anell?

Un tu kameh gar pash leste te well. Tiro dji hi har i bar. Doleske well o Debleskri choli baro un bareder, hoi ap tute wella ap ko diwes, kai hi o Dewel o tchatchepaskro rai un rakrell o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende.
Ap ko diwes dell lo hakenes pal kowa, hoi job kras.

Kolen, kai mukan gar tele, te krenn le o latchepen, dell lo o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Jon hi kolla, kai tchiwan pengro dji koi pre, te dikell o Dewel kamles ap lende, un te lell lo len pash peste an leskro railepen, kai dell lo len o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
Ap kol wawarende well leskri choli. Lenge hi lo gar latches. Jon hi kolla, kai djiwan pal pengro shero un shunan gar ap o Debleskro tchatcho lab, un kran, hoi lengro tchilatcho dji lenge penas.
Bibacht un daar well ap i tsele menshende, kai o tchilatchepen kran, gar kokres ap i biboldende, na-a, ninna ap kolende, kai kek bibolde hi.
Railepen, tchatchepen un bacht dell o Dewel kolen, kai kran o latchepen, - gar kokres i bibolden, na-a, ninna kolen, kai kek bibolde hi.
O Dewel dikell gar ap jekeste, koon job hi.

Kolla, kai kran o tchilatchepen, djan nashedo, ninna te prindjran le gar o Moseskre laba, kai penenn, har jon hunte djiwenn. Un lauter, kai prindjran kol laba un kran o tchilatchepen, lenn ninna pengri phagi.
Glan o Debleste hi kolla tchatcho, kai krenna, hoi job kamella, un gar kolla, kai shunenn kol laba un krenn gar, hoi kol laba penenna.
Mank i menshende, kai prindjrenn gar o Moseskre laba, hi sawe, kai krenna, hoi o Dewel kamella, ninna te was kowa lende gar siklo. Lenge penell lengro dji, hoi latcho un tchatcho hi.

Jaake dikah, an lengre djia hi tchindlo, hoi o Dewel kamella. Te kran le o tchilatcho koowa, penell lenge lengro dji: Kowa his gar mishto, hoi kral. Te kran le latcho koowa, penell lenge lengro dji: Kowa his mishto, hoi kral.

Lauter kowa, hoi an o mensheskro dji hi, well diklo ap ko diwes, kai hi o Jesus Kristo o tchatchepaskro rai un rakrell o tchatchepen win pral i menshende. Jaake penell les o Debleskro lab, hoi me i menshenge penau.
Hoi krenn tumer, i bibolde? Tumer sharenn tumen un penenn: "Me hom i biboldo un prindjrau o Moseskre laba. O baro Dewel hi miro Dewel.
Me djinau, hoi job kamella, un dikau an o Moseskre laba, hoi latcho un tchatcho hi.
Me nai anau i korelen ap o Debleskro drom, ninna kolen, kai an i kali rat djana.
Me hom i sikepaskro kolenge, kai tchi djinenna un haiwenna. An o Moseskre laba hi man o tselo goswepen un tchatchepen."
Hoi te penap tumenge? Tumer sikrenn i wawarende o Debleskro drom. Un tumenge kokres penenn tumer gar: Djan ap o Debleskro drom! Tumer penenn i wawarenge: Ma tchorenn! Un tumer kokres tchorenn.
Tumer penenn: Ma choche tiri romjat i wawar djuwjaha! Un tumer krenn kowa. Tumer penenn: Kowa hi gar mishto, te mangenn wawar koowa an har o Debles, un tumer tchorenn ko koowa.
Tumer sharenn tumen un penenn: "Mer djinah, hoi o Moseskre laba penenna," un tumer krenn kowa gar. Doleske anenn tumer ladj ap o Debleste.
Jaake hi kowa tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: Dran tumende rakrenn i wawar menshe djungeles pral o Debleste.

Ninna te han bibolde un ap tumaro mass tchindlo, hunte rikrenn tumen ap kowa, hoi o Dewel an o Moseskre lila penas. Te krenn tumer, hoi kote tchindlo hi, pale hi tumenge bud moldo, te han bibolde. Te krenn kowa gar, han tumer glan o Debleste har jek, kai hi kek biboldo.
Jek, kai hi kek biboldo, te krell job kowa, hoi o Dewel kamella, palle dikell o Dewel jaake latches ap leste, har te wals lo i biboldo.

Un jaake well kowa, kai kek biboldo hi, i tchatchepaskro rai pral tumende, i biboldende. Job kras, hoi o Dewel kamella, un tumer kran gar, hoi o Dewel kamella, ninna te hi tumen kol tsele tchindle laba, hoi penenn, har te djiwenn, un han tchindlo ap tumaro mass.
I tchatcho biboldo hi gar kowa, kai hi tchindlo ap peskro mass.
Na-a! Kowa hi i tchatcho biboldo, koles o Debleskro Ducho i newo dji das. Kowa nai krenn tchindle laba gar. Sawo biboldo rodell gar, te well lo i menshendar sharedo. Job well o Deblestar sharedo.
Kanna putchau tumendar: Hi kowa i biboldenge bud moldo, te hi le win rodedo mank i wawar menshende un tchindlo ap pengro mass?
Awa, kowa hi lenge bud moldo. Jon lan o Debleskre laba an lengre wasta.
Ninna te djan le gar lauter ap o Debleskro drom, rikras o Dewel peskro lab, un tchiwas len gar ap i rig.

Na-a, kowa kras lo gar. O Dewel hi tchatcho. Hako mensho hi i chocheno. An i Debleskri gili hi tchindlo: Tu, mo Dewel, lauter, hoi rakreh, hi tchatcho. Kek nai well te penell, kai tire laba gar tchatcho hi.
Kanna putchau tumendar: Hi i menshen gar tchatcho, te penenn le: "Hi maro tchilatchepen baro, well o Debleskro latchepen bareder. Doleske hi o Debles gar tchatcho, te dell lo men i phagi."
Na-a, len hi gar tchatcho! O Dewel djal pal o tchatchepen. Te djals o Dewel gar pal o tchatchepen, nai rakrals lo gar o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende.
I menshe nai penans ninna: "Mer te chochah, palle well diklo, har baro o Debleskro tchatchepen hi. Un job well sharedo. Hoske dell lo men i phagi?

Kras tchilatcho koowa, te well latcho koowa dran koleste!" Hi menshe koi, kai rakrenn djungeles pral mende un penenn, mer penams i menshenge: "Kras tchilatcho koowa, te well latcho koowa dran koleste!" Kowa penah mer gar! Tchatchepaha, kolla, kai penenn kowa, lenn pengri phagi.
Hoi hi kanna? Hi i bibolde feteder glan o Debleste tardo har kolla, kai kek bibolde hi? Na-a, jaake har penom: I bibolde, har kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, halauter kran tchilatcho koowa.
An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Kek mensho hi tchatcho glan o Debleste, kek.
Kek mensho hi gosewo. Kek rodell o Debles.
Halauter mukan o tchatcho drom un molenn tchi. Kek krell, hoi mishto un latcho hi, kek.
Dran lengro mui well merepen. Ap lengri tchip hi chochepen. Lengro rakepen anell o merepen har i sapa, hoi dandrenna.
Jon hi pherdo koshepen un praassepen.
Jon hi sik, te marenn le.
Kote, kai jon djana, mukenn le bibacht un ropen pal pende.
Ko drom, kai i menshe pen gar tchingrenna, prindjrenn le gar.
O Deblestar darenn le gar. Lestar kamenn le tchi te djinell.

Mer djinah: Kowa, hoi an o Moseskre laba penlo hi, hi kolenge penlo, kai lan kol laba. Kolla hi i bibolde. Jaake nai penell kek mensho, witar kek biboldo: Man hi kek doosh. Kek mensho krell o tchatchepen. Doleske hi kek mensho tchatcho glan o Debleste.
Te kamell lo te krell, hoi o Dewel an o Moseskre laba penell, haiwell lo ninna, te nai krell lo kowa gar. Kol laba sikrenn les, te hi lo tchilatcho glan o Debleste.

Un kanna, ap kau tsiro, sikras men o Dewel, har krell lo i menshen tchatcho glan peste. Jon wenn gar tchatcho, te rikrenn le pen ap o Moseskre laba, kai penenna, har te djiwenn le. Na-a, o Dewel krell hakenes tchatcho glan peste, kai patsell ap o Jesus Kristeste. Jaake hi kowa an o Moseskre lila tchindlo. Ninna o Debleskre rakepangre penan kowa i menshenge glan i raha tsiro. Doleske hi i bibolde gar feteder har kolla, kai kek bibolde hi.
Lauter kran o tchilatchepen un wan pale-tchiddo glan o Debleste.
Un o Dewel krell len tchitcheske tchatcho un erligo dran leskro baro latchepen. O Jesus Kristo plaissras lenge peskro rateha.

O Dewel bitchras les, te merell lo ap o trushel kolenge, kai ap leste patsenna. Leskro rateha, hoi job ap o trushel ratas, thowas o Dewel mari doosh mendar krik. Jaake dikah, o Dewel hi latcho un tchatcho un lell i menshendar lengri doosh krik.

I raha tsiro rikras o Dewel peskri choli pale, un das len kek phagi. Kanna, ap kau tsiro meras o Jesus lenge, un las lengri phagi ap peste. Jaake sikrell o Dewel peskro tchatchepen. Job hi tchatcho. Ninna krell lo koles tchatcho, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsella.
Koon nai sharell pes kanna? Kowa, kai rikras pes ap kol laba, hoi penenna, har te djiwas? Na-a, les hi tchi, te sharell lo pes. Kowa hi tchatcho glan o Debleste, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsella.
Jaake djinah, o mensho well tchatcho glan o Debleste, te patsell lo ap o Jesus Kristeste, un gar, te djiwell lo pal kol laba, hoi penenn, har te djiwas.
O Dewel hi gar kokres i biboldengro Dewel. Na-a, job hi ninna o Dewel kolenge, kai kek bibolde hi.
Job hi ko jek Dewel. Kowa krell kolen tchatcho, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsenna: i bibolden har kolen, kai kek bibolde hi.
Witsrah mer kanna kol laba ap i rig, kai o Dewel penella, har te djiwas? Na-a, kanna, kai patsah, nai krah tchatchepaha, hoi o Dewel kamella.
Kowa hi jaake har pash maro phuro dadeste, o Abrahameste, kolestar i bibolde wenna. Har was lo tchatcho glan o Debleskre jaka?
Kras lo lauter, hoi mishto hi? Palle nai sharals pes lo glan i menshende, gar glan o Debleste.
Hoi hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab? Kote hi tardo: O Abraham patsas o Debles, un doleske tchiwas o Dewel les an o tchatchepen.
I mensho, kai marell pes tele, te well lo tchatcho, hi har i budepaskro, kai hunte budrella, te well lo plaissedo. Leskre lowe lell lo gar tchitcheske.
I mensho, kai patsell ap o Debleste, hunte marell pes gar tele, te well lo tchatcho. Leskro patsepen tchiwell les an o tchatchepen. Job patsell ap koleste, kai krell i tchilatchen tchatcho.
Jaake rakras o baro rai David i bacht pral kolende win, kolen o Dewel tchatcho kras, ninna te kran le gar lauter, hoi mishto hi.
O David penas: Bachtelo hi kolla, kolenge i doosh krik lino was, un kolengro tchilatchepen o Dewel bistras.
Bachtelo hi ko mensho, koleske o Dewel leskro tchilatchepen gar glan i jaka rikrella.

Koi bacht hi gar kolenge kokres, kai hi tchindlo ap pengro mass. Na-a. Koi bacht hi ninna kolenge, kai hi gar ap o mass tchindlo. Kowa hi jaake, har me tumenge penom: O Abraham patsas o Debles, un doleske tchiwas o Dewel les an o tchatchepen.

Putchau tumendar: Hawo tsiro tchiwas o Dewel les an o tchatchepen? Tchiwas lo les an o tchatchepen ap ko tsiro, kai job ap o mass tchindlo was? Na-a. Job tchiwas les an o tchatchepen, har job gomme gar ap o mass tchindlo his.

Tchindlo was o Abraham, te well diklo: Job hi tchatcho dran o patsepen, hoi glan kau tsiro an leste his. Doleske was lo kharedo: O dad lauterendar, kai patsenn ap o Debleste, ninna te hi le gar ap o mass tchindlo. Lengro patsepen tchiwell len an o tchatchepen.
Job hi ninna o dad kolendar, kai hi tchindlo ap o mass, te djiwenn le an o patsepen jaake, har o Abraham djiwas glan ko tsiro, kai job ap o mass tchindlo was.

Glan raha tsiro das o Dewel o Abrahames peskro lab, te lenn leskre tchawe i tseli phub. Ap ko tsiro penas o Dewel leske gar: Tu te kreh lauter, hoi tutar kamau, palle leh tu kowa lauter. Na-a. Job penas leske: Tu patsal ap mande, doleske hal tchatcho glan mande.
Te lans kolla i tseli phub, kai rikrenn pen ap o Moseskre laba, palle wals o patsepen tchi moldo. Un ko lab, hoi o Dewel o Abrahameske das, wals witar tchi moldo.

Te djinell jek gar, hoi o Dewel lestar kamella, un krell i tchilatcho koowa, nai djinell lo gar, kai kowa tchilatcho hi. Kolla, kai djinenn, hoi o Dewel lendar kamella un krenn kowa gar, pral kolende well o Debleskri choli. Jaake anenn o Moseskre laba, hoi menge penenna, hoi o Dewel mendar kamella, tchatchepaha o Debleskri choli pral i menshende.

Doleske krell o Dewel kolen tchatcho, kai ap leste patsenna. Leskro tchatchepen dell o Dewel tchitcheske lauterenge, kai ap leste patsenna. Jaake atchell ko lab, hoi job o Abrahameste das, lauterenge, kai wenna pal o Abrahameste, i biboldenge har kolenge, kai djiwenn dran o patsepen har o Abraham. Kowa hi o dad mendar lauterendar.

Jaake hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: Me krom tut o dad bud menshendar an bud themma. O Abraham dikas ap o Debleste un patsas, te nai krell o Dewel i mulen djido, un nai krell kowa, hoi gomme gar koi his.

O Dewel penas o Abrahameske: Tu leh i tchawes. Kolestar wenna bud bud menshe, jaake bud, te djiwenn le an bud themma. Ninna te dikas o Abraham tchi kolestar, hoi o Dewel leske penas, patsas lo o Debles.
Ap ko tsiro his o Abraham sheel bersha phuro. Leskri romni Sara his ninna bud phuro. Ninna te dikas o Abraham, har phuro jon his, atchas lo sorelo an o patsepen.
Job rikras pes ap kowa, hoi o Dewel leske penas, un job patsas gar i paash djijestar. Jaake was leskro patsepen gomme sorleder. Un job sharas o Debles.
Peskro tselo djijeha djinas lo, o Dewel nai krell kowa, hoi job penas.
Doleske tchiwas leskro patsepen les an o tchatchepen glan o Debleste.
Kowa was gar leske kokres an i liil tchindlo.
Kowa was ninna menge tchindlo, kai patsah ap o Debleste, kai kras o Jesuses, maro rajes, i mulendar djido. Mer te djinas: Maro patsepen tchiwell men ninna an o tchatchepen.
O Jesus Kristo hi kowa, koles o Dewel bitchras, te merell lo menge, un te lell lo mari doosh mendar krik. Un o Dewel kras les i mulendar djido, te nai krell lo men tchatcho glan leste.
Maro patsepen ap o rajeste, o Jesus Kristeste, kras men tchatcho glan o Debleste. Un o Debleskri choli well buder gar ap mende.

O Jesus Kristo anas men ap o Debleskro drom un kras menge o wudar pre, te djiwas o Debleha khetne. Jaake latcho his lo menge. Un mer djinah: O diwes wella, kai djiwah leha khetne an leskro railepen. Pral kowa ham bachtelo.
Kowa hi gar lauter. Ninna ham bachtelo pral i duka, hoi hunte las mer ap mende. Mer djinah, kol duka krenna, te dikas ap o Debleste.
Te dikah ap o Debleste, jaake atchah ap leskro drom, un jaake well maro patsepen sorleder.
Un kau patsepen mukell jekes gar nashedo te djal. O Dewel kamell men o tselo djijeha. Kowa sikras men o Debleskro Ducho, hoi o Dewel an mende das.
O Jesus Kristo meras menge, har djiwam gomme dur o Deblestar. Men kokres his kek soor, te was pash leste.
Kek merell i tchatcho mensheske. Nai well, te merell jek i latcho mensheske.
O Dewel sikras, har baro leskro kamlepen menge hi, har meras o Jesus Kristo menge, har mer gomme tchilatche hams.
Leskro rateha kras lo men tchatcho glan o Debleste. Doleske nai djinah soreles: O Debleskri choli well buder gar ap mende. O Jesus Kristo kras lauter mishto.

Dikenn! Ap ko tsiro, kai kamam o Deblestar tchi te djinell, meras o Debleskro tchawo menge. Leskro merepen anas men pash o Debleste, te djiwas pale leha khetne. Un kanna ham o Debleskre mala. Un leskro tchawo djiwella, te djas mer gar nashedo.
Un kowa hi gar lauter. Mer ham jaake bachtelo, te was o Dewel maro Dewel. Maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, anas men leha khetne.

Hi jaake: O tchilatchepen was ap i phub, har jek mensho, o Adam, tchomone kras, hoi o Dewel gar kamas. O tchilatchepen anas o merepen ap i phub. Jaake was o merepen pash i tsele menshende. Lauter kran o tchilatchepen, un lauter hunte merenn.
Glan raha tsiro, har shunan i menshe gomme gar, har te djiwenn le, anan le kek doosh ap pende, te kran le o tchilatchepen.

Ninna te dikas o Dewel gar ap lengro tchilatchepen, hunte meran le lauter: o Adam un kolla, kai pal leste wan, bis te was o Mose. Ninna kolla hunte meran, kai kran gar o emligo tchilatcho koowa har o Adam. Jaake har o Adam i bibacht anas, jaake hunte was i wawar, kai lauter mishto krella.

Ko wawar mensho hi o Jesus Kristo. O Adam kras o tchilatchepen, un bud menshe hunte meran. O Jesus Kristo anas o Debleskro latchepen, un las bud menshen win dran o merepen. Jaake dikah, o Debleskro latchepen hi bud bareder har o mensheskro tchilatchepen.

Kowa, hoi o Jesus Kristo menge kras, hi gar har kowa, hoi o Adam ap mende anas. Ko jek mensho kras o tchilatchepen. Un doleske hunte meras lo, ninna lauter, kai pal leste wan. O Jesus Kristo sikras men o Debleskro latchepen un las mari bud doosh mendar, te krell lo men tchatcho glan o Debleste.

Jaake har ko jek mursh, o Adam, i tchilatcho koowa kras, un o merepen anas ap i tsele menshende, jaake anas ninna jek mensho, o Jesus Kristo, o Debleskro djipen. Ko djipen len kolla, kolen o Dewel dran peskro baro latchepen tchatcho kras glan leste.

Jaake dikah: O Adam kras i tchilatcho koowa, un doleske wan le lauter pale-tchiddo glan o Debleste un hunte meran. O Jesus Kristo kras i tchatcho koowa, un doleske wenn le lauter tchatcho glan o Debleste un lenn o Debleskro djipen.
O Adam shunas gar ap o Debleste. Doleske tchiwas o Dewel lauteren pale. O Jesus Kristo shunas ap o Debleste, un doleske kras o Dewel kol bud menshen tchatcho un erligo glan peste.

O Dewel kamas i menshende te sikrell, har baro lengri doosh hi. Doleske das lo len peskre laba. Kolla penan lenge, hoi latcho un hoi tchilatcho hi. Jaake dikan le, har bud tchilatcho koowa jon kran. Un kote, kai o tchilatchepen baro was, kote was o Debleskro latchepen gomme bareder.

O menshengro tchilatchepen his sorelo, un anas o merepen. O Debleskro latchepen hi sorleder. Kanna, kai ham tchatcho glan leste, dell lo men o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Kowa kras maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, menge.
Hoi te kras kanna? Djiwas dureder an o tchilatchepen, te well o Debleskro latchepen bareder? Na-a!
Kowa kras mer gar! Mer ham har mulo. Un o tchilatchepen hi buder gar o rai pral mende.
Djinenn tumer gar, har wam ap o Jesus Kristeskro lab an o pani thodo, meram leha?
Kote hi maro phuro djipen leha paskedo, te djiwas mer kanna i newo djipen, jaake har o Jesus Kristo i mulendar pre stas, har o Dewel, maro dad, peskri bari sorjaha les djido kras.
Mer te meram leha khetne, stah mer ninna i mulendar pre, jaake har job i mulendar pre stas.
Mer djinah, maro phuro djipen was leha ap o trushel dino un meras, te well o tchilatchepen buder gar o rai pral mende.
Kowa, kai meras, hi buder gar pandlo ap o tchilatchepen.
Mer patsah: Te meram mer o Jesus Kristeha, palle djiwah mer ninna leha.
Ninna djinah, job was i mulendar djido un merell buder gar. O merepen hi buder kek soor pral leste.
Jek kopo meras lo i tchilatchenge. Un kanna djiwell lo o Debleske.
Doleske dikenn jaake ap tumende, har te wans mulo, un te nai krans buder gar o tchilatchepen. Djiwenn o Jesus Kristeha khetne o Debleske!
Mukenn gar o tchilatchepen o rai pral tumende te well! Tumer djinenn, kai well o diwes, kai hunte merenn. Ma krenn ko djungelo koowa, hoi an tumaro dji hi!

Denn jak, te krenn tchi tumare wastentsa, herjentsa, jakentsa un mujentsa, hoi krell o tchilatchepen ap kai phub sorleder! Djiwenn o tselo djijeha o Debleske, har sawe, kai his mulo, un wan pale djido. Krenn kowa lauter, hoi krell o latchepen sorleder!
Tumer hunte rikrenn tumen buder gar ap o Moseskre laba. O Dewel kras tumen tchatcho glan leste dran peskro latchepen. Doleske nai well o tchilatchepen buder gar o rai pral tumende.
Kanna djiwah mer buder gar pal o Moseskre laba. Kanna djiwah dran o Debleskro latchepen. Kras mer kanna o tchilatchepen? Na-a, kowa kras mer gar!

Tumer djinenna: Koon tumaro rai hi, ap koleste hunte shunenn. Koleskre budepangre han tumer. Te shunenn tumer ap o tchilatchepen, palle hi o tchilatchepen o rai pral tumende, un tumer merenna. Te shunenn tumer ap o Debleste, palle krell lo tumen tchatcho.
Me sharau o Debles. Tumer hans pandlo ap o tchilatchepen, un kanna shunenn tumer o tselo djijeha ap o latcho lab, hoi mer tumenge o Jesus Kristestar penam.
Kanna han buder gar pandlo ap o tchilatchepen. Kanna han tardo an o tchatchepen, un krenn kowa, hoi o Dewel kamella.

Me penom tumenge kowa jaake, te haiwenn man nai. Har hans gomme gar patslo, kran tumer djungelo un tchilatcho koowa. Un o tchilatchepen an tumende was baro un bareder. Kanna hi kowa wawartchandes. Doleske krenn kowa, hoi latcho un tchatcho hi! Jaake djiwenn tumer o Debleskro djipen.
Ap ko tsiro, har his o tchilatchepen tumaro rai, hans gar tardo an o tchatchepen.
Kowa, hoi kran, his tchi moldo. Tumer kran sawo koowa, koleske kai diwes ladjenn tumen. Sawo koowa anell an o merepen dre.
Kanna han tumer buder gar pandlo ap o tchilatchepen. Tumer wan o Debleskre budepangre. Un tumer djiwenn o Debleskro djipen. Un kowa anell tumen an o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
Kowa, kai krell o tchilatchepen, lell peskri phagi. Koi phagi hi o merepen. Kowa, kai patsell ap o Jesus Kristeste, maro rajeste, koles dell o Dewel tchitcheske o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
Mire phrala, tumer prindjrenn o Moseskre laba. Tumer djinenn, i mensho hi pandlo ap kol laba jaake raha, har job djiwella.
Kol laba penenn menge: I romni hi pandlo ap peskro romeste jaake raha har job djiwella. Te hi lakro rom mulo, palle hi li buder gar pandlo ap peskro romeste.

Te djal li pash i wawar mursheste jaake raha har hi lakro rom djido, palle chochas li peskro romes. Te hi lakro rom mulo, hi li buder gar pandlo ap leste un chochell les gar, te romedinerell li i wawares.

Jaake hi kowa ninna tumentsa, mire phrala. Har o Jesus Kristo meras, meran tumer leha. O Moseskre laba hi buder gar o rai pral tumende. Kol labenge han mulo. Kanna hi tumen i wawar rai. Kowa hi o Jesus Kristo, koles o Dewel i mulendar djido kras. Kanna nai djiwah jaake, te well o Dewel sharedo!

Har djiwam maro phuro djipen, was o tchilatchepen soreles an mende. O Moseskre laba, hoi menge penan, hoi te kras mer gar, kol laba kran, te was o bok pal o tchilatchepen bares an mende. Jaake kram mer kowa, hoi an o merepen anella.

Kanna hi o Moseskre laba, kai pandan men, buder gar o rai pral mende. Len hi buder kek soor pral mende. Mer djah kanna ap o newo drom un djiwah jaake, har o Debleskro Ducho men sikras, un gar jaake har an kol Moseskre lila tchindlo hi.

Hoi sikras men kowa? Hi o Moseskre laba tchilatcho? Na-a. Kowa hi gar jaake. Te wans kol laba gar koi, djinams gar, hoi tchilatcho hi. Kol laba penenn menge: Tiro dji te djal gar pal kowa, hoi o wawareske hi! Te djinoms kol laba gar, djinoms gar, kai kowa tchilatcho hi.
Har shunom kol laba, was i bok pal ko koowa, hoi tchilatcho hi, baro an mande. Jaake kran kol laba o tchilatchepen an mande djido. Te djinoms kol laba gar, wals o tchilatchepen an mande mulo.
His i tsiro, kai prindjrom o Moseskre laba gar un djiwom, har me kamom. Palle, har shunom, hoi o Dewel mandar kamella, haiwom, kowa, hoi krom, his tchilatcho,
un me djinom: Me hunte merap! Un kol laba, hoi o Dewel das, te djiwap, kolla anan man an o merepen.
Me nai rikrom kol laba gar. Jaake hatsas o tchilatchepen i drom te chochell lo man, un te anell lo man an o merepen.
Mer djinah: O Moseskre laba wenna o Deblestar. Lauter, hoi job mendar kamella, well lestar, un hi tchatcho un latcho.

Kanna putchau tumendar: Anell man kowa, hoi latcho hi, an o merepen? Na-a. Kowa hi gar jaake. O tchilatchepen, hoi krom, kowa anell man an o merepen. Kol laba, hoi penenn menge, hoi o Dewel mendar kamella, kol laba sikran man, hoi tchilatcho hi, te dikap me, har djungelo o tchilatchepen hi.
Mer djinah, o Moseskre laba wenna o Deblestar. Ninna djinah, mer ham menshe un pandlo ap o tchilatchepen.
Me haiwau gar, hoske krau tchilatcho koowa. Kowa, hoi kamau te krell, kowa krau gar. Kowa, hoi me gar kamau te krell, kowa krau.
Me te krau gar kowa, hoi kamau, palle penau: Awa, o Moseskre laba hi tchatcho un latcho.
Doleske hom me kowa gar, kai o tchilatchepen krella. Na-a. Kowa hi o tchilatchepen, hoi an mande djiwella.
Me djinau, kek latchepen djiwella an mande - an miro mass. Me kamau o latchepen te krell, un man hi kek soor, te krap les.
Ko latchepen, hoi me kamau, kowa krau me gar. Ko tchilatchepen, hoi me kamau gar, kowa krau.
Te krau me kowa, hoi me gar kamau, palle hom gar me, kai krau kowa. Na-a. Kowa hi o tchilatchepen, hoi djiwell an mande.
Jaake dikau: An miro djipen hi kowa jaake: Ninna te kamau o latchepen te krell, krau me o tchilatchepen.
Miro dji kamell te krell, hoi o Dewel penella.
Un me nai krau les gar. Me dikau, an mande hi i wawar o rai. Kowa pandell man un mukell man gar te krap, hoi kamau. Kowa hi o tchilatchepen, hoi an mande djiwella.
Me bibachtelo! Koon nai lell man dran miro phuro djipen win, hoi anell man an o merepen?
O Dewel well sharedo! Maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, kras kowa! Pral miro dji hi o Dewel o rai, un me hom leske koi. Un pral miro mass hi o tchilatchepen o rai.
Jaake djal kek nashedo, kai djiwell o Jesus Kristeha khetne.
Un o Debleskro Ducho, koles o Jesus Kristo men das, hi kanna o rai pral mende. Un kowa dell men o djipen un lell men win dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen.

O Moseskre laba nai dan ko djipen gar. I menshe nai kran kowa gar, hoi an o Moseskre lila tchindlo hi. Ko tchilatchepen, hoi an lende his, mukas len gar te krell, hoi o Dewel lendar kamas. Doleske penas o Dewel: "O tchilatchepen hunte merell." Un job bitchras peskro tchawes, te well lo i mensho har mer, kai tchilatcho ham. Job las maro tchilatchepen ap peste un meras. Un jaake meras o tchilatchepen leha un nashras peskri soor pral mende.
Kowa kras o Dewel, te was mer jaake tchatcho glan leste, har job mendar kamella. Job kras kowa menge, kai djiwah kanna o newo djipen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho men das, un buder gar maro phuro djipen.
Kolla, kai djiwenn pengro phuro djipen, djiwenn jaake, har jon kamenna. Kolla, kai djiwenn o newo djipen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho len das, kolla kamenn kowa te krell, hoi o Debleskro Ducho kamella.
Kolla, kai djiwenn jaake, har jon kamenna, kolla merenna. Kolla, kai krenna, hoi o Debleskro Ducho lenge penella, kolla len o Debleskro djipen un leskri bacht.
Koon kamell jaake te djiwell, har job kamella, kowa kamell gar o Debles. Job shunell gar ap kowa, hoi o Dewel penella. Job nai krell les witar gar.
Kolla, kai pengro phuro djipen djiwenna, pral kolende nai well o Dewel gar bachtelo.

Tumer djiwenn buder gar tumaro phuro djipen. Na-a. Te hi o Debleskro Ducho an tumende, djiwenn tumer ko newo djipen, hoi job tumende das. Kones hi gar o Jesus Kristeskro Ducho an leste, kowa hi gar i Debleskro tchawo.

Te djiwell o Jesus Kristo an tumende, han tumer tchatcho glan o Debleste, un o Debleskro Ducho dell tumen o djipen, ninna te well ko diwes, kai hunte merell tumaro mass. O tchilatchepen an i menshende kras, te hunte merell o mass.
O Dewel kras o Jesus Kristes i mulendar djido. Te djiwell leskro Ducho an tumende, palle krell lo tumen ninna djido. O Debleskro Ducho, kai an tumende hi, krell kowa.
Mire phrala, kanna hunte djiwas buder gar maro phuro djipen.
Te djiwenn tumer tumaro phuro djipen, merenn tumer. Te djiwenn tumer jaake, har o Debleskro Ducho kowa kamella, un penenn na-a ap o tchilatchepen, hoi an tumaro shero hi, palle djiwenna.
Kolla, kai shunenn ap o Debleskro Ducho, kolla hi o Debleskre tchawe.
O Dewel das tumen gar peskro Ducho, te darenn lestar, har i budepangre darenna pengro rajestar. Na-a, tumer han o Debleskre tchawe. Un o Debleskro Ducho krell, te penah mer: "Tata" ap o Debleste.
Un o Debleskro Ducho penell menge an o dji, te ham mer o Debleskre tchawe.

Gar kokres leskre tchawe ham mer. Mer lah ninna lestar ko tselo latchepen, hoi les menge hi an o bolepen. Kowa lah khetne o Jesus Kristeha. Te wenn duka ap mende, jaake har wan duka ap o Jesus Kristo, palle krell men o Dewel ninna baro un railo leha.
Me patsau soreles, kol duka, hoi an kau tsiro ap mende wenna, hi bud bud tikneder har ko baro railepen, hoi o Dewel men della an ko tsiro, hoi wella.
I phub un lauter, hoi o Dewel kras, dikell peskro tselo djijeha ap ko tsiro, kai o Dewel halauteren sikrella, koon leskre tchawe hi.
I phub un halauter, hoi o Dewel kras, hunte djal paash, ninna te kamenn le kowa gar. O Dewel kamas kowa jaake. Jaake kras lo ninna, te dikenn le ap ko tsiro,
kai hunte merenn le buder gar un wenn jaake newo un railo har o Debleskre tchawe newo un railo wenna.
Mer djinah, i phub un lauter, hoi o Dewel kras, rowell un dell gole i dukatar bis kau diwes.

Un gar i phub kokres, na-a, men ninna hi duka un dikah o tselo djijeha ap ko tsiro, kai wah tchatchepaha Debleskre tchawe un merah buder gar. Ninna te hi men kanna o Debleskro Ducho an mende, dikah ap ko tsiro, kai merah buder gar.
Ninna te djinah, o Debleskro djipen hi maro, dikah mer ap ko tsiro, kai lah les tchatchepaha. Men te wals ko djipen, palle hunte dikams buder gar ap ko tsiro, kai mer lah les.
Maro dji nashell pal kowa, hoi glan mende hi, un hoi dikah nai gomme gar. Doleske wah mer gar khino an mare djia bis te lah les.

Ninna well o Debleskro Ducho ap mari rig, kai ham gar sorelo. Te kamah mer te rakras o Debleha un djinah gar, hoi te mangas lestar, palle rakrell o Debleskro Ducho menge i labentsa, hoi kek nai rakrell win.
Un o Dewel, kai djinell, hoi an o menshengro dji hi, djinell ninna, hoi o Debleskro Ducho lestar menge mangella.
Mer djinah, halauter well mishto kolenge, kai o Debles kamenna. Glan raha tsiro his o Debles an peskro dji, te dell lo menshen gole, te djiwenn le leha khetne.
Har rodas lo len win, his an leskro dji, te wenn le jaake har peskro tchawo. Kowa te well o phureder mank bud phralende un phenjende.

Kolen job win rodas, kolen das lo ninna gole, te djiwenn le leha khetne. Un kolen, kai job gole das, kolen tchiwas lo an o tchatchepen. Un kolen, kai job an o tchatchepen tchiwas, kolen kras lo ninna erligo, te djiwenn le leha khetne an leskro railepen.
Hoi te penas mer budeder? O Dewel hi ap mari rig! Koon nai krell menge i tchilatchepen? Kek!
O Dewel rikras peskro tchawes gar pash peste. Job das les menge lauterenge an o merepen. Patsenn tumer gar, te dell lo men khetne leha kowa lauter, hoi job menge penas?
Kek nai anell i doosh ap kolende, kolen o Dewel peske win rodas. O Dewel tchiwas len an o tchatchepen.
Kek nai penell ap mende: Tu djal nashedo! O Jesus Kristo meras menge. Un kowa hi gar lauter. O Dewel kras les ninna i mulendar djido. Un job hi ap leskri tchatchi rig, un rakrell menge mishto.

Tchi nai lell mendar o Jesus Kristeskro kamlepen krik! Kek duka, kek daar. Ninna te lenn le men palla, ninna te hi men tchi te chal un tchi an ripaske, ninna te kamenn le men tchilatchepen te krell, ninna te marenn le men, ko tselo koowa nai lell gar o Jesus Kristeskro kamlepen mendar krik.
An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Mer ham tiro. Doleske kamenn le men hako tsiro te marell. Jon dikenn ap mende, har te wams bakre, hoi wenn maredo.
O Jesus Kristo, kai kamell men o tselo djijestar, job krell men soreles an lauter kowa hoi ap mende wella.
Me djinau soreles: Tchi nai lell o Debleskro kamlepen mendar krik: kek merepen, kek djipen, kek bolepangre, witar kek tchilatche sorja. Tchi, hoi ap mende wella, kanna un an ko tsiro, hoi wella,

tchi, hoi pral an o bolepen hi un tchi, hoi tele an i phub hi, un kek wawar, hoi djiwella, nai krell, te kamell men o Dewel buder gar. Kowa, hoi maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, menge kras, sikrell men, har baro o Debleskro kamlepen hi.
Glan o Jesus Kristeste penau tumenge: Kowa, hoi tumenge kanna penau, hi o tchatchepen un kek chochepen. Ninna o Debleskro Ducho an miro dji penell mange kowa.

Job djinell, miro dji rowella un dukella hako tsireske mire phralenge, kai bibolde hi har me. Mange wals tchatcho, te woms me mire phralenge praassedo o Deblestar, te wenn jon pash leste, ninna te woms me palle buder gar o Jesus Kristeha khetne.

Jon hi Israelitarja. Kolen rodas o Dewel win, te wenn le leskre tchawe. Lende sikras lo peskro railepen. Lentsa kras lo win, te well lo lengro Dewel un jon peskre menshe. Lende das lo peskre laba, hoi penenna, har te djiwenn le, ninna kol laba, hoi sikrenna, har te budrenn le leske an peskro kheer. Lentsa rakras lo pral o djipen un o brawlepen, hoi kamell lo len te dell an ko tsiro, hoi wella.
Lengre phure hi o Abraham, o Isaak un o Jakob. Ninna o Jesus Kristo was i Israelitari, har was lo boldo. Sharas o Debles pral kowa lauter hako tsireske. Amen!
Kanna penau kate gar, te hi o Debleskro lab buder tchi moldo, hoi job ap i Israelitarja penas. Na-a! Hoi kamau te penell, hi kowa: I tsele Israelitarja hi gar lauter o Debleskre menshe.
Witar gar wenn halauter, kai wan pal o Abrahameste, leskre tchawe kharedo. O Dewel penas ap o Abrahameste: Kolla, kai o Isaakestar boldo wenna, kolla hi tire tchawe.
Jaake dikah, kolla, kai wenna o Abrahamestar, hi gar lauter leskre tchawe. Na-a, kolla hi leskre tchawe, kolendar o Dewel penas, te hi le kowa,
jaake har das o Dewel o Abrahameste peskro lab un penas: Kau tsiro an o wawar bersh wau pale. Palle las i Sara i tchawes.
Kowa hi gar kate kokres jaake. Na-a, ninna pash i Rebekka hi kowa jaake. I Rebekka las dui tchawen, kolengro dad his maro phuro dad, o Isaak.

Har i tchawe gomme gar boldo his, penas o Dewel lake: I tsiro wella, kai budrell o phureder tchawo o tarneder tchaweske. Har job kowa penas, kras kek lendar i latcho koowa, witar kek tchilatcho koowa. Jaake dikah, lauter wella, har o Dewel kamella. Te rodell lo jekes win, krell lo kowa jaake, har job kamella. Job dikell gar ap kowa, hoi jek kras.
Jaake hi kowa an o Debleskro lab tchindlo: Me kamom o Jakobes. O Esaues kamom gar.
Hoi te penas mer kanna: Djal o Dewel gar pal o tchatchepen? Na-a! Kowa hi gar jaake.
Job penas ap o Moseste: Me hom latches koleske, ap koleste me kamau te wap latches. Un man hi i baro dji koleske, ap koleste man i baro dji hi.
Jaake nai krell kek mensho dran peste, te well o Dewel latcho ap leste, ninna te kamell lo kowa. Na-a, lauter well dran o Debleskro kamlepen.
An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo, har mukas o Dewel ap o baro rajeste pral o them Egiptia te penell: Me krom tut bares, te sikrap miri soor ap tute, jaake te well miro lab ap i tseli phub prindjedo.
Lauter krell lo jaake, har job kamella. Ap koneste job latches kamell te well, ap koleste hi lo latcho. Koneske job i dji dran bar kamell te dell, koleske dell lo i dji dran bar.
Kanna putcheh tu mandar: Te hi kowa jaake, hoske tchingrell lo mentsa pral maro tchilatchepen? Mer nai krah gar wawartchandes. O Dewel kamas les jaake.
Palle penau tuke: Tu hal i mensho. Tu nai peneh gar ap o Debleste: Hoi kreh tu kote? Job kras tut. Tu nai peneh gar ap leste: Hoske kral man tu jaake?

Kowa hi jaake har pash i mensheste, kai krell tchare un pirja dran jek kotar loli phub. Te kamell lo, krell lo i shukar tcharo, hoi bud moldo hi. Un te kamell lo, krell lo i wawar tcharo, kai tchiklo koowa dre tchiddo wella.

Jaake hi kowa ninna o Debleha. Job kamas, te sikrell lo peskri soor, un te well peskri choli pral i menshende, kai nashedo hi. Ninna te kamas lo kowa te krell, rikras lo peskri choli i raha tsiro lendar pale.
Kowa kras lo, te sikrell lo peskro baro railepen ap kolende, kai lan leskro kamlepen. Kolen rodas lo win, te djiwenn le leha khetne an leskro railepen.
Un mank kolende ham mer. Dran i tsele menshende rodas lo men win, gar dran i bibolde kokres.

O Debleskro rakepaskro, o Hosea, penas, hoi o Dewel leste sikras: Kolla, kai hi kanna gar mire menshendar, kolen rodau me win, te wenn le mire menshe. Un kolen, kai kek kamas, kolen kamau me o tselo djijestar.
Kote, kai ap lende penlo was: Tumer han gar mire menshendar, kote wenn le kharedo: I tchawe o djido Deblestar.

Pral i Israelitarja rakras o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja, kol laba: Ninna te wans i Israelitarja jaake bud har i tikne barra pash o baro pani, kol budendar atchella jek wast pherdo pral, un well dran o Debleskri choli win.
Kowa, hoi o Dewel penas, well sik pral i phub. Job rakrell i phagi soreles wi pral i menshende.

Kowa hi jaake har o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja, penas: Te mukals o Dewel, ko rai pral o bolepen un i phub, gar tchawe mendar pral atchenna, palle merans mare tsele menshe jaake har i menshe an i forja Sodom un Gomorra.
Jaake nai penah: Kol menshe, kai hi kek bibolde, rodan gar pal o tchatchepen. Un kolen tchiwas o Dewel an o tchatchepen. Jon patsan ap leste. Un doleske kras lo len tchatcho glan peste.

Kowa his wawartchandes pash i Israelitarja. Kolla kaman jaake te djiwell, har o Moseskre laba penenna, te wenn le tchatcho glan o Debleste. Un jon nai djiwan gar jaake, un wan gar tchatcho glan o Debleste.
Hoske gar? Jon kaman tchatcho te well dran pengri soor, un kaman gar te patsell ap o Jesus Kristeste. Un jaake wan le har menshe, kai perenn pral i baro bar, hoi ap lengro drom tchiddo hi.

An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Dikenn, me tchiwau i baro bar an o foro Zion. Pral koleste perenn le, un ap koleste choirenn le pen. Un kowa, kai ap leste patsella, kowa hunte ladjell pes gar glan mande.
Mire phrala, miro tselo djijeha kamoms, te wenn i bibolde dran o Debleskri choli win. Un kowa mangau o Deblestar soreles.
Me djinau tchatchepaha, jon krenn bud koowa o tselo djijeha o Debleske. Ninna te krenn le kowa, djinenn le tchatchepaha gar, hoi o Dewel kamella.
Jon haiwenn gar, har o Dewel i menshen an o tchatchepen tchiwella. Un jon djan ap pengro drom, un djiwenn pal pengro tchatchepen. Jaake krenn le gar, hoi o Dewel lendar kamella.
Job bitchras o Jesus Kristes. Koon ap leste patsella, kowa hi tchatcho glan o Debleste. O Moseskre laba hi buder gar o drom pash o Debleste.

Kowa, kai rikrell pes ap o Moseskre laba, te well lo tchatcho glan o Debleste, hunte krell kowa, hoi kote tchindlo hi. O Mose tchinas an peskre lila: Ko mensho lell o djipen o Deblestar, kai krell, hoi kote tchindlo hi.

Hi wawartchandes kolenge, kai patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste. Dran lengro patsepen wan le tchatcho glan o Debleste. O Debleskro lab penell: Ma pen an tiro dji: Jek hunte djal an o bolepen, te anell lo o Jesus Kristes tele! Mer djinah: o Jesus Kristo was ap i phub.
Ninna hunte penell kek: "Jek hunte djal pash i mulende, te anell lo o Jesus Kristes i mulendar ap i phub." Mer djinah: Job stas i mulendar pre.

Tu hunte rodess buder gar, har te nai weh pash o Debleste. O Debleskro lab penell tuke: Kowa, hoi o Dewel tuke penas, hi pash tute: an tiro mui un an tiro dji. Kau lab rakrell pral o patsepen. Kowa penah mer i menshenge.
Un tu te peneh i menshenge: O Jesus hi o rai, un te patseh tu an tiro dji, te kras les o Dewel i mulendar djido, palle dell lo tut o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
Koon o tselo djijestar ap leste patsella, koles tchiwell o Dewel an o tchatchepen. Un koon i menshenge penella: O Jesus hi o rai, koleste dell o Dewel o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Kowa, kai ap leste patsella, kowa hunte ladjell pes gar glan mande.
Kau lab hi i tsele menshenge: i biboldenge, ninna kolenge, kai kek bibolde hi. Len halauteren hi jek rai. Un job dell o djipen lauterende, kai les mangenna.
Jaake hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: Halauter, kai o Jesus Kristes mangenna, kolen dell lo o djipen.
Te patsenn jon gar ap o Jesus Kristeste, nai denn le les witar gar an-gole. Te shunan le lestar gar, nai patsenn le gar ap leste. Te penell kek lenge o Jesus Kristestar, nai shunenn le gar lestar.
Te well kek bitchedo pash lende, nai penell lenge kek o Jesus Kristestar. O Debleskro lab penella: Har bachtelo ham pral kolende, kai wenn pash mende un penenn menge o latcho lab!
Gar halauter shunenn ap ko latcho lab. O Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja penas: Rai, koon patsas kowa, hoi mer lenge penam?
Kolla, kai patsan ko lab, patsan les, har shunan le les. Un ko lab rakras o Jesus Kristestar.
Kanna putchau tumendar: Shunan i bibolde ko lab gar? Awa! Jon shunan kowa lauter. Jaake hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: Ap i tseli phub shunan le ko rakepen. An i tsele themma was ko lab penlo.

Putchau tumendar: I Israelitarja, haiwan le ko lab gar? Awa! Jon haiwan ko lab. O Mose penell menge, hoi o Dewel penas: Me krau, te silwerenn tumer ap kolende, kai hi gar mire menshe. Un tumer wenn chojedo pral kolende, kai tchi mandar djinenna.
O Jesaja trashas gar te penell, hoi o Dewel pral lende penas: Me mukom man kolendar te hatsell, kai rodan man gar. Un sikrom man kolende, kai gar pal mande putchan.
Pral i Israeleskre menshende penas o Dewel: O tselo diwes homs latcho ap lende, un jon kamenn gar ap mande te shunell un kamenn gar te krell, hoi me lenge penau.
