Me putchau tumendar kanna: Tchiwas o Dewel kol menshen infam, kai job peske win rodas? Na-a! Kowa hi gar jaake. Me hom ninna i Israelitari, i tchawo o Abrahamestar, un mire menshe hi Benjaminarja.

Glan raha tsiro rodas o Dewel i Israelitarjen wi, te wenn le leskre menshe. Doleske tchiwell lo len gar infam. Djinenn tumer gar, hoi an o Debleskro lab pral o Elija tchindlo was? Job was glan o Debleste, un rakras leha pral o tchilatchepen, hoi i Israelitarja kran.
Mo rai, penas lo, jon maran tire rakepangren. Un i barra, hoi wan tuke pre tardo, kran le paash. Me kokres atchom djido, un man kamenn le ninna te marell.
Hoi penas o Dewel leske? Job penas: Efta serja mursha atchan mange pral. Kolla tchiwan pen gar tele ap i tchanga glan o Baal.
Jaake djal ninna kanna an kau tsiro. Hi menshe koi, kai o Debleske pral atchan. Kolen rodas o Dewel win dran peskro kamlepen.
Kran jon latcho koowa? Un doleske rodas lo len win? Na-a! Te krals lo kowa, wals peskro kamlepen gar o tchatcho kamlepen.
Hoi kanna? Kowa, hoi kaman i Israelitarja te lell, kowa lan le gar. Kolen kokres, kai o Dewel peske win rodas, kolla lan kowa. I tsele wawaren hi i dji dran bar.

Jaake hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: O Dewel bitchras i sopaskro ducho ap lende, kai kras len khino. Pengre jakentsa dikenn le les gar, un pengre kandentsa shunenn le les gar. Kowa hi jaake bis ap kau diwes.

Un o baro rai David penas lendar: Jon chatchrenn fichen o Debleske un patsenn, te dikell o Dewel latches ap lende. Jaake hi kowa gar. O Dewel dikell gar latches ap lende. Na-a. Well o diwes, kai lenn le pengri phagi.
Korelo wenn lengre jaka, te dikenn le buder tchi. Lengro trupo hunte well bango hako tsiro.

Me putchau tumendar kanna: Peran jon o Debleskro dromestar tele, te nai stenn le buder gar pre? Na-a. Kowa hi gar jaake. Har peran jon o Debleskro dromestar tele, was o Debleskri bacht pash kolende, kai hi kek bibolde, jaake te silwerenn i bibolde ap kolende.

Har i bibolde peran o Debleskro dromestar tele, was o Debleskri bacht pash i tsele menshende ap i phub. Un kowa, hoi i biboldenge gar mishto hi, was i bacht kolenge, kai kek bibolde hi. Te hi kowa jaake, har bud bareder hi koi bacht, te wenn i tsele bibolde pale ap o Debleskro drom!
Tumer han kek bibolde. Un tumenge penau me: Man hi o Jesuseskro wast. Job bitchras man pash tumende. Un me parkrau man pash leste, te nai sikrap tumende leskro drom.
Me kamaus, te silwerenn mire menshe ap tumende, te anap nai kolendar ninna ap o Jesuseskro drom.

Har jon ap i rig tchiddo wan, nai wan i wawar menshe ap i phub pash o Debleste. Jaake was dran i tchilatcho koowa i latcho koowa. Har bud shukeder well kowa, te wenn i bibolde pale pash o Debleste. Kowa hi jaake shukar, har te wans le mulo un palle djido.

Hako bersh well o djob tchindlo, un dell newo maro. Te denn le i kotar newo maro o Debleste, hi kowa jaake, har te well o tselo maro o Debleste dino. Jaake hi ninna pash o ruk. Te was leskro drab o Debleste dino, palle hi ninna leskre kashta o Debleske.

I bibolde hi har i latcho djeteskro ruk. Ko latcho djeteskro rukestar wan kashta tele tchindlo. Tumer han har i kasht o diwjo rukestar. Un tumer wan ap ko djeteskro ruk dre tchiddo, un djiwenn lestar, un lenn i soor lestar.
Dran kowa penau tumenge: Ma sharenn tumen pral kol kashta, hoi tele tchindlo wan. Tumer hidjenn gar o djeteskro ruk. Na-a. O djeteskro ruk hidjell tumen.
Kanna nai penenn tumer mange: Kol kashta tchinas o Dewel tele, te was mer dre tchiddo kote, kai kol kashta his, hoi wan tele tchindlo.

Kowa hi tchatcho. I bibolde patsan gar o Debles. Jaake hi le har kol kashta, hoi wan tele tchindlo. Tumer han har wawar kashta, hoi wan dre tchiddo ap ko rukeste kokres dran tumaro patsepen. Doleske ma krenn tumen bares! Denn jak!
Te tchinas o Dewel i tchatche kashta ko djeteskro rukestar tele, palle nai tchinell lo tumen ninna tele.

Jaake dikah, o Dewel nai well latcho, un job nai dell i phagi. Kolla, kai peran leskro dromestar tele, kolen dell lo i phagi. Latcho hi lo ap tumende, kai djiwenn dran leskro latchepen. Te djiwenn tumer buder gar dran leskro latchepen, tchinell lo tumen ninna tele.
Kol bibolde, kai wenn pale ap o Debleskro drom, un patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste, hi har kashta, kai tchiwell o Dewel pale dre an ko djeteskro ruk. O Dewel haiwell te krell kowa.
Job tchinas tumen o diwjo rukestar tele, un tchiwas tumen dre an ko latcho ruk, kolestar tumer gar wan. Kitse budeder tchiwell lo kol tchatche kashta pale ap o djeteskro ruk, kolestar jon wan.

Mire phrala, me kamau tumenge i baro tchatchepen te penell, hoi djinenn i menshe gar. Te djinenn tumer kowa, palle penenn tumer gar: "Har gosewo ham mer!" Tumer hunte djinenn, hoske hi bud bibolden i dji dran bar, un patsenn gar ap o Jesus Kristeste. Kowa atchella jaake raha, bis te wan kol tsele menshe dran i wawar themma ap o Jesuseskro drom, kolendar o Dewel kamell, te wenn le pash leste.
Pal kowa wenn i tsele bibolde ninna ap o Jesuseskro drom. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Dran o foro Zion well kowa, kai lell o tselo tchilatchepen o Jakobeskre tchawendar krik.
Ap ko tsiro, kai lau lengro tchilatchepen lendar krik, penell o Dewel, hi kowa kerdo, hoi me lenge penom, un miro wast pre dom.

Te dikau, har patsenn i bibolde gar ap o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, hunte penap: Jon hi gar o Debleskre mala. Kowa was jaake, te nai wenn tumer pash o Debleste. Te dikau, har rodas o Dewel lengre phuren an o phuro tsiro win, hunte penap, kai leskro kamlepen lenge his.
Kowa, hoi job della, lell lo gar pale, un kones job gole della, un win rodella, koles tchiwrell lo gar ap i rig.
Glan i tsiro shunan tumer gar ap o Debleste. Un palle was o Debleskro kamlepen ap tumende. Kowa was an kau tsiro, kai i bibolde gar ap leste shunan.
Kanna shunenn i bibolde gar ap o Debleste. Un jaake, har o Debleskro kamlepen ap tumende was, jaake well o Debleskro kamlepen ninna ap lende.
O Dewel mukas i tsele menshen i tsiro, kai shunan le gar ap leste, te nai well lo lauterenge latches.

Har baro hi o Debleskro latchepen ap lauterende! Har baro hi leskro goswepen! Job djinell halauter, hoi kek wawar nai djinella. Kek nai djinell, har job rakrell o tchatchepen win. Kek nai haiwell leskre tsele dromma.
Kek haiwell lauter kowa, hoi hi an o Debleskro dji. Job hi o rai. Kek nai penell leske, hoi job hunte krella.
Koon das les tchomone, hoi job hunte dell pale? Kek.
Lestar was halauter. Halauter djiwell lestar, un halauter djal pale pash leste. Sharas o Debles kanna un hako tsiro! Amen.

Mire phrala, o Dewel hi kamlo ap tumende. Doleske mangau tumen o tselo djijestar: Djiwenn tumaro djipen o Debleske, un wenn leske kokres koi, jaake te well o Dewel bachtelo pral tumende. Te djiwenn tumer jaake, sharenn tumer les. Un kowa hi tumari budi.
I menshe ap kai phub djiwenn pal pengro shero. Ma djiwenn jaake har jon! Mukenn tumen o Deblestar newes te krell, te haiwenn tumer, hoi job kamella: kowa, hoi hi latcho un mishto un tchatcho.

O Dewel his latcho ap mande, un das man miri budi, te penap leskro lab. Doleske penau hakeneske tumendar: Kek te hadell pes pral o wawareste un rikrell pes bareder un feteder! Hakeno las peskro patsepen o Deblestar. Doleske hunte well lo gosewo, te dikell lo un te haiwell lo, hoi les o Deblestar dino was.
I menshes hi jaka, wasta, pire. Un hako kotar krell gar i emligi budi.
Jaake ham mer bud patsle un djah khetne ap o Jesuseskro drom, un jaake hi jek o wawareske koi.

O Dewel das hakenes mendar i wawar budi leske te krell, jaake har job an peskro latchepen les mishto rikras. Koi hi sawe patsle, kai penenn i menshenge i lab, hoi o Deblestar wella. Koi budi hunte krenn le jaake, har maro patsepen penella.
Wawar patsle haiwenn, har te wenn le nai i wawarenge koi. Koi budi hunte krenn le. Wawar haiwenn i menshenge o Debleskro drom te sikrell. Kolla hunte krenn kowa ninna.

Pale wawar haiwenn i patslen an o dji te rakrell, te krenn le len soreles an lengro patsepen. Kolla hunte krenn kowa. Pale wawar denn i tchorwelende tchomone. Koon kowa krella, hunte krell les dran i latcho dji. Kote, kai i patsle khetne wenna, hi ninna pralstune pral lende. Kolla hunte krenn pengri budi o tselo djijestar. Wawar patsle rikrenn pen ap i rig kolendar, kai djal lenge gar mishto. Koon kowa krella, hunte krell les i bachtelo djijeha.
An tumaro kamlepen hunte well kek chochepen! Mukenn o tchilatchepen un krenn o latchepen!
Kamenn i phralen un i phenjen o tselo djijestar! Hakeno hunte rikrell o wawares bareder har pes kokres.
Ma awenn khino! Krenn tumari budi i tseli sorjaha! Halauter, hoi tumer krenna, krenn o Jesuseske, maro rajeske!
Awenn bachtele un dikenn ap o latchepen, hoi ap tumende wella an ko tsiro, hoi wella! Te well tumaro djipen pharo, rikrenn win! Mangenn o Debles hako tsiro!
Denn kol tchorwele patslen, hoi len hunte well djipaske! Kolla, kai pash tumende wenna, kolen lenn an tumare khera dre, un denn len te chal un te pijell!
Rakrenn latche laba ap kolende, kai lenn tumen palla! Mangenn o Debles lenge, un khoshenn len gar!
Awenn bachteles kolentsa, kai bachtelo hi! Rowenn kolentsa, kai rowenna!
Awenn tumen jek dji un jek djipen! Ma krenn tumen bares! Awenn i mala kolendar, ap kolende i wawar tele dikenna! Ma penenn, te han kokres gosewo!
Te hi jek tchilatcho ap tumende, palle wenn gar tchilatcho ap leste! Krenn, hoi latcho hi an i tsele menshengre jaka!
Jaake bud har djala un ap tumende hi, djiwenn lauterentsa kamles khetne!

Mire kamle phrala un phenja, ninna te kras jek tumenge tchilatcho koowa, ma denn leske pale! Mukenn les! O Dewel dell les i phagi. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: O Dewel penas: Me dau len pale. Me dau len i phagi.

Krenn kowa jaake har an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: Te bokell kowa, kai kras tchilatchepen ap tute, palle de les te chal! Te hi les trush, de les te pijell! Tu te kreh kowa jaake, palle ladjell lo pes tutar.
Ma muk o tchilatchepen o rai pral tute te well! Muk o latchepen sorleder te well har o tchilatchepen!
Hakeno hunte shunell ap i pralstunende, kai hi len penepaske pral o them. I tsele themengre pralstune lan pengri soor o Deblestar. O Dewel tchiwas len an pengri budi.
Koon krell gar kowa, hoi kol pralstune penenn, kowa krell gar, hoi o Dewel lestar kamella, un lell peskri phagi.

Kolla, kai krenn latcho koowa, hunte darenn kol pralstunendar gar, na-a, kolla kai krenn tchilatcho koowa, hunte darenn lendar. Te kameh tu gar te djiwess an i daar kol pralstunendar, palle kre o latchepen! Palle sharenn le tut.

O Dewel das len pengri budi, te djal tuke latches. Tu te kre tchilatcho koowa, palle hunte daress tu lendar. Hi gar tchitcheske, te well len i soor, te denn le i phagi. O Dewel das len koi budi, te denn le kolen i phagi, kai kran i tchilatcho koowa.
Doleske hunte shuness ap lende, gar kokres dran i daar glan i phagi, na-a, ninna dran tiro dji, hoi tuke penell, te kress tu o latchepen.
Dran kowa denn tumer ninna kol themeskre lowe, hoi o themeskre pralstune tumendar kamenna. Te mangenn le kol lowe tumendar, krenn le koi budi, hoi o Dewel len das.
Denn hakeneste kowa, hoi leske hi: themeskre lowe, ninna wawar lowe, hoi jon tumendar mangenna. Shunenn ap kolende, kai hi len penepaske, un dikenn pre ap lende!

Te hi tumen i sijaan pash jekeste, ma atchenn an koi sijaan: Plaissrenn lat pale! Jek koowa nai krenn tumer gar doha: Te kamell jek o wawares o tselo djijestar! Koon kowa kras, kras kowa, hoi o Dewel lestar kamella.

An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Romeha, ma choche tiri romjat i wawar djuwjaha! Romnija, ma choche tiro romes i wawar mursheha! Ma mare kekes! Ma tchore! Ma dik tchilatche jakentsa ap kowa, hoi o wawareskro hi! Lauter kowa, hoi o Dewel tutar kamella, hi an ko jek lab khetne lino: Ab jaake latches ap o wawareste har hal latcho ap tute!
Koon kamell o wawares o tselo djijestar, kowa krell leske kek tchilatcho koowa. Tu te kameh o wawares o djijestar, jaake kreh tu kowa lauter, hoi o Dewel tutar kamella.

Denn jak, te krenn kowa! Tumer haiwan, hawo tsiro kanna hi. O diwes well sik, kai well o Jesus Kristo pale. Har wan tumer patslo, his ko tsiro dur tumendar. Kanna hi ko diwes buder gar dur tumendar. Doleske hunte was gar har menshe, kai sowenna.

Kau tsiro kanna hi har i rati. Sik hi i rati buder gar kai. Un o diwes wella. Dran kowa djiwas gar har i menshe, kai djiwenn an i rati. Te kras buder gar tchilatcho koowa! Kanna hunte kras mer kowa, hoi mishto hi, te well o tchilatchepen gar o rai pral mende.

Djiwas jaake djudjo, har djiwenn i menshe ap o diwes. Te djas gar kote, kai chan le pen nasselo un pijenn pen mato! Te kras gar wi-ladjedo koowa! Te tchingras gar, un dikas gar tchilatche jakentsa ap kowa, hoi o wawares hi!
Djiwas jaake har maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, djiwas! Te kamell o djungelo koowa an tumaro shero te well, palle penenn: Na-a!
Lenn ninna koles latches pre, kai hi gar sorelo an o patsepen. Ma tchingrenn leha pral o patsepen!
Ko jek patsell, kek chapen hi pale-tchiddo. Ko wawar, kai hi gar sorelo an o patsepen, kowa patsell, te nai chal lo kek mass.

Kowa, kai chal o mass, hunte rikrell pes gar feteder har ko wawar, kai chal kek mass. Kowa, kai chal kek mass, hunte penell ko wawareske gar: "Kowa, hoi tu kreh, hi pale-tchiddo koowa." O Dewel tchiwas hake dujen an o tchatchepen.

Kowa hi gar tiro koowa, te peneh pral i wawareskro budepaskro: "Kowa, hoi job kras, hi gar mishto." Leskro rai kokres nai penell: "Kowa hi mishto, kowa hi gar mishto." Un maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, les hi i soor, te rikrell lo les pash peste, jaake te atchell lo tardo an o patsepen.
Jekeske hi jek diwes i Debleskro diwes, ko wawareske hi lo kowa gar. Hakeno hunte djinella peske, kowa, hoi job krella, hi tchatcho un latcho.

Koon rikrell o Debleskro diwes bareder har i wawar diwessa, krell kowa o Debleske. Koon patsell, te nai chal lo lauter, krell kowa o Debleske un parkrell pes pash leste. Koon patsell, te nai chal lo gar lauter, kowa krell les ninna o Debleske, un sharell o Debles ninna.
Kek mendar djiwell peske kokres, un kek mendar merell peske kokres.
Te djiwah, djiwah o Debleske. Te merah, merah o Debleske. Hako tsiro ham mer leskro, - an o djipen har an o merepen.
O Jesus Kristo meras, un was pale djido, te well lo o rai pral kolende, kai mulo hi, un pral kolende, kai djido hi.

Kek tumendar hunte penell pral i wawar patsleste: "Kowa djal gar mishto ap o Debleskro drom." Kek tumendar hunte dikell tele ap i wawar patsleste. Ko diwes wella, kai rakrell o Dewel pral hakeneste mendar o tchatchepen win.
An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: O Dewel penell: Jaake har tchatcho hi, te djiwau, jaake perell hakeno glan mande tele, te sharell lo man. Un hakeno penella: Tu hal o baro Dewel.
Ap ko diwes well hakeno mendar glan o Debleste un hunte penell leske, hoi job kras un hoske job kowa kras.

Doleske hunte penell kek mendar ap o wawareste: "Tu djal gar mishto ap o Debleskro drom." Denn jak, te tchiwenn tumer i wawar patsleske tchi an o drom, jaake te djinell lo buder gar, har te djal lo ap o Debleskro drom.
Me djinau soreles, - maro rai Jesus sikras man kowa: Dell tchi, hoi hi pale-tchiddo an peste. Kowa kokres, kai patsell, te krell tchomone les pale-tchiddo, koleske hi kowa pale-tchiddo.

Te dikell tiro phraal, te chah tu halauter, un kowa dukell les an peskro dji, palle kameh tu les gar o djijestar. O Jesus Kristo meras ninna koleske. Doleske de jak, te anell sawo tikno koowa les gar o Debleskro dromestar tele.
Krenn tchi, te rakrenn i wawar djungeles pral kowa, ninna te hi kowa mishto an tumare jaka!

Kolla, kai o Dewel o rai pral lende hi, kolla tchingrenn gar pral kowa, hoi jon chana un hoi jon pijenna. Na-a. Jon djiwenn pal o tchatchepen, hoi o Deblestar wella un tchingrenn gar, un o Debleskro Ducho dell len bacht an o dji.
Koon jaake djiwella, kowa sharell o Jesus Kristes. Ap leste dikell o Dewel latches. Un pash i menshende hi lo an-diklo.
Kanna kras lauter, te well kek tchingepen mank mende. Kras kowa, hoi krell men lauter soreles an o patsepen.
Ma krenn kowa paash, hoi o Dewel kras! Ninna te hi kek chapen pale-tchiddo an peste, nai well jekes i pharo dji, te chal lo tchomone, hoi leske pale-tchiddo hi. Un kowa hi gar mishto.
Hi feteder, te chah tu kek mass un te pijeh tu kek mool un kreh tchi, hoi anell tiro phrales o Debleskro dromestar tele.
Kowa, hoi tu patseh an kau koowa, djineh tu un o Dewel kokres. Tu hunte sikress les lende gar. Bachtelo hal tu, te kreh lauter jaake, te hunte peness tuke gar: Kowa, hoi krom, his gar mishto.
Koon chal tchomone, un leskro dji well pharo koi pashal, kowa kras tchomone, hoi was gar dran o patsepen. Doleske anas lo doosh ap peste. Kowa, hoi well gar dran o patsepen, anell doosh ap mende.
Mer, kai ham sorelo an o patsepen, hunte dikas ap kolende, kai hi gar sorelo an o patsepen, te hidjas mer lentsa, hoi lenge pharo hi. Mer hunte dikas gar ap mende kokres, te djal menge mishto.
Hakeno mendar hunte djiwell jaake, te dikell o wawar latches ap leste un well sorleder an o patsepen.
Ninna o Jesus Kristo dikas gar ap peste, te djal leske mishto. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo pral leste: O praassepen kol menshendar, kai o Debles praassan, peras ap leste.

Lauter kowa, hoi an o phuro tsiro an o Debleskro lab tchindlo was, was tchindlo, te las mer newi soor dran o Debleskro lab, un das maro patsepen gar pre, un dikas ap ko latchepen, hoi o Dewel men della, an ko tsiro hoi wella.
Un o Dewel, koon dell i newi soor un krell tumen soreles, te denn tumaro patsepen gar pre, lestar mangau me, te well tumen jek dji un jek djipen, jaake har o Jesus Kristo kowa tumendar kamella.
Palle nai sharenn tumer o baro Debles halauter khetne. Job hi o dad maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar.
Jaake har hi o Jesus Kristes i dji tumenge, jaake hunte well tumen i dji jek o wawareske! Palle well o Dewel sharedo.
Un me penau tumenge: O Jesus Kristo was i biboldenge, te dikenn le, o Dewel rikrell ap peskro lab, hoi das job lengre phurende.

Un job was tumenge, kai han kek bibolde, te sikrell lo tumende o Debleskro baro latchepen, jaake te sharenn tumer o Debles. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo, har penell o Jesus Kristo ap o Debleste: Doleske sharau tut mank kolende, kai hi kek bibolde, un giwau gilja tuke.
Kote hi ninna tchindlo: Tumer, kai han kek bibolde, awenn bachteles khetne i biboldentsa. Jon hi kol menshe, kolen job peske win rodas!
Un ninna hi tchindlo: Tumer lauter, kai han kek bibolde, sharenn o Debles! Tumer, kai wenna dran i tsele themma, giwenn leske gilja!

Un o Debleskro rakepaskro, o Jesaja, penas glan i raha tsiro: Koi well i mursh i menshendar, kolengro dad hi o Isai, kowa well o rai pral i menshende an i tsele themma. Ap koleste dikenn le, te well lo lenge latches.

Un o Dewel, kolestar o tselo latchepen wella, ap koleste dikah, lestar mangah, te wenn tumer tchalo i bachtjatar an o dji dran tumaro patsepen, jaake te djinenn tumer: Ko latchepen, hoi dell men o Dewel an o tsiro, hoi wella, kowa well tchatchepaha. Un o Debleskro Ducho dell tumen i soor, te dikenn bud un budeder ap o Debleste.
Mire phrala, me djinau tchatchepaha, tumaro dji hi pherdo latchepen. Un tumer djinenn lauter, hoi o Dewel tumendar kamella. Jaake nai sikrell ko jek o wawareste o tchatcho drom.
Ninna te djinau kowa, tchinom tumenge pral bud koowa an kau liil. Me tchinom sorele labentsa, te bistrenn kowa gar. Koi budi das man o Dewel an peskro latchepen.

Job bitchras man, te budrap o Jesus Kristeske un te djap pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, te sikrap len o Debleskro drom. Jaake hom har i rashai, kai anell kol menshen, kai kek bibolde hi, pash o Debleste. Un o Dewel dell len peskro Ducho, te wenn le leskro. Un job dikell latches ap lende.
O Jesus Kristo das man kai budi. Doleske ladjap gar, te rakrap pral kowa, hoi krau o Debleske.

Me kamau gar te rakrap pral wawar koowa har pral kowa, hoi kras o Jesus Kristo mank kolende, kai kek bibolde hi. Dran maro rakepen un mari budi anas o Jesus Kristo len pash peste, te shunenn le ap leste.
Un job sikras peskri soor, har kras o Debleskro Ducho baro koowa, hoi kek wawar nai krella. Jaake penom o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar an o tselo them trul o foro Jerusalem bis an o them Illirikum.
Ap o tselo drom penom ko lab kokres kote, kai o Jesus Kristo gar prindjedo his, jaake te penell kek ap mande: "Tu budreh kote, kai i wawar glan tute budras."
Jaake krom kowa, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: Kolenge tchi lestar penlo was, kolla prindjrenn les kanna. Kolla, kai lestar tchi shunan, kolla haiwenn kanna.
Doleske his man kek tsiro te wap pash tumende.
Kanna hi miri budi an kol themma kerdo. Un me nai wau pash tumende. Jaake kamom me kowa glan bud bersha te krap.

Ap miro drom an o them Spania, kamoms te dikap tumen, un te atchap i tikno tsiro pash tumende. Te hom tumentsa khetne, lau newi soor. Palle djau dureder, un tumer nai denn man lauter, hoi man hunte well ap o drom.
Glan kowa, kai wau pash tumende hunte djap an o foro Jerusalem, te anap kote i tchorwele patslenge kol lowe, hoi i patsle an i themma Macedonia un Achaja kolenge khetne tchiwan.

Kol lowe dan le pengro tselo djijestar. I patsle an o foro Jerusalem penan o Debleskro latcho lab kolenge, kai kek bibolde hi. Jaake hunte denn i patsle, kai kek bibolde hi, i biboldende lauter kowa, hoi hunte well len djipaske. Koja hi lengri sijaan.
Te dom i patslen an o foro Jerusalem kol tsele lowe, palle kamau ap o drom an o them Spania pash tumende te well.
Un me djinau, te wau pash tumende, anau tumenge i tseli bacht, hoi wella o Jesus Kristestar.
Mire phrala, mangau tumendar an o lab maro rajestar o Jesus Kristestar, un an o kamlepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho men das: Mangenn mantsa khetne o Debles o tselo djijeha,
te wap me gar dino an i wasta kolendar, kai patsenn gar ap o Debleste an o them Judea. Mangenn les ninna, te lenn kol patsle an o foro Jerusalem kol lowe latches pre, hoi anau lenge.
Palle nai wau bachteles pash tumende, jaake har kamell o Dewel, te lap newi soor pash tumende.
O Dewel djal tumentsa lauterentsa un dell tumen peskri bacht an o dji! Amen.

Te well mari pheen, i Febe, pash tumende, mangau tumendar, len lat latches pash tumende pre. Joi hi o Debleskri budepaskretsa an o foro Kenchrea. Lenn lat jaake latches pash tumende pre, har maro rai Jesus kowa i patslendar kamella. Denn lat lauter kowa, hoi lat hunte well djipaske! Joi his bud patslenge koi, ninna mange.
Penenn latche laba mandar ap i Priska un ap o Akwila! Jon budrenn mantsa o Jesus Kristeske.
Har kaman man i menshe te marell, wan le ap miri rig. Lengro djipen his lenge tchi moldo. Pash lende parkrau man gar kokres, na-a, ninna i tsele patsle, kai kek bibolde hi, parkrenn pen pash lende.
Penenn ninna latche laba mandar ap kol patslende, kai an lengro kheer khetne wenna, un ap miro latcho maal, o Epaineto. Job was o ersto patslo an o them Asia.
Penenn ninna latche laba mandar ap i Mariat! Kaja budras jaake bud tumenge.

Penenn ninna latche laba mandar ap o Androniko un i Junia! Kolla hi ninna bibolde har me un his mantsa an o stilepen. Jon hi an-diklo mank kolende, kolen o Jesus Kristo win bitchras, te penenn le leskro lab. Kol dui wan glan mande ap leste patslo.
Penenn ninna latche laba ap o Ampliato, miro latcho maal an o patsepen,
un ap o Urbano, kai mentsa khetne o Jesus Kristeske budrella, un ap miro latcho maal, o Stachis.
Penenn ninna latche laba ap o Apelles! Kowa sikras, te hi lo soreles tardo an o patsepen. Penenn ninna latche laba ap o Aristobolo un ap kolende, kai djiwenn an leskro kheer.
Penenn latche laba ap o Herodion, kai hi i biboldo har me, un ap o Narzisso un kol patslende an leskro kheer.
Penenn latche laba ap i Trifena un i Trifosa! Kolla budrenn o Jesuseske, maro rajeske. Penenn latche laba ap miri latchi pheen, i Persis! Koja kras i bari budi i patslenge.
Penenn latche laba ap o Rufo, koles maro rai Jesus wi rodas, un ap leskri date. Kaja hi mange jaake har miri dai.
Penenn latche laba ap o Asinkrito, i Flegonta, o Hermes, o Patrobas, o Hermas un ap i patslende, kai pash lende hi.
Penenn latche laba ap o Filologo un i Julia, o Nereo un leskri pheen, un ap o Olimpas un kol tsele patsle, kai pash lende hi.

Taprenn tumen trujal, un denn tumen i tchum! Kowa sikrella hakeneste, tumer han phrala un phenja an o patsepen. I tsele patsle, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsenna, penenn tumenge: Atchenn maro Debleha!

Mire phrala, me mangau tumen, denn jak, te shunenn tumer gar ap kolende, kai anenn tchingepen mank i patslende un sikrenn o Debleskro drom wawartchandes har kowa, hoi tumende siklo was, un krenn tumaro patsepen paash! Rikrenn tumen lendar pale!
Sawe menshe budrenn gar maro rajeske, o Jesus Kristeske. Na-a, jon krenn, hoi lenge kokres mishto hi. Shukar labentsa un baro rakepen anenn le kolen o Debleskro dromestar tele, kai denn gar jak.

Bud menshe shunan, kai tumer ap o Debleste patsenn un ap leste shunenn. Doleske hom me bachtelo pral tumende. Un me kamau o tselo djijestar, te haiwenn tumer bud un budeder, hoi latcho hi, un te krenn kek tchilatcho koowa.
O Dewel, kai dell tumen peskri bacht an o dji, krell o bengeskri soor paash. Un ko tsiro well sik. O latchepen maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, djal tumentsa!
O Timoteo, kai mantsa budrella, penell tumenge latche laba. Ninna o Luka, un o Jason, un o Sosipater, - kolla hi lauter bibolde har me, - jon penenn tumenge latche laba.
Me, o Tertio, tchinom an kau liil kowa, hoi o Paulo mange penas, un me penau tumenge ninna latche laba.

O Gajo, - kowa las man an leskro kheer dre, - penell tumenge latche laba. An leskro kheer wenn i tsele patsle khetne. Ninna o Erasto, kai dell garda ap o foreskre lowe, un o Kwarto, miro latcho phraal an o patsepen, penenn tumenge latche laba.
O latchepen maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, djal tumentsa lauterentsa! Amen.

Sharedo well o baro Dewel! Les hi i soor, te krell lo tumaro patsepen soreles. Jaake penell les o latcho lab, hoi me penau i menshenge, ko latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar. Kate well siklo o drom pash o Debleste. Kowa djinan le i raha tsiro gar.

Kanna well ko drom diklo. Ko dromestar tchinan i Debleskre rakepangre an pengre lila, jaake har o baro Dewel kamas. Kowa djiwella hako tsiro, un kamas i tsele menshendar ap i phub, te patsenn le un shunenn le ap leste.
Job kokres hi gosewo, un bitchras menge o Jesus Kristes. Sharedo well job hako tsiro! Amen.
Kau liil tchinau me, o Paulo. O Jesus Kristo rodas man win, te wap leskro bitchepaskro. Kowa kamas o Dewel jaake. Un me un maro phraal Sostenes tchinah kau liil

ap i patslende, kai wenn khetne an o Debleskro lab an o foro Korint. Kolen rodas o Dewel win, te wenn le leskre tchawe, un te djiwenn o Jesus Kristeha khetne. Kau liil hi ninna kol tsele wawarenge, kai o Jesus Kristes an hake gaba un forja an-mangenna. Job hi lengro un maro rai.
Mu well tumen latchepen un bacht an o dji! Kowa dell tumen o Dewel, maro dad, un maro rai, o Jesus Kristo!
Me parkrau man hako tsiro tumenge pash miro Debleste. Job hi tumenge jaake latcho un kras, te prindjrenn tumer o Jesus Kristes.
Job das tumen bud goswepen, te nai penenn o Debleskro lab, un te haiwenn tumer, hoi job kamell tumenge te penell.
O lab o Jesus Kristestar kras tumen soreles an o patsepen.
Tumen hi haki soor, hoi o Debleskro Ducho della. Un tumer dikenn ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, pale.
Job dell tumen i soor, te atchenn an o patsepen, bis te well lo pale. Un kek nai anell i doosh ap tumende ap ko diwes.
Kowa, hoi o Dewel penella, kowa rikrell job ninna. O Dewel das tumen gole, te wenn hako tsiro peskro Tchaweha, o Jesus Kristeha, khetne. Un kowa hi maro rai.

Mire phrala, me shunom, kai hi tchingepen mashkral tumende. Kowa penan mange kolla dran i familja koi djuwjatar Kloe. Kanna mangau tumen an o lab maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar: Ma tchingrenn tumen buder! Atchenn khetne un rikrenn khetne an kowa, hoi tumer krenna un patsenna!

Pash tumende hi menshe, kai penenna: "Mer krah kowa, hoi o Paulo menge penella." Wawar penenna: "Mer rikrah men ap o Apollo." Un pale wawar penenna: "O Kefas hi maro sikepaskro." Un pale wawar penenna: "Mer rikrah men ap o Jesus Kristeste."
Nai djal kowa? Hi o Jesus Kristo an budeder kotja? Djas o Paulo tumenge ap o trushel? Wan tumer ap o Pauleskro lab an o pani thodo?
Me parkrau o Debles, kai thowom kek wawares tumendar an o pani, har o Krispo un o Gajo.
Jaake nai penell kek, tumer wans ap o Pauleskro lab an o pani thodo.
Kowa bistrom: Me thowom ninna o Stefanes un leskri familja an o pani. Budeder djinau me gar, kai thowom me jekes an o pani.

O Jesus Kristo bitchras man gar, te thowap i menshen an o pani. Job kamell te penap o latcho lab lestar i menshenge. Me penau kowa gar gosewe labentsa. Te rakroms me gosewe labentsa, merals o Jesus Kristo tchitcheske ap o trushel.
Maro rakepen pral o Jesuseskro merepen ap o trushel hi dinlepen kolenge, kai djan nashedo. Mer, kai ham ap maro drom an o bolepen, dikah an ko lab o Debleskri bari soor.
O Dewel penella an peskro lab: Pash mande molell o menshengro goswepen tchi. Un kolla, kai penenn, te djinenn le bud, kolende sikrau, kai kowa tchi moldo hi, hoi jon djinenna.

Hoi nai penah mer pral kol gosewe menshende? Un hoi nai penah pral kolende, kai hi tchinepangre un rakepangre ap kai phub? Jon prindjrenn o Debles gar. Doleske hi lengro goswepen an o Debleskre jaka dinlepen.

Ninna te dikenn i menshe o Debleskro goswepen an halauter, hoi job kras, prindjran jon pengro goswepaha o Debles gar. Doleske hatsas o Dewel i wawar drom. Job lell kol menshen dran o tchilatchepen win, kai patsenn ap o rakepen pral o Jesuseskro merepen ap o trushel. Kol wawar menshe, kai gar patsenna, penenna: "Kowa hi i dinelo rakepen, hoi tumer kate rakrenna."
I bibolde kamenn baro un sorelo koowa te dikell. Kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, rodenn goswepen ap kai phub.
Mer penah i menshenge, kai o Jesus Kristo ap o trushel hunte meras. Pral kowa hi i bibolde chojemen. Un i wawar menshenge hi kowa dinlepen.
Mank kolende, kolen o Dewel peske win rodas, hi bibolde un sawe, kai kek bibolde hi. Jon te shunenn o lab o Jesus Kristestar, palle dikenn le an leste o Debleskri soor un leskro goswepen.
Ninna te penenn i wawar menshe: "Kowa, hoi o Dewel krella, hi dinlepen," hi job gosweder har i menshe. Ninna te penenn le: "O Debles hi kek soor," hi job sorleder har jon.
Dikenn ap tumende, mire phrala: Mank tumende hi gar bud gosewe menshe, gar bud pralstune un gar bud, hoi mishto an-diklo hi.

O Dewel rodas kolen win, kai an i menshengre jaka gar gosewo hi, te dikenn i gosewe menshe, kai lengro goswepen tchi molella. Job rodas kolen win, kai hi len kek soor an i menshengre jaka, te dikenn i sorele, kai lengri soor tchi molella.
O Dewel rodas kolen win, kai an i menshengre jaka tchi molenna, un kai gar mishto an-diklo hi, te sikrell lo, kowa, hoi pash i menshende bud molella, hi pash leste tchi moldo.
Jaake sharell pes nai kek mensho glan o Debleste.

O Dewel kras, te wan tumer ap o Jesus Kristeskro drom. Kanna djinah, hoi tchatchepaha goswepen hi. O Jesus Kristo kras men tchatcho glan o Debleste. Job rodas men win, te was leske koi, un las mari doosh mendar krik.
Kanna well kowa jaake, har o Debleskro lab penella: Te kamell pes jek te sharell, nai sharell lo kowa, hoi o Dewel leske kras.
Mire phrala, har wom pash tumende, te sikrap tumende o Debleskro drom, hoi tumer gar prindjran, krom me kowa gar bare un gosewe labentsa.
Jaake raha, har homs pash tumende, kamom me pral kek wawar koowa te rakrell, har o Jesus Kristestar un pral leskro merepen ap o trushel.
Un har me pash tumende homs, his kek soor an mande, un man his traash.
Me rakrom tumentsa gar sorele un gosewe labentsa, te anap tumen ap o Debleskro drom. Na-a, o Debleskro Ducho rakras soreles ap tumende,
jaake te was tumaro patsepen dran o Debleskri soor un gar dran i menshengro goswepen.

Kowa, hoi mer penah i patslenge, hi o Debleskro goswepen. Kau goswepen hi gar har ko goswepen, kai well kol menshendar, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar, witar gar har o goswepen kolendar, kai hi raja ap kai phub. Kolla hunte merenn.
Mer rakrah pral o Debleskro goswepen, hoi i menshe gomme gar prindjrenna. O bolepen un i phub his gomme gar koi, har his o Debles an o dji, te djiwas mer leha khetne an leskro railepen.
Kowa prindjran i raja ap kai phub gar. Te nai dikans le an o Debleskro dji, dans le o Jesuses, ko rajes pral i tsele rajende, gar ap o trushel.
An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Ko latcho koowa, hoi kek jak dikas, un hoi kek kand shunas, un hoi an kek mensheskro dji dre was, kowa lauter dell o Dewel kolen, kai les o djijestar kamenna.
Men das o Dewel peskro Ducho. Un o Ducho sikrell men kowa, hoi hi o Debles an o dji. O Debleskro Ducho dikell an halauter, ninna an o Debleskro dji.
Hoi an o mensheste hi, djinell kokres leskro dji. Hoi an o Debleste hi, kowa djinell kokres o Debleskro Ducho.
An maro shero hi buder gar ko koowa, hoi hi kol menshen an pengro shero, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar. Mer lam o Debleskro Ducho. Doleske djinah, hoi o Dewel menge kras.

Kau koowa penah i menshenge. Kowa krah mer gar labentsa, hoi wenna dran o menshengro goswepen. Na-a, mer rakrah kowa, hoi o Debleskro Ducho menge penella. Job krell, te haiwas mer o Debleskro koowa, un sikrah kowa kolende, kolen ninna o Debleskro Ducho hi.
I mensho, koles o Debleskro Ducho gar hi, haiwell gar, hoi o Debleskro Ducho penella. O Debleskro koowa hi leske dinlepen. Ko mensho nai dikell gar, har o Dewel kowa dikella.
I mensho, koles o Debleskro Ducho hi, kowa dikell ap lauter jaake, har o Dewel kowa dikella. Kol menshen, kai o Debleskro Ducho gar hi, kolla nai haiwenn kol menshen gar, kolen o Debleskro Ducho hi.
Kowa hi jaake, har an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: Kek djinella, hoi an o Debleskro dji hi. Kek nai well leskro sikepaskro. Mer, kai patsle ham, men hi o Jesuseskro Ducho.

Mire phrala, me nai rakrom tumentsa gar har patslentsa, kai djiwenn jaake, har o Debleskro Ducho kamella. Me hunte rakrom tumentsa har kolentsa, kai djiwenn pengro phuro djipen. Tumer hans har tikne tchawe an o patsepen.
Me dom tumen thud te pijell, un kek mass te chal. Kowa nai dandran tumer gar. Ninna kanna nai chan kowa gar.
Tumer djiwenn jaake har te prindjrenn o Jesus Kristes gar. Te hi tchingepen mank tumende, un te silwerenna, palle djiwenna jaake har i menshe, kai prindjrenn o Jesus Kristes gar.
Jek tumendar penella: "Me krau, hoi o Paulo penella." Un ko wawar penella: "Me rikrau man ap o Apolleste." Me penau tumenge: Jaake rakrenn kol menshe, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar.
Dikenn, koon hi o Apollo, un koon hom me, o Paulo! O Debleskre budepangre ham mer un kram, kai wan tumer patslo. Hakeno mendar kras koi budi, har o Dewel leste das.
Me hom har i hacho, kai witsras o djob an i phub. O Apollo hi har jek, kai tchoras o pani pre. Un o Dewel mukas o djob bares te well.
Kowa, kai o djob an i phub witsrella, hi gar bareder har kowa, kai o pani pre tchorella. O Dewel hi bareder, kai mukell o djob bares te well.
Kowa, kai o djob an i phub witsrella hi jaake baro har kowa, kai pani pre tchorella. Un o Dewel dell hakenes, hoi leskri budi moldo hi.
Mer ham o Debleskre budepangre. Tumer han o Debleskri hachetikri phub. Un tumer han har i kheer, hoi o Dewel peske krella.

O Dewel his latches ap mande un das man i budi, te budrap ap ko kheer. Jaake tchiwom me i telstune barra. Me krom kowa, har i gosewo budepaskro, koon haiwella khera te krell. Ap kol telstune barra tchiwell i wawar budepaskro wawar koowa pre. Hakeno hunte dell garda, hoi job pre tchiwella.
Kek nai tchiwella i wawar telstuno bar, har ko bar, hoi tchiddo hi. Kowa hi o Jesus Kristo.
Hi budepangre, kai tchiwenn sonakai, rup, kutch barra, pre. Wawar tchiwenn kasht, phuss, khass pre.
Well ko diwes, kai dikenn le, hoi hakeno pre tchiwas. Ap ko diwes well lauter an i jag. Un koi jag sikrella, hoi haki budi moldo hi.
Te chatchrell kowa gar krik, hoi jek pre tchiwas, lell job tchomone o Deblestar.
Te chatchrell kowa an i jag krik, hoi job pre tchiwas, nashrell job lauter. Job kokres djal gar nashedo. Job hi har jek, kai nashell dran i kheer win, hoi chatchella.
Djinenn tumer gar, kai han tumer o Debleskro kheer, un kai o Debleskro Ducho an tumende djiwella?
Koon o Debleskro kheer paash krella, koles phagella o Dewel. O Debleskro kheer hi o Debleske. Un kau kheer han tumer.
Ma chochenn tumen kokres! Koon patsella, te hi lo gosewo ap kai phub, kowa hunte dikell dre, te molella leskro goswepen tchi.
Kowa, hoi pash i menshende goswepen hi, hi an o Debleskre jaka dinlepen. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: O Dewel taprell kolen an lengro chochepen, kai penenn pendar, kai jon gosewo hi.
Hi ninna tchindlo: O Dewel djinella, hoi an i menshengro dji glan djala, kai lengro goswepen tchi molella.
Doleske hunte sharell pes kek mensho, koon peskro sikepaskro hi. Lauter hi tumaro:
o Paulo, o Apollo, o Kefas. Un tumaro hi ninna: kai phub, o djipen, o merepen, kowa, hoi kanna hi, un kowa, hoi wella. Lauter hi tumaro.
Tumer han o Jesus Kristeskre. O Jesus Kristo hi o Debleskro.
Hakeno hunte dikell ap mende, te ham mer o Jesus Kristeskre budepangre. Job das men koi budi, te penas i menshenge, hoi o Debles an o dji hi, un hoi i menshe gomme gar djinenna.
Un i budepaskro hunte krell peskri budi mishto.
Mange hi jek, hoi tumer mandar penenna. Ninna kowa, hoi i tchatchepangre mandar penenna, hi mange jek. Me dikau witar gar ap mande te penap mange, har miri budi krom.
Me djinau gar, te anom doosh ap mande. Ninna te djinom kowa gar, krell man kowa gar tchatcho glan o Debleste. Kowa, kai o tchatchepen pral mande wi-rakrella, hi kokres maro rai Jesus.

Dran kowa penau, ma penenn jekestar: Kowa krell peskri budi gar mishto. Kanna hi gar o tchatcho tsiro, te rakrenn jaake. Ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai Jesus pale, sikrell lo halauteren, hoi kanna khatedo hi. Un lauter, hoi an o dji dren hi, well palle diklo. Un palle well hakeno sharedo o Deblestar pal koi budi, hoi job kras.

Mire phrala, hoi me kanna penom, rakrau me mandar un o Apollestar. Ap mende dikenn tumer, har te atchenn ap kowa, hoi an i lila tchindlo hi. Kek tumendar hunte phurdell pes pre un penell: "Me rikrau man ap o feteder sikepaskro."
Koon penas tuke, te hal tu feteder har ko wawar? Kowa, hoi tut hi, hi tut o Deblestar. Te das job tut lauter, hoske shareh tut?

Tumer krenn, har te wans tchalo un djinans halauter. Tumer krenn, har te wans brawelo. Tumer krenn, har te wans raja. Mer ham kek raja. Me kamoms, te wans tchatchepaha raja. Palle wams mer tumentsa khetne raja.

Mer, kai ham o Jesus Kristeskre bitchepangre, menge hi jaake, har te anals men o Dewel kote, kai ham tchi moldo an i menshengre jaka. Mer ham har i kurepangre, kai hunte kurenn pen, bis te wenn le mulo dino. Un i menshe un i bolepangre dikenn kowa.

Mer rakrah o Jesus Kristestar. Un doleske ham dinele glan i menshengre jaka. Tumer patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste, un doleske han gosewe. Mer ham gar sorele, un tumer han sorele. Men sharenn le gar. Tumen sharenn le.
Un kau tselo tsiro hi men bok un trush. Un an-ripaske hi men witar tchi. Mer chah dawa. Un men hi kek isema, kai nai atchah.
Mer marah men tele mare wastentsa, te well men tchomone te chal. Jon praassenn men, un mer rakrah o Debleskri bacht pral lende win. Jon te lenn men palla, rikrah mer win.
Te rakrenn jon djungeles mentsa, rakrah mer latches lentsa. Mer ham har tchik hako mensheske, har tchik ham lenge bis kanna.
Me tchinau tumenge kowa gar, te krap tumenge ladj. Na-a! Tumer han mire kamle tchawe. Doleske penau tumenge kowa, te atchenn ap o tchatcho drom.

Ninna te wals tumen deesh serja sikepangre, kai sikrenn tumen, har te djan ap o Jesus Kristeskro drom, hi tumen jek dad kokres an o patsepen. Kowa hom me. Me penom tumenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar un tumer lan ko lab pre.
Me mangau tumen: Djiwenn jaake har me djiwau!

Me bitchrom o Timoteste pash tumende. Kowa hi miro kamlo un latcho tchawo an o patsepen. Job penell tumenge, har me ko drom djau, hoi o Jesus Kristo sikras mande, un har rakrau lestar an hake gaba un forja, kai i patsle khetne wenna.
Pash tumende hi menshe, kai phurdenn pen pre un krenn, har te woms gar pale pash tumende.
Djinenn! Te kamell o Dewel, wau me jaake sik har djala pash tumende. Koi kamau me gar te shunell, har bares jon rakrenna. Me kamau lengri soor an o patsepen te dikell.
Kote, kai i menshe o Debleha khetne djiwenna, well gar kokres rakedo, na-a, kote well o Debleskri soor diklo.
Hunte wap me o kashteha pash tumende? Hi tumenge gar feteder, te wap me i djijeha pherdo kamlepen un latchepen pash tumende?
Me shunom, te hi pash tumende i mursh, kai peskri dadeskri romjaha sowella. Sawo tchilatcho koowa shunom me gomme gar pash kolende, kai gar patslo hi.
Tumer han pre-phurdo. Tumer hunte rowans pral ko koowa, un hunte tchiwans koles pale, kai kras ko koowa.
Ninna te hom me gar pash tumende, hi miro dji pash tumende. Un jaake, har te woms pash tumende, rakrom me i phagi pral koleste win, kai kras sawo koowa:

Te han tumer lauter khetne an o lab maro rajestar, o Jesusestar, un me hom miro djijeha pash tumende, palle krenn kowa jaake: An i soor maro rajestar, o Jesusestar, denn ko murshes an o bengeskre wasta,
te merell leskro phuro djipen an leste, jaake te djal ko mensho gar nashedo ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai Jesus pale.
Tumer sharenn tumen. Un kowa hi gar mishto. Djinenn tumer gar, te krell i tikno kotar shutlo jarro ko tselo wawar jarro shutlo?

Tchiwenn ko shutlo jarro tumendar krik, te wenn tumer har i newo maro, kai kek shutlo jarro dren hi! Un tchatchepaha tumer han har i newo maro! O Jesus Kristo was menge maredo, te lell lo mari doosh mendar krik, jaake har i bibolde maran i bakro ap pengro baro diwes, kai Passa kharella.

Un jaake har tchiwan jon ko shutlo jarro krik un chan sau maro, kai kek shutlo jarro dren his, jaake hunte djiwas mer maro newo djipen an o djudjepen un an o tchatchepen. Mer hunte mukas maro phuro djipen, un djiwas buder gar an o tchilatchepen.
Glan i tsiro tchinom me tumenge i liil. Un an ko liil penom tumenge, te wenn tumer gar mala kol menshendar, kai krenn wi-ladjedo koowa.

An ko liil rakrom me i patslendar un gar lauterendar ap kai phub, kai krenna wi-ladjedo koowa, kai hi boklo pal i lowe, kai hi tchorepangre, un kai mangenn wawar koowa an har o Debles. Kolendar rakrau me kate gar. Te rakroms kolendar, hunte mukans tumer kai phub.

An ko liil tchinom tumenge, te wenn tumer kek mala kolendar, kai penenn pendar: "Me hom patslo" un krenn wi-ladjedo koowa, hi boklo pal i lowe, mangenn wawar koowa an har o Debles, praassenn i wawaren, hi pipangre un tchorepangre. Te hi jek mashkral tumende, kai krell sawo koowa, koleha chan gar khetne!

Kowa hi gar maro koowa, te rakras o tchatchepen pral kolende win, kai gar patslo hi. Kowa krell o Dewel. Tumer hunte rakrenn o tchatchepen pral kolende win, kai patsle hi. Witsrenn koles dran tumende wi, kai krell ko tchilatcho koowa!
Te hi jekes tumendar i tchingepen i wawar patsleha un kamell peskro tchatchepen, har nai anell lo ko koowa glan i tchatchepangre, kai gar patslo hi? Hoske djal lo gar pash i patslende?

Well jek tsiro, koi rakrenn i patsle o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende ap kai phub. Djinenn tumer kowa gar? Tumer te krenn o tchatchepen win pral kol tsele menshende ap kai phub, hoske nai rakrenn tumer kanna gar o tchatchepen win pral kol phralende, kai i tikno djungelo koowa kran?

Djinenn tumer gar, te well ko tsiro, kai rakrah mer o tchatchepen win pral i bolepangre? Te hi kowa jaake, palle nai rakrah ninna o tchatchepen win pral i phralende, kai tchingrenn pen pral i tikno phubjakro koowa.
Hoske anenn tumer ko tikno koowa glan kol tchatchepangre, kai hi tchi penepaske pral i patslende, un kamenn kolendar tumaro tchatchepen?
Kowa, hoi tumer kran, hi i bari ladj. Hi kek gosewo mursh mank tumende, koon nai penella, kones tchatcho hi?
Tumer han phrala. Un tumer tchingrenn tumen glan kol tchatchepangre, kai gar patslo hi!
Tumaro tchingepen hi i tchilatcho koowa an peste. Hoske rikrenn tumer gar win, hoi kol wawar tumentsa krenna? Hi feteder te nashrenn tumaro koowa, har te djan glan i tchatchepangre.
Un kowa hi gar lauter! Tumer krenn i wawarenge ninna tchilatchepen un lenn tumenge lendar kowa krik, hoi len hi. Un kowa krenn tumer ninna i patslentsa.

Tumer hunte djinenn, kolla, kai tchilatcho koowa krenna, wenn gar pash o Debleste an o bolepen, un lenn gar ko latcho koowa, hoi o Debles peskre tchawenge hi. Ma chochenn tumen kokres! Kolla, kai wi-ladjedo koowa krenna, wenn gar pash o Debleste an o bolepen, witar gar kolla, kai mangenn wawar koowa an har o Debles, witar gar kol mursha, kai chochenn pengri romjat i wawar djuwjaha, witar gar i djuwja, kai chochenn pengro romes i wawar mursheha, witar gar kol mursha, kai krenn wi-ladjedo koowa wawar murshentsa un tchawentsa,
witar gar i tchorepangre, witar gar kolla, kai ap i lowe pandlo hi, i dre-phagepangre, i pipangre un kolla, kai praassenn i wawaren, - kolla lauter wenna gar pash o Debleste an o bolepen.

Hi menshe mank tumende, kai kran sawo koowa. Kanna was tumari doosh tele thodo. Un tumer wan erligo kerdo glan o Debleste, un han tchatcho glan leskre jaka. Kowa lauter kras maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, un o Debleskro Ducho tumenge.
Tumer penenn: "Mer nai krah halauter." Me penau: Gar lauter, hoi tumer krenna, hi tumenge mishto. Ninna te nai krau halauter, hunte wap me gar pandlo ap kowa, hoi krau.

O chapen hi koi, te djal lo an o per. Un o per hi o chapaske koi. Well jek diwes, kai krell o Dewel, te hi o chapen un o per buder gar koi. O Dewel kras men gar, te luberas mer trujal. Mer ham koi o Jesuseske, maro rajeske. Un job hi ninna o rai pral maro mass.
Jaake har o Jesus meras, un o Dewel les djido kras, jaake krell leskri bari soor men ninna djido.
Djinenn tumer gar, kai han jek o Jesus Kristeha? I mensho, kai hi jek o Jesus Kristeha, nai well gar khetne i lubjaha. Kowa djal gar!
Djinenn, te djal jek pash i lubni, wenn kol dui jek. O Debleskro lab penella: Kol dui wenna jek.
Ko mensho, kai djal o Jesuseha, maro rajeha, koles hi jek ducho leha.

Doleske penau me tumenge: Ma luberenn trujal! Te kreh tu sawo koowa, tchineh tu tuke kokres an o mass. Hako wawar tchilatchepen kreh tu ap i wawarende. Te lubereh trujal, kreh tu o tchilatchepen ap tute.
Djinenn tumer gar, kai han tumer o kheer, kai o Debleskro Ducho djiwella? Kowa hi an tumende un well o Deblestar. Un tumer han leskre, un nai krenna buder gar, hoi kamenna.
O Dewel plaissras tumenge peskro tchaweskro rateha. Doleske sharenn les tumaro tselo djipaha!
Tumer putchan mandar an tumaro liil: "Wals mishto i mursheske, te romedinerals job gar?" Un koi pre penau me:
Hi feteder, te hi hako murshes peskri romni un haki djuwjat peskro rom, har te krenn le wi-ladjedo koowa.
O rom te well peskri romjake koi. Un i romni te well peskro romeske koi.
Koi romjat hi gar pral peste penepaske. Ko tchatchepen hi o romes. Witar gar hi ko romes pral peste penepaske. Ko tchatchepen hi i romjat.

Kek tumendar te rikrell pes kol wawarestar pale! Tumer nai rikrenn tumen i tikno tsiro pale, te kamenn tumer dui kowa, te mangenn o Debles an. Un pal kowa awenn pale khetne har rom un romni! Te krenn tumer kowa gar, palle nai well, te han buder gar o rai pral tumende un perenn an o bengeskro wast.
Me penau tumenge kowa, te nai krenn kowa jaake, un gar, te hunte krenn les.
Ninna te kamoms, te wals hakeno gar romedino, jaake har me gar romedino hom, kowa djal gar. Mer ham gar jek har o wawar. Jaake har o Dewel kamella, hi jek romedino un ko wawar romedinerell gar.
Kolenge, kai gar romedino hi, penau me: Tumenge wals mishto, te romedinerenn tumer gar. Kol djuwjenge, kolengre romma meran, penau me: Tumenge hi feteder, te romedinerenn tumer buder gar.
Tumer te djiwenn nai gar kokres, palle romedinerenn. Hi feteder, te romedinerenn tumer, har te dukell o mursheskro dji pal i djuwjate un i djuwjakro dji pal i mursheste.

Kolenge, kai romedino hi, penell o rai Jesus, gar me, te mukell i romni peskro romes gar. Witar gar hunte tradell i rom peskri romjat pestar. Te mukas i romni peskro romes, hunte atchell joi peske kokres. Te kamell li gar kokres te atchell, palle rakrell li pes peskro romeha win, un djal pash leste pale.
Kol wawarenge penau me, gar o rai Jesus: Te hi i patslo phrales i romni, kai gar patslo hi, un joi kamell pash leste te atchell, palle tradell job lat gar krik.
Un te hi i patsli romjat i rom, kai gar patslo hi, un job kamell pash late te atchell, hunte mukell joi les gar.

O Dewel dikell latches ap o romeste, kones i patsli romni hi. Un o Dewel dikell latches ap i romjate, kai lat i patslo rom hi. Te wals kowa gar jaake, wans tumare tchawe har i tchawe kolendar, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar. Kowa hi gar jaake. Glan o Debleste hi le har tchawe, kolengro dad un dai, kolla dui, patslo hi.
Te kamell kowa, kai gar patslo hi, o patsles te mukell, jaake nai djal lo peske. Ko patslo hi gar pandlo ap leste. O Dewel kamell gar, te tchingrenn tumen.
I patsli djuwel nai djinell gar, te anell li nai peskro romes ap o Jesuseskro drom. Un o patslo mursh nai djinell witar gar, te anell lo nai peskri romjat ap o Jesuseskro drom.

Kowa, hoi tumenge kanna penau, penau me i tsele patslenge, kote, kai jon khetne wenna. Mer lauter hunte djiwas maro djipen ap koi platsa, kai maro rai Jesus men tchiwas, un hunte atchas koi pashal, hoi mer hams, har o Dewel men gole das:
Te was jek ap o mass tchindlo pal i biboldengro tchatchepen, atchell lo pashal. Te was jek gar ap o mass tchindlo, mukell pes job gar te tchinell.
Kolla hi gar budeder moldo, kai ap o mass tchindlo hi, har kolla, kai gar tchindlo hi ap o mass. Glan o Debleste molella, te rikress tut ap leskro lab.
Hakeno hunte atchell koi pashal, hoi job his, har o Dewel les gole das.

Te hals tu i pandlo budepaskro, har o Dewel tut gole das, hunte dukrell tuke kowa gar! Te penell tiro rai, kai tu leske budreh: "Tu nai dja tuke!" palle nai djah tuke tu, un hal buder kek pandlo budepaskro!

Koon i pandlo budepaskro his ap ko tsiro, har o Jesus Kristo les gole das, kowa hi glan leste buder kek pandlo budepaskro. Un koon kek pandlo budepaskro his ap ko tsiro, har o Jesus Kristo les gole das, kowa hi kanna o Jesus Kristeskro budepaskro.
O Dewel plaissras tumenge peskro tchaweskro rateha. Ma denn tumen an i menshengre wasta!
Mire phrala, hakeno atchell o Debleha un atchell pashal, hoi job his, har o Dewel les gole das.

Pral kol tarnende, kai gar romedino hi, hi man kek lab, hoi maro rai Jesus mange penas. Me penau, har me kowa dikau. Un maro rai Jesus his jaake kamlo ap mande un kras dran mande i mursh, ap koleste i menshe shunenna. Doleske nai patsenn man.
Me penau tumenge: An kau pharo tsiro hi feteder, te atchell hakeno jaake, har job hi.
Hal tu romedino, atch pash tiri romjate un ma dja krik latar! Te hal tu gar romedino, rode tuke kek romjat!

Te romedinereh, jaake aneh tu kek doosh ap tute. Un te romedinerella i tchai, anell li kek doosh ap peste. Kolenge well bud pharo koowa an lengro djipen. Un me kamau, te well kowa gar ap tumende. Doleske rakrau jaake.
Kowa penau me tumenge, mire phrala: Hi buder gar bud tsiro. Kanna hunte djiwell i romedino mursh jaake, har te wals les kek romni, jaake te nai budrell lo o Debleske.

Un kolla, kai lenge ropaske hi, djiwenn jaake, har te wans lenge gar ropaske. Un kolla, kai bachtelo hi, djiwenna jaake, har te wans jon gar bachtelo. Un kolla, kai tchomone o djipaske dre ginenna, krenn kowa jaake, har te nai rikrans jon kowa gar.
Kai phub un lauter, hoi koi pre hi, atchella gar. Doleske pandenn tumen gar ap ko koowa, hoi i menshenge ap kai phub jaake bud moldo hi!
Me kamoms, te well tumaro dji gar pharo. Koon gar romedino hi, nai well o Jesuseske, maro rajeske, o tselo djijestar koi.
Koon romedino hi, koleskro dji hi pherdo phubjakro koowa. Job dikell ap kowa, hoi leskri romni kamella. I paash djijeha hi lo pash peskri romjate, ko wawar paash hi pash o Jesuseste.

Un koi djuwel, kai gar romedini hi, dikella, hoi nai krell joi o Jesuseske, maro rajeske. Un joi krell kowa peskri tseli sorjaha, un kamell peskri tselo djijeha leske koi te well. I djuwel, kai romedini hi, kolakro dji hi pherdo phubjakro koowa. Joi dikell ap kowa, hoi lakro rom kamella.

Kowa penau me tumenge gar, te krap tumaro djipen phares. Na-a, kowa penau, te djal tumenge mishto. Kamoms, te djan o tchatcho drom, te djiwenn o Jesuseske, maro rajeske, un te atchenn soreles pash leste.
Te penell jek: "Kowa hi gar mishto, te romedinerap me miri pirni gar, kai lat jaake soreles kamau," koleske penau me: Te romedinereh lat, aneh tu kek doosh ap tute.
Te hi i murshes ap peskro dji, te romedinerell lo gar, un leske hi kowa gar pharo, te atchell lo kokres, koleske hi mishto, te romedinerell lo gar.
Kowa hi jaake: Te romedinerell jek, hi kowa mishto. Te romedinerell job gar, hi kowa feteder.

I romni hi ap peskro romeste pandlo jaake raha har job djiwella. Te merell o rom, hi li buder gar pandlo ap leste. Un joi nai romedinerell, kones joi kamella. Ap jek koowa hunte rikrell li pes: Joi hunte lell peske i patslo romes.
Joi hi bachtleder, patsau me, te atchell joi peske kokres un romedinerell gar. Jaake dikau me ko koowa. Un man hi ninna o Debleskro Ducho.

Tumer putchan mandar: "Nai chah mer, kai patslo ham, ko mass, hoi was glan i figura anlo, hoi mangenn le an, har te wals li i dewel?" Hi tchatcho, mer halauter ham gosewo un djinah tchomone pral kau koowa. Koon patsell, te hi les bud goswepen, kowa patsell sik, te hi lo bareder har ko wawar. Koon o djijestar o wawares kamella, koles krell job sorelo un gar tikno.
Koon patsella, te hi lo gosewo, kowa djinell gar, hoi tchatcho goswepen hi.
Koon tchatchepaha gosewo hi, kowa kamell o Debles o djijestar. Un o Dewel prindjrell les.
Nai chah mer kanna ko mass, hoi anan le glan i figura, hoi mangenn le an, har te wals li i dewel? Mer djinah halauter, kai hi i figura kek tchatcho dewel. Dell jek Dewel un kek wawar.
Ninna te hi sawo koowa an o bolepen un ap i phub, hoi i menshe an-mangenna, un ninna te dell bud, ap kolende i menshe penenna "mo dewel" un "mo rai",
hi men jek Dewel. Kowa hi maro dad an o bolepen, un dran leste well halauter. Un mer ham leske koi. Un men hi jek rai, kowa hi o Jesus Kristo. Lestar was halauter. Un lestar lam mer o newo djipen.

Hakeno haiwas kawa gar. Hi patsle, te chan jon ko mass, hoi glan i figura anlo was, hi kowa lenge, har te mangans le koi figura an, jaake har an ko tsiro, har his le gar patslo. Un lengre djia, kai gar soreles an o Debleste hi, penenn lenge, te anan le doosh ap pende.

Kolenge penau me: O chapen krell men gar pale-tchiddo glan o Debleste. Te ham dareno, te chas jek chapen, ham gar tikneder glan o Debleste. Te ham gar dareno, te chas kowa, ham gar feteder glan leste.
Kowa hi tumaro koowa, hoi tumer krenna. Ninna te hi kowa jaake, denn jak ap kolende, kai gomme gar soreles an o patsepen hi, te perenn jon gar o Debleskro dromestar tele!

Tu patseh, tu hal gosewo an o patsepen un haiwal, te nai chah ko mass, hoi glan i figura anlo was, un tu djah an ko kheer, kai mangenn le kolat an, un chah ko mass. Djineh tu, hoi nai wella, te dikell tut jek, kai gar soreles an o patsepen hi? Kowa nai well jaake, te chal job ninna ko mass, ninna te penell leskro dji leske: "Ma kre kowa!"
Un ko phraal, koleske o Jesus Kristo meras, un kai hi gar sorelo an o patsepen, nashrell peskro patsepen doleske, kai tu patseh, te hal gosewo.
Me penau tumenge: Tumer te krenn sawo tchilatcho koowa ap tumare phralende un krenn, te well len i djungelo dji, palle krenn tumer i tchilatcho koowa ap o Jesus Kristeste.
Doleske, te dikell miro phraal, kai chau ko mass, un doleske well lo o Debleskro dromestar tele, palle kamoms me miro tselo djipen buder kek mass te chal.

Dikenn ap mande, har me hom! Me nai kroms, hoi me kamau, un me krau les gar. Hom me gar o Jesuseskro bitchepaskro? Awa, me hom o Jesuseskro bitchepaskro. Me dikom o Jesuses, maro rajes. Tumer djinenna, koon tumen ap o Debleskro drom anas. Kowa homs me.
Wawar penenna, te hom me gar o Jesusestar bitchedo. Tumer djinenna, kai man o Jesus Kristo bitchras. Un har me ap tumende lestar rakrom, wan tumer patslo.
Kolla, kai kamenn doosh ap mande te anell, kolendar putchau:
Hi men gar ko tchatchepen, te chas un te pijas pash tumende?
Hi men gar ko tchatchepen, te romedinerah nai i patsli djuwjat, un te las lat mentsa, jaake har krenna kol wawar Jesuseskre bitchepangre un leskre phrala un o Petro?
Me putchau tumendar: Hunte budrap me un o Barnabas maro chapaske kokres?
Kek tsardella an o kurepen un plaissrell pes kokres. Kek tchiwell i drakengre ruka an i phub, un chal gar i drake. Kek dell peskre bakren senlepen te chal, un pijell gar lengro thud.
Hoi me penau, well gar i menshendar. Kowa penell menge o Debleskro lab.
An o Moseskre lila hi tchindlo: I grumni, hoi budrell, te dell li o djob dran o phuss, ma pande lakro mui! Hi o Debleske i grumni ap o dji tchiddo? Na-a!

Ap mende penell o Dewel kowa. Doleske hi ninna menge tchindlo: Ko hacho, kai budrell ap peskro kotar phub, krell kowa, te anell lo bud djob dre. Un kowa, kai dell o djob dran i phuss, budrella, te nai chal lo kolestar.
Te anam mer tumenge o Debleskro lab, nai denn tumer men ninna te chal.

Te hi i wawaren ko tchatchepen ap kowa lauter, hi men ko tchatchepen ninna. Ninna te hi kowa jaake, lah kowa gar menge. Me kamoms gar, te rakrell jek pral mende, te penah i menshenge o Jesus Kristestar, te was mer plaissedo.

Djinenn tumer gar, kai kolla, kai an o Debleskro baro kheer budrenna, kote lenna, hoi len hunte well djipaske? Un kolla, kai anenn marede fichen glan o Debleste, kolla nai chan ninna i kotar kolestar, hoi o Debleste dino wella.
Jaake penas maro rai Jesus ninna, te lenn kolla, kai leskro lab i menshenge penenna, kowa, hoi len hunte well djipaske.

Kau tchatchepen lom mange gar: Me lom tchi tumendar. Me tchinau kowa gar, te wap me kanna tumendar plaissedo. Feteder wals, me meroms, har te penenn i menshe mange palla, te plaissrenn tumer man. Me nai sharau man, te penau i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesusestar tchitcheske.
Me sikrau i menshende leskro drom gar, te wap sharedo. Na-a, me hunte rakrap lestar. Har bibachtelo woms, te kroms kowa gar!
Te kroms me kowa mandar, palle nai loms me kowa plaissedo. Me krau kowa gar mandar. O Dewel das man koi budi.
Hoi lau me koleske? Me lau tchi. Mange hi shukeder te penap o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar tchitcheske, har te wap me plaissedo.
Kek mensho hi miro rai. Ninna te krau nai, hoi kamau, krom me man budepaskro lauterenge, te anap nai jaake bud menshen pash o Jesuseste har djala.
Te hom pash i biboldende, palle djiwau har i biboldo, un rikrau man ap o Moseskre laba, te anap i bibolden pash o Jesuseste, ninna te hom me gar tel o Moseskre laba tardo.

Te hom me pash i menshende, kai rikrenn pen gar ap o Moseskre laba, palle djiwau me har jon, te anap len pash o Jesus Kristeste, ninna te rikrau me man ap o Debleskro tchatchepen. Un kowa hi o Jesus Kristeskro lab.

Pash kolende, kai hi gar soreles an o patsepen, djiwau me jaake har jon djiwenna. Kowa krau me, te well lengro patsepen ap o Jesuseste soreles. Me wom lauterenge jaake har jon, te rodap i drom, te anap len pash o Jesus Kristeste.
Kowa lauter krau me, te patsenn bud ap o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, te lap ninna kowa, hoi mange o Dewel an peskro lab penella.

Haiwenn! Kol nashepangre nashenn lauter, un hakeno kamell o glanstuno te well. Jek kokres well o glanstuno. Tumer patsle, hunte nashenn jaake ap tumaro patsepaskro drom, har te kamans o glanstuno te well! Palle lenn tumer o shukar koowa, hoi o glanstuno lella!
Kol nashepangre rikrenn pen lauterestar pale, hoi len khino krella. Ko shukar koowa, hoi kolla lenna, kowa atchell gar hako tsiro. Hoi mer patsle lah, kowa atchella hako tsireske.
Me nashau jaake har jek, kai djinella, kai job nashella. Me kurau man gar har jek, kai dell trul peste.
Un me dau jak ap mande, te wap o rai pral miro mass. Me kamau gar te penap i menshenge, hoi jon hunte krenna, un me kokres krau les gar.

Mire phrala, ma bistrenn, har djas mare phurenge, har djan jon an o mulo them. I wolka djas glan lende lauterende un sikras lende, kai o Dewel pash lende his. Un jon halauter djan o Moseste palla mashkral o baro pani ap i wawar rig. Mer nai penams: Har wan jon an i wolka un an o baro pani, wan le ap o Moseskro lab an o pani thodo.
Un jon halauter chan ko jek chapen, hoi was o Deblestar.
Un jon pijan lauter ko jek pipen, kai was o Deblestar. Jon pijan ko pani, kai was dran i baro bar win, kai lentsa djas. Ko bar his o Jesus Kristo.
Ninna te his jaake, nai dikas o Dewel gar latches ap bud lendar. Un jon meran an o mulo them.
Kowa, hoi kote djas, kamell menge soreles te penell, te djal maro dji gar pal o tchilatcho koowa, jaake har kolengro dji pal o tchilatchepen djas.

Ma mangenn wawar koowa an har o Debles! Mank kolende an o phuro tsiro his sawe, kai kran kowa. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Jon beshan tele, te chan le un pijan le un stan pre, te khelenn le glan o sonakaskro ficho.
Mer te luberas witar gar trujal. Mank kolende his sawe, kai kran kowa, un lendar meran biish-te-triin serja menshe ap jek diwes.
Ma choirenn o Jesus Kristes, har kolla an o phuro tsiro o Debles choiran, har kran le, har te wals les kek soor. Un i sapa dandran len. Un jon meran.
Ma penenn, kai kowa gar mishto un doha hi, hoi o Dewel tumen das. Jaake rakran kol wawar pale te pale. Un jon wan mulo dino.
Kowa lauter, hoi ap lende was, sikrell men, hoi nai wella. Un mer, kai djiwah kau diwes un djinah, te atchell kau tsiro buder gar raha, menge was kowa tchindlo an i lila, te das mer jak ap mende.
Doleske, koon penella, kai job soreles an o patsepen hi, dell jak, te perell lo gar.

Della sawo koowa, hoi kamell tumen o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell. Dikenn, sawo koowa was ninna ap wawar menshende. Te well pharo koowa ap tumende, dell o Dewel tumen koi soor, te nai hidjenn kowa. Job hatsell i drom, te wenn pale kote win.
Doleske, latche mala, denn jak, un mangenn gar wawar koowa an har o Debles!
Me rakrau tumentsa har menshentsa, kai gosewe hi. Putchenn tumaro dji, te hi kawa lauter tchatcho, hoi me penau!

Te wah khetne, te pijas dran o Jesuseskro khoro, parkrah men koleske pash o Debleste, un djinah, o Jesus Kristo ratas un meras menge un las mari doosh mendar krik. Te phagah ko maro un chah les, rikrell men kowa o Jesus Kristeha khetne.
Mer chah jek maro. Doleske hi men jek djipen khetne o Jesuseha, ninna te ham bud patsle.
Kowa hi jaake, har pash i menshende an Israel. Jon wan khetne un chan kol fichendar, kai anan le o Debleske. Lauter kolla, kai chan, his khetne. Un o Dewel his mank lende.
Me kamau tumendar te putchell: Hi i figura i tchatcho dewel? Na-a! Hi ko mass, hoi anan le glan late, wawartchandes har wawar mass? Na-a!
Kowa, hoi i menshe kol deblen dran kasht un bar denna, anenn jon i bengenge, gar o Debleske. Un me kamau gar, te wenn tumer i bengentsa khetne.
Tumer nai pijenn gar dran o Jesuseskro khoro un dran o bengeskro khoro. Tumer nai chan gar o Jesuseskro chapen un o bengeskro chapen.
Ma choirenn o Debles! Mer ham gar sorleder har job.
Tumer penenn: "Lauter nai krah mer." Me penau: Gar lauter hi latcho. Lauter nai krah mer. Gar lauter, hoi mer krah, hi mishto menge un i wawarenge.
Dikenn gar ap tumende kokres! Pash halauter, hoi tumer krenna, dikenn ninna ap o wawareste, hoi leske mishto hi!
Tumer nai chana hako mass, hoi bikedo wella. Ma putchenn, konestar ko mass wella, te well tumenge gar phares an o dji!
Djinenn, i phub un lauter, hoi koi pre hi, hi o Debleskro.

Te penell tumenge jek, kai gar patslo hi: "Awenn pash mande un chan mantsa," palle djan koi! Un chan pash leste lauter, hoi job tumenge anella! Ma putchenn, kai ginas lo ko chapen, te well tumenge gar phares an o dji!

Kowa hi wawartchandes, te penell tumenge jek: "Kau chapen was i debleste dran kasht un bar dino." Palle ma chan ko mass, te well koleskro dji gar djungeles, kai kowa tumenge penas. Job nai penals: "Hi mishto, te chap ko chapen."
Me rakrau gar tumendar, rakrau ko wawarestar, te wals kowa gar mishto leske, te chals job ko mass. Mange nai penell kek wawar, hoi me nai krap un hoi gar.
Te chau i chapen un parkrau man koleske pash o Debleste, nai praassell man kek, te chau me ko chapen.
Hoi tumer ninna krenna un chana un pijenna, kowa krenn lauter jaake, te well o Dewel sharedo.
Djiwenn jaake, te choirell pes kek pral tumende: kol bibolde gar, un kolla, kai kek bibolde hi witar gar, un witar gar kol patsle, kai wenn tumentsa khetne.
Me krau lauter, te djiwap jaake, har hakeneske mishto hi un rodau gar, hoi mange mishto hi. Me kamau kowa te krell, hoi budenge mishto hi, te djan jon gar nashedo.
Krenn kowa jaake, har me kowa krau! Un me krau kowa, hoi o Jesus Kristo kras.
Me hom bachtelo pral tumende, te bistran tumer gar, hoi me tumenge penom. Kowa, hoi shunom un tumenge penom, krenn tumer.
Me kamau te djinenn tumer, kai o Jesus Kristo hi o pralstuno pral hako mursheste. Un o rom hi o pralstuno pral peskri romjate. Un o Dewel hi o pralstuno pral o Jesus Kristeste.
Hako mursh, kai mangell o Debles an, un hako mursh, kai penella, hoi o Dewel leste sikras, un les hi i stadi ap o shero, kowa anell ladj ap peste.

Haki romni, kai mangell o Debles an, un haki romni, kai penella, hoi o Dewel late sikras, un kowa krell li, te hi lat tchi ap o shero, koja anella ladj ap peste. Kowa hi jaake, har te wans lake i balla tele tchindlo.

Te kamell i romni tchi ap peskro shero te tchiwell, nai mukell joi ninna peskre balla tele te tchinell. Te wenn lake i balla tele tchindlo, un lat hi buder kek balla ap o shero, hi kowa lake i ladj. Doleske hunte tchakrell li peskro shero.
I mursh hunte tchiwell kek stadi ap peskro shero. Job was kerdo pal o Debleste. Un o Dewel sharell pes leha. Jaake sharell pes o rom peskri romjaha.
O mursh hi gar i djuwjater. I djuwel hi o murshestar.
O Dewel kras o murshes gar i djuwjake. Na-a! Job kras i djuwjat o mursheske.
Doleske hunte tchakrell koi romni peskro shero, te dikenn i bolepangre, kai lakro rom o pralstuno pral late hi.
Pash i patslende hi kowa jaake: O rom hi tchi peske kokres. Un i romni hi tchi peske kokres.
I djuwel well o murshestar. Un o mursh well i djuwjatar boldo. Un jon dui wenna o Deblestar.
Me putchau tumendar: Hi kowa latcho, te mangell i romni o Debles an, un lat hi tchi ap peskro shero? Na-a!
Hakeno djinella: Te hi i murshes lengste bal, hi kowa i ladj leske.
Un te hi i djuwjat lengste bal, hi joi shukar. Lakre balla hi lake har i diklo.
Te hi jek pash tumende, kai kamell pes pral kowa tchingrell, jaake hunte djinell job, kai mer tchingrah men pral sawo koowa gar, un kote, kai i patsle o Debleske khetne wenna, witar gar.
Kanna hunte penap tumenge tchomone, kai nai sharau tumen gar. Te wenn tumer patsle khetne, krenn tumer budeder, hoi tumenge gar mishto hi, har te krans kowa, hoi tumenge mishto hi.

Me shunom, te wenn tumer khetne, palle tchingrenn tumer khetne, un ko jek penell: Me krau, hoi kawa penella, un ko wawar penell: Me krau hoi kowa penella. Un me patsau, i paash kolestar, hoi pral tumende shunom, hi tchatcho.
Kowa hunte well jaake, te dikell hakeno, koon tumendar an o patsepen mishto tardo hi.
Me shunom ninna, te wenn tumer khetne, palle chan tumer o Jesuseskro chapen gar jaake, har maro rai Jesus kowa kamella.

Hakeno chal peskro chapen kokres, hoi job peha las, un dell kek wawares tchomone. Doleske hi mashkral tumende phrala un phenja, kai hi len bok un trush. Un wawaren hi jaake bud te pijell, te wenn le mato.

Nai chan un pijenn tumer gar khere? Hi kol patsle, kai o Debleske khetne wenna, tchi moldo an tumare jaka? Kamenn tumer ladj ap kolende te anell, kolen tchi hi? Hoi penap me tumenge? Sharap me tumen? Na-a! Doleske sharau me tumen gar.
Hoi me tumenge penom, kowa penas mange maro rai Jesus. Koi rati, kai was ap maro rajeste, o Jesuseste, phukedo, las job ko maro,
parkras pes pash o Debleste, un phagas ko maro un penas: "Kawa hi miro mass, hoi tumenge dino wella. Hako kopo, kai phagenn tumer o maro, ma bistrenn, hoi me tumenge krom!"

Un pal o chapen las job ko khoro un penas: "Kai mool an kau khoro hi miro rat, hoi tumenge ratau. Jaake krau i newo drom, kai o Dewel un i menshe mala wenna. Hako kopo, kai pijenn tumer dran ko khoro, ma bistrenn, hoi me tumenge krom!"
Hako kopo, kai chan tumer ko maro, un kai pijenn tumer dran ko khoro, penenn tumer dureder, kai maro rai Jesus meras. Kowa krenn tumer jaake raha, bis te job pale wella.
Koon chal ko maro, un pijell dran o rajeskro khoro jaake, te well maro rai gar sharedo, kowa anell doosh ap peste. Job kras har te wals o Jesuseskro mass un rat tchi moldo.
Doleske hunte dikell hakeno ap peste, har hi lo an o patsepen tardo. Un palle chal job ko maro un pijell dran ko khoro.
Koon chal ko maro, un pijell dran ko khoro, un leske hi tchi moldo, hoi o rai Jesus leske kras, kowa anell doosh ap peste un lell i phagi.
Doleske hi bud nassele mashkral tumende, ninna sawe, kai hi len kek soor an lende. Un bud meran ninna.
Te dah jak ap mende, har mer an o patsepen tardo ham, lah kek phagi.
Te lah mer i phagi o Deblestar, palle krell job kowa, te djas mer gar khetne i wawar menshentsa nashedo.
Doleske, mire phrala, te wenn tumer khetne, te chan o rajeskro chapen, denn jak jek ap o wawareste, te lenn ko chapen khetne.
Te hi jekes bok, palle mu te chal job khere, jaake te anenn kek doosh ap tumende. Ko wawar penau tumenge, te wau pash tumende.
Mire phrala, kanna kamau me pral kowa te rakrell, hoi o Debleskro Ducho an tumende tchiwas.
Har tumer gomme gar patslo hans, tsardas tumen bari sorjaha pash kol figure, kai nashte rakrenn gar, kolen i menshe an-mangenna, har te wans le o Dewel.

Doleske kamau te djinenn tumer, hoi wella o Deblestar, un hoi well gar lestar. Un me penau tumenge: Te rakrell jek, hoi o Debleskro Ducho leske an o mui tchiwell, nai praassell lo gar o Jesuses. Un kek nai penella: "O Jesus hi miro rai!" te hi o Debleskro Ducho gar an leste.
O Debleskro Ducho dell i patslende koi soor, te nai budrenn le o Debleske. Ninna te hi koi soor pash hakeneste wawartchandes, hi jek Debleskro Ducho, kai dell jekes kawa un ko wawares kowa.
Della budeder budi, hoi krenn i patsle o Debleske. Jon lauter budrenna ko jek rajeske.
Un della bud dromma, har o Debleskro Ducho an i patslende budrella. Hi jek Dewel, kolestar kowa lauter wella.
An hakeneste budrell o Debleskro Ducho jaake, kai hi kowa i tsele patslenge mishto.
Ko jekes dell o Debleskro Ducho i gosewo lab, un i wawares, te haiwell lo, hoi o Dewel kamella. Un job penell kowa i wawarenge dureder. Hi jek Debleskro Ducho, kai kowa lauter krella.
I wawares dell job i baro patsepen. Un pale i wawares dell job i soor, te nai krell lo i nasselen sasto. Hi jek Debleskro Ducho, kai kowa lauter della.

I wawares dell job koi soor, te krell job baro koowa, hoi kek kokres pestar nai krella. Un pale i wawar penell i menshenge, hoi o Dewel leste sikras. Un pale i wawar haiwella, hoi o Deblestar wella, un hoi gar o Deblestar wella. Wawar rakrenn an wawar rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho len das. Un pale wawar penenn, hoi koi rakedo was.
Kowa krell lauter ko jek Debleskro Ducho, un job dell hakenes kowa jaake, har job kamella.
O mensho hi dran budeder kotja, har mussja, herja, un wawar. Ninna te hi lo dran bud kotja, hi lo jek mensho. Jaake hi ninna o Jesus Kristeha un kolentsa, kai ap leste patsenna.
Kolla, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsenna hi bibolde un kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, hi raja un budepangre. Kolla lauter lan o Debleskro Ducho. Ko Ducho anas len lauteren khetne.
O mensho hi gar dran jek kotar. Job hi dran budeder kotja.
Te penals i heri: "Me hom kek wast," hi li palle kek kotar o menshestar? Na-a, i heri hi i kotar o menshestar.
Te penals o kand: "Me hom kek jak," hi lo palle kek kotar o menshestar? Na-a, o kand hi i kotar o menshestar.
Te wals o tselo mensho i jak, kai wals palle o kand, hoi shunella? Te wals o tselo mensho i kand, kai wals palle o nak, hoi sungella?
O Dewel tchiwas hako kotar jaake an o mensheste, har job kamas.
Te wals o tselo mensho i heri, hawo mensho wals kowa?
Bud kotja krenna jek mensho.
O jak nai penell gar ap o wast: "Me haiwau kowa kokres. Dja tuke!" Un ninna o shero nai penell gar ap i herja: "Me krau kowa kokres. Djan tumenge!"
O menshes hi ninna kotja, kai gar sorelo hi. Te wans kolla gar, nai djiwals lo gar.
Kol kotja, kai menge gar shukar hi, kolla riwah shukar an. Un kol kotja, kai khatrah, ap lende dah mishto garda.
Kol kotja, kolen mer gar khatrah, ap kolende das mer gar jaake mishto garda. O Dewel kras o menshes jaake, te das mer budeder garda ap kol kotja, hoi gar jaake shukar hi har kol wawar.
Job kamas gar, te tchingrenn pen i kotja. Job kamas, te well ko jek o wawareske koi.
Te dukell jek kotar, palle dukenn kol tsele wawar ninna. Un te well jek kotar sharedo, hi kol tsele kotja bachtele.
Tumen hi lauter jek djipen o Jesus Kristeha, un hakeno tumendar hi i kotar lestar.

Kote, kai i patsle khetne wenna, das o Dewel hakenes i budi. Peskre bitchepangren das lo koi budi, te penenn le i menshenge peskro lab. Un wawar hi o Debleskre rakepangre, kai penenna, hoi o Dewel len sikras. Koi hi ninna sikepangre, kai sikrenn i menshende o Debleskro drom, un kolla, kai krenn baro koowa an o Debleskri soor, kai kek kokres pestar nai krella. Wawaren das job i soor, te krenn le i nasselen sasto. Hi patsle, kai hi o wawarenge koi, un ninna wawar, kai rikrenn i patslen khetne, un pale wawar, kai rakrenn nai an i wawar rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho len das.
Gar halauter hi o Deblestar bitchedo, te penenn le i menshenge leskro lab. Gar halauter hi o Debleskre rakepangre. Gar halauter hi sikepangre. Gar hakeno nai krell i baro koowa an o Debleskri soor.
Gar halauter lendar lan koi soor o Deblestar, te krenn le i nasselen sasto. Gar halauter lendar nai rakrenn an i wawar rakepen, un gar hakeno nai penell, hoi koi rakedo was.
Mangenn o Deblestar, te tchiwell leskro Ducho kol sorja an tumende, kai i patslenge i feteder hi. Un kanna sikrau me tumen i drom, hoi pral hako wawar drom hi.

Ninna te rakroms me nai an hako rakepen, hoi i menshe un i bolepangre rakrenna, un te wals man gar o Debleskro kamlepen an miro dji, palle woms me har i bashepaskro, kai bashrell gar mishto. Leskro bashepen molella tchi.

Te wals man gar o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji, palle molals ninna kowa tchi, te penoms me i menshenge, hoi o Dewel mande sikras. Te wals man gar o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji, palle molals ninna kowa tchi, te djinoms halauter, hoi i wawar gar djinenna un te haiwoms ko tselo Debleskro drom. Te wals man gar o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji, palle molals ninna kowa tchi, te wals man jek sorelo patsepen, te penoms me ap i berge: Hadenn tumen, un jon hadenna pen.
Te wals man gar o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji, palle molals ninna kowa tchi, te doms miro tselo brawlepen kol tchorwelende, un te mukoms man me djides pre te chatchrell.
Kones hi o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji, kowa rikrella lauter wi. Job hi latcho un silwerella gar. Job krell pes gar bares un sharell pes gar.

Kones hi o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji, kowa krell kek wi-ladjedo koowa; un dikell gar ap peste kokres. Job dikell ninna ap i wawarende, te djal lenge mishto. Kones hi o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji, kowa mukell pes gar chojedo te krell. Job bistrell o tchilatchepen, hoi i wawar leske kran.
Kones hi o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji, kowa hi gar bachtelo pral o tchilatchepen. Job hi bachtelo pral o tchatchepen.

Te hi les o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji un i menshe dukrenn les, hi job gar chojedo pral kowa. Kones hi o Debleskro kamlepen an o dji, kowa patsell halauter. Job dell o wawares gar pre, un rikrell lauter wi.

Well i tsiro, kai tchiwell o Debleskro Ducho i patslenge buder kek lab an o dji. Well i tsiro, kai dell lo len buder kek wawar rakepen. Well i tsiro, kai hunte well men buder kek goswepen. Jek atchella: o Debleskro kamlepen.
Kanna djinah gar lauter o Deblestar, i tikno kotar kokres. Un kowa, hoi sikrell lo mende pestar, hi i tikno kotar kokres.
Jek tsiro wella, kai dikah lauter lestar un buder gar tikne kotja kokres.
Har homs i tikno tchawo, rakrom me har i tchawo, un dikom lauter har i tchawo. Un man his tchawengro koowa an o shero. Har wom i mursh, tchiwom ko tchawengro koowa krik.

Kanna dikah o Debleskro koowa gar mishto. Mer dikah kowa jaake har an o phuro blenderi. Jek diwes wella, kai dikah mer o Debles, har job hi. Lauter, hoi me kanna lestar djinau, hi tikne kotja. Well ko diwes, kai prindjrau les jaake, har job man prindjrella.
Kanna atchenna menge kalla triin: - O patsepen ap o Debleste; - i bacht, te djinah mer, te well lauter mishto; - o Debleskro kamlepen. O bareder kol trinendar hi o Debleskro kamlepen.

Krenn lauter, te lenn o Debleskro kamlepen an tumaro dji! Un rodenn i tselo djijestar kol sorja, hoi o Debleskro Ducho an tumende tchiwella, te nai budrenna o Debleske! Budeder har hako wawar koowa rodenn koi pal, te penenn nai i menshenge i lab, hoi wella o Deblestar.

Kowa, kai rakrella an i rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho les das, un hoi kek haiwella, kowa rakrell gar i menshenge. Job krell kowa o Debleske. O Debleskro Ducho dell les koi soor, te rakrell lo, hoi kek mensho djinella.
Kowa, kai penell i menshenge i lab, hoi wella o Deblestar, kowa rakrell jaake ap i menshende, te well lengro patsepen soreles, un te wenn lengre djia bachteles un soreles.

Kowa, kai rakrella peske an i rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho les das un hoi kek haiwella, koleske djal feteder an peskro dji. Kowa, kai penell i patslenge i lab, hoi o Deblestar wella, krell kowa, te well kolengro patsepen soreles.

Ninna te kamoms me, te rakrans tumer lauter an i rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho das, kamoms me budeder, te penans nai tumer lauter i menshenge i lab, hoi wella o Deblestar. Hi budeder moldo, te penell jek i lab, hoi wella o Deblestar, har te rakrell jek an i wawar rakepen, hoi kek haiwella. Hi wawartchandes, te hi jek koi, kai penell nai, hoi an ko wawar rakepen rakedo was, jaake te wenn i patsle soreles an o patsepen.

Kanna, mire phrala, har wals kowa, te woms me pash tumende, un rakroms an i rakepen, hoi kek haiwella? Kowa molals tumenge tchi. Tumenge hi budeder moldo, te rakrap an i rakepen, hoi tumer haiwenna, un te penap tumenge, hoi o Dewel mande sikras, un hoi lestar djinau. Un tumenge hi ninna budeder moldo, te penap tumenge i lab, hoi wella o Deblestar, un te sikrap tumen, har te djan ap o Debleskro drom.
Kowa hi jaake har o bashepen. Te bashrell jek gar mishto, haiwell kek, hoi bashedo wella.
Te djan i lurde an o kurepen, palle phurdell jek ap i bashepaskri. Un job te phurdella jaake djungeles, te haiwell les kek, palle djal kek an o kurepen.
Jaake hi kowa ninna tumentsa. Te rakrenn tumer an i rakepen labentsa, hoi kek haiwella, har nai haiwell jek, hoi tumer penenna? Tumer rakrenn tchitcheske.
Dell bud menshe an bud themma. Un hakenes hi peskro rakepen.
Te haiwau me gar ko wawareskro rakepen, hom me koleske i wi-themari. Un ninna job hi mange i wi-themari.
Jaake hi kowa ninna tumentsa. Tumer kamenn o tselo djijestar kol sorja te lell, hoi o Debleskro Ducho della. Krenn lauter, te lenn bud kolestar, hoi krell i patslen soreles an o patsepen!
Hi jaake: Koon an i rakepen rakrella, hoi das les o Debleskro Ducho, kowa hunte mangell o Deblestar, te nai penell lo i menshenge kowa, hoi koi rakedo was.
Me te rakrau an i rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho man das, palle krell kowa o Debleskro Ducho an mande. Un me haiwau gar, hoi me penom.

Hoi hunte krap me kanna? Me kamau te rakrap o Debleha an i rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho man das. Ninna kamau me te rakrap leha i labentsa, hoi me haiwau. Un me kamau leske te giwap, har o Debleskro Ducho mukell man te giwell. Un ninna kamau te giwap i labentsa, hoi me haiwau.
Te shareh tu o Debles an i rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho tut das, un koi hi jek, kai haiwell kowa gar, har nai penell job Amen ap kowa, hoi tu penal?
Leskro dji well gar soreles, ninna te parkral tut tu o djijestar pash o Debleste.
Me parkrau man pash o Debleste, kai rakrau budeder har tumer lauter an i rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho man das.
Te hom me mank i patslende, te sikrap len o Debleskro drom, kamau kote feteder pantch laba te rakrell, hoi hakeno haiwella, har deesh serja laba an i rakepen, hoi kek haiwella.
Mire phrala, ma awenn har tikne tchawe, kai gomme gar bud djinenna. Awenn gosewo har i phure! Pash tchilatcho koowa, awenn har tikne tchawe, hoi o tchilatchepen gar haiwenna!
