An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Me kamau te rakrap ap kal menshende an o wawar rakepen. Un wi-themarja penenn lenge mire laba. Un ninna palle shunenn le gar ap mande, penell o Dewel.

Jaake dikenn tumer: O Debleskro Ducho dell o wawar rakepen, te sikrell o Dewel peskri soor kolende, kai gar patsenna, un gar i patslende. Hi wawartchandes, te penell jek i lab, hoi wella o Deblestar. Ko lab hi i patslenge un gar kolenge, kai patsenna gar ap o Debleste.
Dikenn, te wans i tsele patsle khetne, un rakrans lauter an i wawar rakepen, un koi wals jek, kai gar patslo hi un kai prindjrell kowa gar, penals kowa: "Kalla hi lauter narwele!"

Hi wawartchandes, te lell hakeno i lab o Deblestar, un penell les glan i wawarende, un koi wella jek, kai gar patsella un o tselo koowa gar prindjrella, koleske djal lauter an leskro dji, un leske djan i jaka pre pral peskri doosh.
Hoi an leskro dji khatedo hi, well diklo. Un job mukell pes glan tele perell ap i phub un mangell o Debles an, un penell: "O Dewel hi tchatchepaha pash tumende!"

Mire phrala, hi jaake: Te wenn tumer khetne, sharell ko jek o Debles i giljaha. I wawar sikrell, har te djan ap o Debleskro drom. Ninna i wawar penell, hoi o Dewel les sikras. Pale i wawar rakrell an i rakepen, hoi o Debleskro Ducho les das. Un i wawar nai penell, hoi koi rakedo was. Lauter kowa krenn, te wenn i patsle soreles an o patsepen!
Te hi menshe koi, kai rakrenn an i wawar rakepen, mukenn te rakrenn dui te triin, gar budeder har triin, jek pal o wawareste! Un jek hunte penell, hoi rakedo was.
Te hi kek koi, kai penell nai, hoi koi rakedo was, palle mukenn kekes an i wawar rakepen te rakrell. Job nai rakrell khere peske kokres un o Debleske.
Kolla, kai penenna i menshenge i lab, hoi o Deblestar wella, kolendar mukenn te rakrenn dui te triin! Un kol wawar denn garda, te hi kowa tchatcho, hoi rakedo wella!
Te penell jek i lab o Deblestar, un o Dewel sikrell tchomone ap i wawareste, kai koi pashal beshdo hi, hunte mukell ko ersto koles te rakrell.
Tumer lauter nai penenn jek pal o wawareste i lab, hoi wella o Deblestar. Jaake dikenn lauter, har te djan o Debleskro drom. Un lauter wenna soreles an o patsepen.
Kones i lab well o Deblestar, kowa nai rikrell pes pale, jaake raha har ko wawar rakrella.
O Dewel kamell kek tchingepen. Job kamell, te djal lauter mishto. Kowa hi jaake an hake forja, kai i patsle khetne wenna.
Te wenn tumer khetne an o Debleskro kheer, ma mukenn i djuwjen te rakrell. Jon hunte shunenn ap kowa, hoi penlo wella. Jaake hi ninna tchindlo an o Moseskre lila.
Te kamell i djuwel tchomone te djinell, putchell li khere peskro romestar. Kowa hi gar mishto, te rakrell i djuwel an o Debleskro kheer.
Was o Debleskro lab tumendar? Na-a! Was o Debleskro lab pash tumende kokres? Na-a!
Te patsell jek tumendar, kai o Dewel rakrell leha, un kai o Debleskro Ducho les o Debleskro koowa sikrell, jaake haiwell job, te hi kawa gar mandar, hoi me kate tchinau. Kawa hi o Deblestar.
Koon kowa gar kamell te dikell, ap koleste dikenn witar gar!
Mire phrala, mangenn o Debles, te nai penenn i menshenge i lab, hoi lestar wella! Un mukenn kolen te rakrell, kai kamenna an ko rakepen te rakrell, hoi o Debleskro Ducho len das!
Krenn kawa jaake, te djal kowa lauter mishto un shukar!
Mire phrala, ma bistrenn o latcho lab o Jesusestar, hoi me tumenge penom! Tumer lan ko lab pre, un tumer djiwenn pal kowa.
Te rikrenn tumen ap o latcho lab o Jesusestar, jaake har me les tumenge penom, djan tumer gar nashedo. Te wals kowa wawartchandes, wals tumaro patsepen tchitcheske.
Ko bareder lab, hoi mange penlo was, un hoi me tumenge penom, hi kawa: O Jesus Kristo meras menge, te lell lo mari doosh mendar krik, jaake har an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi.
Un job was paskedo, un was djido pal triin diwessa, jaake har kowa an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi.
Un pal kowa sikras lo pes o Petreste. Un pal koleste sikras lo pes peskre deesh-te-dui malende.
Pal lende dikan les budeder har pantch-sheel phrala ap jek kopo. Bud lendar djiwenna gomme kai diwes.
Pal lende dikas les ninna o Jakobo, un palle ninna i tsele wawar bitchepangre.
Pal lende mukas job pes mandar te dikell. Pal mande dikas les buder kek. Un me homs gar moldo, te dikap les.

Me lom i patslen palla, te marap len. Doleske hom me o tikneder mashkral lende, kolen o Jesus bitchras, te penenn le i menshenge o latcho lab lestar. Un me hom gar moldo, te penenn jon, kai me jek lendar hom.

O Dewel kamas an peskro baro latchepen, te wap me kowa, hoi me kanna hom. Un leskro baro latchepen, hoi job man das, his gar tchitcheske. Me budrom budeder har kol tsele wawar. Gar me kokres, o Debleskro latchepen an mande budras mantsa, te krap nai koi budi.
Kowa hi jek, koon mendar penas tumenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar. Mer halauter rakrah lestar. Un jaake patsan tumer ap leste.
Mer penam tumenge, kai o Jesus Kristo i mulendar pre stas. Har nai penenn menshe mank tumende: "Ko della gar, kai i mule pre stenna."
Te dell kowa gar, kai i mule pre stenna, jaake stas o Jesus Kristo witar gar i mulendar pre.
Te stals o Jesus Kristo gar i mulendar pre, wals kowa tchitcheske, hoi mer o Jesus Kristestar rakrah. Un tumaro patsepen wals ninna tchitcheske.

Palle nai penans le mendar, te ham mer chochene. Mer penam, kai kras o Dewel o Jesus Kristes i mulendar djido. Te wals kowa gar tchatcho, te krell o Dewel i mulen djido, palle nashte kras job o Jesus Kristes witar gar djido.
Te stenn i mule gar pre, palle stas o Jesus Kristo witar gar i mulendar pre.
Te stas o Jesus Kristo gar i mulendar pre, jaake hi tumaro patsepen tchitcheske. Un ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi tumer kran, hi gomme ap tumende.
Te stas o Jesus Kristo gar i mulendar pre, palle hi kolla nashedo, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsan un meran.
Te wals maro patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste buder tchi moldo pal o merepen, wams i tchorwleder i tsele menshendar.
Ko tchatchepen hi: O Jesus Kristo hi o ersto, koles o Dewel i mulendar djido kras.
Jaake har was o merepen jek menshestar, jaake well ninna jekestar, kai stenn i mule pale pre.
Jaake har was o Adamestar, kai hunte merenn lauter, jaake well o Jesus Kristestar, te krell o Dewel len lauter djido:
Hakeno ap peskro tsiro: O Jesus Kristo hi o glanstuno. Te well lo pale, stenn kolla pre, kai ap leste patsan.

Pal kowa herell kau tsiro pre. Hako rai, hako pralstuno un hakeno, koles hi penepaske, koleske lell o Jesus Kristo i soor krik un dell lauter o Debleste, peskro dadeste, te well o Dewel kokres o rai pral halauter.
O Jesus Kristo hunte well o rai jaake raha, bis te tchiwell o Dewel lauteren, kai les gar kamenna, tel leskre pire.
Ko palstuno, kolendar o Jesus Kristo i soor krik lella, hi o merepen.

An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Lauter tchiwas o Dewel tel leskre pire. Ninna te hi kate penlo, kai hi o Jesus Kristo o rai pral lauterende, hi lo gar pral o Debleste tardo. O Dewel hi kowa, kai kras, kai hi o Jesus Kristo o rai pral lauterende.
Te was o Jesus Kristo o rai pral halauter, tchiwell job pes ninna tel o Debleskro wast, te well o Dewel ninna o rai pral o tchaweste. Un o Dewel kokres hi o rai pral halauter.

Kanna rakrau pale pral kolende, kai penenn, te stenn i mule gar pre. Tumer djinenn, hi patsle koi, kai mukenn pen i mulenge an o pani te thowell. Putchau tumendar: Te stenn i mule buder gar pre, hoske mukenn le pen palle i mulenge an o pani te thowell?
Un hoi hi mentsa? Hoske penah mer o Debleskro lab dureder, te djinah mer, te nai wah mer hako tsiro mulo dino?
Hako diwes nai nashrau me miro djipen. Mire phrala, kowa hi tchatcho, jaake har tchatcho hi, kai hom bachtelo pral tumende, kai me anom tumen pash o Jesus Kristeste, maro rajeste.

An o foro Efesus kurom man me menshentsa, kai jaake hi har diwje fiche. Te patsoms me gar, kai i mule pre stenna, kroms me kowa gar. Te stenna i mule gar pre, hi kol wawaren tchatcho, te penenn le: "Chas un pijas! Taissar nai ham mulo!"
Ma patsenn, kai lengro tchatcho hi! Ma krenn kowa, hoi jon krenna!
Djan o tchatcho drom! Ma pijenn tumen mato! Djiwenn buder gar an o tchilatchepen! Mank tumende hi menshe, kai djinenn gar, koon o Dewel hi. Un kowa penau tumenge, te ladjenn tumen.
Kanna nai well jek, kai putchella: "Har nai stenn i mule pre? Un har dikenn le win?"
Me, o Paulo, penau tuke: Har nai putcheh tu jaake dineles? Dik ap o djob, hoi tu an i phub tchiweh! Kowa hunte merell, te well lo djido un baro.
Un kowa, hoi tu an i phub tchiweh, hi gar ko baro djob. Na-a! Tu tchiweh les an i phub, te hi lo tikno. Un jaake kreh tu kowa ninna o wawar senlepaha.
O Dewel mukell les bares te well un jaake win te dikell, har job kamell. Un hako senlepen krell lo wawartchandes.
Hako djipen ap i phub dikell wawartchandes win. I menshe dikenn wawartchandes win har i tchirkle. Un i tchirkle dikenn wawartchandes win har i matche.
Un kolla, kai an o bolepen hi, dikenn wawartchandes win, har kolla, kai ap i phub hi. Un kolla, kai an o bolepen hi, len hi i wawar railepen, har kolla, kai ap i phub hi.
O kham, les hi i wawar railepen har o tchon. Un o tchon, les hi i wawar railepen, har i bolepangre momlia. Un kek lendar dikell win har koi wawar.
Jaake hi ninna, te stenn i mule pre. Kowa, hoi an i phub tchiddo wella, ferdjala. Kowa, kai i mulendar pre stella, merell buder gar.
Kowa, hoi an i phub tchiddo wella, hi djungelo. Kowa, kai i mulendar pre stella, hi shukar. Kowa, hoi an i phub tchiddo wella, koles hi kek soor. Te stell lo i mulendar pre, djal kowa i bari sorjaha.

Kowa, hoi paskedo wella, his i mensho dran mass un rat. Kowa, kai i mulendar pre stella, hi i newo mensho, koles o Debleskro Ducho djido kras. Jaake har della o menshes dran mass un rat, - kowa merella -, jaake della ninna o newo menshes, koles o Debleskro Ducho djido kras. Kowa merella buder gar.
An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: O ersto mensho, o Adam, las o djipen. Un o Jesus Kristo, - koles nai kharams mer o duito mensho, - job hi i djido ducho, kai dell o djipen.
Ko djipen, hoi job della, well pal o djipen, hoi hi men kanna ap kai phub.
O ersto mensho was i phubjatar un dran tchik kerdo. O duito mensho, o Jesus Kristo, was dran o bolepen.
Jaake har ko phubjakro mensho, o Adam, his, jaake hi kolla, kai ap i phub hi. Jaake har ko bolepaskro mensho, o Jesus Kristo, hi, jaake hi kolla, kai an o bolepen hi.
Kanna dikah wi har kowa, kai was kerdo dran tchik. Te wah an o bolepen, dikah wi har kowa, kai was dran o bolepen.
Mire phrala, kowa penau me tumenge: Menshe dran mass un rat nai wenn gar an o bolepen. Witar gar well kowa, hoi mulo hi, kote, kai i djide hi.
Shunenn, me penau tumenge, hoi kek djinella: Mer merah gar lauter. Well i tsiro, koi lell men o Dewel win dran kowa, hoi mer kanna ham, un krell men wawartchandes.

Kowa well ap jek kopo, jaake sik, har kek nai dikella. Ap ko tsiro shunah mer i bashepaskri, kai jek dre phurdell. Te shunah mer koi bashepaskri, stenn i mule pre, un wenn djido. Un mer, kai gomme djiwah, wah win lino dran kowa, hoi mer kanna ham, un wawartchandes kerdo.
Hi jaake: I mule wenn djido. Un i djide hunte merenn buder gar.
Te hi ko tsiro koi, kai i mule djido wenna, un i djide buder gar merenna, palle well kowa tchatcho, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: O merepen nashras peskri soor. Lestar trashah mer buder gar.
Merepen, tiri soor hi krik! Merepen, tu dukreh kekes buder!
O merepen lell peskri soor dran o tchilatchepen, hoi o mensho krella. Hoi tchilatcho hi, djinah mer dran o Moseskre lila, kai tchindlo hi, har te djiwas.
Kanna parkrah men pash o Debleste. O merepen nashras peskri soor pral mende. Maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, his sorleder har o merepen, un las leskri soor krik.

Doleske, mire kamle phrala, atchenn soreles an o patsepen! Ma mukenn tumen kekestar o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell! Awenn hako tsiro o Debleske koi, un budrenn leske mishto! Tumer djinenna: Kai budi, hoi leske krenna, hi gar tchitcheske.
Kanna kamau te rakrell pral i lowe, hoi tumer khetne tchiwenn i patslenge. Krenn kowa jaake, har me les ninna penom kol patslenge an o them Galatia.
Hako kurko tchiwell hakeno tumendar jaake bud lowe ap i rig, har leske djala. Jaake hunte tchiwenn kol lowe gar khetne ap ko diwes, kai wau me pash tumende.

Te wom me pash tumende, rodenn tumenge murshen win, kai hi mishto an tumare jaka. Un me bitchrau len kol lowentsa an o foro Jerusalem, un dau len lila peha, hoi dre tchindlo hi, koneske kol lowe hi un konestar.
Te wals mishto, te djap me ninna koi, palle nai djan le mantsa.
Miro drom pash tumende djal pral o them Macedonia. Kote atchau gar, wau jaake sik har djala pash tumende.
Kamau i tsiro pash tumende te atchell. Te djala, ninna pral o wend. Te djau me dureder, palle wals shukar, te wenn tumer mantsa i tikno kotar drom.
Kau kopo kamau gar te wap pash tumende i tikno tsireske. Me kamoms te atchap i raha tsiro pash tumende, te kamell o Dewel kowa ninna.
Kate an o foro Efesus atchau, bis te well ko baro diwes, hoi kharella Pfingsta.
Kate nai budrau me mishto o Debleske, ninna te hi kate bud menshe, kai krenn mange miri budi phares.

Te well o Timoteo pash tumende, palle len les jaake mishto pre, te well les kek traash. Un te dikell kek ap leste tele! Job budrell ninna o Debleske har me. Te well lo pale pash mande, djan i kotar drom leha! Me un i phrala, kai pash mande hi, atchah kate jaake raha, bis te was lo pash mende pale.
Bud kope penom me ap maro phraleste Apollo, te well job kol wawar phralentsa pash tumende. Job kamell kowa kanna gar. Te well i mishto tsiro, well lo pash tumende.
Denn garda, te atchenn an o patsepen! Ma trashenn! Atchenn soreles!
Lauter, hoi tumer krenna, krenn dran o kamlepen o tselo djijestar!

Mire phrala, tumer prindjrenn o Stefano un kolla, kai an leskro kheer djiwenna. Jon hi kol patsle, kai glan i tsele wawarende an o them Achaja ap o Jesuseste patsan. Jon budrenna pengri tseli sorjaha i patslenge. Mangau tumen,
shunenn ap kolende un ap sawende har jon, kai budrenn o Debleske pengri tseli sorjaha!
Me hom bachtelo, kai was o Stefano, un o Fortunato, un o Achaiko pash mande. Tumer nai wan gar. Doleske hom bachtelo, te nai wan jon pash mande.
Jon kran miro dji soreles, jaake har jon ninna tumare djia soreles kran. Rikrenn tumen ap sawe menshende!

I tsele patsle an o them Achaja penenn tumenge latche laba. Ninna kol dui, o Akwila un i Priska, un kol wawar patsle, kai khetne wenna an lengro kheer, penenn bud latche laba ap tumende, kai han lengre phrala un phenja an o patsepen.
I tsele patsle penenn tumenge latche laba. Penenn tumenge latche laba, un taprenn tumen trujal, un denn tumen i tchum. Koleha sikrenn tumer, te han phrala un phenja an o patsepen.
Atchenn o Debleha! Kowa tchinau me, o Paulo, miro wasteha.
Koon o Jesuses, maro rajes, gar kamella, ap koleste well i bibacht! Maranatha!
O latchepen maro rajestar, o Jesusestar, djal tumentsa!
Me kamau tumen lauteren o djijestar. Mer ham jek an o Jesus Kristeste.

Kau liil tchinau me, o Paulo. Me hom o Jesus Kristeskro bitchepaskro, jaake har o Dewel kowa kamell. Un me un maro phraal, o Timotheo, mer tchinah kau liil ap i patslende, kai wenn khetne an o Debleskro lab an o foro Korint. Kau liil hi ninna i tsele Debleskre tchawenge an o them Achaja.
Mu well tumen latchepen un bacht an o dji! Kowa dell tumen o Dewel, maro dad, un maro rai, o Jesus Kristo!
Sharas o Debles, o dades maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar. Job hi i latcho dad, un les hi i baro dji menge, un mukell men gar kokres.

Ninna te well bud pharo koowa ap mende, hi lo pash mende un krell mare djia soreles, te penas mer kolenge latche laba, ap kolende ninna pharo koowa wella, te wenn jon pale soreles, jaake har kras o Dewel mare djia soreles.
Jaake har well bud pharo koowa ap mende o Jesus Kristeske, jaake dell lo men ninna bud soor an o dji.

Te well pharo koowa ap mende, well kowa, te wenn tumare djia soreles, un te lenn tumer o Debleskro djipen. Te kras o Dewel mare djia soreles, wenna ninna tumare djia soreles. Un tumer nai rikrenn kol duka win, hoi ap mende ninna hi.
Tumenge penah: Mer djinah un patsah, te well pharo koowa ap tumende, palle krell o Dewel ninna tumare djia soreles.
Mire phrala, tumer hunte djinenn, har hams an o them Asia, his maro djipen jaake pharo, te his men buder kek soor un patsam, mer hunte meras.
Maro merepen his glan mare jaka. Kau pharo koowa was ap mende, te dikas buder gar ap mende, na-a, te dikas ap o Debleste, kai krell i mulen djido.
Un job mukas men gar te merell, un krell kowa witar gar an ko tsiro, hoi glan mende hi. Awa, ap leste dikah, te lell lo men pale te pale win dran o merepen an ko tsiro, hoi gomme glan mende hi.
Ninna mangan tumer o Debles menge. Te mangenn bud menshe les menge, palle parkrenn pen ninna bud pash leste, te dikenn le o latchepen, hoi job men das.

Maro dji penell menge, mer djiwam maro djipen tchatches un djudjes, jaake har o Dewel kamella. Doleske nai sharah men. Mer rakram pral o Debleskro latchepen un penam tchi, hoi wella dran maro menshengro goswepen. Tumer djinenna, jaake djiwam gar kokres mank i wawar menshende, na-a, ninna pash tumende.

Ninna kowa, hoi tchinah tumenge an mare lila, nai haiwenn tumer jaake, har kowa tchindlo hi. Me patsau, te haiwenn tumer men budeder un feteder, ninna te haiwenn tumer kanna gomme gar lauter. Ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai Jesus pale, nai sharenn tumen mentsa, un mer nai sharah men tumentsa.
Kowa patsau soreles. Dran kowa his an miro dji, te wap dui kope pash tumende, te anap tumenge dui kope o Debleskro latchepen.
Ap miro drom an o them Macedonia kamom pash tumende te well. Un ninna te djau pale, kamom pash tumende te well. Palle nai dans tumer man kowa, hoi man hunte well djipaske ap o drom an o them Judea.
Kanna nai penans tumer, me hom i mursh, kai rikrell gar peskro lab, un hom jek har bud wawar, kai penenna Mer krah kowa, un krenn les gar.
O Dewel djinella: Kowa hoi mer penah, kowa krah ninna.
O Debleskro tchawo, o Jesus Kristo, kolestar o Silwano, o Timoteo un me tumenge penam, job rikras ninna peskre laba. Lauter hi tchatcho, hoi job penas.
Lauter, hoi mukas o Dewel glan i raha tsiro menge te penell, kowa kras o Jesus Kristo menge. Dran kowa penah mer Amen, te well o Dewel sharedo.
O Dewel krell men, ninna tumen lauteren, soreles an o patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste. Job rodas men peske win,
un das men peskro Ducho. Ko Ducho, hoi an mende hi, sikrell men, kai ham leskro. Doleske djinah, job dell men gomme bud bareder latcho koowa an ko tsiro, hoi wella.
Kanna penau tumenge, hoske djom gar pash tumende. Me kamom tumen gar pale te dukrell. Glan o Debleste penau tumenge kawa pash mo djipen.
Mer kamah te kras tumen bachtelo, un rodah gar koi pal, te was raja pral tumaro patsepen. Na-a, mer djinah: Tumer han soreles an o patsepen tardo.
Kamom gar, te well tumenge ropaske. Doleske wom buder gar pash tumende.
Me te krau, te well tumenge ropaske, palle hi mange kek koi, kai krell man pale bachtelo.
Doleske tchinom tumenge ko liil. Kamom gar, te rowap pral kolende, kai man bachteles hunte krans. Un me patsau soreles, te han tumer bachtele pral kowa, te nai krenna tumer man bachtelo.
Doleske tchinom tumenge ko liil bud ropaha un traash an miro dji. Kamom gar, te dukrap tumen. Na-a, me kamom, te dikenn tumer, kai kamau tumen o tselo djijestar.
Tumer djinenn, pash tumende hi jek, kai dukras tumen an o dji. Job dukras gar man. Na-a, job dukras bud tumendar. Me nai penau gar, te dukras job tumen halauteren.
Tumer dan les i phagi. Un kowa hi doha.
Kanna hunte bistrenn ko koowa, hoi job kras. Rakrenn latches leha, te well leske gar buder ropaske.
Me mangau tumen: Sikrenn leste, te kamenn les!
Ko liil tchinom tumenge ninna, te dikap, har shunenn ap mande an hako koowa.
Te bistrenn tumer o tchilatchepen, hoi o wawar ap tumende kras, palle bistrau me kowa ninna. Awa, te dals tchomone, hoi hunte bistroms me, palle bistrom me kowa tumenge. Kowa djinell o Jesus Kristo.
Me kamau gar te taprell men o beng. Mer djinah mishto, hoi koles hi an leskro shero.
Har wom me an o foro Troas, te penap kote o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, kras o Dewel i menshengre djia pre.
Miro phraal, o Tito, kamas ninna an kau foro te well. Har was lo gar, was man i daar, un me penom lenge: "Atchenn mo Debleha!" un djom mange an o them Macedonia.

Me parkrau man pash o Debleste, te dell lo men i soor, te djas ap o Jesuseskro drom. Khetne o Jesuseha ham hako tsiro sorleder har o tchilatchepen. Un kote, kai penah i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesusestar, hi kowa jaake, har te well i latcho sungepen pash bud menshende.

Te rakrah o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, hi o Dewel bachtelo pral kowa. Kowa hi leske har i shukar sungepen, hoi djal pash kolende, kai len o Debleskro djipen un ninna pash kolende, kai djan nashedo.

Kolenge, kai djan nashedo, hi kowa har i djungeli khand, hoi anell len an o merepen. Kolenge, kai len o Debleskro djipen, hi kowa i latcho sungepen, hoi anell len an o djipen. Kaja hi i bari budi. Koon nai krell kowa lauter mishto? Kek.

Bud rakepangre penenn o Debleskro lab, te lenn le i menshenge lowe lendar tele. Jaake ham mer gar. Mer penah o Debleskro lab tchitcheske. Kowa krah o Jesus Kristeske. Mare laba wenna o Deblestar. Un job shunell, hoi rakrah.

Tumer penans nai: Kanna sharenn le pen pale glan mende. Kowa krah mer gar. Witar gar hunte anas mer tumenge lila, kai dre tardo hi, har mishto mari budi hi. Wawar menshe krenn kowa, mer hunte kras kowa gar. Witar gar kamah tumendar, te tchinenn tumer menge sawe lila.
Tumer han o feteder liil menge, tchindlo an mare djia. Ap tumende nai dikenn i tsele menshe, har kram mer mari budi.

Dran mari budi wan tumer pash o Jesus Kristeste. Un kanna han har i liil, hoi wella o Jesus Kristestar. Kau liil tchinas o Ducho o djido Deblestar, un kek mensho. Kau liil was gar tchindlo ap i barra. Na-a. Kau liil was tchindlo an i menshengre djia, an tumare djia.
Mer patsah soreles, te krell o Dewel sawo liil dran tumende. Kau patsepen das men o Jesus Kristo.
Dran mari soor nai krams mer mari budi gar mishto. Kai budi krah mer dran o Debleskri soor. Un kowa, hoi haiwah, well o Deblestar.

Job kras dran mende peskre budepangre, te sikras mer i menshende o newo drom, kai o Dewel un i menshe mala wenna. Ap o phuro drom hunte rikrenn le pen ap i tchindle laba. Kol phure tchindle laba anenn i menshen an o merepen. Ap o newo drom lenn le o Debleskro Ducho, hoi dell len o djipen.

Kol phure tchindle laba, hoi anenn i menshen an o merepen, his tchindlo ap i barra. Har anas o Mose i menshenge kol barra, was leskro mui jaake railes, te dikan nai i Israelitarja gar ap leste. Jaake dikah, ninna ap o phuro drom was o Debleskro railepen diklo, ninna te djas ko railepen pal i tikno tsiro krik.
Kitse shukeder hi o newo drom, kai lenn le o Debleskro Ducho!
Kau newo drom, kai wenn i menshe tchatcho glan o Debleste, hi bud bud shukeder har ko phuro drom, kai djan i menshe nashedo, ninna te was kote i tikno kotar railepen diklo.
Tchatchepaha, o railepen ap o newo drom hi bud bud bareder har ko railepen ap o phuro drom.
Kowa djas krik pal i tikno tsiro. Har bud raileder hi kowa, hoi atchella!
Mer djinah soreles, te hi kowa jaake. Doleske hi men kek traash, te penas kowa jaake i menshenge.
Mer krah kowa gar har o Mose: Kowa tchiwas i diklo glan peskro mui, te dikenn kol Israelitarja gar, har leskro railepen krik djas.

Kolengre djia wan har bar. Ninna kau diwes haiwenn i bibolde gar, hoi an o Moseskre lila tchindlo hi pral o phuro drom, te shunenn le kol laba an i biboldengre kangria. Kowa hi jaake, har te well i diklo ap lengre jaka tchiddo, te dikenn le gar. O Jesus Kristo kokres nai lell ko diklo lengre jakendar tele.
Ninna kau diwes hi kowa jaake. Te shunenn le o Moseskre laba, hi ko diklo ap lengre djia, te haiwenn le len gar.
Ap ko diwes, kai mukenn i Israelitarja pengro drom un djan ap o Jesuseskro drom, lell job ko diklo lendar krik.
Maro rai Jesus un o Debleskro Ducho hi jek. Te djiwell o Debleskro Ducho an jekeste, hi ko mensho buder gar pandlo, un hunte djal buder gar ap o phuro drom.

Mer lauter, kai patslo ham, dikah o Debleskro railepen jaake mishto, har te dikah an i dikepaskri. Kek diklo hi ap mare jaka tchiddo. Un har mer dikah ap leste, wah mer bud un budeder jaake, har job hi. Kowa krell o Debleskro Ducho an mende.
O Debles hi i baro dji menge, un das men kai budi, te sikras i menshende leskro drom. Doleske wah gar khino, te kras kowa.

Djungelo koowa, hoi krenn i menshe tchorchanes, kowa krah mer gar. Mer chochah kek menshen un penah o Debleskro lab jaake har tchindlo hi, un gar wawartchandes. Jaake djiwah glan o Debleste un rakrah o tchatchepen, te haiwell nai hakeno, kowa, hoi penah, hi tchatcho.
Hi menshe koi, kai haiwenn gar, har latcho ko lab o Jesus Kristestar hi, hoi mer penah. Jon hi kolla, kai djan nashedo.

Jon patsenn gar ap leste. O beng, kai o rai hi pral kai phub, kras len korelo, te dikenn le gar, hawo latchepen well dran o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar. Ko lab sikrell men o Jesuseskro railepen. Un job hi jaake har o Dewel.
Lestar rakrah mer, un gar mendar. Mer penah i menshenge, o Jesus Kristo hi o rai. Un mer ham leskre budepangre un budrah tumenge.

An o phuro tsiro, kai his halauter kali rat, penas o Dewel, te well diwes. Un koi was diwes. Jaake kras lo ninna mare djia pre, te atchas gar tamlo an mare djia, te haiwas mer o Debleskro railepen. Kowa dikah, te dikah ap o Jesus Kristeste.
O latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar hi i baro brawlepen, hoi mer hidjah an mende. Mer kokres ham har tchare, hoi tchi moldo hi, jaake te dikell hakeno, koi bari soor well o Deblestar, un gar mendar.
Ninna te well haki rigatar pharo koowa ap mende, krell men kowa gar paash. Ninna te djinah bud kope gar, hoi te kras, dah mer gar pre.
Ninna te lenn le men palla, hi o Dewel pash mende. Ninna te witsrenn le men tele, stah pale pre.
Jaake har o Jesus hunte meras, merella ninna hako tsiro i kotar mendar. Kowa hi jaake, te well ninna leskro djipen ap mende diklo.
Hako tsiro ham mer glan o merepen tardo. Te merah, merah o Jesuseske, te well ninna o djipen diklo, hoi o Jesus men della, ninna te meras.
Jaake hi o merepen an mende, un o djipen an tumende.
Mer patsah ap o Jesus Kristeste. Doleske rakrah lestar. Jaake krah mer har ko mursh, kai tchinas an o Debleskre gilja: Me patsom o Debles. Doleske rakrom lestar.
Mer djinah, kowa, kai kras o Jesuses, maro rajes, i mulendar djido, kowa krell men ninna i mulendar djido. Un job anell men khetne tumentsa glan peste.
Kowa lauter, hoi lah ap mende, krah tumenge. Mer kamah, te well o Debleskro kamlepen pash bud menshende prindjedo, te parkrenn pen bud un budeder pash leste, un sharenn les.
Doleske wah mer gar khino, ninna te mukell men mari soor. Ko djipen, hoi o Dewel an mende das, well hako diwes pale newes.
Ko pharo koowa, hoi mer kanna hidjah, hi tikno un djal peske. Pal kowa well i baro railepen. Kowa hi shukeder har halauter, hoi kanna djinah, un djal peske gar.

Kau railepen hi menge. Mer dikah gar ap kowa, hoi i menshe nai dikenna. Na-a, mer dikah ap kowa, hoi kanna kek nai dikella. Kowa, hoi jon kanna dikenna, hi jek kopo buder gar koi. Kowa, hoi jon gar dikenna, kowa atchella hako tsireske.
Mer djinah, maro djipen ap kai phub atchell gar. Pal maro merepen lah i newo trupo. Ko newo trupo hi har i kheer, hoi kras o Dewel un kek mensho. Ko kheer atchell hako tsiro an o bolepen.
Kate ap kai phub hi menge ropaske, un mer kamah o tselo djijestar, te las ko newo bolepaskro trupo ap mende.
Kowa hi jaake, har te wals i ripen ap mende. Te lah ko newo trupo gar ap mende, palle wams mer nango koi tardo.
Jaake raha, har djiwah ap kai phub, hi menge ropaske un hi men duka. Mer kamah ko phuro trupo gar tele te tchiwell, kamah budeder ko newo trupo an-riwell, hoi buder gar merella.
O Dewel das men gole, te las ko newo djipen an o bolepen, un job das men peskro Ducho, te djinas, kowa well jaake.
Doleske atchell maro dji sorelo. Mer djinah: Jaake raha, har djiwah ap i phub, ham gar khere pash maro rajeste, o Jesuseste.
Mer djiwah dran o patsepen, un djiwah gomme gar an ko tsiro, kai dikah les.
Tchatchepaha, maro dji hi sorelo, un mer kamams, te mukas i phub, te was khere pash o Debleste.
Doleske kamah lauter te krell, te well job bachtelo pral mende kate ap kai phub, un ninna kote pash leste.

Ap ko diwes, kai rakrell o Jesus Kristo o tchatchepen pral mende win, hunte was mer halauter glan leste tardo. Un hakeno lell pal kowa, hoi job kras, har djiwas lo ap i phub: latcho koowa har tchilatcho koowa.
Mer djinah, har trashas maro rajestar. Doleske rakrah i menshenge an o dji, te patsenn le ap leste. O Dewel djinell, te djah mer o tchatcho drom. Kamoms, te djinenn an tumare djia kowa ninna.

Kowa penah gar, te sharas mer men pash tumende. Na-a, kowa penah, te nai sharenn tumen mentsa. Jaake djinenn tumer, hoi te penenn nai kol menshenge, kai dikenn ap kowa, hoi pash i menshende bud moldo hi. I djudjo dji hi lenge tchi moldo.
Te penell jek, mer ham narwelo, -mishto. Te ham narwelo, ham kowa o Debleske. Te ham gar narwelo un rakrah jaake, te haiwenn le men, palle hi kowa mishto tumenge.
O baro kamlepen, hoi o Jesus Kristo men das, bitchrell men pash i menshende. Un mer djinah, te meras jek menge, hi kowa jaake, har te merans le lauter.
O Jesus meras halauterenge. Un kanna hunte djiwenn kolla, kai lan leskro djipen, buder gar penge kokres. Na-a, jon hunte djiwenn koleske, kai meras lenge, un was o Deblestar djido kerdo.
Doleske dikah kanna buder gar jaake ap i mensheste har an o tsiro, har hams gomme gar patslo. Ninna prindjrah mer o Jesus Kristes kanna wawartchandes har an ko tsiro, har djiwas lo ap i phub.
Kanna djinah: Koon o Jesus Kristeha djiwella, kowa hi i newo mensho, un djiwell buder gar peskro phuro djipen. I newo koowa was an leskro djipen.

Kowa lauter well o Deblestar. Job bitchras o Jesus Kristes menge an o merepen, te lell lo kowa krik, hoi his tardo mank mende un o Debleste, te nai was mer kanna pash leste. Un mende das lo koi budi, te penas i menshenge, te nai wenn le pash leste.

O Dewel his an peskro tchaweste, o Jesus Kristeste, un kras, te nai wenn i menshe leha khetne. Lengri doosh las lo lendar krik. Jaake was kowa krik lino, hoi his mank lende un o Debleste tardo. Mende das lo kai budi, te penas kal latche laba i menshenge.

Jaake ham mer o Debleskre bitchepangre. Men hi o Jesus Kristeskro tchatcho wast. Doleske mangah i menshendar, te wenn le pash leste. Un kowa hi jaake, har te dell len o Jesus Kristo gole: "Awenn pash o Debleste! Awenn leskre mala!"
O Dewel tchiwas mari tseli doosh ap maro rajeste, o Jesus Kristeste, kai job kek tchilatchepen kras, te was mer tchatcho un erligo glan o Debleskre jaka.
Mer ham o Debleskre budepangre. Doleske penah tumenge: Ma witsrenn gar o Debleskro latchepen an i tchik!

O Dewel penell an peskro lab: "Ap o tchatcho tsiro shunau tut, ap ko diwes lau tut dran o tchilatchepen win un dau tut o newo djipen." Shunenn, kanna hi o tchatcho tsiro kai! Kanna lell lo tumen dran o tchilatchepen win!
Kowa hi ap miro dji, te djiwas jaake, te hatsell kek i doosh ap mende, te rakrell nai kek djungeles pral mari budi.

Mer kamah, te dikenn le hako tsiro ap mende, kai ham o Debleskre budepangre. Doleske dah gar pre, ninna te well bud pharo koowa ap mende. Ninna te hi men gar doha djipaske, te well i daar ap mende, rikrah win.
Ninna te denn le men dawa, te witsrenn le men an o stilepen, te lenn le men palla, dah mer gar pre. Mer marah men tele, un della diwessa, kai sowah gar un chah gar.

Maro djipen sikrella, te ham o Debleskre budepangre. Mer djiwah i djudjo djipen un djinah, hoi o Dewel kamella. Mer wah gar khino an mare djia, ham kamlo, un krah, hoi o Debleskro Ducho menge penella. Un an maro kamlepen hi kek chochepen.

Mer penah i menshenge o Debleskro tchatchepen un rakrah dran leskri soor. Kowa, hoi krah un rakrah, hi tchatcho. Jaake hi maro djipen un maro rakepen har i charo, koleha i kurepaskro kurell pes peskro rajeske.

Hi menshe koi, kai sharenn men, un wawar, kai praassenn men. Hi menshe, kai rakrenn djungeles pral mende, un wawar, kai rakrenn kamles pral mende. Ko jek penell: "Chochene!" ap mende, kol wawar djinenn, mer penah o tchatchepen.
Pash jekeste ham prindjedo, pash i wawarende ham gar prindjedo. Ninna te hi o merepen glan mare jaka, ham gomme djido. Mer lam dawa un meram gar.
Menge hi ropaske, un mer nai sah. Mer ham tchorwelo, un krah i wawaren brawelo. Men hi tchi ap kai phub, un lauter hi menge.
Mire phrala an o foro Korint, mer penam tumenge lauter jaake, har kowa hi. Mer kram mare djia dur pre tumenge.
Maro kamlepen tumenge hi gar tikno. Tumaro kamlepen menge was tikno.
Me rakrau tumentsa har i dad peskre tchawentsa. Krenn tumer ninna tumare djia menge pre!

Ma tchiwenn tumen khetne kolentsa, kai patsenn gar ap o Jesus Kristeste. Kolla, kai djiwenn an o tchatchepen un kolla, kai djiwenn gar an o tchatchepen, nai djiwenn gar khetne. O diwes un i rati nai wenn gar khetne. Jaake nai well o latchepen un o tchilatchepen witar gar khetne.
Hoi hi o Jesus Kristes i bengeha khetne? Tchi! Nai wenn i patslen jek dji un jek djipen kolentsa, kai patsenn gar? Na-a!

An o Debleskro baro kheer well o djido Dewel kokres sharedo un kek wawar koowa. Mer halauter ham o djido Debleskro baro kheer. O Dewel penas: Me kamau te djiwap pash lende un mashkral lende. Me kamau lengro Dewel te well, un jon hi mire menshe.
Doleske penell o Dewel: Djan kolendar krik, kai sharenn wawar koowa! Ma awenn lentsa khetne! Lenn tchi an tumare wasta, hoi hi pale-tchiddo glan mire jaka! Palle lau tumen kamles pash mande pre.
Un me kamau tumaro dad te well, un tumer han mire tchawe un mire tcha. Kowa penell o baro Dewel, kai hi o rai pral o bolepen un i phub.

Mire phrala, kol latche labentsa penas o Dewel, hoi kamell lo menge te krell. Doleske mukas mer kol tselo djungelo koowa, un kras mare djia djudjo, te djiwas latches un tchatches glan o Debleste, jaake har job mendar kamella.
Krenn tumare djia menge pre! Mer kram kekes i tchilatcho koowa un dukram kekes, un chocham kek menshes.
Me penau kowa gar, te anap i doosh ap tumende. Na-a, me penom tumenge, men hi i baro dji tumenge. Mer ham tumentsa khetne an o djipen un an o merepen.
Me patsau ap tumende. Un me sharau man tumentsa. Ninna te well bud pharo koowa ap mende, hi miro dji sorelo un man hi i bari bacht an mande pral tumende.
Har wam an o them Macedonia, was haki rigatar pharo koowa ap mende. His menshe koi, kai tchingran pen mentsa. Un men his i bari daar. Jaake lam kek newi soor.
Kolen buder kek soor hi, kolen dell o Dewel newi soor. Un job das men newi soor an o dji, har was o Tito pash mende.

Gar kokres, kai job was, kras men sorelo. Na-a, mer lam budeder soor, har shunam, hawe latche laba tumer leske penan. Job penas menge, te kamenn tumer man o tselo djijestar pale te dikell. Job penas ninna, har tumer rowan un lauter krenn, te wenn mange ap i rig. Har shunom kowa lauter, wom gomme bachtleder.
Tumenge his ropaske pral ko liil, hoi tumenge tchinom. Kowa khaitas man. Kanna khaitell man gar, te tchinom o liil, ninna te his tumenge i tikno tsiro ropaske pral ko liil.

Kanna hom bachtelo, gar pral kowa, kai his tumenge ropaske. Na-a, hom bachtelo, te anas tumen koi duk pral ko tchilatcho koowa pale ap o tchatcho drom. Har his tumenge ropaske pral tumari doosh, dikas o Dewel latches ap tumende. Doleske his ko liil, hoi tchinom, tumenge mishto.

Te hi jekes ropaske pral peskri doosh, un o Dewel dikell latches ap leste, anell les kowa ap o Debleskro drom, un o Dewel dell les o djipen. Un kowa khaitell kekes. Te hi jekes ropaske pral i phubjakro koowa anell les kowa an o merepen.

Tumenge his ropaske pral ko koowa, hoi mank tumende djas, un o Dewel dikas latches ap tumende. Kanna dikenn, hawo latcho koowa dran kowa was: Tumer kamenn lauter mishto te krell, un kamenn te sikrell, te hi tumen kek doosh. Tumer wan chojedo pral koleste, kai ko koowa kras. Un tumen his daar miri choljatar. O tselo djijestar kaman tumer kowa te krell, hoi mishto hi an mire jaka. Doleske dan tumer koles i phagi, kai doosh ap leste his. Jaake sikran, kai his tumen kek doosh pral ko koowa.

Tchatchepaha, har tchinom tumenge ko liil, krom kowa gar koleske, kai kras ko tchilatcho koowa. Witar gar tchinom ko liil koleske, ap koleste ko wawar o tchilatcho koowa kras. Na-a, me tchinom ko liil, te sikrenn tumer o Debleste, kai kamenn tumer lauter te krell, hoi me tumenge penom.

Un kowa kran tumer. Un doleske was newi soor an mare djia. Awa, mare djia wan pale soreles un mari bacht was gomme bareder, har dikam, har bachtelo o Tito his, har was lo tumendar pale. Tumer lauter kran leskro dji soreles.

O Tito dikas ko latcho koowa, hoi leske tumendar penom, kowa his kek chochepen. Jaake har lauter tchatcho hi, hoi tumentsa rakram, jaake hi ninna ko tselo latchepen tchatcho, hoi leske penom tumendar.
Kanna hi leskro kamlepen gomme bareder tumenge. Job dikas tumari traash har tumer les pre lan, ninna dikas lo, kai kran tumer lauter, hoi me tumenge penom.
Me hom bachtelo, te krenn tumer lauter, hoi me tumenge penom.
Mire phrala, mer kamah tumenge te penell, hawo latchepen o Dewel kote kras, kai i patsle an o them Macedonia khetne wenna.
Ninna te was bud pharo koowa ap lende, his le bachtelo an pengre djia. Lengri bacht his jaake baro, te dan le bud lowe i wawar patslenge, ninna te djiwan le an baro tchorwlepen.
Kowa hi tchatcho, hoi penau: Jon dan jaake bud har djala, ninna budeder. Kowa kran jon pendar o tselo djijestar.
Jon mangan men o tselo djijeha, te mukas mer len latcho koowa te krell i patslenge an o foro Jerusalem.
Kowa, hoi jon kran, his budeder har mer patsam. Jon tchiwan pen an o wast o Jesusestar, maro rajestar, un pal kowa an mare wasta, jaake har o Dewel kowa kamas.

Har kowa dikam, mangam mer maro phrales, o Tites, te djal lo pale pash tumende, te lell lo kol lowe, hoi tumer khetne tchiwan, jaake har job kowa ninna glan i tsiro kras. Jaake well kai latchi budi kanna lauter kerdo.

Tumer han brawelo an hako koowa: tumaro patsepen hi baro; tumer haiwenn har te penenn o Debleskro lab un djinenn bud pral o Debleste; tumer krenn i bari budi o Debleske. Un o kamlepen, hoi ap mende dikan, was ninna bares an tumende. Doleske kamah, te sikrenn tumaro baro dji ninna an kau koowa un tchiwenn jaake bud lowe khetne har djala i wawar patslenge.
Kowa mangau tumen. Me penau gar, te hunte krenn les. Te dikau, hawo latcho koowa i wawar patsle an o them Macedonia kran, jaake kamau te dikap, te well tumaro kamlepen dran o dji.
Tumer djinenn, har latcho maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, ap tumende his. Job his brawelo, un was tumenge tchorwelo. Kowa was lo, te wenn tumer brawelo.
Me patsau, kowa hi mishto tumenge, te tchiwenn tumer lowe pale khetne, jaake har kran kowa glan jek bersh.
Kanna krenn pale, hoi tumenge an o shero his, un denn jaake bud lowe har nai denna.
Te dell jek o djijestar jaake bud har nai dell lo, dikell o Dewel latches ap leste. Job kamell gar, te dell lo budeder, har les hi.
Tumer hunte denn gar jaake bud, te djiwenn i wawar i shukar djipen un tumer bokenna. Na-a, lauteren te well doha djipaske!
Kau diwes hi tumen bud, un tumer nai denna kol wawaren tchomone. I wawar kopo, kai hi kolen budeder, nai denn jon tumen tchomone. Jaake hi lauteren doha.
Kowa hi jaake har an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: Koon bud ap i rig tchiwas, koles his gar budeder, har les hunte was chapaske. Un koon gar bud ap i rig tchiwas, koles his doha chapaske.
Me parkrau man pash o Debleste, te das job maro phrales, o Tites, i baro dji tumenge.
Har mangam o Titestar te djal lo pash tumende, kamas lo kowa o tselo djijestar te krell, un was pestar pash tumende.
Khetne leha bitchram i wawar phrales. Kowa haiwell mishto o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar te penell. Dran kowa hi lo an-diklo an hake gaba un forja, kai i patsle khetne wenna.

Un kowa hi gar lauter! I patsle rodan les win, te djal lo mentsa khetne ap maro drom pash kol patslende, kolen mer kol lowe anah. Kowa krah, te well o Dewel sharedo, un te dikenn kol patsle kote maro kamlepen, hoi men lenge hi.
Te djal ko phraal mentsa, nai rakrell kek djungeles pral mende, har nai wals kowa, te anams kol bud lowe kokres.
Mer dikas, te well lauter tchatches kerdo, gar kokres glan o Debleste, ninna glan i menshende.

Khetne kol dujentsa bitchram i wawar phrales pash tumende. Kowa sikras bud kope, har mishto job o Debleskri budi kras. Kanna kamas lo o tselo djijestar pash tumende te djal. Jaake bud rikrell job tumendar.

O Tito hi miro maal un budrell mantsa tumenge. Kol wawar phrala wan kol patslendar bitchedo, kai an wawar gaba un forja khetne wenna. Kal dui phrala hi mursha, kai krenn o Debleske kek ladj, na-a, jon budrenn jaake, te well o Jesus Kristo sharedo.
Lenn len pre an o tselo kamlepen, te dikenn i tsele patsle, kai khetne wenna, kai mer sharam tumen gar tchitcheske glan lende.
Pral ko latchepen, hoi mer hunte kras i patslenge, hunte tchinap tumenge gar.

Me djinau, tumer kamenn o tselo djijestar kol patslenge an o foro Jerusalem lowe khetne te tchiwell. Dran kowa sharom tumen pash kolende an o them Macedonia un penom: "Glan jek bersh lan kol phrala an o them Achaja lowe khetne." Har jon kowa shunan, kaman bud lendar jaake te krell, har tumer kran.
Kanna bitchrau mare phralen pash tumende, te well tchatcho, hoi tumendar sharom an kau koowa, un te well lauter jaake kerdo, har tumendar penom.
Palle, ap ko diwes, kai wenn kolla dran o them Macedonia mantsa khetne pash tumende, hatsenn le lauter jaake har penom. Te hatsans le kowa gar jaake, hawi ladj wals kowa mange un tumenge ninna!

Doleske mangom kol phralen, te djan jon glan mende, un lenn kol lowe, hoi tumer khetne tchiwan. Jaake hunte tchiwenn tumer gar kol lowe sik khetne ap ko diwes, kai mer wah. Un kol lowe, hoi tumer denn, well o djijestar, un gar dran o boklepen.
Kowa hi jaake har pash i hacho: Koon tchiwell gar bud djob an i phub, kowa lell witar gar bud dran i phub win. Un koon tchiwell bud an i phub, kowa lell bud dran i phub win.

Hakeno hunte dell jaake bud lowe, har leskro dji leske penella. Les hunte khaitell kowa gar, hoi job das! Job dell kowa pestar un gar, har te kaman le les lestar. O Dewel kamell kol menshen, kai denn o djijestar.
O Dewel nai dell tumen jaake bud, kai hi tumen hako tsiro doha halauterestar, jaake te nai denn tumer i wawaren tchomone.
Palle rakrenn le tumendar, har an o Debleskro lab tardo hi: Job das bud i tchorwelende. Ko latchepen, hoi job kras, atchella hako tsiro.
O Dewel, kai dell o haches i djob, ninna o maro chapaske, kowa dell tumen ninna, un krell budeder dran kowa, hoi tumen hi, jaake te well bud latchepen dran kowa, hoi tumer krenna.
Job dell tumen jaake bud, te nai denn ninna kolen, kai len tchi hi. Te lenn jon kowa, hoi mer anah lenge, palle parkrenn pen bud menshe pash o Debleste.
Kowa, hoi kran tumer i tchorwele patslenge, hi lenge mishto. Un kowa hi gar lauter. Jon parkrenn pen pash o Debleste. Te parkrenn pen bud menshe pash o Debleste, hi kowa ninna bud moldo.
Koleske, hoi tumer lenge latches kran, sharenn le o Debles. Jon dikenn, kai shunenn tumer ap o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, un kai hi jon, ninna i tsele wawar patsle, tumenge phrala un phenja.
Te dikenn le, har baro o Debleskro latchepen mank tumende hi, mangenn le o Debles tumenge un kamenn tumentsa khetne te well.
Parkras men pash o Debleste! Job das men peskro baro kamlepen, kai hi jaake baro, te nai rakrah les gar win.

Me, o Paulo, rakrau tumentsa kamles un latches, jaake har o Jesus Kristo kamles un latches hi. Hi menshe mank tumende, kai penenna: "Me te hom pash tumende, nai rakrau kek triin laba. Te hom dur tumendar krik, palle rakrau sorele labentsa."
Me mangau tumen: Ma krenn, te sikrap tumen, har sorelo hom, te wau pash tumende! Man hi kek daar te rakrap soreles kolentsa, kai penenn mendar, te krams mer o Debleskri budi dran mari soor.
Ninna te ham menshe, krah gar o Debleskri budi dran mari soor.

An maro budi o Debleske lah mer kek charo an o wast, har i menshe ap kai phub krenna. Na-a, o Dewel dell men i soor, te nai rakras jaake kol menshentsa, kai chocheno koowa pral leste patsenna, te dikenn le, kai kowa, hoi jon jaake raha patsan, tchi moldo hi.
Te penenn jon, te dals kek Dewel, sikrah mer, kai lengre pre-phurde laba gar tchatcho hi. Halauter, hoi lenge an o shero trujal djal un hadell pes pral o Jesus Kristeste pre, dah mer paash.
Te dikah mer, kai tumer shunenn mishto ap lauter, hoi mer tumenge penam, palle rikrah men gar pale, te das lauter kolen i phagi, kai kamenn gar te shunell.
Haiwenn, har kowa hi! Jek, kai penell: O Jesus Kristo hi leskro rai, kowa hunte dikell ninna, te hi o Jesus Kristo ninna miro rai.

Me nai penoms gomme budeder mandar, te das man maro rai Jesus peskro tchatcho wast. Te penoms me kowa, wals kowa tchatcho. Job das man peskro tchatcho wast, te krap tumen soreles an o patsepen, gar te krap tumen paash.
Kowa penau tumenge, te dikenn tumer: Me kamom tumenge kek traash te krell mire lilentsa.
Hi menshe mank tumende, kai penenna: An peskre lila rakrell job bare laba, un hi sorelo. Te hi job pash mende, hi job tikno, un an leskro rakepen hi kek soor.
Koon jaake rakrella, koleske penau me: Har mer an mare lila ham, kai ham dur krik tumendar, jaake ham mer ninna, te wam pash tumende.

Mer krah men gar jaake bares, te penas, mer ham har kolla, kai penenn pendar, har mishto jon hi. Jon krenn pengro tchatchepen kokres win un patsenn, kowa, hoi jon krenna, hi mishto. Doleske haiwenn jon tchi.
Mer kamah men gar jaake bud sharell. Kokres pral koi budi, hoi das men o Dewel, sharah mer men. Un mari budi anas men pash tumende.
Te wams gar pash tumende, palle wals maro sharepen gar tchatcho. Kanna hi wawartchandes: Mer wam tchatchepaha pash tumende un penam tumenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar.

Jaake nai sharah men mer pral i budi, hoi mer kram, un gar pral kowa, hoi i wawar kran. An maro dji djinah, ap ko tsiro, kai was o patsepen an tumende baro, sharenn le men ninna pral kowa, hoi mer mank tumende kram.

Mer kamah te penas o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar ninna kolenge, kai djiwenn an wawar themma, un gar kote, kai rakran i wawar o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar. Mer kamah men gar te sharell pral kowa, hoi i wawar kran.
Koon kamell pes te sharell, kowa hunte sharell kowa, hoi o Jesus Kristo kras.
Kowa mensho kras peskri budi mishto, kones maro rai Jesus sharell. Un gar kowa kras peskri budi mishto, kai pes kokres sharell.
Mukenn man jek kopo jaake te rakrap, har te woms dinelo! Shunenn, hoi kamau tumenge te penell!

Jaake har o Dewel kamell, kamau me ninna o tselo djijestar, te djan tumer gar o Jesus Kristestar krik. Tumer han mange har i tchai, kai dom jek mursheste, te well li leskri pirni. Ko jek mursh hi o Jesus Kristo. Kamau te anap leske i djudji tarni djuwel ap ko diwes, kai romedinerell lo lat.

Me darau, te was wawar koowa an tumaro shero, un tumer djiwenn buder gar djudjes un kokres o Jesus Kristeske. Me darau, te djas tumenge har i Evake, har o gosewo sap chochas lat, un joi mukas o tchatcho drom.

Hi jaake: Te well jek pash tumende un sikrell tumen i wawar drom, har ko drom, hoi mer tumende sikram, palle nashenn tumer leske palla. Te rakrell lo pral i wawar Jesus un i wawar Debleskro Ducho, har kowa, hoi an tumende was, palle shunenn tumer mishto ap ko chocheno mursheste.
Me djinau, me molau ninna jaake bud har kol bare rakepangre pash tumende, kai penenn, te hi le bitchedo o Jesus Kristestar.
Ninna te nai rakrau gar jaake mishto har kol wawar, djinau ninna jaake bud har jon. Kowa nai dikan tumer hako kopo, kai rakrom, un an hako koowa, hoi krom.
Krom man me baro, har lom kek lowe tumendar, har penom tumenge o Debleskro latcho lab? Lom me doleske i doosh ap mande? Na-a, me krom tumen baro.
Kote, kai wawar patsle khetne wenna, lom lowe lendar un djiwom dran lengri possita, te nai budrom pash tumende.

Har me pash tumende homs, un mange his gar doha djipaske, mangom kekestar tumendar tchomone. I patsle phrala, kai wan dran o them Macedonia, anan mange jaake bud, te nai djiwom pash tumende. Jaake perom kekeske tumendar ap i possita. Un jaake kamau kowa ninna te krell an ko tsiro, hoi wella.
An kau koowa sharenn man i menshe. Un pash o Jesus Kristeskro tchatchepen, hoi an mande hi, penau tumenge: Kek mensho an ko tselo them Achaja lell kau sharepen mandar krik!
Hoske penau me kowa jaake? Hi man kek kamlepen tumenge? O Dewel djinella, kai kamau tumen o djijestar.
Te lau tchi tumendar an ko tsiro hoi wella, palle doleske, te wap gar har kolla, kai lenn tumendar lowe. Kamau gar, te nai sharenn le pen un penenn: Jon hi jaake har mer.
Tchatchepaha, jon wan gar o Jesus Kristestar bitchedo. Jon hi chochene, un krenn, har te bitchrals len o Jesus Kristo.
Pral kolende hunte krenn tumer kek bare jaka. Ninna o beng krell jaake, har te wals job o Debleskro bolepaskro.
Doleske hunte kras mer kek bare jaka, te krenn ninna leskre budepangre har te wans jon o Debleskre budepangre. Jon len pengri phagi o Deblestar.
Me penau pale: Kamau gar, te penell jek, me hom dinelo. Un ninna te patsenn tumer, te hom dinelo, palle mangau tumen: Lenn man pre har i dineles, te sharap man me nai ninna i tikno kotar!
Me te sharau man kanna, palle wenn mire laba gar maro rajestar, o Jesusestar. Na-a, me rakrau kanna jaake, har te woms me dinelo.
Bud menshe hi koi, kai sharenn pen pral kowa, hoi jon krenna. Doleske kamau me kowa kanna ninna te krell.
Tumer patsenn, te han gosewo, un nashenn hako dineleske palla!

Te hadell jek pes pral tumende, krenn tumer, hoi job penell. Te kamell job tumare lowe te lell, un kamell tumen ap peste te pandell, un ninna job te dukrell tumen, un dell tumen an o mui, mukenn tumer kowa tumentsa te krell.
Me ladjau man te penap: Kowa nai anoms me gar pral o dji! Kanna rakrau tchatchepaha har i dinelo: Te patsell jek, te nai krell lo pes baro, palle nai krau man me ninna baro.
Jon hi Hebrearja. Me hom ninna jek. Jon hi bibolde. Me hom ninna jek. Jon wenna pal o Abraham. Me ninna.

Jon penenn, te hi le o Jesus Kristeskre budepangre. Kanna rakrau har i dinelo: Me hom budeder har jon leskro budepaskro. Me budrom budeder. Me wom budeder stildo. Me lom budeder dawa. Man his budeder o merepen glan i jaka har jon.
I biboldendar lom me pantch kope triin-deesh-te-enja (39) dawa i tchupnijaha.

Triin kope lom dawa i kashteha. Jek kopo witsran le barentsa ap mande, te denn le man mulo. Triin kope djas o panjeskro ulepaskro tele, ap hoi me homs, un jek diwes un jek rati homs ap i kasht tchiddo an o baro pani.

Ap miro drom an bud wawar forja un themma his bud kope o merepen glan mire jaka. Me nai tassoms an i diwje panja, un kol tchorepangre nai dans man mulo. Un i bibolde, un ninna kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, kolla lan man palla. An o mulo them un an o baro pani, kai homs, his o merepen glan mire jaka, un ninna, har homs mank kol phralende, kai hi kek tchatche phrala.
Me marom man tele un man his bud budi. Bud kope sowom gar. Man his trush un bok. Bud kope chom tchi. Mange his shila un man his tchi an-ripaske.
Me nai penoms gomme budeder: Hako diwes well newo koowa ap mande. Un miro dji dukella, te djinau gar, har kowa kote hi, kai i patsle khetne wenna.
Te hi jek gar sorelo, hom me witar gar sorelo. Te perell jek o Debleskro dromestar tele, hi man bari duk an o dji.
Me te sharap man, palle kamau te sharap man koleha, te hom gar sorelo.
O Dewel, ko dad o Jesusestar, maro rajestar, djinella, kai penau o tchatchepen. Les sharas mer hako tsiro.
An ko tsiro, har me an o foro Damaskus homs, his kote i moskero, koles tchiwas o baro rai Aretas an peskri budi. Ko moskero tchiwas klisten glan ko foro pash kol bare wudja, te taprenn le man.
Trul o foro his i bari barengri baar. Un i patsle tchiwan man an i korba un mukan man dran i wochni, hoi an koi barengri baar dren hi, tele ap i phub. Jaake nai tapran jon man gar.
Tumer kamenn, te sharap man, ninna te molell kowa tchi. Jaake kamau te rakrap pral o bolepaskro koowa, hoi o Jesus Kristo i menshes mukell te dikell.

Me prindjrau i menshes, kai djiwell o Jesus Kristeha. Kowa was glan deesh-te-star bersha an o triinto bolepen dre anlo. His lo tchatchepaha koi pral? Me djinau les gar. Dikas lo kowa an i suni? Me djinau les gar. Kowa djinell o Dewel kokres.

Me djinau, ko mensho was hadedo an o Debleskri shukar baar, un shunas sawe shukar laba, hoi nai penell kek mensho. His lo tchatchepaha koi pral? Me djinau les gar. Dikas lo kowa an i suni. Me djinau les gar. O Dewel djinell kowa.
Ko menshes sharau me. Me sharau man gar. Te sharau man, sharau kowa, hoi sikrella, kai hi man kek soor.

Ninna te sharoms me man, rakroms kek dinelo koowa. Kowa, hoi penoms, wals o tchatchepen. Kamau gar, te rikrenn i menshe budeder mandar har kowa, hoi dikenn le un shunenn le mandar. Doleske sharau me man gar.

O Dewel kamella, te wap gar pre-phurdo pral ko baro bolepaskro koowa, hoi mukas lo man te dikell. Doleske mukas o Dewel tchomone ap mande te well, hoi dukrell man har i subjengro kasht an miro mass. Kowa hi har te dals man i bengeskro kurepaskro dawa, te wap gar pre-phurdo.
Triin kope mangom me o Jesusestar, maro rajestar, te well kowa mandar krik lino.

Un job penas ap mande: "Muk tuke miro latchepen doha te well! Miri soor hi bari an kolende, kai gar sorelo hi." Un me, o Paulo, penau tumenge: Doleske kamau man me te sharell, kai hi man kek soor. Jaake nai dikell hakeno, o Jesus Kristo peskri sorjaha hi pash mande.

Doleske hom gar bibachtelo, te hi man kek soor, te lau dawa, te well pharo koowa ap mande, te lenn jon man palla, te well i traash ap mande. Me djinau, te hi man kek soor, palle dell man o Jesus Kristo soor.

Tumer kran, te rakrom har i dinelo. Me hunte sharoms man gar. Na-a, tumer hunte sharans man. Ninna te woms me tchi, woms me jaake bud moldo har kol bare rakepangre pash tumende, kai penenn, te hi le bitchedo o Jesus Kristestar.
Har homs pash tumende, nai dikan tumer, kai o Jesus Kristo bitchras man. Me budrom mank tumende, un dom gar pre. Me krom baro koowa an o Debleskri soor, jaake te kran i menshe bare jaka.

Me krom tumenge jaake bud, har krom ninna i wawar patslenge, kai an wawar forja khetne wenna. Jek koowa hi wawartchandes: Tumendar lom kek lowe. Te his kowa i doosh, mangau tumendar, bistrenn koi doosh!

Me wau kanna o triinto kopo pash tumende. Ninna kau kopo kamau tchi tumendar te lell. Me kamau tumen un gar tumare lowe. O dad un i dai denn pengre tchawen te chal, un gar i tchawe pengro dades un pengri dat.
Tumenge doms me lauter, hoi man hi, ninna miro djipen. Miro dji hi baro tumenge. Hi tumen doleske kek kamlepen mange?
Tumer djinenna, me djiwom gar dran tumari possita. Kanna penenn mange: Taprom tumen un chochom tumen? Na-a!
Kolla, kai pash tumende bitchrom, tchoran kolla tumare lowe? Na-a!

Me mangom o Tites, te djal lo pash tumende, un bitchrom i wawar phrales leha. Nai penenn tumer, kai o Tito tumendar tchomone tchoras? Na-a! O Tites hi o emligo baro dji tumenge har man. Mer dui djah ninna ko emligo drom.

Patsenn tumer, te rodah mer maro tchatchepen glan tumende? Kowa hi gar jaake. Mer djiwah o Jesus Kristeha un djinah, o Dewel shunell, hoi mer rakrah. Mire phrala un phenja, mer rakrah jaake, te well tumaro patsepen soreles.

Me trashau, te wau pash tumende, dikau sawo koowa pash tumende, hoi kamau gar. Palle hom me witar gar jaake har tumer kamenna. Me trashau te dikau tchingepen mank tumende, ninna silwepen, choli, praassepen, djungelo rakepen pral o wawareste, pre-phurdepen, bi-pandlo djipen, un jek kamell feteder te well har o wawar.

Me trashau te ladjap man tumenge glan o Debleste ap ko diwes, kai wau pale pash tumende, un te well mange ropaske pral budende, kai kamenn pengro phuro djipen gar pre te dell, un djiwenn an djungelo un wi-ladjedo koowa un luberenn trujal jaake har kran le an ko tsiro, har jon gomme gar patslo his.
Kowa hi o triinto kopo, kai wau pash tumende. Ma bistrenn, hoi tchindlo hi: Te kamell jek i doosh ap i wawareste pre te tchiwell, hunte wenn dui, triin koi pashal, kai penenn win, hoi jon djinenna.
Te wau kau kopo, rikrau man gar pale, te dap kolen i phagi, kai kran tchilatcho koowa. Kowa penom, har homs o duito kopo pash tumende, un kanna, kai hom dur tumendar krik, penau les pale tumenge.
Palle dikenn tumer mishto, te was miro rakepen o Jesus Kristestar. Job hi sorelo pash tumende, un sikrell tumen peskri bari soor.

Har job ap o trushel dino was, his job gar sorelo. Kanna djiwell job dran o Debleskri soor. Jaake har o Jesus Kristo ap o trushel gar sorelo his, ham mer witar gar sorelo. Un jaake har job djido was, ham mer leha ninna djido un sorelo dran o Debleskri soor. Kowa nai dikenn, te hom pash tumende!

Dikenn ap tumende, har tumer an o patsepen tardo han! Hi tumaro patsepen tchatcho? Djiwell o Jesus Kristo mank tumende? Te haiwenn tumer gar, te hi lo mank tumende, palle hi tumaro patsepen tchi moldo.
Me kamoms, te dikenn tumer, kai mari budi o Debleske mishto hi.

Mer mangah o Deblestar, te krenn tumer kek tchilatcho koowa. Kowa mangah lestar gar, te sikras, har mishto mari budi kram. Na-a, mer kamah, te krenn tumer o latchepen, ninna te well mendar penlo, kai mari budi tchi moldo hi.
Mer nai krah kokres sawo koowa, hoi krell, te well o Debleskro tchatchepen diklo un shunlo. Un mer nai krah tchi, hoi rikrell o tchatchepen pale.
Ninna te ham mer gar sorelo, ham bachtelo, te han tumer sorelo. Mer kamah, te wenn tumer an o tchatchepen glan o Debleste tardo, un kowa mangah lestar.

Kawa tchinau me tumenge kanna, kai hom dur krik tumendar. Te wau pash tumende, kamau gar te tchingrell tumentsa i sorjaha, hoi das man maro rai Jesus. Kai soor das lo man, te krap tumen soreles, gar te krap tumen paash.

Kanna, mire phrala, awenn bachteles, un awenn pale pale ap o tchatcho drom! Shunenn ap kol laba, hoi me tumenge penom. Rikrenn khetne un tchingrenn tumen gar! Un o Dewel, kai dell kamlepen un bacht an o dji, well tumentsa!
Taprenn tumen trujal, un denn tumen i tchum! Kowa sikrella hakeneste, tumer han phrala un phenja an o patsepen. I tsele patsle penenn tumenge. "Atchenn maro Debleha!"
O latchepen maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, djal tumentsa! Un o Debleskro kamlepen well an tumende! Un o Debleskro Ducho atchell pash tumende!

Me, o Paulo, tchinau kau liil ap i patslende, kai wenn khetne an o them Galatia. O Jesus Kristo das an miro wast, te penap i menshenge leskro lab. Me hom gar i menshendar bitchedo. Kowa, kai bitchras man, hi o Jesus Kristo un o Dewel, maro dad. Kowa kras les i mulendar djido.
Me un i tsele phrala, kai pash mande hi, mer penah tumenge:
Latchepen un bacht tumenge! Ko dell tumen o Dewel, kai maro dad hi, un maro rai, o Jesus Kristo.
Job meras, te lell lo mari doosh ap peste. Kowa kras lo, te lell lo men win dran ko tchilatcho tsiro, an hoi mer djiwah. Kowa kamas o Dewel, maro dad jaake.
Koles sharas kanna un hako tsiro! Amen.

Mange atchas o rakepen krik, har me shunom, kai tumer mukan jaake sik o Jesuseskro drom. O Dewel das tumen gole, te patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste, kai his jaake latcho ap tumende. Un kanna shunenn tumer ap menshende, kai kamenn tumen ap i wawar drom te anell.
Tchatchepaha, dell kek wawar drom, te wenn tumer pash o Debleste! Kolla menshe kamenn tumen dinelo te krell. Jon risrenn o tchatchepen pral o Jesus Kristeste trujal.

Kowa, kai penell, te dell i wawar drom har ko drom, hoi mer tumende sikram, kowa te well praassedo o Deblestar, ninna te wams mer kowa, ninna te wals i bolepaskro dran o bolepen pash tumende un penals kowa.

Jaake har mer jek kopo penam, penau me kanna pale: Te well jek pash tumende un penell tumenge, te dell i wawar drom pash o Debleste har ko drom, hoi mer tumende sikram, kowa te well praassedo o Deblestar!

Penenn mange, rakrau me kanna jaake, har kamenn i menshe kowa te shunell? Na-a! Me rakrau jaake, har o Dewel kowa kamella. Me kamau gar, te sharenn man i menshe. Te wals kowa jaake, woms gar o Jesus Kristeskro budepaskro.
Mire phrala, djinenn, o Jesuseskro drom hoi me tumende sikrom, hi gar i menshengro koowa.
Me shunom kowa gar i menshendar. I mensho sikras les mande witar gar. O Jesus Kristo kokres sikras les mande.
Tumer shunan, har me djiwom an o biboldengro patsepen, un lom kolen palla, kai patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste, un kamom, te marap len.
Me rikrom man ap i biboldengro patsepen feteder har bud wawar bibolde, kai jaake phuro his har me. Miri tseli sorjaha kamom kowa te krell, hoi mare phure penan.

O Debles his i wawar drom mange. Job kamas mande peskro tchawes te sikrell, te djinap, koon job hi. Har me gomme gar boldo homs, rodas job man win. Un job his mange latcho un das man gole, te djap pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, te penap lenge leskro tchawestar. Har o Dewel man pash lende bitchras, putchom gar i menshendar, te penenn le mange, hoi te krap,

djom witar gar an o foro Jerusalem pash kolende, kai glan mande o Jesusestar bitchedo wan, te penenn le i menshenge leskre laba. Lendar putchom gar, hoi te krap. Na-a, me djom an o them Arabia un wom pale pale an o foro Damaskus.
Pal triin bersha wom me an o foro Jerusalem, te dikap o Kefases. Deesh-te-pantch diwessa atchom pash leste.
Kol wawar bitchepangren, kai o Jesus Kristo glan mande pash i menshende bitchras, kolendar dikom me kekes kote har o Jakobo kokres, o Jesuseskro phraal.
O Dewel djinella, kai kawa lauter tchatcho hi, hoi me tumenge tchinau. Me chochau gar.
Pal kowa wom me an i themma Siria un Cilicia.
An o them Judea prindjran man kol patsle gar.
Jon shunan, hoi wawar pral mande penan: "Ko mursh, kai men palla las un kamas o patsepen ap o Jesuseste paash te krell, ko mursh penell kanna i menshenge, te djan le ap o Jesuseskro drom."
Un jon sharan o Debles pral halauter, hoi job ap mande kras.

Pal deesh-te-star bersha djom me pale an o foro Jerusalem. O Dewel sikras mande, te djap koi. O Barnabas djas mantsa. Un o Tito his ninna pash mande. An o foro Jerusalem djom pash i pralstunende mank i patslende, un penom lenge, har sikrau me o Debleskro drom kol menshende, kai kek bibolde hi. Me kamom te djinell, te hi kowa lenge mishto, hoi me penau, te well koi budi, hoi me krau un krom, gar tchitcheske.
O Tito, kai kek biboldo hi, his pash mande. Un kol patslengre pralstune penan gar, kai hunte well job ap o mass tchindlo.

His wawar mursha koi. Jon kran, har te wans le patsle. Jon kaman te dikell, har kol patsle djiwenna, kai buder gar ap o Moseskre laba pandlo hi. Mer, kai ham buder gar pandlo ap kol laba, djiwah kanna pal o Jesuseskre laba. Un kol mursha, kai djiwenn gar pal o Jesuseskre laba, kaman, te was mer pale pandlo ap o Moseskre laba.
Mer kram kowa gar, hoi jon kaman. Mer kamam, te djinenn tumer soreles: O Jesuseskro drom, hoi mer tumende sikram, kowa hi o tchatcho drom.

Kol phrala, kai hi pralstune mank i patslende, kolla penan gar, kai kowa, hoi me i menshenge penau, gar tchatcho hi. Te rakrau kol pralstunendar, hi mange jek, hoi jon his. O Dewel dikell gar ap kowa, har i mensho an-diklo hi.
Jon haiwan, kai mange o Jesus penas, te djap pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, te sikrap lende leskro drom, jaake har o Petro o Jesuseskro drom i biboldende sikrella.
Kowa, kai bitchras o Petres pash i biboldende, hi kowa, kai man bitchras pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi.

Kol pralstune mank i patslende his o Jakobo, un o Kefas, un o Johanni. Har jon haiwan, kai o Dewel mange latcho hi un man koi budi das, dan jon man un o Barnabes o tchatcho wast, te dikenn halauter, kai ham mer phrala. Mer kram win, te djas mer pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, un jon te djan pash i biboldende.
Hi jek koowa, hoi jon mendar mangan, te bistras mer gar i tchorwelen mank lende. Ap kowa rikrom man i tselo djijeha.

An ko tsiro, har o Kefas an o foro Antiochia his, chas job kol patslentsa, kai kek bibolde hi. Koi wan patsle bibolde koi pashal dran o Jakobeskri kangri. Kolla rikran pen ap o Moseskre laba un chan gar kolentsa, kai kek bibolde hi. Un o Kefas trashas lendar, un tsardas pes pale, un kamas buder gar kol patslentsa khetne te well, kai kek bibolde hi. Koi penom me leske an o mui, kai kowa gar mishto hi, hoi job kras.

Jaake har o Kefas dui tchipjentsa rakras, kran ninna kol wawar patsle bibolde. Har o Barnabas len dikas, kras job ninna jaake har jon, un tsardas pes kol patslendar pale, kai kek bibolde hi, te well lo an-diklo pash i biboldende.

Har me dikom, kai jon gar ap o tchatcho drom djan, jaake har o Jesus les mende sikras, koi penom me ap o Kefaseste glan hakeneste: Ninna te hal i biboldo, djiweh tu gar har i biboldo. Hoske kameh i sorjaha, te djiwenn kol patsle, kai kek bibolde hi, har i bibolde?

Mer ham bibolde. Jaake wam mer boldo. Un ham gar kolendar, kai kek bibolde hi un gar ap o Debleskro drom djana. Ninna te ham gar kolendar, djinah, kai kek mensho tchatcho wella glan o Debleste, te djiwell lo pal o Moseskre laba. Na-a, o Dewel krell koles tchatcho glan peste, koon patsell ap o Jesus Kristeste. Doleske patsah mer o tselo djijestar ap o Jesus Kristeste, te was tchatcho glan o Debleste.

Mer ninna, kai ham bibolde, kamah, te krell men o Dewel tchatcho glan peste. Kol labentsa penah mer, kai ham pale-tchidde un tchilatche glan o Debleste, jaake har i tsele wawar menshe ap i phub. Penau kanna, kai o Jesus Kristo men ap o tchilatcho drom anas? Na-a!
Me woms tchatchepaha ap o tchilatcho drom tardo, te penoms kanna, te rikras men pale ap o Moseskre laba, kai me glan i tsiro penom, te hunte rikras men gar ap kol laba.
Har krom gar, hoi o Moseskre laba penenna, penan kol laba mange: Tu hunte meress. Jaake hom lenge mulo un nai djiwau kanna o Debleske. Me merom o Jesuseha ap o trushel.

Kowa hom gar me, kai djiwau kanna. Hi o Jesus Kristo, kai djiwell an mande. Un ko djipen, hoi kanna djiwau, djiwau me an o patsepen ap o Debleskro tchaweste. Job kamas te djiwap, un das peskro djipen mange an o merepen.
Jaake tchiwrau o Debleskro latchepen gar ap i rig. Te djiwoms me pal o Moseskre laba, un kolla krans mange tchatcho glan o Debleste, meras o Jesus Kristo tchitcheske.
Hoske kamenn tumer patsle an Galatia kowa gar te haiwell? Koon kras tumenge dinelo? Tumenge was o Jesuseskro merepen ap o trushel penlo, har te dikans kowa tumare jakentsa!

Kowa kamau me tumendar te djinell: Har djas kowa, kai lan o Debleskro Ducho? Lan tumer les, har tumer kran, hoi o Moseskre laba penenna? Na-a, tumer lan les, har shunan o Jesusestar un patsan ap leste.
Har well kowa, kai haiwenn tumer kowa gar? Dran o Debleskri soor wan tumer patslo. Kamenn tumer kanna dran tumari soor tchatcho glan leste te well?
Tumer djan ap o Jesuseskro drom. Un doleske kran i menshe tumenge o djipen phares. His kowa lauter tchitcheske?

O Dewel das tumen peskro Ducho un kras pash tumende bud baro un sorelo koowa, hoi kek wawar nai krella. Kras lo kowa, har djiwan tumer pal o Moseskre laba? Na-a! Job kras kowa, har tumer shunan o Jesusestar un ap leste patsan.
Jaake his kowa ninna o Abrahameha. Job patsas o Debles. Doleske tchiwas o Dewel les an o tchatchepen.
Tumer dikenn kanna: O Abrahameskre tchatche tchawe hi kolla, kai o Debles patsenna.

O Debleskro lab penas glan i raha tsiro, kai o Dewel ninna kolen tchatcho krella, kai kek bibolde hi, te patsenn le ap leste. Doleske penas lo ap o Abrahameste: Kai bacht, hoi me dau tut, djal dureder ap i tsele menshende ap i phub.
Jaake har o Abraham o Debles patsas un o Dewel das les peskri bacht un soor, jaake lenna kolla lauter o Debleskro djipen, kai les patsenna.

Kol wawar, kai rikrenn pen ap o Moseskre laba, un kamenn jaake tchatcho te well glan o Debleste, kolla hi tel o Debleskro praassepen. O Debleskro lab penella: Hakeno hi praassedo, koon gar lauter krella, hoi o Moseskre laba penenna.Un kek mensho hi koi, kai krell lauter, hoi o Moseskre laba penenna.
Koon rikrell pes ap o Moseskre laba, well dran kowa gar tchatcho glan o Debleste. An o Debleskro lab hi ninna tchindlo: Kowa, kai patsella, kowa well tchatcho glan o Debleste un djiwella.

Te rikrell jek pes ap o Moseskre laba, hi kowa gar ko emligo, har te patsals lo ap o Jesus Kristeste. Pral o Moseskre laba hi tchindlo: Koon krell hako koowa, hoi o Moseskre laba penenna, kowa djiwella.

Mer nashte rikram kowa lauter gar. Un dran kowa wam tel o Debleskro praassepen. Un o Jesus Kristo las ko praassepen mendar krik, har job ap o trushel dino was, un jaake menge praassedo was. O Debleskro lab penella: Hakeno, koon ap o trushel dino wella, hi praassedo.

Un kowa kras o Jesus Kristo, te well o Debleskri soor pash i tsele menshende, jaake har o Dewel glan i raha tsiro o Abrahameske penas. Kanna nai lah mer lauter o Debleskro Ducho, te patsah mer ap o Jesuseste.

Mire phrala, kanna rakrau pral tchomone, hoi tumer lauter prindjrenna. Te krenn dui menshe tchomone win un denn pengro dadeskro wast koi pre, nai penell kek: Kanna hi kowa buder tchi moldo. Witar gar nai tchiwell jek tchomone koi pashal.

Jaake hi kowa o labeha, hoi o Dewel o Abrahameste das. O Dewel penas ap o Abrahameste, te dell lo peskri bacht un soor ap leste un ap leskro tchaweste, kai wella jek diwes pal leste. Kate rakrell o Dewel jek tchawestar. Job rakrell gar kol bud tchawendar, kai wenna pal o Abraham. Ko jek tchawo hi o Jesus Kristo.

Me kamau tumenge kawa te penell: O Dewel das o Abrahameste peskro lab, un tchiwas peskro wast koi pre, te well kowa tchatcho, hoi job penas. O Moseskre laba wan star-sheel-te-triin-deesh (430) bersha palla un nai lenn ko lab gar krik, hoi o Dewel o Abrahameste das.

Te lals jek o Debleskro brawlepen un djipen, te rikrals lo pes ap o Moseskre laba, palle tchiwals o Dewel peskro lab ap i rig, hoi job o Abrahameste das. Kowa hi gar jaake. O Dewel rikrell peskro lab, un doleske das job o Abrahameste peskro brawlepen tchitcheske.

Hoske hi o Moseskre laba koi? O Dewel das len mende, te dikas mer, har baro maro tchilatchepen hi. O Moseskre laba atchan tardo jaake raha, bis te was o Abrahameskro tchawo, ko jek, konestar o Dewel penas, te well job. I bolepangre anan kol laba o Moseske. Kowa his tardo mank i menshende un o Debleste. Un o Mose das kol laba i menshende.
His wawartchandes, har o Dewel o Abrahameste peskro lab das. O Dewel kokres das les peskro lab. Un kek hunte was tardo mank leste un o Abrahameste.

Penenn o Moseskre laba, kai hi ko lab buder tchi moldo, hoi o Dewel o Abrahameske penas? Na-a! Kowa hi gar jaake. Te wals o newo djipen dran o Moseskre laba, palle wals tchatchepaha ko mensho tchatcho glan o Debleste, kai rikrell pes ap kol laba. Kowa hi gar jaake.
O Debleskro lab penella, kai hi hako mensho pandlo ap o tchilatchepen. Ko jek drom, kai anell men win dran o tchilatchepen, hi o patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste. Kowa penas o Dewel.
Jaake raha, har patsam gar ap o Jesus Kristeste, hams pandlo ap o Moseskre laba. Palle sikras men o Dewel i newo drom pash leste: Kowa hi o patsepen.
O Moseskre laba sikran men maro tchilatchepen. Jaake anan le men pash o Jesus Kristeste, te patsas ap leste, un te was tchatcho glan o Debleste.
Kanna, kai patsah ap leste, hunte daras buder gar koi phagi, hoi o Moseskre laba pral mende wi-rakrenna.
Dran tumaro patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste han lauter Debleskre tchawe.
Har wan tumer ap o Jesus Kristeskro lab an o pani thodo, his kowa jaake, har te riwans tumer o Jesus Kristes an, - jaake har i ripen.
Jaake djiwah lauter o Jesuseha khetne. Kanna hi jek, koon tumer han: bibolde un kolla, kai kek bibolde hi, budepangre un raja, mursha un djuwja. An o Jesus Kristeste hi jek har o wawar.
Te djan tumer o Jesus Kristeha, han tumer ninna o Abrahameskre tchawe. Un tumer lenn kowa, hoi o Dewel o Abrahameskre tchawende della, jaake har penas lo.

Me penau tumenge: O tchawo, kai lell jek diwes lauter peskro dadestar, koles hi tchi penepaske pral peskro brawlepen, jaake raha har job tikno hi. Job hi har i budepaskro, ninna te hi ko tselo brawlepen leskro.
Job hi an i wasta kolendar, kai denn garda ap leste, bis te well ko tsiro, kai leskro dad penas, te lell job ko brawlepen.
Jaake djas menge kowa ninna. An ko tsiro, har gomme gar patslo hams, hams har tikne tchawe un hams tel i soor kolendar tardo, kai hi i raja pral kai phub, un hams ap lende pandlo.
Har ko tchatcho tsiro was, bitchras o Dewel peskro tchawes. Kowa was i mensho, un pandlo ap o Moseskre laba.
Job was, te lell lo kolen win, kai hi pandlo ap o Moseskre laba, jaake te was mer o Debleskre tchawe.
Kanna ham leskre tchawe. Doleske das o Dewel peskro tchaweskro Ducho an mare djia. Kowa dell gole: Tata, miro dad!
Kanna hal tu buder gar har i budepaskro, kai les tchi hi. Tu hal kanna o Debleskro tchawo. Un doleske leh tu ninna kowa, hoi o Dewel peskre tchawende della.
An ko tsiro, kai prindjran tumer o Debles gar, hans wawarenge koi, har te wans le o Dewel.

Kanna prindjrenn tumer o Debles. Feteder hi, te penau me: O Dewel prindjrell tumen. Har nai tchiwenn tumer tumen pale tel kol sorja, ap kolende i menshe pandlo hi? Tumer shunenn pale ap laba, hoi tchi moldo hi, un an lende kek soor hi.
Tumer denn jak ap diwessa, tchonna, bersha un bare tsirja un rikrenn len dre.
Me trashau tumenge, kai miri budi pash tumende tchitcheske his.
Mire phrala, me mangau tumen, wenn jaake, har me hom! Me wom ninna jaake har tumer, wom jek, kai hi gar pandlo ap o Moseskre laba. Hans tumer tchilatcho ap mande,
har me o ersto kopo pash tumende homs? Na-a, kowa hans gar. Tumer djinenna, har me tumenge o Debleskro latcho lab penom, koi djas mange gar mishto.

Ninna te his miro nasslepen tumenge gar shukar, dikan tumer gar tele ap mande, witar gar bitchran man tumendar krik. Na-a! Tumer lan man pre, har te woms o Debleskro bolepaskro, har te woms o Jesus Kristo kokres.
Tumer hans jaake bachtelo ap ko tsiro! Kai atchas tumari bacht? Ap ko tsiro lans tumare jaka win un dans len mande.
Kanna, kai penau tumenge o tchatchepen, han tumer tchilatcho ap mande?
Kowa hi gar mishto, hoi kol menshe krenna, kai nashenn tumenge palla, te shunenn tumer ap lende. Jon kamenn tumen mandar krik te lell, te nashenn tumer lenge palla.
Me penau tumenge: Nashenn kowa palla, hoi latcho hi! Krenn kowa hako tsiro, ninna te hom me gar pash tumende!
Mire phrala! Me kamau tumen o djijestar, har te wans mire tchawe. Jaake har i djuwjat duka hi, te lell li i tarnepen, jaake hi man pale duka tumenge, bis te well o Jesus Kristo diklo an tumende.
Me kamoms, te woms kanna nai pash tumende un te rakroms nai jaake, te djal kowa an tumaro dji! Me hom kate tardo un djinau gar, hoi te krap.
Tumer kamenn jaake te djiwell har o Moseskre laba penenna. Djinenn tumer gar, hoi kol laba penenna?
Kote hi tchindlo: O Abrahames his dui tchawe. Ko jekeskri dai his i budepaskretsa, i Hagar. Un ko wawareskri dai his i rajetsa, i Sara.
I budepaskretsa las o tchawes, har menshe kowa kaman. I rajetsa las o tchawes, har o Dewel kowa penas.

Kal dui djuwja hi har dui koowa, hoi o Dewel i menshentsa an Israel win kras. Jek koowa kras o Dewel lentsa win ap i berga Sinai. Kote lan i menshe o Moseskre laba. Kol laba hi o rai pral lende, jaake har his i rai pral i Hagar tardo.
I Hagar hi har i berga Sinai an Arabia. Jaake har kote i menshe ap o Moseskre laba pandlo wan, jaake hi kanna o foro Jerusalem peskre menshentsa ap o Moseskre laba pandlo.
Hi ninna i foro Jerusalem an o bolepen. Ko Jerusalem hi har i rajetsa, i Sara. Lakre tchawe hi gar pandlo ap o Moseskre laba. Joi hi mari dai.
Latar hi tchindlo: Ab bachtelo, ninna te nai lal tu kek tchawe! De gole i bachtjatar, ninna te was tutar kek tarnepen boldo! Kanna hi tut budeder tchawe har koja, kai his o romeha khetne.
Mire phrala, tumer han o Debleskre tchawe. Tumer wan boldo, har o Dewel kowa kamas, jaake har o Isaak boldo was, har o Dewel kowa penas.
An ko phuro tsiro his jaake: Ko tchawo, kai was boldo, har i menshe kowa kaman, kowa las koles palla, kai was boldo dran o Debleskri soor. Kowa hi kau diwes ninna jaake.
O Debleskro lab penell koi pral: Trade koi budepaskretsa peskro tchaweha tutar krik, te lell job gar peskro dadeskro brawlepen. Ko brawlepen lell ko tchawo, koleskri dai i rajetsa hi.
Mire phrala, mer ham gar i tchawe kolatar, kai hi i budepaskretsa. Mer ham i tchawe kolatar, kai hi i rajetsa!
O Jesus Kristo las men win dran hako koowa, ap kowa pandlo hams. Atchenn soreles un mukenn tumen buder gar te pandell!
Shunenn ap mire laba! Me, o Paulo, penau tumenge: Hakeno, koon mukell pes ap o mass te tchinell, jaake har i bibolde kowa kamenna, koleske meras o Jesus Kristo tchitcheske.
Un pale penau me hakeneske: Kowa, kai mukell pes ap o mass te tchinell, kowa hunte krell ninna lauter, hoi o Moseskre laba penenna.
Koon mank tumende djiwell pal o Moseskre laba, te well lo tchatcho glan o Debleste, kowa mukas o Jesus Kristes. Leskro kamlepen hi buder gar leske koi.
Mentsa hi wawartchandes. Mer patsah, te tchiwell men o Dewel an o tchatchepen, te patsah ap o Jesus Kristeste. Ko patsepen dell men o Debleskro Ducho.

O Jesus Kristeske molell tchi, te hi i mursh ap o mass tchindlo, witar gar, te hi lo gar tchindlo. Kowa, hoi hi budeder moldo har lauter, hi o patsepen. Ko patsepen dikah mer ap o kamlepen, kai jekes hi i wawareske.
Tumer nashan mishto ap o Debleskro drom. Koon rikras tumen pale, te shunenn buder gar ap o tchatchepen?
Kowa, hoi sawo mensho tumenge penas, well gar o Deblestar, kai das tumen gole, te wenn leskre tchawe.
Tumer djinenna, i tikno kotar shutlo jarro krell o tselo jarro shutlo.

Me prindjrau tumen mishto un patsau, kai shunenn ap mande, un o Jesus Kristo anell tumen pale ap o tchatcho drom. Kowa, kai anas tumen o tchatcho dromestar tele, kowa lell peskri phagi. Hi jek, koon job ninna hi.

Mire phrala, me te penoms i menshenge, te mukenn pen jon ap o mass te tchinell, lans i bibolde man gar palla. Palle choirans le pen gar pral kowa, kai rakrau pral o Jesuseskro merepen ap o trushel, un penau lenge, kai job kokres men pash o Debleste anella.
Kolla, kai krenn tumen dineles, kamaus, te tchinenn pen le paash!

Mire phrala, o Dewel das tumen gole, te djiwenn i djipen, kai han buder gar pandlo ap tchomone. Kal labentsa penau gar, te krenn tumer nai, hoi kamenna, un djiwenn nai tumaro phuro djipen. Na-a, awenn jek o wawareske koi! Krenn kowa dran o kamlepen!
Te well jek jaake latcho ap o wawareste har job latcho ap peste hi, palle krell lo lauter, hoi o Dewel lestar kamella.
Te dandrenn tumen tumer har midjak djukle, denn jak, te chal jek kol wawares gar pre!
Me penau tumenge: Djiwenn jaake, har o Debleskro Ducho tumenge penella! Job te hi tumentsa, palle krenn gar o tchilatchepen, hoi an tumende hi.

Kowa, hoi an mende hi, kamell gar kowa, hoi o Debleskro Ducho kamella. Un kowa, hoi o Debleskro Ducho kamella, hi gar kowa, hoi an mende hi. Kol dui sorja tchingrenn pen jaake, kai nai krenn tumer gar ko latchepen, hoi kamenn tumer te krell.
Te krenn tumer kowa, hoi o Debleskro Ducho tumenge penella, palle hi o Moseskre laba kek soor pral tumende.

Tumer lauter djinenna, har kol menshe djiwenna, kai krenn ko tchilatchepen, hoi an lende hi: I mursha sowenn wawar djuwjentsa. Un i djuwja sowenn wawar murshentsa. I menshe krenn djungelo koowa un wi-ladjedo koowa.

Jon mangenn wawar koowa an har o Debles. Jon durkrenna. Jon kurenn pen un tchingrenn pen. Jon silwerenna, un len hi choli ap i wawarende. Jon dikenn ap pende kokres, te djal penge mishto, un dikenn gar ap i wawarende, te djal lenge ninna mishto. Jon mukenn pengre phralen un djan wawarentsa khetne.

Jon kamenn kowa, hoi o wawares hi. Jon hi pipangre un chapangre. Un bud wawar tchilatcho koowa krenn jon. Me penom tumenge un penau pale: Koon jaake djiwella, well gar pash o Debleste an o bolepen un lell gar ko latcho koowa, hoi o Debles peskre tchawenge hi.

Kones hi o Debleskro Ducho an peskro dji, dran koleste wella latchepen: Les well o Debleskro kamlepen un bacht an o dji. Job kamell kek tchingepen. Job rikrell lauter wi. Job hi latches ap i wawarende. Les hi i baro dji i wawarenge. Kowa, hoi job penell, ap kowa rikrell pes job.
Job krell pes gar bares un lell pes khetne. O Moseskre laba, kolen hi kek soor pral koleste, koon jaake djiwella.
Kolla, kai djiwenn o Jesus Kristeha, kolla anan ko tsele tchilatcho koowa, hoi jon kran, pash o Jesuseste. Un kanna penenn le na-a, ap o djungelo koowa, hoi kamell an lengro dji te well.
O Debleskro Ducho das men o newo djipen. Doleske djiwas jaake, har job kamella.
Mer rodas gar pal kowa, te was bareder un feteder har kol wawar. Mer tchingras gar un dikas gar tchilatche jakentsa ap kowa, hoi ko wawares hi!
