Mire phrala, nai well, kai krell jek tumendar i tchilatcho koowa. Anenn kol menshes pale ap o tchatcho drom! Rakrenn leha latches! Jaake sikrenn tumer, kai djiwenn jaake, har o Debleskro Ducho kowa kamella. Denn jak ap tumende, te perenn tumer gar ninna o Debleskro dromestar tele!
Jek hunte dikell ap ko wawareste un hidjella leha, hoi an leskro dji leske dukrella. Jaake krenn tumer kowa, hoi o Jesus Kristo tumendar kamella.
Koon patsella, kai job feteder hi har ko wawar, un hi kowa gar, kowa chochell pes kokres.
Hakeno hunte dikell ap peste, har job djiwella. Jaake nai sharell lo pes dran kowa, hoi job krella un dikell gar ap i wawareste.
Hakenes hi doha an peskro djipen, hoi hunte hidjell lo.
Jek te penell tumenge o Debleskro lab, palle hunte denn tumer les kowa, hoi les hunte well djipaske.
Ma patsenn, te krenn nai o Debleha, har tumer kamenna! Tumer te krenn latcho koowa, lenn tumer latcho koowa pale pale. Tumer te krenn tchilatcho koowa, lenn tumer tchilatcho koowa pale pale.
Koon krella, hoi leske kokres mishto hi, koleskro djipen atchell gar. Koon krella, hoi o Debleskro Ducho leske penella, kowa lell o Debleskro djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
Dikas, te was gar khino, te kras latcho koowa. Well ko tsiro, kai lah ninna latcho koowa.
Doleske kras latcho koowa jaake bud, har krah nai, hake menshenge, budeder kol patslenge.
Kanna tchinau bare laba. Koi pre dikenn tumer, kai me kowa tchinom miro wasteha.

Kol mursha, kai kamenn sorjaha, te mukenn tumen ap o mass te tchinell, kolla kamenn kol wawarende te sikrell, har latcho jon hi. Kowa krenn le, te wenn le gar palla lino. Te penans jon, kai o Jesus Kristeskro merepen ap o trushel kokres kowa hi, hoi tchiwell men an o tchatchepen glan o Debleste, wans jon palla lino.
Jon ninna, kai mukan pen ap o mass te tchinell, krenn gar lauter, hoi o Moseskre laba penenna. Doleske kamenn le, te mukenn tumen ap o mass te tchinell, jaake te sharenn jon pen glan i menshende.

Me djinau jek: An kek tsiro kamau me te sharap man. Me sharau ko trushel kokres, kai maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, meras. Kanna hi mange kowa lauter buder tchi moldo, hoi i menshenge jaake bud moldo hi. Me nashau ko koowa buder gar palla.
Hi tchi moldo, te hal tu ap o mass tchindlo. Hi witar tchi moldo, te hal tu gar ap o mass tchindlo. Jek koowa molella: O Dewel kras dran mende newe menshe.
Me kamoms, te dell o Dewel peskri bacht un peskro kamlepen lauterende, kai rikrenn pen ap kal laba. Mu well kowa ninna ap i tsele Debleskre menshende an Israel!
Ma krenn mange buder kek duka! Man hi bud tchinepen ap mande, hoi sikrenna, kai wom o Jesuseske dino.
Mire phrala, mangau maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, te well lo tumenge latcho. Amen.

Kau liil tchinau me, o Paulo. O Jesus Kristo bitchras man, te penap i menshenge leskro lab. Jaake kamell kowa o Dewel. Me tchinau kau liil ap kolende, kolen o Dewel win gole das an o foro Efesus, un kai patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste.
Mu well tumen latchepen un bacht an o dji! Ko dell tumen maro Dewel, kai maro dad hi, un maro rai, o Jesus Kristo.
Sharas maro Debles! Job hi o Dewel un o dad maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, un das peskro tselo bolepaskro brawlepen mende, kai ham patslo ap o Jesus Kristeste.
Har o bolepen un i phub gar koi his, rodas lo men win, te djas ap o Jesuseskro drom. Job rodas men win, te dell lo men i djudjo dji, te hatsell lo kek doosh ap mende. Jaake bud kamas lo men,
te penas lo glan i raha tsiro an peskro dji, te was mer leskre tchawe. Un o Jesus Kristo kras, te wam mer o Debleskre tchawe, jaake har o Dewel kowa kamas,
te sharas mer leskro baro latchepen. Job his jaake latcho ap mende, te das lo peskro kamlo tchawes menge!
Har o Jesus Kristo ap o trushel meras, un peskro rat menge ratas, las lo mari doosh un phagi mendar. Jaake baro hi leskro latchepen ap mende!
Bud kope his lo menge latches, un das men ninna goswepen, te haiwas leskro drom.
Kek mensho djinas, hoi o Dewel kamas te krell. Mende sikras lo, hoi les an peskro dji hi. Kowa, hoi job kamell te krell, krell lo o Jesus Kristeha.
Te well o tchatcho tsiro, anell lo halauter khetne, hoi hi an o bolepen un ap i phub. Un o Jesus Kristo well o rai pral halauter.
Job kras, te wam mer o Debleskre tchawe. Un ko bolepaskro brawlepen, hoi leskro hi, well ninna maro. Kowa kamas o Dewel glan i raha tsiro jaake. Un lauter, hoi job kamella, krell lo.
Doleske sharas mer maro baro Debles! I raha tsiro das maro dji pal o Kristeste gole, ko baro rajeste, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job. Un kanna hi lo kai.

Tumer ninna shunan o tchatchepen. Un tumen was ko drom siklo, hoi anas tumen pash o Debleste. Ko drom hi o Jesus Kristo. Har tumer ap leste patslo wan, das lo tumen o Debleskro Ducho an tumare djia. Glan i raha tsiro penas o Dewel, te dell lo les peskre tchawende. Jaake sikrell lo, koon leskre tchawe hi.
Kanna hi men o Debleskro Ducho an mende. Un doleske djinah, te lah budeder latcho koowa ap ko diwes, kai wah newes kerdo an o bolepen. Doleske sharas mer maro baro Debles!
Me shunom, har baro hi tumaro patsepen ap maro rajeste, o Jesuseste. Ninna kamenn tumer i tsele patslen o djijestar.
Doleske parkrau man hako tsiro pash o Debleste tumenge, un mangau lestar,
te dell lo tumen goswepen, te haiwenn tumer, har baro job hi. Job hi o Dewel maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, un maro dad an o bolepen, o rai pral halauter.

Me mangau lestar, te krell lo tumare djia pre, te dikenn tumare djijeskre jakentsa, har baro un shukar kowa hi, hoi job i patslende della ap ko tsiro, kai wenn le pash leste an o bolepen khetne. Job das tumen gole, te lenn kowa lauter.
Un me mangau lestar ninna, te haiwenn tumer, har bari leskri soor hi, hoi an mende hi, kai patsah. Koi soor hi i emligi bari soor,
hoi kras o Jesus Kristes i mulendar djido, un beshas les ap i tchatchi rig o Deblestar an o bolepen,
un das halauter an leskre wasta, te well lo o rai pral i tsele rajende un pralstunende, sorele un bare. Kek lab hi bareder har leskro lab an kau tsiro, un ninna an ko tsiro, hoi wella.
O Dewel das halauter an leskre wasta, un kras, te was o Jesus Kristo o pralstuno pral i patslende.
Kolla hi leskre. Job djiwell an lende peskri tseli sorjaha. Un leskri tseli soor hi an halauter an o bolepen un ap i phub.
Har gar patslo hans, his bud doosh ap tumende. Un tumer hans tchilatcho. Jaake hans o Debleske mulo.

Tumer djan ap o tchilatcho drom, jaake har i wawar menshe, un shunan ap o bengeste. Kowa hi o rai pral i tchilatche sorja mashkral o bolepen un i phub. Un job budrell an i djia kolendar, kai shunenn gar ap o Debleste.

His i tsiro, kai djiwam mer halauter har jon, un kram o tchilatchepen, hoi an mende hi. Mer kram, hoi mer kamam, un hoi menge an o shero was. Un o Debleskri choli his ninna pral mende har pral kol wawar menshende.

Kanna kras men o Dewel djido. Les his i baro dji menge un kamas men o tselo djijestar. Mer, kai leske mulo hams, har djiwam an maro tchilatchepen, men kras job djido, jaake har job o Jesus Kristes djido kras. Job his jaake latcho ap mende, te las lo men dran o tchilatchepen win.
Har djangras job o Jesus Kristes i mulendar pre, djangras men lo ninna pre, un beshas men an o bolepen pash leste.
Jaake baro hi leskro latchepen ap mende, kai patsah ap o Jesus Kristeste. Ninna an ko tsiro, hoi wella, dikenna i menshe, har baro leskro latchepen ap mende hi.
Dran peskro latchepen las lo tumen dran o tchilatchepen win, har patsan ap o Jesus Kristeste. Tumer wan nai gar dran tumari soor dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win. Na-a! O Dewel las tumen win.
Kowa kras lo gar doleske, kai tumer latcho koowa kran. Jaake sharell nai pes kek mensho glan o Debleste.
Kowa, hoi mer kanna ham, kras o Dewel dran mende. Har wam patslo ap o Jesus Kristeste, das lo men o newo djipen, te kras mer ko latcho koowa, hoi job an mare wasta das.
Ma bistrenn, koon tumer hans, har boldo wan! Tumer hans kek bibolde. Un i bibolde penan Bi-tchindle ap tumende. I bibolde wan ap pengro mass tchindlo, un kowa han tumer gar.

Ap ko tsiro prindjran tumer o Jesus Kristes gar un hans gar o Debleskre menshendar. Ko latcho koowa, hoi o Dewel peskre menshenge penas, te dell lo len, his gar tumenge. Tumer prindjran o Debles gar, un djiwan har an i kali rat un dikan kek momeli glan tumende.
Ap ko tsiro hans tumer dur o Deblestar. Kanna prindjrenn les. O Jesus Kristo anas tumen ap peskro drom, har job ap o trushel peskro rat tumenge ratas.
Job anas i bibolden khetne kol menshentsa, kai kek bibolde hi, te wenn le mala, un las o tchingepen lendar krik, hoi mashkral lende his.

Har job ap o trushel meras, tchiwas lo o Moseskre lila ap i rig, kai tchindlo hi, har i bibolde hunte djiwenna. Job kras tchomone newes, te well i biboldo khetne koleha, kai kek biboldo hi, un te wenn le lauter mala.
Har meras lo ap o trushel, anas lo kol dujen khetne o Debleha, te wenn le leskre mala. Kote las lo o tchingepen lendar krik, hoi mashkral lende his.

O Jesus Kristo was, un sikras lauteren o drom pash o Debleste. Tumen, kai tchi o Deblestar djinan un ninna i bibolden, kai gar dur o Deblestar his, sikras lo ko drom, te djiwas mer lauter pash leste khetne.
Mende halauterende das job o Debleskro Ducho. Un kowa krell, te nai wah mer lauter glan o Debleste, maro dadeste.
Kanna han tumer buder gar sawe menshe, kai win hi un o Debles gar prindjrenna. Na-a, khetne kol wawar patslentsa han tumer kanna o Debleskre menshe un han khere pash leste.

I tsele Debleskre menshe hi har jek kheer, kerdo dran barra. Tumer han kol barra, hoi hi tardo ap i telstune barra. I telstune barra hi o Jesuseskre bitchepangre un o Debleskre rakepangre. O Jesus Kristo hi ko sorelo bar, hoi rikrell o tselo kheer khetne. Un o kheer well baro un bareder, un well i shukar kheer, kai o Dewel djiwella.
Ninna tumer djiwenn o Jesus Kristeha khetne. Doleske han tumer ninna har barra an o Debleskro kheer, kai o Debleskro Ducho djiwella.

Doleske bitchras o Jesus Kristo man, o Paules, pash tumende, kai kek bibolde han. Dran kowa hom me kanna an o stilepen. Tumer shunan, har das man o Dewel miri budi, te penap kolenge, kai kek bibolde hi, har baro leskro latchepen ninna lenge hi.
Kowa djinan i menshe gar. An kau tikno liil tchinom tumenge, hoi sikras man o Dewel pral kowa.
Te drawerenn tumer miro liil, palle haiwenn, kai prindjrau kowa, hoi o Jesus Kristo menge kras.
An o phuro tsiro djinan i menshe kowa gar. Kanna djinenn les o Debleskre bitchepangre un rakepangre. Lenge tchiwas les o Debleskro Ducho an o dji.
Job sikras len, te nai wenn ninna kolla o Debleskre tchawe, kai kek bibolde hi, te djiwenn le leha khetne. O latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar hi ninna lenge, jaake har o Dewel glan i raha tsiro penas.
Kau latcho lab penau me i menshenge. O Dewel his mange latcho, te das lo man kai budi. Ninna das lo man i soor, te krap kowa.
Ninna te hom me o tikneder kol tsele patslendar, das lo man koi shukar budi, te djap pash kolende, kai hi kek bibolde, te penap lenge, hawo baro brawlepen o Jesus Kristes lenge hi,
un te sikrap lauterende, har kras o Dewel kowa, hoi his les an o dji. Kowa djinan i menshe i raha tsiro gar. O Dewel kokres, kai kras o bolepen un i phub, djinas les.
Kanna dikenn i raja un i pralstune an o bolepen, har baro o Debleskro goswepen hi. Kowa dikenn le ap kowa, hoi job i patslenge kras.
Kowa, hoi les glan i raha tsiro an peskro dji his, kowa kras lo, har job o Jesus Kristes menge ap i phub bitchras. Kowa was maro rai,
un kras menge i drom pash o Debleste. Kanna, kai patsah ap leste, hunte trashas buder gar o Deblestar, un mer nai wah glan leste.
Doleske mangau tumen: Ma awenn gar khino an tumaro patsepen, ninna te shunenn tumer, kai me tumenge stildo hom. Kowa, hoi lau ap mande, sikrell tumende, har bud tumer mange moldo han.
Doleske perau ap mire tchanga, un parkrau man pash o Debleste, maro dadeste.
Job hi o tchatcho dad leskre tsele tchawendar an o bolepen un ap i phub.
Un leskri soor hi bari. Doleske mangau lestar, te krell leskro Ducho tumare djia soreles.

Me mangau lestar ninna, te djiwell o Jesus Kristo an tumende dran tumaro patsepen, un te kamenn tumer o Debles un ninna jek o wawares o djijestar. Palle han tumer har i ruk, koleskre draba djan dur an i phub. Un tumer han har i kheer, hoi soreles tardo hi.
Jaake nai haiwenn tumer i tsele patslentsa, har baro o Jesus Kristeskro dji tumenge hi,
ninna te hi leskro kamlepen bareder har lauter, hoi an mare shere dre djala. Te haiwah leskro kamlepen bud un budeder, palle djiwell o Dewel bud un budeder an mende.

Un job nai krell budeder, har mer lestar mangah, un budeder, hoi mer haiwah. Jaake bari hi leskri soor, hoi an mende kowa lauter krella. Mer lauter, kai patsah ap o Jesus Kristeste, sharas maro Debles kanna un hako tsiro. Amen.
Me hom an o stilepen o Jesuseske, maro rajeske, un mangau tumen o djijestar, te djiwenn tumer tumaro djipen har sawe menshe, kolen o Dewel peske khetne gole das.
Ma krenn tumen bares! Awenn latches jek ap o wawareste! Denn i wawaren gar jaake sik pre! Djiwenn khetne an o kamlepen!
O Debleskro Ducho anas tumen khetne. Jaake denn garda, te well kek tchingepen mashkral tumende, un te rikrenn tumer lauter khetne!
Tumer patsle han jek familja. Tumen hi o emligo Debleskro Ducho an tumende. Un o Dewel das tumen gole, te djiwenn tumer lauter leha khetne.
Tumen hi o emligo rai, un o emligo patsepen. Un tumer wan lauter ap o Jesuseskro lab an o pani thodo.
Un tumen hi o emligo Dewel. Kowa hi o dad lauterendar. Job hi pral lauterende un mashkral lende, un djiwell an lauterende.
Hakeneske mendar his o Jesus Kristo latches un das les i budi, hoi budrell lo i patslenge.
Doleske hi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo: Har job pre an o bolepen djas, las lo kolen peha, kai leskro wan, un das len i budi o Debleske te krell.
Kote hi tchindlo, kai job an o bolepen djas. Un kowa penell menge ninna, kai job glan kowa dran o bolepen ap i phub was.
Kowa, kai was tele ap i phub, hi ninna kowa, kai djas pre an o pralstuno bolepen, te djiwell lo an o bolepen un ninna ap i phub.

Job hi kowa, kai das i patslen pengri budi. Koi hi kolla, kolen job bitchras, te penenn le i menshenge lestar. Wawar rakrenna, hoi job lenge an o dji tchiwas, hoi kek wawar djinella. Wawar anenn kol menshen, kai gar patslo hi, pash o Jesus Kristeste. Pale wawar rikrenn i patslen khetne, un sikrenn lende o Debleskro drom.
Lauter kolla krenn pengri budi, te wenn i tsele patsle soreles an o patsepen, un te haiwenn le o Debleskri budi mishto te krell.
Kowa te well jaake, palle ham mer lauter khetne an jek patsepen, un prindjrah o Debleskro tchawes mishto. Bud un budeder haiwah, hoi job mendar kamella, bis te djiwah jaake har job djiwas.

Palle ham buder gar har tikne tchawe, kai lauter patsenna, kau diwes jaake un ko wawar diwes wawartchandes. Un mer shunah buder gar ap kolende, kai chochenna, un kamenn men o tchatcho dromestar tele te anell.

Mer hunte djiwas an o tchatchepen un penas o tchatchepen i menshenge. Maro kamlepen hunte well kek chocheno kamlepen. Jaake wah mer bud un budeder har o Jesus Kristo. Kowa hi o pralstuno pral lauterende, kai patsenn ap leste.

Job rikrell len khetne jaake, te well jek patslo i wawareha khetne anlo. Un jek patslo hidjell o wawares jaake, har les i soor hi. Mer te ham jaake kamlo, ko jek ap o wawareste, palle well o Debleskri familja baro un sorelo.
Me penau tumenge soreles, hoi mange o rai Jesus penas: Ma djiwenn buder har kol menshe, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar! Kowa, hoi an lengro shero trujal djala, hi tchi moldo.
O Deblestar kamenn le tchi te djinell. Lengro dji hi har i bar. Jaake djan le ap i tchilatcho drom, un prindjrenn ko djipen gar, hoi o Dewel della.
Jon ladjenn buder gar, te djiwenn le i wi-ladjedo djipen, un rikrenn pen gar pale te krenn le djungelo koowa.
Sawo koowa kras o Jesus Kristo gar. Na-a!
Tumer shunan lestar, un djinenna, har job djiwas. Ko drom, hoi job sikras men, hi o tchatcho drom.
Ma djiwenn buder gar tumaro phuro djipen! An tumaro phuro djipen was o tchilatcho koowa baro an tumare djia, un tumer kran, hoi tumenge gar mishto hi. Sawo koowa krell tumaro djipen paash.
Mukenn tumen o Deblestar newes te krell!
Djiwenn kanna o newo djipen, hoi tumen o Dewel das! Palle han tumer an o tchatchepen tardo, un han tchatchepaha leske koi.
Ma chochenn buder! Mer ham lauter phrala un phenja. Doleske rakrenn o tchatchepen jek o wawareha!
Te wenn tumer an i choli, palle denn garda, te krenn kek tchilatcho koowa! Mukenn o kham gar tele te djal pral tumari choli!
Denn garda ap tumende, te krenn tumer gar, hoi o beng kamella!
Koon tchoras an peskro phuro djipen, kowa tchorell buder gar! Job hunte budrell peskre wastentsa, te well les doha djipaske, un te nai dell lo ninna i tchorwelen tchomone.
Rakrenn kek tchilatche un djungele laba! Kowa, hoi tumer penenna, hunte well latches kolenge, kai shunenna, te lenn le newi soor an pengro djipen.

Te krenn tumer i tchilatcho koowa, palle dukrenn o Debleskro Ducho an tumare djia. O Dewel das les tumende, te sikrell lo, kai leskro han ap ko diwes, kai lell lo tumen dran o tselo tchilatchepen win.
Awenn ap kekeste tchilatcho un chojedo! Tchingrenn ap kekeste, un praassenn kekes!
Awenn kamlo jek ap o wawareste, un lenn i dji o wawareske! Bistrenn o tchilatchepen, hoi o wawar ap tumende kras! Ninna o Dewel bistras tumaro tchilatchepen, har o Jesus Kristo tumenge meras.
Tumer han o Debleskre tchawe. Un job kamell tumen i tselo djijeha. Doleske krenn lauter jaake, har o Dewel kowa krella,
un djiwenn an o kamlepen, jaake har o Jesus Kristo peskro kamlepen mende sikras, har job menge meras. Un jaake das lo peskro djipen o Debleske. Un o Dewel dikas latches ap leste.
Tumer han o Debleskre menshe. Doleske krenn kek wi-ladjedo un djungelo koowa! Nashenn witar gar pal i lowe! Hi gar mishto, te well pral sawo koowa mank tumende rakedo!

Hi witar gar tchatcho o Debleskre tchawenge, te rakrenn le djungele laba, dinelo koowa, un sapaskro koowa, hoi tchi moldo hi! Tumare labentsa sharenn o Debles, un parkrenn tumen pash leste! Kowa krenn un gar ko wawar!

Tumer hunte djinenn: An o bolepen, kai hi o Jesus Kristo un o Dewel i raja, kote wenn kek mursha dre, kai sowenn wawar djuwjentsa, witar kek djuwja, kai sowenn wawar murshentsa, witar kek, kai krell djungelo koowa, witar kek, kai nashell pal i lowe. Kowa, kai nashell pal i lowe, koleske hi o brawlepen peskro dewel.
Ma patsenn kekes, kai penell tumenge, te nai krenn kowa lauter! Koon kowa penella, hi i chocheno. O Debleskri choli well ap kolende, kai gar ap o Debleste shunenna, un krenna sawo tchilatcho koowa.
Rikrenn tumen kolendar pale, kai kowa lauter krenna!

Glan ko tsiro, har tumer patslo wan, djan tumer ap o tchilatcho drom. Kowa his har te djans an i rati. Kanna hi kowa wawartchandes. Maro rai Jesus djiwell an tumare djia, un anas tumen ap peskro drom. Job hi i bari momeli tumenge. Djan kanna ap leskro drom, kai hi buder kek tamlepen!
Lauter kolla, kai ap leskro drom djana, krenn kowa, hoi latcho un tchatcho hi, un penenn o tchatchepen.
Rodenn pal kowa, hoi hi mishto glan o Jesuseste, maro rajeste!
Ma djan ap o tchilatcho drom kolentsa, kai krenna, hoi tchi moldo un tchilatcho hi! Sike lende, har tchilatcho kowa hi!
Kowa, hoi jon tchorchanes krenna, hi jaake djungelo, te hunte ladjell kowa pes, kai kolestar rakrella.
Te sikrah len lengro tchilatcho koowa, hi kowa jaake, har te anams ko koowa pash i momeli. Un jon dikenn les ninna.
Un kowa, hoi diklo wella, atchell gar an o tamlepen. Doleske giwah mer an i gili: "Tu, kai soweh, ste pre! Ste i mulendar pre! Un o Kristo well tuke har i momeli."
Denn jak koi pre, har tumer tumaro djipen djiwenna! Ma djiwenn har dinele menshe! Djiwenn har kolla, kai djinenna, hoi mishto hi!
Hako kopo, kai krenn nai latcho koowa, krenn kowa! Kau tsiro, kai djiwah, hi tchilatcho.
Doleske krenn tumaro dji pre, te haiwenn, hoi o rai Jesus tumendar kamella!
Ma pijenn jaake bud mool, te wenn mato! Te han mato, palle krenn tumer hako dinelo koowa. Mukenn o Debleskro Ducho o rai an tumende te well, un wenn pherdo lestar!

Giwenn lauter khetne o Debleskre gilja un sawe gilja, hoi sharenn o Debles, ninna sawe gilja, hoi o Debleskro Ducho an tumende tchiwella! Giwenn un bashrenn o tselo djijestar o Jesuseske, maro rajeske!
Parkrenn tumen hako tsiro pash o Debleste, maro dadeste, lautereske, hoi das lo tumen! Krenn kowa an o lab maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar!
O Jesus Kristo hi tumaro rai. Un tumer penenn Rai ap leste. Doleske hunte hadell pes kek tumendar pral o wawareste.
Tumer djuwja, ma hadenn tumen pral tumare romende! Jaake sikrenn tumer, kai hi o Jesus Kristo tumaro rai.
O rom hi o rai pral i djuwjate jaake, har hi o Jesus Kristo o rai pral i tsele patslende. Kolen las job dran o tchilatchepen win. Jon hi leskre menshe.
Jaake har kol tsele patsle ap o Jesus Kristeste shunenna, jaake hunte shunenn ninna i romja ap pengre romende an hako koowa.
Tumer mursha, awenn jaake kamlo ap tumare romjende, har o Jesus Kristo kamlo hi ap i patslende! Job das peskro djipen lenge an o merepen,
te wenn le erligo un djudjo glan leste. Job thowas lengri doosh lendar tele, har patsan le leskro lab, un wan leske an o pani thodo.
Jaake kras lo len railes un shukar. Kek djungelo un tchilatcho koowa hi ap lende. Djudjo un erligo hi le glan leste tardo.
Jaake hunte well i mursh jaake kamlo ap peskri romjate har hi lo kamlo ap peste! Te hi lo kamlo ap peskri romjate, hi kowa jaake har te wals lo kamlo ap peste.
Kek hi tchilatcho ap peste. Na-a, job krell peske lauter latcho koowa. Jaake krell kowa o Jesus Kristo i patslenge ninna.
Mer ham leskri familja.
An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Doleske mukell i mursh peskro dades un peskri da, te djiwell lo peskri romjaha khetne. Un kol dui wenna jek familja.
Kawa lab sikrell men i baro tchatchepen. Me rakrau o Jesus Kristestar un kolendar, kai ap leste patsenna.
Ninna te haiwau me kau lab jaake, penell kau lab tumenge: Hakeno hunte well jaake kamlo ap peskri romjate, har job kamlo ap peste hi! Un i romni hunte well latcho ap peskro romeste!
Tumer tchawe, shunenn ap tumaro dadeste un ap tumari date! Kowa hi mishto glan o Debleste.
O Dewel penell menge: Dik ap tiro dadeste un ap tiri date, te djal lenge mishto! Koon kowa krella, koleske djal mishto, un job djiwell i raha djipen ap i phub.
Tumer dada, ma choirenn tumare tchawen! Penenn lenge, hoi o Dewel lendar kamella, un sikrenn lende, har te djan le ap o Debleskro drom!
Tumer budepangre, kai hunte budrenn tumare rajenge, ap tumende penau: Shunenn ap tumare rajende! Darenn lendar un budrenn lenge, har te budrans o Jesus Kristeske!
Ma krenn koi budi jaake, te sharenn tumen i menshe! Na-a, krenn koi budi o Jesus Kristeske, te sharell job tumen! Jaake han leskre budepangre, kai o djijestar krenna, hoi o Dewel kamella.
Krenn tumari budi an o latchepen! Tumer budrenna o Debleske, un gar i menshenge.
Shunenn: Koon latcho koowa krella, koleste dell o Dewel latcho koowa pale. O Dewel dikell gar koi pre, hoi ko mensho hi: te hi lo i budepaskro, te hi lo i rai.

Tumer, kai han raja, ap tumende penau: Awenn latches ap kolende, kai tumenge budrenna! Ma denn len trad! Tumer djinenna: Len hi i rai an o bolepen. Kowa hi ninna tumaro rai. Glan leskre jaka hi jek mensho har ko wawar.
Ninna kamau tumenge te penell: Awenn soreles an o patsepen ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste! Les hi i bari soor tumenge.
O beng kamell tumen an peskro wast te lell. Doleske riwenn kol koola ap tumende, hoi dell o Dewel tumende, te atchenn nai soreles tardo an o kurepen o bengeha!
Mer kurah men gar i menshentsa. Na-a, tchilatche sorja hi mashkral o bolepen un i phub, kai wenna o bengestar. Kolen hi penepaske an kau tchilatcho tsiro. Kolentsa kurah men.
Doleske riwenn kol koola ap tumende, hoi dell tumen o Dewel, te kurenn tumen mishto ap ko diwes, kai well o beng ap tumende. Palle han sorleder har job, un atchenn soreles tardo.

Awenn jaake rido har i kurepaskro, kai djal an o kurepen! Trul leskro per hi i pessi soreli dori, un ap leskro betch i sasterno gad. Ap peskre pire riwell lo sorele kircha. Glan leste rikrell lo i buchli sasterni patrin. Ap leskro shero hidjell lo i sasterni stadi un an leskro tchatcho wast i charo. Djiwenn an o tchatchepen! Kowa hi jaake har te pandan i pessi soreli dori trul tumaro per. Krenn kowa, hoi hi mishto un latcho! Kowa hi har i sasterno gad ap tumaro betch.
Djan pash i menshende, un penenn lenge o latcho lab, te kras o Jesus Kristo i drom, kai o Dewel un i menshe mala wenna! Kowa hi jaake, har te riwenn tumer sorele kircha.
Patsenn soreles ap o Jesus Kristeste! Kowa hi jaake, har te rikrenn i buchli sasterni patrin glan tumende. Koja krell koi jag win, kolaha o beng ap tumende karje della.

Ma bistrenn, te las tumen o Jesus Kristo dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win! Kowa hi tumenge har i sasterni stadi ap tumaro shero. Lenn ninna o Debleskro lab an tumaro wast. Kowa hi har i charo, hoi dell tumen o Debleskro Ducho.
Rakrenn hako tsiro o Debleha! Mangenn lestar kowa, hoi o Debleskro Ducho an tumare djia tchiwella! Ma mukenn tele te mangell les i tsele patslenge!
Mangenn mange ninna, te dell o Dewel man i tchatche laba, un te darap gar i menshendar, te sikrap lende o Debleskro drom un penap lenge kowa, hoi djinenn le gar.
Koi budi das man o Jesus Kristo. Doleske hom me kanna stildo. Awa, mangenn o Debles mange, te darap gar un rakrap jaake, har miri budi hi.

Me bitchrom maro latcho phrales, o Tichiko, pash tumende, te penell lo tumenge, har mange djala, un hoi me krau. Job budrell o Jesuseske, maro rajeske, un krell peskro budi mishto. Me bitchrom les pash tumende, te djinenn tumer kowa lauter, un te krell lo tumare djia soreles.
Mire phrala, o Debleskri bacht well tumentsa, ninna kamlepen un patsepen! Kowa dell tumen o Dewel, maro dad, un o Jesus Kristo, maro rai.
O Debleskro latchepen well pral lauterende, kai kamenn maro rajes, o Jesus Kristes, o tselo djijeha! Job dell len o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella!

Mer, o Paulo un o Timoteo, tchinah kau liil. Mer budrah o Jesus Kristeske, un tchinah kau liil ap lauterende, kolen o Dewel win gole das an o foro Filipi, te patsenn le ap o Jesus Kristeste. Kau liil hi ninna i pralstunenge, kai denn garda ap i patslende, ninna kolenge, kai krenn o Debleskri budi mashkral i patslende.
Mu well tumen latchepen un bacht an o dji! Kowa dell tumen o Dewel, maro dad an o bolepen, un maro rai, o Jesus Kristo.
Hako tsiro, kai wenn tumer mange an o shero, parkrau man tumenge pash miro Debleste.
Un hako tsiro, kai mangau o Debles tumenge lauterenge, hom bachtelo pral tumende.
Tumer budran mantsa khetne, har mer sikram i menshende o Jesuseskro drom. Kowa kran tumer, har patslo wan, un mukan gar tele bis kau diwes.
Doleske djinau: O Dewel kras i latchi budi an tumende. Un job krell ninna, te atchenn pash leste, te wenn latches glan leste tardo ap ko diwes, kai well o Jesus Kristo pale.

Me nai sharau tumen jaake. Tumer han an miro dji un rikrenn mantsa khetne, ninna kanna, kai hom an o stilepen, un penau o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar glan i tchatchepangre un sikrau lende leskro drom jaake, te djinenn le o tchatchepen.
O Dewel djinella: Miro dji hi pash tumende. O Jesus Kristo das man i baro kamlepen tumenge.
Un me mangau o Deblestar, te well tumaro kamlepen bareder un bareder, te haiwenn, hoi o Dewel kamella, un te djinenn, hoi te krenna.
Jaake nai dikenn, hoi mishto un tchatcho hi. Un ap ko diwes, kai well o Jesus Kristo pale, han tumer an o tchatchepen glan leste tardo, un kek doosh hi ap tumende.
Un ko bud latcho un tchatcho koowa, hoi tumer kran, krell o Debles bares. Kowa kran tumer an i soor, hoi o Jesus Kristo das tumen.
Shunenn, mire phrala, me kamau te djinenn tumer kowa: Dran lauter, hoi ap mande was, shunan bud menshe o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar.
I tsele lurde, kai denn garda ap o themeskro rajeskro kheer, ninna kol wawar, kai kate hi, kolla lauter djinenn kanna, kai hom me o Jesus Kristeske an o stilepen.
Ninna bud patsle wan sorleder an o patsepen ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste, kanna, kai me stildo hom. Kolen hi buder kek traash, te sikrenn le i menshende o Jesuseskro drom.

Mashkral lende hi ninna sawe, kai silwerenn ap mande. Kolla rakrenn o Jesus Kristestar, te sikrenn le mande, kai jon kowa feteder haiwenna har me. Jon krenn kowa dran i tchilatcho dji un kamenn, te well mange budeder ropaske. Wawar sikrenn i menshende o Jesuseskro drom dran i latcho dji. Jon kamenn man o djijestar un djinenna, me hom kate stildo, te sikrap o Jesuseskro drom i tchatchepangren jaake, te djinenn le o tchatchepen.
Hoi te penap? Mange hi bud moldo, te well o Jesuseskro drom i menshende siklo, jaake te jaake. Jek rakrell lestar dran i tchilatcho dji, un i wawar dran i latcho dji.
Awa, me hom bachtelo. Tumer mangenn o Debles mange. Un ap miri rig hi o Debleskro Ducho, kai o Jesus Kristo man das. Doleske djinau, te djal lauter mishto mange.

Me patsau te rikrell man o Dewel an o wast, un kamau o tselo djijestar te krap tchi, kai hunte ladjap man glan leste. Kamau gar, te trashap i menshendar. Jaake har rakrom hako tsiro o Jesus Kristestar, un trashom lendar gar, jaake kamau les ninna kanna an o stilepen te krell, ninna te hunte merap, te dikenn i menshe ap miro djipen un ap miro merepen, har baro un railo o Jesus Kristo hi.
Miro djipen hi o Jesus Kristeske. Un te merau me, hi kowa mange feteder.
Me te atchau djido, nai sikrau budeder menshende o Jesuseskro drom. Doleske djinau gar, hoi budeder moldo hi.
Awa, me djinau gar, hoi feteder hi. Ap jek rig kamaus te merap un te wap pash o Jesus Kristeste. Kowa wals mange feteder.
Ap i wawar rig wals tumenge feteder, te atchap djido.

Doleske hi miro dji sorelo, un me djinau, te atchap djido, un wau pale pash tumende. Te hom pale pash tumende, wenn tumer soreles un bachteles an o patsepen, un parkrenn tumen pash o Jesus Kristeste, un sharenn les bud un budeder.

Kanna, krenn lauter, te djan jaake ap o Jesuseskro drom, har kowa tumende siklo was! Krenn kowa ninna, te hom gar pash tumende! Te dikau tumen gar, kamaus te shunap, te rikrenn tumer lauter khetne an o patsepen, un te krenn i tseli sorjaha lauter, te well o patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste sorelo pash tumende.

Ma darenn kolendar, kai kamenn gar o Jesus Kristes, un kai chan pen ap tumende! Te han sorelo an o patsepen tardo, sikrell kowa lende, te djan jon nashedo, un te lenn tumer o djipen an o bolepen, hoi wella o Deblestar.
O Dewel hi tumenge latcho, un das tumen o patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste, un gar o patsepen kokres. Na-a, dran o patsepen ap leste, hunte lenn tumer ninna duka ap tumende.
Kol duka, hoi ap tumende wenna, his man ninna, har homs pash tumende. Un ninna kanna ap kau tsiro shunenn tumer mandar, kai hunte lap duka ap mande.

Me djinau, tumer rakrenn i menshenge o Jesuseskre laba an o dji. Tumare laba wenna dran o kamlepen, un krenn lengre djia soreles. O Debleskro Ducho rikrell tumen khetne, un tumen hi i baro dji i wawarenge.
Kowa lauter krell man bachtelo. Krenn man gomme bachtleder, te well tumen jek dji un jek djipen, un te kamell hakeno o wawares o djijestar! Rikrenn khetne un tchingrenn tumen gar!

Kek te krell tchomone, hoi leske kokres mishto hi, witar tchi, te well lo sharedo pash i menshende! Kek te krell, har te wals lo feteder har ko wawar! Na-a, ap hakeneste penau: Dik jaake ap o wawareste, har te wals lo bareder har tu!
Kek te dikell ap peste kokres, te djal leske mishto! Job te dikell ninna ap o wawareste, te djal koleske ninna mishto!
Djiwenn jaake, har o Jesus Kristo djiwas!
Ninna te his lo o Dewel, mukas lo peskro railepen un peskri soor, hoi les an o bolepen his.
Job das kowa lauter pre, un was i mensho, un djiwas har i menshe. Job was i budepaskro o Debleske,
un shunas ap leste, un mukas, te wan i menshe rai pral leste, un maran les, un dan les ap o trushel.
Doleske kras o Dewel, te well job bareder har hako wawar rai.
Un hakeno an o bolepen un ap i phub un tel i phub hunte perell glan leste tele ap i tchanga.
Un lauter hunte penenna: "O Jesus Kristo hi o rai pral lauter!" Un jaake sharenn le o Debles, maro dades an o bolepen.

Mire kamle phrala un phenja, tumer shunan hako tsiro ap kowa, hoi me tumenge penom, har pash tumende homs, ninna kanna, kai gar pash tumende hom. Me penau tumenge: Krenn lauter, te atchenn ap o Debleskro drom, bis te han pash leste! Shunenn ap o Debleste, un trashenn lestar!
Job sikrell tumen, hoi job kamella. Ninna krell lo an tumende, te kamenn tumer kowa, hoi job kamella, un te nai krenn kowa ninna.
Lauter kowa, hoi tumer krenna, krenn les i bachtelo djijestar, un tchingrenn gar!

Jaake djiwenn tumer, har mishto hi. Un kek hatsell i doosh ap tumende. Tumer han o Debleskre tchawe, un djiwenn mashkral kol menshende, kai hi tchilatcho un nashran pen an bud dinelo koowa. Mashkral kolende han tumer har i momlia an i rati,

te rikrenn tumer ap o Debleskro latcho lab, hoi o djipen della. Te krenn tumer kowa lauter, palle hom me bachtelo ap ko diwes, kai o Jesus Kristo pale wella. Jaake his miri budi pash tumende gar tchitcheske.

Me anom tumen ap o Debleskro drom. Doleske hom me glan leste tardo har i rashai, kai anell leske tumaro patsepen. Ninna te meroms pash miri budi o Jesus Kristeske, hom me kanna bachtelo tumentsa khetne pral tumaro patsepen.
Awenn tumer ninna bachtelo koi pral! Awa, awenn bachtelo mantsa!

Kamau te bitchrap o Timotes sik pash tumende, un patsau, te krell maro rai Jesus i drom, te bitchrap les. O Timoteo, te well lo pale pash mande, nai penell lo mange, har tumenge djala, te wap bachtelo pral tumende.
Man hi kek wawar har job, koles sawo baro dji hi tumenge, un job kamell, te djal tumenge mishto.
Kol wawar krenn lauter, hoi lenge mishto hi. Jon krenn gar, hoi o Jesus Kristo kamella.
Tumer prindjrenn o Timotes un djinenn, har mishto leskri budi hi. Har me i menshende o Jesuseskro drom sikrom, his lo mange koi, har hi i tchawo peskro dadeske koi.
Koles kamau me pash tumende bitchrell, jaake sik har djinau, hoi kate mantsa djala.
Me patsau te mukell man o rai Jesus sik pash tumende te well.
Kanna bitchrau maro phrales, o Epafrodito, pash tumende pale. Koles bitchran tumer pash mande, te anas lo man kowa, hoi man hunte well djipaske. Peskri tseli sorjaha kras lo mantsa o Debleskri budi.
Tumer shunan, kai job nasselo was. Har job shunas, kai tumer djinenn kowa, rowas leskro dji, un job kamas pash tumende te well.
Job his tchatchepaha ap o merepen tchiddo. O Dewel his leske latches, un rikras peskro wast pral leste. Gar kokres leske his lo latches, ninna mange his lo latches, te well mange gar budeder ropaske.
Doleske bitchrau les sik pash tumende, te dikenn les tumer, te wenn bachtelo, un te well ninna mange buder gar ropaske.
Lenn les o djijestar pash tumende pre! Job hi maro phraal an o patsepen ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste. Sawe phrala har job hi tumenge bud moldo.
Har tumer wan nai gar pash mande, his job mange koi, un leskro djipen his leske gar bud moldo. Leskri budi o Jesus Kristeske anas les pash o merepen.
Mire phrala, awenn bachtelo, kai tumer ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste, patsenn! Me wau gar khino, te tchinap tumenge pale te pale ko emligo koowa, te wenn tumer soreles an o dji.

Denn garda, te shunenn gar ap kolende, kai hi tchilatche budepangre un djukle. Jon kamenna, te mukenn tumen ap tumaro mass te tchinell, un penenn: "Kowa hunte krenn, te nai wenn tumer o Debleskre menshe!"

Mer, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsah, ham tchatchepaha o Debleskre menshe. Ap mende hi o Debleskro Ducho. Jaake nai krah o Debleskri budi. Mer ham bachtelo pral kowa, hoi o Jesus Kristo menge kras un hunte rikras kek koowa, hoi wella i menshendar. Mer djinah, sawo koowa nai anell men gar pash o Debleste.
Me nai sharoms man ninna, te rikrom menshengro koowa. Jek te sharals pes, te hi lo tchindlo ap peskro mass, palle nai sharoms man budeder.

Me wom ap miro mass tchindlo, har homs ochta diwessa phuro. Me hom i Israelitari. Mire menshe hi Benjaminarja. Me hom i Hebreari. Un miro dad un miri dai hi ninna Hebrearja. Un me homs i Farisari, un djiwom pal o Moseskre lila.
Miri tseli sorjaha lom kolen palla, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsenna. Me krom kowa lauter, hoi an o Moseskre lila tchindlo hi, un kek nai anas i doosh ap mande.
Har o Jesus Kristo miro rai was, was mange lauter kowa tchi moldo, hoi mange an ko tsiro bud moldo his.

Awa, kowa lauter, hoi me ap ko tsiro patsom un krom, hi mange kanna buder tchi moldo. Me prindjrau kanna o Jesus Kristes. Job hi miro rai. Doleske hi ko tselo wawar koowa mange har tchik, un tchi moldo. O Jesus Kristes kokres kamau te prindjrell budeder.

Leske kamau te djiwell. Har djiwom pal o Moseskre lila kras man kowa gar tchatcho glan o Debleste. Na-a, miro patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste kras man tchatcho glan o Debleste. Koon patsell ap o Jesus Kristeste, koles tchiwell o Dewel an o tchatchepen.
Kamoms te prindjrap tchi wawar har o Jesus Kristes un o Debleskri soor, kai kras les i mulendar djido. Un me lau duka ap mande, jaake har job duka ap peste las, te wap jaake har job bis ap o merepen,
te krell o Dewel man ninna i mulendar djido.
Ninna te hom gomme gar jaake har kamoms te wap, un hom gomme gar kote, kai kamau te wap, nashau o Jesuseskro drom, te lap o djipen pash o Debleste. Koleske das man o Jesus Kristo gole.
Mire phrala, me nai penau gomme gar mandar, te hom me jaake har kamoms te wap. Jek nai penau: Me bistrau, hoi pal mande hi, un rodau kowa, hoi glan mande hi.

Me nashau ap o Jesuseskro drom dureder, te lap ko shukar koowa, hoi dell o Dewel kolen, kai gar pre dan. Kowa hi o djipen pash leste an o bolepen. Doleske das lo men gole, te djiwas o Jesus Kristeha khetne.
Koon prindjrell kowa lauter, hunte djiwell jaake. Te haiwell jek tumendar tchomone wawartchandes, pale sikrell les o Dewel, har kowa tchatcho hi.
Jek hunte kras: Kowa, hoi mer djinah, jaake hunte djiwas ninna.
Mire phrala, dikenn ap mande un ap kolende, kai djiwenn jaake har me! Djiwenn tumer ninna jaake!
Me penom tumenge, un penau les kanna pale i ropaha: Bud menshe djiwenn jaake, har te wals lenge o Jesuseskro merepen ap o trushel tchi moldo.

Jon djan ap i drom, kai djan le nashedo. Lengro per hi lengro Dewel. Jon sharenn ko djungelo koowa, hoi kran le, un hunte ladjans pen pral kowa. Kowa, hoi an lengro shero trujal djala, hi phubjakro koowa.
Maro them, kai khere ham, hi o bolepen, kai o rai, o Jesus Kristo, hi. Mer dikah ap ko diwes, kai well lo pale, un te dell lo men o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
Kanna ham menshe, kai hunte merenna. Job krell dran mende newe menshe, kai wenn jaake har job, un merah buder gar. Jaake sorelo hi lo. Les hi koi soor, te krell lo lauter, hoi job kamella.
Mire kamle phrala, me kamau o tselo djijestar pash tumende te well. Tumer han miri bacht un miro railepen. Doleske atchenn soreles pash maro rajeste, o Jesuseste!
Me mangau tumen, tumer phenja Evodia un Sinticha, tchingrenn buder gar khetne! Tumer han phenja an o patsepen ap maro rajeste, o Jesuseste.

Me mangau ninna tut, miro latcho males, ab lenge ap i rig! Har sikrom i menshenge o Jesuseskro drom, budran le khetne mantsa un o phraleha, o Klemens, un kol wawarentsa, kolengre laba hi tchindlo an o Debleskro liil, kai halauter dre tchindlo hi, kai lenn o Debleskro djipen.
Awenn bachtelo hako tsiro! Tumari bacht well o Jesusestar, maro rajestar. Awa, awenn bachtelo!
Sikrenn hakeneste tumaro latchepen! O rai Jesus wella an i tikno tsiro pale.
Ma darenn tchi! Hako tsiro mangenn o Deblestar, hoi tumen hunte well, un penenn leske lauter, hoi ap tumaro dji hi! Un parkrenn tumen pash leste!
Palle dell o Dewel tumen peskri bacht an o dji. Leskri bacht hi jaake baro, kai nai haiwah kowa gar. Un o Jesus Kristo rikrell tumaro dji, un lell tumari daar krik.

Pale penau tumenge, mire phrala, rakrenn pral kowa, hoi latcho un tchatcho hi, hoi djudjo hi, hoi kamlo hi, hoi mishto hi pash i menshende! Awa, rakrenn pral lauter kowa, hoi shukar hi un well sharedo!
Un djiwenn jaake, har me tumenge penom un sikrom, jaake har tumer kowa mandar shunan un ap mande dikan! Un o Dewel, kai kras i drom, te nai djiwah an o latchepen khetne, hi tumentsa!

Me homs o djijestar bachtelo, un parkrom man pash maro rajeste, o Jesuseste, har dikom, kai tumer bistran man gar, un bitchran man kowa, hoi man hunte well djipaske. Ninna te kaman tumer kowa i raha tsiro mange te krell, djas kowa gar.
Kowa penau gar, te sikrap tumen, kai man gar doha his. Na-a. An miro djipen haiwom, te hi mange kowa doha, hoi man hi.

Me nai hom tchorwelo, un me nai hom brawelo. Kowa lauter prindjrau. Me nai bokau. Un me nai hom tchalo. Me djinau har kowa hi, te hi man budeder har doha djipaske. Un me djinau, har kowa hi, te hi man gar doha djipaske.
O Jesus Kristo dell man i soor, te djiwap jaake te jaake.
Ninna te rakrau jaake, his kowa shukar tumendar, kai wan mange ap i rig, har djas mange gar mishto.

Tumer patsle, kai an o foro Filipi djiwenna, tumer djinenna, har krom man ap o drom, te penap i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, un djom dran o them Macedonia win. An ko tsiro dan tumer man lauter, hoi man hunte was djipaske. Kek wawar patsle, pash kolende homs, kran kowa, har tumer kokres.
Ninna har homs an o foro Tessalonika, bitchran tumer mange dui kope tchomone.
Me penau kowa gar, te denn mange tchomone. Na-a, kamau, te denn tumer o Debleske tchomone, te sharell job tumen.

Kanna hi man lauter, hoi man hunte well djipaske, un budeder har doha. O Epafrodito anas mange kowa lauter, hoi tumer mange bitchran. Kowa hi jaake, har te anans tumer o Debleske latcho koowa, hoi sungell mishto, un kai dikell lo latches pre un hi bachtelo pral kowa.
Miro Dewel dell ninna tumen lauter, hoi tumen hunte well djipaske. Les hi i baro brawlepen an o bolepen. Kowa dell lo kolen, kai djan ap o Jesus Kristeskro drom.
Sharas o Debles, maro dades an o bolepen, kanna un hako tsiro! Amen.

Penenn ap kol tsele patslende, kai djan ap o Jesus Kristeskro drom: "Atchenn maro Debleha!" Kowa penenn tumenge ninna kol phrala, kai pash mande hi, ninna i tsele patsle, kai kate an o foro Rom hi. Kolla, kai budrenn an o kheer o baro rajestar an o foro Rom, kamenn tumen o tselo djijestar.
O latchepen maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, well pral tumende!

Me, o Paulo, tchinau kau liil khetne maro phraleha, o Timoteo. O Jesus Kristo bitchras man, te penap i menshenge leskro lab. Jaake kamell kowa o Dewel. Mer tchinah kau liil ap o Debleskre tchawende an o foro Kolossa. Tumer han mare phrala un phenja an o patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste. Latchepen un bacht tumenge! Kowa dell tumen o Dewel, maro dad, an o dji!

Mer shunam, har tumer patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste, un har tumer i tsele patslen o djijestar kamenna. Doleske parkrah men tumenge pash o Debleste hako tsiro, kai mangah les tumenge. Job hi o dad maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar.

Tumaro patsepen un kamlepen well dran kowa, kai dikenn tumer ap ko diwes, kai djiwenn tumer o Debleha khetne an o bolepen. Kowa shunan tumer ap ko tsiro, har tumenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar penlo was. Un ko lab hi tchatcho.

Kau latcho lab was gar tumenge kokres penlo. Na-a, kau lab well ap i tseli phub penlo. Un bud un budeder menshe wenna patsle. Jaake hi ninna pash tumende: Tumer shunan ko latcho lab, un haiwan tchatchepaha, kai hi o Dewel latches ap tumende.
Kau lab penas tumenge maro kamlo phraal, o Epafras. Kowa budrella o Jesus Kristeske har mer. Job krell peskri budi mishto pash tumende.
Job penas menge, har baro tumaro kamlepen hi, hoi das tumen o Debleskro Ducho.
Un har mer kowa shunam, mangam o Debles tumenge, un mukam gar tele, te mangas lestar, te dell lo an tumende o goswepen, hoi dell o Debleskro Ducho, te haiwenn tumer, hoi o Dewel kamella.

Palle djiwenn tumer jaake, te well o Dewel sharedo, un krenn lauter, hoi hi latcho un mishto glan leskre jaka. Un dran tumaro djipen well bud latcho koowa. Un tumer prindjrenn o Debles hako tsiro feteder.
Lestar mangah, te dell lo tumen peskri bari soor, te wenn tumare djia soreles, te djan bachteles dureder ap leskro drom, ninna an ko tsiro, kai hi tumaro djipen pharo.
Parkrenn tumen o tselo djijestar pash o Debleste, kai hi tumaro dad an o bolepen! Job kras tumen moldo, te djiwenn tumer khetne i wawar patslentsa pash leste an o bolepen, kai hi kek tamlepen.
Job las men win dran i wasta kolestar, kai hi o rai pral o tamlepen un o tchilatchepen, te djiwas mer khetne peskro Tchaweha, koles job o djijestar kamella. Kowa hi maro rai,
kai plaissras menge peskro rateha, un las mari doosh mendar krik.
Kek nai dikell o Debles. Har leskro tchawo ap i phub was, sikras job har o Dewel hi. O Jesus Kristo hi jaake har peskro dad. Un job hi bareder har lauter, hoi kerdo was.

Dran leste was lauter kerdo, hoi hi an o bolepen un ap i phub, kowa, hoi dikah, un hoi gar dikah. Mank lende hi bare raja un i sorele pralstune un lauter, kai hi len penepaske mashkral o bolepen un i phub. Lauter wan dran leste, un wan leske kerdo.
O Jesus Kristo his glan hako wawareste koi. Un lauter, hoi koi hi, rikrell lo djides.

Job hi o pralstuno pral i tsele patslende. Har o Dewel les i mulendar djido kras, das lo les o newo djipen glan hako wawareste, koles o Dewel newes krella. Jaake kras o Dewel, kai hi o Jesus Kristo o pralstuno pral halauter, hoi koi hi.
O Debles his an peskro dji, te djiwell lo an peskro tchaweste, te well o tchawo jaake har o dad.
Un o Jesus Kristo hi ko drom, kai o Dewel un i menshe pale mala wenna. Har job ap o trushel meras, un peskro rat ratas, anas o Dewel lauteren pash peste khetne, hoi hi an o bolepen un ap i phub.
Ninna tumen anas o Dewel pash peste. Glan i raha tsiro djiwan tumer dur lestar, kran tchilatcho koowa, un kaman o Debles gar.
Kanna wan tumer o Debleskre mala. Har peskro tchawo tumenge meras, las lo tumari doosh tumendar un kras tumen djudjo un erligo glan leste.

Jek koowa hunte krenn tumer: Atchenn ap o Jesuseskro drom! Patsenn soreles ap leste! Mukenn gar tele, te dikenn ap kowa, hoi tumen hi pash o Debleste! Rikrenn soreles ap leskro latcho lab, hoi tumenge penlo was! Ko lab was penlo ap i tseli phub. Ninna me, o Paulo, hunte penap ko lab i menshenge. Kowa hi miri budi.
Un kanna hom bachtelo an kol duka, hoi anom tumenge ap mande. Jaake har o Jesus Kristo anas duka ap peste i patslenge, jaake hunte anap me ninna duka ap mande i patslenge.
Lengro budepaskro wom me. O Dewel das man koi budi, te penap tumenge o tselo Debleskro lab.
I raha tsiro djinan i menshe ap i tseli phub gar, hoi o Dewel kamas te krell. Kanna djinenn les o Debleskre menshe.

Kolen sikras o Dewel, har baro un shukar ko drom hi, hoi anell ninna kol menshen pash leste, kai kek bibolde hi. Un ko drom hi o Jesus Kristo, kai djiwell an tumende. Doleske djinenn nai, te djiwenn tumer leha khetne an o bolepen.

Un kau Jesuseskro drom sikrah mer i menshende, un penah hakeneske an o dji, te djal lo ap kau drom. Mer penah lenge o Debleskro lab jaake, te haiwenn le les mishto. O Dewel kamella, te well hakeno baro un sorelo an o patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste.
Dran kowa budrau i tseli sorjaha, hoi o Jesus Kristo an mande das.
Me kamau, te djinenn tumer, har me marau man tele tumenge un kol patslenge an o foro Laodicea, ninna kolenge, kai prindjrenn man gar.

Kowa krau, te wenn tumer soreles an tumaro dji, un rikrenn khetne an o kamlepen. Ninna kamau, te haiwenn tumer mishto o Debleskro drom, hoi i menshe i raha tsiro gar djinan. Ko drom hi o Jesus Kristo.
Job kokres nai dell tumen o tselo goswepen, te haiwenn o Debleskro lab mishto.
Kowa penau tumenge, te anell tumen kek chochene labentsa kau dromestar tele.
Ninna te hom gar pash tumende, han tumer an miro dji. Un me hom bachtelo, te shunau, kai han soreles tardo an o patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste.
Tumer lan o rajes, o Jesus Kristes, an tumare djia. Djiwenn kanna jaake leha khetne,
te well tumaro patsepen jaake sorelo har i ruk, hoi soreles an i phub tardo hi! Ma mukenn ko tchatcho drom, hoi tumende siklo was! Bistrenn witar gar, te parkrenn tumen bud pash o Debleste!

Denn jak, te shunenn ap kekeste, kai kamell te taprell tumen shukar labentsa, hoi wenna dran i menshengro goswepen. Kowa hi chochepen un tchi moldo! Kol laba hi menshengro rakepen, hoi i phure ap i tchawende dureder penan un wella i phubjatar, un gar o Jesus Kristestar.
O Jesus Kristo hi o rai pral i tsele rajende un lauterende, kai hi len penepaske mashkral o bolepen un i phub. Les hi o tselo Debleskro djipen an peste. Un ko djipen dell lo kolende, kai leskro hi.

Har mukan tumaro phuro djipen pal tumende, wan tumer o Debleskre menshe. I bibolde wan tchindlo i wastentsa ap pengro mass. Tumer wan gar tchindlo i wastentsa. Na-a! Tumer lan i newo dji, hoi das tumen o Jesus Kristo.

Har tumer o Jesus Kristeske an o pani thodo wan, was tumaro phuro djipen paskedo. Un jaake wan tumer o Jesus Kristeha paskedo. Har tumer ap leste patsan, kras o Dewel tumen djido, jaake har job o Jesus Kristes i mulendar djido kras.
An o phuro tsiro, har tumer an o tchilatchepen djiwan, hans mulo o Debleske, un hans gar leskre menshe. Kanna kras o Dewel tumen o Jesus Kristeha djido, un las tumari tseli doosh tumendar.
Har kram tchilatcho koowa, his kowa jaake, har te wals mari doosh an i liil tchindlo. Ko liil las lo, un tchiwas les ap o trushel.

Un i raja un lauter, kolen hi penepaske mashkral o bolepen un i phub, kolla nashran pengri soor, har o Jesus Kristo ap o trushel meras. Kote sikras o Dewel glan lauterende, kai hi o Jesus Kristo sorleder har jon.

Ma shunenn ap kolende, kai penenn tumenge: "Hi gar mishto, te chan un pijenn tumer kawa te kowa!" Ma shunenn ap lende, te penenn le tumenge, te denn jak ap i bare diwessa an o tchon un an o bersh, ninna ap o diwes, kai i bibolde gar budrenna.

Me penau tumenge: Kol tsele laba, kai penenn, hoi hunte krenn, un hoi hunte krenn gar, kol laba das o Dewel i bibolden glan i raha tsiro, te sikrell lo len, te well jek diwes, kai kowa wella, kai hi bareder har kau tselo koowa. Kowa was kanna. Job hi o Jesus Kristo.

Hi menshe, kai krenn pen bares, un kamenna, te shunenn tumer ap kawa te kowa, un te sharenn tumer o Debleskre bolepangre, har jon krenna. Ma shunenn ap lende! Ninna te penenn le tumenge, te dikan le i baro koowa, hoi kek wawar dikas, ma patsenn lenge! Kowa, hoi jon penenna, hi tchi moldo. Jon hi sharede, ninna te dell tchi, pral hoi jon nai sharans pen: Lauter hoi jon rakrenna well dran lengro shero.

Jon rikrenn pen gar ap o Jesus Kristeste, ko rai pral i tsele patslende. Jaake har i kokale i menshes khetne rikrenna, jaake rikrell job i patslen khetne pash leste, un dell len lauter, hoi len hunte well djipaske. Un jon wenna baro un sorelo an o patsepen jaake, har o Dewel kowa kamella.
Tumer meran o Jesus Kristeha. Doleske hi i phubjakro koowa buder gar o rai pral tumende. Hoske rikrenn tumen gomme ap kol menshengre laba, kai penenn tumenge:
Ma taprenn kawa! Ma chan kowa! Ma lenn kowa an tumaro wast!
Me penau: Ko koowa hi chapaske un atchell gar. Kol laba hi menshengre laba.

Ninna te wals jaake, har te wans kol laba gosewe laba, hi le tchi moldo. Kol menshe marenn pen tele o Debleske, jaake har jon kamenna, un gar har o Dewel kowa kamella. Jon shunenn ap kawa te kowa, un marenn pen tele. Un jaake krenn le kowa, hoi dran lende wella un gar o Deblestar.
O Dewel kras tumen o Jesus Kristeha i mulendar djido. Doleske tchiwenn tumaro dji ap kowa, hoi hi an o bolepen! Kote hi o Jesus Kristo ap i tchatchi rig o Deblestar beshdo!
Dikenn ap kowa, hoi an o bolepen hi! Ma dikenn ap kowa, hoi ap i phub hi!
Tumer meran. Un tumaro newo djipen hi kanna o Jesus Kristeha pash o Debleste an o bolepen, ninna te dikenn kowa kanna gomme gar.
Ap ko tsiro, kai nai dikell hakeno o Jesus Kristes, dikenn le ninna tumen pash leste an leskro railepen.

Ma krenn buder ko koowa, hoi kran an tumaro phuro djipen: Ma luberenn trujal! Ma krenn djungelo un wi-ladjedo koowa! Ma mukenn tchilatcho koowa an tumaro shero trujal te djal! Ma nashenn pal i lowe! Koon pal i lowe nashella, koleske hi peskre lowe har leskro dewel.
Kol menshe, kai shunenn gar ap o Debleste, kolla krenna sawo koowa. Doleske well o Debleskri choli pral lende.
Ap ko phuro tsiro, har tumer gar ap o Jesus Kristeste patsan, kran tumer ninna kowa lauter.
Kanna djiwenn tumer buder gar tumaro phuro djipen. Doleske tchiwenn i choli tumendar krik, ninna o tchilatchepen, o djungelo rakepen pral o wawareste, wi-ladjede laba! Ma chochenn tumen!

Djiwenn kanna o newo djipen! Mukenn tumen o Deblestar bud un budeder newes te krell, jaake te prindjrenn o Debles feteder un djinenn, hoi job kamella! Palle wenn tumer jaake har job, kai tumen o newo djipen das.

Kote, kai o Dewel i menshen newes kras, kote hi jek jaake bud moldo har o wawar: I bibolde un kolla, kai kek bibolde hi; kolla, kai ap o mass tchindlo hi un kolla, kai gar ap o mass tchindlo hi; wi-themarja un diwje; raja un budepangre. O Jesus Kristo djiwell an hakeneste mendar.

Tumer han kanna o Debleskre menshe, kolen job peske win rodas. Job kamell tumen o djijestar. Doleske hunte well tumen i baro dji o wawareske, te well hakeno latcho ap o wawareste, te krell pes kek bareder har o wawar, te rakrell hakeno latches o wawareha, te dell kek o wawares sik pre,
te choirell pes kek sik pral o wawareste. Un bistrenn ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi i wawar ap tumende kran! Jaake har o rai, o Jesus Kristo, tumari doosh bistras, hunte krenn tumer kowa ninna.
Bareder har lauter hi o kamlepen, hoi wella o Deblestar. Te kamenn tumer i wawaren o djijestar, palle krenn tumer lauter, hoi o Dewel tumendar kamella, un hoi tumen khetne rikrella.
O Jesus Kristo das tumen pash peste gole, te djiwenn lauter leha khetne. Djiwenn kanna jaake, te han tumer jek dji un jek djipen! Un parkrenn tumen pash o Debleste!

Ma mukenn tele, te rakrenn un shunenn o lab o Jesus Kristestar! Rakrenn les tumenge an o dji! Awenn gosewo koi pashal, te sikrell jek o wawareste, har te djal lo ap o Debleskro drom! Giwenn Debleskre gilja un sawe gilja, hoi sharenn o Debles, ninna sawe gilja, hoi o Debleskro Ducho an tumende tchiwella! Awa, giwenn o Debleske, un sharenn les an tumare djia!
Un lauter, hoi tumer krenna un penenna, kowa krenn un penenn jaake, te well maro rai Jesus sharedo! Un parkrenn tumen pash o Debleste, maro dadeste, lautereske, hoi o Jesus Kristo tumenge kras!
Tumer djuwja, ma hadenn tumen pral tumare romende! Jaake kamell kowa tumaro rai Jesus tumendar.
Tumer mursha, awenn kamlo ap tumare romjende, un gar chojedo!
Tumer tchawe, shunenn hako tsiro ap tumaro dadeste un ap tumari date! Kowa kamell o rai Jesus tumendar.
Tumer dada, ma awenn gar jaake chojedo ap tumare tchawen, te darenn le tumendar an o dji!

Tumer budepangre, shunenn hako tsiro ap tumare rajende, kolenge tumer hunte budrenna! Ma krenn tumari budi jaake, te sharenn tumen i menshe! Na-a! Budrenn lenge o tchatcho djijestar, un jaake, har kamell o rai Jesus kowa tumendar.
Lauter, hoi tumer krenna, krenn kowa o djijestar o Jesuseske, maro rajeske, un gar i menshenge!
Djinenn, maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, dell tumen peskro brawlepen an o bolepen. Leskre budepangre han tumer.
Koon o tchilatchepen krella, kowa lell i phagi. Pash o Debleste hi hakeno jaake bud moldo har o wawar.
Tumer kai han raja, ap tumende penau: Awenn tchatches ap tumare budepangre un djan lentsa mishto trujal! Ma bistrenn, kai hi tumen ninna i rai an o bolepen!
Ma mukenn tele, te mangenn o Debles! Parkrenn tumen hako tsiro pash leste!

Mangenn o Debles ninna menge, te krell lo menge i drom pre, te penas nai leskro lab i menshenge, te sikras lende, te hi o Jesus Kristo ko drom, kai anell men pash o Debleste. Kowa djinan i menshe i raha tsiro gar. Har me kowa i menshenge penom, wom doleske an o stilepen.
Mangenn o Deblestar, te rakrap kowa jaake, har o Dewel kamella!
Djiwenn tumaro djipen jaake, te dikenn i wawar, kai tumer patsle han! Rodenn i drom, te rakrenn lentsa pral o Debleste!
Rakrenn lentsa kamles, un trashenn gar, te penenn o tchatchepen! Jek te putchell tumendar tchomone pral tumaro patsepen, palle rakrenn leha jaake, har kowa koleske mishto hi.

Me bitchrau miro latcho phrales, o Tichiko, pash tumende, te penell lo tumenge lauter, hoi mantsa djal. Job budrell mantsa o Jesuseske, maro rajeske, un krell peskri budi mishto. Koles bitchrau pash tumende, te djinenn tumer, har menge djala, te wenn tumer soreles an o dji.
Leha khetne bitchrau miro latcho phrales, o Onesimo, kai rikrell soreles ap o patsepen. Kowa hi jek tumendar. Kol dui penenn tumenge lauter, hoi kate djala.

O Aristarcho, kai mantsa an o stilepen hi, penell tumenge "Atchenn o Debleha!" Ninna o Marko un ko Josua, kai ninna Justo kharella, penenn tumenge "Atchenn o Debleha!" O Marko hi o kakeskro tchawo o Barnabestar. Te well lo pash tumende, lenn les kamles pre, har penom tumenge glan i tsiro! Kolla triin mursha hi bibolde, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsenna. I tsele biboldendar, kai kate hi, krenna kol triin kokres mantsa khetne o Debleskri budi. Jon dan man soor an miro dji.

Ninna o Epafras penell tumenge: "Atchenn o Debleha!" Kowa hi jek tumendar, un budrell o Jesus Kristeske. Job mangell o Debles hako tsiro tumenge, te wenn tumer soreles an o patsepen, te djinenn lauter, hoi o Dewel tumendar kamella un te krenn kowa ninna.
Me nai penau, har bud job o Deblestar mangas tumenge un kol patslenge an i forja Laodicea un Hierapolis.
Ninna o Luka un o Demas penenn tumenge: "Atchenn o Debleha!" O Luka hi ko dramaskro, koles mer lauter o djijestar kamah.
Penenn i patslenge an o foro Laodicea mendar: "Atchenn o Debleha!" Penenn kowa ninna i Nimfa, un kol tsele patslenge, kai wenn khetne an lakro kheer!
Tumer te draweran kau liil, palle denn les ninna i patslende, kai wenn khetne an o foro Laodicea. Un drawerenn ninna ko liil, hoi tchinom kolenge!
Penenn ap o Archippo: Kre koi budi, hoi o rai Jesus tut das! Muk gar tele!
Me, o Paulo, tchinau tumenge miro wasteha kal laba: "Atchenn o Debleha!" Ma bistrenn man, kai hom an o stilepen! O Debleskro latchepen djal tumentsa!

Mer, o Paulo, o Silwano un o Timoteo, tchinah kau liil ap tumende, kol patslende, kai wenna khetne an o foro Tessalonika. Tumer patsenn ap o Debleste, maro dadeste, un ap maro rajeste, o Jesus Kristeste. Latchepen un bacht tumenge!
Hako tsiro, kai mangah o Debles, parkrah men tumenge pash leste, maro dadeste.

Hako tsiro, kai parkrah men pash leste, well menge kowa an o shero, hoi tumer leske krenna an o patsepen un an o kamlepen ap i menshende, un har tumer mukenn gar tele, te dikenn ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, pale.
Mire phrala, o Dewel kamell tumen o djijestar. Mer djinah, job rodas tumen win, te djiwenn leha khetne.

Har wam pash tumende, un penam tumenge o Debleskro latcho lab, koi penam gar leskro lab kokres, na-a, koi dikan tumer ninna o Debleskri soor an halauter, hoi job mashkral tumende kras. Un o Debleskro Ducho rakras ap tumende, un tumer haiwan, leskro lab hi tchatcho. Ninna djinenn tumer, har djiwam maro djipen pash tumende, un sikram tumen o Debleskro drom.

Un kowa, hoi dikan tumer ap mende, kowa krenn tumer kanna ninna, un djiwenn jaake, har o rai Jesus djiwas. Har shunan tumer o Debleskro lab, patsan les un hans bachtelo pral kowa, ninna te kran i menshe tumenge o djipen phares. Koi bacht das o Debleskro Ducho an tumende.
Kanna dikenn kol tsele patsle an i themma Macedonia un Achaja ap tumende, un kamenn kowa jaake te krell, har tumer kowa krenna.

Tumendar djas o latcho lab o Jesusestar, maro rajestar, dureder, gar kokres an i themma Macedonia un Achaja. Na-a, ninna an bud wawar themma shunan i menshe, har tumer patsenn ap o Debleste. Jaake hunte penas mer lenge buder tchi pral kowa.

Jon hi kolla, kai penenn i wawarenge, har lan tumer men pash tumende pre, har mukan tumaro phuro drom, te djan ap o Debleskro drom, un mangenn buder gar wawar koowa an har o djido un tchatcho Debles kokres.
Tumer dikenn ap ko diwes, kai well o Debleskro tchawo dran o bolepen pale. Kowa hi o Jesus, koles kras o Dewel i mulendar djido. Job lell men dran o Debleskri choli win, hoi pral i menshende wella.
Mire phrala, tumer djinenna, har wam pash tumende, un penam tumenge o Debleskro lab. Kowa his gar tchitcheske.

Glan ko tsiro, kai wam pash tumende, hams an o foro Filipi. Ninna te wam kote palla lino un dino, har tumer djinenn, djam pal kowa pash tumende an o foro Tessalonika. O Dewel das men i soor, te penas tumenge o Debleskro latcho lab, ninna te his pash tumende bud menshe, kai kran menge o djipen phares.
Jaake nai dikenn tumer, kowa, hoi tumenge penam, was gar dran i tchilatcho dji, un hi kek chochepen. Witar gar kamam tumen gosewe labentsa te taprell.

Na-a, o Debleske ham moldo, te das lo men koi budi, te sikras mer i menshende o Jesuseskro drom. Doleske rakrah mer lestar. Kowa krah gar, te dikenn i menshe latches ap mende, na-a, mer kamah, te dikell o Dewel latches ap mende. Job djinella, hoi an maro dji hi.
Tumer djinenna, mer rakram tumenge gar pal o mui. Witar gar penam o Debleskro lab, te las lowe i menshendar. O Dewel djinella, me penau o tchatchepen.
Mer rodam gar o sharepen i menshendar, gar tumendar, witar gar i wawarendar.
Mer ham o Jesus Kristeskre bitchepangre un nai penams tumenge soreles, hoi te krenn. Kowa kram gar. Na-a, mer hams kamlo ap tumende, har i dai ap peskre tchawende.
Tumer hans an mare djia, un doleske sikram tumende gar kokres o Debleskro drom, na-a, mer djiwam ninna tumentsa khetne; jaake baro his maro kamlepen tumenge.
Mire phrala, tumer djinenna, har phari mari budi his, har hams pash tumende, un sikram tumende o Debleskro drom. Ap o diwes un an i rat budram, te djiwas gar dran tumari possita.
O Dewel dikas, har djiwam mashkral tumende. Un tumer, kai ap leste patsenna, dikan ninna, te djiwam jaake pash tumende har o Dewel kamella, un djam pal o tchatchepen, te hatsas kek i doosh ap mende.

Tumer djinenna, mer rakram tumentsa har i dad peskre tchawentsa. Hakenes tumendar rakram an o dji latche un sorele labentsa, te djiwenn tumer jaake, te well o Dewel sharedo. Job das tumen gole, te djiwenn pash leste an o bolepen un lenn leskro railepen.

Doleske mukah gar tele, te parkras men pash o Debleste, te patsan tumer o Debleskro lab, hoi tumenge penam. Un tumer haiwan, ko lab well tchatchepaha o Deblestar un gar i menshendar. Un tumaro djipen sikrella, te patsenn tumer ap ko lab.
Mire phrala, tumare menshe lan tumen palla. Jaake djas tumenge har kol patsle biboldenge an o them Judea. Lengre menshe, i bibolde, lan len ninna palla.
I bibolde maran o Jesus Kristes. Glan leste maran le o Debleskre rakepangren. Men lan le ninna palla. Jon choirenn o Debles. Un ap i tsele menshende hi jon tchilatcho.

Jon mukenn men gar, te penas mer o latcho lab i wawarenge, kai kek bibolde hi, te nai wenn kolla ninna ap o Debleskro drom. Jaake was i biboldengri doosh jaake baro, bareder djal gar. Un o Debleskri choli was soreles pral lende.
Mire phrala, ninna te dikam men nai i tsiro gar, hams hako tsiro pash tumende maro djijeha. Maro dji nashell pal tumende, un mer kram lauter, te dikas tumen.
Me, o Paulo, kamom budeder kope pash tumende te well. Un o beng was hako kopo koi mashkral.
Mer ham bachtelo pral tumende. Un mer dikah ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai Jesus pale. Palle nai sharah men tumentsa.
Tumer han maro railepen un mari bacht.
Mer rikram buder gar win, te shunam buder tchi tumendar. Doleske penam menge, hi mishto, te atchap me, o Paulo, kate an o foro Athen, khetne maro phraleha, o Silwano,

un te djal maro phraal, o Timoteo, pash tumende. Kowa hi o Debleskro budepaskro, kai penell i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar. Mer bitchram les pash tumende, te krell lo tumen soreles an o dji un an tumaro patsepen,
te mukell kek tumendar peskro patsepen, ninna te well lo palla lino. Djinenn, kau pharo drom hi o Debleskro drom menge, un mer wah palla lino.
Kowa penam tumenge, har pash tumende hams. Un tumer dikan, kowa was jaake.

Doleske rikrom kowa buder gar win, un bitchrom o Timotes pash tumende, te nai penell lo mange, har han tardo an tumaro patsepen. Man his traash, te anals tumen o beng o Debleskro dromestar tele. Palle wals mari budi pash tumende tchitcheske.

Kanna was o Timoteo pale, un penas latcho koowa pral tumaro patsepen un kamlepen. Lestar djinah, mer ham hako tsiro an tumaro dji. Un tumer kamenn men pale te dikell, jaake har kamah mer tumen pale te dikell.
Mire phrala, kal latche laba kran mare djia bachtelo. Tumaro patsepen das men newi soor an maro pharo djipen. An i daar lam pale i newi soor, har dikam, te rikrenn tumen ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste.
Mer nai parkrah men gar doha pash o Debleste, jaake bachtelo kran tumer men.

Ap o diwes un an i rati mangah o Debles o tselo djijestar, te dikas tumen pale, te nai kras tumaro patsepen gomme sorleder. Me kamoms o tselo djijestar, te anell man o Dewel, maro dad, un o Jesus, maro rai, pash tumende.
Tumenge mangau me maro rajestar, o Jesusestar, te well tumaro kamlepen baro un bareder mashkral tumende un i wawar menshenge ninna. Jaake baro hi ninna maro kamlepen tumenge.
Palle wenn tumare djia sorelo un djudjo. Un o Dewel, maro dad, hatsell kek doosh ap tumende ap ko diwes, kai well o Jesus, maro rai, pale lauterentsa, kai leskre hi.

Mire phrala, mer sikram tumende, har te djiwenn tumaro djipen jaake, te well o Dewel bachtelo pral tumende. Un kowa krenn tumer. Kanna mangah tumen jaake har maro rai, o Jesus, mangals tumendar: Krenn kowa gomme budeder un feteder!
Tumer djinenna, hoi job tumendar kamella. Mer penam les tumenge.
O Dewel kamell, te djiwenn tumer i djudjo djipen, te sowell kek rom i djuwjaha khetne, kai hi gar peskri romni, un kek djuwel i mursheha, kai hi gar peskro rom.
Hako mursh hunte djiwell peskri romjaha jaake khetne, har glan o Debleste mishto hi. Job hunte dikell gar ap late, har te wals li tchi moldo.
I chantch hunte chal les gar pre, har kowa hi pash i menshende, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar.
Kek hunte chochell peskro phrales. Koon kowa krella, koles dell o Dewel i phagi. Jaake penam tumenge, un dam tumen trad.
O Dewel das men gole, te djiwas i djudjo djipen. Job das men gar gole, te kras djungelo koowa.
Koon kamell kol laba gar te shunell, kowa tchiwell o Debles ap i rig, un gar i menshes. Un o Dewel hi kowa, kai das peskro Ducho an tumende.
Me hunte tchinap tumenge gar, te well tumen i baro dji i patslenge. O Dewel penas tumenge kowa an o dji.
Un tumer krenn o latchepen ap i patslende an o tselo them Macedonia. Mire phrala, mukenn gar tele, te krenn kowa budeder un feteder!
Djiwenn tumaro djipen jaake, te nai rakrenn i menshe gar djungeles pral tumende! Krenn tumari budi! Budrenn jaake, te well tumen doha djipaske, jaake har tumenge penam!
Palle hunte lenn tumer tchi kolendar, kai hi gar patslo. Un jon rakrenn nai gar tchilatches pral tumende.
Mire phrala, mer kamah, te djinenn tumer, hoi hi kol patslentsa, kai meran, te well tumenge gar ropaske har kolenge, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar un djinenn gar, hoi pal o merepen wella.
Mer patsah, te meras o Jesus un stas i mulendar pale pre. Doleske djinah ninna, ap ko diwes, kai well o Jesus pale, anell o Dewel ninna kolen khetne leha, kai an o patsepen meran.
Mer penah tumenge, hoi o rai Jesus menge penas. Mer, kai ham gomme djido ap ko diwes, kai well o Jesus pale, wah gar sikeder pash leste har kolla, kai meran.

Ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai Jesus tele dran o bolepen, shunah, har jek gole della. O Debleskro pralstuno bolepaskro dell bari gole, un jek phurdell an o Debleskri bashepaskri. Palle stenn kol mule pre, kai patsan ap o Jesus Kristeste.
Palle wah mer, kai ham gomme djido, lentsa khetne pre hadedo un ap i wolke pash o rajeste, o Jesuseste, an o bolepen anlo. Un pash leste atchah hako tsiro.
Te dell jek o wawareste soor kal labentsa!
Mire phrala, mer hunte tchinas tumenge tchi pral ko tsiro, kai kowa lauter wella.
Tumer djinenna, o rai Jesus wella har i tchorepaskro an i rati.

Te penenn i menshe: "Lauter hi mishto, kek kurepen hi kai, un men hunte well kek daar", palle well i bibacht pral lende, un jon nai nashenn gar krik. Koi bibacht well pral lende jaake sik, har i duka wenna pral i djuwjate, kai lell i tarnepen.
Tumer, kamle phrala, ma djiwenn jaake har an i kali rat har kolla, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar! Palle well ko diwes gar pral tumende har i tchorepaskro an i rat.
Tumer lauter djan ap o tchatcho drom, un djiwenn gar an o tchilatchepen. Kowa hi har te djiwenn ap o diwes, un gar an i rat.
Doleske, te sowas mer gar har i wawar, te rikras mare jaka pre, un te das jak har djiwah!
Koon sowella, sowell an i rat. Un koon kamell pes mato te pijell, krell kowa ninna an i rati.

Mer djiwah ap o diwes. Doleske das jak, har te djiwas! Jaake har i kurepaskro riwell i sasterno gad ap peste, te nai dukrell les kek, jaake riwas mer o patsepen un o kamlepen ap mende har i ripen. I kurepaskro tchiwell ninna i sasterni stadi ap peskro shero, te dukrell les kek ap leskro shero. Jaake nai dukrell men kek, te dikah mer ap o Jesus Kristeste, un djinah soreles, te lell men o Jesus Kristo dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win.
O Dewel kamell gar, te well leskri choli pral mende. Na-a, job kamell, te dell men maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, o Debleskro djipen.
Kowa meras menge, te djiwas leha khetne, mer, kai gomme djido ham, un ninna kolla, kai meran.
Dran kowa, rakrenn kal laba jek ap o wawareste, te dell jek o wawares soor, jaake har tumer kowa ninna krenna!
Mire phrala, mer mangah tumen: Shunenn ap tumare pralstunende, kai budrenn mashkral tumende! O Dewel tchiwas len an pengri budi, te sikrenn le tumen, hoi job kamella!
Jon krenn o Debleskri budi. Awenn latches un kamles ap lende! Un mukenn kek tchingepen mashkral tumende te well!

Mire phrala, kanna penah tumenge, hoi te krenn: Denn kolen trad, kai kamenn gar te budrell! Rakrenn kolentsa mishto, kai hi dareno! Krenn kolen soreles, kai hi gar sorelo an o patsepen! Denn kekes sik pre!
Ma awenn tchilatcho ap kolende, kai tchilatcho ap tumende wan! Mukenn gar tele, te wenn latches ap hakeneste mashkral tumende, ninna ap i tsele wawar menshende!
Awenn bachtelo hako tsiro!
Mangenn o Debles hako tsiro!
Parkrenn tumen pash leste pral halauter! Kowa kamell o Dewel lauterendar, kai djan ap o Jesuseskro drom.
Mukenn o Debleskro Ducho mashkral tumende te budrell!
Shunenn ap kol laba, hoi o Dewel i patsleske an o dji tchiwas!
Denn jak, te well ko lab, hoi job penas, tchatchepaha o Deblestar! Un rikrenn kowa, hoi mishto hi!
Rikrenn tumen pale dran hako tchilatcho koowa!

O Dewel kras i drom, te was pash leste. Lestar mangau, te krell lo tumaro tselo djipen djudjo glan leste, te rikrell lo tumen an peskre wasta, jaake te hatsell lo kek doosh ap tumende ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, pale.
O Dewel das tumen pash peste gole, job mukell tumen gar, un krell kowa, hoi job penas.
Mire phrala, mangenn lestar ninna menge!
Penenn i tsele patslenge mendar: "Atchenn o Debleha!" Un denn len i tchum!
Me penau tumenge soreles an o lab maro rajestar, o Jesusestar: Drawerenn kau liil glan i tsele patslende!
O latchepen maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, djal tumentsa!

Mer, o Paulo, o Silwano un o Timoteo, tchinah kau liil ap tumende, kol patslende, kai wenna khetne an o foro Tessalonika. Tumer patsenn ap o Debleste, maro dadeste, un ap maro rajeste, o Jesus Kristeste.
Latchepen un bacht tumenge! Kowa dell tumen o Dewel, maro dad, un maro rai, o Jesus Kristo.

Mire phrala, mer hunte parkras men tumenge pash o Debleste hako tsiro, jaake bud latchepen shunam tumendar. Tumaro patsepen well baro un bareder. Un pash tumende lauterende well o kamlepen bareder, kai jek o wawareske hi.

Mer sharah men tumentsa pash i patslende, kai wenn khetne an o Debleskro lab an i wawar forja, un penah lenge, hoi tumer lauter ap tumende lenna, un te mukenn gar tumaro patsepen, ninna te lenn le tumen palla un krenn tumaro djipen phares.

Ap kowa lauter dikenn tumer, kai djal o Dewel pal o tchatchepen ap ko diwes, kai rakrell lo o tchatchepen win pral i menshende. Tumer, kai lan leske bud pharo koowa ap tumende, lell lo pash peste. Tumer han leske moldo, te djiwenn leha khetne an o bolepen.
Job djal ninna pal o tchatchepen, te dell lo kolen i phagi, kai tumen palla lan.

Tumer, kai wenn kanna palla lino, tumen dell lo i bari bacht. Kowa dell lo tumende mentsa khetne ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai Jesus pale dran o bolepen, un lauter dikenn les. Leskre sorele bolepangre wenn leha,

un i jag hi trul lende. Palle well o Debleskri choli pral kolende, kai kaman lestar tchi te djinell, kolla kai shunan gar ap o latcho lab maro rajestar, o Jesusestar, un kaman gar ap leskro drom te djal.
Kolla lenn i phagi: Jon djan hako tsireske nashedo, un nai wenn buder gar pash o Debleste, un dikenna gar leskro baro railepen

ap ko diwes, kai well maro rai Jesus pale, te well lo sharedo peskre menshendar. Un i tsele patsle dikenn les, un hi bachtelo pral leste, ninna tumer, kai patsan ap o Debleskro latcho lab, hoi mer tumenge penam.

O Dewel rodas tumen win, te djiwenn pash leste. Doleske mangah lestar hako tsiro, te djiwenn tumer kanna jaake ap kai phub, har job kowa peskre tchawendar kamella. Ninna mangah lestar, te dell lo tumen i soor, te nai krenn o latcho koowa, hoi kamenn te krenn dran tumaro patsepen.
Palle well maro rai Jesus sharedo dran tumende. Un leha khetne wenn tumer ninna sharedo. Jaake latcho hi maro Dewel un maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, tumenge.
Mire phrala, kanna kamah te penas tumenge pral ko tsiro, kai well maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, pale, te lell lo men pash peste.

Mer mangah tumen: Ma mukenn tumen dinelo un dareno te krell, te penenn i menshe tumenge: "Ko diwes hi kanna kai." Ma patsenn lenge ninna, te penenn le, te sikras len o Dewel kowa, witar gar, te penenn le, te lans le i liil mendar, kai mer kowa tchinams!

Kowa lauter hi chochepen. Ma patsenn kekeske, kai kowa penella! Ko diwes wella gar jaake raha, har peran gar bud menshe o tchatcho dromestar tele. Ap ko tsiro well ko tchilatcho mensho diklo, kai rikrell pes ap kek tchatchepen. Leske hi glan-diklo, te djal lo nashedo.
Job hadell pes pral o Debleste un pral halauter, hoi i menshe an-mangenna, un beshell pes an o Debleskro baro kheer, un krell, har te wals job o Dewel.
Djinenn tumer buder gar, har penom tumenge kowa lauter, har pash tumende homs?
Kanna djinenn tumer, hoske job gomme gar diklo was. Leskro tsiro hi gomme gar koi.
Ninna te dikah les gomme gar, well o tchilatchepen bareder. Kanna rikrell jek o tchilatchepen pale. Te well job krik lino,
palle sikrell pes ko tchilatcho mensho, har job tchatchepaha hi. Koles marell maro rai Jesus ap ko diwes, kai well lo pale. Job phurdell ap leste, un kowa merella.
Ap ko tsiro, kai well ko tchilatcho mensho, lell lo peskri soor o bengestar, un krell bud chocheno baro un sorelo koowa.

Un chochepaha anell lo kolen ap o tchilatcho drom, kai djan nashedo. Kolla hi kol menshe, kai kaman gar o tchatchepen te shunell. Te patsans le o tchatchepen, nai wans le win lino dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen.
Jon patsan gar o tchatchepen. Doleske mukell len o Dewel an o chochepen te perell. Doleske mukell lo len kol chochene laba te patsell.
Jaake len kolla pengri phagi, kai kaman o tchilatchepen budeder har o tchatchepen.

Mire phrala, mer hunte parkras men tumenge pash o Debleste hako tsiro. Maro rai Jesus kamell tumen o djijestar. Glan i raha tsiro, har o Dewel kras o bolepen un i phub, rodas lo tumen win, te djiwenn leha khetne an leskro railepen. Har patsan tumer leskro tchatcho lab, das lo peskro Ducho an tumende. Un kowa krell, te djiwenn tumer i djudjo djipen glan leste.
Har penam tumenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, das o Dewel tumen gole, te lenn tumer o railepen, hoi hi ninna maro rajes, o Jesus Kristes.
Doleske atchenn sorelo, mire phrala! Rikrenn tumen ap kol laba, hoi mer tumenge penam, un an mare lila tumenge tchinam.

O Dewel hi maro dad un kamell men o djijestar. Job hi menge latcho, un penell menge an o dji, te kras lo lauter menge mishto, un te lell lo men pash peste hako tsireske. Lestar mangah un maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar,
te dell lo tumen soor an tumare djia, te nai krenna un penenna lauter, hoi mishto hi.
Ninna mangau tumendar, mire phrala: Mangenn o Jesusestar, maro rajestar, menge, te nai penah leskro lab an bud wawar forja, te well lo kote jaake sharedo, har pash tumende.
Mangenn lestar ninna, te dell lo garda ap mende, te nai krenn men kol midjak un tchilatche menshe kek tchilatchepen. Gar hakeno patsell ap o Jesus Kristeste.
Maro rai Jesus mukell tumen gar. Job dell tumen soor, un dell garda ap tumende, te well kek tchilatcho koowa ap tumende.
Job hi maro un tumaro rai. Doleske djinah, tumer krenn, hoi mer tumenge penah, kanna un an ko tsiro, hoi glan mende hi.

Maro rajestar, o Jesusestar, mangah, te krell lo tumare djia pre, te dikenn tumer, har baro o Debleskro kamlepen tumenge hi. Un lestar mangah ninna, te denn tumaro patsepen gar pre, ninna te well tumaro djipen pharo, jaake har o Jesus Kristo gar pre das.
Mire phrala, an o lab maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, penah tumenge soreles: Rikrenn tumen kol phralendar krik, kai kamenn gar te budrell! Jon djiwenn gar jaake, har mer tumenge penam.
Tumer djinenna, har te djiwenn. Djiwenn jaake, har mer djiwam, har hams pash tumende! Mer kram mari budi,
cham pash kekeste tchitcheske. O diwes un i rati budram, te djiwas mer gar tumare lowendar.
Mer mangams nai tumendar kowa, hoi men hunte wals djipaske, un kram kowa gar. Mer kamam, te dikenn ap maro djipen, har te djiwenn.
Ninna har pash tumende hams, penam tumenge: Kowa, kai kamell gar te budrell, kowa hunte chal witar gar.
Mer shunam, mashkral tumende hi menshe, kolla kamenn gar te budrell. Tchi budrenn le, un kowa, hoi tchi moldo hi, krenn le.
Kolenge penah mer an o lab maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, te budrenn le, te nai ginenn le penge, hoi len hunte well djipaske.
Tumer, mire phrala, ma awenn khino te krenn kowa, hoi latcho hi!
Jek te krell kowa gar, hoi mer an kau liil tchinam, penenn kowa i wawar patslenge, un rikrenn tumen lestar pale, te well i ladj pral leste!
Ma dikenn ap leste har ap jekeste, kai kras tumenge tchilatcho koowa. Na-a, job hi tumaro phraal. Penenn leske, hoi job gar mishto kras, te well lo pale ap o tchatcho drom!
Maro rai Jesus, kolestar wella i tseli bacht, kolestar mangau, te dell lo tumen hako tsiro peskri bacht an o dji, kote, kai tumer han. Maro rai Jesus djal tumentsa lauterentsa!
Kal laba tchinau miro wasteha: Atchenn o Debleha! Jaake tchinau an mire tsele lila. Kowa sikrell tumen, kau liil well mandar.
O latchepen maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, djal tumentsa lauterentsa!

Me, o Paulo, tchinau kau liil. Me hom o Jesus Kristeskro bitchepaskro, te penap i menshenge leskro lab. Jaake kamell kowa o Dewel, kai lell men dran o tchilatchepen win, un o Jesus Kristo, ap koleste patsah.
Me tchinau kau liil ap tute, Timoteo. Tu hal mange har miro tchawo an o patsepen. Latchepen, kamlepen un bacht tuke! Kowa dell tut o Dewel, maro dad, un o Jesus Kristo, maro rai, an o dji!

Tu djineh, har me tuke penom, te atchess an o foro Efesus. Kowa mangom tutar, har me an o them Macedonia djom. An o foro Efesus hi menshe, kai sikrenn i patslende i chocheno drom, hoi anell len gar pash o Debleste. Kolenge peness, te mukenn le kowa.
Pen lenge, te rodenn jon gar o tchatchepen an i parmisse, witar gar an kol bare lila, kai i phurengre laba tchindlo hi. Kowa anell tchingepen, un anell men gar ap o Debleskro drom dureder.

Lauter, hoi peneh tu lenge pral o patsepen, hunte sikrell lende, te well lengro kamlepen dran i djudjo dji, un te well len i patsepen, an koleste kek chochepen hi, un te krenn le lauter jaake, har lengro dji lenge penella.
Kol menshe, kai penenn wawar koowa, mukan o Debleskro drom, un rikrenn pen kanna ap kolla laba, hoi tchi molenna.
Jon kamenn sikepangre te well, kai penenn i menshenge, har te djiwenn le. Un jon haiwenn gar, hoi jon penenna un soreles rakrenna.
Mer djinah, kai o Moseskre laba mishto hi, te wenn le i menshende jaake penlo, har tchatcho hi.

Mer djinah, o Moseskre laba wan gar tchindlo kolenge, kai pal o tchatchepen djiwenna. Kol laba wan tchindlo kolenge, kai gar pal o tchatchepen djiwenna, un kai gar ap o Debleste shunenna. Kol laba wan tchindlo kolenge, kai gar ap o Debleste patsenna, un krenna, hoi job gar kamella. Kol laba wan tchindlo kolenge, kai lengro dji djungelo hi, un kolenge, kai praassenn o Debles. Kol laba wan tchindlo kolenge, kai marenn o dades un i da, un ninna wawar menshen.
