O Moseskre laba wan tchindlo kol murshenge, kai sowenn wawar djuwjentsa, un kol djuwjenge, kai sowenn wawar murshentsa. Kol laba wan ninna tchindlo kol murshenge, kai sowenn i murshentsa un tchawentsa. Kol laba wan tchindlo kolenge, kai tchorenn menshen un bikrenn len, un kolenge, kai penenn o chochepen, un kolenge, kai denn pen chochenes sowel. Un te dell wawar koowa, kai o Debleskro lab lestar penella, te kras mer kowa gar, palle wan o Moseskre laba kolenge tchindlo, kai kowa krenna.
Jaake penell menge o latcho lab, hoi das o Dewel an mire wasta, te penap kowa i menshenge. Ko lab sikrell men o Debleskro railepen. Lestar well o tselo latchepen.
Me parkrau man pash maro rajeste, o Jesus Kristeste, kai das man i soor, te budrap leske. Job patsas ap mande, un tchiwas man an koi budi, te wap leske koi.

His i tsiro, kai rakrom djungeles pral leste, un lom i patslen palla, te marap len. An ko tsiro prindjrom les gar, un djinom gar, hoi me krom. Job kras mange peskro dji pre, un las man dran o tchilatchepen win.
Jaake latcho his o Jesus Kristo mange, te das lo man ninna o patsepen ap leste un o kamlepen i wawarenge.

Hi tchatcho, hoi kanna penau. Un tumer nai patsenn man: Maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, was ap kai phub, te anell lo kolen ap o drom pash o Debleste, kai dur lestar an tchilatchepen djiwenna. Kolendar hom me o djungleder.

Me krom bareder tchilatchepen har hako wawar. Un ninna man las o Dewel dran miro tchilatcho djipen win, te nai sikrell o Jesus Kristo ap mande, har bud job i menshen kamella, jaake, te patsenn i menshe ap leste, un lenna ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
Me sharau o Debles, koles, kai hako tsiro o baro rai hi; kowa, kai merella gar, un kai nai dikell les kek. Kowa kokres hi o Dewel. Leskro railepen atchell hako tsireske. Amen.

Miro tchawo Timoteo, kowa penau tuke, te rikress tu kowa an tiro dji. Ma biste kol laba, hoi glan i tsiro pral tute glan-wi penlo wan! Kolla laba denn tut i soor, te mukess gar tele te krell o Debleskri budi, jaake har i latcho kurepaskro gar pre dell an o kurepen.
Rike ap o patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste! Kre, hoi tiro dji tuke penella! Hi menshe, kai shunan gar ap pengro dji, un kran gar, hoi mishto hi. Un jon peran o Debleskro dromestar tele.
Dui lendar hi o Himeneo un o Alexandro. Kolen dom an o bengeskro wast, te rakrenn le buder gar djungeles pral o Debleste.
Me penau tumenge kanna, hoi hunte krenn un gar mukenn: Mangenn o Debles i tsele menshenge! Penenn leske lauter, hoi ap tumaro dji hi! Parkrenn tumen pash o Debleste lautereske, hoi job das!

Mangenn lestar, te dell lo i rajen un i pralstunen o goswepen, te krenn le pengri budi mishto, jaake te djiwas nai an o latchepen, te djas mer o Debleskro drom, te nai rakrenn i menshe gar djungeles pral mende!
Kowa kamell maro Dewel, kai das men o newo djipen.
Job kamella, te wenn i tsele menshe ap leskro drom, un te haiwenn le leskro tchatchepen.
Hi jek Dewel i tsele menshenge. Un hi jek rakepaskro, kai anell o Debles un i menshen khetne. Kowa hi ko mensho Jesus Kristo.
Job das peskro djipen i tsele menshenge. Jaake sikras o Dewel an o tchatcho tsiro, kai kamell lo, te well hako mensho win lino dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen.

Doleske bitchras man o Dewel pash kolende, kai kek bibolde hi, te penap lenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, un te sikrap lende o tchatcho patsepen. Man hi o Jesuseskro wast. Kowa hi o tchatchepen. Me chochau gar.

Jaake kamau me, te mangenn i mursha o Debles an, kote, kai i patsle khetne wenna. Kal mursha hunte djiwenn pengro djipen jaake, har o Dewel kamella. Te hadenn le pengre wasta pre, te mangenn le o Debles an, palle hunte denn le jak, te well kek choli un kek tchingepen an lengre djia.

Ninna kamau, te riwell i djuwel kek wi-ladjede ripja. Te riwell li pes gar jaake, te dikell hakeno ap late. Lakro shukapen te well gar diklo an kowa, har joi peskre balla hidjella, witar gar an o sonakai un wawar kutch koowa, witar gar an kutch ripja.
Lakro shukapen sikrell pes an ko latcho koowa, hoi joi krella. Jaake hi kowa pash kol djuwjende, kai ap o Debleste patsenna.
Te well o Debleskro lab i patslenge penlo, hunte shunenn i djuwja ap kowa, hoi penlo wella. Jon hunte rakrenn gar peha.
Me kamau gar, te penell i djuwel o Debleskro lab glan i murshende, witar gar, te well lat penepaske pral o mursheste. I djuwja rikrenn pen pale.
Hoske penau kowa? Doleske: O Adam was glan i Eva kerdo.
O sap chochas gar o Adames. O sap chochas i Evat. Un i Eva shunas gar ap kowa, hoi o Dewel penas.
I djuwel well sharedo, te lell li tchawen, un te patsell li ap o Jesuseste, un te hi lat o Debleskro kamlepen an lakro dji, un te djiwell li i djudjo djipen glan o Debleste un glan i menshende.
Kowa, hoi kanna penau, hi tchatcho. Te kamell jek i phureder te well mank i patslende, kowa kamell i latchi budi.

I phureder hunte djiwell jaake, te hatsell kek i doosh ap leste. Les well gar budeder har jek romni. Job rakrell kek dinelo koowa, un dell pes jak, hoi job rakrell un krell. Job mukell pes gar an djungelo koowa te tsardell. Job lell i wawaren latches an peskro kheer dre. Job sikrell mishto o Debleskro drom.
Job hi kek pipaskro. Job hi kek marepaskro. Les hi i baro dji i wawarenge. Job hi kek tchingepaskro. Job hi gar pal i lowe.
Job hi i latcho rai pral peskro kheer. Leskre tchawe shunenn ap leste.
Hi kau mursh kek latcho rai pral peskro kheer, nai well lo witar gar i latcho rai pral i patslende, kai wenn khetne an o Debleskro lab.
I phureder mank i patslende hunte well gar newes an o patsepen, te nai phurdell lo pes gar pre. Te phurdas pes lo pre, nai tsardell les o beng o Debleskro dromestar tele.
I phureder hunte well jek, pral koleste ninna kol menshe, kai gar patslo hi, mishto rakrenna. Jaake hunte ladjell lo pes gar, un perell gar an o bengeskro wast.

Jaake har i phureder mank i patslende hunte djiwenn latches glan i menshengre jaka, jaake hunte djiwenn kolla ninna, kai budrenn i patslenge an o Debleskro kheer. Jon te rakrenn gar dui tchipjentsa. Jon te wenn kek pipangre. Jon te nashenn gar pal i lowe.
Jon hunte rikrenn soreles ap o tchatchepen, hoi o Dewel sikras. Lengro patsepen hunte well dran i djudjo dji.
Lenn tumen i tsiro, te dikenn tumer, har jon djiwenna. Te nashte rakrell kek pral lende djungelo koowa, palle nai budrenn le i patslenge an o Debleskro kheer.

I djuwja, kai hi i patslenge koi, hunte djiwenn ninna latches glan i menshengre jaka. Jon rakrenn kek chocheno koowa pral i wawarende. Jon rakrenn kek dinelo koowa. Jon krenn pengri tseli budi mishto.
I mursh, kai budrella i patslenge an o Debleskro kheer, les well gar budeder har jek romni. Job hunte well i latcho dad peskre tchawenge, un i latcho rai pral peskro kheer.
Kol budepangre, kai pengri budi mishto krenna, kolla wenn an-diklo pash i patslende, un pash o Debleste. Un len hi kek daar, te rakrenn le pral pengro patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste.

Me kamau te wap sik pash tute. Te nai wau gar jaake sik, djineh tu kanna, har te krenn le lauter an o Debleskro kheer. Doleske tchinom tuke kau liil. I patsle hi o kheer o djido Deblestar. Jon rikrenn pen soreles ap o Debleskro tchatchepen. Jon hi har kol telstune barra, hoi o kheer khetne rikrenna.

Tchatchepaha, an maro patsepen hi i baro tchatchepen: O Debleskro tchawo was i mensho. Hoi job kras, hi tchatcho. Ko sikras men o Debleskro Ducho. I bolepangre dikan ap leste. An i tsele themma rakran le lestar. Ap i tseli phub patsan le ap leste. An o bolepen las les o Dewel pash peste.
O Debleskro Ducho penell menge, te perenn i menshe o Debleskro dromestar tele an ko tsiro, hoi wella. Jon shunenn ap o chochepen, un ap kowa, hoi wella o bengestar.

Kolla, kai anenn len o tchatcho dromestar tele, hi chochene, kai penenn pendar, te haiwenn le o tchatchepen. Un jon djinenn buder gar, hoi mishto un tchatcho hi. Ninna haiwenn le gar, hawo tchilatcho koowa jon krenna.
Jon penenna, te romedineress gar, un te chas gar hako chapen. Koon ap o Jesus Kristeste patsella, un o tchatchepen haiwella, nai chal lauter, te parkrell pes lo pash o Debleste, kai lauter kras.
Lauter, hoi o Dewel kras, hi latcho. Un tchi hi pale-tchiddo, te parkrah men mer koleske pash o Debleste.
O Debleskro lab krell, te nai chas hako chapen. Un mer parkrah men pash o Debleste koleske.

Te peneh tu kau koowa i patslenge, hal tu o Jesuseskro latcho budepaskro. Jaake sikreh, kai djiweh pal o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar, hoi tu shunal un patsal, un kai djah tu dureder ap o Debleskro drom!
Ma shun ap dinele parmisse! Kolla wenna gar o Deblestar! Dik ap tute, te djiwess o djipen, hoi latcho hi glan o Debleskre jaka.

Te dikeh ap kowa, te wenn tire mussja un herja soreles, hi kowa gar bud moldo. Te dikeh ap kowa, te well tiro patsepen soreles, hi kowa bud moldo, un tu leh o tchatcho djipen. Ko djipen dell tut o Dewel kanna ap kai phub un an ko tsiro, hoi wella.
Kawa lab hi tchatcho, un tumer nai patsenn les.

Maro patsepen rikrell pes ap o djido Debleste. Job kamell hako menshes dran o merepen win te lell. Un kolla, kai patsenn ap leste, wenn dran o merepen win lino. Doleske budrah mer, un lah ninna duka ap mende.
Kal laba pen i patslenge un pen lenge, te shunenn le ap kowa!

Ninna te hal tarno, ma muk tut ap i rig te tchiwell! Tu djiwess jaake, te dikenn i wawar patsle, har hunte djiwenn jon. Kowa dikenn le ap tire laba, tiro djipen, tiro kamlepen i wawarenge, tiro patsepen ap o Jesuseste, un tiro djudjo dji.
Le o Debleskro lab an i wast, un sike i menshende, hoi koi dre tchindlo hi, un rake koi pral! Sike lende, har te djan jon ap o Debleskro drom! Kre kowa jaake raha, bis te wau pash tute!
Ma biste koi budi, hoi o Debleskro Ducho tut das, har kol phureder phrala tuke i wasta pre tchiwan, un hoi jon pral tute glan-wi penan!
Kre kowa lauter tiro tselo djijeha un tiri tseli sorjaha, te dikell hakeno, kai tiro patsepen bareder wella!

De garda ap tute, har tu djiweh un har tu sikreh o Debleskro drom! Kre ko koowa, hoi tuke penom! Jaake djah tu ap o drom pash o Debleste. Un kolla, kai shunenn ap kowa, hoi tu peneh, aneh tu ninna ap ko drom.
Ma tchinge ap i phureste! Tu te peneh o phuro mursheske, kai kowa gar mishto hi, hoi job kras, palle rake leha, har te wals job tiro dad! Un i tarne murshentsa rake, har te wans le tire phrala!
Rake i phuri djuwjaha, har te wals li tiri dai! Rake i tarne djuwjentsa, har te wans le tire phenja, un kre kowa i djudjo djijeha!
Kanna rakrau pral kol djuwjende, kolengre romma buder gar djiwenna. De jak, te well kolen doha djipaske, kai hi len tchatchepaha kek menshe, kai lenge koi hi.

Te hi kol djuwjen tchawe, tchawengre tchawe, hunte wenn kolla lenge koi. Jaake sikrenn jon, te patsenn le ap o Debleste. Un jon parkrenn pen pash pengri dai un pengri mami, hoi kolla lenge lauter kran. Kowa hi mishto glan o Debleskre jaka.

I patsli djuwel, kai hi lat buder kek rom, witar kek wawar menshe, kolake hunte wenn tumer koi. Koja dikell ap o Debleste kokres un mangell lestar, te dell lo lat doha djipaske. Joi mangell les i tselo djijestar o diwes un i rati, un mukell gar tele.
Hi wawartchandes pash i djuwjate, kolakro rom buder gar djiwella, un kai dikell ap peste kokres, te well lat i shukar djipen. Kolakro patsepen hi mulo.
Pen i patslenge, te djiwenn le pal kal laba, te hatsell kek i doosh ap lende!
Koon gar peskre menshenge koi hi, un kolenge, kai pash leste an o kheer djiwenna, kowa nashras peskro patsepen, un hi har jek, kai patsell gar ap o Jesus Kristeste.

Kanna rakrau pral ko liil, kai i laba kol djuwjendar dre tchindlo wenna, kolakro rom buder gar djiwella. Te hi jek lendar tarneder har shob-deesh bersh (60), ma tchin lakro lab pre! Koja, kai well dre tchindlo, kolat hunte his jek rom.

Wawar menshe hunte dikenn ap late, te kras li latcho koowa, un te tsardas li peskre tchawen mishto pre. Jon hunte dikan, te las li menshen pash peste pre, un te thowas li i patslenge i herja. Jon hunte dikan, te his li kolenge koi, kolen i pharo djipen hi, un te kras li hako latcho koowa.
Kanna rakrau i tarne djuwjendar kolengre romma buder gar djiwenna. Ma tchin kolengre laba an ko liil! Jon nai kamans budeder pale i romes te lell, har te wenn le o Jesus Kristeske koi.
Jaake rikrenn le gar pengro lab, hoi jon o Jesus Kristeste dan. Un doleske anenn le doosh ap pende.
Kal tarne djuwja kamenn buder gar te budrell, un jon djan dran jek kheer an o wawar, un tchamrenn bud. Jon kamenn lauter feteder te djinell, un rakrenn jaake, hoi gar mishto hi.
Doleske kamau, te romedinerenn kol tarne djuwja pale, te lenn jon tchawen, un te budrenn jon an pengro kheer, jaake te nai penell kek djungelo koowa pral i patslende.
Djinau sawendar, kolla mukan o tchatcho drom, un djan o bengeske palla.

Te hi i patsli djuwjat wawar djuwja an lakri familja, kolengro rom buder gar djiwella, hunte dikell joi ap lende, te hi len doha djipaske. Kai budi hi gar i budi i tsele patslendar. I patsle hunte wenn kol djuwjenge koi, kai len kek menshe hi.

Kanna rakrau pral kolende, kai hi kol phureder mank i patslende, un krenn pengri budi mishto. I patsle hunte dikenn pre ap lende un shunenn ap lende. Ninna hunte denn le len lowe. Kowa penau budeder kolendar, kai penenn i menshenge o Debleskro lab, un sikrenn lende o Debleskro drom.
An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Te budrell i ficho tuke, palle pande gar leskro mui, te kamell lo te chal! Ninna hi tchindlo: O budepaskro hi moldo, te well lo plaissedo.
Ma shun ap jekeste, kai anell i doosh ap i phureder pre, te hi gar dui, triin patsle koi, kai penenn kowa nai ninna, hoi job kras.
Kolla, kai kran tchilatcho koowa, kolen dess trad glan lauterende, te well kol wawaren daar.

Me penau tuke soreles glan o Debleste, un glan o Jesus Kristeste, un glan kol Debleskre bolepangre, te rikress tut ap ko koowa, hoi me tuke kanna penom! Pash hakeneste dja pal o tchatchepen! Ma tsarde jekes glan o wawareste!
Ma tchip sik tire wasta ap jekeste pre! De jak, te well i doosh i wawarestar gar ap tute! Rike tiro dji djudjo!
Tu te pijeh pani, palle tchore ninna mool dre! Kowa hi mishto tiro pereske. Tu hal jaake bud nasselo.
Denna menshe, kai lengri doosh diklo wella i wawar menshendar. Pash wawar menshende hi lengri doosh khatedo. O diwes wella, kai lengri doosh diklo wella.
Jaake hi ninna pash i menshende, kai krenn latcho koowa. Pash jekeste nai dikell kowa hakeno. Pash i wawareste hi kowa khatedo. Well i diwes, kai well o latcho koowa diklo.
I budepangre, kai ginlo wan, hunte shunenn ap pengre rajende, te nai rakrell kek mensho djungeles pral o Debleste un pral kowa, hoi mer i menshenge pral leste penah.

Kol budepangre, kai hi len patsle raja, hunte dikenn gar tele ap pengre rajende. Na-a, jon hunte budrenn latcheder lenge. Kolla hi lengre phrala. Un o Dewel kamell len o djijestar. Un jon krenn ninna latcho koowa. Kowa pen i patslenge an o dji, te krenn le les!
Te sikrell jek i menshende i wawar drom, un penell lenge gar o tchatcho lab maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, un sikrell lende gar, har te djan le ap o Debleskro drom,

palle hi job pre-phurdo un haiwell tchi. Job kamell te tchingrell pes hako labeske. Kowa hi jaake har i nasslepen. Dran sawo koowa well, te silwerenn le, te tchingrenn pen le, te rakrenn le djungeles jek pral o wawareste, te dikell ko jek tchilatche jakentsa ap o wawareste.

Sawo tchingepen djal dureder un dureder. Kolla, kai krenn kowa, hi nasselo an o shero un haiwenn buder gar, hoi o tchatchepen hi. Jon patsenna, te nashte lenn le bud lowe khetne, te krenn le, hoi o Dewel kamella.
Tchatchepaha, koon krella, hoi o Dewel kamella, un leske hi doha, hoi o Dewel les della, koleskro djipen hi pherdo latcho koowa.
Mer anam tchi ap kai phub, un nai lah tchi peha, te merah.
Te hi men chapaske un ripaske, hi menge kowa doha.
Kolla, kai kamenn brawele te well, kolla perenn an o bengeskro wast, un anenn pen an bud dinelo un djungelo koowa. Un kowa anell len an i bibacht un mukell len tele te djal.
Koon pal i lowe hi, perell an hako tchilatchepen. His menshe koi, kai kaman i lowe jaake bud, kai peran le o Debleskro dromestar tele, un dukran pen kokres.

Tu hal i Debleskro mursh. Rike tut ko tselo koowa pale! Kre lauter, te wess an o tchatchepen tardo, un te djiwess jaake, har o Dewel kamella! Kre ninna lauter, te atchess an o patsepen, un te kamess i menshen o tselo djijestar! Te djal tuke gar mishto, rike win! Ab latches ap i wawarende!

Jaake har i kurepaskro kurell pes mishto un dell gar pre, jaake dess tu gar tiro patsepen pre, te tapress ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. O Dewel das tut gole, te tapress les. Un tu penal glan bud menshende, kai patseh ap o Jesus Kristeste.
Me penau tuke glan o Debleste, kai krell lauter djido, un glan o Jesus Kristo, kai penas o tchatchepen glan o Pontio Pilato:
Rike o tselo djijeha ap kol laba, hoi tuke penlo wan, te hatsell kek i doosh ap tute. Atch koi pashal jaake raha har maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, gomme gar pale was.
Job wella ap o tchatcho tsiro. Ko tsiro djinell o Dewel. Koles sharah mer! Job kokres hi o baro rai, un bareder un sorleder har lauter. Job hi ko baro rai pral i tsele rajende.
Job nai merell gar. Job djiwell kote, kai i momeli jaake sorelo hi, kai kek nai dre djala. O Debles dikas kek mensho, un kek mensho nai dikell les. Koles well o tselo railepen un i tseli soor!

Pen kol brawelenge, te rikrenn jon pen gar bareder har wawar, un te tchiwenn jon pengro patsepen gar ap o brawlepen, hoi gar atchella. Mer tchiwas maro patsepen ap o Debleste, kai dell men lauter djipaske, jaake te nai djiwas bachteles.
Pen kol brawelenge ninna, te krenn le latcho koowa! Lengro dji te well baro i wawarenge, te denn le ninna i wawaren dran pengro brawlepen!
Jon te krenn latcho koowa i wawarenge, hi kowa lengro brawlepen an o bolepen, hoi atchella. Jaake djiwenn le o djipen, hoi o Dewel kamella.

Tu, Timoteo, atch pash kowa, hoi o Dewel an tiro wast tchiwas! Ma shun ap kolende, kai rakrenn laba, hoi tchi moldo hi, un hoi gar o Deblestar wenna! Jon rakrenn dinelo koowa, un patsenn, kai djinenn le budeder har kol wawar. Lengro hi gar tchatcho.
Denna menshe mashkral i patslende, kai patsan kolen, un peran o Debleskro dromestar tele. O Debleskro latchepen djal tumentsa lauterentsa!

Me, o Paulo, tchinau kau liil. Jaake har o Dewel kamas, bitchras man o Jesus Kristo, te penap i menshenge, kai o Dewel kamell len ko djipen te dell, hoi gar pre-herella. Ko djipen dell lo kolen, kai ap o Jesus Kristeste patsenna.
Me tchinau ap tute, Timoteo. Tu hal miro latcho tchawo an o patsepen. Latchepen, kamlepen un bacht tuke! Kowa dell tut o Dewel, maro dad, un o Jesus Kristo, maro rai, an o dji!
Hako diwes un haki rati mukau gar tele, te parkrap man pash o Debleste tuke, un te mangap o Debles tuke. Job hi kowa, koleske budrau me o djudjo djijeha, jaake har ninna mire phure kowa kran.
Me bistrau nai gar, har tu glan mande rowal, un dikau tut jaake glan mande. Doleske kamau me tut o tselo djijeha pale te dikell, te wap bachtelo.
Dikom tiro patsepen, an koleste kek chochepen hi. Kau patsepen his ninna an tiri mamjate Lois, un an tiri date Eunike. Un me djinau, kai djiwell kau patsepen ninna an tute.
Doleske mangau tut: Muk koi soor an tute te budrell, hoi o Dewel tut das! Tu lal koi soor, har mangom o Debles tuke, un har tchiwom tuke i wasta pre.
O Debleskro Ducho, hoi o Dewel men das, kowa krell men gar dareno, na-a, o Debleskro Ducho dell men soor, kamlepen i wawarenge, un o goswepen, har te djiwas.

Ma ladj tut, te rakress tu maro rajestar, o Jesusestar! Ma ladj tut mange, ninna te hom me kanna leske an o stilepen! Na-a, rake maro rajestar, ninna te wenn duka ap tute, jaake har me lau duka ap mande, te well o latcho lab o Jesusestar penlo. O Dewel dell tut i soor.

Job las men dran o tchilatchepen win, un das men gole, te djiwas leha khetne. His gar dran maro latcho koowa, te das lo men gole. Na-a. Kowa his an leskro dji, te was lo menge latches. Har o bolepen un i phub gomme gar koi his, his an leskro dji, te bitchrell lo o Jesus Kristes menge ap i phub.

Kanna was o Jesus Kristo, te sikrell lo men o Debleskro latchepen. O Jesus Kristo las men dran o tchilatchepen win, un kras, te well o merepen buder kek soor pral mende. Job anas menge ko djipen, hoi atchella, har peskro latcho lab penella.
O Dewel bitchras man, te penap o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar i menshenge, un sikrap len leskro drom.

Doleske hunte lap kawa lauter ap mande kate an o stilepen, un me ladjau gar. Me djinau, ap koneste patsaua. Un me djinau, kai o Jesus Kristo rikrell peskre wasta pral kowa, hoi job an miro wast das, bis te job pale wella.
Rike tut ap kol latche laba, hoi tu mandar shunal! Jaake djineh, har tu hunte rakress. Un atch an o patsepen un an o kamlepen, hoi o Jesus Kristo men das!
Kal latche laba hi har i kutch brawlepen, hoi an tiro wast dino was. Rike len! O Debleskro Ducho, kai an tute djiwella, dell tut koi soor, te kress kowa.
Tu djineh, kai mukan man kol tsele patsle, kai hi an ko them Asia. Mank lende hi ninna i phrala Figelo un Hermogeno.
Me mangau o Debles miro phraleske, o Onesiforo un i menshenge an leskro kheer, te well lo lenge latches. O Onesiforo kras bud kope miro dji soreles, un ladjas pes gar mange, har homs stildo.
Har job an o foro Rom was, rodas lo pal mande jaake raha, bis te job man hatsas.
Me mangau o Debles, te well lo leske latches ap ko diwes, kai job glan leste tardo hi. Tu djineh ninna, har bud job i patslenge an o foro Efesus budras.
Tu, miro tchawo Timoteo, wess soreles an o patsepen! O Jesus Kristo dell tut koi soor.

Tu hals pashal, har penom bud menshen o Debleskro lab. Kowa, hoi shunal mandar, sike kanna wawar patslen, kai krenn, hoi tu lenge peneh, un kolendar tu djineh, te haiwenn le mishto o Debleskro lab te penell!
Jaake har i latcho kurepaskro duka ap peste lella, jaake le ninna duka o Jesus Kristeske ap tute!
Kowa, kai an o kurepen djala, krell kek wawar budi. Job kamell, te dikell peskro pralstuno latches ap leste.
Jek, kai kurell pes, un kurell pes gar jaake, har leske penlo was, kowa well gar o latcheder.
O hacho, kai phares budrella, hi o glanstuno, kai chal kolestar, hoi dran i phub was.
Muk an tiro shero trujal te djal, hoi penom tuke! Un o rai Jesus dell tut o goswepen, te haiwess kowa lauter.
Rike an tiro shero o Jesus Kristes! Koles las o Dewel dran i mulende win, un kras les djido. Job his o Davideskre menshendar. Jaake penau kowa i menshenge.
Koleske lau duka ap mande. Jon pandan man an o stilepen, har te woms i marepaskro. Ninna te pandan le man an o stilepen, nai pandenn jon gar o Debleskro lab.
Me lau kowa lauter ap mande kol menshenge, kolen o Dewel win rodas, te lenn jon o djipen un o railepen, hoi gar pre-herella. Kowa dell len o Jesus Kristo.
Kau lab hi tchatcho: Te merah o Jesus Kristeha, djiwah mer ninna leha.
Te rikrah win an o patsepen, wah mer raja leha an o bolepen. Te dah mer les buchoste, dell job men ninna buchoste.
Te rikrah men gar pash leste, job rikrell pash mende. Un job atchell jaake har job hi.
Pen lenge kowa pale te pale! De len trad glan o Debleste, te tchingrenn jon pen gar pral laba! Ko tchingepen hi tchi moldo, un krell o patsepen kolendar paash, kai kowa lauter shunenna.
Kre lauter, te wess i latcho budepaskro o Debleske, un hunte ladjess tut gar koleske, hoi tu kreh! Pen o Debleskro lab jaake, har tchatcho hi!
Ma shun ap dinelo rakepen, hoi well i menshendar un gar o Deblestar! Kowa hi tchi moldo un anell i menshen o Deblestar krik!
Ko rakepen hi har i tchilatcho nasslepen, kai chal trul peste. Mashkral lende, kai dineles rakrenna, hi o Himeneo un o Fileto.
Jon mukan o tchatcho drom, un penenn chochepen, te penenn le: "Ko tsiro his koi, kai o Dewel i mulen djido kras." Hi patsle koi, kolenge krell kau rakepen pengro patsepen paash.

Ninna te hi sawe menshe koi, kai rakrenn chochepen, djinah mer: Kowa, hoi o Dewel kras, nashte krell kek paash. Kowa hi har i bar, hoi soreles tardo hi. Kek nai witsrell les trujal. Ap leste hi tchindlo: O rai prindjrella kolen, kai leskre hi. Un ninna hi tchindlo: Koon o rajes an-mangella, hunte mukell o tchilatcho drom.

An i baro kheer dell bud tchare un pirja: kolla dran sonakai un rup, ninna wawar dran kasht un chatchedi tchik. Kol kutch tchare un pirja wenn ap i chapaskri tchiddo, un an kol wawar well djungelo koowa dre tchiddo.

Jaake hi kowa ninna i patslentsa: Kowa, kai tchiwas ko tselo tchilatchepen dran peskro djipen wi, kowa hi har i kutch tcharo o rajeske pral o kheer. Job hi kokres peskro rajeske koi, un hi leske bud moldo. Leskro rai nai dell leske haki latchi budi.

Tu, Timoteo, ma kre ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi i tarne murshenge an o shero trujal djala! Kre lauter, te djiwess an o tchatchepen! Atch an o patsepen! Ab kamlo ap i wawarende! Djib latches lentsa khetne! Kre kowa lauter khetne kol phralentsa, kai o Debles an-gole denna o djudjo djijeha!
Te tchingrenn i menshe pral i laba, ma muk tut an ko dinelo rakepen dre tsardell, hoi tchi molella! Tu djineh, kowa anell tchingepen.
Kowa, kai budrell o Debleske, hunte tchingrell pes gar. Na-a, job hi kamlo ap hakeneste, un haiwell mishto i menshende o Debleskro drom te sikrell. Job well gar chojedo ap lende,

ninna te kamenn le gar ap leste te shunell. Job rakrell latches lentsa, te anell lo len ap o tchatcho drom! O Dewel nai dell len o dji, te mukenn le pengro tchilatcho drom, un te haiwenn le, hoi o tchatchepen hi.
Jaake wenn jon pale dran o bengeskre wasta win, kai jon pandlo his. O beng tapras len, te kran le kowa, hoi job kamella.
Kowa hunte djiness tu: Glan ko tsiro, kai i phub tele djala, well i pharo tsiro ap i menshende.

An ko pharo tsiro dikenn i menshe ap pende, te djal lenge kokres mishto. Jon hi pal i lowe. Jon krenn pen bares. Jon dikenn tele ap i wawarende. Jon rakrenn djungeles pral o Debleste. Jon shunenn gar ap pengro dadeste un ap pengri date. Jon parkrenn pen gar ko latchepaske, hoi i wawar lenge kran. Jon djiwenn jaake, har te dals kek Dewel.
Len hi kek dji i wawarenge. Jon wenn gar pale latches pal o tchingepen. Jon rakrenn chochepen pral o wawareste. Jon hi bi-pandlo un dukrenn i wawaren. Jon kamenn kek latchepen.
Jon hi phukepangre. Jon wenn sik chojedo. Jon phurdenn pen pre. Jon kamenn budeder pengro khelepen har o Debles.
Kolla krenn jaake, har te wans le patslo. Jon prindjrenn gar koi soor, hoi well dran o tchatcho patsepen. Rike tut sawe menshendar pale!
Mashkral lende hi menshe, kai djan an i khera, te taprenn le sawe djuwjen, kai ladjenn pen glan tchi, un ap lende bud doosh hi.
Kalla djuwja kamenn hako tsiro newo koowa te shunell un haiwenn gar, hoi o tchatchepen hi.
Glan raha tsiro shunan o Jannes un o Jambres gar ap o Moseste. Jaake shunenn kol menshe witar gar ap o tchatchepen. Jon hi nasselo an o shero, un lengro patsepen hi tchi moldo.
An i tikno tsiro dikella hakeno, kai kowa dinlepen hi, hoi jon krenna, har kowa ninna pash kolla dui murshende was.

Me sikrom tut, har te djas ap o Debleskro drom, un tu atchal ap leskro drom, un djiwal jaake, har me tuke glan djiwom. Tu kameh kowa, hoi me ninna kamau. Tu dikal, har me patsau ap o Jesus Kristeste. Un tu djineh, har rikrom ap o patsepen. Tu djineh ninna, har kamom i wawaren o djijestar, un har rikrom lauter win.
Tu djineh, har lan le man palla an i forja Antiochia, Ikonion un Listra. Un tu djineh, hawe duka jon mange kran. Un kowa lauter rikrom win. Un dran lauter kowa las man o rai Jesus win.
Djiness, lauter kolla, kai patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste un kamenn te krenn, hoi job kamella, wenn palla lino.

Kol tchilatche menshe un kol chochene, kai krenn jaake, har te wans le patslo, kolentsa well djungleder un djungleder. Jon peran o Debleskro dromestar tele, un tsardenn ninna wawaren o Debleskro dromestar tele.
Tu, Timoteo, atch pash kowa, hoi tuke penlo was, un hoi tu patseh! Tu djineh, koon tuke kowa lauter penas.

Tu prindjreh o Debleskro lab fun tiknes pre. Un ko lab das tut o goswepen, te hatsal o drom pash o Jesus Kristeste un haiwal, tu hunte patsess ap o Jesus Kristeste, te less ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.

Lauter, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi, tchiwas o Dewel an i menshengre djia, te tchinenn le kowa pre. Men hunte well o Debleskro lab, te sikras i menshende leskro drom, te sikras len lengri doosh, un hoi te krenn le feteder, un har te djiwenn le i djipen, hoi o Dewel kamella.
I mensho, kai kamell o Debleske koi te well, hatsell an o Debleskro lab lauter, hoi les hunte well, te nai krell lo lauter jaake, har o Dewel kamella.

Kowa, hoi kanna penau tuke, penau glan o Debleste un glan o Jesus Kristeste, kai krell o tchatchepen win pral i djidende un i mulende. Job, kai well pale, te well lo o baro rai pral i tsele menshende, kowa shunell, hoi tuke penau:

Pen i menshenge o Debleskro lab! Kre kowa un muk gar tele, ninna te kamenn i menshe kowa gar te shunell! Sike len lengri doosh! De len trad, te mukenn le o tchilatchepen! Kre lengre djia soreles an o patsepen! Un ab gar khino, te sikress len o tchatcho drom!
Well i tsiro, kai kamenn le o Debleskro tchatchepen buder gar te shunell. Jon djiwenna, har jon kamenna, un rodenn penge sawe sikepangre, kai kowa len sikrenna, hoi jon kamenn te shunell.
Palle shunenn jon buder gar ap o tchatchepen. Jon shunenn ap chochene parmisse.
Tu, Timoteo, de jak har tu djiweh! Rike win, ninna te krenn le tuke o djipen phares! Pen i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar! Koi budi das tut o Dewel. Kre koi budi mishto!
Miro djipen hi har i pipen, hoi well win tchoredo o Debleske. O tsiro was, kai hunte merap.
Me budrom phares o Jesuseske un dom miro patsepen gar pre. Me nashom jaake ap o Jesuseskro drom, har te woms i nashepaskro, kai nashell i raha drom. Kanna nashom o tselo drom.

Kowa, hoi kanna glan mande hi, hi ko shukar koowa, hoi kolla lenna, kai kran, hoi o Dewel kamella. Un kowa dell man maro rai Jesus. Job hi ko tchatchepaskro rai, kai djal pal o tchatchepen. Ko shukar koowa dell lo man ap ko diwes, kai job o tchatchepen wi-rakrell pral i tsele menshende. Ko shukar koowa dell job gar mande kokres. Job dell kowa lauterende, kai dikenn o tselo djijestar ap ko diwes, kai well lo pale.
Ab jaake sik har djala pash mande!
O Demas mukas man, un djas an o foro Tessalonika. Job kamell o djipen ap kai phub. O Kreskens djas an o them Galatia, un o Tito an o them Dalmatia.
O Luka atchas kokres pash mande. Te weh tu pash mande, aan o Markes tuha! Job nai budrell mange.
O Tichikes bitchrom an o foro Efesus.
Te weh tu, aan mange miri plashka, kai mukom an o foro Troas pash o mursheste, kai kharella Karpus. Aan ninna kol lila un kol ledertikre patria tuha, kai jaake bud moldo hi.
O Alexandro, kowa, kai budrell i sasteha, kras mange bud tchilatchepen. O rai Jesus rakrell i phagi pral leste win pal kowa, hoi job kras.
Tu ninna, de tut garda glan leste! Lauter, hoi mer penam, his leske gar mishto.
Har homs o glanstuno kopo glan i tchatchepangre tardo, his kek ap miri rig tardo. Lauter mukan man kokres. Me mangau o Debles, te lell lo koi doosh lendar.

O rai Jesus his ap miri rig, un das man i soor, te nai penap kote o tselo latcho lab lestar, jaake te shunan les ninna kolla, kai hi kek bibolde. Un job las man jaake dran lengre wasta win, har te woms dran i leweskro mui win lino.
Ninna an ko tsiro, hoi wella, lell man o Dewel dran o tselo tchilatchepen win, un lell man pash peste an o bolepen, kai job o rai hi. Les sharas mer kanna un hako tsiro. Amen!
Pen latche laba mandar ap i Priska un ap o Akwila! Pen ninna latche laba mandar ap i menshende an o Onesiforeskro kheer!
O Erasto atchas an o foro Korint, un o Trofimes hunte mukom nasselo an o foro Milet.
Trade tut, te wess glan o wend kai. O Eubulo un o Pudens, o Linus, i Klaudia, un i tsele wawar patsle penenn tuke: "Atch o Debleha!"
Maro rai Jesus hi tuha! Leskro latchepen djal tumentsa!

Me, o Paulo, tchinau kau liil. Me hom o Debleskro budepaskro. Un o Jesus Kristo bitchras man pash kolende, kolen o Dewel peske win rodas, te krap lengro patsepen soreles, te haiwenn le o tselo tchatchepen, un te djan le ap o Debleskro drom.
Jon hunte djinenn, te lenn le o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Kowa penas o Dewel glan i raha tsiro. Un job chochella gar.
Un kanna, kai o tchatcho tsiro was, mukell lo hakeneske peskro lab te haiwell. Maro Dewel, kai men dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win lella, job bitchras man, te penap kowa i menshenge.

Me tchinau ap tute, Tito. Tut un man hi jek patsepen. Doleske hal tu har miro tchatcho tchawo. Mu well tut latchepen un bacht an o dji! Kowa dell tut o Dewel, maro dad, un o Jesus Kristo, kai las men dran o tchilatchepen win.

Me mukom tut an o them Kreta pale, te kress tu kowa, hoi me buder gar krom, un te rodess tu phureden win mashkral i patslende an hako foro, te rikrenn le i patslen ap o tchatcho drom. Te kreh tu kowa, ma biste, hoi me tuke penom!
Sawo phureder hunte djiwell jaake, te dikell kek i tchilatcho koowa ap leste. Les well gar budeder har jek romni. Leskre tchawe shunenn ap leste, un patsenn ap o Debleste. Jon hi gar bi-pandlo.

I pralstuno pral o Debleskro kheer hunte djiwell jaake, te dikell kek i tchilatcho koowa ap leste. Job djal gar pal peskro shero, un well gar sik chojemen! Job well kek pipaskro un kek tchingepaskro! Job nashell gar pal i lowe!

Na-a, job well gar jaake! Job lell i wawaren latches an peskro kheer dre! Les well i baro dji i wawarenge. Job dell pes jak, hoi job rakrella. Job hi tchatcho un krella, hoi o Dewel kamella. Job nai lell pes khetne.

Job rikrell pes ap o Debleskro lab jaake, har kowa leske penlo was, un tchatcho hi. Palle nai rakrell lo i patslenge an o dji, te atchenn le ap o tchatcho drom. Ninna nai sikrell lo kolende, kai wawar koowa rakrenna, kai lengro gar tchatcho hi.

Koi hi bud menshe, kai shunenn gar ap o Debleste, un rakrenna dinelo koowa, un anenn i menshen o tchatcho dromestar tele. Bud lendar djiwenn pal i biboldengro tchatchepen un penenn: I mursha hunte wenn tchindlo ap o mass.
Tu pandess lengro mui! Jon sikrenn i menshende i drom, hoi gar tchatcho hi. Kowa krenn le, te well len budeder lowe. Jaake djinenn tsele familje buder gar, hoi te patsenna.

Jek lendar, kowa djiwas ninna an o them Kreta, his i sikepaskro un penas pral lende: "I Kretarja chochenn hako tsiro. Har diwje fiche hi le! Jon haidjrenn pengro pesso per o tselo diwes un budrenn tchi."
Un kowa, hoi ko sikepaskro penas, hi tchatcho. Doleske pen lenge, hoi pash lende gar mishto hi, un de len trad, te djan le tchatches ap o Debleskro drom.

Pen lenge, te shunenn le gar ap i biboldengre parmisse, witar gar ap kol menshende, kai mukan o tchatcho drom un penenn i menshenge, te rikrenn le pen ap laba, hoi penenna, hoi pale-tchiddo hi un hoi gar pale-tchiddo hi.

Kolla, kai o Jesus lengri doosh lendar las, kolla hi djudjo un erligo glan o Debleste. Kolenge dell tchi, hoi hi pale-tchiddo. Kolla, kai gar ap leste patsenna, kolla hi pale-tchiddo glan o Debleste. Kolenge hi lauter pale-tchiddo. Lengro dji hi tchilatcho, un jon haiwenn buder gar, hoi mishto un tchatcho hi.

Jon penenn, te prindjrenn le o Debles. An lauter, hoi jon krenna, sikrenn le, kai jon les gar prindjrenna. Jon hi infam an o Debleskre jaka, un kamenn gar ap leste te shunell. Jaake hi lauter, hoi jon krenna, tchi moldo.
Tu, Tito, sike i patslende o Debleskro drom jaake, har kowa tchatcho hi!

Pen i phure murshenge, te penenn le kek dinelo koowa, te djiwenn le latches glan i menshende, te denn le jak, hoi jon rakrenna, te atchenn le an o tchatcho patsepen, te kamenn le i menshen o tselo djijestar, un te wenn le gar khino an o patsepen!
Pen i phure djuwjenge, te djiwenn le jaake, har o Debleskre tchawe djiwenna, te rakrenn le gar djungeles pral i wawarende, te pijenn le pen gar mato! Jon hunte sikrenn i wawaren, hoi latcho hi.
I tarne djuwjenge hunte penenn le, te kamell hakeni peskro romes un pengre tchawen o djijestar,

te denn le pen jak, hoi jon rakrenna, te krenn le kek wi-ladjedo koowa, te krenn le pengri budi mishto an pengro kheer, te wenn le latches, un te shunell hakeni ap peskro romeste! Jon te krenn kowa lauter, palle rakrell nai kek mensho djungeles pral o Debleskro lab.
Pen i tarne murshenge soreles, te denn le jak, hoi jon rakrenna un krenna!
An hako koowa sike lende, har tu kowa kreh, te krenn le ninna latcho koowa! Pen o Debleskro lab an o tchatchepen, te djal les hakeneste an o dji!
Pen les lenge jaake, te nai penell kek, kai kowa gar tchatcho hi, hoi tu peneh! Palle nai rakrenn kolla gar djungeles pral mende, kai hi chojemen ap mende. Na-a, jon ladjenn pen.
Pen kolenge, kai hunte budrenn i rajeske, te shunenn le hako tsiro ap leste, te krenn le kowa, hoi job kamella, te rakrenn le leske gar pale,

te tchorenn le tchi lestar! I budepangre hunte krenn pengri budi mishto un tchatcho. Jaake sikrenn le an hako koowa, har mishto o Debleskro drom hi, hoi lende siklo was. Un jaake sharenn le o Debles, kai las men win dran o tchilatchepen.
Jaake sikras o Dewel, har baro peskro latchepen i tsele menshenge hi. Job kras i drom, te lell lo len dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win.

An peskro latchepen penell lo menge, te penas "na-a" ap lauter, hoi job gar kamella, te kras mer ko djungelo koowa gar, hoi kol wawar kate ap i phub krenna. Mer das jak, hoi krah, te djas ap o tchatcho drom, un te kras, hoi o Dewel kamella, jaake raha har mer djiwah ap kai phub.
Un mer dikah ap ko bachtelo diwes, kai well o Jesus Kristo pale an o shukar railepen. Job hi maro baro Dewel, kai las men dran o tchilatchepen win.
Job das peskro djipen an o merepen, te las lo mari tseli doosh ap peste, un te kras lo maro dji djudjo, te was mer leskre menshe, un te kamas i tseli sorjaha latcho koowa te krell.
Pen kawa lauter i patslenge! Rake an lengre djia! Te krenn le tchomone, hoi gar mishto hi, pen les lenge an o Debleskri soor! Hakeno hunte shunell ap tute.
Pen i patslenge, te shunenn le ap i rajende pral i themma un pral i forja! Pen lenge ninna, te krenn le hako latcho koowa,
te rakrenn le gar djungeles pral i wawarende, un te rodenn le kek tchingepen! Na-a! Jon hunte wenn o djijestar latcho un kamlo ap i tsele menshende.

Glan ko tsiro, kai hams gar patslo, hams ninna sawe menshe, kai prindjran o tchatchepen gar. Mer shunam gar ap o Debleste, un djam gar ap leskro drom. Hams pandlo ap djungelo koowa, hams tchilatcho un dikam tchilatche jakentsa ap kowa, hoi i wawaren his. Hams tchilatcho un chojemen ap i wawarende, un jon ap mende.
Kowa lauter was wawartchandes, har o Dewel mende sikras, har latcho un kamlo job ap i menshende hi. Job las men dran o tchilatchepen win

un anas men pash peste. Hams gar moldo, te kras job kowa. Ninna te kram gar latcho un tchatcho koowa, his o Debles i baro dji menge. Doleske thowas lo mari doosh mendar tele, un mer wam leskre tchawe. Kau newo djipen das men o Debleskro Ducho.
Koles bitchras o Jesus Kristo pash mende, un mer lam lestar bud.
Jaake tchiwas men o Jesus Kristo an o tchatchepen dran lauter latchepen, te dell lo men ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Un mer djinah, kai lah ko djipen an ko tsiro, hoi wella.
Kau lab hi tchatcho. Doleske rake kowa i patslenge an o dji, te rodenn le koi pal, har nai krenn le latcho koowa. Kowa hi mishto un bud moldo hakeneske.

Ma shun ap ko dinelo rakepen, hoi tchi molella! Ma tchinge lentsa pral kol lila, kai hi i phurengre laba dre tchindlo, witar gar pral kowa, hoi an o Moseskre lila tchindlo hi. Sawo tchingepen hi gar mishto i menshenge, un hi tchi moldo.

Te dell jek mensho, kai anell tchingepen mashkral i patslende, pen koleske, te mukell lo kowa! Job te mukell gar tele, pen kowa leske i duito kopo! Job te shunell gar ap tute, palle rake buder gar leha!
Tu djiness, sawo mensho djas o tchatcho dromestar tele, un kamell gar pale ap o tchatcho drom te well. Jaake sikrell lo, kai job mukas o Debles.

Me kamau te bitchrap i phrales pash tute: nai well o Artemas, nai well o Tichiko. Te well jek lendar pash tute, palle hunte wess tu sik pash mande kate an o foro Nikopolis. Me kamau te atchap kate pral o wend.
O Zenas, ko tchatchepaskro, un o Apollo, kolen de lauter djipaske, te djan le ap o drom dureder!
Muk ninna i patslen latcho koowa te krell un i wawarende te dell, hoi kolen hunte well djipaske! Jaake djiwenn i patsle pengro djipen gar tchitcheske.
Lauter kolla, kai pash mande hi, mukenn tuke latche laba te penell. Pen latche laba mendar lauterenge, kai kamenn men an o patsepen! O Debleskro latchepen djal tumentsa lauterentsa!
Me, o Paulo, kai stildo hom o Jesus Kristeske, un maro phraal, o Timoteo, mer tchinah kau liil ap tute, Filemon! Tu hal maro kamlo phraal un kreh mentsa khetne o Debleskri budi.
Mer tchinah ninna ap mari phenjate, i Apfia, un ap o Archippo, kai budrella mentsa o Jesus Kristeske, ninna ap i tsele patslende, kai wenna khetne an tiro kheer.
Latchepen un bacht tumenge! Kowa dell tumen o Dewel, kai maro dad an o bolepen hi, un o Jesus Kristo, maro rai.
Hako tsiro, kai rakrau o Debleha, parkrau man tuke pash leste.

Me shunom, kai tu kameh i tsele patslen o djijestar. Un tu patseh ap maro rajeste, o Jesuseste, jaake har mer ap leste patsah. Me mangau o Deblestar, te well tiro patsepen jaake soreles an tute, te haiwess tu bud un budeder har baro o latchepen hi, hoi das men o Jesus Kristo.
Miro phraal! Tiro kamlepen, hoi hi tut i patslenge, kowa kras lengre djia soreles. Un kowa, hoi tu lenge kral, kras man ninna bachteles, un das man newi soor.

Kanna penau tuke, hoske tchinau kau liil: Me kamau tutar, te kress tu tchomone mange. Ninna te hi man o Jesuseskro wast, un nai penoms tuke soreles, hoi tu hunte kress, kamau me kowa gar soreles tuke penell. Na-a. Me, o Paulo, i phuro mursh, un stildo o Jesus Kristeske, kamau tut o djijestar.
Un doleske mangau tutar miro tchaweske, o Onesimo, te wess tu leske latches. Kate an o stilepen penom leske o Jesus Kristestar. Un job was patslo, un was miro tchawo an o patsepen.
Ap ko tsiro, har job pash tute budras, his lo tuke tchi moldo. Kanna hi lo mange har tuke bud moldo.
Koles bitchrau tuke pale. Un miro dji djal leha.
Me kamoms te atchals lo pash mande un wals mange koi, jaake har tu mange koi wals, te wals tu pash mande kate an o stilepen. Kate hom doleske, kai penom i menshenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar.
Me kamom gar tchomone te krap, hoi tu gar kameh. Doleske rikrom o Onesimes gar pash mande. Tu te kameh les mange pale te dell, kress tu kowa dran tiro latchepen.
Nai wals, te his lo i tikno tsiro gar pash tute, te atchell lo kanna hako tsireske pash tute.

Kanna hi lo tuke buder gar kokres i budepaskro. Na-a. Job hi budeder har kowa. Job hi i latcho phraal. Kowa hi lo mange, un har bud budeder hi lo kowa kanna tuke: Job hi tiro budepaskro un ninna tiro phraal an o patsepen.
Me te hom tiro maal, palle le les pash tute pre, jaake har tu man pre lals.
Job te kras tuke tchomone tchilatches un te hi les i sijaan pash tute, palle kre jaake, har wals man koi sijaan pash tute.
Me, o Paulo, tchinau kowa kokres miro wasteha. Me kamau plaissrell, hoi job hunte plaissrals tuke. Me kamau gar te rakrap pral koi sijaan, hoi tut pash mande hi: Me anom tut ap o Debleskro drom.
Awa, miro phraal! Kre man bachteles, un kre kowa, hoi me tutar mangom! Kre kowa maro rajeske, o Jesus Kristeske, ap koleste mer dui patsah. Jaake kreh tu miro dji soreles an leste!
Me djinau, te shuneh ap mande un kreh ninna budeder har me tutar mangom. Doleske tchinom tuke kau liil.
I wawar koowa mangau tutar: Kre mange i isema an tiro kheer, kai me nai sowap! O Dewel te shunell tumaro mangepen, palle wau an i tikno tsiro pash tumende. Kowa patsau.
O Epafras, kai mantsa an o stilepen o Jesus Kristeske hi, penell tuke: Atch maro Debleha!
Ninna o Marko, o Aristarcho, o Demas, un o Luka, kai mantsa o Jesus Kristeske budrenna, kolla lauter penenn tuke: Atch maro Debleha!
O latchepen maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar, well pral tumende!
An o phuro tsiro rakras o Dewel bud kope jaake te jaake ap peskre rakepangre, un bitchras len pash mare phurende, te penenn le lenge leskre laba.
Kanna, an kau tsiro, bitchras lo peskro tchawes pash mende, te rakras job ap mende. Koleste das o Dewel lauter an leskre wasta, te well job o rai pral lauter. Koleha kras lo o bolepen un i phub.

O Debleskro tchawo hi railo un baro har o Dewel. Un kowa, hoi hi o Debles an o dji, hi ninna o tchawes an o dji. Dran leskro sorelo lab rikrell lo lauter khetne, hoi job kras. O Debleskro tchawo las mari doosh un tchilatchepen mendar, un job beshas pes ap i tchatchi rig o baro Deblestar an o bolepen.
Job was bud bareder un sorleder har i bolepangre. Un o Dewel das les i lab, hoi hi bud bareder un raileder har lengre laba.

An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo, kai penell o Dewel ap peskro tchaweste: Tu hal miro tchawo. Kau diwes wom tiro dad. Sawe laba penas lo ap kekeste peskre bolepangre. Witar gar penas lo ap kekeste lendar: Me wau tiro dad. Un tu weh miro tchawo.
O Debleskro tchawes hi peskro dadeskro wast. Lestar penas o Dewel, har job les ap i phub bitchras: I tsele Debleskre bolepangre hunte witsrenn pen glan leste tele, te sharenn le les.
Pral peskre bolepangre penas lo: Jon hi mire budepangre, sik har i ducho, hoi phurdell pral i phub, un sorelo har i jag.
Ap peskro tchaweste penas lo: Tu, o Dewel, atcheh o baro rai kanna un hako tsiro. Tu hal tchatcho un latcho ap tire menshende.
O tchatchepen kamal tu, un o tchilatchepen dikeh glan i jaka nai gar. Doleske rodas tut tiro Dewel win, te wess tu bareder un bachtleder har kolla, kai pash tute hi.
Pale penas lo ap leste: Tu hal o baro rai, un kral i phub glan i raha tsiro. Un tire wasta kran o bolepen.
O bolepen un i phub atchenna gar. Tu atcheh hako tsiro. O bolepen un i phub wenn phuro, un djan paash har i ripen.
Tu tchiweh len khetne, har jek i phuri plashka khetne tchiwella, un i newi plashka ap peste tchiwella. Tu atcheh jaake, har tu hal, un mereh gar.
Ap kekeste peskre bolepangre penas lo kowa, hoi job ap peskro tchaweste penas: Besh tut ap miri tchatchi rig! Un me krau, te wess tu o rai pral kolende, kai chan pen ap tute.
I tsele bolepangre hi leskre budepangre. Kolen bitchras o Dewel ap i rig kolendar, kai djan ap o Debleskro drom, te lenn le o Debleskro djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.

Glan i raha tsiro penan i bolepangre mare phurenge, har hunte djan jon ap o Debleskro drom. Koon gar ap o Debleste shunas, un gar ap leskro drom djas, kowa las peskri phagi. Jaake sorelo hi o Debleskro lab. Doleske hunte das mer baro jak ap ko lab, hoi mer shunam, te djiwas pal kowa, un te peras gar ko tchatcho dromestar tele.

Mer te djah gar ap o newo drom, kai lah o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella, palle wella o Debleskri choli pral mende. Kau newo drom sikras men maro rai Jesus. Un leskre laba hi o tchatchepen. Kolla, kai les shunan, penan les menge.

Un o Dewel das len peskri soor, te krenn le baro un sorelo koowa, hoi kek wawar mensho nai krella. Jaake sikras lo, te penan le o tchatchepen. Ninna das lo i patslende peskro Ducho un peskri soor, te krenn le peskri budi mashkral i menshende. Hakeneste das lo i soor, te krell job koi budi, hoi o Dewel lestar kamas.
Ap i bolepangre penas lo gar, te wenn le raja pral koi newi phub, hoi wella, kolatar mer kate rakrah. Na-a.
Kowa penas lo ap i menshende. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Hoske bistral tu gar o menshes? Hoske deh tu ap leste garda?
I tikno tsiro mukal les tikneder te well har i bolepangre. Palle kral tu les railo un baro.
Tu dal lauter an leskre wasta. Tchi hi koi, pral koleste job gar o rai hi. Ninna te djinah mer kowa, dikah kanna gomme gar lauter an leskre wasta.

Kones mer dikah, kowa hi o Jesus. Job his i tikno tsiro tikneder har i bolepangre, un meras i menshenge. Doleske kras o Dewel les baro un railo. Jaake latcho his o Dewel i menshenge, te bitchras lo o Jesuses lauterenge an o merepen.

O Dewel kamas, te wenn bud menshe peskre tchawe, un lenn leskro railepen. Doleske hunte las peskro tchawo duka un merepen ap peste, te nai anell lo len ap ko drom, kai lenn le o Debleskro djipen. Jaake his kowa mishto glan o Debleskre jaka, kai lauter kras, un koleske lauter kerdo was.
O Jesus kras i patslen tchatcho un erligo, un anas len pash peskro dadeste. Kanna hi leskro dad ninna lengro dad. Doleske ladjell lo gar, te dell lo len "phrala" gole.
Un job penell ap o Debleste: Me sikrau mire phralende, koon tu hal. Un kote, kai jon khetne wenna, sharau tut un giwau gilja tuke.
Un pale penell lo: Me tchiwau man an o Debleskre wasta. Un pale penell lo: Dik, kate hom me kal tchawentsa, kai o Dewel das man.
Jon hi menshe dran rat un mass. Doleske was lo ninna i mensho har jon, un meras, te las lo o bengeske i soor krik pral o merepen.
Jaake nai las lo kol menshenge i daar o merepastar, hoi his len an pengro tselo djipen.
Tchatchepaha, kowa kras lo gar i bolepangrenge, na-a, kowa kras lo kol menshenge, kai ap leste patsenna, jaake har o Abraham ap leste patsas.

Doleske hunte was o Jesus an lauter jaake, har leskre phrala, te well les i baro dji lenge, un te well lo lenge i tchatcho baro rashai glan o Debleste, te mangell lo les leskre menshenge, te lell job i doosh lendar.

O Jesus haiwella, hoi duka hi. Un job djinella, har kowa hi, te kamell o beng jekes o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell. Doleske nai well lo kanna ninna ap i rig kolendar, kai kamell len o beng o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell.

Mire patsle phrala, o Dewel das tumen gole, te djiwenn pash leste an o bolepen. Doleske dikenn ap o Jesuseste, kones o Dewel bitchras, te anell lo i menshen ap leskro drom. Les hi peskro dadeskro wast. Un job hi maro baro rashai. Ap leste patsah mer. Job mangell o Debles menge.
Koi budi das les o Dewel. Un job kras lat mishto jaake, har ninna o Mose peskri budi o Debleskre menshenge mishto kras.
O Jesus hi bareder har o Mose. Kowa hi jaake, har te wals i kheer kerdo: Kowa, kai kras ko kheer, well budeder sharedo har ko kheer, hoi kerdo was.
Hako kheer well jekestar kerdo. Un kowa, kai lauter kras, hi o Dewel.
O Mose budras mishto o Debleskre menshenge. Kowa, hoi job kras un penas, sikras lende, hoi o Dewel kamas te krell an ko tsiro, hoi wella. Ninna te budras o Mose mishto, his lo i Debleskro budepaskro.

O Jesus Kristo hi o Debleskro tchawo. Un an leskre wasta hi o Debleskre menshe, ap kolende job mishto garda della. Kolla ham mer, te tchiwah maro tselo patsepen ap leste, un dah gar pre bis te lah o railo djipen pash leste.
Doleske shunenn, hoi o Debleskro Ducho tumenge penella: Tumer te shunenna kau diwes o Debleskro rakepen, palle shunenn ap leste!
Krenn tumaro dji gar har barra jaake, har tumare phure kran an o mulo them, har tchingran le ap o Moseste, un kaman miro drom buder gar te djal!
Ninna te dikan le star-deesh bersha, hoi me, o Dewel, lenge krom, patsan le man gar, un mire laba his lenge tchi moldo.
Doleske wom me chojedo ap lende, un penom: Hako tsiro djan le pal pengro shero. Miro drom kaman le gar te djal.
Jaake chojedo homs ap lende, te dom man sowel, un penom: Jon wenn gar dre an miro them, kai jon pash mande khere nai wans.
Mire phrala, denn jak ap tumare djia, te mukell kek tumendar peskro patsepen, un kamell o djido Deblestar buder tchi te djinell.

Rakrenn hako diwes khetne pral o patsepen, te atchenn pash o Debleste! Ko tsiro, kai rakrell o Dewel ap tumende hi kanna. Te shunenn tumer gar ap o Debleste, nai well i tsiro, kai shunenn tumer buder gar, te dell lo tumen gole.
Te rikrah soreles ap maro patsepen ap o Jesus Kristeste jaake raha, har djiwah, palle ham tchatchepaha leskre.

Doleske hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab: Kau diwes, te shunenn tumer o Debleskro rakepen, shunenn ap leste, un krenn tumare djia gar har barra, har tumare phure kran, har tchingran le ap o Moseste, un kaman miro drom buder gar te djal!
Penenn mange: Koon his kolla, kai shunan o Debleskro rakepen, un kaman buder gar ap leskro drom te djal? Kolla his lauter, kai djan o Moseha win dran o them Egiptia.

Pale putchau tumendar: Pral koneste was o Debleskri choli star-deesh bersha? Leskri choli was ap kolende, kai kaman buder gar ap leskro drom te djal. Kolla meran an o mulo them, un atchan kote tchiddo.
Kanna penenn mange: Pral koneste rakras o Dewel, har job pes sowel das, te wenn le gar an leskro them, kai jon hako tsiro khere wans? Job rakras kolendar, kai shunan gar ap leste.
Jaake dikah mer: Kolla, kai patsan gar, hoi o Dewel penas, hi kolla, kai wan gar an o Debleskro them dre.

Dran kowa denn mishto garda, te dell kek tumendar peskro patsepen pre! An o phuro tsiro penas o Dewel peskre menshenge, te dell lo len i them, kai jon hako tsiro khere hi. Kau lab, hoi o Dewel lenge penas, atchell menge ninna. An o phuro tsiro shunan le les, un patsan les gar. Jaake wan le gar an o Debleskro them.

Mer, kai patsah, hoi o Dewel penas, mer wah an o Debleskro them. I wawarendar penell lo: An miri choli dom man sowel, un penom: Jon wenn gar dre an miro them, kai wans le hako tsiro pash mande khere. Kau them hi koi jaake raha, har o Dewel o bolepen un i phub kras. Lauter his kerdo, har job o bolepen un i phub an shob diwessa kras.
Pral o eftato diwes was penlo: Har kras o Dewel lauter an o bolepen un ap i phub, budras lo buder tchi ap o eftato diwes. Lauter his kerdo.
Kol menshendar an o phuro tsiro penas lo: Jon wenn gar an miro them dre, kai wans le hako tsiro pash mande khere.
Jaake dikah: Hi sawe menshe, kolla wan gar dre an leskro them, un wawar, kai nai wenn koi dre. Kolla, kai shunan o Debleskro lab an o phuro tsiro, patsan les gar, un wan gar dre.

Doleske rodas o Dewel i wawar diwes win, kai job pale ap i menshende rakrella. Ko diwes hi kanna. Bud bersha pal o tsiro, kai mare phure an o mulo them djan, tchiwas lo o Davideske kol laba an o dji: Tumer te shunenn kau diwes o Debleskro rakepen, palle shunenn ap leste! Krenn tumare djia gar har barra!
Glan o David djiwas o Josua. Kowa anas mare phuren an o them Israel. Te wals o them Israel ko them, pral koleste o Dewel rakras, rakrals lo bud bersha pal ko tsiro buder gar pral i wawar diwes.
Jaake dikah: Hi gomme i tsiro, kai nai wenn i menshe pash o Debleste, kai jon hako tsiro khere nai wenna.
Kote hunte krenn i menshe buder kek budi, jaake har o Dewel buder kek budi kras, har lauter ap i phub kerdo was.

Doleske tchiwas mer maro tselo dji koi pre, te was an leskro them dre, kai ham hako tsiro pash leste khere. Das jak, te perell kek mendar o Debleskro dromestar tele, har kol menshe an o phuro tsiro, kai shunan gar ap o Debleste!

O Debleskro lab hi djido un sorelo, un tchinell sorleder har i charo, hoi tchinell ap dui riga. Jaake har tchinell i charo dur dre an o mass, ninna an i kokale, jaake tchinell o Debleskro lab dur dre an o mensheskro dji, un sikrell leste, hoi hi latcho un tchilatcho an leskro djipen.
O Dewel dikella lauter. Tchi an mende hi khatedo glan leskre jaka. Lauter hi pre tchakedo glan leste. Un leske hunte penas mer halauter, hoi kram.
Men hi i baro rashai. Kowa hi o Jesus, o Debleskro tchawo. Job djas pash o Debleste an o bolepen, te mangell lo les menge. Doleske mukas mer gar tele, te rikras soreles ap maro patsepen.

Job, maro baro rashai, haiwell men mishto, un djinella, te hi men kek soor pral o tchilatchepen. Les kamas o beng ninna o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell, jaake har kamell lo men o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell. Jek koowa his an o Jesuseskro djipen wawartchandes har pash mende: Kek tchilatchepen his an leste.
Dran kowa was mer glan maro latcho Debleste. Koles hi i baro dji menge, te dell lo men peskri soor ap ko tsiro, kai hunte las mer leskri soor.
Hako baro rashai hi dran i menshende win rodedo, te well lo lengro rashai glan o Debleste. Leske anenn le fichen, te anell lo len glan o Debleste, te well lengri doosh lendar krik lino.

O baro rashai haiwell mishto, har kolenge djala, kai peran o Debleskro dromestar tele, ninna te djinan le gar, kai hi kowa tchilatcho, hoi jon kran. Job hi i mensho har jon, un les hi gar i soor pral o tchilatchepen.
Doleske hunte marell lo ninna peske i fiches, un anell les glan o Debleste, te well leskri doosh krik lino, jaake har job i wawar menshenge fichen marella, un glan o Debleste anella.
Kek mursh nai penella: Me wau baro rashai. Na-a, o Dewel rodell les win, jaake har job glan i raha tsiro ninna o Arones win rodas, te well lo i baro rashai.
Ninna o Jesus Kristo kras pes gar bares un penas: Me wau baro rashai. Na-a, o Dewel rodas les win, har penas lo ap leste: Tu hal miro tchawo. Kau diwes wom tiro dad.
I wawar kopo penas lo lestar: Hako tsiro hal tu o baro rashai glan mande, un kreh koi budi jaake, har glan i raha tsiro o Melchisedek kras.

Har o Jesus ap i phub djiwas, kras lo lauter, hoi o Dewel kamas. Doleske shunas les o Dewel. An i daar mangas o Jesus o Debles i ropaha un bari goljaha. Job djinas, kowa nai lell les dran o merepen win.
Ninna te his lo o Debleskro tchawo, hunte las job duka ap peste, te krell lo kowa, hoi o Dewel lestar kamas.
Un job kras kowa lauter, un tchi atchas pral, hoi hunte krals lo gomme. Jaake nai lell lo lauteren, kai ap leste shunenna, hako tsireske dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win.
Un o Dewel penas ap leste: Tu hal i baro rashai glan mande, har glan i raha tsiro o Melchisedek his.
Pral kowa wals men tumenge budeder te penell. Un menge hi kowa phares, te rakras jaake, te haiwenn tumer les: Tumare djia wan khino.

Tumer han jaake raha patslo, kai hunte wans sikepangre i wawar menshenge. Kowa han tumer gar. Tumende hunte well pale o Debleskro drom siklo har djinans les gomme gar. Jaake han tumer har tikne tchawe, kai pijenna thud, un nai chan kek mursheskro chapen.
I thud hi i tikne tchawenge, kai djinenn gar, hoi hi latcho un tchilatcho.
O mursheskro chapen hi kolenge, kai djiwenna pal o Debleskro lab un haiwenn bud un budeder, hoi latcho un tchilatcho hi.

Kanna kamah te rakras pral kowa, hoi kolenge hi, kai hi phure an o patsepen, un buder gar pral kowa, hoi mer kolenge penah, kai hi tarno an o patsepen. Mer kamah buder gar pral kowa te rakrell, hoi tumer shunan, har patslo wan! Ap ko tsiro was tumenge penlo, te mukenn tumaro tchilatcho drom, hoi an o merepen anella, un te patsenn ap o Debleste, un te djan ap leskro drom.

Ninna was tumenge penlo, te mukenn tumen an o pani te thowell, te sikrenn tumer, kai mukan tumaro phuro djipen. Ninna was tumenge penlo, hoske i patslo peskre wasta ap i wawareste tchiwella. Tumenge was ninna penlo, te krell o Dewel i mulen djido, un te rakrell lo o tchatchepen pral lende win. Kowa, hoi job len dell, - o djipen har i phagi, - kowa atchell hako tsiro ap lende.
Djas kanna dureder! Kowa kamell o Dewel mendar!

Hi menshe koi, kolenge kras o Dewel lengre djia pre, te haiwan le leskro bolepaskro latchepen. Un o Debleskro Ducho budras an lengre djia. Un jon haiwan o Debleskro latcho lab un leskri soor an lengro djipen. Kolla te perenn o Debleskro dromestar tele, nai anell len kek pale ap o Debleskro drom. Kowa, hoi jon krenna hi jaake, har te denn le penge o Jesus Kristes pale ap o trushel. Un kol wawar san pral leste.
Mer menshe ham har i phub, ap late bud kope o brishin das. O Dewel dikell latches ap koleste, kai hi har koi phub, hoi lell o brishin an peste dre, un anell latcho koowa win kolenge, kai budrenn koi.
Job dikell gar latches ap koleste, te hi lo har koi wawar phub, hoi anell subjengre burra, un wawar djungele burra win. Koi phub hi tchi moldo, un pal i tsiro well li chatchedo.
Kamle mala, ninna te rakrah jaake, patsah soreles, te han tumer ap i feteder drom. Ko drom anell tumen pash o Debleste.
O Dewel hi latcho un tchatcho, un bistrell gar tumaro kamlepen ap leste, har budran i patslenge, un krenn kowa gomme kanna dureder.
Mer kamah o djijestar, te tchiwell hakeno tumendar peskro dji ap ko shukar djipen, hoi kamell o Dewel les te dell an o bolepen.
Ma awenn khino, te krenn o Debleskri budi! Awenn jaake har kolla, kai atchan soreles an o patsepen, un lan kowa, hoi o Dewel lenge penas.

Te dell i mensho peskro lab, dell lo peskro dadeskro wast koi pre. Leskro dad hi bareder har job. Jaake sikrell lo o wawares, te krell lo tchatchepaha kowa, hoi job penas. Un ko wawar patsell les. Har das o Dewel o Abrahameste peskro lab, das lo peskro wast koi pre. His kek, kai his bareder har o Dewel. Un o Dewel penas: Tchatchepaha, bud bacht mukau pral tute te well, un tutar wenna bud bud tchawe. Un o Abraham patsas o Debles, un witsras gar peskro patsepen ap i rig. Un jaake las lo kowa, hoi o Dewel leske penas.
Har das o Dewel peskre menshen peskro lab, das lo ninna peskro wast koi pre. Jaake sikras lo len, te dell lo len tchatchepaha kowa, hoi job lenge penas.

Ko lab, hoi das o Dewel un das peskro wast pre, nai well an kek tsiro krik lino. O Dewel chochella gar. Un mer, kai wam pash leste, te lell lo men dran o tchilatchepen win, men hi kanna leskro sorelo lab, te dell lo men o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella, jaake har job penas.

Kau patsepen rikrell maro djipen, jaake har rikrell i sorelo saster i panjeskro ulepaskro, te djal lo gar ap o pani nashedo. Un kowa, ap koleste patsah un dikah, kowa hi o Jesus. Job djas glan mende pash o Debleste an o bolepen, jaake har djas o baro rashai an o phuro tsiro an o Debleskro kheer. Un jaake was o Jesus hako tsireske sawo baro rashai, har glan i raha tsiro o Melchisedek his.

O Melchisedek his o baro rai pral o foro Salem, ninna o baro rashai o baro Deblestar. An ko tsiro djas o Abraham an o kurepen, un maras i bare rajen pengre lurdentsa. Har job pale was, djas o Melchisedek pash leste, un rakras o Debleskri bacht pral leste win.
Un o Abraham das les o deshto kotar lauterestar, hoi las job an o kurepen. Ko lab Melchisedek kharella Tchatcho Rai, un job his ninna o rai pral o foro Salem. O lab Salem kharella Bacht.

An o Debleskro lab hi tchi tchindlo pral leskro dadeste un leskri date. Tchi hi koi tchindlo pral leskre phurende, witar gar pral ko diwes, kai job boldo was, un kai job meras. Jaake atchell lo o baro rashai hako tsireske, har o Debleskro tchawo.
Kowa sikrell tumen, har baro o Melchisedek his! Koles das maro kamlo dad, o Abraham, o deshto kotar lauterestar, hoi las job an o kurepen.

Ninna an o them Israel lan i rashaja o deshto kotar lauterestar, hoi i Israelitarja penge khetne anan. Jaake his tchindlo an o Moseskre lila. Kol rashaja, - lengro dad his o Levi, - lan o deshto kotar kolendar, kai lengre phrala his. Kolla lauter wan pal o Abraham.

Koleste das o Dewel peskro lab, te krell lo les baro, un te dell lo les bud bacht. Ninna te hi o Abraham jaake baro, hi o Melchisedek bareder har job. Job las o deshto kotar o Abrahamestar un rakras o Debleskri bacht pral leste win, ninna te his lo gar leskre menshendar.
Un hakeno djinella: O bareder rakrell i bacht win pral o tikneder.
I rashaja an o them Israel, kolende i menshe pengro deshto kotar denna, kolla hi menshe, kai hunte merenna. O Melchisedek, kolestar hi penlo, te djiwell lo.

I rashaja an o them Israel wenna pal o Levi. Kolla lenn o deshto kotar, hoi pengre phrala khetne anan. Un o Levi was pal o Abraham. Jaake nai penah: Har das o Abraham o deshto kotar, das kowa ninna leskro tchaweskro tchawo, o Levi,
ninna te his o Levi gomme gar boldo, har o Melchisedek pash o Abrahameste djas.

Mer djinah, har das o Dewel peskre menshende o Moseskre lila, koi penas job ap o Levideskre tchawe, te wenn le rashaja. Ninna te kran jon pengri budi jaake, har lengro dad, o rashai Aron, nai tchiwan le i menshen gar an o tchatchepen glan o Debleste. Doleske rodas o Dewel i wawar rashajes win, jek, kai krell peskri budi jaake har o Melchisedek, un buder gar jaake har o Aron.
Mer djinah: Te lell o Dewel peske i wawar rashai, kai gar o Levideskre tchawendar hi, palle sikrell o Dewel ninna i wawar drom, kai wenn nai i menshe pash leste.

Maro baro rashai, kolestar kate rakedo wella hi o Jesus Kristo. Job well gar o Levideskre menshendar. Mer lauter djinah, leskre menshe wenna pal o Juda. Un kek kolendar his i rashai. Lenge penas o Mose gar, te wenn le rashaja.
Mer haiwah mishto, ko wawar rashai, kai hi jaake har o Melchisedek, koles his kek dad, koon ninna rashai his. Na-a. Les hi o Debleskro djipen, kai hako tsiro atchella. Doleske was lo maro rashai.
O Dewel penell pral leste: Tu hal i rashai hako tsireske har o Melchisedek.
Jaake tchiwas lo kol phure laba, hoi o Mose i menshenge penas, ap i rig. An kol laba his kek soor. Un jon his tchi moldo.
O Moseskre laba nai kran i menshen gar tchatcho glan o Debleste. Doleske sikras men o Dewel i newo un feteder drom, kai anell men pash leste.

Job tchiwas o Jesuses an leskri budi un penas: Tu hal i baro rashai hako tsireske, un job das peskro wast koi pre. Un kal laba nai khaitenn les kek tsireske. Har job o Levideskre tchawen lengri budi das, te wenn le rashaja, das job gar peskri wast koi pre.
Jaake was o Jesus kowa, kai nai anell men tchatchepaha pash o Debleste. Kowa nai kras o Mose gar.
An ko tselo tsiro his bud rashaja. Kolla lauter hunte meran. Har jek meras, was pale i wawar.
O Jesus atchell o rashai hako tsireske. Job merella gar, un kek wawar well pal leste.
Doleske nai krell lo, te djal kek kolendar nashedo, koon job pash o Debleste anas. Job djiwell hako tsireske, un mangell o Debles lenge.

O Jesus hi o baro rashai, kai hunte well men. Job hi latcho glan o Debleskre jaka. Kek tchilatchepen, witar kek doosh hi ap leste. Na-a, job hi gar jaake har mer tchilatche menshe ham, kai ham pale-tchiddo glan o Debleste. Un o Dewel kras les bareder har hako wawar an o bolepen.

Job hi gar har kol wawar bare rashaja, un hunte anell gar hako diwes i maredo fiches o Debleske, te well peskri doosh krik lino. Ninna hunte anell lo gar i wawar menshenge marede fichen o Debleske, te well lengri doosh krik lino. Na-a, job kokres das peskro djipen an o merepen jek kopo hako tsireske.

Kol wawar bare rashaja hi menshe un gar sorelo, un nai krenn gar mishto kowa, hoi o Dewel lendar kamella. Jon wan rashaja jaake, har o Mose an peskre lila tchinas. Bud tsiro palla, das o Dewel peskro lab, un das peskro wast koi pre, te well leskro tchawo i baro rashai hako tsireske. Job krell lauter mishto, hoi o Dewel lestar kamella.
Kowa hunte djinenn tumer: Men hi i baro rashai, kowa hi o Jesus Kristo. An o bolepen hi lo beshdo ap i tchatchi rig o Deblestar.
Kote budrell lo o Debleske an o tchatcho Debleskro kheer, hoi kras o Dewel, un kek mensho.
Hako baro rashai ap i phub hunte anell o Debleske marede fichen, un wawar latcho koowa. Ninna maro rashai, o Jesus, hunte anell tchomone o Debleske.
Kate ap kai phub wals lo kek rashai. Ap i phub hi kol rashaja, kai anenn o Debleske latcho koowa jaake, har an o Moseskre lila tchindlo hi.

Ko kheer, kai jon budrenna, un kowa, hoi jon krenna, sikrell men i tikno kotar dran koi tseli budi, hoi krell maro baro rashai, o Jesus Kristo, an o bolepen. Kowa dikah kanna gomme gar lauter. Har kras o Mose o Debleske i kheer dran fichengre balla an o mulo them, penas o Dewel leske, har te krell lo les un penas: Kowa lauter, hoi tu kreh, kre jaake, har me sikrom les tute ap i berga!

Maro baro rashai hi o Jesus. Koleste das o Dewel i feteder budi har kol rashajende ap i phub. Job hi ninna maro rakepaskro, kai kras menge i newo drom, kai nai wah pash o Debleste. Kau newo drom hi feteder har ko phuro drom, hoi o Mose sikras. Ap kau newo drom djiwah nai tchatchepaha o Debleha khetne, jaake har job kowa menge penas.
Te nai wams ap o phuro drom pash o Debleste, hunte rodals o Dewel kek newo drom.
Job dikas, kai kol menshe, kolengre phure o Israel un o Juda his, gar jaake djiwan, har job lenge penas. Koi penas lo: Ko tsiro wella, kai sikrau len i newo drom, te wenn le mantsa khetne.
Kau newo drom hi gar jaake, har ko phuro drom, hoi sikrom lende ap ko diwes, kai taprom lengre phuren ap i wasta, te anap len dran o them Egiptia win. Har atchan le gar ap miro drom, mukom len.

Ap ko tsiro, hoi wella, penell o Dewel, rakrau pale lentsa, un anau len ap o newo drom. Me tchiwau miro tchatchepen an lengre shere, un tchinau mire laba an lengre djia. Un me hom lengro Dewel, un jon hi mire menshe.
Kek hunte penell ap peskro phraleste, witar gar ap koleste, kai djiwell pash leste: Tu hunte hatsess o Debles! Hakeno djinella, koon me hom. I tikne un i bare prindjrenn man.
Un me bistrau lengri doosh, hoi jon ap pende anan. Ko tchilatchepen, hoi jon kran, well buder gar an miro shero.
Te penell o Dewel kate: Me krau i newo drom, jaake hi kowa, hoi job o Moseha win kras, i phuro drom. Un kowa, hoi hi phuro un buder tchi moldo, well krik lino.

An ko phuro tsiro, har o Mose i menshenge penas, har djan le ap o Debleskro drom, koi penas lo lenge ninna, har te budrenn le o Debleske an leskro kheer, un ninna, har te krenn le leske i kheer ap i phub, kai mangenn le les an.

Ko Debleskro kheer his i tikno kheer, kerdo dran fichengre balla, hoi hidjan le nai. Koles his dui iseme. I glanstuni isema kharella: O Debleskri isema. I palstuni isema kharella: O Debleskri kutch isema. An i glanstuni isema his i momelengri un i chapaskri tardo. Ap i chapaskri his kol mare tchiddo, hoi dan le o Debleste. Mashkral kol dui iseme his i wudar dran kutch pesso thann.

An i palstuni isema his o sonakaskro bob tardo, kai kutch gudlo kasht pral pre chatchedo was, hoi mishto sungella. Koi his ninna o sonakaskro mochton. An leste his o sonakaskro khoro, kai his ko maro dre tchiddo, hoi Manna kharella. An ko mochton his ninna o Aroneskro kasht, hoi senelo was, ninna kol dui tchindle barra. Ap kolende his i deesh Debleskre laba tchindlo, hoi o Dewel peskre menshentsa win kras.

Pral pre ap o sonakaskro mochton his dui raile bolepangre dran sonakai tardo. Kolen his mussja har bare tchirklen hi. Pengre mussja rikran le pral o sonakaskro mochton. Kote well i menshengri doosh krik lino. Kanna kamah gar te rakras pral hako tikno koowa an o Debleskro tikno kheer.
Kanna sikrau tumende, hoi an o Debleskro tikno kheer kerdo was. Hako diwes djan i rashaja an i glanstuni isema, te krenn le pengri budi o Debleske.

Jek kopo an o bersh djas o baro rashai kokres an i palstuni kutch isema. Har djal lo dre, lell lo o rat peha i fichestar, hoi maras lo o Debleske, te lell o Dewel leskri doosh lestar, ninna i doosh kol menshendar, kai anan doosh ap pende, ninna te djinan le gar, kai kowa, hoi jon kran, i tchilatcho koowa his.
Jaake sikrell men o Debleskro Ducho, kai kek nai djal an koi palstuni kutch isema, jaake raha, har hi koi glanstuni isema koi.

I glanstuni isema sikrell mende ko tsiro, an hoi mer kanna djiwah. I menshe anenn fichen, un wawar koowa o Debleske. Kowa lauter nai krell lengro dji gar djudjo. An lengro dji haiwenn le, te hi le gomme tchilatcho.

Ninna rikrenn pen i menshe ap laba, kai penenna, hoi te chan le gar, un hoi te pijenn le gar, un har te thowenn le pen. Kol laba hi menshengre laba. Kowa lauter his mishto jaake raha, har sikras len o Dewel gomme gar o feteder drom, te nai wenn jon pash leste.

Kanna was o Jesus Kristo. Job hi maro baro rashai un anas men o bolepaskro brawlepen. O Debleskro kheer an o bolepen, kai job dre djas, hi bareder un feteder har ko Debleskro kheer ap i phub. O Debleskro kheer an o bolepen hi gar i menshendar kerdo.

Har o Jesus an o Debleskro kheer an o bolepen djas, anas lo gar i bakrengro rat peha, witar gar i grumjengro rat. Na-a. Peskro rat anas lo glan o Debleste. Kowa kras lo jek kopo un gar bud kope. Un jaake las lo mari doosh hako tsireske mendar.

An o phuro tsiro tchoras o rashai o bakrengro rat, un o grumjengro rat, un o jagakri tchik i chatchedi grumjatar ap kolende, kai hi pale-tchiddo glan o Debleste, te wenn le pale erligo kerdo. Te hi o ficheskro rat jaake sorelo,

kitse sorleder hi o Jesus Kristeskro rat. O Debleskro Ducho, kai djiwella hako tsiro, das o Jesus Kristeste i soor, te nai das lo peskro djipen an o merepen. Un job meras o Debleske jaake har i bakro, ap koleste kek doosh hi. Kowa kras lo, te lell lo mari doosh mendar, jaake te djiwas mer buder gar pal kol laba, hoi tchi moldo hi un i menshe an o merepen anenna. Kanna hi maro dji djudjo, un mer nai wah tchatchepaha o djido Debleske koi.

Har o Jesus Kristo meras, las lo i doosh kol menshendar krik, kai djan ap o phuro drom, un kras lenge i newo drom, kai nai wenn le pash o Debleste, te djiwenn lauter kolla, kai o Dewel peske gole das, leha khetne hako tsiro, un te lenn le ko shukar brawlepen pash leste an o bolepen, jaake har job penas.

Te hi jekes i shukar brawlepen, hoi kamell lo i wawares te dell pal peskro merepen, palle tchinell lo kowa an i liil. Pal leskro merepen lell ko wawar ko brawlepen, jaake har an ko liil tardo hi. Job nai lell kowa gar jaake raha, har ko wawar gomme djiwella. Na-a, kowa hunte meras.

Jaake wan ninna an o phuro tsiro fiche maredo, har das o Dewel i menshen i tsillo, kai penas lo lenge, har jon leha khetne nai wenna. Un i fichengro rat sikras, te rikrenn le pen ap kol Debleskre laba.

Kowa lauter djas jaake: O Mose penas i menshenge kol laba, hoi an ko liil tardo hi, kai tchindlo hi, har te djiwenn le. Palle las lo i grumjengro rat un i bakrengro rat, das pani pashal, un las i kasht, hoi kharella Ysop, pandas lole bakrengre balla pral pre, un tchiwas ko kasht i balentsa an o rat, un tchoras ko rat ap ko liil un ap kol menshende,
un penas ap lende: Ko rat sikrell tumende: Tumer han o Debleskre menshe, un djiwenn pal kol laba, hoi job tumenge penas.
Un ap o Debleskro tikno kheer tchoras lo ninna o rat, ninna ap i tsele tchare un khore, kai kote dren hi.
Hi gar bud koowa, hoi well gar o rateha djudjo un erligo kerdo. Jaake hi an o Moseskre lila tchindlo. Un te well kek rat win tchoredo, nai well kek doosh krik lino.

O Debleskro tikno kheer ap i phub un lauter, hoi kote dren hi, sikrell mende i tikno kotar ko Debleskro kherestar, hoi hi an o bolepen. O Debleskro tikno kheer ap i phub hunte was i fichengro rateha djudjo un erligo kerdo. An o Debleskro kheer an o bolepen djas jek, koleskro rat hi latcheder har i fichengro rat.

Kowa hi o Jesus Kristo. Job djas gar an o Debleskro kheer, hoi i menshe kran, un hoi sikrell mende kokres i tikno kotar ko tchatcho Debleskro kherestar an o bolepen. Na-a, job djas an o bolepen glan o Debleste, te mangell lo les menge.
O menshengro baro rashai djal hako bersh o fichengro rateha an o Debleskro kutch isema. O Jesus Kristo meras jek kopo, un anas peskro rat jek kopo glan o Debleste, un gar bud kope.
Te wals kowa gar jaake, hunte merals lo bud kope jaake raha, har i phub koi hi. Job was kanna an kau tsiro, kai mer djiwah, te merell lo, un te lell lo jek kopo hako tsireske i doosh i menshendar.
Un jaake har i tsele menshe hunte merenna jek kopo, un palle rakrell o Dewel o tchatchepen pral lende win,

jaake hunte meras o Jesus Kristo jek kopo i menshenge, te lell lo i doosh bud lendar ap peste. Ap ko tsiro, kai well lo i duito kopo, well lo gar, te lell lo i doosh i menshendar krik. Na-a. Palle well lo kolenge, kai tchiwan pengro dji ap leste, te lell lo len pash peste, un te dell lo len lauter kowa, hoi hi lenge an o bolepen.

Kowa, hoi an o Moseskre lila tchindlo hi, sikrell men gar o tselo bolepaskro brawlepen, hoi kamell o Dewel i menshende te dell. Na-a, i tikno kotar kolestar. Kolla, kai anenn marede fichen glan o Debleste, nai wenn gar tchatcho un erligo glan leskre jaka. Te wans le tchatcho un erligo, hunte anans le gar hako bersh pale fichen glan leste.

Te krals ko fichengro rat len jek kopo hako tsireske tchatcho un erligo, palle hunte anans le buder gar pale te pale marede fichen glan o Debleste. Lengre djia wans djudjo, un jon nai bistrans ko tchilatchepen, hoi jon kran.
Tchatchepaha, kol tsele marede fichen, hoi jon o Debleske hako bersh anan, kowa anas lenge pale te pale lengri doosh an o shero.
Della kek drom, kai lell nai o grumjengro rat un o bakrengro rat i doosh i menshendar krik.
Doleske penas o Jesus Kristo, har job ap i phub was, ap o Debleste: Mo Dewel, marede fichen un wawar koowa kamal gar. Na-a. Man mukal i mensho te well.
Tu dikeh gar latches ap i fichende, hoi chatchran le tuke, te well lengri doosh lendar krik lino.
Koi penom: Dik, mo Dewel, kate hom, te krap, hoi tu mandar kameh, jaake har was mandar glan i raha tsiro an o Debleskro lab tchindlo.

Ninna te hi tchindlo an o Moseskre lila, te marenn le fichen o Debleske, penas o Jesus Kristo: Tu, mo Dewel, kamal gar, te anenn le tuke marede fichen un wawar koowa, witar kek fichen, hoi jon tuke chatchrenna, te less tu lengri doosh lendar. Tu dikeh gar latches ap kowa.
Palle penas job: Dik, me wau, te krap, hoi tu kameh. Kanna dikah: Har o Jesus Kristo was, te dell lo pes o Debleske, koi was ko phuro drom buder tchi moldo.
Har o Jesus Kristo ap o trushel menge meras, kras lo kowa, hoi o Dewel kamas. Un mari doosh las lo jek kopo hako tsireske mendar, un job kras men jaake djudjo un erligo glan o Debleste.
Hako rashai krell hako diwes peskri budi, un marell bud kope fichen o Debleske. Kal fiche nai len gar i doosh i menshendar.

O Jesus Kristo das pes jek kopo an o merepen, te lell lo i doosh i menshendar krik, un beshas pes hako tsireske ap o Debleskri tchatchi rig. Kote dikell lo ap ko diwes, kai wenn kolla tel leskre pire tchiddo, kai kaman les gar.
Jek kopo meras o Jesus Kristo kolenge, kai wenna pash o Debleste, un kras len hako tsiro tchatcho un erligo glan leste.
Ninna o Debleskro Ducho penell menge kowa. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo:
Ap ko tsiro, hoi wella, penell o Dewel, sikrau me i menshende i newo drom, har nashte wenn le pash mande: Me tchiwau miro tchatchepen an lengre shere un tchinau mire laba an lengre djia.
Un me bistrau lengri doosh. Un lengro tchilatchepen well buder gar an miro shero.
Kote, kai o Dewel i doosh krik las, kote hunte merell kek ficho buder gar, te lell lo i doosh krik.
Mire phrala, shunenn! Har o Jesus Kristo menge meras, un peskro rat ratas, kras lo menge i wudar pre, te nai wah glan o Debleste. Men hunte well buder kek traash.

Har o Jesus Kristo peskro djipen an o merepen das, his kowa jaake, har te krals lo menge ko wudar dran kutch pesso thann pre, hoi hi glan o Debleskri kutch isema. Jaake kras lo menge i newo drom, hoi anell men an o djipen o Debleha.
Men hi i baro rashai. Kowa hi i tsele patslenge koi.
Leskro rat thowas mari doosh mendar, un kras mare djia djudjo. Un mer wam an o djudjo pani tele thodo. Doleske djas kanna o latcho un tchatcho djijeha glan o Debleste an i sorelo patsepen!
Mer nai patsah o Debles, te krell lo kowa, hoi job penas. Job rikrell peskro lab. Doleske rikras soreles maro patsepen ap leste!
Das jak jek ap o wawareste, te kamell jek o wawares o djijestar, un te krell hakeno latcho koowa!

Das jak, te atchas gar krik, te wenn i patsle khetne. Hi sawe mashkral i patslende, kai wenn buder gar khetne. Kowa hi gar mishto. Tumer dikenna, te hi o diwes gar dur, kai well o rai Jesus pale. Doleske djan kote, kai wenn i patsle khetne, te krell jek o wawares soreles an o dji.
Te kamell jek ap i tchilatcho drom te djal, un krell kowa ninna, ninna te prindjrell lo o tchatchepen, koleske hi buder kek koi, kai nai merals, te lell lo leskri doosh krik.
Na-a, job hunte trashell ko diwes, kai well o Debleskri choli pral i phub un i soreli jag pral kolende, kai kaman lestar tchi te djinell.

An o phuro tsiro his jaake: Ko mensho hunte meras, kai djiwas gar jaake, har an o Moseskre lila tchindlo hi. Te dikan dui, triin menshe ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi ko mensho kras, hunte meras job. Un kekes hunte khaitas job.

Te his kowa jaake koleha, kai kras gar, hoi o Mose penas, kitse sorleder well o Debleskri choli pral koleste, kai o Debleskro tchawes pestar stakrella, un krella, har te wals o Jesus Kristeskro rat tchi moldo. Un kau rat lals peskri doosh krik, un krals les erligo glan o Debleste. O Debleskro Ducho his leske latches, un job dukras les.
Mer djinah, kai o Dewel penas: Me dau len ko tchilatchepen pale, hoi jon kran. Miri choli well ap lende. Un pale hi tchindlo: O Dewel rakrell o tchatchepen pral peskre menshende win.
Hawi bari phagi well pral kolende, ap lende o djido Dewel chojedo hi!

Ma bistrenn ko tsiro, kai o Debleskro kamlepen har i momeli an tumare djia was! Ap ko tsiro kran i menshe tumenge o djipen phares. Un tumer lan bud duka ap tumende, un witsran tumaro patsepen gar ap i rig.
Bud tumendar wan glan lauterende praassedo un dino. I wawar tumendar wan ap i rig kolendar, kai praassedo un dino wan.

Tumer rowan kolentsa, kai an o stilepen hi. Kolla, kai gar patslo his, lan tumendar kowa krik, hoi tumaro his. Un i bachtelo djijeha mukan tumer len kowa te krell. Tumer djinan, kai hi tumen i feteder brawlepen an o bolepen, hoi kek nai lell tumendar.
