Doleske penau tumenge: Ma witsrenn tumaro patsepen tumendar! Tumer djinenn, hawi bacht lell kowa, kai ap o Debleste rikrella.
Tumer hunte wenn gar khino an tumare djia, te krenn kowa lauter, hoi o Dewel kamella! Palle dell lo tumen peskro brawlepen jaake, har job penas.

An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Ko tsiro wella sik, kai well kowa, kai hunte wella. Job mukell pes gar ap o drom pale te rikrell. O Dewel penas: Koon ap mande patsella, kowa hi tchatcho glan mire jaka. Un job lell o djipen. Koon miro drom mukella, ap koleste dikau gar latches.
Tchatchepaha, mer ham gar kolendar, kai mukenn leskro drom un djan nashedo. Na-a. Mer ham kolendar, kai atchah an o patsepen, un lah o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.

Te patsah ap o Debleste, patsah mer ninna, te dell men o Dewel kowa, hoi job penas. Kowa patsah soreles. Ninna te dikah kowa gomme gar, hi maro dji sorelo un djinell, te well kowa jaake, har job penas.
Sawo patsepen his an mare phurende, un o Dewel dikas latches ap lende.
Dran maro patsepen haiwah, te was o bolepen un i phub kerdo dran o Debleskro rakepen. Lauter, hoi kanna dikah, kowa kras o Dewel dran kowa, hoi nai dikah gar.

An o phuro tsiro patsas o Abel ap o Debleste, un maras leske i ficho. Har dikas o Dewel, hoi o Abel leske anas, dikas lo latches ap kowa. Jaake was o Abel an o tchatchepen tardo glan leste. Kowa, hoi leskro phraal, o Kain, o Debleske anas, kowa his gar jaake latcho glan o Debleskre jaka har kowa, hoi o Abel leske anas. Ninna te meras o Abel, sikrell men leskro djipen gomme kau diwes leskro patsepen.

Ninna o Henoch patsas, hoi o Dewel penas. Un o Dewel las les djides pash peste. Job hunte meras gar. Kek nai hatsas les buder. Glan kowa was lestar penlo, te kras lo kowa, hoi his latcho glan o Debleskre jaka.

Te hi jekes kek patsepen, nai krell lo gar, hoi hi latcho glan o Debleskre jaka. Koon kamell pash o Debleste te well, kowa hunte patsell, te hi o Dewel djido, un te hi lo latcho ap koleste, koon rodell les.

Ninna o Noa patsas, hoi o Dewel penas, har job leha rakras, un leste sikras, hoi pral i tsele menshende wella. Ninna te dikas o Noa kowa gomme gar, shunas lo ap o Debleste, un kras i baro panjeskro kheer. Jaake hunte meras job peskre menshentsa gar. Har o Noa ko panjeskro kheer kras, was diklo, te patsas job, hoi o Dewel penas. Ninna was diklo, i wawar menshe patsan gar, hoi o Dewel penas. Doleske hunte meran le. Ap o Noa penas o Dewel: Tu patsal man. Tu hal kanna an o tchatchepen tardo glan mande.

Ninna o Abraham patsas, hoi o Dewel penas. Har job leske penas: Dja an ko them, hoi me dau tute un tire tchawende, koi shunas o Abraham ap leste, un djas dran peskro them win, un djinas gar, kai job djala.

Ap ko tsiro djiwan wawar menshe an ko them, hoi kamas les o Dewel te dell. Un o Abraham djas kate un kote an ko them trujal, un djiwas an khera dran fichengre balla. Ninna leskro tchawo, o Isaak, un koleskro tchawo, o Jakobo, djiwan jaake. Kolenge penas o Dewel ninna: Tumende dau ko them.
O Abraham dikas ap ko tsiro, kai nai djiwell lo an ko foro, hoi o Dewel krella, un hoi hako tsiro atchella.

Ninna o Abrahameskri romni, i Sara, patsas, te nai kras o Dewel kowa, hoi job lenge penas. An lakro tselo djipen nai las li kek tarnepen. Un kanna, kai his li phuri, penas o Dewel, te lell li i tchawes. Joi patsas les, un las i soor, te lell li i tchawes.

Har o tchawo boldo was, his o Abraham ninna jaake phuro, te nai wals lo buder gar o dad i tchawestar. Un job was o dad bud bud menshendar. Leskre tchawe, tchawengre tchawe un lauter, kai pal leste wan, wan jaake bud har i bolepangre momlia, un har i tikne barra pash o baro pani, kai kek djinell, har bud kolla hi.

Kol phure patsle meran lauter. Ninna te lan le kowa gar, hoi kamas o Dewel len te dell, patsan le, te lenn le les. Jon dikan kowa dur glan pende, un his bachtelo pral kowa. Jon penan pendar, te hi len kek them ap i phub, un te hi le kate gar khere.
Kolla, kai jaake rakrenna, rodenn i wawar them, hoi lengro hi, un kai jon khere hi.
Te rakrans le pral ko them, hoi jon mukan, palle nai djans le kote pale.
Kowa kran le gar. Na-a. Lengro dji das gole pal i latcheder them. Kowa hi an o bolepen. Doleske ladjell o Dewel lenge gar, te penenn le: "Maro Dewel!" ap leste. Un job kras lenge i foro.

Tumer djinenna: An o phuro tsiro kamas o Dewel te dikell, har baro o Abrahameskro patsepen hi. Un o Dewel penas ap leste, te marell job peskro tchawes har i bakro, hoi o Debleske maredo wella. Un o Abraham shunas ap o Debleste, un las peskro tchawes, kai leske kokres boldo was, te marell lo les glan o Debleste. Glan kau tsiro penas o Dewel ap o Abrahameste: Tiro tchawo, o Isaak, hi o dad kolendar, kai pal tute wenna.

Kolla laba wan o Abrahameske an o shero un job penas peske: O Dewel nai krell les i mulendar djido. Jaake baro his leskro patsepen ap o Debleste. Doleske das les o Dewel o tchawes pale, un job hunte maras les gar. Kowa his leske jaake, har te wals lo i mulendar djido.

Ninna o Isaak patsas, te well kowa tchatcho, hoi o Dewel penas. Un o Isaak tchiwas peskre wasta ap peskre tchawende, ap o Jakob un ap o Esau, un rakras i bacht pral lende win, hoi o Dewel len della an ko tsiro, hoi wella.

Ninna o Jakob patsas, te well kowa tchatcho, hoi o Dewel leske penas. Har job ap o merepen tchiddo his, tchiwas lo peskre wasta ap o Josefeskre tchawende, un rakras o Debleskri bacht pral lende win, un tchiwas peskro shero glan tele ap peskro kasht, un sharas o Debles.

Ninna o Josef patsas, te well kowa tchatcho, hoi o Dewel penas. Har job ap o merepen tchiddo his, penas lo peskre phralenge, te well ko tsiro, kai djan i Israelitarja dran o them Egiptia win. Palle hunte lenn le leskre kokale lentsa.

Ninna o Moseskro dad un peskri dai patsan ap o Debleste. Doleske trashan le gar o baro rajestar pral o them Egiptia, har kowa penas, te wenn i tikne tchawe maredo, hoi i Israeleskre djuwja lan. Har o Moseskro dad un peskri dai dikan, har shukar lengro tchawo hi, khatran le les triin tchon.

Ninna o Mose patsas ap o Debleste. Har job baro was pash o baro rajeste pral o them Egiptia, kamas lo buder gar, te kharenn le les: O baro rajeskri tchakro tchawo. Feteder kamas lo duka ap peste te lell, khetne i wawar Debleskre menshentsa, har te djiwell lo i tikno tsiro i shukar djipen an o rajeskro kheer, kai djiwan le jaake, har o Dewel gar kamas.
O Mose kamas feteder, te lell lo o praassepen ap peste, hoi ninna o Jesus Kristo ap peste las, har te lell lo o tselo brawlepen an o them Egiptia. Leske his o brawlepen an o bolepen budeder moldo.

Dran peskro patsepen djas o Mose win dran o them Egiptia, un daras gar o baro rajestar pral o them Egiptia, te well job chojedo ap leste. Na-a. Job rikras jaake ap o Debleste, koles kek nai dikella, har te dikals les lo peskre jakentsa.

O Dewel penas leske, hawi bibacht pral o them Egiptia wella. Un job penas leske ninna, hoi i Israelitarja hunte krenn, te well koi bibacht gar pral lende. Koi patsas o Mose, te well kowa tchatcho, hoi o Dewel penas. Un o Mose penas ap i Israelitarja, te marenn le bakren, un te chan le len - kau chapen was Passa kharedo -, un te makenn le i fichengro rat ap pengre wudja. Har palle o bolepaskro was, te marell lo i tsele phureder tchawen, koi atchan i Israeleskre tchawe djido. Jon his an i khera, kai o rat ap i wudja hi.

I tsiro koi pre djan le mashkral o baro pani, hoi kharella lolo pani, har te djans le ap o drom. Kowa nai kran le doleske, kai patsan le, hoi o Dewel lenge penas. I Egiptarja kaman ninna mashkral o baro pani te djal, un jon tassan.
I Israelitarja patsan ninna kowa, hoi o Dewel lenge penas, har his le glan o foro Jericho tardo. Un jon djan efta kope trul o foro. Palle peran i tsele barra khetne, hoi trul o foro pre tchiddo his.

Ninna i lubni Rahab patsas ap o Debleste, un las kol murshen an lakro kheer dre, kolen o Mose bitchras, te dikenn le, har sorelo o foro Jericho hi. Jaake was i Rahab gar maredo khetne kol wawar menshentsa an ko foro, kai prindjran o Debles gar.
Hoi te penap tumenge budeder? Jaake bud tsiro hi man gar, te rakrap kol murshendar Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jeftah, David, Samuel un kolendar, kai his o Debleskre rakepangre.

Kol tsele mursha patsan, hoi o Dewel lenge penas. Mashkral lende his ninna kolla, hoi kuran pen kol bare rajentsa un kol rajengre lurdentsa. Un jon his sorleder har kol bare raja un lengre lurde. Wawar kran o tchatchepen un dikan pengre jakentsa, har kowa tchatcho was, hoi o Dewel lenge penas. Wawar wan glan bare un diwje margodje witsedo, un kolla dandran len gar.

Wawar wan an i jag witsedo, un i jag nai chatchan len gar. Wawaren kaman i menshe i chareha te marell, un jon nai nashan penge. Kolla, kai kek soor buder an lende his, kolen kras o Dewel soreles. An o kurepen lan le i soor, te tradan le i wawar lurden krik.

Mashkral kolende, kai patsan, hoi o Dewel lenge penas, his ninna djuwja, kolengre tchawe meran. Kolen das o Dewel lengre tchawen djides pale. Wawar patsle wan phares dino an o stilepen. Lenge was penlo, te mukans le pengro patsepen, nai wans le dran o stilepen win. Un jon mukan gar pengro patsepen, un mukan pen te marell. Pengro tselo djijeha dikan le ap ko tsiro, kai krell o Dewel len i mulendar djido. Kowa his lenge budeder moldo, har o djipen ap kai phub.
Wawar wan praassedo, un wan i tchupnijaha dino. Wawar wan i sasterne shellentsa pandlo, un an o stilepen witsedo.

Wawar wan i barentsa mulo witsedo, an dui paash tchindlo, un o chareha maredo. Wawar wan palla lino. Len his kek kheer un tchi te chal. Lengre koola his dran bakrengre balla un busjengre balla. Un te wan le tapedo, wan le dino.

Jon nashan an o mulo them trujal, ninna an i berge un djinan gar, kai te djal. Mashkral i bare barra khatran le pen, ninna tel i phub. Kolla lauter his latche menshe. I wawar menshe ap kai phub his gar moldo, te djiwan kol latche menshe mashkral lende.
Kolla lauter patsan ap o Debleste, un job dikas latches ap lende. Fote latches job ap lende dikas, las gomme kek lendar kowa, hoi o Dewel kamell peskre tchawende te dell.
O Debles his an peskro dji i feteder drom menge. Job kamas gar, te wenn kol phure patsle glan maro tsiro pash leste. Job kamell, te was mer lauter khetne pash leste an o bolepen.

Kanna dikah, bud bud menshe patsan, te hi kowa tchatcho, hoi o Dewel penas. Mer ham gar kokres, kai patsah. Doleske hunte kras har jon kran, un mukas gar tele te nashas ap o Debleskro drom, hoi glan mende hi. Te tchiwas lauter tele, hoi kamell men pale te rikrell! Ninna hunte tchiwas o tchilatchepen tele, hoi kamell men te taprell.

Te dikas ap o Jesus Kristeste! Kowa anas men ap o Debleskro drom, un djal glan mende, bis te wah pash leste. O Jesus Kristo meras ap o trushel. Ninna te his kowa i ladj leske, las lo kau merepen ap peste. Job djinas, pal kowa well i bari bacht ap leste. Un kanna hi lo beshdo ap o Debleskri tchatchi rig.
Dikenn, hawo tchilatcho koowa i tchilatche menshe ap leste kran, te wenn tumer gar khino an tumare djia, un te atchenn soreles an o patsepen!
Me djinau, tumer kamenn gar, te well o tchilatchepen o rai pral tumende. Ninna te was tumenge pharo, te penenn na-a ap o tchilatchepen, meran doleske gomme gar.
Ma bistrenn kol laba, hoi rakras o Dewel peskre tchawenge an o dji: Dikenn mire tchawe, kowa hi tumenge mishto, te dap tumen i phagi. Te tchingrau ap tumende, ma nashenn mandar!
Kones o Dewel o djijestar kamella, kowa lell ninna lestar i phagi. Un koon well leskro tchawo, koles dell lo ninna dawa.
Hi mishto tumenge, te lenn lestar i phagi. Rikrenn kowa win! O Dewel krell tumentsa har i dad peskre tchawentsa. Prindjrenn tumer jekes, koon gar peskro dadestar i phagi las?
I tsele Debleskre tchawe djinenn i tsiro, kai lan le lestar i phagi. Tumer te djinenn kowa gar, palle han gar leskre tchatche tchawe.
Har tchawe hams, dan men mare dada i phagi. Un mer hunte shunam ap lende. Kitse budeder hunte shunas ap maro dadeste an o bolepen, te djiwas.

Mare dada ap i phub dan men i phagi, hoi dukas men i tikno tsiro, jaake har jon penan penge, te hi kowa menge mishto. O Dewel, te dell lo men i phagi, hi kowa tchatchepaha menge mishto. Job kamell, te was mer latcho un tchatcho, jaake har job hi.

Ap ko tsiro, kai lah i phagi, kamah kowa gar. Na-a, kowa dukell men. Pal ko tsiro haiwah, kowa his menge mishto. Un mare djia wenna pale bachtelo, un mer djiwah budeder an o tchatchepen glan o Debleste, har glan ko tsiro.
Doleske awenn pale soreles! Hadenn tumare wasta pale pre, hoi khino wan! Krenn tumare herja pale soreles, an lende buder kek soor hi!
Atchenn ap o tchatcho drom, te wenn kolla, kai gar sorelo hi, sasto an o patsepen, un te perenn le gar ko dromestar tele!
Krenn lauter, te well tumen kek tchingepen i wawar menshentsa! Tchiwrenn o tselo tchilatchepen dran tumende win! Kek mensho dikell o Debles, te mukell lo o tchilatchepen an peste te djiwell.

Denn jak, te tchiwell kek o Debleskro latchepen ap i rig! Denn jak, te djal kek tchilatcho rakepen mashkral tumende trujal, un krell o patsepen bud patslendar paash! Sawo rakepen hi har i tchilatcho chuchur, hoi krell kolen nasselo, kai les chana.

Denn garda, te krell kek tumendar wi-ladjedo koowa, witar gar, te djiwell jek har o Esau, koleske o Debleskro latchepen tchi moldo his! Job his o phureder tchawo, un les hi o tchatchepen, te lell lo peskro dadeskro brawlepen pal koleskro merepen. Was i diwes, kai was les bok, un job bikras ko tchatchepen, te lell lo i tcharo latcho chapen.

Tumer djinenn, hoi pal kowa was. O Esau nai kras buder tchi wawartchandes. Ninna te rowas lo soreles glan peskro dadeste, was lo ap i rig tchiddo. Leskro dad nai rakras buder gar koi bacht pral leste win, hoi hunte lals lo.

Shunenn, mire phrala! Tumaro tsillo, kai wenn khetne o Debleha, hi gar ko emligo har pash i Israelitarja. Jon djan pash i berga Sinai, un pash i jag, hoi dikan le nai. Trul lende his kali rat un i sorelo ducho phurdas.

Jon shunan i bashepaskri, kai jek dre phurdas. Ninna shunan le i sorelo rakepen, hoi penas: Hakeno, kai taprell koi berga i wastentsa, hunte well i barentsa maredo. Ninna ko ficho hunte merella, hoi kote djala. Har jon kol laba shunan, djas kowa lenge jaake an o dji, te mangan le o Mosestar, te wenn kol sorele laba buder gar ap lende rakedo.
Kowa lauter, hoi i menshe kote dikan un shunan, kras len jaake dareno, te penas ninna o Mose: Man hi sawi daar, te trissenn mire herja.

Kowa lauter dikan tumer gar. Na-a. Tumaro tsillo, kai wenn khetne o Debleha, hi ap i berga Zion an o bolepen. Kote hi o foro o djido Deblestar tardo, o newo foro Jerusalem. Kote hi bud bud serja bolepangre, kai sharenn o Debles.

Kote wenna o Debleskre tchawe khetne. Lengre laba hi an o bolepen pre tchindlo. Kote hi o Dewel, kai rakrell o tchatchepen win pral i tsele menshende. Kote hi ninna kol tsele patsle, kai meran un kolen o Dewel pash peste las.

Kote hi ninna o Jesus, maro rakepaskro, kai kras menge o newo drom, te djiwas khetne o Debleha. Job meras menge, un leskro rat las mari doosh mendar. O Jesuseskro rat hi feteder har o Abeleskro rat. Har o Abel maredo was, das leskro rat gole pal i phagi pral o Kain. O Jesuseskro rat lell mari doosh mendar.

Denn jak, te shunenn ap o Debleste, kai ap tumende rakrella! Har job ap i phub ap i phure Israelitarja rakras, kaman le gar ap leste te shunell, un leskri choli was pral lende. Kitse budeder well o Debleskri choli pral mende, te shunah gar ap leste, kai dran o bolepen rakrella.
An o phuro tsiro trissas i phub, har o Dewel rakras. Kanna penell lo: An ko tsiro, hoi wella, trissell i phub i wawar kopo, un gar i phub kokres, na-a, ninna o bolepen trissella.
Kol laba i wawar kopo sikrenn men: Kowa, hoi kerdo was, - o bolepen un i phub, - kowa atchell gar soreles tardo un well krik lino. Palle atchell kowa, hoi soreles tardo hi, un hako tsiro atchella.
O Debleskro them an o bolepen, kai khere ham, atchell soreles tardo, un kote djah mer. Doleske parkras men pash o Debleste, shunas ap leste, daras lestar un kras, hoi job kamella!
Ma bistrenn, maro Dewel hi jaake har i soreli jag!
Mukenn gar tele, te kamenn i phralen un i phenjen o tselo djijestar!
Te well jek pash tumende, ma bistrenn, te lenn les an tumaro kheer! His menshe koi, kai lan bolepangre an pengro kheer, un djinan les gar.

Ma bistrenn kolen, kai hi an o stilepen. Denn lende kowa, hoi len hunte well djipaske, jaake har te wans tumer kolla, kai stildo hi! Awenn ninna kolenge koi, kai wan palla lino un lan dawa. Awenn lenge jaake koi, har wans tumer kolla, kai wan palla lino un lan dawa.

Kolla, kai romedino hi, hunte bistrenn gar, te hi jon romedino. O rom hunte well gar khetne i wawar djuwjaha, un i romni hunte well gar khetne i wawar mursheha. Djinenn, o Dewel dell i phagi kol murshende, kai chochenn pengri romjat, un kol djuwjende, kai chochenn pengro romes, ninna lauterende, kai luberenn trujal.
Ma nashenn i lowe palla! Kowa, hoi tut hi, kowa muk tuke doha te well! O Dewel penas: Me bistrau tut gar, un mukau tut kek tsireske!
Jaake hunte daras gar un nai penah: O Dewel hi ap miri rig, me hunte darap gar. Hoi nai krell i mensho ap mande?

Ma bistrenn, har kolla pengro djipen djiwan, kai penan tumenge o Debleskro lab, un sikran tumen leskro drom! Dikenn, har jon djiwan un meran, un soreles an o patsepen tardo his! Djan jaake ap o Jesuseskro drom har jon djan!
O Jesus Kristo atchell har job hi: taissar, kau diwes, un hako tsireske.

Te hi menshe koi, kai sikrenn tumen wawar dromma un kamenn tumen o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell, palle patsenn lenge gar! Har shukar hi kowa, te wenn tumer sorelo an o dji! Kowa krell o Dewel, kai hi jaake latcho ap tumende. Kolla, kai penenn tumenge, hoi te chan un hoi te chan gar, kolla nai krenn gar tumaro patsepen soreles. Lengre laba hi tchi moldo.

Mer djah ap o newo drom. Menge meras o Jesus Kristo ap o trushel. Kolla, kai djan ap o phuro drom, marenn fichen an o Debleskro kheer ap kai phub. Koon gomme fichen marella un glan o Debleste anella, koleske hi o Jesus Kristo gar koi.
I mule fiche, kolengro rat o baro rashai an o Debleskri kutch isema anas, te lell o Dewel i doosh i menshendar krik, kol fiche wenn win glan o foro an i jag chatchedo.
Jaake meras o Jesus ninna win glan o foro, te krell lo peskro rateha i menshen erligo glan o Debleste.
Doleske djas pash leste win glan o foro, te las o praassepen ap mende jaake, har job o praassepen ap peste las!
Ap kai phub hi men kek foro, kai nai atchenna. Na-a. Mer dikah ap ko tsiro, kai djiwah an o Debleskro foro, hoi wella.
Dran kowa parkras men pash o Debleste, sharas les hako tsiro, un kras o Jesuseskro lab bares.
Ma bistrenn te krenn o latchepen! Denn i wawaren tchomone, te well len ninna tchomone! Kowa, hoi tumer i menshenge krenna, hi har te krans tumer les o Debleske. Un job dikell latches ap kowa.

Shunenn ap kolende, kai sikrenn tumen, har te djan ap o Debleskro drom! Krenn kowa, hoi jon tumenge penenna! Lengri budi hi, te denn le jak ap tumende. Un jon hunte penenn o Debleske, har jon kran pengri budi. Djiwenn jaake, te krenn le pengri budi i bachtelo djijeha! Te rowenn jon pral tumende, palle wals kowa tumenge gar mishto.
Mangenn o Debles menge! Maro dji hi djudjo. Kowa djinah mer. Hako tsiro kamah kowa te krell, hoi latcho hi.
O tselo djijestar mangau tumendar, te mangenn o Deblestar, te nai wap sik pash tumende.

O Dewel kras i drom, te nai wah pash leste. Job kras o Jesuses, maro rajes, i mulendar djido. Kowa ratas peskro rat menge, te nai wah pash o Debleste, un djiwah hako tsiro leha khetne. O Jesus was maro baro bakrengro. Kowa dell jak ap mende, har i bakrengro dell jak ap peskre bakre.

Mangau o Deblestar, te dell lo tumen i soor, te krenn lauter kowa, hoi latcho hi, jaake har job kamella. Mu dell lo men i soor, te djiwas jaake, har mishto hi glan leskre jaka. O Jesus Kristo nai krell kowa. Sharas o Jesus Kristes kanna un hako tsiro! Amen.
Mire phrala, me mangau tumen, shunenn ap kol laba, hoi me tumenge an kau tikno liil tchinom!
Djinenn, maro phraal Timoteo was dran o stilepen win. Te well lo sik pash mande, wau leha pash tumende.
Penenn latche laba mendar kolenge, kai denn garda ap tumende, un ninna ap i tsele patslende! I patsle dran o them Italia penenn tumenge "Atchenn o Debleha!"
O Debleskro latchepen tumenge lauterenge!
Kau liil tchinau me, o Jakobo, kowa, kai budrell o Jesus Kristeske un o Debleske. Me penau latche laba kolenge, kai patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste un djiwenn mashkral kolende, kai gar patslo hi.
Mire phrala, te well pharo koowa ap tumende, palle dikenn koi pre, har te well kowa i bacht tumenge.
Te well sawo koowa ap tumende, un tumer mukenn gar tele te patsenn ap o Jesus Kristeste, palle wenn tumer sorleder an o patsepen un denn gar sik pre.

Rikrenn win, un djan dureder an o patsepen! Ma atchenn tardo! Jaake wenn tumer sawe menshe, har kamell o Dewel dran tumende te krell. Un tumer krenna lauter, hoi mishto un latcho hi. Un kek doosh hi ap tumende.
Te djinell jek tumendar gar, hoi o Dewel lestar kamella, palle nai mangell lo o Debles, te sikrell job leste kowa. O Dewel hi latcho, un job dell o djijestar, ninna te weh tu bud kope pash leste.
Tu te mangeh, hunte patsess, kai leh kowa ninna. Te patseh tu kowa gar, hal tu har i pani, kai phurdell i sorelo ducho pral un tradell les kate te kote.
Tu te hal jaake, djiness, kai leh tu tchi o Deblestar.
Palle hi tut dui djia, un djineh gar, hoi kameh, witar gar, hoi hunte kress.
I tchorwelo patslo, kai pash i menshende tchi molella, kowa nai sharell pes, kai job pash o Debleste bud molella.
I brawelo hunte sharell pes gar pral peskro brawlepen. Job hunte djinell, te atchell lo gar. Har i bluma an o senlepen merell lo.
O kham djal pre un chatchrell o senlepen. Un koi bluma perell tele, un nashrell peskro shukapen. Jaake har koi bluma, jaake merella ninna ko brawelo ap peskro drom.
Bachtelo hi kowa, kon mukell gar peskro patsepen, ninna te well i pharo koowa ap leste. Job hi moldo, te lell lo ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Kawa djipen dell o Dewel kolen, kai les kamenna.

Te well jek an sawo koowa, hoi kamell les o tchatcho dromestar tele te anell, hunte penell lo gar: "Ko koowa well o Deblestar." Kek nashte anell o Debles o tchatcho dromestar tele. Un ninna o Dewel anell kekes o tchatcho dromestar tele.
Te mukah mer o tchatcho drom, hi men kokres doosh. Ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi an maro shero trujal djal, kowa well mendar.
Te shunah ap maro shero, krah mer ko tchilatcho koowa. Un te was ko tchilatcho koowa baro, anell kowa menge o merepen.
Mire kamle phrala! Ma chochenn tumen kokres!

Lauter, hoi hi mishto un latcho, wella o Deblestar an o bolepen. Job kras o kham un o tchon un i bolepangre momlia. Kolla krenn, te well diwes un rat, un jon wenn jek tsiro diklo un i wawar tsiro gar diklo. O Dewel hi gar jaake. Job atchell, har job hi.
Job kamas, te wam mer leskre tchawe. Kolla wam, har menge leskro tchatcho lab penlo was. Jaake wam mer o feteder mank lauter, hoi o Dewel kras.

Mire kamle phrala, djinenn: Hako mensho hunte lell peske tsiro, te shunell lo. Job te kamell te rakrell, palle hunte putchell lo pestar, te hi kowa mishto, hoi job kamell te penell. Un job hunte well witar gar sik chojedo.
Kek krell an i choli kowa, hoi o Dewel kamella.

Doleske mukenn hako djunglepen un tchilatchepen! Un patsenn ko lab, hoi o Dewel an tumende tchiwas! Krenn kowa i latcho djijeha! An o Debleskro lab hi koi soor, te lell lo tumen dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win.
Hi gar doha, te shunenn leskro lab. Tumer hunte krenn, hoi ko lab penella. Tumer te krenn kowa gar, palle chochenn tumen kokres.
Kowa, kai shunell o Debleskro lab, un krell gar, hoi ko lab penella, kowa hi har i mensho, kai dikell pes an i dikepaskri.
Job dikell jek kopo dre, un djal peske, un bistras sik, har job wi-dikella.

Koon dikell pale un pale an o Debleskro latcho lab, hoi i menshen win lella dran lengro phuro djipen, ko mensho bistrell gar, hoi job dikas un shunas. Un kowa krella, hoi ko lab penella. Koles dell o Dewel peskri bacht an lauter, hoi job krella.
Te penell i mensho: "Me djiwau pal o Debleskro lab," un job rikrell peskro mui nai gar, kowa chochell pes kokres. Un kowa, hoi job o Debleske krella, hi tchi moldo.

Kanna penau tumenge, hoi o Dewel, maro dad, kamella, un hoi hi latcho glan leskre jaka: Krenn latchepen i tchorwele djuwjenge, kolen kek rom buder hi! Krenn ninna latchepen kol tchorwele tchawenge, kolen kek dad un dai buder hi! Ma mukenn tumen dre an ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi i menshe ap kai phub krenna.
Mire phrala, tumer patsenn ap maro rajeste, o Jesus Kristeste. Job hi o rai pral i tsele rajende. Doleske, ma dikenn ap i menshende, koon jon hi, un har brawelo jon hi!
Hoi krans tumer, te wals jek pash tumende an i kangri, un les wals i sonakaskri gustrin ap peskro wast un raile ripja ap peste, un koi wals ninna i tchorwelo an tchorwele ripja dre?
Un tumer penans ap koleste, kai railo rido hi: "Besh tut kai ap ko shukar beshepaskro," un ap ko tchorweleste penans: "Atch koi tardo! Tu nai besheh tut ninna ap kai phub!"
Kowa wals jaake, har te penans: "Ko railo hi feteder har ko tchorwelo." Te dikenn tumer jaake ap tumare phralende, hi kowa tchilatcho.

Shunenn, mire kamle phrala! O Dewel rodas kolen win, kai hi tchorwelo ap kai phub, te wenn le brawelo an o patsepen. Ko tsiro wella, kai djiwenn le leha khetne an o bolepen un lenn leskro brawlepen. Kowa lenna kolla, kai kamenn les o djijestar. Jaake penas les o Dewel.

Har hi kowa pash tumende? I tchorwele hi tumenge tchi moldo. I brawele hi tumenge budeder moldo. Un jon hi kolla, kai rikrenn tumen tele, un anenn tchilatcho koowa ap tumende un anenn tumen glan i tchatchepangre.
Un pral koleste, koon tumaro rai hi, rakrenn le djungeles.

O Jesus Kristo hi maro baro rai un penell menge: Tu hunte wess jaake latches ap o wawareste har hal latcho ap tute kokres! Jaake hi tchindlo an o Debleskro lab. Te djiwenn jaake, palle krenn tumer, hoi mishto hi.
Tumer te dikenn ap jekeste, koon job hi un har brawelo job hi, palle lenn tumer doosh ap tumende. Un o Debleskro lab penell tumenge, kai mukan tumer o Debleskro drom.
Te rikreh tut ap i tsele laba, hoi an o Moseskre lila tchindlo hi, un te kreh tu jek tchilatcho koowa, palle hi kowa, har te rikrals tu tut ap tchi, un tu leh doosh ap tute.

O Dewel penella: Romeha, ma choche tiri romjat i wawar djuwjaha! Romnija, ma choche tiro romes i wawar mursheha! Un job penell ninna: Ma mare kekes! Tu te chocheh gar tiri romjat, un tu mareh jekes, palle mukal tu o Debleskro drom.
Rakrenn un djiwenn pal o Debleskro tchatchepen! Kau tchatchepen lell i menshen dran kowa win, hoi len pandas.

Ma bistrenn! Well jek diwes, kai rakrell o Dewel o tchatchepen win pral tumende. Te hi jekes kek dji i wawareske, koleske hi o Debles witar kek dji. Kones hi i dji i wawarenge, koles hunte well kek daar ap ko diwes, kai rakrell o Dewel o tchatchepen pral i menshende win.
Mire phrala, te penell jek, kai job ap o Jesus Kristeste patsella, un krell tchi leske, koleskro patsepen hi tchi moldo ap ko diwes, kai job glan o Debleste tardo hi.
Hoi molell kowa, te well pash tumende i phraal, i pheen, kai hi len gar doha ripaske, chapaske un pipaske,
un tumer denn len gar, hoi len hunte well djipaske? Palle hi lenge tchi moldo, te penell jek ap lende: "O Dewel hi tumentsa. Job dell tumen chapaske un ripaske."
Tchatchepaha, te krenn tumer kek latcho koowa, hi tumaro patsepen mulo.

Kanna nai well jek, kai penella: "Jekes hi patsepen un i wawar krell latcho koowa." Koleske penau me: Sike mande o patsepen kolestar, kai krell kek latcho koowa. Miro patsepen sikrau tute dran kowa, hoi me krau.
Tu patseh, kai dell jek Dewel kokres. Mishto, kre kowa! Ninna kol benga patsenn kowa un trashenna.
Hoske haiweh tu kowa gar? Dikeh tu gar, kai o patsepen ap o Debleste tchi molella, te kreh tu gar, hoi job kamella?

Ninna pash maro phuro dadeste, o Abrahameste, his kowa jaake: Job was latcho un tchatcho glan o Debleste, har job kras, hoi o Dewel lestar kamas: Job tchiwas peskro tchawes ap i pre tchidde barra, te marell lo les o Debleske.
Tu dikeh, har job kras, hoi o Dewel lestar kamas, koi sikras lo, kai leskro patsepen ap o Debleste baro his.
Kote was tchatcho, hoi an o Debleskro lab tchindlo hi: O Abraham patsas o Debles. Doleske tchiwas les o Dewel an o tchatchepen glan peste. Ninna i menshe penan lestar, kai hi job o Debleskro maal.
Tumer dikenn kanna, o patsepen kokres hi gar doha. O mensho hunte krell ninna, hoi o Dewel kamella, te well lo tchatcho un erligo glan leste.

Ninna koi lubni Rahab was tchatcho un erligo glan o Debleste, har joi ko latcho koowa kras. Joi phukras gar ap kol dui bitchepangre dran Israel, kai wan an lakro foro, te dikenn le, har sorelo o foro hi. Joi khatras len, un anas len ap i wawar drom dran ko foro win.
Jaake har o mensho mulo hi, te hi les kek ducho, jaake hi maro patsepen mulo, te krah kek latcho koowa.

Mire phrala, hi gar mishto, te wenn bud tumendar sikepangre. Tumer djinenna, kai o Dewel rakrell o tchatchepen pral i menshende win. Ap ko tsiro dikell lo ap kol sikepangren budeder har ap kol wawarende.
Mer halauter krah bud kope, hoi gar mishto hi. Koon rakrell an kek tsiro tchilatcho koowa, kowa hi i latcho mensho, kai nai rikrell pes khetne.
Dikenn ap i graja! Te tchiwah mer lenge ko kotar saster an o mui, jaake nai anah mer len kote, kai mer kamah.
Dikenn ninna ap kol bare panjeskre ulepangre, kolen i sorelo ducho pral o baro pani tradell. Lengro rai anell len o tikno kashteha kote, kai job kamella.
Jaake hi ninna mari tchip tikno un krell nai bare laba. Tumer djinenna, i tikni jag nai chatchrell i tselo weesh tele.

I tchip hi har i jag. Lat hi i soor, te krell li bud tchilatcho koowa. I tchip nai krell o tselo menshes djungeles un tchilatches. Koi jag, hoi i tchip krell, chatchrell o tselo djipen, un well o bengestar.
I menshe hi i raja pral i tsele diwje fichende, ninna pral i tchirkle, pral i bare sapa un pral i bare matche. Un kolla hunte krenn, hoi i menshe kamenna.
Kek mensho hi o rai pral peskri tchip. I tchip hi diwjo un tchilatcho. I tchip hi har i midjak sap, hoi anell o merepen.
I tchipjaha sharah mer o Debles, kai hi maro rai un dad. Un i tchipjaha praassah mer i menshen, kai o Dewel kras jaake har job hi.
Dran ko emligo mui wella sharepen un praassepen. Kowa hi gar mishto, mire phrala!
Dran jek pani nai well gar jek kopo latcho pani un o wawar kopo londo pani.
Mire phrala, i ruk, hoi hidjella pawja, nai hidjell kek brola. I ruk, kai hidjell drake, nai hidjell kek kirjasse. Jaake nai well kek londo pani dran o latcho pani win.
Koon gosewo hi mank tumende un djinell bud, kowa hunte sikrell dran peskro latcho djipen, kai haiwas lo, hoi mishto un tchatcho hi. Un job sharell pes gar pral ko latcho koowa, hoi job kras.
Te silwerenn tumer un hadenn tumen pre pral i wawarende, ma penenn, kai han gosewo! Kowa wals i chochepen un gar o tchatchepen.
Sawo goswepen well gar o Deblestar. Kowa well o menshestar un o bengestar.
Kote, kai i menshe silwerenna, un hadenn pen pre pral i wawarende, kote hi tchingepen un hako tchilatcho koowa.

Ko goswepen, hoi o Deblestar wella, hi wawartchandes. I mensho, kai hi les kau goswepen, kowa djiwell i djudjo djipen. Job kamell te djiwell lo latches i wawarentsa khetne. Job hi kamlo un latcho. Les hi i dji i wawarenge, un krell bud latcho koowa. Job mukell pes gar ap jekeskri rig te tsardell. Les hi gar dui tchipja.
Kolla, kai lenn o tchingepen mank i menshende krik, kolendar well latcho koowa, kai atchell hako tsiro.
Kai well o kurepen un o tchingepen mashkral tumende? Kowa wella dran tumare tchilatche djia. Hakeno kamell o feteder koowa peske kokres.

Tumer kamenn bud te lell, un len tchi. Doleske nai marans i menshen. Tumer silwerenn ap i wawarende, un tumer nai lenn gar, hoi kamenna. Doleske tchingrenn un kurenn tumen. O Deblestar mangenn tumer tchi. Doleske hi tumen tchi.
Te mangell jek tumendar tchomone o Deblestar, mangell lo, hoi gar mishto hi, un hoi dran leskro tchilatcho dji wella. Doleske dell les o Dewel kowa gar.

Tumer chochan un mukan o Debles! Djinenn tumer gar, kai kolla, kai tchiwenn pengre djia ap i phubjakro koowa, kolla hi gar o Debleskre mala? Koon kamell ko drom te djal, hoi i menshe ap kai phub djana, kowa kamell o Debles gar.
O Debleskro lab penell gar tchitcheske: O Debleskro Ducho, kai an mende khere hi, kamell men peske kokres.

Un ninna budeder latchepen kamell men o Dewel te dell. An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Kolla, kai krenn pen bares, kolen bitchrell job pestar. Un kolen, kai krenn pen gar bares, kolen dell job bud latchepen.
Doleske, shunenn ap o Debleste! Krenn lauter, hoi job kamella! Ma krenn, hoi o beng kamella! Jaake nashell o beng tumendar.

Awenn pash o Debleste! Jaake well job ninna pash tumende. Ap tumende, kai kran tchilatcho koowa, penau me: Krenn tumare wasta djudjo! Ap tumende, kai djan ap dui dromma, penau me: Mukenn ko tchilatcho drom, un djan ap o Debleskro drom!
Denn gole pral tumaro tchilatcho djipen! Rowenn koi pral! Ma san gar buder! Awenn bibachtelo un buder gar bachtelo!
Witsrenn tumen tele glan o Debleste! Un job krell tumen bares.

Mire phrala! Ma rakrenn djungeles pral o wawareste! Koon pral peskro phraleste djungeles rakrella un o gushteha ap leskri doosh sikrella, kowa tchiwell pes pral kowa, hoi o Dewel penas. Tu te kreh kowa, hal tu buder gar jek, hoi o Debleskro tchatchepen krella. Na-a, tu tchiweh tut pral o tchatchepen.
O Dewel kokres hi o tchatchepaskro rai. Job nai dell jekes i phagi, un mukell i wawares te djal. Koon hal tu, te sikreh tu ap o wawareskri doosh?
Mashkral tumende hi kolla, kai penenna: "Kau diwes kamah mer an ko foro te djal, un kamah jek bersh koi te atchell, te ginas un te bikras, un te anas bud lowe khetne."
Jaake rakrenn tumer un djinenn gar, hoi taissar hi! Tumaro djipen hi har i ducho, hoi atchella gar. Tumer han i tikno tsiro djido. Un ap jek kopo han tumer buder gar koi.
Doleske hunte penas jaake: "Te kamell o Dewel, djiwah mer un krah kawa te kowa."
Kowa penenn tumer gar. Tumer krenn tumen bares, un sharenn tumen pral kowa, hoi tumer krenna. Tumaro sharepen hi gar mishto.
Koon djinell o latchepen, un krell les gar, kowa anell doosh ap peste.
Kanna penau ap tumende, kai brawelo han: Rowenn un denn gole pral koi bibacht, hoi pral tumende wella!
Tumer nashrenn tumaro brawlepen. Un tumare ripja chan i kerme.

Tumaro sonakai un rup molell buder tchi. Tumer rikran les tumenge. Kowa anell tumen glan o tchatchepaskro rai un chal tumen pre har i jag. I phub atchell buder gar raha. Ninna te djinan kowa, anan tumenge bud brawlepen khetne!
Shunenn! Tumer chochan tumare budepangren, kai budran ap tumaro them, un dan len kek lowe. Kolla denn gole ap o bolepen. Lengri gole shunell o Dewel, ko rai pral o bolepen un i phub.
Tumenge djas mishto ap kai phub, tumer chan un pijan, un wan pesso, jaake har i fiche, kai wenn maredo.
Koles, kai his kek doosh ap leste, anan tumer glan i tchatchepangre, te well lo mulo dino. Kowa kamas pes gar tumentsa te tchingrell.

Mire phrala, dikenn ap o diwes, kai well maro rai Jesus pale, un awenn gar khino an tumare djia, jaake har i hacho dikell ap ko diwes, kai peskro kutch djob bares was. Job djinell, o brishin hunte well un krell i phub sapeno, un pal i tsiro hunte dell pale brishin, te well o djob bares. O tselo tsiro well o hacho gar khino an peskro dji.
Ninna tumer, ma awenn khino an tumare djia! Atchenn soreles an o patsepen! Hi buder gar raha, kai well maro rai Jesus pale.
Mire phrala, ma rakrenn chojemen jek pral o wawareste, te lenn kek phagi o Deblestar! O Dewel, kai rakrell o tchatchepen win pral i menshende, hi kanna glan o wudar tardo.
Mire phrala, dikenn ap o Debleskre rakepangre, kai penan i menshenge o Debleskro lab. Jon wan gar khino an lengre djia, ninna gar, har wan bud duka ap lende. Awenn har jon!

Kolla hi tchatchepaha bachtelo, kai rikran soreles ap o Debleste. Tumer shunan, har rikras pes o Hiob soreles ap o Debleste, un tumer djinenna, hawo brawlepen o Dewel les lauter das. O Debles hi i baro dji i menshenge un hi lenge latches.

Mire phrala, ma denn tumen sowel, gar ap o bolepen, witar gar ap i phub un witar gar ap wawar koowa. Te penenn tumer: "Awa," jaake hunte well kowa ninna awa. Un te penenn tumer: "Na-a," jaake hunte well kowa ninna na-a, te lenn kek phagi o Deblestar.
Te hi jekes tumendar i pharo tsiro, penell lo o Debleske, hoi leske phares hi! Te hi jek bachtelo, giwell lo o Debleske gilja!
Te hi jek tumendar nasselo, kharell lo kolen, kai hi i phureder mank i patslende, te mangenn le o Debles leske, un te makenn le les o djeteha dre an o Jesuseskro lab.
Te mangenn i phureder o Debles un patsenn ap leskri soor, well ko nasselo sasto. Un o Dewel krell les pale soreles. Te hi doosh ap leste, palle lell o Dewel koi doosh lestar.

Doleske penenn tumenge tumari doosh, un mangenn o Debles jek o wawareske, te wenn tumer sasto. I mensho, kai djiwell jaake, har o Dewel kamella, job te mangell i tselo djijeha tchomone o Deblestar, nai krell o Dewel bud leske.
O Elija his i mensho har mer. Job mangas o Deblestar, te dell kek brishin. Un koi das kek brishin ap i phub triin bersha un shob tchon.
Un job mangas o Debles pale. Un koi das brishin. Un lauter was senelo un baro ap i phub.
Mire phrala, djinenn: Te peras jek tumendar o tchatcho dromestar tele, un jek wawar anell les pale ap o tchatcho drom,
palle las kawa les dran o merepen win, te djal job gar nashedo. Un leskri bud doosh hi lestar krik lino.

Me, o Petro, tchinau kau liil. Me hom o Jesus Kristeskro bitchepaskro, un tchinau kau liil tumenge, kai djiwenn an i themma Pontus, Galatia, Kappadocia, Asia un Bitinia. Tumer han o Jesuseskre menshe un djiwenn mashkral kolende, kai patsenn gar ap o Jesus Kristeste.

O Dewel, maro dad an o bolepen, rodas tumen win, un das tumen peskro Ducho, te wenn tumer o Debleskre tchawe, un krenn, hoi o Jesus Kristo tumendar kamella. Un job thowas tumari doosh peskro rateha tumendar tele. Mu well tumen bud latchepen un bacht an o dji!

Mer sharah o Debles, ko dades maro rajestar, o Jesus Kristestar. O Dewel kamas men jaake bud, te was job maro dad un das men o newo djipen. Un an mare djia djinah soreles, jaake har job o Jesus Kristes i mulendar djido kras,
jaake lah mer ninna ko djipen, hoi buder gar pre-herella. Ko shukar koowa, hoi lah an o bolepen, atchell hako tsiro. Kowa well gar tchiklo un phuro. Kau brawlepen hi tumenge,

kai patsenn ap leste. O Dewel rikrell tumen an peskro sorelo wast, bis te well ko diwes, kai lell tumen o Jesus Kristo dran i tseli bibacht win. Palle dikenn tumer har shukar kowa hi, hoi les tumenge hi.
Doleske awenn bachtelo, ninna te hunte djan i tikno tsiro ap i drom, kai well bud pharo koowa ap tumende.

Kowa wella pral tumende, te well tumaro patsepen sorelo. Jaake har o sonakai an i jag djudjo un kutch kerdo wella, jaake hunte well tumaro patsepen ninna djudjo un kutch kerdo. Tumaro patsepen hi budeder moldo har o sonakai, hoi atchell gar. Te atchell tumaro patsepen sorelo, palle sharell tumen o Dewel un krell tumen bares un railes ap ko diwes, kai well o Jesus Kristo pale.

Koles kamenn tumer o djijestar, ninna te dikan les gar. Ap leste patsenn tumer, ninna te dikenn les kanna nai gar. Tumaro patsepen anell tumen pash o Debleste an o bolepen. Kote hi tumari bacht jaake baro, hoi i labentsa nai gar penenna.
Kol Debleskre rakepangre rakran glan i raha tsiro pral ko latchepen, hoi o Dewel tumen della. Jon kaman te djinell, har nai lenn i menshe o Debleskro djipen an o bolepen.
Jon kaman ninna ko tsiro te djinell, kai kowa wella. O Jesuseskro Ducho his an lende. Un kowa sikras len kol duka, hoi wenna pral o Jesuseste, un ko railepen, hoi lell lo pal kowa.

Kol Debleskre rakepangre haiwan, kai kowa gar lenge kokres hi, hoi len o Dewel sikras. Kowa hi tumenge, kai kanna djiwenna. Tumenge was o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar penlo. Kolla, kai penan les tumenge, rakran kowa, hoi penas lenge o Debleskro Ducho. Koles bitchras o Dewel dran o bolepen. Ninna i bolepangre kamenn o Jesuseskro railepen te dikell.
Doleske awenn gar khino an tumare djia, un denn garda, te atchenn ap o Debleskro drom! Dikenn ap ko baro latchepen, hoi o Dewel dell tumen ap ko diwes, kai well o Jesus Kristo pale.
Tumer han o Debleskre tchawe. Doleske shunenn ap leste, un djiwenn buder gar jaake har an ko tsiro, kai prindjran tumer o Debles gar un kran o tchilatchepen, hoi an tumende his.
O Dewel das tumen gole, te wenn tumer leske koi. An leste hi kek tchilatchepen, jaake hunte well ninna kek tchilatchepen an tumende.
An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo, kai o Dewel penella: An mande hi kek tchilatchepen. Doleske hunte well kek tchilatchepen an tumende.

O Dewel hi o tchatchepaskro rai, kai rakrell o tchatchepen win pral hakeneste pal kowa, hoi job kras. Un o Dewel dikell gar koi pre, koon ko mensho hi. Ap leste penenn tumer: "Tata!" Doleske djiwenn jaake, har job kowa kamella, jaake raha har tumer kate ap i phub djiwenna.

Tumer djinenna, o Jesus Kristo plaissras kek sonakai un kek rup, - kowa lauter atchell gar, - te lell lo tumen win dran tumaro phuro djipen, hoi tchi moldo his, har djan ap ko drom, kai tumare phure djan.
Job plaissras peskro kutch rateha, hoi job ratas, har meras lo ap o trushel. O Jesus Kristo his har i bakro, hoi maredo was o Debleske. Ap leste his kek doosh un kek tchilatchepen.
Har i phub gar koi his, rodas o Dewel les win, te merell lo i menshenge. Un an kau tsiro, kai djiwah, was lo tumenge ap i phub.
Job anas tumen ap o Debleskro drom. O Dewel kras les i mulendar djido, un das les peskro railepen. Doleske tchiwenn tumaro tselo patsepen ap leste!
Tumer shunan ap o tchatcho lab, un tchiwan o tchilatchepen dran tumaro djipen krik. Kanna nai kamenn tumen tchatchepaha har phrala un phenja. Mukenn gar tele, te kamenn tumen o tselo djijestar!
Tumer wan newes boldo un han tchawe jekestar, kai merell gar. Ko newo djipen lan tumer, har patsan ap o Debleskro lab, hoi hi djido un atchella hako tsiro.
An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: I tsele menshe hi har o senlepen un har shukar blume. O senlepen merella, un i blume perenn tele.
O Debleskro lab atchell hako tsiro. Kowa hi ko lab, hoi was tumenge penlo.
Doleske mukenn hako tchilatcho koowa! Ma chochenn! Ma rakrenn dui tchipjentsa! Ma silwerenn! Rakrenn kek djungelo koowa pral kekeste!
Har i tarnepen pal o thud gole della, jaake hunte well tumen bok pal o Debleskro lab. Palle wenn tumer sorelo an o patsepen un djan mishto ap ko drom kai anell tumen pash o Debleste.
Tumer haiwan, har latcho maro rai Jesus hi.
Awenn pash leste! Job hi ko djido bar, hoi o Dewel win rodas. O Debleske hi lo o kutch bar, ninna te witsran les i menshe ap i rig.

Ninna tumer han sawe djide barra. Tumentsa kamell o Dewel peskro kheer pre te tchiwell. Job rodas tumen win, te wenn tumer leskre rashaja, un te wenn leske koi. An tumende das o Jesus Kristo peskro Ducho. Doleske nai sharenn o Debles jaake, har job kowa kamella.
An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Me rodom jek kutch bar win, un tchiwom les an o foro Zion tele, jaake te well miro kheer ap leste soreles tardo. Un koon ap koleste patsella, atchell djido.

Kau bar hi kutch tumenge, kai patsenna. Kau bar hi gar kutch kolenge, kai gar patsenna. Jon perenn pral kau bar, un choirenn pen koi pral, jaake har tchindlo hi an o Debleskro lab: Ko bar, hoi kol budepangre ap i rig witsran, kowa was ko bar, ap koleste ko tselo kheer tardo hi; pral ko bar perenn i menshe, un choirenn pen koi pral. Kolla kai patsenn gar ap o Debleskro lab, perenn pral leste. Jaake hunte djal lenge.

Tumer han kolla, kai o Dewel peske win rodas. Tumaro baro rai hi o Jesus Kristo. Koleskre rashaja han tumer, te wenn leske koi. Tumer han o Debleskre menshe, kolen job khetne gole das, te penenn tumer i menshenge, hawo baro un latcho koowa o Dewel kras. Job las tumen dran i rati win, un anas tumen pash peste, kai hi lauter shukar un djudjo.
Glan i raha tsiro hans tumer gar leskre menshe. Kanna han tumer o Debleskre menshe. Glan i raha tsiro djinan tumer gar, kai hi les i baro dji tumenge. Kanna kras lo peskro dji tumenge pre.
Kamle mala, tumer djinenn, kai han gar khere ap kai phub. Me mangau tumen, awenn sorelo, te well o djungelo koowa an tumare djia pre. Palle penenn: "Na-a!" ap kowa un krenn les gar!

Tumer djiwenn mank i menshende, kai o Debles gar prindjrenna. Doleske djiwenn jaake, te hatsenn le kek tchilatchepen ap tumende! Un kolla, kai rakrenna djungeles pral tumende, kolla hunte dikenn o latcho koowa ap tumende, jaake te sharenn le o Debles ap ko diwes, kai job wella.
Shunenn ap kowa, hoi kol pralstune ap kai phub penenna! Kowa kamell o Dewel, maro rai, jaake. Shunenn ap o baro rajeste pral o them!
Shunenn ninna ap i moskere! Kolen das o themeskro rai i budi, te denn le kolen i phagi, kai kran tchilatcho koowa, un te sharenn le kolen, kai krenn latcho koowa.
O Dewel kamell, te krenn tumer o latchepen. Jaake pandenn tumer kol dinele menshenge o mui, kai haiwan gar o tchatchepen un rakrenn djungeles pral tumende.

Tumer han buder gar pandlo ap o tchilatchepen. Doleske penenn gar: "Mer nai krah halauter, hoi kamah." Un pal sawo rakepen khatrenn tumer tumaro tchilatchepen. Ma bistrenn, kai han pandlo ap o Debleste!
Awenn latches ap hako mensheste! Kamenn i patslen o djijestar! Sharenn o Debles, un krenn, hoi job kamella! Shunenn ap o baro rajeste pral o them!
Tumer budepangre, shunenn ap tumare rajende, ap kolende, kai latcho un kamlo hi un ninna ap kolende, kai tchilatcho hi.
Te krenn tumer, hoi o Dewel kamella, un doleske dukrenn le tumen un tchingrenn ap tumende, ninna te kran tumer kek tchilatchepen, palle sharell tumen o Dewel.
Te krenn tumer tchilatcho koowa un wenn doleske dino, hi kowa gar mishto, ninna te rikrenn tumer i duka win. Te krenn tumer latcho koowa, un jon dukrenn tumen dran kowa, palle sharell tumen o Dewel.
Job das tumen pash peste gole, te krenn o latchepen, un te rikrenn i duka win. Ninna o Jesus Kristo las tumenge duka ap peste. Job kras kowa, te sikrell lo tumenge, har te djan leske palla.
Job kras kek tchilatcho koowa. Un dran leskro mui was kek chochepen.
Te tchingran le ap leste, tchingras job gar pale. Te dan le les, das lo len gar trad. Na-a, job tchiwas pes an o Debleskre wasta. Un o Dewel hi o tchatchepaskro rai, kai djal pal o tchatchepen.

O tchilatchepen, hoi mer kram, las o Jesus Kristo ap peste, un hidjas les ap o trushel. Har job menge meras, hi kowa jaake, har te meram mer leha. Kanna hi o tchilatchepen an mende mulo. Un mer djiwah nai i latcho un tchatcho djipen. Kol duka, hoi o Jesus ap peste las, kran maro djipen sasto.
Tumer hans har bakre, kai nashran pen. Kanna anas tumen o Jesus Kristo pale ap o tchatcho drom. Job hi tumenge har i bakrengro, un dell garda ap tumende.

Djuwjale, ma hadenn tumen pral tumare romende, ninna te shunenn jon gar ap o Debleskro lab! Jaake dikenn jon, har tumer i djudjo djipen djiwenna, un ap o Debleste shunenna. Un tumaro djipen sikrell len o tchatcho drom pash o Debleste, ninna te krenn tumer kek bare laba.
Tumaro shukapen hunte well gar diklo an kowa, hoi i menshe dikenna: har tumer tumare balla hidjenna, witar gar an o sonakai un kutch ripja!
Tumaro shukapen hunte well dran tumaro dji un sikrell pes an o latchepen, kai kek tchingepen dren hi. Sawo shukapen atchella, un hi bud moldo glan o Debleskre jaka.
Jaake djiwan ninna kol patsle djuwja an ko phuro tsiro. Jon dikan ap o Debleste, un hadan pen gar pral pengre romende.
Jek lendar hi i Sara. Joi shunas ap o Abrahameste, un penas ap leste Rai. Te krenn tumer, hoi latcho hi, un te mukenn tumen kekestar daar te krell, palle han tumer har lakre tcha.

Murshale, djiwenn tumare romjentsa latches khetne! Jon hi gar jaake sorelo har tumer. Awenn latches ap lende! Ma bistrenn, i djuwja lenn o Debleskro djipen har tumer! Te djiwenn tumer jaake, palle well tchi mashkral tumende tardo ap ko tsiro, kai rakrenn o Debleha.
Ap tumende lauterende penau: Rikrenn khetne! Hakenes te well i dji o wawareske! Tumer lauter han phrala un phenja. Awenn latches jek ap o wawareste! Ma krenn tumen bares!
Krenn kekeske tchilatchepen, kai kras ap tumende tchilatchepen! Jek te tchingrell ap tumende, ma tchingrenn pale! Rakrenn latche laba leha! O Dewel das tumen gole, te lenn tumer leskro latchepen.
An o Debleskro lab hi tchindlo: Koon kamell i latcho djipen un bachtele diwessa te dikell, kowa dell garda ap peskri tchip. Kek chochepen, kek tchilatchepen hunte well dran leskro mui!
Job mukell o tchilatcho koowa, un krell o latcho koowa. Peskri tseli sorjaha krell lo, te djal kek tchingepen mashkral i menshende!
O Dewel, maro rai, dikell latches ap koleste, kai djiwell pal o tchatchepen. Un te mangell job o Debles, shunell lo les. Ap kolende, kai djiwenn an o tchilatchepen, dikell o Dewel gar latches.
Tumer te kamenn i tseli sorjaha latcho koowa te krell, koon krell tumenge tchilatchepen? Kek, patsau.
Tumer krenn, hoi o Dewel tumendar kamella. Nai well, te lenn le tumen doleske palla. Palle han bachtelo. Te denn le tumen trad, ma darenn! Ma trashenn lendar!
O Jesus Kristo kokres te well o rai an tumare djia! Un te putchenn le tumendar tchomone pral tumaro patsepen, ma darenn kek tsiro, te penenn lenge, ap koneste tumer patsenna.
Rakrenn lentsa latchepaha, un krenn tumen gar bares pral lende! Rakrenn dran i djudjo dji, te well i ladj ap kolende, kai rakrenn djungeles pral tumaro djipen o Jesus Kristeha!
Te krenn tumer latcho koowa, un dran kowa krenn le tumentsa tchilatcho koowa, palle hi kowa feteder, har te krans tumer tchilatcho koowa. Jon nai dukrenn tumen gar, te mukals len o Dewel gar.

Ninna o Jesus Kristo las jek kopo duka ap peste, har job ap o trushel meras, un mari doosh ap peste las. Job his i latcho, un meras i tchilatchenge. Kowa kras lo, te anell lo len pash o Debleste. I menshe maran les. O Debleskro Ducho kras les djido.
Har job mulo his, djas lo ninna pash i mulende an o mulengro them tele, un penas lenge o Debleskro latcho lab.

Job djas pash kol mulende, kai djiwan an ko tsiro, kai o Noa djiwas. Har o Noa ko panjeskro kheer kras, das o Dewel i menshen i raha tsiro, te wenn le pash leste. Un jon wan gar. His gar budeder har ochta menshe, kai djan an o panjeskro kheer. Un kolla tassan gar an o pani.

Jaake har wan kol ochta menshe win lino dran o merepen, jaake djas tumenge kanna ninna, har wan tumer o Debleske an o pani thodo. Kote was gar koi tchik tumendar tele thodo. Na-a! Koon mukell pes o Debleske an o pani te thowell, kowa mangell o Debles, te dell lo les i djudjo dji. Kowa nai dell o Dewel leste doleske, kai stas o Jesus Kristo i mulendar pre un djas an o bolepen. Kanna hi lo beshdo ap i tchatchi rig o Deblestar, un hi o rai pral i tsele bolepangre, un pral i tsele pralstune un sorele an o bolepen.
O Jesus Kristo las bare duka ap peste, har job ap i phub his. Doleske, ma darenn, te wenn ninna duka ap tumende. Koon an peskro djipen duka haiwas, kowa mukell o tchilatchepen.
Jaake raha, har kau mensho ap kai phub hi, krell lo kowa, hoi o Dewel kamella, un djiwell buder gar pal peskro shero.

I raha tsiro djiwan tumer har kol menshe, kai o Debles gar prindjrenna. Tumer kran wi-ladjedo koowa. Un tumaro dji nashas pal tchilatcho koowa. Tumer pijan tumen mato, chan tumen nasselo, un mangan wawar koowa an har o Debles. Kowa hi tchilatcho glan o Debleskre jaka.
Kanna djiwenn tumer buder gar ko djungelo djipen har kol tchilatche. Kowa djal kolenge gar an o shero. Doleske tchingrenn le ap tumende.
Well i diwes, kai wenn jon anlo glan o Debleste. Kowa rakrell o tchatchepen win pral i djidende, ninna pral i mulende. Un jon hunte penenn o Debleske, hoske jon ko tchilatcho koowa kran.
Doleske was ninna i mulenge o latcho lab o Jesus Kristestar penlo, te nai lenn le o Debleskro djipen, ninna te meran le, har i tsele menshe hunte merenn.
Ko tsiro wella sik, kai tchi atchella, hoi kanna koi hi. Doleske denn garda, har tumer djiwenna, te rikrell tumen tchi pale, te rakrenn o Debleha!
Rikrenn khetne an o kamlepen! Kowa hi feteder har lauter wawar. O kamlepen tchakrell bud tchilatchepen.
Lenn jek o wawares kamles an peskro kheer! Un choirenn tumen gar pral koi budi, hoi tumen hi!
Hakeno tumendar las i budi o Deblestar, te nai krell lo i wawarengro patsepen soreles. Krenn koi budi! Awenn jek o wawareske koi! Jaake han tumer latche budepangre o Debleske.

Das tut o Dewel gole, te rakress o Debleskro lab, palle rake o Debleskro lab! Das tut o Dewel i soor, te budress i patslenge, palle kre kowa an o Debleskri soor! Jaake sharah mer o Debles an halauter, hoi o Jesus Kristo men das. Les hi o railepen un i soor kanna un hako tsiro. Amen!
Kamle mala, tumaro dji well gar dareno, te wenn tumer soreles palla lino. Sawo koowa djal kolenge, kai patsle hi. Kote well diklo, har tumaro patsepen hi.
Te wenn duka ap tumende, djinenn: sawe duka wan ninna ap o Jesus Kristeste. Doleske awenn bachtelo! Ap ko diwes, kai leskro railepen diklo wella, giwenna un bashrenna tumare djia i bachtjatar.
Te praassenn le tumen doleske, kai patsenn tumer ap o Jesus Kristeste, nai wenn tumer bachtelo. Palle nai djinenn: O Debleskro railo Ducho hi ap tumende tchiddo.
Kek tumendar hunte well i marepaskro, i tchorepaskro, i tchingepaskro, i phukepaskro! Kalla menshe len i phagi i menshendar un hunte ladjenn.
Jek, kai patsell ap o Jesus Kristeste un lell doleske i phagi, kowa hunte ladjell gar. Na-a, job te parkrell pes pash o Debleste, te hi o Jesus Kristo leskro rai.
Kanna was ko tsiro, kai wenna i tchilatche diwessa pral o Debleskre tchawende. Pal kowa wella bari bibacht pral kolende, kai patsan gar ap o Debleskro latcho lab!

Kolla, kai hi tchilatcho, un kamenn o Deblestar tchi te djinell, kolenge djal bud djungleder har kolenge, kai kran, hoi o Dewel kamas, ninna te well kolengro djipen ninna phares an ko tchilatcho tsiro.
Doleske penau tumenge: Te mukell o Dewel ap tumende i pharo tsiro te well, palle denn tumen tseles an o Debleskro wast, kai das tumen o djipen! Un mukenn gar tele, te krenn o latchepen!

Kanna rakrau ap kolende, kai hi i phureder mank tumende. Me hom ninna i phureder, un dikom mire jakentsa, har o Jesus Kristo ap o trushel meras. Un ap ko diwes, kai well peskro tselo railepen diklo, hom me ninna pash leste. Tumenge penau soreles:

Denn garda ap i patslende, kai o Dewel peske khetne anas! Tumer han har i bakrengre. Un o Debleskre tchawe hi har bakre, hoi o Dewel an tumare wasta das. Denn len kowa, hoi len hunte wella, te atchell lengro patsepen djido! Krenn kowa o tselo djijestar! Jaake kamell les o Dewel. Krenn kowa gar, har te wals i phari budi, hoi hunte krenn! Krenn koi budi dran o kamlepen un gar, te wenn tumer plaissedo!
Ma awenn raja pral i patslende! Sikrenn lende, har tumer djiwenna, te djiwenn jon ninna jaake!
Un ap ko diwes, kai well o pralstuno bakrengro, lenn tumer leskro railepen, hoi atchella hako tsireske.

Kol tarne menshenge penau me: Krenn kowa, hoi kol phureder phrala tumenge penenna! Hakeneske penau: Kek te krell, har te well lo bareder har ko wawar! O Dewel hi gar ap i rig kolendar, kai krenn pen bares. Na-a, job hi latches kolenge, kai krenn pen gar bares.
Doleske krenn tumen tikno tel o Debleskro sorelo wast! O Debleskro tsiro wella, kai job tumen bares krella.
Lauter, hoi hi tumen phares ap o dji, witsrenn ap leste! Job krell lauter mishto.
Denn garda, un awenn gar khino! O beng kamell tumen te marell. Un job djal trujal har i diwji bari margodja, hoi hi lat bok, un rodella, kones joi nai chal pre.
Ma krenn, hoi o beng tumendar kamella! Atchenn soreles an o patsepen! Tumer hunte djinenna, kai lenn le tumare phralen un phenja ap i tseli phub ninna jaake palla har tumen.

I tikno tsiro well pharo koowa ap tumende. An kau tsiro lenn tumer i soor, te atchenn ap o Debleskro drom. O Dewel, kolestar well o tselo latchepen, job das tumen gole, te djiwenn hako tsiro khetne o Jesus Kristeha un lenn leskro railepen. Job dell tumen ninna i soor, te atchenn soreles an o patsepen un an o djipen.
I tseli soor hi leske kanna un hako tsiro! Amen!
Maro latcho phraal, o Silwano, was mange ap i rig, te tchinell lo kau tikno liil. An kau liil kamoms te penap tumenge an o dji, te djinenn tchatchepaha: O Dewel hi tumenge latcho. Atchenn pash leste!
I patsle, kai wenn khetne an o foro Babilon, penenn tumenge latche laba. Jon wan o Deblestar win rodedo har tumer. Ninna miro tchawo Marko penell tumenge latche laba.
Te wenn tumer khetne, denn tumen i tchum, te dikell hakeno, kai tumer phrala un phenja han! O Debleskri bacht tumenge lauterenge, kai djan ap o Jesus Kristeskro drom!

Me, o Simon Petro, tchinau kau liil. Me budrau o Jesus Kristeske un hom leskro bitchepaskro. Me tchinau ap lauterende, kai lan ninna ko patsepen har mer. Ko kutch patsepen, kai tchiwas men an o tchatchepen glan o Debleste, das men maro Dewel un o Jesus Kristo, kai las men dran o tchilatchepen win.
Me mangau o Deblestar, te dell lo tumen peskro latchepen un peskri bacht an o dji, te prindjrenn les un o Jesuses, maro rajes, feteder!

Job hi baro un railo, un his menge latcho, un das men pash peste gole. Har lam les an maro dji pre, das men o Dewel an peskri soor halauter, hoi men hunte well, te djiwas maro djipen jaake, har job kamella.

Glan i raha tsiro penas o Dewel i menshenge, te bitchrell lo lenge jekes, kai lell len dran o merepen win, un dell len o Debleskro djipen. Ko baro un kutch koowa kras lo kanna menge. Mer lam o Debleskro djipen un hunte kras buder gar ko djungelo koowa, hoi i menshe ap kai phub jaake kamenna, un hoi anell lenge o merepen.
Doleske tchiwenn tumaro tselo dji koi pre, te well pash tumaro patsepen ninna i djudjo djipen. Koon i djudjo djipen djiwella, haiwell, hoi o Dewel lestar kamella.

Koon haiwas, hoi o Dewel lestar kamella, kowa rikrell pes lauterestar pale, hoi leske gar mishto hi. Koon rikrell pes lauterestar pale, hoi leske gar mishto hi, kowa rikrell soreles ap kowa, hoi latcho hi. Koon kowa krella, kamell o Debles.
Koon o Debles kamella, koles hi ninna i dji peskre phralenge un phenjenge. Kones i dji hi peskre phralenge un phenjenge, kowa kamell ninna i tsele menshen ap kai phub.
Te krenn tumer kowa lauter, un djan dureder ap kau drom, palle prindjrenn tumer maro rajes, o Jesus Kristes, budeder un feteder.
I patslo, kai krell ko koowa gar, kowa hi korelo, un djiwell an o tamlepen. Job bistras, kai was leskri tseli doosh lestar krik lino, hoi job kras.

Mire phrala, o Dewel das tumen gole, un rodas tumen win, te wenn tumer leskre tchawe. Doleske djiwenn jaake tumari tseli sorjaha, te atchenn pash leste! Te djiwenn tumer jaake, perenn tumer gar o Debleskro dromestar tele.
Un o Dewel lell tumen latches pash peste an o bolepen pre, kai hi maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, o rai hako tsiro, - job, kai las men dran i tseli bibacht win.
Ninna te djinenn kowa lauter, un han sorelo tardo an o tchatcho patsepen, penau tumenge kowa pale te pale.
Me patsau, hi mishto tumenge, te penap tumenge kowa jaake raha, har me djiwau, te bistrenn tumer kowa gar, un te wenn gar khino, te krenn kowa lauter.
Me djinau, kai merau an i tikno tsiro. Maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, penas kowa mange.
Doleske tchinau me lauter pre, te bistrenn gar, hoi me tumenge penom.
Mer penam tumenge, te well maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, i bari sorjaha pale. Kowa hi kek gosewi parmissa. Na-a. Mer dikam leskro baro railepen mare jakentsa.
O Dewel, leskro dad, das les peskro baro railepen un sharas les, har job dran o bolepen ap leste penas: "Kawa hi miro tchawo, koles me o djijestar kamau. Job krell man bachtelo."
Ko rakepen shunam mer dran o bolepen, har hams leha khetne ap koi Debleskri berga.

Doleske djinah mer tchatchepaha, kai kowa tchatcho hi, hoi o Debleskre rakepangre penan. Tumer krenna mishto, te denn garda koi pre. Ko lab hi har i momeli, hoi chatchella an i rat, bis te well o diwes. Palle djal i raili momeli an tumare djia pre.
Un kowa hunte djinenn tumer: Kek Debleskro rakepaskro rakras nai pestar Debleskre laba.
An kek tsiro was o Debleskro lab i menshendar. Kol Debleskre rakepangre rakran, hoi o Dewel lenge penas. Kowa tchiwas lenge o Debleskro Ducho an o dji.

Glan i raha tsiro his chochene rakepangre an o them Israel, kai kran, har te bitchras len o Dewel. Jaake wenna ninna mashkral tumende chochene sikepangre, kai sikrenn tumen i chocheno drom, kai anell tumen krik o Deblestar. Kol sikepangre denn o Jesuses, maro rajes, buchoste, kai plaissras peskro rateha lenge, te lell lo len dran o tchilatchepen win. Jon nashenn an pengri bibacht.
Bud wawar dikenn lengro wi-ladjedo djipen, un krenn jaake har jon, un djiwenn ninna i wi-ladjedo djipen. Doleske rakrenn kolla, kai gar patslo hi, djungeles pral o Debleskro drom.
Kol chochene sikepangre kamenn tumen chochene labentsa ap pengri rig te anell, te lenn le lowe tumendar. O Debleskri choli well tchatchepaha pral lende, un lengri bibacht wella sik.
O Debleskri choli was ninna pral kol bolepangre, kai kran o tchilatchepen. O Dewel witsras len an o telstunepen. Kote hi le pandlo an i kali rat, bis te well ko diwes, kai dell lo len lengri phagi.

Un o Debleskri choli was pral kol menshende, kai djiwan an ko tsiro, kai o Noa djiwas. Jon kaman o Deblestar tchi te djinell, un shunan gar ap o Noa, har job lenge penas, te hunte djan le ap o Debleskro drom. Un o Dewel bitchras o baro pani pral lende. O Noa kokres un efta wawar tassan gar.

Un o Debleskri choli was pral kol forja Sodom un Gomorra. Un job chatchras kol forja jaake te atchas tchi har barra un jagakri tchik. Jaake sikras job kolende, kai pal lende wenna, hoi djal kolentsa, kai gar ap leste shunenna.
O Lot kokres was win lino dran o foro Sodom, har i jag tele peras. Job djiwas jaake, har o Dewel kamas. Un leske dukas ko djungelo djipen, hoi kol tchilatche menshe djiwan.
Hako diwes dikas un shunas lo, hoi jon tchilatches kran. Un lengro tchilatcho koowa dukras les an leskro dji.

O Dewel, maro rai, haiwell garda te dell ap kolende, kai les kamenna, te perenn le gar o tchatcho dromestar tele. Job haiwell ninna kol tchilatchen pandlo te rikrell, te lenn le pengri phagi ap ko diwes, kai well o tchatchepen wi-rakedo pral i tsele menshende.

Palle well i phagi soreles pral kolende, kai djiwan i fullo djipen, un kaman kek rajes pral pende. Kolla chochene sikepangre hi pre-phurdo, un krenn pen bares. Jon darenn gar, te rakrenn le djungeles pral kolende, kai hi an o bolepen.
I bolepangre hi sorleder har kol chochene sikepangre. Un jon praassenn i chochene sikepangren gar glan o Debleste.
Kol chochene sikepangre rakrenn djungeles pral kowa, hoi jon gar prindjrenna. Jon hi har diwje fiche, kai wenn boldo, te wenn le tapedo un maredo. Jaake merenn jon ninna.

Jon kran tchilatchepen, un tchilatchepen well pral lende. Jon chan pen nasselo, un pijenn pen mato ninna ap o diwes. Lenge hunte ladjenn tumen, te chan le pen pash tumende tchalo, un rakrenn lengro chochepen.

An lengre jaka dikeh, kai dikenn le pal haki djuwjate. Hako tsiro hi len bok pal tchilatcho koowa. Un jon anenn kolen o tchatcho dromestar tele, kai hi gar sorelo an o patsepen. Lengro dji hi pherdi bok pal i lowe. Praassedo hi le!
O tchatcho drom mukan le, un nashran pen. Jon djan ap ko tchilatcho drom, kai djas ninna o Bileam, - leskro dad hi o Beor. O Bileam kamas i tchilatcho koowa te krell, te lell lo lowe.
Koi rakras leha leskri esla har i mensho. Jaake was leske siklo, har tchilatcho kowa his, hoi kamas lo te krell. Un koi esla rikras les pale, te krell job kek dinelo koowa.
Kol menshe hi har i brunna, kai hi kek pani dre. Jon hi har o bolepen, kai dell kek brishin. Ap ko diwes, kai lenn jon pengri phagi, wenn le an i kali rat witsedo.
Jon rakrenn bare laba, kai tchi moldo hi. Lengro wi-ladjedo djipen tsardell kolen ap o tchilatcho drom, kai dan glan i tikno tsiro pengro phuro djipen pre.
Kolenge penenn le, te nai krenn jon, hoi jon kamenna. Kol chochene sikepangre hi pandlo ap o tchilatchepen, hoi krell lengro djipen paash. I mensho hi pandlo ap kowa, hoi sorleder hi har job.
Jon haiwan, kai maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, lenge meras, un dan pengro phuro djipen pre. Un palle wan le ap ko djungelo drom pale. Kanna hi lengro djipen djungleder har glan ko tsiro.
Jon prindjran o tchatcho drom, un mukan les. Jon kamenn buder tchi te shunell o Debleskro lab, hoi lenge penlo was. Lenge wals feteder, te djinans jon o Debleskro drom gar.
Kol menshenge djal jaake, har penlo well: "Ko djuklo chal pale kowa, hoi job win tchadas. Un ko balo witsrell pes pal o thopen pale an i tchik."
Latche phrala un phenja, kawa hi o duito liil, hoi me tumenge tchinau. Kalla lila tchinau, te wenn tumer gar khino an tumaro patsepen. Ma bistrenn,
hoi penan o Debleskre rakepangre glan i raha tsiro! Bistrenn witar gar kol laba, hoi tumenge kolla penan, kolen maro rai Jesus pash tumende bitchras, - job, kai las men dran o tchilatchepen win.
Me kamau, te djinenn tumer, glan ko tsiro, kai o Jesus Kristo pale wella, wenna menshe pash tumende, kai san pral tumaro patsepen. Kolla djiwenn jaake har jon kamenna,
un penenn ap tumende: "Kai hi tumaro Jesus? Job penas, kai job pale wella. Mare phure meran, un lauter atchas jaake har his, har i phub kerdo was."
Kol menshe kamenn gar te haiwell, kai kras o Dewel o bolepen un i phub glan i raha tsiro. Jaake har job penas, djas i phub wi dran o pani un atchas ap jek rig tchiddo, un o pani ap i wawar rig.
Koi phuri phub djas tele an o baro pani.

Pral o bolepen un i phub, hoi kanna kai hi, penas o Dewel, te atchenn le jaake raha, bis te wenn le chatchedo an i jag. Jon atchenn jaake raha tardo, bis te well ko diwes, kai well o Debleskri choli pral i menshende ap kai phub, un job kolen i phagi della, kai gar ap leste shunan.
Latche phrala un phenja, jek koowa hunte djinenn tumer: Pash o Debleste hi jek diwes har i sero bersha, un i sero bersha hi har jek diwes.

Hi menshe, kai penenna: "O rai Jesus lell pes bud tsiro, te well lo pale." Kowa hi gar tchatcho. Les hi i baro dji tumenge, un kamell, te djal kek tumendar nashedo. Job kamella, te mukell hakeno peskro tchilatcho drom un well ap o Debleskro drom.

Kek djinell o diwes, kai maro rai Jesus pale wella. Ko diwes wella jaake har i dre-phagepaskro wella. Palle djal o bolepen krik bari goljaha. I bolepangre momlia chatchrenna krik. Ninna i phub un ko tselo koowa, hoi ap i phub hi, chatchrella pre.
Mer djinah, kai lauter jaake paash djala. Doleske hunte kras mer lauter, te atchas o Debleha, un djiwas jaake, har job kamella.
Djiwenn jaake, te well o Debleskro baro diwes sikeder! Ap ko diwes chatchrell o bolepen pre, un djal paash an i jag. Un i bolepangre momlia chatchrenna ninna pre.
Mende das o Dewel peskro lab, te krell lo i newo bolepen un i newi phub. Kote della buder kek tchilatchepen. Ap kowa dikah mer.

Latche phrala un phenja, tumer kamenna, te well ko diwes sik. Doleske krenn lauter, te well tchi mank tumende un o Debleste tardo! Djiwenn jaake, te hi tumen i djudjo dji, un te hatsell o Dewel kek doosh ap tumende ap ko diwes, kai wenna glan leste tardo!

Dikenn, te well maro rai Jesus gar jaake sik pale, krell lo kowa, te dell lo i menshen gomme i tsiro, te wenn le pash leste. Kowa tchinas tumenge ninna maro kamlo phraal Paulo, koles o Dewel bud goswepen das.

Pral ko koowa tchinell lo an peskre tsele lila. Koi hi ninna laba dre tchindlo, hoi hi pharo te haiwell. Un kol menshe, kai haiwenn kowa gar, kolengro patsepen gar sorelo hi, kolla risrenn kol laba trujal, jaake har jon ninna krenna kol wawar Debleskre labentsa, hoi tchindlo hi. Un jaake djan le nashedo.

Latche phrala un phenja, kanna djinenn tumer, kai tchilatche menshe wenna, kai shunenn gar ap o Debleste. Doleske denn garda, te patsenn gar o chochepen, hoi jon rakrenna! Ma djan lentsa, te perenn tumer gar o tchatcho dromestar tele! Atchenn soreles an o patsepen tardo!
Djiwenn bud un budeder dran o latchepen, hoi maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, tumen della! Job las men win dran o tchilatchepen. Prindjrenn les bud un budeder! Sharedo well job kanna un hako tsiro. Amen.
Mer tchinah tumenge pral koleste, kai his hako tsiro koi. Mer shunam les, un dikam les. Awa, mer dikam les mare jakentsa, un tapram les mare wastentsa. Job hi ko lab, hoi o djipen della.

Awa, ko djipen was pash mende, un sikras pes mende. Mer dikam les. Doleske rakrah mer kolestar, kai dikam un shunam. Un mer penah tumenge, koon ko djipen della, hoi gar pre-herella. Kowa his pash peskro dadeste an o bolepen, un was pash mende.

Kowa, hoi mer dikam un shunam, penah mer tumenge, te nai was mer tumentsa khetne an o tchatchepen. Un tchatchepaha, mer ham khetne o Debleha, kai hi maro dad an o bolepen, un leskro tchaweha, o Jesus Kristeha.
Kowa lauter tchinah tumenge, te wenn mare djia un tumare djia pherdo bacht.
Kowa, hoi tumenge penah, shunam o Jesus Kristestar. Lestar shunam, kai hi lauter latchepen an o Debleste. Un kek tchilatchepen hi an leste. O Dewel hi har o diwes un kek tamlepen hi an leste.
Mer te penah, te ham khetne o Debleha, un djiwah an o tchilatchepen, palle ham chochene, un djiwah gar pal o tchatchepen.

Mer te djiwah khetne o Debleha an o tchatchepen, jaake har o Dewel an o tchatchepen tardo hi, palle nai ham mer ninna lauter khetne an o tchatchepen. Un o rat leskro tchawestar thowell mari tseli doosh mendar tele.
Mer te penah: "Men hi kek doosh an maro djipen", jaake chochah men kokres, un mer ham gar an o tchatchepen tardo.

Mer te mangah men tele glan o Debleste, un penah leske, hawi doosh mer ap mende lam, palle krell lo, hoi job penas un lell i doosh mendar krik. Job hi latcho un tchatcho un thowell o tselo tchilatchepen mendar tele.
Mer te penah, kai lam kek doosh ap mende, palle krah, har te wals o Dewel i chocheno. Un mer djiwah gar pal leskro lab.

Mire tchawe, me tchinau tumenge kowa, te krenn tumer kek tchilatchepen! Un jek te kras i tchilatcho koowa, jaake hi men i rakepaskro, kai well ap mari rig un rakrell mishto menge pash maro dadeste an o bolepen. Kowa hi o Jesus Kristo, kai an o tchatchepen glan o Debleste tardo hi.
Job kokres las mari doosh mendar, un las lat ap peste, har job menge ap o trushel meras. Gar mari doosh kokres las lo ap peste. Na-a, job las ninna i doosh i tsele menshendar ap kai phub ap peste.
Mer te krah kowa, hoi o Dewel menge penas, te kras, djinah mer, te prindjrah les.
Koon penella: "Me prindjrau o Debles", un krell gar, hoi job penas, kowa hi i chocheno, un djiwell gar pal o tchatchepen.
Koon krella, hoi o Dewel penella, an koleste hi tchatchepaha o Debleskro tselo kamlepen. Un ap kowa dikah mer, te atchah o Debleha.
Koon penella, te atchell lo o Debleha khetne, kowa hunte djiwella jaake, har o Jesus Kristo djiwas.
Kamle phrala, ko lab, hoi me tumenge kate tchinau, te krenn kowa, hi tumenge tchi newo. Na-a, kowa hi i phuro lab. Tumer shunan ko lab, har tumer patslo wan, un djinenn les.
Ko phuro lab hi ninna newo. O Jesus djiwas pal ko lab un tumer djiwenna ninna jaake. Ap kowa dikenn le, kai i rat pale djala, un o diwes wella.
Koon penella: "Me djiwau o Debleha," un krell peskro phraleske tchilatchepen, kowa djiwell gomme an o tchilatchepen. Kowa hi jaake, har te djiwell lo an i kali rat.
Koon peskro phrales o tselo djijestar kamella, kowa atchella o Debleha. An leste hi kek tchilatchepen, hoi les o Debleskro dromestar tele nai anell.
Koon peskro phraleske tchilatchepen krella, kowa djiwell har an i kali rat, un djal i drom, kai dikell lo nai gar. Job djinell gar, kai job djala. An i rat hi lo, har te wals lo korelo.
Tchowale, me tchinau tumenge kau lab, te bistrenn tumer gar, kai o Jesus Kristo meras tumenge. O Dewel las tumari doosh tumendar.
Phure murshale, tumenge tchinau kau lab, te bistrenn gar o Jesuses, kai hako tsiro koi hi. Tarne murshale, tumenge tchinau kau lab: Tumer hans sorleder har o beng un kran gar, hoi job tumendar kamas.

Tchowale, tumenge tchinom kau lab, te bistrenn gar, kai hi o Dewel tumaro dad. Phure murshale, tumenge tchinom kau lab, te bistrenn gar o Jesuses, kai hako tsiro koi hi. Tarne murshale, tumenge tchinom kau lab, te han tumer soreles. Un o Debleskro lab atchell an tumende. Un tumer kran gar, hoi o beng tumendar kamas.

Ma kamenn ko koowa, hoi i menshe ap kai phub kamenna! Ma kamenn ko koowa, hoi i menshe ap kai phub krenna! Te kamell jek ko koowa, hoi i menshe ap kai phub kamenna, kowa kamell gar o Debles, maro dades an o bolepen.

Pash i menshende ap kai phub djal lauter pal jek koowa: chapen un pipen, romedinepen un khelepen, brawlepen un sharepen. Kowa lauter well gar o Deblestar, maro dadestar. Kowa lauter hi phubjakro koowa.
Kai phub atchella gar, witar gar kowa, hoi i menshe ap kai phub kamenna. Koon krella, hoi o Dewel kamella, kowa atchella hako tsiro.

Tchowale, mer djiwah an ko tsiro, kai i phub buder gar raha atchella. Un tumer shunan, kai ko chocheno wella, kai hadell pes pral o Jesus Kristeste. Shunenn, bud chochene hi kanna kai, kai hadenn pen pral o Jesus Kristeste. Ap kowa dikah mer, kai i phub buder gar raha atchella.
Kolla wan mendar. Jon his gar tchatchepaha mendar. Te wans jon mendar, atchans le pash mende. Un har jon penge djan, nai dikas hakeno, te his le gar mendar.
Tumer lan o Debleskro Ducho, un lestar djinenn tumer kowa lauter.
Me tchinom tumenge gar, har te prindjrans tumer o tchatchepen gar. Tumer prindjrenn les, un djinenn, kai kek chochepen dran o tchatchepen wella.

Kowa hi i chocheno, kai dell buchoste, kai o Jesus o baro rai hi, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job. Hakeno, kai dell buchoste, te hi o Jesus o Debleskro tchawo, un te hi o Dewel leskro dad, hi har ko chocheno, kai hadell pes pral o Jesus Kristeste.

Hakeno, kai o Debleskro tchawes buchoste della, prindjrell witar gar o Debles, kai leskro dad hi. Koon ap o Jesuseste patsella, un i menshenge penella, te hi o Jesus o Debleskro tchawo, kowa prindjrella ninna o Debles, leskro dades.

Tumenge penau: Rikrenn kol laba an tumare djia, hoi shunan, har tumer patslo wan! Te atchenn kol laba an tumende, hoi tumer shunan, har patslo wan, jaake atchenn tumer khetne o Debleskro tchaweha un o Debleha, maro dadeha.
Un tumer lenn ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Kowa penas o Jesus Kristo menge.
Kawa tchinom tumenge, te mukenn tumen gar o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell.

O Jesus Kristo das tumen o Debleskro Ducho. Kowa atchell an tumende. Doleske hunte well tumen kek wawar sikepaskro. O Debleskro Ducho sikrell tumende o tselo Debleskro drom. Un lauter, hoi job tumende sikrell, kowa hi tchatcho un kek chochepen. Krenn kowa, hoi o Debleskro Ducho tumende sikrella! Jaake atchenn tumer o Jesus Kristeha khetne.
Un kanna, mire tchawe, atchenn pash leste, te well men kek traash, te well job pale. Jaake hunte ladjas men gar glan leste.
Tumer djinenna: O Jesus Kristo kras, hoi tchatcho hi glan o Debleste. Jaake djinenn tumer ninna: Kolla, kai krenn, hoi tchatcho hi glan o Debleste, kolla hi o Debleskre tchawe.

Dikenn, har baro o Debleskro kamlepen menge hi. O Dewel, maro dad, penell ap mende: "Mire tchawe". Un tchatchepaha, kolla ham mer. Dran kowa haiwenn men kol menshe gar, kai o Debles gar prindjrenna. Jon haiwenn gar, koon job hi.

Latche phrala un phenja, kanna ham Debleskre tchawe. Un hoi mer wah an ko tsiro, hoi wella, djinah gomme gar. Jek djinah: Ap ko tsiro, kai well o Jesus Kristo pale, dikah les har job hi, un mer wah jaake, har job hi.
Un hakeno, kai kowa patsella, rikrell peskro dji djudjo, te well kek doosh ap leste, jaake har ap o Jesus Kristeste kek doosh hi.
Hakeno, kai o tchilatchepen krella, djiwell gar pal o Debleskro tchatchepen. Un kowa, kai djiwell gar pal o Debleskro tchatchepen, anell doosh ap peste.
Tumer djinenna, kai o Jesus Kristo was, te lell lo ko tchilatcho koowa krik, hoi kram. Tumer djinenn ninna, kai an leste kek tchilatchepen hi.
Hakeno, kai atchell o Jesus Kristeha khetne, djiwell gar an o tchilatchepen. Koon an o tchilatchepen djiwella, kowa djinell tchi o Jesus Kristestar, un haiwas les gar.

Tchowale, mukenn tumen kekestar o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell! Tumer hunte djinenna, kolla, kai krenna, hoi tchatcho hi glan o Debleskre jaka, kolla hi an o tchatchepen tardo glan o Debleste jaake har o Jesus an o tchatchepen tardo hi glan o Debleste.
Kolla, kai djiwenn an o tchilatchepen, kolla hi o bengestar. O beng krella o tchilatchepen jaake raha, har job koi hi. Doleske was o Debleskro tchawo ap kai phub, te phagell lo o bengeskri soor.
Kolla, kai o Debleskre tchawe hi, djiwenn gar an o tchilatchepen. O Debleskre tchawen hi o Debleskro djipen an lende. Un jon nai djiwenn gar an o tchilatchepen.

Hakeno, kai gar kowa krella, hoi hi tchatcho glan o Debleskre jaka, kowa hi gar o Deblestar. Witar gar hi kowa o Deblestar, kai peskro phrales gar o djijestar kamella. Ap kowa dikell hakeno, koon o Debleskre tchawe hi, un koon o bengeskre tchawe hi.
Ko lab, hoi tumer shunan, har patslo wan, hi kowa: Mer patsle hunte kamas men jek o wawares o djijestar.

Mer hunte was gar har o Kain. Kowa his o bengestar un maras peskro phrales. Hoske maras lo les? Leskro phraal kras, hoi latcho his. Un o Kain kras, hoi tchilatcho his. Doleske maras o Kain peskro phrales.
Mire phrala, krenn kek bare jaka, te hi i menshe ap kai phub chojedo ap tumende!

Mer hams mulo, kanna djiwah. Hoske djinah kowa? Mer kamah i patslen o djijestar. Kowa sikrell mende, kai wam dran o merepen an o djipen. Koon o wawar patsles gar kamella, kowa hi mulo un atchell mulo.
Djinenn, hakeno, kai hi krell peskro phraleske tchilatchepen, kowa hi har jek, kai marell peskro phrales. Un kowa, kai marell peskro phrales, koles hi gar ko djipen an leste, hoi gar pre-herella.
O Jesus sikras mende, har o Debleskro kamlepen hi. Job mukas peskro djipen menge. Jaake mukas mer ninna maro djipen i patslenge.
Te hi jek brawelo, un dikell, kai peskro phrales gar doha djipaske hi, un job dell les tchi, jaake nai atchell gar o Debleskro kamlepen an leste.
Mire tchawe, mer te kras gar bare laba te penah, kai kamah i menshen i djijestar. Na-a, o tchatcho kamlepen dikenn le ap kowa, hoi jek o wawareske krella.
Te kamah i menshen jaake, djinah, kai ham an o tchatchepen. Jaake hunte trashas gar o Deblestar.
Ninna te penell menge maro dji: "Tu djiwal gar jaake, har hunte wess," palle hi o Dewel bareder har maro dji, un djinell lauter.
Latche phrala un phenja, te penell menge maro dji gar, te lam doosh ap mende, hi men kek traash, te was glan o Debleste.
Un lauter, hoi mer lestar mangah, kowa lah mer, te rikrah men ap kowa, hoi job menge penas, un djiwah jaake, har job kamella.
Un kawa kamell o Dewel mendar: te patsas mer ap leskro tchaweste, o Jesus Kristeste, un te kamas men, jek o wawares o djijestar, jaake har o Jesus Kristo les menge penas.
Koon kowa krella, hoi job menge penas, kowa atchell o Debleha khetne. Un o Dewel atchell leha khetne. O Dewel das men peskro Ducho. Un kowa sikrell mende, te hi o Dewel mentsa.

Latche phrala un phenja, ma patsenn hakenes, koon penella, te hi les o Debleskro Ducho! Dikenn ap leskro rakepen, te djinenn tumer, te well kowa tchatchepaha o Deblestar! Bud chochene rakepangre nashenn ap i phub trujal. Kolla penenna i menshenge, te well lengro rakepen o Deblestar. Kowa hi gar tchatcho.
Har nai djinah, te hi o Debleskro Ducho an jekeste? Hakeno, kai penell glan i menshende, kai o Jesus Kristo was i mensho dran mass un rat, koles hi o Debleskro Ducho.
Koon kowa buchoste della, an koleste hi gar o Debleskro Ducho. Jaake rakrell o chocheno, kai hadell pes pral o Jesus Kristeste. Tumer shunan, kai kowa wella. Job hi kanna ap kai phub.
Mire tchawe, tumer han o Deblestar, un han sorleder har kol chochene rakepangre. O Debleskro Ducho, kai an tumende hi, hi sorleder har o beng, kai an i menshende hi, kai o Debles gar prindjrenna.
I chochene rakepangre hi menshe kai phubjatar. Doleske rakrenn le har i menshe, kai prindjrenn o Debles gar. Un i menshe shunenn ap lende.

Mer ham o Deblestar, un hakeno, koon o Debles prindjrella, shunell ap mende. Koon hi gar o Deblestar, kowa shunell gar ap mende. Doleske djinah mer, kones o Debleskro Ducho hi, kai rakrell o tchatchepen, un kones o chocheno ducho hi.

Latche phrala un phenja, o djijeskro kamlepen wella o Deblestar. Doleske hunte well men i dji mare phralenge un phenjenge an o patsepen. Kolen, kai hi i dji i wawarenge, kolla hi o Debleskre tchawe, un prindjrenn o Debles.
O Dewel hi pherdo djijeskro kamlepen. Kones kek dji o wawareske hi, kowa prindjrell o Debles gar.
O Dewel sikras men peskro kamlepen, har bitchras lo peskro tchawes ap kai phub, te las mer lestar o tchatcho djipen.
