Kawa hi o Debleskro kamlepen: Hi gar jaake, kai mer kamam o Debles. Na-a, job kamas men, un bitchras peskro tchawes, te lell job mari doosh ap peste.
Latche phrala un phenja, o Debles hi sawo baro dji menge. Doleske hunte well men ninna i baro dji mare phralenge un phenjenge an o patsepen.
Kek mensho dikas o Debles. Te hi men i dji i wawar patslenge, atchell o Dewel mentsa. Un leskro tselo kamlepen hi an mende.
O Dewel das men peskro Ducho. Ap kowa haiwah mer, kai o Dewel mentsa hi, un mer leha ham.
Mer dikam, kai o Dewel, maro dad, peskro tchawes bitchras. Doleske penah mer i menshenge, kai job kowa hi, kai lell len win dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen.
Koon glan i menshende penella, kai o Jesus o Debleskro tchawo hi, koleha atchell o Dewel, un job atchell o Debleha.

Mer haiwam ko tchatcho kamlepen, hoi o Debles menge hi. Un mer patsah, te kamell men o Dewel tchatchepaha! O Dewel hi pherdo kamlepen. Koon an o Debleskro kamlepen atchella, kowa atchella o Debleha, un o Dewel atchell leha.

Mer te ham pherdo Debleskro kamlepen, palle hi men buder kek daar glan o Debleste ap ko diwes, kai o Dewel o tchatchepen wi-rakrella pral i tsele menshende. Ninna te ham mer kanna ap kai phub, ham mer o Debleha khetne, jaake har o Jesus Kristo o Debleha khetne hi.
Kones o Debleskro kamlepen an peste hi, koles hi kek traash. O Debleskro kamlepen tradell i traash win. Koon trashella, te nai lell lo i phagi, koles hi gar o tselo Debleskro kamlepen an peste.
O Dewel kamas men o djijestar. Doleske kamah mer o Debles un i menshen ninna.

Te penell jek: "Me kamau o Debles," un krell peskro phraleske tchilatchepen, kowa hi i chocheno. Job kamell gar peskro phrales, koles job nai dikella. Har nai kamell lo o Debles, koles job nai gar dikella?
Kawa hi, hoi o Jesus menge penas: Koon o Debles kamella, kowa hunte kamell ninna peskro phrales o tselo djijestar.
Kolla, kai patsenna, kai o Jesus o baro rai hi, kolestar o Dewel penas, te well job, kolla hi o Debleskre tchawe. Un hakeno, kai kamell o dades, kowa kamell ninna leskre tchawen.
Kawa haiwam: Mer te kamah o Debles tchatchepaha, un krah, hoi job penella, palle kamah leskre tchawen ninna.
Maro kamlepen o Debleske sikrell pes, te krah mer kowa, hoi job menge penella. Un kowa, hoi job menge penella te kras, kowa hi gar pharo.

Hoske? Kolla, kai o Debleskre tchawe hi, hunte krenn buder gar ko tchilatcho koowa, hoi i menshe ap kai phub krenna. Maro patsepen hi mari soor pral o tchilatcho koowa, hoi i menshe ap kai phub krenna.
Awa, kowa, kai patsella, kai o Jesus o Debleskro tchawo hi, koles hi i soor pral o tchilatcho koowa, hoi i menshe krenna.

O Jesus Kristo was pash mende. Job was o Debleske an o pani thodo, un meras ap o trushel. Har meras lo, ratas lo peskro rat. Hi gar kokres leskro thopen an o pani, na-a, ninna leskro rat sikrell mende, kai job o Debleskro tchawo hi. Un o Debleskro Ducho penell menge kowa ninna. Un o Debleskro Ducho penell o tchatchepen.
Kolla hi triin, kai sikrenn mende, kai o Jesus o Debleskro tchawo hi:
O Debleskro Ducho, ko pani un ko rat. Hake triin penenn ko jek koowa.

Te shunah mer ap i menshende un patsah, hoi jon penenna, hoske patsah gar, hoi o Dewel penella? Kowa, hoi o Dewel penella, hi bareder har kowa, hoi i menshe penenna. Un o Dewel penas, kai o Jesus Kristo peskro tchawo hi.

Koon ap o Debleskro tchaweste patsella, kowa djinella an peskro dji, kai hi kowa tchatcho, hoi o Dewel pral o Jesus Kristeste penas. Koon o Debles gar patsella un leskre laba gar patsella, hoi o Dewel pral peskro tchaweste penas, kowa penella, te chochas o Dewel.
O Dewel penas tchatchepaha, te dell lo men ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Un ko djipen hi an peskro tchaweste.
Kones o tchawo an peskro dji hi, koles hi ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella. Kones o Debleskro tchawo gar an peskro dji hi, koles hi ko djipen gar.
Me tchinom tumenge, te djinenn tumer, kai tumen ko djipen hi, hoi gar pre-herella. Ko djipen hi kolenge, kai ap o Debleskro tchaweste patsenna.
Ko jek djinah: Te mangah o Deblestar tchomone, jaake har job kowa kamella, jaake shunell lo men.
Un te djinah mer, kai job men shunella, djinah mer ninna, kai job men kowa das, hoi mer lestar mangam.

Te dikeh tu, te kras i wawar patslo i tchilatcho koowa, palle hunte mangess tu o Debles leske! Un o Dewel dell les o djipen. Della ninna i doosh, hoi anell an o merepen. Un me penau gar, te mangess tu o Debles kolenge, kai koi doosh ap pende lan.
Hako kopo, kai mer i tchilatcho koowa krah, anah mer doosh ap mende. Gar haki doosh anell i menshen an o merepen.
Mer djinah, o Debleskre tchawe atchenn gar ap i tchilatcho drom. O Debleskro tchawo dell garda ap lende. Un o beng nai krell len tchi.
Mer djinah, kai ham o Deblestar. I tsele wawar menshe ap i phub hi an o bengeskro wast.

Mer djinah, kai o Debleskro tchawo ap kai phub was, te krell lo mare jaka pre, te prindjras o tchatcho Debles. Un jaake har mer ham khetne o Debleskro Tchaweha, o Jesus Kristeha, jaake ham khetne o tchatcho Debleha. O Jesus Kristo hi o tchatcho Dewel. Un job dell ko djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
Doleske, mire tchawe, denn jak, te mangenn o tchatcho Debles kokres an un kek wawares!

Me, i phureder mank i patslende, tchinau ap koi rajetsa, kolat o Dewel peske win rodas, un ap lakre tchawende. Me kamau tumen o tselo djijestar, un gar me kokres, ninna kol wawar, kai prindjrenn o tchatchepen, kamenn tumen o djijestar.
O tchatchepen atchell an mende, un hi pash mende hako tsiro. Doleske kamah tumen o djiestar.
Latchepen, kamlepen un bacht tumenge! Kowa dell men o Dewel, maro dad, un leskro tchawo, o Jesus Kristo, an o dji. Un jaake atchah mer khetne an o Debleskro tchatchepen un kamlepen.
Me homs bachtelo, kai hatsom menshe tumendar, kai an o tchatchepen djiwenna, jaake har o Dewel, maro dad, kowa kamella.
Romnija, kanna tchinau tuke un tire tchawenge i lab, hoi hi tumenge kek newo lab. Tumer shunan les, har wan patslo. Mangau tumendar, te kamell jek o wawares o djijestar!
Te krah mer kowa, hoi o Dewel penas, sikrah mer, kai kamah les. Un kowa, hoi job penas, te kras, shunan tumer, har wan patsle.

Bud chochene sikepangre nashenn ap i phub trujal, kai kamenn i patslen o tchatcho dromestar tele te anell. Jon penenna, kai was o Jesus Kristo gar i mensho dran mass un rat. Kol sikepangre wenna gar o Deblestar. Jaake har jon rakrenna, jaake rakrell ninna ko chocheno, kai hadell pes pral o Jesus Kristeste.
Denn jak, te nashrenn gar kowa, hoi mer tumen sikram, te well tumen ninna ko tselo brawlepen, hoi o Dewel kamell tumen te dell.

Hakeno, koon atchell gar pash kol laba, hoi o Jesus Kristo menge penas, un penell wawar koowa, kowa atchella gar o Debleha. Kowa, kai atchell pash kol laba, hoi o Jesus Kristo menge penas, kowa atchell o Debleha, maro dadeha, un peskro Tchaweha.
Te well jek pash tumende, un penell tumenge wawar koowa har kowa, hoi o Jesus Kristo menge penas, koles lenn gar an tumaro kheer! Parkrenn les witar gar!
Koon les parkrella, koles hi ninna doosh ap leskro tchilatcho koowa, hoi job krella.
Me nai penoms tumenge gomme bud. Kowa kamau gar lauter an i liil te tchinell. Shukeder wals, te nai woms pash tumende, un rakroms tumentsa, te wenn mare djia pherdo bacht.
I tchawe tiri wi-rodedi phenjatar, penenn tuke latche laba.
Me, i phureder mank i patslende, tchinau tuke, latcho Gajo, kau liil. Me kamau tut o tselo djijestar.
Latcho phraal, me mangau o Debles, te djal tuke mishto, un te wess sasto jaake, har sasto hal an tiro patsepen.
Bachtelo homs, har mare phrala wan un mange penan, har tu ap o tchatcho drom djah, un pal o tchatchepen djiweh.
Pral kek wawar koowa hom jaake bachtelo, har te shunap, kai mire tchawe ap o tchatcho drom djana.
Latcho phraal, tu kreh i latchi budi tire phralenge, ninna te prindjreh len gar.
Jon penan tutar glan i patslende, kai kate khetne wenna, hawo baro kamlepen tut hi. Jon te djan ap pengro drom dureder, de len chapen un pipen peha, jaake har kowa glan o Debleskre jaka mishto hi.
Jon kran pen ap o drom, te penenn le i menshenge o Jesus Kristestar. Un jon lenn tchi kolendar, kai les gar prindjrenna.
Doleske hunte das mer sawe phralen kowa, hoi len hunte well djipaske. Jaake budrah mer lentsa, te well o Debleskro tchatchepen i menshenge penlo.
Me tchinom i tikno liil ap i patslende, kai kote khetne wenna, kai hal. Jek lendar hi o Diotrefes. Kowa kamell o pralstuno mashkral lende te well, un shunell gar ap mande.

Te wau me pash tumende, penau me leske, hoi job lauter kras. Job anell o chochepen pral mende pre. Un kowa hi leske gar doha. Job lell gar i patsle phralen pre, kai wenna pash leste. Un kolla, kai kamenn len pash pende pre te lell, kolenge penell lo, te krenn le kowa gar, un witsrell len dran i kangri win.
Latcho phraal, ma kre o tchilatchepen palla! Kre o latchepen! Kowa, kai krell latcho koowa, well o Deblestar. Kowa, kai o tchilatchepen krella, kowa prindjrell o Debles gar.

O Demetrio krell o latchepen. Lauter rakrenn mishto pral leste. Un leskro djipen sikrella, te hi lo an o tchatchepen tardo. Mer ninna penah, kai kowa, hoi job krella, mishto hi. Un tu djineh, kai kowa, hoi mer penah, tchatcho hi.
Me hunte penoms tuke jaake bud. Kowa kamau gar lauter an i liil te tchinell.
Wals mishto, te dikams men jaake sik, har djala. Koi rakrams nai pral lauter.
O Debleskri bacht tuke! Kol mala pash mande penenn tuke "Atch maro Debleha!" Pen latche laba mandar mire malenge, kai pash tute hi, pen kowa hakeneske peskro labeha!"

Me, o Judas, tchinau kau liil ap tumende, kolen o Dewel peske win rodas. Job hi tumaro dad un kamell tumen o djijestar. Un o Jesus Kristo dell garda ap tumende. Me hom o Jesus Kristeskro budepaskro un o Jakobeskro phraal.
O Debleskro kamlepen, bacht un latchepen well bud un budeder pral tumende!

Mire phrala un phenja, his i tsiro, kai kamoms tumenge an i liil te tchinell, har latcho o Dewel ap mende hi, te las lo men dran o tchilatchepen wi. Pral kowa kamau me kanna buder gar te tchinell. Kanna dikau, hi feteder, te tchinap tumenge, te atchenn soreles an o patsepen. Ma mukenn tumen o Debleskro dromestar tele te anell! Leskro lab, hoi tumenge penlo was, atchell tchatcho hako tsiro.

Me shunom, hi menshe koi, hoi tchorchanes mank tumende wan. Kolla kamenn o Deblestar tchi djinell. Jon penenn, te hi o Dewel latcho, un te nai krenn le lauter, hoi jon kamenna. Jaake djiwenn le i wi-ladjedo djipen, un denn maro rajes, o Jesus Kristes, buchoste. Kowa kokres hi maro rai. Glan i raha tsiro hi tchindlo, te lenn jon pengri phagi.
Ninna te djinenn tumer kowa lauter, kamau, te bistrenn gar, har o Dewel, maro rai, peskre menshen dran o them Egiptia win las. Un ap i wawar tsiro maras lo kolen, hoi gar patsan.

Ma bistrenn witar gar kol bolepangren, kai dan gar garda ap koi budi, hoi o Dewel len das, un mukan pengro kheer an o bolepen. Kolen pandas lo i shellentsa, hoi kek tsireske buder pre kerdo wenn. Un job rikrell len stildo an i kali rat, bis te well ko baro diwes, kai i phagi pral lende wi-rakedo wella.

Jaake lan ninna kol menshe i phagi, kai djiwan an i forja Sodom un Gomorra un an kol forja trul lende. Jon kran wi-ladjedo koowa har kol bolepangre un djan wawar mass palla. I phagi, hoi pral kol menshende was, sikrell mende, hoi kolenge djal, kai sawo koowa krenna. Jon djan an i jag, hoi hako tsiro chatchella.
Un jaake hi ninna kolla, kai dikenn sunja, un krenn wi-ladjedo koowa, un kamenn kek rajes pral pende, un rakrenn djungeles pral kolende an o bolepen.

O Debleskro baro bolepaskro, leskro lab hi Michael, las peske gar win, te praassell lo o benges, har job tchingras pes o bengeha, koon lendar lals o mulo Moses. Job penas leske kokres: "O Dewel, maro rai, dell tut i phagi!"
Kolla menshe praassenn lauter, hoi le gar prindjrenna. Kowa, hoi lengro mass kamella, kowa krenn le jaake har i fiche, kai tchi djinenna. Un jaake djan le nashedo.

Bibacht well ap lende! Jon djan ap o tchilatcho drom, kai ninna o Kain djas. Un i lowenge anenn le doosh ap pende, jaake har o Bileam kras. Un jaake har o Korach merenn le. O Korach hadas pes peskre menshentsa pral o Debleskre murshende.

Kol menshenge hunte ladjenn tumen. Te wenn tumer khetne, te pijenn un te chan, palle chan jon pen thules pash tumende un ladjenn pen gar. Jon dikenn ap pende kokres, te djal lenge kokres mishto. Jon krenn bare laba, hoi tchi moldo hi. Jon hi har ruka, ap kolende tchi baro wella, witar kek patria, un kai hi tseles mulo un wenn tele dino.

Jon hi har diwje panja, hoi witsrenn pengro tchik, hoi an lende hi, win ap i phub glan lende. Jon hi har bolepangre momlia, hoi dran pengro drom win djan, un hunte djan kanna hako tsireske an i kali rat.
Glan i raha tsiro penas pral lende o Henoch, kowa his o eftato dad pal o Adam: Dikenn, o Dewel, maro rai, well dran o bolepen. Un bud serja bolepangre hi pash leste.
Job well, te rakrell lo o tchatchepen wi pral i tsele menshende, un te dell lo kolen i phagi, kai djan gar ap o Debleskro drom un kran gar, hoi job kamas, un tchingran ap leste tchilatche labentsa.

Kolla hi sawe menshe, kolenge kowa gar mishto doha hi, hoi o Dewel len das. Un jon choirenn pen, kai lenge gar feteder djal. Jon djiwenn pal pengro shero. Jon hi sharede, kai rakrenn shukar labentsa i menshentsa, te lenn le lendar latcho koowa.
Tumer, mire prala un phenja, ma bistrenn kol laba, hoi tumenge kolla penan, kolen maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, bitchras, te penenn le i menshenge leskre laba.
Jon penan: Glan ko tsiro, kai maro rai Jesus pale wella, wenna sawe menshe, hoi san pral o Debleskro koowa, un djiwenn jaake, har jon kamenna un krenn, hoi o Dewel gar kamella.
An lengro shero hi phubjakro koowa. Un an lengro dji hi gar o Debleskro Ducho. Kolla anenn tchingepen un krenn, te rikrenn i patsle buder gar khetne.
Tumer, mire phrala un phenja, atchenn soreles an tumaro patsepen, hoi das tumen o Dewel. Un mangenn les jaake, har leskro Ducho an tumende kamell.
Un rikrenn tumen an o Debleskro kamlepen! Un dikenn ap maro rajeste, o Jesus Kristeste! Kowa hi jaake latcho ap mende, te dell lo men o djipen, hoi gar pre-herella.
Awenn latches ap kol menshende, kai djinenn gar, hoi te patsenn, un jek kopo kawa patsenn un ko wawar kopo kowa. Krenn lengre djia soreles!

Wawar nashran pen. Kolen anenn ap o tchatcho drom! Kowa hi jaake har te tsardans len dran i jag win. Wawar djiwenn i djungelo djipen. Rakrenn ninna kolenge latches an o dji! Un denn garda, te krenn gar kowa, hoi jon krenna. Lengro djipen hi har i tchiklo ripen ap lende.
Maro Debles hi i soor, te rikrell lo tumen ap leskro drom, te hatsell lo kek doosh ap tumende ap ko diwes, kai han glan leste tardo, un dikenn leskro railepen, un han bachteles.

Sharas koles, kai kokres o Dewel hi! Job las men dran o tchilatchepen win, har maro rai, o Jesus Kristo, menge meras. Maro Dewel hi o baro rai. Les hi i tseli soor kanna un glan kau tsiro un an ko tsiro, hoi wella. Amen.

An kau liil hi kowa tchindlo, hoi o Dewel mukas o Jesus Kristes te dikell, te sikrell job peskre budepangren, hoi an i tikno tsiro hunte wella. Un o Jesus Kristo bitchras peskro bolepaskres pash mande, te sikrell lo mande kawa lauter. Me, o Johanni, hom leskro budepaskro
un tchinom kowa, hoi o Jesus Kristo mande sikras, an kau liil. Kolla laba wenna o Deblestar. Lauter, hoi dikom, tchinom pre.
Bachtelo hi kowa, kai drawerell kal laba. Un bachtele hi kolla, kai shunenn kal laba, un rikrenn len an pengre djia. O tsiro hi gar dur, kai kawa lauter wella.

Me, o Johanni, tchinau kau liil ap i tsele patslende, kai an i efta forja an o them Asia khetne wenna. Latchepen un bacht tumenge! Kowa dell tumen o Dewel! Job djiwella hako tsiro: kanna un an ko tsiro, hoi his un hoi wella! Latchepen un bacht tumenge! Kowa dell tumen o Debleskro Ducho! Kowa hi har efta jaga glan o Debleskro beshepaskro tardo.

Latchepen un bacht tumenge! Kowa dell tumen o Jesus Kristo! Job sikrell i menshende o tchatcho drom pash o Debleste. Un job hi o glanstuno lauterendar, kai stenn i mulendar pre un wenn djido. Un job hi ninna o rai pral i tsele raja ap kai phub! Job kamell men o tselo djijestar, un las men dran mari doosh win, un plaissras menge peskro rateha.
Job kras men raja un rashaja o Debleske, peskro dadeske. Leske hi o railepen un i soor kanna un hako tsireske! Amen.

Dikenn, job wella dran o bolepen, un hakeno dikell les, ninna kolla, kai les ap o trushel dan. Un an hake themma rowenn le pral leste, un penenn le: "Patsams mer ap leste!" Awa, jaake hunte well kowa. Amen.
O baro Dewel penella: "Mandar was halauter. Un lauter wella pale glan mande. Man hi i tseli soor, un djiwau hako tsireske: kanna un an ko tsiro, hoi his un hoi wella."

Me, o Johanni, hom tumaro phraal an o patsepen ap o Jesuseste. Job hi miro baro rai har job tumaro baro rai hi. Jaake har tumer wenn leske palla lino, wom me ninna leske palla lino un dom miro patsepen gar pre. Me penom i menshenge o Debleskro lab, un sikrom lende o Jesuseskro drom. Doleske wom stildo un anlo ap ko them Patmos, kai an o baro pani tchiddo hi.
Ap o Debleskro diwes was o Debleskro Ducho soreles pral mande. Un me shunom pal mande i sorelo rakepen. Kowa his har i gole, hoi dell i bashepaskri, kai phurdeh dre.
Un ko rakepen penas: "Tchin an i liil, hoi tu dikeh! Un bitche ko liil ap kol patslende, kai an kol efta forja khetne wenna: Efesus, Smirna, Pergamon, Tiatira, Sardes, Filadelfia un Laodicea!"
Un me risrom man trujal, te dikap koles, kai ap mande rakras. Un har risrom man trujal, dikom efta sonakangre momlia.
Un mashkral lende his jek tardo, hoi wi-dikas har i mensho. Les his i lengsto ripen ap leste, un i sonakaskri dori trul leskro betch.
Leskre balla ap o shero his parno har i bakrengre balla, har gib. Un leskre jaka chatchan har i jag.
Un leskre herja his har dran sonakai, hoi an o bob chatchedo un thodo wella. Un leskro rakepen his har i gole i baro panjestar, hoi dur tele perella.
Un an leskro tchatcho wast his les efta bolepangre momlia. Un dran leskro mui was i charo, hoi ap dui riga nai tchinella. Un leskro mui his har o kham.
Un har dikom les, perom glan leskre herja khetne, har woms mulo. Un job tchiwas peskro tchatcho wast ap mande, un penas: "Ma dare! Mandar was halauter. Un lauter wella pale glan mande.
Me hom o djido. Un me homs mulo, un kanna hom djido un djiwau hako tsireske. Man hi i soor pral o merepen. Un man hi o klidepaskro an o mulengro them.
Tchin lauter, hoi dikal, an i liil: kowa, hoi kanna hi, un kowa, hoi pal kowa lauter wella.

Me kamau te haiwess, hoi kol efta bolepangre momlia hi, hoi tu an miro tchatcho wast dikal. Te haiwess ninna, hoi kol sonakangre momlia hi! Kol efta bolepangre momlia hi o Debleskre budepangre, kai denn jak ap i patslende, kai an i efta forja khetne wenna. Un i efta sonakangre momlia hi i patsle, kai wenn khetne an i efta forja."

"Tchin kau liil ap o Debleskro budepaskro, kai dell jak ap i patslende an o foro Efesus: Kawa penell kowa, kai rikrell kol efta bolepangre momlia an peskro tchatcho wast, un kai djal mashkral kol efta sonakangre momlia trujal.

Me prindjrau lauter, hoi tumer mange kran, tumari tseli phari budi. Tumer dan tumaro patsepen gar pre. Un tumer mukenn gar tchilatche menshe mashkral tumende te well. Un tumer lan kolen an o jak, hoi penan, te hi le o Jesuseskre bitchepangre, un jon hi kowa gar. Un tumer haiwan, te chochan le.
Tumer dan tumaro patsepen gar pre, un lan i pharo djipen mange ap tumende, un tumer wan gar khino an tumari budi mange.
Jek koowa hi pash tumende, hoi hi gar mishto: Tumer kamenn man buder gar o tselo djijestar, jaake har kowa his ap ko tsiro, har tumer patslo wan. Tumaro dji mukas man.

Mukenn tumenge kowa an o shero te djal, har dur tumer mandar tele peran. Awenn pale o tselo djijeha pash mande! Djiwenn ko djipen, hoi djiwan, har tumaro patsepen ap mande tarno his. Te krenn kowa gar, palle wau, un lau tumari momeli krik, un tchiwrau lat ap i rig.
Kate hi tchomone, hoi tumer krenn latches. Tumer kamenn gar, hoi kol Nikolarja krenna, jaake har me kowa witar gar kamau.

Shunenn halauter mishto, hoi o Debleskro Ducho penella ap i patslende! Kowa, kai hi sorleder har o tchilatchepen, koles dau te chal ko rukestar, hoi o djipen della, kowa, hoi tardo hi an o Debleskri shukar baar."
"Tchin kau liil ap o Debleskro budepaskro, kai dell jak ap i patslende an o foro Smirna: Kawa penell kowa, hoi hi o glanstuno un o palstuno, hoi mulo his, un djido was.

Me djinau, te lenn le tumen palla. Ninna djinau, har tchorwelo han. Tchatchepaha han tumer brawelo! Me djinau ninna, te rakrenn kolla djungeles pral tumende, kai penenn pendar, te hi le Debleskre menshe. Jon hi kek Debleskre menshe. Na-a, jon hi bengeskre menshe.

Ma darenn kol duka, hoi ap tumende wenna! O beng mukell menshen tumendar an o stilepen te witsrell, te well diklo, har sorelo tumaro patsepen ap mande hi. Un tumer wenn deesh diwessa palla lino. Atchenn soreles an tumaro patsepen ap mande, ninna te marenn le tumen! Palle dau tumen ko shukar koowa, hoi kolla lenna, kai hi i sorleder an o kurepen. Un kowa hi o djipen, hoi atchella.
Shunenn halauter mishto, hoi o Debleskro Ducho penella ap i patslende! Kolla, kai soreles an o patsepen atchan, un gar pre dan, kolla merenn gar o duito kopo."
"Tchin kau liil ap o Debleskro budepaskro, kai dell jak ap i patslende an o foro Pergamon: Kawa penell kowa, koles o charo hi, hoi ap dui riga tchinella.

Me djinau, tumer djiwenn kote, kai o beng o rai pral i menshende hi. Tumer rikrenn soreles ap mande, un mukan o patsepen gar, ninna an kol diwessa, har was o Antipas maredo, har job i menshenge mandar rakras an tumaro foro, kai o beng djiwella.

I tikno koowa pash tumende hi gar mishto. Mashkral tumende hi sawe menshe, kai djan ap ko drom, koles o Bileam glan i raha tsiro i menshende sikras. Job sikras o baro rajeste pral o them Moab, - leskro lab his Balak, - har te anell lo nai i Israelitarja ap i tchilatcho drom. Jaake chan i Israelitarja ko mass kol fichendar, hoi kol wawar menshe glan lengro debleste anan. Ninna djan le pash wawar djuwjende.
Jaake hi ninna mashkral tumende sawe menshe, kai ap kowa patsenna, hoi kol Nikolarja penenn.
Krenn kanna ko tchilatcho koowa buder gar! Te mukenn tumer kowa gar, jaake wau an i tikno tsiro, un tchingrau ap kolende, kai shunan gar ap mande. Un miro rakepen tchinella har i charo.

Shunenn halauter mishto, hoi o Debleskro Ducho penella ap i patslende! Kowa, kai hi sorleder har o tchilatchepen, koles dau ko maro dran o bolepen te chal, hoi kharella Manna. Ninna dau les i parno bar. Ap koleste hi o newo lab tchindlo, koles kek prindjrell, har kowa, kai les lella."
"Tchin kau liil ap o Debleskro budepaskro, kai dell jak ap i patslende an o foro Tiatira: Kawa penell o Debleskro tchawo, koles hi jaka har i jag, un herja har sonakai.

Me prindjrau lauter, hoi tumer mange krenn. Tumer kamenn man o djijestar, un rikrenn soreles ap mande. Me prindjrau lauter, hoi tumer tumare phralenge krenna. Un tumer wan gar khino an tumaro patsepen. Kowa, hoi tumer kanna krenna, hi ninna budeder har kowa, hoi kran, har patslo wan.

Jek koowa hi gar mishto pash tumende. Tumer mukenn koi djuwel Isebel te rakrell, hoi joi kamella, koja, hoi penell, te hi li o Debleskri rakepaskretsa. Joi tsardell mire budepangren o Debleskro dromestar tele un penell lenge, te nai djan i mursha pash wawar djuwjende, un i djuwja pash wawar murshende. Ninna penell li lenge, te nai chan le ko mass, hoi wawar menshe glan lengro debleste anan.
Me dom lat tsiro, te nai mukell li peskro tchilatcho drom. Un joi kamell gar peskro djungelo koowa te mukell.
Doleske witsrau lat ap o nasslengro tchiben. Un kolla, kai laha sowan, jon te mukenn kowa gar, palle anau bare duka ap lende.

Un kolakre tchawen dau mulo. Palle haiwenn i tsele patsle, te hom me kowa, kai lauter prindjrella, hoi i menshen an o shero un an o dji hi. Un hakeno, kai tchilatcho koowa kras, kowa lell mandar koi phagi pal kowa, hoi job kras.
Tumer wawar patsle an o foro Tiatira, kai gar pal kol chochene laba djiwan, un ko bengeskro drom gar prindjrenna, ap tumende penau me: Me penau tumenge tchi wawar koowa, hoi tumer hunte krenna,
har kowa, te rikrenn mire laba soreles an tumare djia, jaake raha bis te wau pale.
Kowa, kai hi sorleder har o tchilatchepen, un krell lauter, hoi me kamau, jaake raha har djiwell lo, koleste dau i soor, te well lo rai pral i menshende an i wawar themma.
Job anell len i sasterno wasteha un dell lauteren paash, kai gar ap leste shunenna, jaake har tchare paash dino wenna.
Jaake har das man miro dad peskri soor, jaake dau me koles miri soor. Ninna dau les ko bolepaskri momeli, hoi djal pre taissarlake ap o bolepen.
Shunenn halauter mishto, hoi o Debleskro Ducho penella ap i patslende!"

"Tchin kau liil ap o Debleskro budepaskro, kai dell jak ap i patslende an o foro Sardes: Kawa penell kowa, koleske o Debleskro Ducho koi hi, un koles i efta bolepangre momlia an o wast hi. Me djinau lauter, hoi tumer kran. Tumer han mulo, ninna te penenn le pral tumende, te han djido.

Stenn pre o sopastar! Mashkral tumende hi gomme menshe, kai patsenn ap mande. Kolla hi gar bud. Un lengro patsepen hi tikno. Krenn lengro patsepen pale soreles! Glan miro Debleste hi kowa gar mishto doha, hoi tumer mange krenn.

Ma bistrenn, hoi tumenge penlo was un hoi shunan! Un rikrenn ap kal laba! Un awenn pale ap o tchatcho drom! Te krenn kowa gar, un stenn gar pre o sopastar, palle wau pral tumende har i tchorepaskro. Un tumer djinenn gar, hawo tsireske pale wau.

Ninna te hi gar bud patsle an o foro Sardes, kai djan ap miro drom, hi sawe patsle mank tumende, kai kran pengre koola gar tchiklo. Kolla hi moldo, te wenn le rido an parne koola, un djiwenn mantsa an o bolepen.

Koon sorleder hi har o tchilatchepen, kowa lella parne ripja. Un leskro lab lau me gar win dran o liil, kai i djide dre tchindlo hi. Ninna penau glan miro dadeste un glan leskre bolepangre, kai jon hi mire.
Shunenn halauter mishto, hoi o Debleskro Ducho penella ap i patslende!"

"Tchin kau liil ap o Debleskro budepaskro, kai dell jak ap i patslende an o foro Filadelfia: Kawa penell o Debleskro tchatchepaskro. Koles hi o Davideskro klidepaskro an o wast. Job te krell o wudar pre, palle nai krell les kek pale pandlo. Job te krell o wudar pandlo, palle nai krell les kek pre.
Me prindjrau lauter, hoi tumer mange kran. Dikenn, me krom i wudar glan tumende pre, hoi kek nai pandell. Tumen hi i tikni soor, un rikran miro lab an tumare djia, un dan man gar buchoste.

Shunenn, hoi me kol bengeskre menshentsa krau, kai chochenn un penenn pendar, te hi le o Debleskre menshe, un jon hi kek Debleskre menshe. Me krau, te wenn lendar pash tumende, te witsrenn le pen glan tumende ap i phub, un te haiwenn le, te kamau tumen o tselo djijestar.

Tumer rikran ko lab, hoi tumenge penom, un wan gar khino an o patsepen ap mande. Doleske rikrau mire wasta pral tumende an ko pharo tsiro, kai i bibacht wella pral i tsele menshende ap kai phub, te well diklo, hoi an lengre djia hi.
Me wau an i tikno tsiro pale. Rikrenn tumaro patsepen soreles, te lell kek wawar ko shukar koowa tumendar, hoi tumenge an o bolepen hi, un hoi kolla lenna, kai dan pengro patsepen gar pre.

Kowa, kai rikras peskro patsepen bis ap o merepen, dran koleste krau me jekes, kai hi har i baro bar, kai rikrell miro Debleskro kheer. Un kowa atchell koi tardo hako tsireske. Un me tchinau o lab miro Deblestar ap leste, un o lab o Debleskro forestar. Kowa hi o newo Jerusalem, hoi dran o bolepen tele wella. Un miro newo lab tchinau ninna ap leste.
Shunenn halauter mishto, hoi o Debleskro Ducho penella ap i patslende!"

"Tchin kau liil ap o Debleskro budepaskro, kai dell jak ap i patslende an o foro Laodicea: Kawa penell kowa, kai kharell Amen, un penell hako tsiro o tchatchepen, un sikrell i menshende o tchatcho drom pash o Debleste. Job his koi pashal, har o Dewel lauter kras.
Me djinau halauter, hoi tumer kran. Tumer han har i pipen, hoi hi gar shila, witar gar tato. Kamaus, te wenn tumer jek kolendar.
Tumer han paash tato. Doleske tchungrau tumen wi dran miro mui.

Tumer penenna: Mer ham brawelo, un men hi halauter; tchi hunte well men buder. Me penau tumenge: Tumer djinenn gar, te han an i bibacht, jaake te khaitenn tumer man. Tumer han tchorwelo, un nango, un korelo.

Doleske penau tumenge: Ginenn mandar sonakai, sawo sonakai, hoi an i jag thodo was, jaake te wenn tumer tchatchepaha brawelo. Ginenn mandar ninna parne ripja un riwenn kolla ap tumende, te han buder gar nango, un hunte ladjenn tumen buder gar. Un ginenn kutch djet, un makenn tumare jaka, te nai dikenn pale!
Lauteren, kai kamau o djijestar, kolende sikrau lengri doosh, un penau lenge dawentsa, te shunenn le ap mande. Mukenn kanna tumaro tchilatcho drom, un awenn pale ap miro drom!
Dikenn, me hom glan o wudar tardo, un dau ap ko wudar. Koon shunella, hoi me penau, un krell mange o wudar pre, pash koleste djau me dre, un chau leha, un job mantsa.

Kowa, kai hi sorleder har o tchilatchepen, kowa nai beshell pes mantsa ap miro rajeskro beshepaskro, jaake har me ninna homs sorleder har o tchilatchepen, un me beshom man miro dadeha ap leskro rajeskro beshepaskro.
Shunenn halauter mishto, hoi o Debleskro Ducho penella ap i patslende!"

Pal kowa dikom i wudar an o bolepen, hoi pre hi. Un kowa, kai ap mande rakras, un leskri gole sorelo har i bashepaskri his, kai phurdeh dre, kowa penas ap mande: "Ab kate pre! Me sikrau tut, hoi pal kawa wella."
Un ap jek kopo was o Debleskro Ducho soreles ap mande, un me dikom i rajeskro beshepaskro an o bolepen tardo. Un ap koleste his jek beshdo.
Leskro mui dikas jaake shukar win har kol kutch shukar barra Jaspis un Karneol. Un trul o rajeskro beshepaskro his i brishineskro bogo, kai dikas jaake win har ko shukar bar Smaragdo.

Un trul o rajeskro beshepaskro his biish-te-star wawar rajengre beshepangre tardo. Un ap kolende his biish-te-star tchatchepangre phure beshdo. Kolen his parne ripja ap lende, un i shereskro sonakai ap lengre shere.

Un kotar, kai ko rajeskro beshepaskro hi, das jag karje pral un tele, un was i bari gole win, har koi gole, hoi o bolepen krella, te dell baro brishin un te djal jag tele ap i phub. Un glan o rajeskro beshepaskro chatchan efta jaga. Kol efta jaga hi o Debleskro Ducho.

Glan o rajeskro beshepaskro his tchomone har i baro pani dran wali. Kowa his jaake djudjo, te dikenn le nai dre, har dikenn le an i wali. Trul o rajeskro beshepaskro his star sorele bolepangre, jek ap haki rig. Kolla his pherde jaka glan un palla.

Un ko glanstuno sorelo bolepaskro his har i bari margodja. Un ko duito sorelo bolepaskro his har i tarni murshkani grumni. Un ko triinto sorelo bolepaskres his i mui har i menshes hi. Un ko starto sorelo bolepaskro his har i baro tchirklo an o bolepen.

Un hakenes lendar his shob tchirklengre mussja. Kolla his dren un win pherde jaka. Un jon giwenn o tselo diwes un i tseli rat: "Baro hi o Dewel, baro hi o Dewel, baro hi o Dewel. Job hi o rai pral halauter. Hako tsiro djiwell lo, kanna, un an ko tsiro, hoi his, un hoi wella."
Un jaake sharenn kol star sorele bolepangre koles, kai ap o rajeskro beshepaskro beshdo hi, un jon hadenn les un krenn les baro, un parkrenn pen pash leste, kai djiwell hako tsireske.

Hako kopo, kai krenn le kowa, witsrenn pen kol biish-te-star tchatchepangre phure glan koleste tele, kai ap o rajeskro beshepaskro beshdo hi, un sharenn koles, koleskro djipen gar pre-herella. Un jon tchiwenn pengro sherengro sonakai glan o rajeskro beshepaskro tele, un penenna:
"Tu, o Dewel, maro rai, tu hal moldo, te less o railepen, un o sharepen, un i soor. Tu kral o bolepen un i phub. Jaake, har tu kamal, jaake kral tu kowa, un was kowa."
Un me dikom i liil an o tchatcho wast kolestar, kai ap o rajeskro beshepaskro beshdo hi. Ap ko liil his dren un win tchomone tchindlo. Un ko liil his khetne pandlo efta dorjentsa.
Un me dikom i sorelo bolepaskres, kowa das soreles gole: "Koon hi moldo, te nai krell lo ko liil pre, te dikell lo dre?"
Un an o bolepen, un ap i phub, un tel i phub his kek koi, kai hi moldo, te krell lo ko liil pre, te dikell lo dre.
Un har dikom, te his kek moldo, te krell lo ko liil pre, te dikell lo dre, koi rowom soreles.

Un jek kol tchatchepangre phurendar penas ap mande: "Ma rob! Dik, jek las i soor o Deblestar pral o tchilatchepen un o merepen, un hi moldo, te krell lo ko liil pre, te dikell lo dre. Job hi kowa, kai kharenn le lewo, kai well dran o them Juda. Job hi o Davideskro tchawo."

Un me dikom i tarno bakres pash o rajeskro beshepaskro, hoi wi-dikas, har wals lo maredo. Kowa hi tardo mashkral kol star sorele bolepangre un kol tchatchepangre phurende. Les hi efta shinga un efta jaka. Kol efta jaka hi o Debleskro Ducho, hoi pral i tseli phub win bitchedo was.
Un o tarno bakro was pash koleste, hoi ap o rajeskro beshepaskro beshdo his, un las ko liil dran leskro tchatcho wast.

Un har job las o liil, peran kol star sorele bolepangre un kol biish-te-star tchatchepangre phure glan o tarno bakro tele. Un hakenes lendar his i bashepaskri. Un jon bashran i shukar bashepen. Len his ninna sonakangre tchare pherdo gudlo kasht, hoi o Debleske chatchedo wella, un mishto sungella. Un kowa his o mangepen, hoi o Debleskre menshe pengro Deblestar mangan.

Un jon giwenn i newi gili, un penenn: Tu hal moldo, te less ko liil, un te kress ko liil pre. Tu wal maredo, un plaissral tiro rateha, te giness menshen tiro Debleske. Kolla wenna dran hako them, haki nationa, haki harmenationa un hako rakepen.
Un tu kreh lendar raja un rashaja maro Debleske. Un jon wenn raja pral i tseli phub.

Un me dikom un shunom bud bolepangren tardo trul o rajeskro beshepaskro, un trul kol star sorele bolepangre, un trul kol tchatchepangre phurende. Jon his jaake bud har deesh serja (10.000) kope deesh serja un jek sero kope jek sero.

Un jon giwenn soreles: O tarno bakro, hoi was maredo, kowa hi moldo, te well les i bari soor, ninna o brawlepen, un o goswepen, un o sharepen, un o railepen, un i gilja, hoi les hadenna, un bares krenna.

Un me shunom i gili, hoi lauter giwan, kai an o bolepen hi, un ap i phub, un tel i phub, un an o baro pani. Un jon giwenn: "Koleske, kai ap o rajeskro beshepaskro beshdo hi un ko tarno bakreske, kolenge hi i gilja, un o sharepen, un o railepen, un i soor pral lauter, kanna un hako tsireske."
Un kol star sorele bolepangre penan: Amen! Un kol tchatchepangre phure witsran pen glan o Debleste un glan o bakro tele, un sharan len.
Un me dikom, har ko tarno bakro jek kol efta dorjendar pre pandas, hoi ko liil khetne rikrenna. Un me shunom, har jek kol star sorele bolepangrendar soreles penas: "Ab!"

Un me dikom i parno grajes. Un kowa, kai pre beshdo hi, koles hi i bogo an o wast. Un les was i shereskro sonakai dino, hoi sikrella, te hi job sorleder har bud wawar bare raja. Un job djas wi an o kurepen, un was sorleder har jon halauter.
Un o bakro pandas o duiti dori pre, hoi ko liil khetne rikras. Un me shunom, har ko duito sorelo bolepaskro penas: "Ab!"
Un i wawar grai was wi. Ko grai his lolo har i jag. Un kowa, hoi pre beshdo his, koles was i soor dino, te anell lo o kurepen ap i phub, jaake te marenn pen i menshe. Un les was i baro charo dino.

Un o tarno bakro pandas i triinti dori pre, hoi ko liil khetne rikras. Un me shunom, har o triinto sorelo bolepaskro penas: "Ab!" Un me dikom i kalo grajes. Un kowa, kai pre beshdo his, koles his jek koowa an peskro wast, hoi sikrella, har pharo tchomone hi.

Un me shunom i rakepen, hoi was mashkral kote wi, kai kol star sorele bolepangre tardo hi, un penas: "Jek diwes hunte budrenn le, te ginenn le jek tcharo parno djob. Un jek diwes hunte budrenn le, te ginenn le triin tchare djob. O djet un i mool atchenna, har jon hi. Kolenge hunte plaissrenn le gar budeder."
Un o tarno bakro pandas i starti dori pre, hoi ko liil khetne rikras. Un me shunom, har o starto sorelo bolepaskro penas: "Ab!"

Un me dikom i grajes. Kowa his parno har i mulo. Un kowa, kai pre beshdo his, koleskro lab his "Mulo." Un o merepen was pal leste. Un les was i soor dino, te marell lo i menshen ap o starto kotar i phubjatar. O charo, i diwje fiche, i bok un o nasslepen marenn len.

Un o tarno bakro pandas i pantchti dori pre, hoi rikras ko liil khetne. Un me dikom kol tsele menshen, kai rikran soreles ap o Debleskro lab, un sikran i menshende o Debleskro drom, un wan doleske maredo. Jon his tardo pash o Debleskri jag.
Un dan soreles gole un penan: "Baro Dewel un tchatcho rai, ab sik un rake i phagi wi pral kolende ap i phub, kai maran men. De len ko tchilatchepen pale, hoi jon ap mende kran!"

Un hakenes lendar las i parno ripen. Un jek penas ap lende: "Mukenn tele i tikno tsiro! Tumare phrala, kai budrenn o Debleske har tumer budran, kolendar wenna ninna maredo, jaake bud har o Dewel mukell, te wenn le maredo."
Un me dikom, har o tarno bakro i shobti dori pre pandas, hoi ko liil khetne rikras. Koi trissas i phub soreles. Un o kham was kalo har i kalo gono. Un o tselo tchon was lolo har o rat.
Un i bolepangre momlia peran ap i phub, jaake har perenn i brola ap i phub tele, te phurdell i sorelo ducho an i broleskro ruk.
Un o bolepen tsardas pes khetne, har i liil, hoi khetne uledo wella. Un kek berga atchas, kai his li tardo, witar gar kek them, hoi an i pani tchiddo hi.

Un i tsele menshe khatran pen: i raja pral i themma ap i phub, i bare un i brawele, i lurdengre pralstune un wawar pralstune, ninna i budepangre un lengre raja. Jon khatran pen an i phub, un mashkral i bare barra,
un penan ap kol berge un ap kol bare barra: "Perenn ap mende, un khatrenn men kolestar, kai ap o rajeskro beshepaskro beshdo hi, un koi bari choljatar, hoi ko tarno bakres hi!
Ko baro diwes was, kai lengri choli ap mende wella. Un kek nashte nashell lengri choljatar krik."

Un pal kowa dikom me star bolepangren. Kolla his tardo ap kol star riga i phubjatar, un rikran ko sorelo ducho pale, hoi phurdell dran hake star riga pral i phub. Jon rikran les pale, te phurdell lo gar pral i phub, witar gar pral o baro pani, witar gar pral i tsele ruka.

Un me dikom i wawar bolepaskres. Kowa was kol rigatar, kai o kham pre djala. Un job kras i sikepen ap kolende, kai o djido Debleske koi hi. Un job das soreles gole ap kol star bolepangre, kolen i soor dino was, te dukrenn le i phub un o baro pani.
Un job penas ap lende: "Ma dukrenn i phub un o baro pani, witar gar i ruka, jaake raha har mer kram gar i sikepen glan ap i shere kolendar, kai maro Debleske budran."
Un me shunom kitse menshe ko sikepen lan. Kolla his jek-sheel-te-star-deesh-te-star serja menshe (144.000), kai wan dran i tsele menshendar, kai wenna pal i deesh-te-dui Israeleskre tchawende.

Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Juda. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Ruben. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Gad. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Asser. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Naftali. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Manasse. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Simeon. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Levi. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Issachar. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Sebulon. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Josef. Deesh-te-dui serja wenna dran o Benjamin.

Pal kowa dikom me bud menshen, jaake bud, te nai penell kek, kitse jon hi. Kolla wenna dran hako them, haki nationa, haki harmenationa un hako rakepen. Un jon his khetne tardo glan o rajeskro beshepaskro un glan ko tarno bakro. Len his parne ripja ap lende un bare patria an lengre wasta.
Un jon dan soreles gole: "Mer sharah maro Debles, kai ap o rajeskro beshepaskro beshdo hi un ko tarno bakres! Jon lan men win dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen."

Un i tsele bolepangre his tardo trul o rajeskro beshepaskro un trul i tchatchepangre phurende un trul i star sorele bolepangre. Un jon witsran pen glan o rajeskro beshepaskro tele o mujeha ap i phub, un sharan o Debles.

Un jon penan: "Hi mishto, te giwas mer gilja maro Debleske, hoi les hadenna, un hoi les bares krenna. Leskro railepen un goswepen hi baro. Hi mishto, te parkras men pash leste, un te sharas les. Les hi bari soor, kanna un hako tsireske. Amen!"
Un jek kol tchatchepangre phurendar putchas mandar: "Koon hi kolla, kai hi len parne ripja ap lende? Kai wan le?"

Un me penom ap leste: "Miro rai, tu djineh les." Un job penas ap mande: "Kolla wan soreles palla lino, un wan wi dran ko pharo tsiro. Un jon thowan pengre ripja, un kran len parno an o tarno bakreskro rat."

Doleske hi le tardo glan o Debleskro beshepaskro un hi leskre rashaja an leskro kheer, un hi leske koi o tselo diwes un i tseli rat. Un kowa, kai ap o Debleskro beshepaskro beshdo hi, djiwell pash lende, un dell jak ap lende.
Un jon hunte bokenn buder gar, witar gar trushenn le buder. Un o kham chatchrell len buder gar, witar kek wawar tatepen.

O tarno bakro, hoi mashkral o Debleskro beshepaskro hi, kowa dell ap lende garda, har i bakrengro rai ap peskre bakre garda della, un anell len pash o pani, hoi o djipen della. Un o Dewel khossell hake swar ap lengre jaka tele.
Un har o tarno bakro i eftati dori pre pandas, hoi ko liil khetne rikras, rakras kek buder an o bolepen. I tikno tsiro rakran le tchi buder.
Un me dikom kol efta bolepangren, kai glan o Debleskro beshepaskro tardo hi. Kolla lan efta bashepangren, te phurdenn le dre.

Un i wawar bolepaskro was, un djas pash o Debleskri jag. Les his i sonakaskro tcharo an o wast, an koleste gudlo kasht chatchedo wella, hoi mishto sungella. Un ko bolepaskro las bud gudlo kasht, te chatchrell lo les ap o Debleskro sonakaskro bob, hoi glan o Debleskro beshepaskro tardo hi, te well o latcho sungepen khetne o mangepaha, hoi o Debleskre tchawe o Deblestar mangan.
Un ko latcho sungepen hadas pes pre dran leskro wast, un djas glan o Debleste khetne o mangepaha kol Debleskre menshendar.

Un ko bolepaskro las ko tcharo, an koleste ko gudlo kasht chatchedo wella, un kras les pherdi jag, hoi job dran o Debleskri jag las, un tchoras o tcharo wi ap i phub. Koi das jag karje pral un tele, un das bari soreli gole, har koi gole, hoi o bolepen krella, te dell baro brishin, un te djal jag tele ap i phub. Un i phub trissas soreles.
Un kol efta bolepangre, kai his len kol efta bashepangre, lan len an i wasta, te phurdenn le dre.

Un o glanstuno phurdas an peskri bashepaskri. Koi das brishin, hoi his har barra, un jag o rateha mashkral ap i phub. Un o triinto kotar i tseli phubjatar chatchras, un o triinto kotar i tsele rukendar chatchras, ninna o tselo senlepen.
Un o duito bolepaskro phurdas an peskri bashepaskri. Koi was i bari kotar bar, hoi chatchella, an o baro pani witsedo. Un o triinto kotar o tselo baro panjestar was har o rat.
Koi meras o triinto kotar lauterestar, hoi an o baro pani djiwas. Ninna hako triinto panjeskro ulepaskro djas paash.

Un ko triinto bolepaskro phurdas an peskri bashepaskri: Un i bolepaskri momeli chatchas har jag, un peras tele ap i phub. Un koja peras ap o triinto kotar hako lengsto panjestar, ninna ap ko pani, hoi wella dran i phub wi.
Un koi bolepaskri momeli kharell shut. Un o triinto kotar kol panjestar was shutlo. Un bud kol menshendar, kai pijan ko pani, meran lestar.

Un o starto bolepaskro phurdas an peskri bashepaskri. Un o kham las i dab, un o triinto kotar lestar was kalo. Ninna o tchon un i wawar bolepangre momlia lan i dab. Un o triinto kotar lendar was kalo. Jaake chatchas o kham gar ap o triinto kotar ap o diwes, witar gar chatchan o tchon un i bolepangre momlia ap o triinto kotar an i rati.

Un me dikom dur pral ap o bolepen i baro tchirkles, un shunom, har job gole das: Bibacht, bibacht, bibacht! Te phurdenn i wawar triin bolepangre an pengre bashepangren, palle wella i bari bibacht ap kolende, kai ap i phub djiwenna.
Un o pantchto bolepaskro phurdas an peskri bashepaskri. Un me dikom i bolepaskri momeli, hoi tele ap i phub peras. Un koja kras o telstunepen pre.
Koi was i jagakri khand dran o telstunepen wi, har i jagakri khand dran i baro bob wi wella. Un koi jagakri khand hadas pes pre, un tchakras o kham un o bolepen, jaake te was rati.
Dran koi jagakri khand wan stepangre win ap i phub. Kolla lan i soor, te denn le tchurje, jaake har i skorpione denn tchurje.
Un lenge was penlo, te dukrenn le gar o senlepen ap i phub, witar gar i ruka. Jon hunte dukrenn kol menshen kokres, kai kek Debleskro sikepen glan ap lengre shere hi.
Kol menshen hunte dukrenn le pantch tchon, un hunte marenn len gar. Lengre duka wenn jaake baro, har te dans len i skorpione tchurje.
Un an ko tsiro kamenn i menshe te merell, un nashte merenn gar. Lengro dji nashell pal o merepen, un o merepen nashell lendar.
Un kol stepangre his har graja, kai djan an o kurepen. Un hakenes his ap leskro shero tchomone har i shereskro sonakai, jaake har bare rajen hi. Un lengre muja his jaake, har wans le menshengre muja.
Un lengre balla his har djuwjengre balla. Un len his danda har i bari diwji margodja.
Un ap lengro betch his len sasterne gada. Un koi gole, hoi lengre mussja kran, his har koi gole, hoi bud wurdja pengre grajentsa krenn, kai an o kurepen nashenna.
Un len his porja, un dan tchurje har i skorpione tchurje denna. Un lengri soor his an lengre porja, te dukrenn le i menshen pantch tchonna.
Un len hi i rai pral pende. Kowa hi o bolepaskro pral o telstunepen. Kowa kharell ap hebretikes Abadon. Un ap grichtikes kharell lo Apoljon.
Jek bibacht was ap i menshende. Un dui wawar wenn pal kaja.

Un o shobto bolepaskro phurdas an peskri bashepaskri. Un me shunom i rakepen. Kowa was win dran kol star shinga, hoi ap o Debleskro sonakaskro bob hi, ap koleste gudlo kasht o Debleske chatchedo wella. Ko sonakaskro bob hi glan o Debleste tardo.
Un ko rakepen penas ap ko shobto bolepaskro, kai hi les koi bashepaskri an o wast: "Muk kol star bolepangre te djal, kai pash o baro pani Eufrat pandlo hi! Kre lengre shelle pre!"
Un kol starenge wan lengre shelle pre kerdo, te krenn le koi budi, hoi hunte krenn le ap kau diwes, an kau tchon, an kau bersh: Jon hunte marenn hako triinto menshes ap i phub.
Un me shunom, kitse lurde ap pengre graja an o kurepen djan. Kolla his biish serja kope deesh serja.

Un me dikom kol grajen un kolen, kai ap lende klissenna. Kolengre sasterne gada his lolo har i jag un blaueto un djilto. I grajen his shere har bare diwje margodja. Un dran lengre muja was jag un khand, hoi marella.
Koi jag un koi khand maran hako triinto menshes.
I grajen hi lengri soor an lengre muja un an lengre porja. Lengre porja hi har sapa, un len hi shere. Kolentsa dukrenn le i menshen phares.

Un kol wawar menshe, kai gar maredo wan, kolla mukan gar pengro tchilatcho drom, un mukan gar tele, te mangenn le kowa an, hoi jon pen pengre wastentsa kran. Jon mukan gar tele, te mangenn le i bengen an, witar gar kol figuren dran sonakai, rup, saster, barra un kasht, hoi gar nai dikenna, un gar nai shunenna, un gar nai nashenna.
Un jon mukan gar pengro bengeskro koowa un pengro wi-ladjedo koowa, un mukan gar tele te marell un te tchorell.

Un me dikom i wawar sorelo bolepaskres dran o bolepen tele te well. I wolka his trul leste har i ripen. Un i brishineskro bogo his ap leskro shero. Leskro mui his har o kham, un leskre herja har dran jag.
Un les his i liil an peskro wast, hoi gar khetne uledo his. Un job tchiwas peskri tchatchi heri ap o baro pani, un i serwi heri ap i phub.
Un job das soreles gole, har i bari diwji margodja soreles gole della. Un har job gole das, shunom efta sorele gole dran o bolepen.
Har me kamom kol laba, hoi shunom, pre te tchinell, penas jek dran o bolepen ap mande: "Ma tchin ko bolepaskro rakepen pre, te djinell les kek!"
Un ko bolepaskres, kai dikom ap o baro pani un ap i phub tardo, kowa hadas peskro tchatcho wast pre an o bolepen,

un das pes sowel pash koleste, kai djiwella kanna un hako tsiro, kowa hoi o bolepen kras, un lauter, hoi an leste hi, ninna i phub un lauter, hoi ap late hi, un ninna o baro pani, un lauter, hoi an leste hi. Un o bolepaskro penas: "O tsiro hi trujal."

An kol diwessa, kai o eftato bolepaskro rakrella, un an peskri bashepaskri phurdella, hi lauter kerdo, hoi o Debles an o dji his, te kras lo les jaake har job ap peskre budepangre penas, te well kowa.
Un kowa, kai dran o bolepen ap mande rakras, rakras pale mantsa, un penas ap mande: "Dja pash ko bolepaskro, hoi ap o baro pani un ap i phub tardo hi! Un le o liil dran leskro wast!"

Un me djom koi, un penom ap leste: "Mangau tut, de man ko liil!" Un job penas ap mande: "Le les, un cha les pre! O liil well tuke phares an tiro per tchiddo, ninna te hi lo gudlo har o gwin an tiro mui."
Un me lom ko liil dran leskro wast, un chom les pre. Un an miro mui his lo gudlo har gwin. Un har chom les pre, his lo mange phares an o per tchiddo.
Un jon penan ap mande: "Tu hunte rakress pale pral kowa, hoi wella pral i menshende un lengre rajende, kai djiwenna an bud themma, kai wenna dran bud natione, un rakrenna bud wawar rakepen."

Un jek das man i kasht an o wast, un penas ap mande: "Tchip kowa ap o tselo Debleskro baro kheer, un dik palla, har baro kowa hi. Dik ninna palla, har baro o Debleskri chapaskri hi. Un dik, kitse menshe kote o Debles sharenna!
Un ko kotar phub glan o Debleskro baro kheer, kote tchip ko kasht gar pre. Ko kotar phub well kolende dino, kai kek bibolde hi. Un jon stakrenn o Debleskro foro khetne star-deesh-te-dui tchon.

Un me bitchrau dui rakepangren an ko foro. Kolla penenn i menshenge o tchatchepen pral mande. Lengre ripja hi kerdo dran gone. Deesh-te-dui-sheel-te-shob-desha (1.260) diwessa penenn jon lenge mire laba."
Kolla dui mursha hi kol dui djeteskre ruka un kol dui momlia, hoi hi tardo glan o Debleste, kai hi o rai pral kai phub.
Un te kamell jek te dukrell lo len, palle djal i jag dran lengro mui win, un chatchrell les pre. Jaake merenn lauter kolla, kai kamenn len tchilatchepen te krell.

Len hi i soor, te rikrenn le o brishin pale, jaake te dell kek brishin ap ko tsiro, kai jon o Debleskro lab penenna. Un len hi i soor pral o pani, te nai krenn le dran kol tsele panja rat. Ninna hi len i soor, te nai anenn le haki bibacht pral i phub, jaake bud kope, har jon kamenna.
Un te rakran jon i tsele laba, hoi o Dewel lenge penas, palle well o ficho dran o telstunepen pre. Un ko ficho hi sorleder har jon, un marell len.
Un kal mule mursha hi ap o drom tchiddo an ko baro foro, kai ninna lengro rai ap o trushel maredo was. Kau foro hi har o foro Sodom un har o them Egiptia.
Un bud menshe dran hako them, haki nationa, haki harmenationa un hako rakepen dikenn kol mule murshen ap o drom tchiddo triin diwessa un i paash diwes, un mukenn gar, te wenn jon paskedo.

I menshe ap i phub hi bachtelo, un giwenna un khelenna. Un jek bitchrell o wawareske shukar koowa. Jaake bachtelo hi le, te hi kol dui Debleskre rakepangre mulo, kai dukran kolen, kai ap i phub djiwenna.
Un me dikom: Pal kol triin-te-paash diwessa kras o Dewel len pale djido. Un jon stan pre. Un i bari daar tapras kolen, kai kowa dikan.
Un kol dui shunan i sorelo rakepen dran o bolepen, hoi ap lende penas: "Awenn kate pre!" Un jon djan an o bolepen pre. Un lauter kolla, hoi chojedo ap lende his, dikan kowa.

Un ap jek kopo trissas i phub soreles. Un o deshto kotar ko forestar peras khetne. Un efta serja (7.000) menshe wan maredo. Un kol wawaren tapras i bari daar, un jon sharan o Debles, kai an o bolepen hi.
I duiti bibacht hi pal lende. Un i triinti bibacht wella sik.

Un ko eftato bolepaskro phurdas an peskri bashepaskri. Koi his i rakepen an o bolepen, un bud dan bari gole, un penan: "Kanna hi o Dewel un leskro tchawo, o Jesus Kristo, i raja pral i tsele menshende ap i phub hako tsireske."
Un kol biish-te-star tchatchepangre phure, kai glan o Debleste ap pengre beshepangre beshdo hi, kolla witsran pen glan o Debleste tele, un sharan les,
un penan: Mer parkrah men pash tute, maro rai. Tu hal o sorelo Dewel. Tu djiweh kanna har djiwal an o phuro tsiro. Tu sikral tiri bari soor, un wal o rai pral halauter.

I tsele natione choiran pen pral tute. Doleske was tiri choli pral lende. Kanna hi o tsiro kai, te well o tchatchepen wi-rakedo pral i mulende. Kanna was ko tsiro, te dess tiro brawlepen kolende, kai tuke budran, kai an tiro lab rakran, lauterende, kai tire menshe hi, un tut sharenna, un tutar darenna, i tikne har i bare. I tsiro hi ninna kai, te maress kolen, kai i menshen ap i phub maran.

Un o Debleskro kheer an o bolepen was pre kerdo. Un an o Debleskro kheer dikom me ko sonakaskro mochton, hoi sikrella, kai o Dewel o maal peskre menshendar hi. Un i jag das karje dran o bolepen pre te tele. Un o bolepen das bari gole, har koi gole, hoi o bolepen della, te dell baro brishin un te djal jag tele dran o bolepen. Un i phub trissas, un das brishin har bare barra.
Un i baro koowa sikras pes ap o bolepen: I djuwel hi koi. Kolakro ripen hi o kham. Un tel lakre pire hi o tchon. Un ap lakro shero hi deesh-te-dui bolepangre momlia.
Un joi hi an wawar koowa, un lakro tarnepen kamell te well. Un joi dell gole i dukatar.
Un i wawar baro koowa sikras pes ap o bolepen: I baro lolo sap was. Un les hi efta shere un deesh shinga. Un ap hako shero hi i shereskro sonakai.

Un leskri pori tsardell o triinto kotar kol bolepangre momlijendar krik, un witsras len tele ap i phub. Un ko baro lolo sap hi glan koi djuwjate tardo, kai an o tsiro was, te well o tarnepen. Un jaake sik, har ko tarnepen wals, kamas les lo pre te chal.

Un joi las i mursh tchawes. Kowa te well o rai pral i menshende an i tsele themma ap i phub. Job anell len i sasterno wasteha. Un lakro tchawo was pre hadedo pash o Debleste, un pash leskro beshepaskro.

Un koi djuwel nashas an o mulo them, kai kek menshe djiwenna. Kote hi o Debles lake i kotar phub, kai atchell li deesh-te-dui-sheel-te-shob-deesh (1.260) diwessa, un lell halauter, hoi lat hunte wella djipaske.
Un an o bolepen was i baro kurepen: O Michael un leskre bolepangre kuran pen o baro lolo sapeha un leskre kurepangre.
Un o Michael un leskre bolepangre his sorleder. Un o baro lolo sap un leskre kurepangre nashte atchenn buder gar an o bolepen.

Un o baro lolo sap was wi witsedo. Job hi ko phuro sap, hoi kharella ninna Beng un Satan, ko chocheno, kai tsardell i menshen ap i tseli phub ap peskro drom. Job was tele witsedo ap i phub, un leskre kurepangre leha.

Un me shunom i sorelo rakepen an o bolepen, hoi penas: Kanna las men maro Dewel dran o bengeskro wast win. Maro Dewel sikras peskri soor, un was o rai pral i tsele menshende ap i phub. Un job das peskri tseli soor koles, kai job wi rodas, te well lo o baro rai pral halauter. Tele witsedo hi ko phukepaskro, kai anas i doosh ap mare phralende glan o Debleste o diwes un i rati.

Mare phrala his sorleder har ko phukepaskro. O tarno bakro, hoi maredo was, kowa thowas lengri doosh peskro rateha tele. Mare phrala sikran i menshende o tchatcho drom pash o Debleste, ninna te wan le doleske maredo.

Lauter kolla, kai djiwenna an o bolepen, lengro dji dell gole i bachtjatar. Kol wawar, kai djiwenn ap i phub un ap o baro pani, i bibacht well ap lende. Pash lende was o beng. Leske atchell gar bud tsiro. Kowa djinell lo. Doleske hi les i bari choli.
Un har ko baro lolo sap dikas, te was lo ap i phub witsedo, las lo koi djuwjat palla, kai ko tchawes las.

Un koi djuwjake wan tchirklengre mussja dino, har i baro tchirkles hi, te nai djal li an o mulo them ap ko kotar phub, kai joi nai djiwella dur krik ko sapestar. Kote atchell li triin-te-paash bersha. Un kote lell li halauter te chal un te pijell.
Un ko sap kras peskro mui pre, un tchungras bud sorelo pani pal koi djuwjate win, te tassell li an ko pani.
Koi kras i phub peskro mui pre, un pijas ko tselo sorelo pani, hoi ko baro lolo sap dran peskro mui win tchungras.
Un ko baro lolo sap was chojedo ap koi djuwjate, un djas koi, te marell lo lakre tchawen. Kolla hi kol menshe, kai shunenn ap o Debleskro lab, un djan ap o Jesuseskro drom.
Un o baro lolo sap his pash o baro pani tardo.

Un me dikom dran o baro pani i fiches pre te well. Koles his deesh shinga un efta shere. Un ap haki shing hidjas lo i shereskro sonakai. Un ap leskre shere his sawe laba tchindlo, hoi praassenn o Debles.

Un ko ficho, hoi me dikom, his har i bari diwji margodja. Leskre herja his baro un sorelo. Un an leskro mui his bare danda. Un ko baro lolo sap das les peskri soor un peskro beshepaskro, te was ko ficho i baro rai, koles bud penepaske hi.
Un jek leskre sherendar his, har te wals lo maredo. Un les hi i baro tchinepen. Un ko tchinepen was sasto. Un i tsele menshe ap i phub kran bare jaka un djan ko ficheske palla.

I menshe djinan, kowa his o baro lolo sap, hoi das o ficheste peskri soor. Doleske sharan le o lolo sapes. Un jon sharan ninna o fiches, un penan: "Kek hi sorleder har o ficho! Kek nai kurell pes leha un well sorleder!"
Un o ficho rakras un phurdas pes pre un praassas o Debles. Star-deesh-te-dui (42) tchonna nai kras o ficho kowa.
Un job praassas o Debles, un rakras djungeles pral leskro lab un leskro kheer. Ninna kolen, kai an o bolepen djiwenna, praassas lo.

Un o Dewel mukas o fiches te kurell lo pes o Debleskre menshentsa, un mukas, te well lo sorleder har jon. Un kol fiches was i soor pral i menshende dran hake themma, haki nationa, haki harmenationa un hako rakepen.

Lauter, hoi ap i phub djiwenna, sharenn ko fiches, - lauter kolla, kolengre laba gar tchindlo hi an o djipaskro liil. Kolla, kai lengre laba dre tchindlo hi an kau liil, hi jaake raha dre tchindlo, har i phub koi hi. Kau liil hi o tarno bakres, hoi maredo was.
Tumer lauter, shunenn mishto, hoi tumenge penau!
Koon stildo hunte well, kowa well stildo. Koon o chareha maredo hunte well, kowa well o chareha maredo. Doleske hunte wenn o Debleskre menshe soreles tardo an o patsepen, te denn le gar pre.
Un me dikom i wawar fiches dran i phub pre te well. Un les his dui shinga har i tarno bakro. Un job rakras har o baro lolo sap.

Les hi i tseli soor, hoi ninna ko fiches hi, hoi dran o baro pani was. Un ko duito ficho kras, te sharenn i tsele menshe ap i phub ko fiches, hoi dran o baro pani was, koles ko baro tchinepen his, un pale sasto was. Un ko ficho, hoi dran o baro pani was, kowa dikas lauter, hoi ko duito ficho kras,

un das koles i soor, te krell job baro koowa, jaake baro, te mukas lo ninna i jag dran o bolepen glan i menshende tele te perell. Un kowa kras lo, te anell lo i menshen ap i phub ap o bengeskro drom. Job penas lenge, te krenn le penge i fiches, hoi wi-dikella har ko ficho, kai les his o tchinepen o charestar, un dran kowa meras, un pale djido was.
Un ko duito ficho las i soor, te krell lo ko fiches djido, hoi i menshe penge kran, jaake te nai rakrell kowa ninna, un te nai krell job, te wenn lauter maredo, kai les gar an-mangenna.

Un i tsele menshe hi an o wast ko fichestar: I bare har i tikne, i brawele har i tchorwele, i raja un i budepangre. Kolla lauter hunte krenn i sikepen ap pende. Hi sawe, kai hunte tchinenn les ap pengro tchatcho wast. Wawar hunte tchinenn les glan ap pengro shero.
Ko sikepen nai well o ficheskro lab, ninna leskri numra. Koles, kai ko lab gar ap peste hi, witar gar leskri numra, kowa nashte ginell tchi, un nashte bikrell tchi.
Kate hunte well men goswepen. Koon gosewo hi, kowa nai hatsell ko lab win. Ko lab hi i mensheskro lab. Leskri numra hi triin shoba (666).

Un me dikom ko tarno bakres ap i berga Zion tardo. Un leha his jek-sheel-te-star-deesh-te-star serja (144.000) menshe. Kolen hi o Jesuseskro lab un o lab leskro dadestar glan ap lengre shere tchindlo.

Un me shunom i gole dran o bolepen. Kai gole his jaake sorelo har bud panja gole denna, un har koi gole, hoi o bolepen krella, te dell baro brishin, un te dell jag karje tele ap i phub. Kai gole his ninna jaake har o bashepen, hoi kol bashepangre krenna, hoi harfe kharenna.

Un jon giwenn i newi gili glan o rajeskro beshepaskro, un glan kol star sorele bolepangre un glan kol tchatchepangre phurende. Un kek nai giwas koi gili, har kokres kol jek-sheel-te-star-deesh-te-star serja (144.000) menshe. O tarno bakro plaissras lenge peskro rateha, te lell lo len i phubjatar wi, un te anell lo len khetne o Debleske.
Kolengro djipen hi djudjo. An kek tsireske wan le khetne i djuwjaha. Un jon djan o tarno bakreske palla, kai job ninna djala. Dran i menshende ap kai phub las job len khetne peske un o Debleske.
An lende hi kek chochepen, witar kek tchilatchepen.

Un me dikom i wawar bolepaskres dur pral ap o bolepen. Kowa hunte penas i menshenge o latcho lab, hoi atchella un gar pre-herella. Job penas les i tsele menshenge, hoi ap i phub djiwenna, haki nationa, haki harmenationa, hako rakepen, un an hake themma.

Un job das bari gole: "Darenn o Deblestar un sharenn les! Ko tsiro hi kanna kai, kai job o tchatchepen pral i tsele menshende wi-rakrella. Witsrenn tumen tele glan koleste, kai kras o bolepen un i phub, un o baro pani, un mangenn les an!"

Un i duito wawar bolepaskro was pal leste, un penas: "O baro foro peras khetne. O baro foro Babilon peras khetne, ko foro, hoi anas i menshen an i tsele themma ap peskro drom, te kran le wi-ladjedo koowa. Kowa his jaake har te das lo len mool te pijell. Doleske was o Debleskri choli pral o foro."

Un i triinto wawar bolepaskro was pal lende, un das bari gole: "Kolla, kai mangenn o fiches an, un ko fiches, hoi was i menshendar kerdo, un kolla, kai tchinan leskro sikepen glan ap pengro shero, ninna ap pengro wast.

Jon hunte pijenn o Debleskri mool. Kai mool hi o Debleskri choli. Kaja hi jaake soreli har i mool, kai kek pani dren hi. Kolla, kai mangenn o fiches an, hunte djan an i bari jag. Un koi jag un i jagakri khand krenn lenge bare duka. Un jon dikenn o Debleskre bolepangren un o tarno bakres.
Un i khand koi jagatar, hoi krell len sawe bare duka, djal pre hako tsiro. Kolla, kai mangan o fiches an un ko kerdo fiches, un lan leskro sikepen ap pende, kolen hi duka o diwes un i rati.
Doleske hunte wenn o Debleskre menshe soreles tardo an o patsepen, kolla lauter, kai krenna, hoi o Dewel kamella, un djan tchatchepaha ap o Jesuseskro drom."

Un me shunom, har i rakepen dran o bolepen penas: "Tchin kowa an i liil dre: Kanna un an ko tsiro, hoi wella, hi kolla bachtele, kai merenna un rikran soreles pengro patsepen ap o rajeste, o Jesuseste." "Awa," penell o Debleskro Ducho, "lenge djal latches, un jon bistrenn pengri tseli phari budi. Kowa, hoi jon kran o Debleske hi gar bistedo an o bolepen."
Un me dikom i parni wolka. Koi pre his jek beshdo, hoi dikas wi har i mensho. Koles his ap leskro shero i shereskro sonakai, un an leskro wast his les i bangi tchuri, hoi mishto tchinella.

Un i wawar bolepaskro was wi dran o Debleskro baro kheer, un das ap koleste bari gole, hoi ap i wolka beshdo hi, un penas ap leste: I phub un i menshe koi pre hi har i hachetikri phub, kai o djob baro was. Le tiri bangi tchuri, un tchin ko djob tele un pande les khetne! I tsiro hi kanna kai, te tchineh les tele.
Un kowa, kai ap i wolka beshdo his, witsras peskri bangi tchuri pral i phub. Un o djob was tchindlo un khetne pandlo.
Un i wawar bolepaskro was wi dran o Debleskro kheer an o bolepen. Un les his ninna i tchuri, hoi mishto tchinella.

Un i wawar bolepaskro his pash o Debleskri jag tardo. Un job his o rai pral i jag. Kowa was glan, un das ap koleste soreles gole, koles koi latchi tchuri hi, un penas: "I phub hi har i drakengro ruk. Le tiri tchuri, un tchin i drake tele! I tsiro hi kanna kai, te tchineh len tele."
Un ko bolepaskro witsras peskri tchuri pral i phub, un tchinas i drake tele, un witsras len an i bari piri, kai wenn i drake stakedo. Koi bari piri hi o Debleskri choli.
Win glan o foro wan kol drake an koi bari piri stakedo. Un o rat nashas koi win, jaake bud, te djas o rat o grajenge pash lengre muja, un nashas triin-sheel (300) kilometarja dur.

Un me dikom i wawar baro koowa an o bolepen. Kowa his baro un dareno. Kote his efta bolepangre, kai anenn efta kope i bari phagi pral i phub. Pal koi eftati phagi well buder kek phagi. Palle hi o Dewel buder gar chojedo.

Un me dikom tchomone har i baro pani. Kowa his djudjo har i wali. Un jag his koi dre. Un pash o baro pani dikom me kolen, kai sorleder his har ko ficho un har ko ficho, hoi i menshendar kerdo was. Jon mukan witar gar, te was o ficheskro lab ap lende tchindlo. Un len his bashepangre, hoi kharenna harfe. Kolen das lende o Dewel an lengre wasta.

Un jon giwan koi gili, hoi o Debleskro budepaskro, o Mose, giwas. Jon giwan lat o tarno bakreske, un penan: Baro un shukar hi halauter, hoi tu kral, maro rai, tu sorelo Dewel! Mishto un tchatcho hi tire dromma, baro rai pral i tsele themma!

Tutar darella hakeno, tiro labestar penenn le: Har baro un shukar hi lo! Maro rai, o baro Dewel hal tu. Kek wawar hi jaake har tu. I raja wenna dran hake themma; glan tute witsrenn le pen tele, te sharenn le tut. Lauter dikan, har pal o tchatchepen tu djal, har tu i menshende lengri phagi dal.
Un pal kowa dikom, har koi kutch isema pre kerdo was an o Debleskro tikno kheer an o bolepen.
Un kol efta bolepangre, kai efta kope i bari phagi pral i phub anenna, kolla wan dran o Debleskro kheer win. Len his djudje parne ripja ap pende, un trul lengro betch buchle sonakangre dorja.

Kote his ninna kol star sorele bolepangre tardo. Un jek lendar das kol efta bolepangren efta sonakangre tchare an lengre wasta. An kol tchare his i choli o Deblestar, kai djiwell kanna un hako tsireske.
Un o Debleskro kheer his pherdo tampa, hoi was dran o Debleskro railepen un soor. Un kek nai djas kote an o Debleskro kheer dre, bis te anan kol efta bolepangre efta kope i bari phagi pral i phub.
Un me shunom, har jek dran o Debleskro kheer bari gole das un ap kol efta bolepangre penas: "Djan wi un tchorenn kol efta tchare, kai pherdo Debleskri choli hi, pral i phub win!"

Un o glanstuno bolepaskro djas un tchoras peskro tcharo wi pral i phub. Koi was i djungelo un tchilatcho nasslepen ap kol menshende, kai lan o ficheskro lab ap pende, un mangan o fiches an, hoi i menshendar kerdo was.
Un o duito bolepaskro tchoras peskro tcharo wi pral o baro pani. Un o pani was rat, har i mulestar. Un lauter meras, hoi an o baro pani djiwas.
Un o triinto bolepaskro tchoras peskro tcharo wi pral kol bare un tikne panja, hoi wenna dran i phub wi. Un kolla wan rat.

Un me shunom, har penas ko bolepaskro, koles i soor pral i panja hi: "Tu, o baro Dewel, djiweh kanna, har djiwal an o phuro tsiro. O tchatchepaskro Dewel hal tu. Kowa, hoi tu rakreh, hi mishto un tchatcho.
Jon maran tire menshen, ninna tire rakepangren, un mukan lengro rat te nashell. Un kanna hunte pijenn le o rat. Kowa hi lengri phagi."
Un me shunom, har jek pash o Debleskri jag penas: "Awa, rai, maro sorelo Dewel, mishto kral, kai tu dal len sawi phagi."
Un o starto bolepaskro tchoras peskro tcharo wi pral o kham. Un o kham las i soor, te nai chatchrell lo i menshen.
Un i menshe wan soreles chatchedo. Un jon praassan o Debles, kai das len koi phagi. Un jon mukan gar pengro tchilatcho drom, un sharan o Debles gar.
Un o pantchto bolepaskro tchoras peskro tcharo wi pral o ficho un leskro them, kai job o rai hi. Un i rati was ap lende. Un leskre menshe dandran ap pengri tchip i dukatar.
Lengre duka dran o djungelo nasslepen his jaake baro, kai praassan le o Debles an o bolepen. Un jon mukan gar pengro tchilatcho koowa, hoi jon kran.
Un o shobto bolepaskro tchoras peskro tcharo win pral o baro pani, hoi kharella Eufrat. Un ko pani djas pale. Jaake was i drom kerdo kol rajenge, kai wenna dran o them, kai o kham pre djal.

Un me dikom triin benga, hoi dikan win har djambe. Kolla wan wi, jek dran o baro sapeskro mui, jek dran o ficheskro mui, un jek dran ko rakepaskro mui, kai job i chocheno hi, un krell pes, har te wals lo i Debleskro rakepaskro.
Kolla triin benga krenn baro un sorelo koowa, un djan pash i rajende pral i tsele themma, te anenn jon pengre lurden khetne, te djan le an o kurepen ap o Debleskro baro diwes.

Un i triin benga anan len khetne an i them, hoi kharella ap hebretikes: Harmagedon. Kanna shunenn, hoi o Jesus Kristo penella! Job penella: "Me wau har i tchorepaskro. Bachtelo hi kowa, kai jak della, un gar sowella, un leskre koola ap leste hi, jaake te hi lo gar nango un ladjella."

Un o eftato bolepaskro tchoras peskro tcharo wi an o ducho, hoi djal pral i phub. Un dran o Debleskro kheer was i rakepen kote win, kai o rajeskro beshepaskro hi, un penas soreles: "Kanna hi lauter kerdo."

Koi das i jag dran o bolepen karje pre te tele, un was i bari gole wi, har koi gole, hoi o bolepen krella, te dell baro brishin un te djal jag tele ap i phub. Un i phub trissas jaake soreles, har dikan le kowa gar jaake raha, har menshe ap i phub hi.
Un o baro foro phagas an triin kotja. Un i forja an i wawar themma peran khetne. O Dewel bistras ko baro foro Babilon gar, un mukas i menshen kote peskri choli te pijell har mool.
Un hako them, hoi an o baro pani tchiddo hi, djas tele. Un i berge his buder gar koi.
Un das brishin har bare barra. Kolla his jaake pharo har i mensho, un peran tele dran o bolepen ap i menshende. Har i menshe sawi bari phagi lan, praassan le o Debles.

Un jek kol efta bolepangrendar, kai hi len kol efta tchare an i wasta, kowa was pash mande, un penas: "Ab kai! Me kamau tut i phagi te sikrell, hoi ko foro lella, hoi pash bud panja tchiddo hi. Ko foro hi har i djuwel, kai kras wi-ladjedo koowa.
I bare raja ap kai phub tchiwan pen laha khetne. Ko wi-ladjedo koowa, hoi koi djuwel kras, hi har i mool, hoi pijan kolla, kai ap i phub djiwenna, un latar mato wan."

Un o Debleskro Ducho was pral mande. Un o bolepaskro anas man an o mulo them. Un me dikom i djuwel ap i lolo ficho beshdo, hoi les efta shere un deesh shinga his. Un ap koleste his sawe laba tchindlo, hoi praassenn o Debles.

Un koi djuwel his rido an i kutch lolo ripen. Un ap late hi sonakai un kutch barra un mirklia. Un lat his i sonakaskro khoro an lakro wast, pherdo djungelo koowa un sawo koowa, hoi hi pale-tchiddo glan o Debleste. Kau koowa was dran lakro wi-ladjedo djipen.
Un ap lakro shero his i lab tchindlo, hoi i menshe gar haiwan: "Koi bari Babilon, kolatar wella hako djunglepen un wi-ladjedo koowa ap i phub."
Un me dikom, kai koi djuwel mato his o ratestar, hoi nashas, har o Debleskre menshe maredo wan, kolla, kai patsan ap o Jesuseste un dan pengro patsepen gar pre. Un me nashte patsom gar, hoi dikom.
Un ko bolepaskro penas ap mande: "Hoske patseh tu gar, hoi dikeh? Me kamau tuke te penell, koon koi djuwel hi, un koon ko ficho hi, hoi lat hidjella, un koles kol efta shere un kol deesh shinga hi.

Ko ficho his djido, un djiwell kanna buder gar, un well dran o telstunepen pale pre. Un palle djal lo hako tsireske nashedo. I tsele menshe krenn bare jaka, te dikenn le, te well ko ficho pale, hoi djido his, un kanna buder gar djiwella. Jon hi kolla, kolengre laba gar dre tchindlo wan an o djipaskro liil, har i phub gomme gar koi his.
Kanna hunte well men goswepen, te haiwas kowa: I efta shere ko fichestar hi efta berge, ap kolende koi djuwel beshdo hi. Kal shere hi ninna efta bare raja:
Pantch kolendar meran, ko jek hi koi, un ko wawar was gomme gar. Un te well lo, hunte atchell lo i tikno tsiro.
Ko ficho, hoi djido his, un kanna buder gar djiwella, job hi o ochtato. Ninna hi lo jek kol eftendar, un djal hako tsireske nashedo.

Un kol deesh shinga, hoi dikal, hi deesh bare raja. Kolen hi kanna gomme kek penepaske pral i menshende. Well i diwes, kai well len i soor, te wenn le bare raja pral i menshende khetne o ficheha i tikno tsireske.
Kolla rikrenn khetne, te denn le pengri soor ko fiches, te well koles bud penepaske.

Un jon kurenn pen ko tarno bakreha. Un o tarno bakro hi sorleder har jon. Job hi o rai pral i tsele rajende, un o pralstuno pral i tsele pralstunende. Un pash leste hi kolla, kolen job gole das un wi rodas, kolla, kai ap leste patsenna."

Un o bolepaskro penas ap mande: "Tu dikal, kai beshell koi djuwel, hoi wi-ladjedo koowa krell, pash bud panja. Kol panja hi menshe dran haki harmenationa, dran hako them, haki nationa, un hako rakepen.
Un kol deesh shinga, hoi dikal, khetne o ficheha wenn le chojedo ap koi djuwel, un lenn lake lauter krik, hoi lat hi, jaake te hi li nango. Un jon chan lakro mass un chatchrenn lat pre.

Kowa das len o Dewel an lengre djia, te krenn jon, hoi job kamella. Doleske rikrenn le lauter khetne, un denn pengri soor ko ficheste. Kowa djala lauter jaake raha, bis te was lauter jaake, har o Dewel penas.
Un koi djuwel, hoi tu dikal, kaja hi ko baro foro, hoi hi les penepaske pral i bare rajende ap kai phub."
Pal kowa dikom i wawar bolepaskres, kai dran o bolepen tele wella. Koles his i bari soor. Un i phub was pherdo leskro railepen.

Un job das soreles un bares gole: "O foro peras khetne! O baro foro Babilon peras khetne! Kanna djiwenn kote i benga. Kote khatrenn pen kol tchirkle un wawar fiche, kai pale-tchiddo hi, un i menshe darenn lendar.

I Babilon tsardas i menshen an hake themma an bi-pandlo un wi-ladjedo koowa. Kowa his har mool, hoi i menshe pijan. Un i bare raja ap kai phub tchiwan pen laha khetne. Un i bikepangre un i parepangre wan brawelo dran lakro brawlepen."
Un me shunom, har jek wawar dran o bolepen rakras un penas: "Mire menshe! Djan dran ko foro win, te lenn tumer gar leskri doosh un leskri bibacht ap tumende!
Ko foro hi har i djuwel, hoi wi-ladjedo koowa kras. Lakri doosh hi jaake baro, te djal koi doosh an o bolepen pre. Un o Dewel bistras ko tchilatcho koowa gar, hoi joi kras.

Krenn ap late jaake, har joi ap tumende kras! Denn lat dui kope jaake bud tchilatchepen pale, har joi ap tumende kras! Denn lat i pipen te pijell, hoi hi dui kope sorleder har kowa, hoi joi das tumende te pijell!

Denn lat jaake bud duka un bibacht har his lat i shukar un brawelo djipen ap kai phub! Ninna kanna penell li an lakro dji: Me hom i bari rajetsa. Un man hi lauter doha. Un i bibacht well gar ap mande."

Doleske well i tseli bari bibacht ap jek kopo pral ko foro: merepen, ropen, un bok. Un i jag chatchrella ko foro pre. Sorelo hi o Dewel, maro rai, kai rakrell pral i menshen an o foro o tchatchepen wi, un dell len i tchatchi phagi.
Un i bare raja ap kai phub, kai tchiwan pen lentsa khetne un wan brawelo, kolla denna gole un rowenna, har jon dikenn, te chatchrella ko foro.

Dur glan o foro hi le tardo i darjatar, te well koi bibacht ninna ap lende, un jon penenna: "Dikenn! Hawi bibacht! Hawi bibacht! O baro foro Babilon, o sorelo foro! Leskri phagi was an jek tikno tsiro pral leste."
Un i bikepangre un i parepangre ap kai phub rowenna pral leste, un denna pengre wasta khetne pral o shero. Kek kamell buder lengro koowa te ginell:

Lengro koowa dran sonakai un rup, kutch barra un mirklia, latcho parno thann un kutch lolo thann, un phar, i tsele kutch kashta, hoi latcho sungenna, ninna shukar koowa, hoi kerdo was dran parne danda, dran kutch kasht, dran lolo un kalo saster, dran parne barra,

ninna o tselo kutch thulepen, un ko gudlo kasht, hoi sungella mishto, ninna mool un djet, un latcho jarro un djob, un grumja un bakre, un graja un wurdja, un ninna sawe menshe, kai hunte budrenn i wawarenge.
Ap ko foro Babilon penenn le: "Lauter, hoi tu kamal, nashral. Tiro tselo brawlepen un shukapen hi nashedo, un tu leh les buder gar pale."
Kol bikepangre un parepangre, hoi kol forestar brawelo wan, kolla hi dur lestar tardo i darjatar, te well gar leskri bibacht ap lende. Un jon rowenna un denna lengre wasta pral o shero khetne,
un penenna: "Hawi bibacht! Hawi bibacht! Dikenn, o baro foro! I menshe an leste his rido an latcho parno thann, un an kutch lolo thann, un phar. Un sonakai, un kutch barra, un mirklia his ap lende.

An jek tikno tsiro djas lengro tselo baro brawlepen paash un nashedo!" Dur glan o foro his ninna kolla tardo, kai ap o baro pani hi: I pralstune ap i panjeskre ulepangre, kolla, kai kol ulepangre ulerenna, un kolla, kai ap kol panjeskre ulepangre budrenna, un hakeno, koleskri budi ap o baro pani hi.
Kolla lauter dikan koi jag, hoi ko fores pre chatchras, un dan gole, un penan: "Kek foro his jaake shukar har kawa!"

Un jon lan tchik, un tchiwan les ap pengre shere un rowan, un dan lengre wasta pral o shero khetne, dan gole, un penan: "Hawi bibacht! Hawi bibacht! Dikenn, o baro foro! Leskro brawlepen kras lauter kolen brawelo, kai hi len panjeskre ulepangre ap o baro pani! Un an jek tikno tsiro peras ko foro khetne."

Awenn bachtelo, tumer, kai djiwenn an o bolepen! O baro foro hi paash! Awenn bachtelo, tumer Debleskre menshe! Awenn bachtelo tumer, kai han o Jesuseskre bitchepangre, ninna tumer, kai han o Debleskre rakepangre! Kowa, hoi o foro tchilatches kras ap tumende, das o Dewel ko fores pale.
Un i sorelo bolepaskro hadas i baro bar pre, un witsras les an o baro pani, un penas: "Jaake djal o baro foro Babilon i sorjaha tele. Un tchi buder atchell lestar.
Kek bashepen un kek gipen shunenn le buder kote. Kek budepaskro budrella buder koi. Kek djob hi buder koi, te well dran leste jarro kerdo.

I tsele momlia djan win. Un kek krella pale i momeli an. Tu shuneh buder kek pirno peskri pirnjaha khelell un giwell. I bikepangren un i parepangren an ko foro his bud penepaske ap kai phub. Un ko bengeskro koowa, hoi kran le an o foro, anas i menshen an i tsele themma ap o bengeskro drom.
Ninna nashas an o foro o rat, hoi ratan kol Debleskre rakepangre un o Debleskre menshe, kai kote maredo wan, awa, o rat kolendar lauter, kai ap i phub maredo wan."
Un pal kowa dan bud menshe an o bolepen bari gole: "Halleluja! Maro Dewel las men dran o tchilatchepen un o merepen win. Job hi o rai, un les hi i soor pral halauter.

Latcho un tchatcho hi lo. I phagi, hoi job i menshen das, hi mishto un tchatcho. Job das i bari lubjat lakri phagi. Joi tsardas i menshen ap i tseli phub an wi-ladjedo koowa un maras o Debleskre budepangren. O Dewel das lat ko tchilatchepen pale, hoi joi ap lende kras."
Un jon penan o duito kopo: "Halleluja!" Un ko forestar djas i jagakri khand pre hako tsireske.
Un kol biish-te-star tchatchepangre phure un kol star sorele bolepangre witsran pen tele glan o Debleste, kai ap peskro rajeskro beshepaskro beshdo hi, un sharan les, un penan: "Amen, Halleluja!"
Un i rakepen was kotar, kai o Debleskro beshepaskro hi, un kowa penas: "Sharenn maro Debles, tumer lauter, hoi leske budrenna, un lestar darenna, tikne har bare!"

Koi dan bud menshe gole: "Halleluja!" Koi gole his jaake sorelo, har i baro pani gole della, hoi dur tele perella, un har koi gole, hoi o bolepen krella, te dell baro brishin un te dell jag tele karje. Un jon rakran un penan: "Maro sorelo Dewel was o rai pral lauter.
Te was bachtelo, te giwas un stas, un les sharas! O tsiro hi kanna kai, te romedinerell o tarno bakro. Un leskri pirni kras pes shukar, te djal li leha."
Un joi las i shukar ripen dran djudjo parno thann. Ko latcho parno ripen hi o tchatcho koowa, hoi o Debleskre menshe kran.
Un o bolepaskro penas ap mande: "Tchin an ko liil: Bachtele hi kolla, kai kharedo wan, te wenn le ap o tarno bakreskro bijab. Kal laba hi tchatchepaha o Debleskre laba," penas lo ap mande.

Un me witsrom man glan leste tele, te sharap les. Un job penas ap mande: "Ma kre kowa! Share o Debles! Me hom o Debleskro budepaskro har tu un tire phrala, kai sikrenn i wawar menshende o Jesuseskro drom. Kolen das o Jesus o Debleskro Ducho. Kowa sikrell len, te hi le leskre menshe."

Un me dikom, har o bolepen pre hi. Un kote his i parno grai. Un kowa, kai pre beshdo hi, kharella: Mursh labestar, kai rakrell o tchatchepen. Job te dell i menshen i phagi un kurell pes kolentsa, kai tchilatche hi, djal job pal o tchatchepen.
Leskre jaka hi har i jag. Un ap leskro shero hi bud sonakai bud kutch barentsa. Glan ap leskro shero hi i lab tchindlo. Koles prindjrell kek har job kokres.
Un leskro ripen hi an o rat dre tchiddo. Job kharell: O Debleskro lab.
Un i tsele bolepaskre kurepangre wan leske palla ap parne graja. Len his koola dran parno djudjo thann.

Un dran leskro mui well i charo wi, hoi latches tchinella. Koleha kurell lo pes i menshentsa an i tsele themma, un well sorleder har jon. Job anell len i sasterno wasteha. Jaake har jek i drake paash stakrella, te well i mool win, jaake stakrell lo kolen paash, kai gar ap leste shunenna, un anell i choli o sorelo Deblestar ap lende.
Ap leskro ripen un ap leskri pralstuni heri hi i lab tchindlo, hoi kharella: o rai pral i rajende un o pralstuno pral i pralstunende.
Un me dikom i bolepaskro an o kham tardo. Kowa das soreles gole, un penas ap i tsele tchirkle, kai denn pen dur pral an o bolepen. "Awenn kate pash o Debleskro baro chapen khetne,
